2a1(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa ngas gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
2a2(rgyud): de bzhin pa/ shegs pa thos cad kyi sku dang gsung
2a3(rgyud): thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i drug la bzhugs so// brjid kyis
2b1(rgyud): mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phrar
2b2(rgyud): snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ 'di lnga ste/ 
2b3(rgyud): byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' che na/ be la tshig rdo rje
2b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nyedape sku rdo rje dang / 
2b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsung rdo rje dang / byang chub
3a1(rgyud): bya// sems drapa' ser+ra sra dpa'u re pe thugs rde rje dang
3a2(rgyud): ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na pe nyi nge 'dzin je rje dang /  bang cha
3a3(rgyud): soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba rdo rje dang /  rlu ba sa pa sa dpa
3a4(rgyud): sems dpa' re pre sa rdo rje dang / bang chu sems dpa
3a5(rgyud): sems dpa' char pe chu rdo rje dang / bang ru bas lus dpa' sems dpra'
3a6(rgyud): che po re rdo rje dang / ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
3b1(rgyud): rlung rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha' rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rdo rje dang / 
3b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa'
3b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po re rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po reg bya rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
3b4(rgyud): kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje dang // de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brjod kyis mi 'ang bI
3b5(rgyud): yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa la'i
3b6(rgyud): lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin
3b7(rgyud): chen dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'od dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba dang / de dag la sogs pa
4a1(rgyud): // na mkha'i dbyings thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste dper na/ til gyi gang bu bzhin du/ de ba'i
4a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thaMd kyis na mkha'i dbyings thad shin tu gang bar 'gyur to// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnar snang mdzad chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thad
4a3(rgyud): kyi 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa de dag dzad nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad// de nas dbazhin gshegs
4a4(rgyud): pa de dag zad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe/ gas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po yod su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku dud re dkyi gtsu
4a5(rgyud): su mngon par sprul nas/ bac+doMs rnar snang mdzad can po'i sku las mngon par byung bar gyur te// dalal la ni sangs rgyas spyan lta bu/ la la ni mA ma ki lta bu/ la la ni gos dkar me lta bu/ la la ni
4a6(rgyud): dam tshig sgrol ma lta bu/ la la ni gzugs kyi ngo lta bu/ la la ni sgra'i ngo lta bu/ la la ni dri'i ngo bo lta bu/ la la ni ri'i ngo bo lta bu/ la la ni reg gi ngo bo lta bu/ der yang dag par gnas par gyur to// 
4a7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun me'i b+ha ga la dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdul med pa gru
4b1(rgyud): bzhin byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun tu rgyus// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab// 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhinag rtse
4b2(rgyud): pa kun gyis gnas// de nas bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus bzhag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
4b3(rgyud): mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad
4b4(rgyud): rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs la zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gnon pa
4b5(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas na mkha'i
4b6(rgyud): dbyings 'ang thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par 'gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i phyi ngas thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag
4b7(rgyud): thams cad rdo rje sems pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
4b8(rgyud): ba byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dam tshig 'thung brdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 
5a1(rgyud): rig chen po'i skyes bu'i gardus 'di/ de shin gshegs pa pas cad kyi ga gyis bangs kyim gyi gyi tham so// phyin gyi thabs pa gdu/ yo lnga' chu ba rjid shin gsheg
5a2(rgyud): bde nyid lal gsum pa lta bur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni thugs pa nas byung ste/ ched du
5a3(rgyud): brjod pa 'di chad du brjod do// a ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ byang chub sems ni rab byung ga/  bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsapa/ rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
5a4(rgyud): yang gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa spros pa de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig rin po che'i sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de/ phyag
5a5(rgyud): 'tshal ras 'di skad ces gsol to// 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gas// rdo rje snying po 'dus pa yi// de nyid/ bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
5a6(rgyud): gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gse legs// 'on kyang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the
5a7(rgyud): byed pa na/ bya rgu ses gan gzi sa// gas ma ldan sa de yin gshegs pa da gyur/ rang tshub mam pas cad yod pa dzad pa/ bcos pa
5a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la/ 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can du gyur pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
5b1(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ston par mi spro ba de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes pa thams cad la bibyin gyis brlabs pa mdzad da/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis/ de bzhin
5b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong ba bgyi ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar gyi phyir yang dag par bstan du gsol/ 
5b3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa dmakhan nas/ ya shes kyi sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
5b4(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhes sdang gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // / badz+ra d+h+r-ika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de
5b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rigs pa'i skyes bu de nyid mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyi/ nag po dkar po dmar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
5b6(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gti mug gi rigs kyi mchog gi snying
5b7(rgyud): bo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // dzi na dzi ka/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rigs pa'i skyes bu rnam par snang mdzad
5b8(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/ dkar po nag po dmar po'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
6a1(rgyud): ca kyi na po 'byung ba'adzi rje pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin pa thoms pa zhugs te/ 'di shin gyin bu'i rigs kyi mchog gi steng po'i phreng po di/ dkyi sgra dang gdung dang thugs rdo rdulas
6a2(rgyud): rat+na d+h+r-i// de nas 'di phyung ma bag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rigs pa'i skyes bu rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya chen por sbyor bas nam mkha'i gnas kyis sor
6a3(rgyud): bo nag po dkar po'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i lho phyogasu bzhugaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i rgyun 'byung
6a4(rgyud): brdo rje nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // a ro li ka/ de nas 'di byung ma
6a5(rgyud): thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rigs pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rig pa'i bdag po'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor
6a6(rgyud): ba'i thabs kyis// dmar po nag po dkar po'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rgyub tu bzhugaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa
6a7(rgyud): gdon mi za ba'i mchog/ dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung// 
6a8(rgyud): bradz+nyA d+ha ka de nas 'di phyung ma phag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu grub pa gdon mi za ba'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/ ljang ku dang nag/ 
6b1(rgyud): po dang dkar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i byang phyogasu bzhug so// zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang // yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste// rigs lngar gtogs pa 'di rnams
6b2(rgyud): kyis// 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa'o// de nas lnga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdzasu mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi
6b3(rgyud): btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dwa Shar ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ bud med kyi
6b4(rgyud): gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi grwar bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ rjes su mnyas par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 
6b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // mo ha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
6b6(rgyud): sgra dang bsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu nyid/ bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ lho phyogs kyi grwar nugaso// de bcom ldan 'ad bzhin gshegs pa pad kyi 'dod chags yin pa/ su chags pa skyed pa'i rdo rje nas bya
6b7(rgyud): ma su /  shegs gyi ga na ma ga kyi chung ga nga ju rje tsu/ ga su ga tas pa she yo kyi nga sa
6b8(rgyud): drug kyi na kyis bu dang / khud med kyi gdugs na par gyur te/  phyogs kyi grwang bdug so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dkrugs sru rdo rje zhes bya pa'i ting dzin pa ltom/ 
7a1(rgyud): / par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab 'chang ba'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // badz+ra ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma zag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/ 
7a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ byang phyogs kyi grwar bzhug so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog dam tshig phun sum
7a3(rgyud): tshogs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di/ ding
7a4(rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // ya mAn+ta kr-i ta/ de nas 'di phyung ma dag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ de bzhin ga
7a5(rgyud): pa thams cad bslangs par byed pa'i tshul du shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ kyi mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
7a6(rgyud): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // pradz+nyAn+ta kr-i ta/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
7a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ rdo rje'i dam tshig bstang ba'i tshul du/ lho phyogs kyi spror bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rin po che 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes
7a8(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // pad mAn+ta kr-i
7b1(rgyud): tade nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi tshul du/ nub phyogs kyi sgor bzhug so// de nas
7b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin
7b3(rgyud): gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byungango // bi g+h+nAn+ta kr-i ta/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig
7b4(rgyud): pa'i skyes bu de nyid// de gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thug sa kyi tshul du/ byang phyogs kyi sgor bzhugaso// de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyes par byed pa dang
7b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnam so// de bzhin gshag/ sa pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ti nge 'dzin gyi
7b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md
7b7(rgyud): kyis mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sku dang gsung dang thug kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ bcom ldan snying po bshad du gsol// 
7b8(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen cing / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems
8a1(rgyud): kyi yong su rtog pa yang thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa'adi dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed kyis sems lus lta bu dang / lus sems lta bu dang / sems cig tu
8a2(rgyud): brjod pa lta bur bskrad cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skra dang gsung dang thugs na mkha' lta bur sbar nas/ chad du brjod pa 'di chad du
8a3(rgyud): brjod do// a ma 'o kun tu bzang po yi/ skra dang gsung thugs rdo rje can// skya ba med pa'i tshul gyi su// skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsu
8a4(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// dngos
8a5(rgyud): po med pas sgom pa mang/ bsgom par bya ba sgom pa min// de ltar dngos po dngos mad pas// ma pa dmi gsumed pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
8a6(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 
8a7(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungaso// dngos po thams cad dang bral ba// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ 
8a8(rgyud): stong po nyid kyi rang bzhino// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad bI
8b1(rgyud): rdo rjegs bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa// chos dang chos nyid med pa ste/ rnam pa' lta bu bdag med pa/ byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes
8b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
8b3(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'od gsung so// chos rnams thams cad dngos po med cing // chos kyi mtshan ma nyid rnam par spangs// bdag med chos las kun tu byung // byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// 
8b4(rgyud): zhes btson 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal gyis gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer ba bar ba rdo rje sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la sa
8b5(rgyud): par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungaso// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// ngo bo med de sgom pa'ang med// namakha' tshul du sbyor ba yis// dngos po dag tu rab tu bsgrags// zhes
8b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa gdon mi za ba de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
8b7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pa na mkha' bzhin// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// byang chub tshul 'di brtan
8b8(rgyud): ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gang byang grub pa gdon mi za bas gsung so// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang
9a1(rgyud): // gsung dang thugs kyi gsang pa'i chos kyi khon nyid kyi yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur te// ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma 'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos/ chos bshad pa ni rnga
9a2(rgyud): mtshar cha/ yang dag don ni dag pa'i don// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshalo// bdag med pa yi chos las byung // sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs mdzad pa/ rnam par mi rtog dmigasu med// byang chub sems la bya
9a3(rgyud): 'tsha lo// kun tu bzang po thams cad don// byang chub sems ni rab bskor ba// byang chub spyod pa rdo rje cha/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tshalo// dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// sku dang gsung dang thugs rje
9a4(rgyud): rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ston pa// byang chub sems la bya dag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gas pa 'dus pa las/ byang chub sems
9a5(rgyud): kyi le'u skye gnyis pa'o// / nga nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi 'phro ba'i sprin
9a6(rgyud): bkod pa rdo rje nas bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsung so// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs
9a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbom pa ni// 'od zer sprin gyi bkod pa che// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'dod dang mnyam ka/ 'od zer sna lngas kun tu khyab/ kun nas yongasu zlum po ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyad// mchod pa nas
9a8(rgyud): balngas rgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su// gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// phyag rgya
9b1(rgyud): chen po bsgom par bya// tshogs gnyis dang ni ldan pa yis// bsdus dang gcig tu sbyor ba yis// mi bskyod pa yi rgya mchog dang kadakon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen dang // tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang // thogs med grub
9b2(rgyud): pa'i rgya chen rnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams// rnam par gtsigs la 'jigs 'jigs lha// 
9b3(rgyud): shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// thor tshugs cod pan gyis rgyan po// rab 'bar phyags na 'khor lo bsnams// sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'dra// sangs rgyas sprin gyis
9b4(rgyud): kun tu 'khrigs// de yi phyag na rdo rje cha// rtso mo dgu pa rnam par sgom// maurka ta yi 'od 'dra ba// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par rgyan// kun tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis khyab// phyag na rin chen bsna bas+hog/ pad+ma
9b5(rgyud): rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba/ gtso bo 'dod chags 'bar ba mnga'// rab 'bar phyag na pad+ma bsnams// 'dod chags rdo rje can bsgom bya// 'od zer sna lnga'i 'od 'dra'i sku// gdon mi za
9b6(rgyud): brdo rje nan// zhi ba phyag na ral gri bsnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjed bzhin gshegs
9b7(rgyud): ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ skra dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungaso// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma kro haM/ rin chen chen po kha
9b8(rgyud): dog lnga// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsom// sna yi rtse mor nan tan du// rnal 'byor gyis ni rtag tu sbom// rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro// brtan par ma gyur yong me spro// sangs rgyas 'bar ba 'dra ba'i
10a1(rgyud): / 'od mchog rab sbyin rnams spo bar bya// 'khor lo rdo rje ni chen dang // pad+ma ral gri mtshan chen 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spog nas pa'i
10a2(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar na// pad+ma sgoms
10a3(rgyud): tho bar bya'i chen dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni// rin chen brtson pas bsgom par bya// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba// namakha' 'dra bar bri bar bya// 'di dag sangs rab kyi mchog/ sku gsung
10a4(rgyud): thugs ni bsgoms pa yis// dkyil 'khor rdo rje las byung ba// pad mkhyen pa'i tshul 'thob pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba
10a5(rgyud): 'dus pa las/ rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi la 'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'ad/ sa de bzhin gshegs pa thad yang 'dus nas/ bcom
10a6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po la// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs
10a7(rgyud): pa kun gyis gnas// chos kun bdag med po yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan rnams zad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan min zad yang dag spangs// kun tu
10a8(rgyud): bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung // yes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa
10b1(rgyud): bshang du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med// kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sbyar// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 
10b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum pa khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtso// 'jig rten gsum mchog ston pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi drug
10b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor rab tu nyams dga' bshad// de nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi rdo rje rab 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// 
10b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya// lus ngag sems ni bsgoms pa yis/ shes rab can gyis thig gdab pa// thig skud sar pa legs bkal ba// tshad ma rab tu mdzes
10b5(rgyud): pa yis dathugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ khru ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya// ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan// spro ba zhi bar ni rab tu brtag/ de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// 
10b6(rgyud): rab tu zlum po bri bar bya// de nas las kyi cho ga ni// mthong bas phyag rgya dgod par bya// de'i dbus rdo rje bri ba ni// in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// 'bar ba chen po rtse lnga pa// 'jigs pa dag kyang
10b7(rgyud): rab 'jigs byed// 'khor lo chen po shar phyogs// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par rgyan// rin chen chen po lho phyogasu// 'od zer mang pos rab tu 'khrigs// pad+ma chen po nub phyogasu// pad+ma
10b8(rgyud): rA ga'i kha dog 'dra// ral gri chen po byang phyog su// 'od zer mang pos rab tu 'khrigs/ dbus na sprin dang 'dra ba'i 'od// spyan ni shar gyi grwa ru gr-i// mA ma ki yi rigs 'byung ba'i// rdo rje
11a1(rgyud): de bzhin lho phyogasu// pad+ma kha bya sdong bur bcas// nub phyogasu ni bri bar bya// ud pal mdzes pa byang phyogasu// mthing kha sprin dang 'dra bar bris// tho ba 'bar ba 'od gsal ba// 
11a2(rgyud): shar phyogs sgor ni bri bar bya// rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od bzang ba// be con lho yau phyogasu bris// pad+ma ba bar 'od pad pa// nubi kyi phyogasu bri bar bya// rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje can// byang gi phyogasu rdo rje brika/ thugs kyi dkyil
11a3(rgyud): 'khor dam pa dka/ yongasu gsal bar shes byas nas/ lus dang ngag sems mchod pa yis// nan tan du ni mchod par bya// bud med rab tu mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa ni// dri dang me tog phrang rgyan
11a4(rgyud): te/ yon tan ska rags mA ma kir// shes rabo can gyis byin rlabs la// / de yi dbusu mnyes par bya// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas spros pas// na mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu rgyan// gshang gci khu ba khrag
11a5(rgyud): la sogs// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de ltar byas nas sang+yas dang // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes// de bzhi na gshegs pa zed kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba
11a6(rgyud): gsang ba 'dus pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni// kun gyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi// rdo rje 'chang ba'i
11a7(rgyud): rgyal po ni// gnas kyi dbang phyug kun mchog gis// spyod pa kun mchog chos kyi don// spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal to// rnam par mi rtog don las byung // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rigs// theg pa mchog
11a8(rgyud): ni bla med pa'i// dngos grub rab mchog sgrub par byed// rigs ngan smig ma maldan la sogs// gsod don don gnyer sems pa rnams// theg chen bla na med pa yi// theg mchog 'di la 'grub par gyur/ sen
11b1(rgyud): mtshams med la sogs pa'i// sdig pa chen po byed pa yang // rdo rje thag pa rgya mtsho che// theg pa mchog ni 'di la 'grub// snying nas slob dpon sprod pa dag/ bsgrubs kyang 'grub par yongs mi 'gyur// 
11b2(rgyud): srog gcod pa yi sems can gang // brdzun du smra la dga' ba dang // gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang // rtag tu 'dod pa spyod gang dang // gshang gciza su za ba ste// de dag sgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur// ma dang sring
11b3(rgyud): mo bu mo la// 'dod pa bas ni mnyes byas na// theg chen mchog gi chos nyid kyi// dngos grub rgya che nges 'thob po// sangs rgyas gtso bo'i yum dag la// rnam par mi rtog blo can gyis// mnyes par byas kyang mi gos
11b4(rgyud): te de nas sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrib pa thaMng rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur rmang du gyur te// bcom ldan 'am
11b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi bdag po Ni'i slad du de bzhin gsheg sa bzang kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu'i tshig ngan pa gsung zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs bzad kyis/ 
11b6(rgyud): sgrib pa zade rnar sel ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshig gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams zong de skad
11b7(rgyud): mazer cig/ snying po ye shes can rnams kyi// sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa 'di// snying po chos kyi don las byung // byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin// de nas yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi
11b8(rgyud): lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing // ri rab la sogs pa'i rdul phra mo skad kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs skrag nas rgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zed kyis// bya
12a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' de dag brgyal bar gyur pa gzigs nas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs byang chub
12a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sede 'a chen po 'di dag bslang bar gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ namakha' dang mnyam pa gnyisu med pa'i rdo rje
12a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyom par zhugaso// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
12a4(rgyud): chen po de dag rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thaMng ngo mtshar du gyur// rmad du gyur// dgyes pas khyab par gyur nas// chos kyi dbyings 'di skad ces gsung so// 
12a5(rgyud): e ma'o chos e ma'o chos e mtho chos kyi don 'byung ba/ chos don dag pa bdag med pa// rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal 'dungad/ sku dang gsung thugs rab tu bdag namakha' dang ni mnyam nyid
12a6(rgyud): gnas// rnam par mi 'gyur snang ba med// rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud// thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtso// dus gsum dag gi lam du byung // na mkha' chen po dbyings gyur pa// na mkha'i lam la phyag
12a7(rgyud): 'tshal 'dud// na mkha'i sku las yang dag byung // namakha'i lam la gnas pa po// nam pa'i thugs te chos kyi mchog/ spyod pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal bdud// de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thug
12a8(rgyud): kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ kun tu spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa/ de bzhin gshegags pa zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
12b1(rgyud): gsang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsung so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kro he/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de gshegs pa rdo rje
12b2(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad// rdul dang bral ba'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya bI ting 'dzin la sgoms par zhugs te/ sku byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsung so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas
12b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag tu med pa/ mnyam pa nyid mi gnyis pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsung byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsung so// oM sarba
12b4(rgyud): thA ga ta thAH badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma go ha// rdo rje gsum po de bzhin gdags pa'i gsang // gnas ni gnas kyi rnam par smod par bya// sngags kyi mtshan gyis shin tu mtshan byas la// mchog
12b5(rgyud): rang 'ji mas bsgrub pa nyid du bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de na/ gabye ba pon mcho ga dpal// ye shes smon sa rdo rje zhes byA nga'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te/ sngags
12b6(rgyud): gsungaso// oM sarba ta thA gA ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma go haM// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gabye ba grub pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba// rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
12b7(rgyud): te sngags 'di gsung so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA dz+nyA badz+ra swa b+hA ba A hA ko ha/ rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin mchod par bya// mchod pa rnam po lnga rnams kyis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid
12b8(rgyud): tho ba 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang bas gsungaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang
13a1(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi gsang ba 'di gsung so// sngags la dmigs pa'i lus dang ni/ ngag dang yid kyis bskul nasu/ 
13a2(rgyud): yid ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis// dngos grub rab mchog bsgrub par bya// sems la dmigs pa bdag med pa// ngag dang lus kyang rnam par sgom// na mkha' bzhin du mnyam pa'i gnas// sbyor ba rnam gsum
13a3(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs na// ngo bo nyid ni dmig su med// sngags kyi lus su sbyor ba la// byang chub med cing sgom pa'ang med// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di ni mdor na rnam
13a4(rgyud): dpyang nas// sngags kyis brtags pa'i ting 'dzin// byang chub sbyor ba sgom par bya// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// sangs rgyas kun
13a5(rgyud): mchog kun mkhyen gyis// sgom pa'i mchog ni bka' stsal to// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyi la 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab
13a6(rgyud): bsgoms nas// phra mo'i sbyor ba kun tu brtsam// sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam// 'gro dang mi 'gro yungs kar la// ye shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba// gsang ba'i ye shes kyis brtag sgom// nam
13a7(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas sku yi gnas bsgoms te// de yi steng du gnas bzhag go// hUMd namakha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal
13a8(rgyud): ba'i dkyi lo 'khor bsgom par bya// spun gyi tshul du sbyor ba la// rdo rje pad+ma rnam par sgom// nem pa'i dasgyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom por bya// mchog gi sbyor ba nan tan gyis
13b1(rgyud): da yi steng du yongasu sbom// namakha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi ba spro// 'khor yang khyad par dag tu spro// ud ngal mthing ka'i mdog 'dra ba
13b2(rgyud): rtse mo lnga pa khyad par du// nas kyi 'bru tsom nan tan gyis// sna yi rtse mor rnam par bsam// tsa na ka yau 'bru tsam la// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// sna yi rtse mor 'di shes te// bsgoms pas byang
13b3(rgyud): chub gzhol bar 'gyur// 'khor lo la sogs khyad par du// sgom pa der ni brtag par bya// dngos grub thams cad yon tan gnas// nyams dga' byang chub gnas 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub
13b4(rgyud): gnas rnams ni// de ru mdor na spro bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa yi/ chos kyi tshig rnams rab tu brjod// da nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// de nyid don kun ston pa pos// spyod pa
13b5(rgyud): kun mchog legs dag pa// gsang ba'i dam pa bka' stsal to// / gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa// shes rab can gyi sa zla drug sgom// gsang ba'i de nyid mchod chen gyiso// 
13b6(rgyud): legs par mchod nas bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// zas su gshing gci zos na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa// yang dag bla med grub par 'gyur// zas su sha rnams
13b7(rgyud): za ba dang // sha chen dag ni rab brtags na// sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba yi// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// / glang po'o sha dang rta yi sha// de bzhin dam pa khyi ya sha// zas kyi phyir ni
13b8(rgyud): bza' bar bya// zas gzhan dag ni ma zos na// byang chub sems dpa' blo can dang // sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// sbyar du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur ro// 'dod
14a1(rgyud): khams dbang phyugs 'jig rten nu// go 'phang las ni byed par 'gyur/ gtso bo gzi can stobs dang ldan// mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong // mthong ba tsam gyis bskul
14a2(rgyud): med par// 'jig rten 'di dag dbang du 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba byang chub dam pa ste// yang dgra sngags kyi gsang ba 'di// lus ngag sems las 'da' ba'o// de bzhin
14a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las// skra dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
14a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag pos// dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u 'di gsung
14a5(rgyud): so// 'dod pa'i longs spyod zad la// ji ltar 'dod par bsten na ni// / 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas myur du thob pa ra 'gyur// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/ ji ltar 'dod
14a6(rgyud): par bsten bya ste// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pas// bsten kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi// 'dod po'i longs spyod thams cad la// 
14a7(rgyud): bsten na myuro du 'grub par 'gyur slongs mo za zhing mi bzla ste// slong mo 'ang dga' bar mi bya'o// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing // sngags kyi yan lha ma nyams bzlas// lus dang ngag dang sems rnam
14a8(rgyud): ni na bde bar gnas na byang chub 'thob// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod rnams// chos
14b1(rgyud): mchog mi g.yo brnyas pa yang // 'dod pa thams cad bstan pas so// chags can ye shas 'dod pa yis// rtag tu 'dod yon lnga rnams bstan// byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya// byang chub nyi ma chags
14b2(rgyud): par bya// gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas// mchod par byed pas mchod par bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzod gzhi// sbrul rnams gsum shes byas nas// lha rnam
14b3(rgyud): la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gadriH rnams gsum shes byas nas// sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// 'dod
14b4(rgyud): chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso// rol rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas thogs meng rdo rje 'dzin// reg la rnam
14b5(rgyud): gsum shes byas nas// bdag gi rig la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi bskyod pa yi tshul bsdus pa'o// gzugs sgra ro la sogs pa la// rtag tu sems ni
14b6(rgyud): sbar bar bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i snying po btus pa'o// gzugs sgra dri sogs sngags pa yis// lha nyid du ni rtag tu sgom// yang na de la sgom pa ni// rigs kyi tshul du rnam
14b7(rgyud): por sgom// sangs rgyas rje su dran par sbyor// chos ni rje su dran sgom pa// rdo rje su dran sgom pa// sku dang gsung dang thug rnams sgom// rigs ni rje su dran par sbyor// khro bo rje su dran smos pa/ lha ni rje su dran
14b8(rgyud): par sbyor// bsgoms na byang chub thob por 'gyur// bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la// byin gyis brlobs kyi gnas gsum gyis// dben par mchod pa rab tu
15a1(rgyud): rtsam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog/ spyan la sogs par bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// yi ge hUM dang oM
15a2(rgyud): ngag dang // AHdang phaT kyang rab brtag bya// 'od zer rnam lngas khyab pa yi// pad+ma rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar// yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya ka sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la
15a3(rgyud): sogs da byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya// de la sangs rgyas rje su dran pa ji ltar smos zhe na// b+ha gro la ni ling ga banag/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya// ba spyan mos kyi bu gnas// me khas pas sang+yas
15a4(rgyud): smi rnams s+ho// de la chos rjes dzi slo na/ ga na ming ga panag/ rdo rgya ches ni bsgos par bya// bsnun mas kyi buganas ma so pas chos kyi smi rnams s+ho// de rdo
15a5(rgyud): dran pa ji ltar sgrom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga bzhag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sdom// ba spun mas kyi bu gnas// rdo rje sprin rnams spro bar bya// de la rigs rje su dran pa rdzi ltar snyom
15a6(rgyud): na khrag la ni ling ga bzhag/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab tu snyom// ba spu rnams kyi bu gnas// mkhas pas rigs kyi sbyin rnams spro// de la khro bor+d+ha su dran pa ji ltar sbom be na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga bzhag
15a7(rgyud): khro bo'i dbang po rab tu sgom// ba spu rnams kyi bu gnas// mkhas pas khro bo'i sprin rnams spro// de la dam tshig rjesu dran pa ji ltar sdom zhen/ bdag gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te/ 
15a8(rgyud): rang gi khu ba'i thigs pa yis// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' mchod// de la dkyil 'khor rje su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam gzhag ste// mkhas pas rang gi khu bdag kau/ rnam
15b1(rgyud): 'byor pas ni rtag tu dbyung // kyi kyor tshul du bya// de la dkyil 'khor rje su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin// phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyas// sangs rgyas sku yi rang bzhin gyis// bdag kyang
15b2(rgyud): de dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la gsung rje su dran pa ji ltar sbom zhe na/ rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin// gsung de nges tshig phun sum tshogs// bdag gi tshig kyang de 'ang ste// chos 'dzin pa dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la thug
15b3(rgyud): rjesu dran pa ji ltar sdom zhan/ gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa// kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur ni// bdag gi sems kyang de 'drar gyur// de la sems can rje su dran pa ji ltar sgom
15b4(rgyud): zhe na/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan// da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mkha' dang mtshungs par spyod gyur cig/ de la sngags thams cakyi gzugs dang sku
15b5(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rje su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ sngags kyi rdo rje/ sku gang yin// gsung gi sku yang rnam sgom pa// bdag kyang rtag tu de 'dra bar// sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam gyur cig
15b6(rgyud): de la dam tshig rje su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ dam tshig khru byung cho ga bzhin// 'bras bu 'dod pas btung bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad na/ dngos grub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// de la shes
15b7(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rdzasu dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ rang gi nyan gyis ni 'od gsal ba// thams cang ma skyes zag pa med// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/ khams kyang med cing 'byung ba'ang
15b8(rgyud): med// de la ma skyes pa rjesu dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// mtshan med mi 'gyur namakha' bzhin// gnyis med gonyi su med min bzhin// shin tu dri mang na mkha'i bzhin// de la zhe sdang
16a1(rgyud): de gas thogs pa rjod parjes spyan rlom sa nga med mas na ga/ yo ngas du gis sbyi pa na ngag gas kyi sbyongs ba spyos te/ 
16a2(rgyud): gi khu bas mchod par bya// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni// chos 'dzin mchog gi gsung dge kyang / tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// smrang de gsung dang thugs kyang 'grub
16a3(rgyud): gang gzhan phra mor bshad pa rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms te// bzlas pa tsam gyis de 'grub 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thug kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa
16a4(rgyud): las/ sngags kyi spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / nga nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchog dpal gyis// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
16a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag po// dbang phyug dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dris gsol ba btang po// rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che// nem pa'i spyod pa rnam sbyong ba
16a6(rgyud): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ rgyal mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// rdo rje theg pa rab ston pa// nam pa'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ rgya lo bzhi mchod pa
16a7(rgyud): bshad du gsol// thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa// theg pa gsum gyi lam la gnas// sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdag/ mi mchog mchod po bshad du gsol// byang chub sems ni rgyas pa'i
16a8(rgyud): spyan/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// sku dang gsung thugs shin tu dag/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad na mkha' mi 'gyur tshe// thams cad dbang bskur
16b1(rgyud): kum gyingos pam dadang rdo rjeri chen 'dzin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog rdo rjemi byed pa jum gnas pa/ srungadang gsung dang thugs skal mchog rgyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba bshang / 
16b2(rgyud): na chung gzhon nu mig yangs pa// gzugs bzang bzhon pas rgyan pa ni// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon rnyed ka/ byol song las kyang rab tu brtag/ sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa 'am/ rgyal
16b3(rgyud): nyid skyes zhi zhi ba'i gnas rnamasu// gshang gci chu la sogs pas byug pa 'am// rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag pAr rab tu byu// mu ma'i dbus par spyi gtsug mtha' yi bar// cho ga shes pas yang na rkang
16b4(rgyud): nga'i bar// lte ba rkang pa gsang bar rgyal ba'i sras// rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu byokan mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnos par// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya// bdag
16b5(rgyud): nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas par// mkhas pas snying khar ba sgom par bya// zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod na// bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya// rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten la// 'od zer phreng
16b6(rgyud): bas rnam pa rgyan// ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi// gnas de yin par rnam par bsam// bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas// mkhas pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro// mkhas pas ud pa la dag
16b7(rgyud): dang // pad+ma rnam pa lngar shes bya// dzA ti rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// me tog kar+t+ti kA ra dang // mal+li ka dang yU thi kA// me tog ka ra bI ra ba sama?// mchod pa zad
16b8(rgyud): rab tu bzhig/ dbag tshad brgya mi khyen tsam du// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor sbom byas la// rnam por mangs pas rtog par ni/ rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya// de bzhin pad+ma rdo rje dang / 
17a1(rgyud): // ral gri ut+pal mkhas pas sgom// dpag tshad byed pa'i khyon tsam du// gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi// mchod rten rin chen sna bzhi pa// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med// rigs rnams
17a2(rgyud): thams cad mchod pa'i phyir// shes rab can gyis gnas su sgom// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis de la mchod pa rgya mtsho brtsa mak+Sha rin chen na bzang la sogs pas// byang chub 'dod pa
17a3(rgyud): rtag tu mchod// mchod pa rnam lnga mchog rnams kyis// rtag tu lha rnams mnyes par bya// rin chen 'byung gnas na chung mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs mchog gis brgyan ka / sgrub che rab tu 'gru
17a4(rgyud): ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// zhing 'dir chen sna bdun gyis// mkhas pa dag gis yongs bkang la// dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir// nyi nire shes rab
17a5(rgyud): can gyis dbul// bdag po'i phyag rgyas mnyam gzhag la// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// 'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas la// reg pa'i sbyor ba dngul bar
17a6(rgyud): bya rnam pa'i dbyings kyi dngul gnas par// dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi lus// bla ma gshang dang gtso bas mchod// bzhon bzang shin
17a7(rgyud): tu mdzes pa yi// na chung skal ba mchog ldan pa// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas bsams te// de bzhin/ sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu brtag/ mig bzang brtan pa'i blo ldan pas// khu ba
17a8(rgyud): blangs nas bza' bar bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // sngags rnams dngos grub byed par gsungs/ de badzin
17b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ gshang gci'i dam tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams
17b2(rgyud): cad namapa' mi 'gyur che// thaMd dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog// dbang phyug dam pa kun don gyis// sku gsung thugs la longs spyod pa// rdo rje mi phyi gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas ye shes can gyi
17b3(rgyud): gsang // nyams dga' mchog ni rab tu bshad kaun mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par ka sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje mi bskyod rab sgom nas// lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya// 
17b4(rgyud): 'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang // 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gong / dus gsum pa yi sangs rgyas rnams// bsgoms nas rjes phye maro brlag/ sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni// rdo rje
17b5(rgyud): phyir brlags med gyur pa// bsam gtan mchog de bsgo/ mas ni na// thugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus// sems can thams cad bsang
17b6(rgyud): na na// mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing dag tu// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bor 'gyur// 'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na ste// rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho yin par shes par bya'o// de nas
17b7(rgyud): rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// mi shes thar pa rab sgrub pa// ngo bo nyid dag gos pa med// byang chub spyod pa rab ston pas// sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa yi/ yang dag dam tshig bka'i stsal to// 
17b8(rgyud): nam pa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sgom// rin chen kun gyi
18a1(rgyud): sbyor bas yis/ rdo rje'i gdug ni rab tu brtag/ nor rnams thams cad phyogs nas su// rdo rje gsum du namu bsgoms na/ nor gyi rgya mchos gang ba yi/ ying bzhin nor bung 'dra bar 'gyur
18a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi sras rnams dang // thub pa'i skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// 'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las// gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig yang dag pa nyid du shes par bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje
18a3(rgyud): badz+ri na// 'dod chags thar pa rab sgrub pa// gsang ba dag pa dmigs med pas// dkyil 'khor rab tu bka' stsal to// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gan+da bar// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dpag med
18a4(rgyud): tshe ni rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad dgang // bud med ltar bur sbyar ba ni// dam tshig bzhi 'i sbyar ba yis// thams cad de ru bsgos par bya// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul
18a5(rgyud): mchog go// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// de dag tha mas cad nye bar spyad// 'di ni rdo rje dzad kyi// mi phyed sku gsum sgom pa'o// 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi yang dag pa'i dam
18a6(rgyud): tshig ste/ sngags pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje badzin// rdo rje sngags kyi don sgrub pa// bdag med ye shes las byung bas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// namakha'i dbying
18a7(rgyud): kyi dbus gnas par/ ka/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// / rdo rje thogs med rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas zad bsgom par bya// thams cad gzugasu rnam bsgoms nas// rdo rje tshig gi
18a8(rgyud): brdzun smra bas// rgyal ba kun gyi gnas rnams dang // rgyal ba thams cad bslu bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// nam mkha'i gsung ste dri med pa// ye shes blo can kun gyi gsang // sngags
18b1(rgyud): kyi dngos grub thob bshad/ 'di ni dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid de// don ji lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje mi phyed gsum rgyal gnas// rdo rje dngos
18b2(rgyud): grub rab ston pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// num pa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms te// gzugs rnams kun
18b3(rgyud): gyis 'di dag dgang // rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni// bsten na ye shas thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang de
18b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi dam tshig rdo rje dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du gyur nas rdo rje'i tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bac+doM
18b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po// khams pa/ sum lus 'das shing 'jig rten thams cad las 'das bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cu dadu/ byang chub sems
18b6(rgyud): sh+tsa R+Wa/  sa la sa ga /  ga sa su na sa na
18b7(rgyud): khyima'i mang 'i yang rjod byis mi 'ang po'i sangs rgyas kyi shing gi'i rab kyi rdul phram ny-i kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyidas tshig gi pal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems sa
19a1(rgyud): spyod pa ni spyod pa'i mchog go/ 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper narnam pa'i ni thams cad kyi rjesu song ba ste/ chos thams cad kyang
19a2(rgyud): namakha'i khongasu gtogs pa'o// chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi la yang mi gan so// 
19a3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang de ltar rje su rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni don gyi dbang de lta bu ma khyen cing ka sems can rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad par mdzad// rigs kyi bu de ltar
19a4(rgyud): namakha'i tshigs nges par brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig de dag rje su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na btsub stan dang mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen gyis du ba 'byung zhing
19a5(rgyud): me 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi// med yang gtsub shing la yang mi gnas/ gtsub stan la yong mi gnas/ mi'i lags pa ba skyod pa la yang mi gnaso// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin ga sh+ya
19a6(rgyud): ba thams cad rdo rje'i dam tshig 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs parje su rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur// rmad du gyur nas/ ngam zhing mig gdangs te tshig 'di skad ces smra so// rmang
19a7(rgyud): byu chen po'i chos rnam ni// nam pa' dang ni mtshungs pa dang // rnam par mi rtog dag pa las// kun rdzob tu yang bshad pa mtshar// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba sa
19a8(rgyud): ba 'dus pa las/ don dam pa'i dag pa de lo na nyid kyi don gyi dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen
19b1(rgyud): de'i rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ste// 'di skad ces gsol to// de nyid sngags snying kun bsdus pa// sku dang gsung
19b2(rgyud): thugs gsang bar bsgrags// dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ yang dag bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso// 'bar ba drag sman yangs pas// 
19b3(rgyud): gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni/ rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa/ gang na ldi gnas mnyam pa nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjer sgom// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
19b4(rgyud): gshegs pa/ rang bzhin gyis dag pa pha rol tu phyin pa sngags kyi tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thaMd la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
19b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zad/ mi bskyod pa la so gas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa bye ba khra ga khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs gcig tu/ sems can thang
19b6(rgyud): kyi don bya ba la rol pa ston par mdzad/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthas bkrus pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rol cing // dgyes par yongasu spyod pa yod kyang / de dag sngags spyod pa la mngon
19b7(rgyud): bar gyis brtson pa rnams la/ kye ma 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi/ chos rdzogs par gyur to// snyam nas spyan ras kyos mi 'tsho ste/ de bas na skyes bu ngom pa de dag
19b8(rgyud): la spyan ras kyis bca' ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba/ sngags thams cad kyi snying po kun tu bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba// rab tu gsang ba
20a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad smra dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa/ chos 'dzin pa thams cad
20a2(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa 'di// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas sngags bsdus pa 'di lta bu gsung so// oM AHhUM/ de nas 'di ni
20a3(rgyud): gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/ rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ dam tshig
20a4(rgyud): 'di gsung so// namakha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bkod dpo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus gnas yi ge hUM// rang gi gzugasu rab tu btag/ rdo rje'i 'od zer cher
20a5(rgyud): 'bar ba// rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gsung thugs// drangs par de yis rnam bsgoms na// de ma/ bag tu der 'gyur ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin rdo rje
20a6(rgyud): sems dpa' rgyal po che// kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug mchog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor rang rdo rjes// bskyed par byed pa'i tshul du 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying po rdo rje bsdus pa yin/ rang sngags
20a7(rgyud): skyes bur sdoms nas ni// gnas pa'i rnamasu gzugs kyi tshul// zhal gsum lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// kha dog gsum du rab tu bsgom// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de sad ces bka' stsal to// 
20a8(rgyud): ngol 'di ni rdo rje mchog gi gsang ba'o// snying kha'i dbus suM phra mo yi/ dkyil 'khor rnaMs ni bsam par bya/ yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig/ de yi dbus su bsam par bya// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa
20b1(rgyud): rtag tu sbyor bas bsgom par bya// rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum rnams bsgom par bya// de yis snying khar brdab byas te// lnga rnams ji sbed bskul bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// sang+yas byang chu
20b2(rgyud): rab sgrub pa'o// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs la sogs// rdo rje kyo bo rnam sbom zhing // snying pa ro ni bskul brir bshad// 'odadi ni rol mo'i 'byung ba ste/ rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di/ zhag bdun par du byas ni na
20b3(rgyud): rje can gyi gsang // sku dang gsung thugs 'grub par 'gyur// gachog stsol ba dag rnam par gzigs// yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas// yid la migu ning dga'agyur pa'i// dngos grub rgya rten
20b4(rgyud): ster bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog sgrub pas// rmongs pas 'da' ba byas na ni// de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje
20b5(rgyud): 'dzin// rdo rje gsum gyi ston pa mo chog/ 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtses// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes
20b6(rgyud): rdzogs// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos po thams cad brtag par bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags dam tshig sgom pa'o// rig ma'i dbang phyug zhugs pa la// rdo rje'i sbyor ba rab
20b7(rgyud): sgom zhing // chags la chags chags pas blta bar bya// 'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sras// thams cad dbang bskur sang+yas gtses/ 
20b8(rgyud): gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na/ bud med ji snyed yod pa kun// phyag rgya che sogs sbyor ba yis// de dag zeng ni bar spyad// bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin// sa
21a1(rgyud): gnas ni der spro bya// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'i// byang chub 'di yis thob par 'gyur// byang chub
21a2(rgyud): sems dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe nges 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
21a3(rgyud): kyi snying po bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sngags kyi
21a4(rgyud): skyes bu mchog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs tre/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags rdo rje rig ba'i skyes bu'i le'u 'di gsung so// rdo rje gsum yig sngags
21a5(rgyud): kyi mchog/ phyag rgya chen po rnam sgom pa/ byang chub zang thob bya'i phyir// yis rdo rje dag gis bya// oM ni yes sI bo ste// rdo'i sku ni thob byed pa'o// A ni byang chub bdag med pa/ 
21a6(rgyud): rdo rje gsung ni thob byed pa'o// hUM ni sku gsung thugs nyid de// rdo rje mi phyed gosum thob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sngags kyi skyes bus des
21a7(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// nam pa'i rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun skyes bsam// rdo rje'i sprin ni 'pho bskyed pa// de ru yi ge b+h+rUM bsam mo// de la 'di ni las rdo rje'i snying po'o// b+h+rUM
21a8(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// hUM zhes bya ba rab tu sgom// gsal po'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par / yi ge oM ni rnam par bsam// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par
21b1(rgyud): yi ge AHni rab tu sgom// yi ge b+h+rUM gyis gnas bsgoms te// rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya// snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs ni mnyes byed pa// oM ni sangs rgyas sA
21b2(rgyud): yi mchog/ oM AHni sangs rgyas gsung gi lam// AHhUM ni ye shes thugs kyi 'jigs// hAM/ byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub
21b3(rgyud): pa/ ye shes rdo rjes sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung // 'di dag sangs rgyas skyes bu ste// sngags kyi rig pa zhes kyang bsgrags// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa'i// dam tshig dag gis rdzogs
21b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// dben zhing rab rab tu nyams dag
21b5(rgyud): b.rabasbyor ba 'di ni kun brtsams na// rdo rje sku dang gsung dang / thugs// zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsams te/ 
21b6(rgyud): rang gi sngogs kyi dam tshig bskyed// yi ge oM ni snying khar bzhag/ 'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po// rnam par snang mdzad mchog tu sgom// 'di yis sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku// rdo rje rnam snang rgya mtshor 'gyur
21b7(rgyud): yis lnga ldan bsten na ni// sangs rgyas sku ni 'dra ba'i mdog/ rdo rje skal pa gsum du gnas// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje gsang bas dri skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin
21b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rang gi sngags kyi skyes bu bskyed// AHni ngag gi laM
22a1(rgyud): bzhag ste// 'dog lnga yi pad+ma che// 'jig rten dpal mchog bsgoms pa yis// dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te/ tshig gis dam tshig lnga yi mchog chos kyi tshig gi lam gnas pa rje
22a2(rgyud): chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur// ye shes ldan ldan bstan na ni// rdo rje skal pa gsum du gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gsung gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
22a3(rgyud): gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rang sngags skyes bu rdzogs byas la// sems la yi ge hUM gnas pa// dam tshig chen po'i de nyid
22a4(rgyud): ni/ \u0f7fkha dog rnam lngar bsgom par bya// rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas/ ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba// yas shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten
22a5(rgyud): ni ni rdo rje skal pa gsum du gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i thugs gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin ga she gas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dmatshig rje
22a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje chen po bsgom par bya// lus rnams kun la khams dmigs na// rdo rje ye shes mkha' mnyam 'gyur// bi sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
22a7(rgyud): yis/ yang dang yang du mchod pa dang // skal pa gsum du dam tshig gnas// sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das na mkha' rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sgra dang gsung
22a8(rgyud): dang thugs mi snang ba 'byung ba bkod pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// rang sngags skyes bu rab bsam nas// snying khar rdo rje haM zhes pa// bzhag ste 'od zer rnam par sgom haM/ 
22b1(rgyud): 'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod la// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' de 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting badzin
22b2(rgyud): to// 'od zer 'bar ba'i yi ge b+hIHna ma'a'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// mtshan mchog rdo rje'i lus ngog gis// rdo rje'i sku dang 'dre bar 'gyur// b+h+r-i na mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bkod pa'i gnas zhes bya ba
22b3(rgyud): ting 'dzin to// sangs rgyas mngon shes dam tshig mchog rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni dngos grub zad kyi/ sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa'o// nam pa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ 
22b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgo mas la// ye shes oM ni bsgom par bya// oM rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// mi bskyod rdo rje gsum 'drar 'gyur// bcwa
22b5(rgyud): rdo rje mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// mi skyong pa yi sku 'dra/ dang // gsung dang thugs mtshogs 'dra ba 'dzin// 'jig rten khams rnams thang du// mi bskyod rdo rjes mchod par 'gyur/ 
22b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod ba'i sku dang mnyam par mngon par 'byung ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam/ nam pa'i
22b7(rgyud): rdo rje rab bsgoms la// rin chen oM ni bsam par bya// oM rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// dkon mchog dpal gyi 'dod dang
22b8(rgyud): 'dra ba de ni bdag med byang chub dang // ye shes gsang ba 'dir gnas 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchag dpal gyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// rin po che'i dam tshig long
23a1(rgyud): / spyod pa rdo rje'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rnam pa'i dbyings kyi dbus ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la// chos kyi oM ni bsgom par bya/ 
23a2(rgyud): oM rdo rje dam tshig gsumo bsgoms pas// rdo rje gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// 'od dbang med dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de ni sems can thams cad kyi// theg chen lam ni 'byung bar 'gyur// 
23a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tsha dpag tu med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan pag tu med pa rdo rje 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// ma kha'i dbyings kyi dbus ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje
23a4(rgyud): pad+ma la bsgoms la/ dam tshig oM ni rab tu sgom// oM rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gdon mi za bar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// rdo rje thog med 'dra ba'i 'od// de ni dpal
23a5(rgyud): ldan ye shes mtsho// sems can kun don 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdon mi za bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'od zer gyi ye shes kyi mchog
23a6(rgyud): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbusu ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje snang mdzad rab bsgoms la/ ka/ sku gsum oM ni rab tu sgom// oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms
23a7(rgyud): pas/ rnam par snang mdzad mnyam par par 'gyur// lus dang ngag yid rdo rje yi ka rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'ong // de ni ye shes rdzogs byang chub// sku gsum mi phyed sgrub byang 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo
23a8(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// lus dang ngag dang yid dmigs pa mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rnam par dben pa'i ri bo dang // klu dang 'bab chu rnams dang ni/ dur
23b1(rgyud): gyi khrod la sogs par yang / bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag sgom// mi skyod ye shes dag la sogs// rdo rje rnam pa'i dkyil du bsam// mngon shes lnga po'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gnas sbom// bcom ldan
23b2(rgyud): ldan 'das dam tshi ba chen po'i rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// 'bar ba lnga yis rnam par brgyan// gnas lnga dag tu sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// 
23b3(rgyud): me steng mang po 'khrug pa yi// rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje lnga sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rnam pa dkyil nyid du// 'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas 'jug
23b4(rgyud): bar rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas gnas dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil khor dbus gnas par// bdag gi lus la snang mdzad bzhag/ snying khar yi ge oM bsam+ba la// sngags la
23b5(rgyud): rnam par shes pasgom/ 'gog pa'i rdo rje sems nyid du// gang tshe/ de la skye 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa/ yid bzhin dang ldan lta bur 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus
23b6(rgyud): gnas par// rdo rje mi bsod rab tu sdom// snying khar yi ge hUM bsgoms nas// sems ni thig ler gyur par bzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sgom/ snying khar yi ge
23b7(rgyud): AHbsams te/ rdo rje thog ler gyur par gzhag/ 'di ni dam tshig mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum sgom pa// 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// rdo rje na mkha'i
23b8(rgyud): dbyings gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi gau oM/ bsams na de ni skal bar gnas// rdo rje na mkha'i dbyings gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsngo
24a1(rgyud): bar bya/ sa ngag sems la yige smra/ bams ca ni sal par gnas/ rdo rnam pa'i dbyis gnas par/  dkyis 'khor bsgros par bya/ lus dag sems pa yig sgru/ bas
24a2(rgyud): nade ni skal bar gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// rnal 'byor 'dir gyur phyin chad ni// klog gam yang na sems
24a3(rgyud): kyang rung // de yang rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig
24a4(rgyud): de kho na nyid rdo rje'i rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// bskyed pa ye shes mchog sgrub pa// dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum/ 
24a5(rgyud): rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal pa// mkha' dang mtshungs par maHma gyur pa// rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid// chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa las// rol mo 'di dag rab tu sgom// dgon pa
24a6(rgyud): chen po'i sa phyogs su// me tog 'bral bu sogs kyis brgyan// ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa sgrub// maM/ lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la// rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu sgom/ 
24a7(rgyud): lus dang ngag sems la spros pas// rdo rje 'jam pa 'dra bar 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// rdo rje 'brar ba'i 'od dag gis// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// dag pa'i bdag nyid snang
24a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur// tshangs ba drag po la sogs lhas// nams kyang mthong bar mi nuso// rdo rje 'jam pa mchog gi dam tshig mi snang ba zhes bya ba ting 'dzin to// rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung // gshang gici
24b1(rgyud): dam tshig lnga rnams ni// lcags gsum las byung ldan byas te/ khar bcug nas ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas zan gyis mi phyed pa'i// thugs ni de ru rab bsgoms na// rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'odang dra bar// de ma thag tu
24b2(rgyud): de 'gyuraro// 'khor lo 'od 'phro mdangs mtshogs cano// rang gi sngags kyis rab bsgoms nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas// bsgoms na sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu
24b3(rgyud): rtsa drug gi// rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun// de yi rje su 'brang bar 'gyur// 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor dbus
24b4(rgyud): su rib bsnams nas// / rdo rje kun gyi gnas yin par// bsams na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yong ba yi// de snyed kyi ni bu med rnams/ 
24b5(rgyud): yon tan can gyi gnas su 'gyur// drag po dag gis phyag byas pa// / khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig/ ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad la// rang
24b6(rgyud): sngags rdo rje bsams nas su// chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin par// bsams na chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rib sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// sangs rgyas mchod mchog
24b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'jog par byed// pad+mo mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// ye shes lnga ldan rab bsten na// skal ba gsum du yun du gnas// phyogs bcu'i sang+yas
24b8(rgyud): zad kyi// gsang ba gsum la bsnyen bkur byed// 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra'i 'od// rang gi sngags kyi ral gri sgom// mig yangs lag na thogs na ni// rdo rje gsum rig 'dzin par 'gyur/ 
25a1(rgyud): khams gsum kun gyis rang mchod cing / tshangs dbang lha min phyag byas pa// stong gsum na ni gcig pu pa// mi mchog gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur// gang rnams bdod dang bsam pa dag/ sku gsung
25a2(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje'i thugs las rab tu byung / de lta bu yi sa dngos grub ste// / rol gri thams cad kyi dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// oM ni ril bu tsa na ka 'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbusu rang gi
25a3(rgyud): lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na// des zab tu yang // byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // dzA m+bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog/ AHni ril bu tsun ka'i/ 'bru chung tsam
25a4(rgyud): du bsams nas ni// dbus rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na/ de ni de ma thag tu yang / byang chub ye shes dbong 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing / dzAm+bu chu bo'i gser gyi
25a5(rgyud): mdog/ hU~M ni ril bu can// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na/ de ni de ma thag tu yang // rdo rje'i sku dang 'od 'dra gyur
25a6(rgyud): mkha' dadangs gsal ba'i dbus nas bar/ rnam par snang mdzad rab tu sgom// lag tu 'khor lo rab bsgoms na/ 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// 'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// sangs rgyas sku rin
25a7(rgyud): rab sbyor zhing // ye shes 'di ni rab sgrub pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// ye shes mi bskyod rab bsgoms te// lag tu rdo rje rab bsgoms na// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ 
25a8(rgyud): rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// rdo rje'i sku ni rab sbyor zhing // rdo rje'i mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings rin chen dbus gnas par// rin chen rdo rje rab tu sgom// lag tu rin chen
25b1(rgyud): rab bsgoms na// rin chen rigs pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rin po che yi rigs bsgoms nas// rin chen skur ni rab sbyor zhing // rin chen mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// rdo rje ye shes ngag gis ba// mkha' dbyings chos kyi dbus gnas
25b2(rgyud): bar ched pas med par btu sdom/ lag tu pad+mo ba bsgoms na// pad+mo'i rigs pa 'dzin par 'gyur// pad+mo'i rigs chen bsgoms nas su// chos kyi skur ni rab sbyor zhing // pad+mo'i mchog 'di sgrub pa ni/ ye shes rdo rje
25b3(rgyud): ngag gis bya// ma ba' dbyings dam tshig dbus gnas par// gdon mi za ba'i ye shes sdom ka lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po'i rigs bsgoms nas// thogs
25b4(rgyud): med dam tshig rab sbyor zhing // dam tshig mchog 'di sgrub pa ni/ ye shes rdo rje dag gis pa// rtse gsum ye shes lcags kyu sogs// rdo rje khyad par gyis bsgrubs na// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa
25b5(rgyud): yi/ bsam gtan dus ni 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rjes da skad ces ban/ 'astsal to// lam gyi bzhi mdo'am shing gcig drung // mtshan mi bzhi
25b6(rgyud): dang zhi gnas su// rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par gyis// sgrub pa pos ni rtag sgrub// sbyor gsum rdo rje can rnams kyi// sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu bsam// sangs rgyas ye shes blo ldan gyis// sku gsung thugs
25b7(rgyud): kyi kyo ba btang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa// sangs rgyas dgug po dam pa yin// dam tshig las byung phyog bcu pa// rdo rje so bkug nas nye bar spyod// namakha'i dbyings kyi rdo rje dam tshig dgug
25b8(rgyud): pa'i cho ga'o// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che/ rdo rje pad+mo la sogs pas// rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni// dam tshig dgug mchog kyo bas bya// khams gsum gyi dam tshig dgug pa'o// rnam
26a1(rgyud): pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la// lag tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi// kyi ba la sogs rab tu sgom// 'di dag lnga bu'i sbyor ba yis// de ni gnas las byed
26a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje'i sku ni rnams bsgoms la// rdo rje'i sbyor bas lce bsgoms na/ rdo rje'i gsung dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas
26a3(rgyud): skur ni rnams bsgoms la// lag tu bsgrub bya bsams na ni// rdo rje dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur// gsang gsum dam tshig mchod pa'i mchog/ mchod pas mchod nas rab tu sgrub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 
26a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yin// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po da ma tshig gis de skad ces gsung so// sha chen dmatshig mchog gis ni// rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya// gshang
26a5(rgyud): gcing ma tshig mchog gis ni// rig pa badzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyu ra// glang po'i sha yi dam tshig gis// mngon shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur// rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis// mau snang ba mi
26a6(rgyud): bdag por 'gyur// khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ba lang sha yi dam tshig gis// rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// shwa rnams thams cad meng na yang / zing bas
26a7(rgyud): bas rnam par brtag/ rdo rje sbyor ba 'di byas na// sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can// snying khar ye shes dam tshig dang // dbu rgyan rdo rje
26a8(rgyud): mchog 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes gyur pa// dam tshig mchog gis bya ba ni// dngos grub thang 'grub pa'i mchog/ dam tshig mchog gis rab tu bya// dam tshig zang ye shes rdo rje
26b1(rgyud): thur ba nus bya ba'i jingange 'dzin to// lce li mtshig rdo rje mchog rdo rje can gyis hU~M bsgoms te// bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis// zlos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur// A.A dang oM gyi dam tshig kyang // 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul
26b2(rgyud): mchog ste// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mi byed 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i dam tshig bdud rtsi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin to// rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog/ sku gsum rdo rje can du 'gyur// phyogs bcu
26b3(rgyud): seMn tha~Md kyi nor bu yid bzhin rgya mtshor 'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thad du// rdo rje'i bdog nyid snang bar byed// 'khor lo'i dam tshig grub pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang ga'i
26b4(rgyud): byed snyed thams cad du// grub pa kun tu rnam par spyod// dam tshig dam pa dzad kyi// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyu ra// rdo rje'i sku ni rab bsgoms pas// dzang dam tshig mchog
26b5(rgyud): 'grub// mi snang gyur pa thams cad lo// stong kha mos dgani snang bar byed// sangs rgyas kun las 'phrog pa da // lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod/ gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rnams/ 
26b6(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa// rang lag skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// rdo rje mig gos mthong bar 'gyur// gang+gA bye snad zhing rnams na// sgra bsgrags pa ni ji snyed po// mngon shos rna bas thos pa ni/ 
26b7(rgyud): rna ba'i drung na 'khrod pa bzhin// gang+gA'i bye steng zhing dag gi// sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa yi// ril mo las byung sems rig 'gyur// 
26b8(rgyud): bskam pa gad+ma'i bye sted du// 'khor bo dgan gnas pa yi/ rgyan gyi gnas kyi gtani migs rnams zhag gsum 'on pa bzhin du dran// 'ang+ka'i bye ma med kyi lus// sangs rgyas phrin la songs
27a1(rgyud): brgyan pa// bskal pa ba d+hA'i bya sted du// rdo rje rdzu 'phrul mchog gis bgengs// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la mngon par shes pa ldan
27a2(rgyud): / rdo rje'i spyan dang rdo rje'i sman dang // rdo rje'i thugs dang // rdo rje'i gnas dang // rdo rje'i rdzu 'phra lo// sangs rgyas mngon shes lnga don 'grub// sangs rgyas sgo dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i be steng grangs med pa'i// 'khor
27a3(rgyud): gyis yongasu bskor na su// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung thugs kyis// 'jig rten khams kun bgrong bar 'gyur// bsnyen 'i dam tshig sbyor ba dang // nye bar sgrub pa 'byung ba dang // sgrub pa'i don gyi dam tshig dang / 
27a4(rgyud): sgrub pa chen po dag dang bzhi// rdo rje'i bye brag shes byas la / de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya// bsten pa'i ting 'dzin rab sbyor pra// byang chub mtshig ni bsgom par bya// nye bar sgrub pa grub mchog
27a5(rgyud): la'i rdo rje skye mched rnam par spyad// sngag kyi bdag po bsgoms pa yis// sgrub pa'i tshe ni bskul bar gsungs// sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// 
27a6(rgyud): dbu rgyan la ni bdag po bas mo// ye shes rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i ye shes bdud rtsi dag/ thams cad du ni rtog par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams zad kyi// sngags kyi de nyid don sgrub pa'o//
