27a7(rgyud): dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang // rab tu rnam par dben pa dang // ngo bo nags 'dab chu ngogasu// rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sgrub pa chen pos de skad ces bka'
27a8(rgyud): stsal to// yang na rdo rje bzhi dag gis// brtul zhugs brtan pas bsnyen pa bya// sku gsum mnyam pa nyid gyur pa// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dus bzhi dag tu rab sbyor bas// blo dang / 
27b1(rgyud): ldan pas gnas lngar ni// ye shes rdo rje yi ge oM// bsgoms na sgom pa yin par bshad// zhag bdun dang ni zla phyed dang // zla gcig zla ba ded dang gnyis// rdo rje dam tshig bsgrubs na ni// dngos grub myur/ 
27b2(rgyud): du thob par 'gyur// zhag grangs dbrag rab bskal ba// nga yis rgyas par rab tu stan// gsang ba mchog las byung ba la// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par gsungs// de la 'di ni nye bar grub pa'i yul/ 
27b3(rgyud): sgrim pa'i yul lo// sangs rgyas sgo 'dzin dpa le dang ldan// rdo rje mi byed gsum 'byed pa// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas byas to// rdo rje sku dang ldan par bya/ mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgrims pas/ 
27b4(rgyud): phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// de la sku yis mtshan pa yi// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad da// de la 'di ni sgrub po'i sdom pa'i yu'o// chos kyi gsung
27b5(rgyud): lam dpal deng ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa// byin gyis brlobs kyis gnas byas te// rdo rje gsang dang ldan par bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ 
27b6(rgyud): phyogs bcu na bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams// de la gsung las byung ba yi// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdza // de la 'di na sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa'i yulo// rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin
27b7(rgyud): dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa// byin gyis brlab kyis banas byas te/ rdo rje thugs dang ldan par bya/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// phyogs bcu na bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams/ 
27b8(rgyud): de la thugs las byung ba yi// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// yang na chos kyi sems dpa'ang rung // rmongs pas 'da' bar byed na ni// chal par 'gas par gdon
28a1(rgyud): mi za de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog
28a2(rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / dmas bcom ldan dade gshegs kun// ye shes rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa// sems can kun don yang dag 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' bla ldan
28a3(rgyud): gyis// thub pa don kun rdo rje canaka/ ston pa che la phyag 'tshal nas// dam tshig de nyid mkhyen pa la// mchod de rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di gsungaso// e ma 'o sang+yas tshul ro bzang // e ma 'o byang chub
28a4(rgyud): tshul gyi mchog/ e ma'o chos kyi tshul re zhi// e mi 'o sngags kyi tshul re stan// mau skyes pa yi chos rnams ni// ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par can// rnam par mi rtog yang dag rig/ ye shes
28a5(rgyud): 'byung ba rab tu bshad// yid 'ong sngags rnams kun bsdus pa// rdo rje bzlas pa ye shes tshe// sku gsum mi byed dkyil 'khor dang / sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'gyur
28a6(rgyud): ba// rdo rje mi byed gsum bsgoms pa'i// rdo rje bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// rigs gsang sngags thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan
28a7(rgyud): gsang sngags zlos pa di ring gsungs// ye shes rgya mtsho gsan pa dang / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje tsan+da// sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung rnams// rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgoms pas/ 
28a8(rgyud): ye shes mnyam med thob 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// na mkha' rdo rje ye shes 'byung // khyed skad dam pa mchog gi gtses/ 
28b1(rgyud): rdo rje bzlas pa 'di gsungaso// sngags kyi ngan kun bzlas pa ni// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyis mtshan// rdo rje dbya ba gsum gyi mthar// bkod pa rdo rje gsum zhes bya// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnamasu ka sprob rnam pa
28b2(rgyud): gsum dag bya// rdo rje bzlas 'di yis ni// rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thu/ bsgoms nas mchod pa'i mchog rtag pa// ye shes rdo rjes byas na ni// rdo rje gsum gyi thug 'dar
28b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// bsams nas mchod pa'i mchog brtags pa// ye shes rdo rjes rab tu ba ka 'di ni byang chub mchog thob pa'o// 'dra na dbya ba rnam gsum gyis// so so dag tu spro bar bya// sku
28b4(rgyud): dang gsung thugs bdag mang ba// ye shes sems kyis yang dag spro// brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni// rdzogs nas rab tu bsngo bar bya// 'di ni ye shes sbyin pa ba'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni kun gyi yino// sa
28b5(rgyud): yi rdo rje rdzogs byang chub/ dngos dang dngos med rnam dpang pa// sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar bshad // de ni sku yi bzlas par bshad// gsu ngagi ngom tshig rdzogs byang chub// sgra dang sgra min rnam dpang pa/ 
28b6(rgyud): gsung gi rdo rje zhes bshad de// de ni gsung gi bzlas par bshad// / thugs kyi dam tshig rdzogs byang chub// gnas pa'i rdo rje rnam dpang pa// thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ste// de ni thugs kyi bzlas par bshad// don gyi rjes
28b7(rgyud): 'gro bzlas pa ni/ ngo bo nyid meng bzang po yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnam dadad pa// de ni rin chen bzlas pa ra bshad// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thad du// sku yi sprin rnams spro ba dang // bzhud cing byon pa rdo rje'i don// de na
28b8(rgyud): thog med bzlas par bshad// khro bo'i dam tshig ye shes kyis// rang gi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grags// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig thos pa// de ni khro bo'i bzlas par bshad// 'dod pa'i don gyis myos gyur pa// kun
29a1(rgyud): /  nga ba ga sem na ga gags la rdzo ngonas sa sa pa bayang / dro chus grolas chu tshig lus dang ga sa lags pa'i sems pas
29a2(rgyud): mtshor gnas banag don 'dod chags bzlas par bshad/ zhe sdang rdo rje las byung sems/ lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa'i// sems can ne sdang gnas la bcag/ de ni bsdang bzlas par bshad// dam tshig de'ing
29a3(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gang du mangs tshig rdo rje can/ de nyid mchi rdo rje yika bzlas pa mning zhes bya'o// 'dod chags de na sgom pa/ rdo rje bdag po thams cad ni/ sems can kun la phan 'dra ba'i// 'dod chags byang chub rdzogs par mdza
29a4(rgyud): rigs pa chen pa mo spyan la sogs// rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa/ 'dod pa'i 'ongs spyod dag gis ni// ji ltar dod pa bstenan 'grub/ gti mug dam tshig las byung ba// rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can/ mni
29a5(rgyud): ngag gis gnas grub po// dngos grub dam pa rab tu sbyar// kho bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes// gsod la rtag tu brtson pa dag/ sgrub pa mim ga gi chos can la// gsod pa'i don gyis 'grub par 'gyur// 
29a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// ye shes 'khor lo can rnams kyi// 'khor lo snying kha'i dbus su sgom// gsol ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dbusu 'khor lo'i
29a7(rgyud): don sgo mo// ye shes rdo rje can rnams kyi// rdo rje snying kha'i dbus su sgom// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ rdo rje'i sngags don bsgom par bya// rin chen ye shes can rnams kyi// rin chen snying kha'i dbusu sbom
29a8(rgyud): rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rin chen sngags don bsgom par bya// pad+mo ye shes can rnams kyi// pad+mo snying kha'i dbus su sgom// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+mo'i sngags don bsgom par
29b1(rgyud): bya ral gri ye shes can rnams kyi/ ral gri snying kha'i dbus su sbom// dam tshig dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ral gri'i sngags don bsgom par bya// dathil 'khor kun gyi ngos rnams su// sangs rgyas lnga rnams dgod
29b2(rgyud): bar bya// 'od zer lnga yi bye brag gis// spos na byang chub thob par 'gyur// sngags rnams thaMng spro ba ni// de brag rnam banyis su bsgrags// sku gsum rdo rje bye brag gis// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba ba// lus kyis sku'i ngas
29b3(rgyud): kyis chub kying nyi ga gisung gi ngo bo nyid// mchod nas mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo yis// rdo rje lnga rnams bsgom par bya// dbus su bdag po bsams nas ni// sku gsung rdo rje rang
29b4(rgyud): gi gzugs// rang sngags rdo rje'i gzugs dag gis// dkyil 'a khor rnam pa bzhi dag tu// kha dog rnam bzhir kun brtags la/ snying khor sngags kyi don bsgoms na// rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yi las// 
29b5(rgyud): bsam gtan rdo rje can dag byed// 'di ni sngags rnams thaMd kyi// gsang ba rab tu bzang po yin// zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul// rgyas la rdo rje pad+mo can// dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas// rdo rje
29b6(rgyud): khro bo mngon spod la// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// / gsang ba sku gsum las byung ba// sngags rnams kun ni sprul pa ste// bya ba'i rol mos mtshan pa'o// ma dang smra ba'i sems can dang // rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // 
29b7(rgyud): gdug pa'i sems can gzhan rnams la'ang // rab tu bskul ba 'di ba'o// bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i 'khor lo rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams ka sarba
29b8(rgyud): rgyas skur ni rnam bsgoms la// dgra bos bsang bar bsams nas su kau/ de nas las rnams brtsam par bya// namakha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje rtsa lnga kha bzhi pa// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun dang ldan/ 
30a1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpar rnam par sgos// dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba// sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam bsgoms la// sangs rgyas 'khor lo stobs po che// lag pa g.yas pas 'di bya'o// phyogs
30a2(rgyud): bcu nas zung sems can rnams// sangs rgyas sku yi bye brag gis// bsdug te gong bu'i tshul gyis su// rang gis lus la de dag gzung // sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor lo can// slar yang spro bar rab tu ba/ khro
30a3(rgyud): bas 'khrugs pa'i khro bo rnams// mi sdus 'jig su rung ba'i gzugs / mtshon cha sna tshogs mchog 'dzin pa// gsod pa'i don gyis don sems pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid dam// gdug pa chen po gsod par
30a4(rgyud): nga // sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog stsol pa'o// rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gnas// nyi ma bdun du 'di byas na// sangs rgyas bos grub ster bar 'gyur// rmongs pas grub pa mi ster na// 
30a5(rgyud): 'chi bar 'din gdon mo za// rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin to// no mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// 'khor lo rdo rje 'bar bas rgyan// rnam pa'i mchog
30a6(rgyud): ni kun dang ldan/ rnam par snang mdzad rab tu sdom// dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen ni// rdo rje me stag 'phro ba can// de yi phyag na bsnams par sgoms// phyog bcunas byung / 
30a7(rgyud): sems can rnams// rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// / de dag bdag gis lus la gzung // sprob rdo rje dzad kyi// ye shes mchog gi gnyen gyis bya// sku gsung thugs kyi
30a8(rgyud): sbyor ba can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson// bdag ni dang ldan rdo rje 'dzin// bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor ba// gal te ngam las 'das na// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis// sku gsum las byung dgas par
30b1(rgyud): bgyi shig par gyur bar gdon mi 'chal 'khor ba 'dam tshig mes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje na/ mam du'i rdo rje dus su bsam// gshin rjeg shed kyi 'a'
30b2(rgyud): lo che// rang gi rdo rje yin par brtag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas sems dpa' rnams// sku gsum dkyil 'khor bzhugs bdag gshin rje gshed kyi mdog 'dra ba/ ka/ slar yang sangs rgyas spro bar bya// dus
30b3(rgyud): gsum la bzhugs sems can dang // gdug sems can gyi dgra bo rnams// khros pas thams cad gsod par sgom// 'di ni rdo rje bka'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig thams cad las byung ba gshin rjeg shid
30b4(rgyud): kyi sku gsum las rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// sku gsung thu gas kyi rdo rje'am// rang sngags don gyi yon tan nam// yang na gtsug tor dam tshig gis// bka'i yi 'khor lo sbyar ba bya/ 
30b5(rgyud): sngags kun srung phyir ye shes mchog/ rdo rje can gyis bya ba ste// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// byang chub bsrung ba'i don chen bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// nam
30b6(rgyud): mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// chos kyi snang mdzad sku mchog las// byung ba'i sku gsum dam tshig dag/ ma lha dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// bsams nas gdan du de rab brtag/ mkha' dbyings
30b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thaMd kyis// yongasu gang bar rnam par sgom// rang sngags yi ge'i gnas ye shes// thugs kyi rnam por bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni sems tsam du// bsgoms nas slar yang
30b8(rgyud): rab tu bsdu// thugs kyi rdo rjer byas pa'i phyir// sku gsum la ni de dag gzung // rdo rje'i sngags rin po che rab tu snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/ 
31a1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' ba du sgom// sangs rgyab rim bzhin bkod nas ni// chu yi steng du bcag par bya// rkang pa mnyam banag sbyor ba yis// spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa sgom// bcom ldan 'das ngom
31a2(rgyud): nyid dag pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje rgya mtsho rkang pas gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni// dbus khro bo rnam bzhag la// las kyi rdo rje rkang pa yis// de 'iyi sgra
31a3(rgyud): bor gnon par sgom// mu stegs can dang las kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rdo rje gsum mchog khro bo'i tshul// ge sar ser po'i mchog 'dra ba// thang rim
31a4(rgyud): rgyal po ltar// bsams nas spyi bor rab tu sgom// sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon byed na// mi dbang la ni ngogs pa mang // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thug
31a5(rgyud): las byung bas de skad ces bka'o stsal to// dpung thams cadaganon pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// dgra bo skrag pa'i dam tshig gi// bsam gtan rab tu brtag pa 'di// sangs rgyas
31a6(rgyud): ngag gis 'das na yang // 'gag par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis de skad ces gsungs so// hUM las phur bu bsam pa ni// rtse lnga pa yi tshad du ste// rdo rje phur bu
31a7(rgyud): de yis ni// snying khar de ni rab bsgoms na// khros pas sangs rgyas dpung dag kyang // 'jig par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// dgra rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin to// grong ngam yang na grong khyer ram// 
31a8(rgyud): ljongs dag tun rab sbyor ba// nang kun spong ba'i zhi ba yang // dadis ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya// rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni// bar snang dag la rab tu sgom// sreg pa'i bskal pa ltar bsams na// slar yang rab tu bsdu
31b1(rgyud): bar bya// spro ba dag kyang de nas bya// rin chen yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od// chos kyi sprin ni bsgoms nas kyang // dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje'i bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs
31b2(rgyud): smin pa'i rdo rje rab tu sgom// yid bzhin nor bu dang ldan 'gyur// sangs rgyas sbyin dang chos chan dang // rdo rje sems dpa' dar spro ba// bskal pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing // sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob/ 
31b3(rgyud): 'od ni sangs rgyas thaMd kyi// gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o// nang thad med par byed pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// bsam gnas las byung ngam bcas pas// gnas gang du ni yong dag spyang / 
31b4(rgyud): bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni// gnas na sangs rgyas byin gyis rlo bo// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che// rdo rje phur bu rab tu sbom// me stag 'bar ba 'dra ba yis// phyogs bcu'i
31b5(rgyud): 'khor gad ba por bya// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhi pa rdo rje zhes bya jir ting 'dzin to// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// rnam par snang mdzad gzu
31b6(rgyud): bsams nas// rang gi thugs khar 'dod pa bzhag/ spyan la sogs pa mchog rnams kyis// mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar sgrom// bsdus nas 'od kyi grong bu yis// nad pa la ni dbab par bya// 
31b7(rgyud): baspu'i bub cwa sangs rgyas// sprin rnams brtul rdugs can gyis spro/ sangs rgyas sprin rnams de yi tshe// de la dbang bskur rab tu rtsol// nang po rdo rje mtshig gis// srang cig gis ni dang ldan 'gyu ro// 
31b8(rgyud): rang 'i rgyas kying mtshig bsod pa'i sprin pas byabya'o zhing 'dzin to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// dbang chen gyil 'khor dam pa bsam// chos 'dzin pa yi gzugs pasams shes/ slo sa
32a1(rgyud): 'do nga bzhag par bya// mnga' dbyings gnas ni nyams dpa' bar// dkar mo nas byas rab tu dbang // khyod kyi ngong bur bsdus nas ni// ling bzhi nor bu'irin chen 'ong // lus
32a2(rgyud): dang ngag dang sems gnas la// 'dod pa la de dang ba par bya// ba spu'i bu gnas rin chen// sprin rnams brtul zhugaso can gyi spro// chos kyi sprin rnams bsgoms nas su/ dbang bskur bar yang dag pa// rdo rje
32a3(rgyud): bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dbang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs// sbyin pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa de// yid bzhin nor bu dang ldan 'gyur// chos kyi sprin gyi dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// na mkha' dbyings kyi dbus
32a4(rgyud): ni/ rdo rje'i zla ga ma dkyil 'khor bsam// rdo rje na mkha' chos mdun pa/ zugaso// 'dod pa snying khar banag par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// namakha'i dkyil 'khor yongasu gong // 'od zer
32a5(rgyud): lnga yi sbyor ba yis// de ni gzi brjid dbab par bya// da ni ma thag tu yang / sangs rgyas kun gyi thugasu byon// 'jam dpal gyi ni mdog dang 'dra// gnas las byed par 'gyuraro// dbang bskur
32a6(rgyud): da ni dpo' ston cha// dgyes pa'i bdag nyid ngartsol bas// bltas tsam skyed pa nyid kyis kyang // 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur// rin po che 'dam tshig gis sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// na mkha'
32a7(rgyud): rdo rje srin po ni/ drag cing khro la rab tu ma dang // wa dang bya phyog sna tshogs dang // bya rgod khyi yis gang bar sdom ka/ mo yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dgra po rnams ni skyug par sgom// sangs rgyas kun la gnod
32a8(rgyud): byed pa// bsams gtanas rnal 'byor sbyar bar bya// mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pas mnan// rgyu ma khrag dang rkang la sogs// tha~Mng drangs par rnam bsgoms te// bsgoms na ngag rnams 'chi bar 'gyur// ga la
32b1(rgyud): te da ltar rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yang / zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gnod mi za// rdo rje dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum pa/ 
32b2(rgyud): ston pa'i sprin gyi mdog 'dra bsam// dkar po nag po rabatung ma // thor tshugs/ dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan// rdo rje can ni zhal gsum bas ma ka nag po dkar po mar po'i zhalaka/ 'bar ba'i thor tshugasang bu
32b3(rgyud): rgyan can// 'jig rten dmas rnams 'khrug byed pa'o// 'dod chags can ni zhal gsum bsam// dmar po nag po dkar po'i zhal// bor tshugs dbu rgyan longs spyod can// bsgoms na nges par 'grub par
32b4(rgyud): 'gyur// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+mo che// g.yas pa'i phyag tu bsnams par bsgom// rdo rje phyag drug mtshon cha ni// bzang po sna tshogs bsnams par sgom// sems can kun la phan bzhed ma// spyan
32b5(rgyud): ni zhal gsum dag tu bsam// dkar po nag po rab dmar ba// mdzes pa'i gzugasu rab tu sgom// mkha' skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che// zhal gsum du ni rtag par sgom// gnog
32b6(rgyud): dang dkar drang dmar ba'i tshul// mdzes pa'i gzugasu rnam par sgom// chu skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che// zhal gsum du ni rnam par sgom// dmar dang gnag dang dkar ba ste// kha dog mdzes par rnam par sgom/ 
32b7(rgyud): rig ma rdo rje ud pal bsnams// zhal gsum rab tu gsal ba'i mdangs/ ser dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// bsgoms na ye shes thob par 'gyur// khro bo chen po gshin rjes gshed/ 
32b8(rgyud): zhal gsum drag po'i 'od bzang ba// rnon po 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par byed// kha dog nag po rab tu sgom// gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo cha// drag tu band pa'i sgra 'byin pa// zhal gsum 'od zer
33a1(rgyud): mang po dag/ rab tu 'phro ba rnam par bsam// khro bo chen po gamagrin ni// skal ba'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar// zhal gsum gdug pa zhabs kyis mnan// sbyor ba can gyis rtag tu sgom/ 
33a2(rgyud): rdo rje mi 'chi khro bo che// 'od zer 'gro ba rab tu 'khrug drag po 'khor lo 'bar ba 'dra/ 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jig par byed// 'dod pa'i ye shes khro bo che/ zhal gsum pa ni 'jigs par byed// phyag ba'i
33a3(rgyud): 'jig par byed pa'i mchog/ Takri rgyal po rab tu bskum// stobs po che ni rdo rje che// 'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba// gdug po thams cad 'jom par byed// zhal gsum par ni rtag par sgom// khro bo chen bo dbyug
33a4(rgyud): sngon can// khams gsum ngag ni 'jigs par byed// zhal gsum rdo rje gsum las byung ka'abar ba rnon po can du sgom// rdo rje mi g.yo khro bo che// rdo rje las byung mi g.yo ba// zhi ba ral gri nags
33a5(rgyud): pa bsnams// gnang mdzes ye shes mchag 'dzin pa/ brtul zhugs can gyis zhal gsum sgom// gtsug tor chen po yi ge gcig/ bong zer dag ni kun tu 'phro// zhal gsum
33a6(rgyud): 'bar ba 'khor lo can// bsam gtan dkyil khro bsgom par bya// gnod mdzes ye shes mchog 'dzin pa/ 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho yang dag byed// zhal gsum 'bar ba 'od 'phro can// bsam gtan
33a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// gzi brjid phung po gtsug tor rgyal// gang gzhan sngags kyi 'khor lo can/ dam tshig longs spyod padi rnams kyis// so so dag tu bsgom par bya// ting 'dzin na dpag med pa/ 
33a8(rgyud): sngags rnams kyi ni bshad pa yin// khro bo dag ni re re yang // nam pa'i steng du shin tu 'phags// rnam pa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam po bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs
33b1(rgyud): ba snyos la// na par snang mdzang rnam par bsam// / gsal zhing gi bzla ba bzhin// 'od byer sna tshogs 'dra ba'i 'ong // me ljongs lta bu yang dag byung // khams gsum dgug kyil 'khor du/ 
33b2(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dag/ bsams na de yis byang chub mthong // bsam gtan rdo rje rab sgom pa// 'di yis sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/ 'jig rten thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid kyis
33b3(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig 'o byung ba mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// rnam pa'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs
33b4(rgyud): ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsam// khros dab gsal ba'i lus dang 'dra// 'bar ba sna tshogs mnyam pi'i 'od // rnam po'i mchog rnams kun dang ldan// rgyan rnams kun
33b5(rgyud): gyis rnam par brgyan// zhi ba'i ye shes gnas bsgoms na/ myur du rdo rje jing thob 'gyur/ bsam gtan rdo rje/ rab bskul ba// 'dis ni rdo rje'i bdag nyid che// sems can thams
33b6(rgyud): cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur dam tshig thams cad 'byung ba mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsams// sangs
33b7(rgyud): rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// chos kyi sems dpa' rnam par sgom// gsal ba'i lus 'dzin no ba ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// 'od zer sprin gyi 'khor lo cha// rnam par 'phro ba
33b8(rgyud): rab tu sgom// 'di yis chos kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsum mi phyad las byung ba// ye shes rgya mtshos rnam par rgyan// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// chos kyi sems dpa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes
34a1(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ri// na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// spyan gyi mchog ni rnam par sgom// zhal bzang sbran
34a2(rgyud): ni rab tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs// bung mang sgyu ma'i mchog ldan pa// khams gsum dag ni dbang byed pa// ye shes thams cad grub par byerje/ 
34a3(rgyud): 'khor lo yid bzhin nor bu skor// phyag tu 'khor lo bsgom par bya// spyan gyi dam tshig phyag gi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'ong mchog can// mkha'i dbyings rdo rje'i
34a4(rgyud): dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas/ na mkha'i rdo rje rab mchog sbom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// ut+pal mthong ka'i mdog 'dra ba// mtshon rnams
34a5(rgyud): dzad rab tu rdzogs// namapa'i rdo rje mchog rabasgom// khams gsu mngag gis phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub bang pa 'i mchog/ dngos grub rdo rje can gyi gsang // ut+pal sngo
34a6(rgyud): dmar phyag na bsnams// na mkha' yum gyi rin po che// 'od kyi sprin rdo rje tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// tshos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzu
34a7(rgyud): ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje chos ma rab tu sgom// zhal bzang spun ni rab tu yang so// pad+ma rA gau'i mdog 'dra ba'i// sgyu mas mtshan pa'i mchog las byung // 'dod chags chags pa 'dzin sdug pa// mtshan
34a8(rgyud): nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa// / chos kyi ye shes 'byung gnas mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje can gyi gsang / 
34b1(rgyud): ut+pal dmar po phyag na bsnams// chos kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid mngon par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam pa'i rdo rje'i dbusu bsam// sangs rgyas
34b2(rgyud): gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// sgrol ma'i mchogs ni bsgom par bya// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// kha dog ljang ser 'dra ba'i 'od/ bud med sgyu ma rab tu myos// rdo rje
34b3(rgyud): ting 'dzin las byung // sen kun gyis phyag byas pa// ut+pal ser po'i mdog 'dra ba'o// gsal ba phyag na bsnams par sgom// dam tshig sgrol ma mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ti 'i drin to// nyi ma'i dkyil
34b4(rgyud): 'khor dam pa ni// nam kha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// gshin rjes gshed mchog/ rnam par sgo// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// 'jigs
34b5(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu khros// spyan dmar mche ba rnam par gci gas// phyag na ral gri bsnams par sbom// snang mdzadadabu rgyan rnams bsgoms na// rdo rje can ni dgyes par 'gyur/ 
34b6(rgyud): 'di ni ye shes rdo rje can// gshin rje gshed kyi spro ba'i snang ba bkod pa sgom pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// namakha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgom
34b7(rgyud): la/ gzhan gyis mi thub rab sgom paka/ 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po// sbrul gyis rgyan zhing ska rags can// rdo rje dgyes pa 'jigs 'jigs lnga/ ka kha dog dkar po rab tu sgomaka mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// 
34b8(rgyud): bas sun rdo rje can ngag mnyes// 'di ni ye shes blo can gyi// khro bo kun gyi ngam tshigo// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam pa'i rdo rje'i
35a1(rgyud): dbus su bsams// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje rta ni rab tu sgom// khro bo'i 'od zer mang po dag/ zad du ni rnam par 'phro// gdug pa tha~Md nams kyis mnan// 
35a2(rgyud): kha dog dmar po rnam par bsam// rdzogs sangs dpag med dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rdo rje can dag mnyes// 'di ni rdo rje ye shes can// khro bo kun gyi dmi tshig yin// rta sred pa 'byung ba rnam par bkod pa zhes bya
35a3(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// rnam pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje mi 'chi rab tu sgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje'i sprin rnam
35a4(rgyud): kun tu 'khrug/ khros shing khro bcas pa nag pa dang // mche ba rnon po rab tu sgom// ming skyong dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgo mas na khro bo 'dzin mnyes 'gyur// 'di ni bro bo zad kyi// 'da'
35a5(rgyud): bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go yi 'i mchig 'byung rje zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin to// zhi ma'i dkyil 'khor ma pa ni/ rnam pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs
35a6(rgyud): ni rab bsgoms la// Tik+ki rgyal po rab tu sgom// khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs gtum// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jig par byed// rgyan rnams zad yongasu rdzogs// rdo rje 'od bzang bsgom par bya/ 
35a7(rgyud): mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo tha~Md kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// bsam gtan rdo rje rdzogs par byang chub pa dga' ba zhes
35a8(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// / namakha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// stobs po che ni rab tu bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer ma
35b1(rgyud): po 'phro rdo rje sum gyi gnas dkyil 'khor// khros shing khros pa thags pa 'dzin// rdo rje stobs chen bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni bro bo thams
35b2(rgyud): cad kyi 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje gsum gyis stobs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// nyi mo dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam pa'i rdo rje'i dbus bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sdom
35b3(rgyud): bo rnam par sgom// khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// gzugs ni rab tu gnag la rno// rgya mtsho nag po skyed par byed // 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje'i dbyigs po/ 
35b4(rgyud): bsgoms par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes por 'gyur// 'di ni bro bo zad kyi// 'da' bor dka' ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje dbyig pa'i dam tshig mchog dra
35b5(rgyud): ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor das pa ni/ nama'i'i rdo rje'i dbus bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la ka mi g.yo mchog ni rnam par sgom// khros shing 'jag
35b6(rgyud): ba'i zur gyis lta// 'khrugs pa ral gri zhags pa bsnams// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// mi g.yo rdo rje can du snom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bozang
35b7(rgyud): kyi 'dab bar dka' ba dam tshig go// rdo rjernam pa'i dbyings kyi dmachig zhabs kyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// nyi ma'o dkyil 'khor dam pa ni nam pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/  sangs rgyas bzugs
35b8(rgyud): ni rab bsgoms la// rig pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bsgom mtshan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs// 'khor lo 'bar bas yongasu bskor// gtsug tor 'khor lo rgyu dang tshig/ rnam par 'phro ba rab tu sgom// mi skyed
36a1(rgyud): dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi ka 'da' bar dka' de'i dam tshig go// gtsug tor gyi dam tshig rig pa'i stobs 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i
36a2(rgyud): ting 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sum+b+ha rab tu sgom// me lce rnon po 'bar bar sku// rdo rje'i sprin ni rab tu 'gro// phyag na rje
36a3(rgyud): rab 'bar bka/ bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje'i dam tshig sum+b+ha
36a4(rgyud): rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// 'gog pa khro bo'i 'khor lo ni/ sangs rgyas 'khor lo bsten pa yis// ting 'dzin rdo rje ye shes rnams// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur// de bzhin ga
36a5(rgyud): bzod kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las// rdo rje dam tshig bkang ba de kho na nyid kyi don sgom pa mngon/ bar byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// 
36a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi bdag po// rdo rje 'dzin chen po zhi ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
36a7(rgyud): cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+ha lo tsa na sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// 'byor pa kun la dgyes pa rnams/ 
36a8(rgyud): mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje rje su dran// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi 'byung ba// las rnams thams cad rab grub cing // rdo rje'i dam tshig bskul mdzad ma// shi bsos par byed par gsu
36b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsum gyi mchig rdo khro'o// dngos po dngos po med pa'i dam tshig rdo rje nas bya nga'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rdo rje 'dren thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog
36b2(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM shaM kA re shan+ti ka ra// b+huT g+hu T+Ta g+huT+Ti nig+hA ta ya ni g+hA ta ya g+hu d+h+r-i ni swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sku gsum dper med rdo rje can// mnyes
36b3(rgyud): ba'i spyan ni gangangs nas su// rdo rje'i thugs ni rje su dran// rdo rje srung ba'i sbyor ba la// las rnams rtag tu rab sgrub pa// rdo rje chen po 'jigs nyen la// rtag tu stobs ni byed par bshod// de nas bcom ldan 'das
36b4(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po'i dam tshig la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dal snyoms bur zhugs nas// chos kyi sku'i btsun mo mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 
36b5(rgyud): oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka Ta~M ka Te swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs can/ gyis// rdo rje chos mchog 'dzin pa rnams// mnyes nas bsam gtan thob gyur nas// rdo rje'i chos ni rje su dran// rtag
36b6(rgyud): tu chos rgyas stobs mdzad pa// rtag tu mdzod po che dang ldan// rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du// bzlas pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i
36b7(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// dam tshig sems dpa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // oM tA re tut+tA ri tu ra swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis ka sa
36b8(rgyud): rgyas kun bdag cha las skyes// mnyes shing ye shes thob gyur nas// rdo rje'i sku ni rje su dran// sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang sems can khams ni ma lus pa// skad cig gis ni bran bzhin du// thams cad g.yo
37a1(rgyud): med dbang du byad // ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ dri ma med pa'i
37a2(rgyud): 'od zer gyi sprin rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed po chen po rdo rje khro bo 'di// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra NA/ 
37a3(rgyud): oM kha kha khA hi khA hri/ sarba duSh+Ta satwa da mu ka/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu/ pA sha hasta/ tsa tur b+hu dza/ tsa tur mur kha/ Sha Tu ra Na/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta prA Na a pa hA ri Ne/ ma hA big+h+na g+hA ta ka/ bi kr-i tA nen/ 
37a4(rgyud): sar+b+ba b+hU ta b+ha ye kA ra// aT+TA T+Ta hA sa nA da ni/ byA g+h+ra tsam+ba ni ba sa na// ku ru ku ru sarba kar+m+ma Ni/ tshin+da tshin+da sar+b+ba man twA na/ b+h+r-in+da b+hin+da pa/ ra mu drA na/ Ak+ShA ya A kaR+Sha ya sar+b+ba b+hA tAM ni/ ma tha ma ga nar+Ya \u0f7f
37a5(rgyud): sar+b+ba dr-iny+dzan/ pra be sha ya bri ba sha la ma wA le me d+h+ye/ be bswa ta/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra ma ma sar+b+ba kar+yaM ku ru ku ru// da ha hA/ @tsa bi tsa/ mA ba~M laM ba mA bi laM ba/ sa mi ya ma nu s+phar/ hUM
37a6(rgyud): phaT phaT/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sar+b+ba shA pa ri pU ra ka sar+b+ba na nA shA li re pUn/ ka ra ka ra he ha b+ha ga ban/ kany+tsi ra ya si/ ma ma sar+b+ba ar+tha na/ sa d+ha ya swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs
37a7(rgyud): rgyas grags pa chen po kun// 'jigs shing kun tu skrag gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' rjesu dran// zod pa ma chag ma gsang ba// gzugs mdzes yid 'ang rnyed pa la// rkang pas mnan pa'i tshul
37a8(rgyud): byas nas// sngags 'di rje su dran par bya/ mA ma ki'am spyan yang rung // rdo rje'i rigs chen las byung ba// lan gsum dag tu brjod na ni// de ma thag tu nges par 'gug/ bcom ldan 'das thugs
37b1(rgyud): rdo rjes da skad ces gsungaso// de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad// dam tshig gi 'od zer sdug po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting lnga snyoms par zhugs nas/ khro bo mi 'chi ba'i dam
37b2(rgyud): tshig 'di// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta bar+d+habadz+ra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA deSh+Tota ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mus la ba ra shu pA sha hAstA ya/ 
37b3(rgyud): oM a mr-i ta ku dz+wA li/ kha la khA ha khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha bin+d+ha/ han ha na/ da ga he/ gerdza gardza/ bIs+pha Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba bi g+h+nAn/ banA ye kAn/ ma hA ga Na ba ti dzI bi tAn+ta ka rA ya swA hA/ de nas 'di
37b4(rgyud): ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun// brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas// rdo rje'i sku da ni rje su dran/ sngags rnams kun gyis sbyor ba dang // rdo rje bsku
37b5(rgyud): pa'i las rnams la// sangs rgyas nyid kyi dpung dag kyang // tshul bzhin byas na skrod par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rtogs sangs rgyas kyi
37b6(rgyud): 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rdo rje khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'dig nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ 
37b7(rgyud): oM hUM dzi na ri Tin+da hU~M hUM phaT phaT swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas bdag nyid che skyes kun/ 'jigs shing kun tu skrag gyur te// byang chub sems ni rjesu dran// srin po ma rungs gtu
37b8(rgyud): bo dang // 'jigs pa chen po'i khrugs pa dang // rdo rje sems kyis rab sbyar na// las rnams cho ga bzhin du byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa/ dpag
38a1(rgyud): / tu mang pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// pad+mo 'byung ba rdo rje khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ta/ na maHsa
38a2(rgyud): man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ oM hUM hUM hAM/ ta'u la/ bi ru la/ sarba bi Shag+na taka/ dz+wa li ta bis+tha li ga/ aT+TA hA sa/ ke sa ri saT a To ga TaM kA ra/ badz+ra khu ra ni ra g+hA ta na tse li ta ba sud+b+ha ta la/ ni shwa sa mA rutwota k+Shi pa ta
38a3(rgyud): d+hA ratrI d+har/ b+hIShaNa.aT+TaT+Ta hAs/ oM ba rari mi ta ba la pa rA kra ma/ Ar+ye ga Na/ b+hI ta b+hUHgA Na/ dz+ya b+h+r-i ta/ brahU bud+h+ya/ ha ya gr-I ga b+hUd khAd/ par man+tan/ tshin+da tshin+da/ b+h+r-in+da b+hin+de/ ba ra mudrAn/ sid+d+ha ma ma nga sha/ 
38a4(rgyud): A be sha ya/ sarba dz+wa raM pi shAts+tsha dIn/ sarba gra he'u a pra tiH/ to b+ha ba/ badz+ra deSh+Ta kiny+dza rA ye sa~M/ i daM duSh+Ta gra he duSh+Ta badz+ra da d+hu na d+hun/ mtha ma tha/ marang mard / pA Ta ya pA Ta ya/ mtha
38a5(rgyud): ma Ta/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bud d+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+ha a nu dz+nyA taM karma ku ru/ ha ya dzAHgalas dzA pa ya/ bedz+ra gA tA ya phaT/ badz+ra na trA ya phaT/ badz+ra/ diSh+Ta yai phaT/ badz+ra khA rA ya phaT/ badz+ra khu 'di shA rnaM sa la rje
38a6(rgyud): ga/ sarba~M kirme Sh+Ta a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ badz+ra ku la san trA sa nA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// chos kyi rdo rje cha mchog skyes// 'jigs shing rab tu nga rgyal bar 'gyur// 
38a7(rgyud): ye shes rgyal po rje su dran// mkha' dbyings dug gis yongs gleng ba// rdo rje ha la ha lI'i 'angadi // khro bo'i rgyal po bskul ba yis// dug rnams thams cad med par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
38a8(rgyud): gshegs pa gden mi za bar grub pa gang na mi za ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba dpa la rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas / rdo rje bapon sngon po khro ba'i rgyal po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang
38b1(rgyud): brags rdo rje las byung // namaHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+rA d+haM/ oM e h+ye hi/ b+ha ga ban nI la badz+rad d+hA/ tu ru du ru/ hu lu hu lu/ hA hA/ gu lu gu lu/ gu lA ba ya gu lA ba la/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha ga d+ha na/ bA yu be ge na/ 
38b2(rgyud): b+hUtAn shig+ne/ gang ha da ha/ da rang ra/ bgab ha/ btsa pa gam bam pa/ pA twa ya pA ta ya/ ma Ta ma Te/ mo Ta baM la mo nA pa ya/ sarba ke no N+Di/ tshe rje Nin+da/ b+hi k+Sha lamra 'di mi a s+ya me da madz+dza ru d+hi ra/ pri ya e h+ye hi b+ha gA
38b3(rgyud): bin sarba big+ha ni/ sarba bir+ya ni/ sarba man+ta ni/ sarba mU la ka mArti/ kr-i tri ma NiShA dI nI/ sarba gra hA na/ gan ha na/ b+hak+ShAd+hany+dza/ ma ra da marang / i m+be kAr+ya sA d+ha ya/ d+hA ni lA ya/ nI lA badz+ra da d+hA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ bag+h+nAn pa
38b4(rgyud): nA ya ka nA sha ya nA sha ya /  su ru du ru/ dIp+ta tsar+N+Na ya/ sarba shat+sA/ k+Sho hr-id yA ni bI Da ya/ tshin+da Nin+da ba ra bid+yA nA~Mn+na da ka/ hUM bi d+yA nA ma shi/ Sh+Ta ka/ sa ma ye nu s+phar/ badz+ra d+ha ra ba nAnIH/ marmA Ni ni kr-in+ta hUM/ na
38b5(rgyud): phan/ da ha da ha/ ku ru ku/ tu ru tu ru/ hu ru hu ru/ phiT phaT/ hAt+sA kr-i ten+ta ya/ de ba ri Shi bi drA ba kA ya/ han ha na/ badz+ra dar+d+han swA hA// ngi nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// gdug pa'i mchog las byung ba
38b6(rgyud): kun/ yid ni 'jigs shing rab skrag nas// sems dpa'i rdo rje rje su dran/ khro bo'i rgyal po grags chen 'di/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa dang // cho ga'i tshul bzhin bskul ba yis// gdug pa thams cad gsod
38b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur// danas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas// kun nas sprin dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje stobs po che 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
38b8(rgyud): las byung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM Ta pha Ta la/ u gra shU la pA Ni/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM dzo ti nir nA da/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ de nas 'din
39a1(rgyud): gsungs ma thal/ stobs po che yis klu rnams kun/ yid ni 'jigs shing rab sgrub nas// sku gsum rdo rje rje su dran// bzlas btsam gyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams cang sgrub par byed/ 
39a2(rgyud): zizan pa byung ba'i dus na yang // chu yi dkyil 'khor 'bebs par byed // de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'jims pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thung
39a3(rgyud): kri'i rgyal po khri bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ga tsit+ta badz+ro trA~M/ Ta k+ki hUM dzaHde nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po kun
39a4(rgyud): 'jigs shing dam tshig ldan gyur nas// rdo rje sku gsum rjesu dran rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// ling ga rkang pa g.yas pas mnan// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags dag gis// sngags rnams thams
39a5(rgyud): cad 'gugs pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shas kyi phreng ba'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin tal snyoms bar zhugs nas/ mi g.yo ba'i rdo gtum po'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi
39a6(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+ra N+DaM/ a tsa la kA Na tsat+satAM/ naT+Ta na Ta maT+Ta maT+Ta/ mo T+Ta mo TA/ shaT+Ta sha Ta/ taT+Ta taT+Ta/ ha na ha/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ mo ha ka ra/ ha sa ha
39a7(rgyud): sa/ badz+re hA sa ku ru kaha sa ha sa/ marda ra Ta marda raT/ gardza gardza/ ha na ha na/ ban+d+he ban+ta/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi shaM AM bi sha/ ma hA man+tha/ pA laM ka/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/ big+h+na na mA ra ya mA ra ya/ du
39a8(rgyud): g+h+nAM b+hak+Sha g+hak+Sha/ sarbA Ta ru kra ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi la ma tho la/ s+pho Ta ya/ hA hU~M hUM/ hri ba lI ta ra/ gan d+ha ka/ A A A/ hA hA hI/ a tsa la tsi Ta/ s+phoT ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUM hUM/ a sa man+te ka traT
39b1(rgyud): hA ba la shA ta ya/ ba ra man tAM/ AM AM/ hAM hA maM/ b+hU tu lo ka/ tuShu tu badz+ri/ na mosta A pra ti ha ta ba le b+hU/ dz+wA la ya/ tra Ta a sa ha na na ma swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// lha rnams 'khor du bcas
39b2(rgyud): pa kun du brgyal zhing yid ni rab skrag nas/ rdo rje'i sku ni rje su dran// khro bo chen po'i sngags 'di yi// lha chen drag la sogs pa'i lha// mthu chen dag kyang sreg gyur nas// kha sbyar lus su 'gugs par 'gyur/ 
39b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyom par zhugs nas// rdo rje 'dzin tha~Md kyi dam tshig khro bo gnod mdzes 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung
39b4(rgyud): oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na yo b+ha ga wA bi d+yA ra dzi hUM phaT// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// bu mo mthu chen thams cad ni/ sgra bshig gos dang
39b5(rgyud): bral gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa'i rjesu dran// rdo rje sems/ dpa'i zhabs kyis mnan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ bdag pa'o// rdo rje lcags kyugags pa yis// bu mo rnams ni
39b6(rgyud): 'gugs pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting badzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba gsung gi ngam
39b7(rgyud): tshig gi ngo bo nyid gnas 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyu // sangs rgyas rdo rje sku gsum la// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// nags pa rdo rje kyo ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa'o// 
39b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku gsung sbyor ba yi// 'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// rtag tu nges par khugs par 'gyur// mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas// 'khor lo pad+mo rdo rje che// 
40a1(rgyud): rdo rje kyo ba'i khyad par gyis// sngags rnams tham snga gugs pa'i mchog/ thang rdo rje'i dngos ni ba// rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni// mi yi bu mo mchog rnams kyi// snying khar rdo rje
40a2(rgyud): kyo ba sbyor// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// nges par rtag tu 'gug par 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen sbom// de na sha tsi gnas par bsams// rdo rje mi 'chi'i sbyor
40a3(rgyud): ba yis// lan grangs lnga bcu brjod na ni// nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur// rdo rje kyo ba gzugs chen po// 'bar ba rdo rje 'dra ba'i 'ong // rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms ni ni// nam kha'i bu mo 'gugs pa'i
40a4(rgyud): mchog/ khro bo rdo rje dam tshig ni ka/ rdo rje sa 'og gnas bdag/ shA la rdo rje kyo ba'i gnas// lha min bu mo 'gugs pa'i gnas// / btsag gam rdo rgyus dag kyang rung // rdo rje kyo bi'i sbyor ba yis
40a5(rgyud): zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i tshe// khar bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya// tshangs pa grag po la sogs lha// rang gi ming rnams bris nas ni// rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du// 'dregaso shing
40a6(rgyud): skrag nas 'ong bar 'gyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu sgom// khro do chen po gshin rje gsheng // rdo rje kyo ba rnam par bsam// bskal pa'i sreg pa'i 'khor lo cha// bsgoms
40a7(rgyud): nas gnod sbyin mo dgra spyad // kun gyi pha rgya'i khyad par dang // yang gsungs pa// gtsir bur phud de skrag pa shig la// 'jigs pa'i tshul du gtsigs shing 'gyur// rkang pas ling ga ma nAn ni// nam
40a8(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jig par 'gyur// ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam ka khang stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang // mtshan gcig dang ni shing gcig drung // mngon par spong ba brtsam par bya// mi rus las
40b1(rgyud): byas phur bu ni// sor brgyad pa yi tshang dag la// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas te// dgra bo'i sgo khar sbas na ni// sangs sku gsum mchog sbyin pa ka/ shas dang mi shes rnam spangs pa// zla ba phrang ni tshun chad kyis// 
40b2(rgyud): bskams sam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur// yang na thod pa gang ba dag/ khyad par du ni mkhas pas btsal// der ni sngags kyi tshig bris te// rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas pa bya// dgra yi sgo 'am grong dag tu// sbas
40b3(rgyud): na nges par skrong par 'gyur// / ta la'i lo ma 'am gzhan la'ang rung // khro bo'i sngags ni kun bris la// dgra yi grong ngam sgo dag tu// sbas na 'chi 'am bskams par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam
40b4(rgyud): tshig chen po'i dpal rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsu dang dang thugs nges par 'ching ba rdo rje la zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
40b5(rgyud): la sgoms par zhugs nas// rdo rje khams gsum pa thaMd kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gnon pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'a/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM g+ha
40b6(rgyud): g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn phaT phaT// kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA pa~M phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM dzA kI lams sadz+nyA ba ya ti/ ka ya wa ka tsit+ta badz+ra kI lA ya hU~M hU~M hUM phaT phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs ma thag/ sangs
40b7(rgyud): rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po kun// brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas// nam mkha' rdo rje thugs dran 'gyur// mi rus las byes phur bu'am/ yang na song lding rtse las skyes// lcags las byas pa'i phur
40b8(rgyud): bu dag/ rdo rje sku gsum 'jig par byed// 'od 'phro 'khrug cings mdangs bzang ba'i// rdo rje sems dpar mnyam gzhog la// rdo rje sku ni gsum gyi mthar// gzugs brnyan bsam nas sbyar bar
41a1(rgyud): // bya rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen nas// yang na 'dang chags rdo rje can// gshin rje gshed kyi rgya chen dag/ bsams na rdo rje gsum yang gnon rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis// gdug cing khrob
41a2(rgyud): tshar bcad la// sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang // rdo rje'i sbyor bas bya ba yin// snying kha nas ni rkang pa'i mthar// rdo rje phur bu rnam par sgom// gong du'ang dam tshig de nyid bya'o// 'di ni phur bu'i rnam 'phrul
41a3(rgyud): yin// bsams gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'bebs// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// phur bus btab na myur du 'chi// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po ka sku
41a4(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i dam tshig tsham ngam gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i snga gas 'di// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'byung
41a5(rgyud): ngo oM badz+ra tsan+da tshin+da/ han ha na// da ha da ha/ dab+hi badz+ra tsakrahU~M phaT/ phan tshun dkri ba'i tshul du bya// mthe bong gzhi ni rab tu bsdam/ rnam par snang mdzad tshul gnas te// rdo rje
41a6(rgyud): phur bus nges par gdab// btab ma thag tu sems dpa' tshe// rdo rje sku gsum las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gan su 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das
41a7(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// gsung gi dam tshig tsha ma ngam gnod pa rdo rje'i sngags 'di // nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdorje
41a8(rgyud): las byung // oM hri b+hu b+hu ba// ye shes pad+mo kha bye ba// rdo rje sor mo nges par bzhag/ 'dod chags rdo rje'i tshul gnas te// rdo rje'i phur bu nges par 'debs// btab ma thag tu rdo rje cha// sku gsum dri/ 
41b1(rgyud): meng las byung ba// btab pa tsam gyis ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gan su 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po// thugs rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
41b2(rgyud): bar zhugs nas thugs kyi dam tshig tshad ma gyis gnon bu'i sngagra'i kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM ba dz+ra rAHhUM hUM mo lnga dra ri'i nas ni// 'od 'phro mang po 'khrigs par sgom/ rdo rje thugs kyi tshul gnas
41b3(rgyud): ta/ rdo rje phur bus nges par gad ga// btab pa tsam gyis rdo rje cha/ rdo rje dri med gsum las byung // btab ma thag tu ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gnasu 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga lagra pa byas
41b4(rgyud): nus ni// mkha' dbyings rdo rje mthas klas par// phur bus 'debs bar gdon mi za// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur bu chen pos des dad ces bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog/ 
41b5(rgyud): sems can khams la phran mdzad pa// mnyes shing rab tu dgyes/ gyur nas// gsung ni 'di skad pa' stsal to// e ma 'ogs nga ba'i gnas kyi mchog/ a ma'o snying pa kun bsdus pa/ e na
41b6(rgyud): chos kyi gnas zhi ba// a ma'o rdo rje rnam par 'joms// phur 'debs sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen te// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// phur bus gdab pa yang dag ca
41b7(rgyud): 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// ngur gdab de nyid las byung ba// sku gsung thugs ni mchog sbyin pa'i sngags kyi de nyid don bsdus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pazed kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang
41b8(rgyud): ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sku dang gsung dang thugs nang du byung ba'i sngags kyis 'gugs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u sa bcu bzhi pa'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin
42a1(rgyud): thams cad namakha' mi 'gyur ma// thams cad dbang bskur kun mkhyen pas// rdo rje'i gsung ni bka' stsal pa// sma sha can gyi bdag nyid cha// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// dben pa'i gnas byang
42a2(rgyud): bar du// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub// gshang gci dam tshig la sogs pa// de ru cho ga bzhin du ni// dkyil 'khor klu bani lham babya/ rdo'-i'i dgyir sgom pa'is/ mngan nyid thaMd yongasu dag/ rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes// rgyan rnams tshang
42a3(rgyud): yongs rdzogs pa// bang bar bzhag nas rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor lnga yi 'khor lo yis// sangs rgyas rnams rnam par sgom// sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyi gsang // mchod pa'i gnas ni nyams dga' sgom// sku gsung thug
42a4(rgyud): ni rdo rje can// rnam par snang mdzad sku chen po// bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// gtso klog ma bar ni bdag nyid che// bu mo
42a5(rgyud): ud ngal mthing kha'i mdog/ 'dra ba dag ni rtag / sgrub// sbyor ba'i tshe ga de nyid ni// byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya// 'di ni sngag/ sa rnams zad kyi// dam tshig shin tu'ang 'daka' ba'o// de ni dam
42a6(rgyud): zag tu yang ka/ rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyuraro// rgyal po chos rnams kun dang mtshungs// 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa// rdo rje chos ni rnam bsgoms pas// gar ma ban bu mo rab mdzes shing // bzhin bzang mig
42a7(rgyud): ni dukyus ring ba// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub/ de ni rdo rje cho ci bdag/ sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur// rgyal po gsung gi dam tshig 'dzin// mnga' bdag dam pa kun gyi mchog/ bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u yi rigs/ 
42a8(rgyud): dmang rigs las byung bu mo ni// rdo rje chos bdag bsgrub par bya// 'di na gsang ba thob byed pa'o// rdo rje nyi ma nung nas ni// sgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya// skya reng 'char ba'i dus su ni// sgom pa'i mchog gis
42b1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs// spos dang me tog rnams kyis rgyan// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na// grub pa myur du 'thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// sangs rgyas
42b2(rgyud): mtshan gyis mtshan par gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// de yi 'od kyang snang bar byed/ dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba tha~Md brtsam par bya// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'das
42b3(rgyud): dka' ba'o// rdo rje can gyi grub 'dod na// gshang gci'i dam tshig bzang bar bya// 'di ni dngos grub tha~Md kyi ka/ dam tshig shin tu 'dis 'da' dka' ba'o// gshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas// dbang po gnyis
42b4(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba// de nyid bla na med pa 'grub// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa dang thar pa'i dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig
42b5(rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje kun tu skrag/ par byed pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di ga nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
42b6(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung // oM hriHSh+T+r-i wi kri ta A na na// sarba sha trun nA sha ye staM b+ha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT sU hA// dug ni khrag dang kun tu sbyar// ldan cha ske tshe yungs mar te// khro zhing tsher ma'i me la sreg bu mo'i
42b7(rgyud): ming dang tshig tu bcas// nyi ma gung ngam nam byed na// 'di ni yongs ye rab tu shis// shes rab can gyi gru gsum du// stong rtsa brgyad ni tshul bzhin sreg/ bu mo dag gi don gyi phyir// 'di ni nyi ma gsum du bya/ 
42b8(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med gsum du yang // nga yis rtag tu gnon par 'gyur// sangs rgyas sam ni chos 'dzin pa 'am// yang na rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung ba gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni// de yi tshe ni rer zad 'gyur// 
43a1(rgyud): bcu bzhi'am yang mtshes brgyad la// dur khrong sol ba blangs nas ni// cho ga bzhin du sngags bang ban// de ni rtag tu ster bar 'gyur// sngags shes pa yis gang rung ba'i// ngag yi gzugs
43a2(rgyud): brnyan byas nas su// bsam gtan dag gis bris na ni// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// tho ba bsam gtan sbyor ba yis// phab na nges par ltung bar 'gyur// hUM ni rab tu 'bar dang bcas// rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu
43a3(rgyud): sgom// phyag na rdo rje'i rigs dran te// bdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed// rdo rgyus sol ba la sogs pas// skyes pa 'am bung mang gzugs bris la// lag par sngar bsams nas su// ming pa bcang pa
43a4(rgyud): rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas sku gsum rin chen mchog/ sems can kun la phan 'dod pa/ 'di yis snang bar 'gyur ba 'am// shi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// las kyi rdo rje rab 'bar ba// me sdug
43a5(rgyud): mang po'i bregs pa can / dbusu rdo rje bsams nani// chu rnams mnan pa'i mchog yin no// dkyil 'khor dag ni 'dri ba na/ rlung la sogs pa byung na ni// mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas
43a6(rgyud): su gdug pa'i ngag ni dran par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// gang zhig sprul par gyur pa yang // mthong ba tsam gyis 'gag 'gyur te// gzhan du byas na 'jig par 'gyur// sangs
43a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dang // skye bo gdug pa gzhan dag kyang // sngags 'dis skrag par byas ni ni// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// de la 'di ni sngags tha~Md kyi gsang ba'i snying po'o// phaT/ yis som
43a8(rgyud): dba'i sbyor ba yis// dbusu gzugs ni bsgom par bya// sngags shes pa yis gnas bzhi ru // bud med rtag tu bzhag par bya// rgyan rnams zang yongasu rdzogs// mtshan rnams cad kyis mtshan cing / 
43b1(rgyud): pad+ma rab tu rgyas byas nas// sngags 'di rnam par bsgom par bya// / hUM 'od zer lnga ni rab 'bar ba'i// rdo rje can gyi sbyor bsgom// rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la// pab na byang chub thob par 'gyur// de ni de ma thag tu yang
43b2(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad 'ong 'dra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// sangs rgyas sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin ka/ sems dpa 'tshang bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// bzhin bzang phan par 'dod pa yi// bud med
43b3(rgyud): rnyeng na cho ga bzhin// dben par mchod pa brtsam par bya// gsang ba blangs nas bzab par bya// de ni da ma thag tu yang // 'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam// mi snang bdag po dpal dang ldan// badz+ram+bu gser gyi
43b4(rgyud): mngangs 'drar 'gyur// gshang ba 'am yang na bza' ba 'am/ sha dag kyang ni gzhug par bya// cho ga bzhin du bsngags nas ni// zos na sangs rgyas mi mthong // zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
43b5(rgyud): 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// gshang ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas// kham phor sbyar mar bzhag par bya// brgya rtsa brgyad du bskul na ni// sangs rgyas nyi ma mi mthong ngo // 
43b6(rgyud): khyi yi sha dang rta sha dang // sha chen dag ni cho ga bzhin/ blangs nas sbyar ba'i thabs kyis ni// zos na de mos mi mthong ngo // gshong dang ldan cog sbyar ba yi// ril bu lpags gsum gyis dkris pa/ dbang po nyis
43b7(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mthong ngo // khyi yi sha dang sbyar ba yi/ ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // sha chen dang ni sbyar ba yi// 
43b8(rgyud): ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // ba lang sha dang sbyor ba yi // rol bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi spor ba yis/ 
44a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // bshang ba las byung srog chags las// brtul zhugs can gyis ril bu bya// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // ga pu
44a2(rgyud): tsan ngan sbar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi spor ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // gi waM a ga ru sbar ba'i// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis
44a3(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje stobs po chen 'gyuraro// ga pur gur du ma sbyar ba yid// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // rdo rje 'dzin pa
44a4(rgyud): gang yang rung // phyag rgyan por byin rlabs nas// de ni nga 'dra'i dpalo ldan pa'i// stobs chen pha rol gnon par 'gyur// dpag tshad bye ba rdzogs pa yi// stang du rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// stong
44a5(rgyud): gsum bgrod pa'i dang ldan pa// sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur// / 'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo dang // lha yi longs spyod rigs bortul zhugs// yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la// 
44a6(rgyud): stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyad// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mi snang ba'i rdo rje chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas rab dgyes bdag/ sems 'khrul yid la dbang ba rnams// ngo mtshar
44a7(rgyud): gyur cing spyan gdangs nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// e ma'o 'di rab ngo mcher che// e ma'o gsang gnas mi 'gyur ba// a mtho ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ e ma'o shin tu dri med chos// de nas ston
44a8(rgyud): ba rdo rje 'dzin// skyed pa byeng mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen pos// rdo rje'i gsung du bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje 'dzin rnams mnyes par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas
44b1(rgyud): byang chub rab dab pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur// rdo rje can gyi gzugs la sogs// gtsug tor 'jog par byed par bshad// khro bo'i nang na da mchog ste/ sangs rgyas rdo rje rab sgom pa'o// reg pa'i
44b2(rgyud): rgyal mo chos mchog rnams// dkon mchog dpal ni rnam par sgom// rig pa'i rgyal mo sbyor ba la// tshe dngag mang ba rab tu sgom// thams cad las byang sngags rnams la// gdon mi za ba'i yas sgom// sngags rnams
44b3(rgyud): thang cing la ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhes gsung so// gnod sbyin mo yi sngags rgyud la// gshin rje gshed ni rtag par bya// sngags rnams thaMng nyid la mi spyi bo nas ni bskul ba shis// bcom ldan 'das
44b4(rgyud): dam tshig chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// bsam gtan 'kho ra lo de yis ni// sngags mnyes pa yid dkyil 'khor dag/ dam tshig chen po sgrub byed pa// sgrib pa po la phan par gsung // 
44b5(rgyud): nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ gtso bo chos rnams kun dbang phyug/ sku dang gsung thugs yongs dag pas// yas rdo rje bka' stsal to// ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang // nags tshal rab tu dben par ni/ 
44b6(rgyud): bsam gtan rdo rje rab bya ba// bzlas dang sngags kyi sbyor bas so/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun// sngags kyi bsam gtan gyis bskul bas// gsung gi las kyi bka' bzhin
44b7(rgyud): du las rnams sna tshogs byang bar 'gyur// rdo rje chos kyi gzugs chen po// pad+ma rA ba'i 'od 'dra ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la// gnas gsum du ni rigs brtago// dbab pa'i cho ga dzad ni// byas na
44b8(rgyud): gdon mi za bar 'grub/ bskul dang rangs dang lha chen po// 'phags lam bzhi po dag kyang ni// rdo rje grub pa dag gis bya// / de ltar byas ma rtag par 'grub/ bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis
45a1(rgyud): ma 'am khya lo drangs bcu gnyis pa/ mtshan nyid rang yongs rdzogs pa/ bzung nas dngab pa rab tu brtag cho ga zang bas nas ni// las rnams rab tu bsgrub par ba// rnam pa gzhan du byas na ni
45a2(rgyud): khams gsum skya bos dpyasar 'gyur// de la snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig 'di rnam so// hUM haHAHd+hIHnam pa' khams ni sems med cing // rtog pa tha~Mng rnam spangs dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang // tshig
45a3(rgyud): bzhin du bas no 'ba'o// hUM ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag/ ha/ ni sku yi rdo rje can// AHni chos 'dzin rgyal po ste// 'di ni gsang tshig bstan du'o// d+hIHni bskul bar byeng bar bshad// 'gul ba dang ni g.yo ba yin// 'din
45a4(rgyud): skul ba tha~Md kyi// gsang ba yin par 'di rab bshad/ khrug tsan ma ma khru do 'am/ khru brgyad tsam ram lnga tsam du// rdo rje sems draba'i rab bskol na// 'jigs shing bsgrag nas 'phar bar 'gyur// 
45a5(rgyud): sde ma bzhin du thams cad 'gyur// 'di ni gsang ba thob pa'i// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzi ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ sku gsum gnas ni yongs dag pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka'
45a6(rgyud): stsal to// rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang // brtul zhugs brtan bso 'di dag bya// sbyor ba gzhan min pas bya ba// gdug pa zang rnam gzhig pa'o// dur khrid sol dang phub sogs las kangag yi gzugs brnyan byas
45a7(rgyud): nas ni// skra bshigs gcer bur byung nas ni// khams gsum dag kyang 'jig par byed// dur khrod ro bsregs thal ba yis ka dag yi gzugs brnyan bas nas ni// stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas kyang // 'tsho
45a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas pa la// ba lang sha 'am rtog yi sha/ khyi yi sha bam sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje'ang gdon mi za bor 'jig/ sha chan gyis ni thaMd kyi// rdo rje las byung 'jig
45b1(rgyud): par bshad// 'di ni dgra rnams zad kyi// 'jigs pa shin tu bzang yin/ dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// gshang gci dag gi chos mchog can// tsher ma'i me la khros nas bsregs// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig
45b2(rgyud): chu bo'i 'gram sa yis kyang // dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// til 'bru tsam gyis yan lag kun// dug las byung ba'i tshar ma yis// bskul tshig dang bcas pas dgang // sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ 
45b3(rgyud): ske tsha lan chu 'bru mar dang // dug dang da dur dag ni// sangs rgyas dzad bsad pa la// 'di dag mchog tu gyur par bshad// sol khus gshar ba'i gos dag ni// gyon te sems ni khros na su// rkang pas ling ga mnan nas ni// 
45b4(rgyud): srin pos khyer bar gdon mi za// rus byed khrag dang dug rnams kyis// / gzugs brnyan rab tu byas na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang myur bdag tu 'khor bar 'gyur// ske tshe gshang gci sbyar ba yis// 
45b5(rgyud): ling ga yongasu gang bar ni ka/ blugs la rkang pas rab mnanan/ tsha ba chen pos btab par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa zad kyi dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bro'i snying po'o// na maHsa man+t+ra
45b6(rgyud): kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+ra d+hA/ oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ han ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nA na bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga na ba ti dzI bA tAn+ta kA rA ya hUM phaT/ sbyin sreg yang na bas
45b7(rgyud): gtan dag/ lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste// ma yangs pa yi sems kyis bya// / 'di ni gsod pa'i mchog yin no// rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che// rnam par bgrang ba 'jigs 'jig ste/ ste re tho ba phyag na bsnams/ 
45b8(rgyud): bsams nas pas gtan rab tu bya/ de la 'di ni drag po chen po'i khro bo'i dam tshig go// mnga' dbyings thang sangs rgyas kyis// yong su gang bar rab tu sgom// gdug pa de yis bsad par ni// bsams na de mthag
46a1(rgyud): tu 'chi/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yongasu gang bar bsgoms nas ni// gdug pa'i sems pas bas ngan ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi// sangs rgyas gnod byang dgra rnams la// skrag
46a2(rgyud): cing 'jigs pas dkrugs par ni// sngags mkhan gyis ni mdun bsams na// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// srin po bro bo sna tshogs pa// gtum zhing khro ba mi bzad pas// der ni skrag par byas bsams na// rdo rje 'dzin pa
46a3(rgyud): nyid kyang 'chi// 'ug po khwa dang brkod dang // mchu ring ba dang wa rnams te// de yis zos par bsams na ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang ngas par 'jig sbrul nag rab tu khro ba ni// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// dug gi mchog
46a4(rgyud): gi ngas tshig ni// dpral bar posams ma khyad 'phags pa'i/ sbrul des zos par bsams na ni// sangs rgyas ngag kyang nges par 'dzi ga/ phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la// yam sau sam gnod par byed
46a5(rgyud): ba rnams// 'jigs pa nges par 'bebs pa'i mchog/ 'dun pa/ bskul ba'i mchog yin no// thob rab tu drag po yis// bad+d+ha/ la zhugs can gyis snying khar brdeg/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du/ 
46a6(rgyud): dgra bo'i srog ni med par 'gyur// rdo rje sta re la sogs pas// gshegs cing gtub par bsams na ni// sku gsum gyi ni mchog sbyin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po'ang 'chi// srung ba la sog sngags rnams dang // lnga
46a7(rgyud): rnams kyang ni phur bus gdab// 'di ni gsod par byed pa'i mchog/ dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// rdo rje'i phung pos ji tsam du// sen dkyil 'khor gnas pa la// bsang bdag nyid gtogs bsams ni ni// mnyes
46a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur te gzhan du min// ston pa sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje chos dang rdo rje can// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// bsam gtan sbyor bas 'chi bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das khro ba chen po'i dam tshig khro bos de skad
46b1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thaMd rnam pa 'jub chen po// ba dbang bskur rdzogs sangs rgyas// yis rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// e ma 'dra bo nyid kyis ngag / rdo rje thag pa blan mang // ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/ 
46b2(rgyud): rgyal ba rnams kyis skye bar bstan// de la 'di ni las phran tshegs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'o// sprul ni ma sdug 'jigs byed pa// nag po 'bar ba 'khrug cing khro// lha gnyis mche ba'i phreng can ni// rdo rgyus dag gam sol bas
46b3(rgyud): bring nge la 'di ni klu khro bo bskul ba'i snying po'o// khaM/ mi bzang bar ni 'gyur ba'i dug// rdo rje'i dbus na 'dug par bsam// dug ni ha la pha la mtshungs// sreg pa'i me yi kha dog bzhin// bsgoms ni 'gul bar gdon mi za/ 
46b4(rgyud): de la 'di ni dag zang 'byin pa'i snying po'o// hrIHrnam pa sna tshogs las byug dug/ khams gsum na ni gnas pa kun// de yis khyer dbar bsgoms nas ni// 'bab par gyur rna ra bsam// de ni de ma thag tu yang
46b5(rgyud): mi bzang dug gi rgya mtshor 'gyur// reg me zag tu skye bo kun // 'jig pa 'di la the tshom med// sdig pa rus sbal la sogs dang // sbrul rnams sna tshogs pa dag kyang // sbyor ba 'byung mtsham
46b6(rgyud): mchog pa'i du bya de la 'di ni dug zang 'pho ba'i snying po'o// oM lta brdo rje'i drug la sogs// gzhan yang mi bzang ba yi drug/ rnam pa' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// bsams na yis rdo rjes dran ba c+doMs dug gi
46b7(rgyud): dam tshig chen po rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// nga la 'di ni dug gso ba'i dam tshig rdo rje snying po'o// hUM rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di ka kha dog dkar por rnam par bsam ka/ 'od sprin ni shin tu 'bar// zla ba'i 'od zer
46b8(rgyud): bzhin du bsil// gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis// de ma thag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// lan gsum legs par sgom pa ni// skyugs pa dag tu rnam bsams na// na mkha' khams kun gang ba yang // de ma thag tu drug
47a1(rgyud): bsams brtsam gyis med par 'gyur // d+ma ldan po 'dabs brdung kazla ba bzhin du dri ma med // de yi dbus na dug bsam pa/ 'od zer sngon rtogs pa'o// rlung ba zhing mtshig gnas/ bskul ba ming kAr bo dra / ngas
47a2(rgyud): gan nas ni gsang ba ridi // me sa meng pasi chen yin/ de la 'dzin nga gi mang rnams gsoba'i rdo rje snying po'i sdigs kyi yi ge'i tshig rnamamo// ji na dzika I l-ig/ badz+ra d+hi/ na gyi rdo rje bskul ba yis// yig
47a3(rgyud): tshig ni gang 'dod pa/ ka/ dang bas yon tan thob 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gzugs ni bsgom par bya// dam tshig spre'u dang 'dra ba'am// yang na khyi// las byung ba'ang rung // rang gi lus ngag sems gnas las/ 
47a4(rgyud): byung ba dag tu rnam par bsam// 'khor lo 'am ni rdo rje'ang rung // bsgom san rdo rje'i gau 'phang gnas// lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams// des ni phye mar brlag par sgom// de nas brtsams
47a5(rgyud): te rdzogs sangs rgyas// byang chub sed 'thugs chen rnams// byin rlabs go 'phang dam pa dag/ dgyes pa'i spyan gyis rab tu stsol// 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la/ ka/ sangs rgyas sprin
47a6(rgyud): ngag rnam par bsam// rdo rje rgyal po sprin chen po// nad las thar par rnam par sgom// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thaMd dang // / blo ldan byang chub senga'adag// de la khros par bsams na ni// 'chi bar byed pa dam pa yin
47a7(rgyud): bsam gdan sbyor ba di dag gis// las skyes su yang gang grags pa// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas sbyor ba yis// nyim bdun gyis 'jigs par 'gyur// yang na bdag gis sngags rgyal gyis// rdo rje'i bsam gan/ 
47b1(rgyud): tshig sa 'kho sas srang kyi/ da cig 'i tu ba bdag sa de nas rgyal po rdo 'dzin/ yes myo 'ong ba che/ 'ang par rdo rjes// gzung ning di na pa 'gyul to// cho numam chi lam lda
47b2(rgyud): ste// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing ka/ rang bzhin dag pa de nyid la// 'khrul pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsung // bsam gtan bzlas pa don brtson pa'i// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub seMng pa rnams// dag
47b3(rgyud): brnam pa gnyi su mthong // de la 'di ni rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas te// byang chub yis mchog thob pas// sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por mthong // sangs rgyas rdzogs longs spyod pa yi// skur yang pongs
47b4(rgyud): nyid myur du mthong // seMn chen po khams gsum pas// mchod dbyang bar ngos mthong ngo // yas chen po'i 'od 'dra'i bakhrugs// sangs rgyas byang chub sa der yis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis/ 
47b5(rgyud): rtag tu mchod pa byengad par mthong // rdo rje sa de'i gzugs chen dang // grags ba chen po rdo rje chos// gsang ba rdo rje grags pa cher/ rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong // byang chub seng 'arjon
47b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba'i// rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong bar gyur pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ste// rgyan rnams thaMng yongs rdzogs pa'i/ lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang // khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong
47b7(rgyud): na de ni dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zad kyang // zhing na bzhugs par nges par mthong // thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas// chos mdzad yid du 'ong ba stsal// chos kyi 'khor lo
47b8(rgyud): sbyar ba'i lus// sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs bskor ba// bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i// dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur// kun dka' ra ba skyed mos tshal// lha yi bu mo sogs pas rgyan// sangs
48a1(rgyud): kun gyis byin rlabs pas// bsam gtan dam tshig can gyis mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// de ni mngon par dbang bskur mthong // rigs 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis ma
48a2(rgyud): ba byas par nges mthong ngo // yang gsungs pa// rdo rje las byung sna tshogs pa'i// rmi lam dri ma med mthong na/ sku gsum thugs kyi rdo rje las// skyes pa bla med 'grub par 'gyur gdol pa spyi yi sbyor la
48a3(rgyud): sogs/ gal rdo rje blos mthong na// blo ldan rdo rje sems dang wa~M/ sems kyi gnas ni 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni mi lam rnam par dpyang ba'i dam tshig gi steng po'o// rang sems rnams ni dmigs pa la// chos rnams
48a4(rgyud): zad rab tu gnas// na mkha' rdo rje ba gnas sems 'di// chos med chos nyid med pa'o// de nas bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Mng ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang
48a5(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig gi the tsom gcod pa rdo rje sedang la zhus pa/ bac+doMs 'di ci zhig lags// chos rnams ngo bo med ba la// chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa// e mdo ngo mtshar las byung ba/ 
48a6(rgyud): nam mkha' la ni na mkha' sgom// de nas bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md la 'di skad ces gsung so// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa
48a7(rgyud): dzad nam kha' ni chos gang dang yang mi ldan te// mi ldan pa yang ma yino// rnam pa 'ding ni chos thang du gtogs la/ thaMd kyi rje su blta'o snyam du yang mi sem so// de bzhin du shags parjes de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd rmi lam lda
48a8(rgyud): bung rdzi i las byung bar rdzasu rtogs par bya'o// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad // 'di lta ste/ dper na nam pa' brtag tu med cing bltar mi snang bathogs pa med pa de bzhin du/ bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa zang
48b1(rgyud): chos drang kyang rjes rtogs par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste// dper na lus dang ngag dang sems dang chos thaMd rdo rje'i gnas kyi dam tshig ne/ zad kyi su song bajo ba zhing gcig pa'i phyir te
48b2(rgyud): 'dilta ste sems kyi ngo ba // lus dang gadrang sems kyi 'ams gang yin pa dang / nam pa' 'ams de dag gnyisum bying gnyisu byar ma do// bac+doMs dri bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dis ste/ dperan po'i mangs
48b3(rgyud): mkha'i khams la gnas te/ nam lnga'i khams de yang 'dong ba'i khams na gnas pa yang ma yin// gzugs kyi khams na gnas pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams na gnas pa yang ma yin te/ chos gang khams
48b4(rgyud): gsum nami gnas bdon skye bamad// gang la skye ba med pa 'di ni chos gang gis kyang banag par mi nu nga bas na bac+doMs de don na gshegs pa zad/ chos drang ngo ba nyid meng pa'o// kye c+doMs pa
48b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi yis 'byung ba rdo rje'i gnas byed pa ste/ byang chub kyi sems de yang lus la mi gnas ngag
48b6(rgyud): la mi gnas sems la mi gnaso// chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba mdo// 'di ni yis 'byung ba rdo rje'i gnas yin// kye bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa thang // rmi lam ngoni bdag gis khams gsum
48b7(rgyud): durmi lam mthong bar bya'o// snyam du mi sem so// mi yang bdag gis rmi lam mthong snyam du mi sem so// khams gsum gyi bya ba de rnams kyang // rmi lam lta bu// rmi lam dang 'dra ba// rmi lam las byung ba'o// de bzhin
48b8(rgyud): du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seng ji snyed pa rnams dang / sen ji skad ba zad kyang / rmi lam bdag med pa'i gnasu rdzasu rtogs par
49a1(rgyud): bya'o// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs bzang / 'di lta ste/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni/ rin po che tha~Md kyi gtso bo yon tan zad dang ldan pa ste/ rin po che tha~Md kyi gtso bo yon tan tha~Mng dang
49a2(rgyud): ldan pa gang yin pa de la/ seMn gang dag gis gser ram rin po che'am dngul yang rung ste/ gang bslangs pa de dag thaMd bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor pas byang da// rin po che la sogs pa de dag kyang sems la yang mi
49a3(rgyud): gnas/ yid bzhin gyis nor bu la yang gnas pa ma yino// de bzhin du bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa zang chos thaMd dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos thaMd kyang rjesu rtogs par bya'o// de nas bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
49a4(rgyud): thang rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan gdangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs bzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs gang rnam pa'i khams kyi rjesu 'brang
49a5(rgyud): ba'i chos thaMd la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rje su 'brang ba de / mtshar to// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub seMda' de dag zang kyis// bac+doMs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis pa
49a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis sngags tha~Md kyi rdo rje'i dngos grub mdor bsdus te gsungs pa/ sngags zad kyi rdo rje mdor bsdus pa'i dngos grub de dag gang la gnas// 
49a7(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thad dang // byang chub seMd 'a de dag tha~Md la leg so zhes bya ba byin nas// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md la 'di skad ces gsung so// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa zad sngags
49a8(rgyud): kyi dngos grub za ni// sku dang gsung dang thugs la mi gnas// de ci'i phyir na na/ 'on kyang bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pazang sngags kyi dngos grub dzang dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos dzad ni bdag gi lus dang ngag dang
49b1(rgyud): sems rdo rje la ni gnaso// lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje de dag kyang // 'dong ba'i khams na mi gnas gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/ sems kyang lus la mi
49b2(rgyud): gnas/ lus kyang sems la mi gnas/ ngag kyang sems la mi gnas sems kyang ngag la mi gnaso// de ci'i phyir na na// na mkha' ltar ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir// de na de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung thugs
49b3(rgyud): rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ ka/ bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi chos gang la gnas gnas byung // dang lo rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal ba// rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems las byung // bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs
49b4(rgyud): bzad kyis gsol pa/ sems gang na gnas bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa' la gan so gsol ba/ nam pa' gang na gnas/ bka' sprul pa/ gang na yang mi gan so// de nas sangs rgyas byang chub sa 'dab
49b5(rgyud): mtshar du gyur rmang du gyur nas/ rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gan sa nas sems shing cang mi smra bar 'khod bar gyur to// de bani na gshegs pazad kyi sku dang gsung dang thug kyi gsang ba gsang ba
49b6(rgyud): 'dus pa las/ seni thod kyi dam tshig gi snying po'i rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa zad yang 'dus par gyur nas// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi
49b7(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la thod kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig gis gsol ba btab nas// de bzhin gshegs pa dzad kye rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod pa byas
49b8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa// rdo rje dzad kyi dkyil 'khor seng ge'i dam tshig gi rgyal po nas bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di sangs rgyas thong
50a1(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // de nas sku yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/ legs par rab tu bshad par bya// blun ban
50a2(rgyud): drug tshad du bya// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor ste// sku yi rdo rje rab tu gnas// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// rdo rje'i cho gas bri bar bya// sngags rnams kun gyi gsang ba mchog/ 
50a3(rgyud): phyag rgya rdo rje'i gnasu bya// dbus rnam par snang mdzad gnas// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'ang bri// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog/ grwa rnams kun tu dgod par bya// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa yi// khro bo rnams kya
50a4(rgyud): sbyor bri'o// rdo rje gsang ba rab sgoms pasang mchod bsngags she sa pa yis bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'ad dka' ba'o// gshang dang gci ba la sogs pa// bye brag tu
50a5(rgyud): ni nges par dbul// 'di ni sngags rnams zad kyi/ sku yi rdo rje las dam tshig de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas bsu
50a6(rgyud): rdo rje thad kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 
50a7(rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog legs par rab tu bshad par bya// khru ni nyi shu'i chang du bya// gru bzhi lham pa cho ga bzhin/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// rdo rje bsgoms
50a8(rgyud): bas thig gdab bo// de dbus 'khor lo chen po ni// zlum por kun tu bri bar bya// mdo ru phyag rgya zad ni// cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// tshe dpag med kyi phyag rgya che// de yi dbus su bzhag par bar bya// rdo rje
