50b1(rgyud): gnas mchog de zhing du// zang yongasu dgong bar bya// yongasu gsal bar cho ga bzhin// dkyil 'khor dam pa byas nas ni// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya// 'on tang rdo rje can dag mnyes// gshang gzhi khu ba'i dam tshig/ 
50b2(rgyud): gis// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas zad kyi ka/ dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor// de nas bac+doMs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin ga sh+ye
50b3(rgyud): ba kun nas sprin gyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rab tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thug rdo rje las phyung // rdo rje dzin mchog gang yin pa'i/ 
50b4(rgyud): gzugs ni dbusu legs bris pa// de yi dkyil 'khor gnas su 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang las byung // 'di ni de bzhin gshegs bzang kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gnas
50b5(rgyud): yis gsang ba yin ta rab tu gsang ba'o// de nas phyag nardo rje bzhin gshegs pa dkyil 'khor nad kyi 'khor lo 'byung / ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la sems par zhugs nas// dkyi bgro
50b6(rgyud): thad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba'i di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi snying po'i thig gdab pa'i yi ge'i gnas rnam so// oM A hUM/ rdo'i
50b7(rgyud): thig ni gdab pa dang // tshon rtsi dag ni dgye ba dag/ sngags kyi sems pas mi bya ste// byas na byang chub rnyed par dka'// de bas dam tshig tshul shes pas// sngags kyi lha rnams phab nasu// byin gyis brlabs
50b8(rgyud): kyis gnas bsgoms la// dkyil 'khor rnams ni rnam par rtag/ rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad dang // yang na spyan ni dbab par bya// sku yi pa la 'khor gnas yid 'ong // rdo rje sku yi yon tan 'thob// rdo rje
51a1(rgyud): chos ni rgyal po che// rang gi chos mas dbab par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams pang kyi// gsang ba rab tu rtag pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mA ma kI yang dbab par bya// 'di ni sngag
51a2(rgyud): rnams zad kyi// gsang ba rmang du byung ba'o// de ltar byas na byin rlob cing // yid la dbang ba nyid gshegs te// rab tu dgyes par gyur nas ni// gsang ba dag gis mchog kyang stsol// 'di skad kyang gsung so// sngags
51a3(rgyud): kyi sems pas bya ba ni// rdo rje gsang barmang po che// khro bo'i rgyal pos bkugs nas ni// sangs rgyas zang mchod par bya// rdo rje dri med gsum dag gi/ dam tshig mchod pa dus gsum pa// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas bya// 
51a4(rgyud): sngags kyi dngos grub thob par byed// 'di skad kyang gsung so// snga gas rnams thad nyid la yong // rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dbul// gshang gci sha dang 'bru mar dang // sems las byung ba'i tsan dan
51a5(rgyud): dang khu bdag gis sngags rnams kun// tshim par 'gyur bar/ kun tu bshad// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te// sangs/ rgyas byang chub rdzogs byed pa'o// thig gdab pa yi cho ga 'di/ 
51a6(rgyud): bdag nyid gang tshe spyod pa na// rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms na su// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu sgom// yang na rdo rje mi 'chir grags// blong ma rdo rje 'od po che// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten pa yi// las kyi go 'a
51a7(rgyud): bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga rnams ni// rdo rje'i thig skud dag la dgod // 'di ni sangs rgyas zad kyi// gsang ba rab tu rmad byung ba'o// rnam pa'i rtsa lngar ni// tshon ci dag kyang rnam par sgom// 'di ni
51a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thod kyi// gsang ba byang chub ma pa yin// sngags rnams thang nying la yang // rdo rje hUM ni bsgom par bya// sku dang gsung dam tshig mchog/ gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de ltar rtag tu
51b1(rgyud): byas na ni// rdo rje mi phyed gsum las skyes// rdo rje sa dang blo ldan pa// 'jigs shing sdug nas byin rlong mdzad// rdo rje bum pa sa ke sngags rgyud bdag pos shes bya ste/ rdo rje sanga'i ting 'dzin gnas// brtan pa'i blos ni ba
51b2(rgyud): bar bya// dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'dod pa'i// sngags shes pas ni sbyin bsreg bya// gshang gzi 'bru mar sha la sigs// sbyin bsreg tu ni dgrol bar bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dag la// rdo rje gsang
51b3(rgyud): sbyin sregs dbul dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te zhal du dbab par bya// 'di skad kyang gsung so// dbang po gnyis kyi ngom tshig gis// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas zad kyi/ 
51b4(rgyud): dam tshig shin tu 'anga' dka' ba'o// rnam snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba yis// slob ma rdo rje gsum las byung // AHni lus dang ngag sems lo// bsgoms nas rdo rje bzung bar bya// rgyal che
51b5(rgyud): rdo rje seng 'a dang // grags chen rnam par snang mdzad dag/ hU~Mgasu dathugs kyi dam tshig tu byin gyis brlabs ni rab tu gsol// de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen por 'drug pa'i rdo rje'i mchig go// 
51b6(rgyud): AHkhaM bi ra hUM/ 'di ni dam tshig thaMd kyi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i snying po'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyis na mkha'i khams/ yongasu gang bar
51b7(rgyud): rab tu spros/ rdo rje'i rigs ni 'dzin pa yis// sil snan dri yi sprin rnams s+ho// 'di sad kyang gsung so// rdo rje sku gsum sngogs kyis ni// nyung kar dag gis brdeg par bya// de la de yi cha tsam// bdag nyid dbang bskur rab tu
51b8(rgyud): stsol// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// yang na sangs rgyas bsgos par bya// bum pa dam tshig mchog rnams kyis// gzung bar mkhas pa dag gis sgom// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad pas/ slob ma rtag tu blo brtan
52a1(rgyud): / lan lus dang ngag sems rdo rje can// sngags shes pas ni bong drang bya// de la 'di ni dbang bskur badzad kyigasang ba slob dpon zad kyi rdo rje'i tshig tu smra bar bya'o// sangs rgyas rnams ni thad kyi
52a2(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung / khams gsum ngag gis phyag byas pa/ rdo rje dbang bskur cheno sbyin/ de la 'di ni slong mthangad kyis rdo rje chen po'i gsol ba bya ba'i tshi ga gsang ba'o// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ 
52a3(rgyud): mcho chen ji ltar stsal ba bzhin// bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir// na mkha'i rdo rje dang bdag stsol// de tshe de la dbang bskur ba// rab tu dgyes nas stsol bar mdzad// lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis// snying khar
52a4(rgyud): bdag po bzhag par bya// rdo rje slob ma blo ldan la// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la/ dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// dam tshig gsang ba bsgrag par bya/ 
52a5(rgyud): khyod kyis srog chags bsang bar bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// mabyon par yang khyod kyis long // bud med dag kyang bstan par bya// rdo rje'i lam ni 'di dag gis// sen thaMd bskul bar bya
52a6(rgyud): 'di skad kyang gsungs te// 'di ni sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi// dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o// sngags kyis bskul ba smras pa yis// nga la sngags kyang sbyin par bya// sngags kyi rgyal po'i ting 'dzin dang // gsang ba sbyin
52a7(rgyud): ba brtsam par bya// khu ba 'am yang na gshang ba'ang rung // cho ga bzhin du bsngags nas ni// rdo rje'i blos ni lngas bya// 'on tang dngos grub rnyad mi dka'// rnam pa 'di bzhi gsang chen te// rdo rje can ni kun gyi gsang // 
52a8(rgyud): sngags kyi 'khor lo bud med gzugs// sems can do spyong phyir gnas pa'o// de la 'don rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tha~Md kyang sngags kyi menyes par bya ba gsang ba'o// glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha/ sha chen dag kyang bza'
52b1(rgyud): sa cul bya/ de ra rgyan rjo rdzo ba la/ mangs pas kyi 'ar mab bya/ bshang cims byadang// rlo pang ba'i tshig ga ses sngam
52b2(rgyud): rnams kun gyi yige oM// bsgoms na de mthog tu 'byor// dac+doMs sngags kyi rig pa'i skyes du chen ngos dri skad ces bka' stsar to// dngos gru brdang sgrubang dang // dam tshig chen po sgrub pa dang // sangs rgyas bya
52b3(rgyud): chu ba nyid drug kyang / nan tan du ni bsgrub par bya// mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog dag kyang // rdo rje sku yi dka' bzhin du ka dkyil 'khor dag gis bems par 'grub// gshang gci
52b4(rgyud): dang ni sha chen rnams// cha ni mnyam par byas nas su// kham por sbyar mar bzhag na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig 'khod// 'dis daces kyang gsungs te/ de la 'di ni gsang ba zad kyi rdo rje mngag
52b5(rgyud): bzhug pa rab tu sgrub pa'i tshig gi mchog go// hriHni 'bar ba'i 'od bzang po// narnam pa' rdo rje'i dbus bsam// sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam pa'i khams// yongasu gang bar rnam par sgom
52b6(rgyud): de yi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// der ni sngags kyi dbab par bya// / de la 'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sngags rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i snying po'o// sngar d+hi phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen dang // phyag na
52b7(rgyud): pad+mo 'od chen dang // gzhan gyis mi thub gzugs chen dag/ bsgoms nas gsang ba'i gnas bzhag go// de la 'di ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnaso// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par ka/ mi bskyod pa ni rab tu
52b8(rgyud): rtag/ tshe dpag med pa'i 'khor lo che// rdo rje snang mdzad de bzhinate// 'od chen sdug bsngal chen po yis// khang snying pos bskul bar bya/ de la 'di ni rdo rje'i snying po zang bskul ba'o// AHmdung rtse che dang
53a1(rgyud): rdo rje cher lcags su chor sgra rnams kyis/ rdo rje chog bzhin bskul na// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grub/ 'di skad ces kyang gsung so// nyams dpa' ba yi ri ngag dang // chu dring rnams
53a2(rgyud): sna tshogasu ka/ zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis ka/ sangs rgyas thob pa gdon mi za/ ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phrin ji sbeng yong ba yi// de yi 'khor tshogs ldan cig tu// 'khor lo can gyi byang chub 'grub// phyo/ 
53a3(rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas thod kyi/ sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur// zab mo chos kyang thos 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas su yang 'thob par 'gyur// bac+doMs dam tshig rdo rje band pas de skad ces bka' stsal te// de lo
53a4(rgyud): 'di ni mang gra ga zhug pa zad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'o// rdoHseng+ge yis che// de bzhin gsung gi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sku yi dpyong ba ches/ ka/ mngag gzhug pa dag rtag tu bskul// de la
53a5(rgyud): 'din rdo rje ye shes 'khor lo sngags kyi dmatshig gan so// dum tshig bskul ba dang // dam tshig gtong ba dang // dam tshi/ bong ba dang / dam tshig bcing ba'o// mkha' dbyings rgya chen dag
53a6(rgyud): pa ni// chos rnams tha~Mng rnam par spangs// gong bu'i tshul gyis byed pa ni// rdo rmad byung gzugs can no// bac+doMs sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi bu gcig pa rdo rje sada' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas rdo rje
53a7(rgyud): sa'ang rung // gal te dbang du bya 'dod na// rdo mchog gsum 'dzin pa che// gsang ba chen po 'di bsam mo// rdo rje 'jam pa stobs po che// nam pa' rdo rje'i dbusu bsam// mnga' lnga'i sbyor ba dag gis ni// dbu rgyan/ 
53a8(rgyud): rtse mo yang dag spro// gnas lnga dag tu sngags shes pas// rdo rje khro bos rab tu bag// sngangs shing brgyal bar sgom pa ni// byi ba'i blo ni grags chen gyis// bsam gtan 'di ni zla byed du// gsang ba'i bskul/ 
53b1(rgyud): ba dag gis sgom// sngags rnams kun gyis rab gsang ba// rdo rje'i don gyis blo yis gsungs// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni// na mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsam pa// sngags kyi rdo rje hUM la sogs// rdo rje
53b2(rgyud): gsum la sogs par sgom// oM ni mig gi dbus bsams nas// 'di dag cho ga bzhin du bstan/ sngags rnams kun gyi gzugs dag ni// sku gsung rdo rje can du mthong // bkres skom la sogs nyon mong
53b3(rgyud): che// sbyor 'di ni rnam bsam na// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// sdug bsngal tha~Md byang bar 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po// bas men don rnams zad 'byor// baM ni kha yi nang du sbom// oM ni lAM la
53b4(rgyud): 'dug bor bsam// bza' bar bya ba kun gyi gnas// yid bzhinanor bus rgyan pa ste// zhi ba sdug bsngal thang sel// ye shes rdo rje las byung ba'o// bac+doMs yid bzhin gyis nor bus de skad ces bka'
53b5(rgyud): sprul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegasapa dpa' bo chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas// rdo rje sgo ma pa'i tshig gi mchog/ rdo rje'i gsung las phyung // hrIHsa ng+yas
53b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'od bzang po// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis// bskyed de 'di ni rnam par bsam// rgyan rnams thaMd yongs rdzogs pa// cung zad ser ba rdo rje 'gying // zhi ba thor
53b7(rgyud): tshugs dbu rgyan can // bsams nas zad brtsam par bya// rdo rje dpa' bo rlo bos kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan kun nas dbyangs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa
53b8(rgyud): zhugs nas// rdo rje chen po sgom pa'i tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // tsu/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ na mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsam/ sangs rgyas sprin gyi cho/ 
54a1(rgyud): g.yis/ rdo rje gsum gyi glags rje na ni// lus dang ngag dang sems la dbub/ bskul byeng rdo rje ma sbom mo// rgyan rnams dzad yongs rdzogs pa// kha dog dkar mo rab tu sdom// rdo rje se
54a2(rgyud): rgyal po che ka bsams la sngags kyi tshig dgong ngo // rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa// bsam pa zang rdo rje longs spyod pa nas
54a3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// ting 'dzin gyi 'khor lo'i tshul 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // dza sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa ngag/ nam pa'i dbyings kyi dbus su bas mo// sangs
54a4(rgyud): kun gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje sgom pas dbab par bya// dzam+b+ha la ni nor sbyang ba// gnod sprin chen po bskyed par bya// zhi ba gnod sbyin gzugs 'dzin pa// thor tshugs dbus rgyan rdo rje can// sangs rgyas lnga yi
54a5(rgyud): ga yis// gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu// de yis// bsam gtan gnas la 'dug la dbu'o// rdo rje sa mas dpa'i cho ga yis// dbu rgyun de la rnam par bsam// de ltar
54a6(rgyud): byas na gnod sbyin dbang // gnod gnas dadang po 'od chen gnyis// rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdzas sgrub pa'i rtog gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas bac+doMs phyag na rdo rje bzhin gshegs pa// rdo rje 'dod
54a7(rgyud): po nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin mi'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // k+ShaM/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i byanas
54a8(rgyud): par/ gru bzhi ldom pa rab tu bzang / bang rin chen bzhi las byas// me tog spos kyis kun tu 'khrigs// gnod sbyin mo ni zad kyis// nam pa'i dbyings ni gang bar bsam// gzugs kyi sprin dag rnam bsam/ 
54b1(rgyud): la/  rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas dpab// gzugs ni gcig tu bsam par bya// lus gsum rdo rje pa brag gis// nga yi bsam gtan bsgom par bya// rdo rje 'jam pa'i ting 'dzin gnas// dbu rgyan la ni khro bo sgom// 
54b2(rgyud): snying khar sngags kyi cho ga bsgoms la// rdo rje'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// gnod sbyin mo tha~Mng dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa sgom pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas bac+doMs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
54b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i sngags thad kyi dngos grub kyi nor 'phrulo ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// dngos grub phra mo 'di // nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // sku dang gsung thugs yang
54b4(rgyud): 'grub// sangs rgyas gzugs 'dzin 'od bzang po// 'dzam+b+hi nu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// dngos grub phra mo dag la gnas// mi snang la sogs yang dag grub// 'dzem pa'i 'od dang 'dra bar
54b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ gnod sbyin rgyal po grub pa che// rig 'dzin dag gi dang nga por 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dngos grub zad kyi gzu gas gsang ba'i dngos grub rnam so// sngags kyi dngos grub thob
54b6(rgyud): pa yi/ mdzes pa'i gzugs rnams tha~Md ni// 'jig rten khams ni tha~Md du// / mthong ba nyid kyis dga' bar 'gyur// / gtsug tor thaMd grub pa na// yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub byed
54b7(rgyud): pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas rdo rje rang sdom pa'o// bac+doMs bsam bzad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi bdag pos
54b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa brtul zhugs yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thug rdo rje las phyung // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// lus dang ngag sems
55a1(rgyud): snang la nu zhi kyi te/ de lta sa grub 'jo par gyung// de la dzin nga bsung nga thugs ba rig pa'i dul chu so// bang chugs du rgyun ma gyi gzugs/ 
55a2(rgyud): chen po 'dog nga bo 'dra// sngags kyi sdom pas kun tu sngams// cho ga bzhin du nga bya// lo grangs bcu dru ga yin pa ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par thubs// bzhin sdu ga mig gi dkyus ring ba/ rjed nas rim rdza
55a3(rgyud): brtul zhugs spyang / spyan gyi gi 'phang li spyod cing // rdo rje'i mtshan mas bsgos par bya// phyang rgya sngags kyi chog shes/ sngags kyi rgyung rnams legs par bslabs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mor byaHsa
55a4(rgyud): rgyas byang chub la rab gnas/ brtul zhugs chen po dus pa ni ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya// sdong burtsa pa 'bras bu// / bza' dang bca' ba spyad par bya// 'on tang myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur
55a5(rgyud): bdag po ye shes rgya mtsho che// zla ba drug gis dadag de dag kun// / gdon mi za bar 'bod par 'gyur// rtag tu gzhan gyi nor du zhing kabs dpa'ang mang du byung nga// 'dod chags rdo rje
55a6(rgyud): gnas spyang ba// sdom pa 'di ni kun tu bsdums// 'dod chags rdo rje lca gos kyu mo// yon tan lug rgyud mA ma kI// gsung gi rdo rje thugs mchog lo// 'di ni rnam pa kun tu rigs// bsam gtan spyad pa yig gsum rdo rje
55a7(rgyud): can/ rang gi phyag rgya sems kyi bsam// de ltar sangs rgyas kun mkhyen pa// mnyes par 'gyur ba gdon me/ sgrub pa po ni blo brtan pas// nags tshal dag tu bsod snyoms bslang // kha zas bzang po bltar dag/ 
55a8(rgyud): de dag skrag nas stor bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsum 'das nas// rdo rje'i yi ge 'jig par 'gyur// lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// lha ma yin nam mi mo'ang rung // rnyed nas rig pa'i rdul zhugs bya// rdo rje gsu
55b1(rgyud): gyi ya shes bstan// 'di ni sngags rnams dzad kyi// de nyid gsang ba'i tshul chen yin// rdo rje gsum gyi yis 'byung // sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'jug pa'o// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rigs pa'i yul
55b2(rgyud): zhugs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las// dngos grub zad kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje mngon
55b3(rgyud): bar byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zang yang 'dus nas/ bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
55b4(rgyud): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa// mi bskyo nga rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas pa che/ rdo rje ga sum dkyil 'khor gsum// gsangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag
55b5(rgyud): 'tshalo// rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che// rje ni bdag 'a na/ gsal mchog gi mchog/ ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tsha'o// / rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje rnam pa' dri ma med// rang
55b6(rgyud): bzhin dag pa gos pa med/ rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje dpag mang rgyal po che// mi rtog na mkha' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyed// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tsha lo// don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs/ 
55b7(rgyud): bsam pa zang rdzogs mdzad pa// dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas kun gyis bskul ba yi// bstod tshig zhi ba 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje longs spyod bstod na ni// ngo lnga
55b8(rgyud): bangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun la rjes bortse ba/ rdo rje gsang ba gsung dag pa// rdo rje'i gsung na bka' stsal to// e ma'o sangs rgyas drang byig chos kyi dbyings ni
56a1(rgyud): mi be che rang bzhin dgas la yong su rnam pa'i dbyis bzhi drim med// de nas phyag na rdo rje bzhin gshegs pa zang kyi dag zos// sangs rgyas nga kyi su rdo rje dan tshig 'di/ khrid kyis
56a2(rgyud): rang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho yi// dam tshig bzhi ni bsrung bar ba// sha chen rtag tu bza' bar bya// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no// de nas phyes na rdo rje bzhin gshegs
56a3(rgyud): bzad kyi bdag yis// sangs rgyas thaMd kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya// gsung gi rdo rje yi gaches// gau shang gci dag ni rtag tu bza'/ 
56a4(rgyud): 'di ni gsang ba rmang byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje bzhin gshed/ sa pa zad kyi bdag pos// rdo rje 'dzin thaMd kyi dam tshig 'di nyis kyi sgo dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // rdo rje sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul
56a5(rgyud): ches/ dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya// khrag dang khu basbyar ba dag brtul zhugs bstan pas rtag tu bza'// sku gsung thu gas kyi rdo rje yi// dam tshig 'di ni rmang po che/ sangs rgyas kun
56a6(rgyud): gyi brtag pa 'di/ rdo rje 'dzin gyis bsrung bar bya// rang zhig mchog 'di srung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' 'ong po che// de mi sku gsung thugs rtogs pa'o// nga ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje
56a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi bdag pos// rang sangs rgyas kyi don gyi dam tshig 'dri// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyong// de yi lus kyi ston pa ni// rdo rje'i sku la rab tu gnas// sems can gzung
56a8(rgyud): nga'i nga tshul te// dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa bai sriT gyi bdag pos// nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba'o// ngas
56b1(rgyud): babacu'i las kyi lam// byed pa yis spangs pa rnams// dman par mos bzad kyi// dam tshig 'di ni mang po che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi bdag pos/ tshangs pa'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung
56b2(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // gti mug las kyi lam gang rnams// byed pa 'jigs shing mi sdug pa// sangs rgyas byang chub ston pa ste// sku yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thang
56b3(rgyud): kyi bdag pos// drag po'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // khams gsum ngag na gnas pa yi// bud mang rdo rje las byung rnams// sna tshogs dngos pos spyang pa ni// dam tshig mchog
56b4(rgyud): du mang byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs bzodakyi bdag pos// khyab 'jug gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // sanaM las byung ji snyed pa/ 
56b5(rgyud): dper meng sku gsum la gnas pa// rdo rje mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyang // bsam gtan rdo rjes bsang bar bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi bdag pos// rang gi ngas
56b6(rgyud): tshig rdo rje'i dinyid kyi sku rang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // sku yi rdo rje tshangs par 'gyur// gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug mo// thugs kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de nying khyab 'jug rdzu 'phrul che// de nas phyag na bzhin
56b7(rgyud): gshegs pa zad kyi bdag pos// gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // khrag dang sha ni za ba dang // rtag tu gzhon gyi bud med spyod// dam tshig dga' ba 'di
56b8(rgyud): rnams kyis// rdo rje chen po mnyes par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi bdag pos/ klu'i rgyal po thad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje los phyung ngo // 'o ma 'bung
57a1(rgyud): 'bram can/ de sa yo nga dril 'dang // dan cig 'dis ni bsgrub par bya// gzhan du nges par nan mongs 'gyur// de nas bya bya na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs bzang kyi bdag pos// lham grin gyi
57a2(rgyud): bu mo'i dam tshig 'di ka nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // khro zhing nga rgyal gsod pas non// spos dang me tog spyod la dgyes// rdo rje sa 'og dam tshig ste// gdul dka' rdo rje 'jigs byed pa'o// 
57a3(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi bdag pos srin mo rnams kyi dam tshig 'di// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // thod rus bdug pa'i 'bru mar dang // zhag gis rab tu dga' bar
57a4(rgyud): 'gyur// 'byung po kun gyi dam tshig ste// dag byed 'di ni don chen byed/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag pos// / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thad kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang
57a5(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // gshang gci dang ni khrag dag badz+ra/ 2// chang la sogs pa'ang rtag tu btung // rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis// gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis bsad
57a6(rgyud): bya ba ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba// khams gsum dag na rnam par spyod// san kun la phan 'dod pa'i// dam tshig ma lus spang bar bya// khams gsum po tha~Md kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rje su 'brang ba zhes bya
57a7(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cod kyi bdag pos// lus kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // lus kyi rnam gsum dzad ni// rdo rje las
57a8(rgyud): ni byung bar bya// sems can khams ni thang du// rtag par sangs rgyas sku byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi bdag pas// ngag gi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
57b1(rgyud): rdo rje las byung // tshi gi las lam ma lus par// khams gsum dri med dkyil 'khor te// tshig gi dngos grub yid 'ong 'di// dam tshig shin tu 'das dka' ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi
57b2(rgyud): bdag pos// sems rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dngos grub 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // yid kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun// rdo rje brtan pa 'dzin pas sbom// rdo rje mi phyed gsum ldan pagyi/ dam
57b3(rgyud): tshig bshad pa 'di yin no// bac+doMs kun tu mdzes dga' rdo rje seng 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag pos// sngags tha~Md kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i dam tshig 'di nyid
57b4(rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rang rgyal nyan thos de bzhin te// sku gsung thugasu sbyor ba na// phyag 'tshal na ni ma rung 'gyur// de nas
57b5(rgyud): yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag pos// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bas ma gtan gyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang
57b6(rgyud): thugs rdo rje las phyung // kun tu rdo rje songa' yi// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// bsam gtan rdo rjes gsum spor bas// sngags zlos pas nibasam gtan bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin ga sh+ya
57b7(rgyud): pa bod kyi bdag pos// sngags sgrub pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // mdo ro na seMn khams rnams ni// bsam gtan rdo rjes bskul bar bya// rdo rje gsum
57b8(rgyud): gyi phyag 'tshal mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje las byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag pos bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa dang // nye bar sgrub pa dang sgrib pa chen po'i
58a1(rgyud): sdom pa 'di ni gyi sku nga bsung dang drugs rdo rdza las spyong // rdo rjeg shang gcis rnam pa'i phyis// yongasu pang rnam par bsam// dus gsus rdo rje dag la dbul// dmachi rab tu rtag pa'o// 
58a2(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thang kyi dag pos// rdo rje mi snang bzad kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // dus bzhir ji ltar mchog bzhin du// rdo rje mo ni nyin re spa
58a3(rgyud): mngan rdzas kyang rtag tu drog/ dam tshig rdo rje rdzogs byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi 'dagu pos// nam pa'i rigs 'dzin gyi dam tshig 'dri/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
58a4(rgyud): rdo rje las byung // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// dbu rgyan dag la ba sam gtan bsam// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste// khros ba rnams kyis mi thub bo// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
58a5(rgyud): bzad kyi bdag pos/ sngags 'chang las dang po bzed kyi dam dz+dza ga 'di/ gnyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // sku yi rdo rje kha zas la// phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / ma
58a6(rgyud): gdon cho ga'i bya ba la// rtag par rdo rje cho su bya// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi 'dag pos// rdo rje 'dzin pa zad kyisku
58a7(rgyud): dang gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid rnam par dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri rab kyi rdul rab tu phra ba dang // mnyam pa'i
58a8(rgyud): byang chub seda' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa zad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bzad kyi dag po ci'i slad du// de bzhin
58b1(rgyud): gshegs pazang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang du kyang mi gsung bar bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thang la 'di sad ces bka' stsal to// rig
58b2(rgyud): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po 'di/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid dmigasu med pa'i yi ge'i tshig la/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i yi ge'i tshig brjod nas// cang mi gsung
58b3(rgyud): bar bzhug so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs padzad kyi bdag po 'di sems pa ni 'di snyam du gyur to// sku ni mi 'gyur ma skyes pa// gsung dang thug kyi mtshan ma med// nam kha' rdo rje rtog las byung // log par bzung bas
58b4(rgyud): zin pa yin// de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seng chen po rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
58b5(rgyud): tha~Mng gsung rdo rje'i tshigs la phyin ci log kun 'byung bar mi ban+d+ha/ gtu gsol// de ci'i slad du zhe na// de bzhin gshegs pa/ tha~Md kyi bdag po 'dzi na// de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi rdo rje dang
58b6(rgyud): kyi ngo bo nyid/ spong bar 'gyur ba gshegs pa dang byon pa'i rje su 'gro'o/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ tshangs pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sede' chen po// mngon par shes pa chen po'i yis thob pa rnams chos tha~Md
58b7(rgyud): kyi mtshan gyi ngo bo nyid mi shes nas 'di snyam du rnam par rtog ste/ ci rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'di de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi chos tha~Md kyi rdo rje'i de kho na nyid yongasu ma shes nas// gsang ba'i yi ge rnams 'chang ngas
58b8(rgyud): snyam du sems dpa' yang mchiso// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams lta ci smos te/ 
59a1(rgyud): deng de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba mi 'gyur ba rnyed pa 'ang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi byang chub mi sheso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa'i
59a2(rgyud): rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa mi 'gyur ba las byung ba'o// rigs kyi bu sen chen po'i khongasu gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thaMng byang chub la gnas pa sangs rgyas rdo rje'o// de ci'i
59a3(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ kye ma sen de dag ni sku gsum rdo rje'i chos nyid kyi phyir// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i yas thob pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos
59a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thang dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces gsungaso// rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas med pa// rtog pa rdo rje las byung ba/ 
59a5(rgyud): smra bar byed pa sgra ma yin ka de nas brjes de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyis/ bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs de
59a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub ji ltar yang dag par 'jug/ gang na gnas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa/ bac+doMs de bzhin
59a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thang dang // thams mkhyen pa dang khams gsum ji snyed pa dag/ rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud kyi rdo rje la gnaso// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis slar
59a8(rgyud): gsol pa/ bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub dang / khams gsum thaMd gang na gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag po yis rdo rje'i bdag po
59b1(rgyud): gsungs pa// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs bzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub dang / khams gsum pa thaMd ni namakha' la gan so// de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyis gsol pa// namakha' gang na gnas
59b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs bzang kyi bdag pos gsungs pa// gang na yang ma yino// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur mang du gyur nas/ e ma'o rdo rje e rdo rje/ e ma'o rdo rje yi bshang ba/ 
59b3(rgyud): gang du lus dang ngag sems med// de ru gzugs ni rnam par sgom// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas nas// rdo rje gsum mchog mchog chen mchog/ rdo rje gsum gyi nga
59b4(rgyud): phyug mchog/ rig pa'i skyes bu sgom pa yi// dngos grub kun ni bshad bar mdzad// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgoms par bya// rdo rje'i sku ni rab
59b5(rgyud): bsgoms nas// spyi bor rdo rje rab tu sbom// zhal gsum sku gsum las byung ba// rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya// rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsams na/ byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// 
59b6(rgyud): rigs kyi bye brag gos// gsang ba 'di ni rnam par bsam// gzhan du rnam par bsgoms na ni// de dag dngos grub mchog mi 'gyur// / bac+doMs rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// 
59b7(rgyud): khams gsum las byung rgyal mo che// / mnyes par byed ma rnam bsams nas// rdo rje sku gsum gyis mtshan pa// khyu mchog ngas ni mnyes par 'gyuraro// gang zhig 'di dag sgom pa yi// byang chub sengal
59b8(rgyud): grags chen rnams// zhag bdun gyis ni gzi che ba'i// sku gsum dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bsdus pa'i gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku
60a1(rgyud): dang gsung du rdo rje las byung // sku gsung thugs kyi dmatshigs ni// phyag rgya chen po 'don rtogs pa// cho ga bzhin du kun pasgoms na// sad cig gis ni sang+yas 'bog/ de nas
60a2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thaMd kyi lus dang ngag drang sems gsang ba 'di nyis kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo // sngags rnams kun gyi
60a3(rgyud): dam tshig 'di// rgyal rnams kyang mi 'da'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje sangs zed kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // gshang gci bu ba khrag rnams ni// spang ba dag tu yong mi bya/ 
60a4(rgyud): ga bzhin du rtag tu bza'// gsang 'di rdo rje gsum byu yin// de nas yang bac+doMs phyag na rdo rjes gsung rdo rje'i dam ga 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 
60a5(rgyud): khams gsum dag gi lam mchog na// bud med ji snyed yod dra/ rnams// thang cho ga bzhin du spyad// gsung gi rdo rje mi smang ngo // de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes thugs kyi dam tshig 'ang
60a6(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // rdo rje sku gsung la gnas pa// dam tshig ji snyed yod pa kun// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis// mgu zhing tshim pa dag tu bya// thugs kyi rdo rje mi rma do// bac+doMs
60a7(rgyud): dam tshig chen po gsum gyi dam tshig gis nga skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos// de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje 'di// nyid kyi sku
60a8(rgyud): rang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni// sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bsgrags/ rdo rje'i skye mched nyid dag kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes
60b1(rgyud): khams gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung kas ni spyan zhes bya ba yin// chu yi khams ni mA ma kI/ dkar dang sgrol ma zhes bya ba// me dang rlung du rab tu bsgrags// mkha' dbying
60b2(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid yin// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po tha~Md kyi gnas kyi dbang phyugs rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bac+doMs de bzhin
60b3(rgyud): gshegs pa zad kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso// snoms par zhu
60b4(rgyud): nas kyang de bzhin gshegase ba tha~Md kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ral gzigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ de bzhin
60b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thaMd la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang ga/ sung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba gsang ba 'dus par// mngon
60b6(rgyud): par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon la// de bzhin gshegs pa thang dang / byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs bzang dang / byang chub seMda' rnams kyis byang
60b7(rgyud): chub sems rdo rje bzhin du blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ slob dpon ni byang chub kyi sems dang mnyam zhing rnam pa gnyisu dbyar med do// rigs kyi bu mdor bstan na ka phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
60b8(rgyud): na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sang 'ji snod 'khod cing 'tshol skyong ba de dag bang dus gsum du byon nas// slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs bzad kyi mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas/ sangs rgyas
61a1(rgyud): kyi zhing der yang 'gro cing dag rdo rje'i yi ge yang 'di skad du 'byin to// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi pa'o// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pazad kyi ma'o zhes bya ba nas// bdag
61a2(rgyud): cag de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi ston pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na ji skad bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bac+doMs de rnam kyi sku
61a3(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po// ji snyed pa de bas kyang slob dpon gyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig gi bsod nams khyad par du 'phagaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems
61a4(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'o// skye ba'i gnas/ gyur pa'o// skye ba'i gnasu gyur pa nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i bar du'o// de nas yang byang chub
61a5(rgyud): sems dpa' byams pa yid 'jigs shing skrag nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal dang // de bzhin gshes
61a6(rgyud): pa 'od dpag tu med pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams// rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes
61a7(rgyud): bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bde la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' khyod rnams cad nyon cig/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bac+doMs dus gsum gyi
61a8(rgyud): rdo rje'i yis las byung ba de rnams kyang // gsang ba 'dus pa'i slob dpon dang phrad na/ mchod pa phyi'i phyag 'tshalo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid ston pa yin bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa yin/ sangs rgyas zad
61b1(rgyud): kyi yis kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyi'o// de nas byang chub sede chen po de dag thams cad kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa dzang la 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thug
61b2(rgyud): kyi dngos grub rnams ci la gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi bka' stsal pa/ sku dang gsum gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs ni// rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la gan so// byang
61b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje grang la gnas/ gang la yang mi gnaso// de nas byang chub sems dang 'di dag ngo mtshar du gyur mang du gyur nas cang mi
61b4(rgyud): sme bar 'khod ngo // de nas bac+doMs phyag na rdo rje/ de bzhin pa/ shegs pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje'i ting 'dzin las bzhengs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Mng dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
61b5(rgyud): le bos te bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa zing dang // byang chub seMr khyed tha~Md/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi byang chub kyi sems kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi
61b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyon cig/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag tha~Md kyi thal mo sbyar nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkyil
61b7(rgyud): 'khor chen po bshang du gsol// bang par gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ nu mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus bsam pa// gru bzhi ldam pa rab tu mdzes// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// bsam
61b8(rgyud): gtan rdo rje rab bskul bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis// 'khor lo can kun bzhugs par bya// mchod pa'i cho ga de nyid kyis// blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bya// slob dpon snying khar ra
62a1(rgyud): sgoms nas// dbang bskur ba ni brtsam par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis na mkha'i dbyings// yongasu gang bar rnam bsgoms la// dbang bskur ba yi gnas gsum gyis// thams cad
62a2(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du dbab// sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i// byang chub 'di yis 'bab 'gyur zhing // ngo mtsha ro chen po'i dngos grub kun// sku gsung thugs ni 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dang byang chub senga'
62a3(rgyud): zad kyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang po 'do/ nyid kyi
62a4(rgyud): sna dang gsung dang drugs rdo rje las byung ngo // hUM hri khaM/ sha rus la sogs dkyil 'khor ni// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bas ma// / swa dang gsung thugs gsums ma snying po// rdo rje sems dpa
62a5(rgyud): bsgom par bya// drag po mi sdug khris pa TI// ud pal sngon bo'i kha dog 'dra// phyag bzhi pa yi cho ga yi// phyag mthong ba bsna mas bar sgom// / 'od zer lnga rnams yang dag byung // rang lce
62a6(rgyud): shubs can gyis bsgom// bsam gtan rdo rje sbyor ba yis// khrag drang ba ni mchog yin no// rtse gsum rdo rje dam tshig dang // phur bu dag po mchog dag gis// sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku dag kyang // rdo rje'i sbyor bas gdab per
62a7(rgyud): byang nganas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i kha zas kyi dam tshig gi bya ba 'angadi / nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // bza' ba 'am btung ba gang cung zad // brtul zhugs can gyis gang bza' ba// gshang gci
62a8(rgyud): yi sbyor ba yis// cho ga bzhin du yongasu brtag/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mchod pa'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las byu // mchod
62b1(rgyud): pa'i yo byad mchog lnga yi// mchod pas de dag mchod par bya// 'di ni rdo rje dzad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'anga' dka' ba'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa pa zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba
62b2(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi khu ba la sogs pa// cho ga bzhin du kun mchod na// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin
62b3(rgyud): gshegs pa tha~Md kyi spyod pa lus dang ngag dang sems kyi sdom pa 'di ga nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // seMn khams rnams mtha' yas kyi// dam tshig 'dzin pa'i ma rnams la// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje spyang/ 
62b4(rgyud): sdom pa 'di ni mang po che// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po tha~Md kyi sdom pa'i rdo rje 'diganyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyu ngo // lus dang ngag sems longs spyod kyika gsang ba gsum gnas
62b5(rgyud): rdo rje skyes// bzang po bdag gis bsgrub par bya// 'dzidzi ni yod ya 'jig par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po zad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa 'di ni nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
62b6(rgyud): rdo rje las byung // mtho gang tsam gyi dpags par ni// spyi bor dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// oM ni dbus su gnas bsams nas// bdud rtsi lnga po dbab par bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// skad cig dag gis gzi
62b7(rgyud): can 'gyur ka/ lus dang ngag sems bder gnas paraka/ 'gyur bar 'di ni ngogs pa maud// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sngags 'dzin pa thaMd kyi// lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang
62b8(rgyud): thugs rdo rje las phyong// mchod rten dag gi las mi bya// glags bam klag pa'ang mi bya zhing // dkyil 'khor dag kyang yong mi bya// rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
63a1(rgyud): pa da kyi bdag pos// dug dzang 'byin pa'am gnon pa dang 'dren pa'i gsang ba 'di gnyid kyi sku dang gsung dang zug rdo rje las phyung // oM/ 'od zer dkar po'i phreng ba can// 'khor lo'i dbus
63a2(rgyud): su chud par bzhag/ 'od zer ser po 'khrigs pa ni// ser po lta bur bsgom par bya// rdor gsum 'od zer dam tshig gis// sa bon gsang gsum las byung ba'o// nga nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
63a3(rgyud): thad kyi bdag pos// lus dang ngag dang sems srung ba'i 'khor lo'i sngags rdo rje dang ldan pa 'di ga nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las phyung // oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ gan ha na/ nga gang
63a4(rgyud): a mra ti hUM phaT/ gro ga la sogs 'khor lo na// las kyi ro rje la gnas par/ haM ni dbusu bzhag nas su// mang ni dbus su bri bar bya// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis// rgyan te rtag
63a5(rgyud): tu bzhag par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thad kyi// gsang ba gsuM gyis gnas bsdus pa'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje dab zhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag pos// rdo rje any+dza na'i dam
63a6(rgyud): tshig 'di ga nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // lam gyi bzhi madro shing gcig drung // ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su// de ru rdo rje any+dzan// thong par rtag tu dbab par bya/ tshil chen po dang
63a7(rgyud): khrag dang gshang ba dang // pad+ma'i skud pa dang // arga'i skud pas me mar gyi snying po byas la// tshes nyi shu dgu'i rnam phyed na// rdo rje any+dzan dbab par bya'o// de nyid la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad btab na// dngos
63a8(rgyud): grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyuraro// zhes bac+doMs kun tu bzang pos gsungaso// de nas bac+doMs de bzhin gshegashegs pa thad kyis// phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol
63b1(rgyud): to// bac+doMs gsang ba'i yi ge du dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi spyod pa'i rdo rje 'di la dad cing sgom par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs
63b2(rgyud): pa zad kyi bdag pos phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsungaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md gsang po'i yig gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'// de bzhin ga
63b3(rgyud): padzad kyi spyod pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de la dang cing sgom par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis gsol pa/ gsum po gang zhig lags// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku rdorje
63b4(rgyud): ngang de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi gsung rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs rabazed kyi thugs rdo rje ste gsum mo// de nas de bzhin gsheg bzed kyis/ bac+doMs phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas thang mi gsu
63b5(rgyud): bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd dang / byang chub sems dpa'adi dag la bka' stsal pa/ bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa
63b6(rgyud): bde/ sngon byung ba na brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul rab tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa yang 'das nas// gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
63b7(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'das pa nas// thub pa chen po 'od srung mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsung so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i gnas
63b8(rgyud): kyi don bshad pa de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na seMn rnams la skal ba meng pa'i phyir ro// 'on kyang bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi
64a1(rgyud): byang chub rdzogs par byengad // gang+gA'i rlung gi byes sded kyi bskal bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing bcal kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur bde/ gsang ba 'dus pa la mngon
64a2(rgyud): par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o// de nas byang chub sede'i de dag gis gsung rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di thos nas rab tu nguso// 
64a3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin go shegs pa de dag thad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ma du shig/ sdug bsngal gsum lam sgom shig/ de nas de bzhin
64a4(rgyud): de bzhin gsheg pa zang la/ byang chub sems dang 'di rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa zad ji ltar mi ngu bar bgyi/ ji ltar sdug bsngal gsum mi sgom par
64a5(rgyud): bgyi// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gtsang po'i yi ge'i ming tsam thos bri/ skul ba yang ma mchiso// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis bka' stsal pa/ de skad ma zer cig/ yi ge ni thun mong ste/ rigs
64a6(rgyud): kyi bu khyed rnams kyis ji ltar mi shes pa dang ma thos pa de bzhin du// deng de bzhin gshegs bzang dang / byang chub sems dpa' bad kyis kyang / rigs kyi bu gsang ba'i yi ge 'di dag ma thos shing
64a7(rgyud): mngon par sangs ma rgyaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba'i yi ge rnam par dag pa'i phyir// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thang cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gabye/ 
64a8(rgyud): bzang / de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhug so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi btsun mos// bac+doMs de bzhin
64b1(rgyud): gshegs pazad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la dga' bas bstod pa// seMn khams na gnas kyis dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs// dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol la mgon po
64b2(rgyud): gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// seMn yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la degyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thubs kyi btsun mor mA ma
64b3(rgyud): kIs/ bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la/ rdo rje 'dod pa'i dge pa'i mchod pa'i mchog gi yi ge'i tshig 'dis yang dag par bstod do// rdo rje'i sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo
64b4(rgyud): semra can kun la phan ka/ sangs rgyas don du byang chub don da ma rje su phan ston pa// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni ga son par mchis bzhed na// 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas
64b5(rgyud): bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bad kyi dag po la/ 'jigarten gyi dbang phyug gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i spyan gyis
64b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la 'dod pa la nye bar longs spyod pa'i dam tshig gis yang dag par bstod pa// khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phani zhang thugs brtse ba// 'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzod pa la
64b7(rgyud): rtag tu brtson// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ rab dga'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po bdag la dgyes pa mdzad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang
64b8(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i btsun mos// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dga' ba'i dis
65a1(rgyud): bstod do// khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog ga phan don che// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyan pa nyid gzigs pa// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par
65a2(rgyud): mchis bzhed na/ yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur pa dag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags thang nye bar longs spyod pa'i rdo rje'i dpal zhes
65a3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi btsun mo de dag la dam tshig gi 'khor los 'dod pa spyod cing cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas na mkha'i dbyings 'di dag zang la
65a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs brjid kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu bas yongasu gang ste/ bum pa rdo rje chus gang bltar gnas par gyur to// de nas rdo rje nam de'i dbyings 'din dang
65a5(rgyud): sen sku gsum gyi dam tshig las// yang dag par byung ba de rnams rdo rje'i dpal gyis reg nas/ thang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum
65a6(rgyud): gyi yis can du gyur to// de nas brtsams te san thang kun tu bzang po kun tu bzang po zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes dbang skur bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag
65a7(rgyud): na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zang la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa zang chos thad kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam// de nas de bzhi gshegs pa thad kyis/ phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
65a8(rgyud): gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje yis kyi spyod pa mthong lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lagaso// de nas brtson 'das de bzhin
65b1(rgyud): gshegs bzang / de bzhin gshegs patha~Md kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga las mngon par byung nas/ bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang 'dod chags kyi yi ge'i tshig
65b2(rgyud): gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjesu rtogs pa de ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag pos// de bzhin gshegs pa
65b3(rgyud): thang la 'di skad ces gsung so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bang de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thad ni rnam pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig dang mtshungs pa'i phyir// gzugs kyi phung po ma yin
65b4(rgyud): tshor ba'i phung po ma yin// 'du shes kyi phung po ma yin la du byed kyi phung po ma yin rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma yin// khams ma yin skye mched ma yin// de bzhin du 'dir 'dod chags ma
65b5(rgyud): yin zhe sdang ma yin gti mug ma yin/ chos ma yin chos ma yin pa yang ma yin// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de ngag thang cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
65b6(rgyud): gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thang dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams zang du de bzhin gshegs bzed kyi sku dang
65b7(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'di bsgo bar gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skal ba yod pa'i phyir ro// de nas phyog nad
65b8(rgyud): rje de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dam tshigs gi de kho na nyid 'di zung shig/ khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi
66a1(rgyud): chos kyis dbang phyug rdo rje nas dbang bskur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rje chos kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes gsos nas pang mi gsung bar gyur to// de na ste
66a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum la rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs zhugs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum thaMd kyi lus rdo rje la gnas shing
66a3(rgyud): nga bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsungs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje khams gsum thad kyi dag rdo rje la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pazad kyi gsung
66a4(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshe gas pa phyags na rdo rje khams gsum tha~Md kyi sems la gnas shing // de bzhin gshags pa zad kyi thugs mnam pa nyid la
66a5(rgyud): dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar to// da skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhi na gshegs bzed kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sa
66a6(rgyud): tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de bzhin gshegs zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang zhing rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal
66a7(rgyud): po rdzogaso// rgya gar gyis ma khan po brad+d+ha ka ra waR+Ya dang / shu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri dz+nyA na ka ra bas bshad nas/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba
66a8(rgyud): 'gos lhas bcas kyis zhus gtugs g.yar khral du 'tshal ba'o// 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud la lo chen gyis bsgyur ba mang du snang na'ang / bgos kyis 'gyur bcos mdzad pa nyung bar snang la/ 'grel pa'i bshad
66b1(rgyud): nga'agos 'gyur gyi steng nas byed pa la rgyud kyi 'gos 'gyur gal che bar mthong nas bris pa'o// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' seng 'a chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi dbang bskur
66b2(rgyud): ba dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa la dngos po med kyis ji lta ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing thos la khong du chud nas chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs de dag tha~Mng
66b3(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi sku gsung thugs kyi nges pa dag/ rdo rje gsum gyis kun tu ni// rdo rje gsum la kun tu bzhugs// sems can tham sa dus gsum gyi// rdo rje'i ngo bor yang
66b4(rgyud): ngag byung // sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pa'o// e ma'o 'di rab ngo mtshar che// e ma'o zhi ba dbang po 'das// / e ma'o 'khor ba dag gi rgyun// e ma'o mchog tu mya ngan
66b5(rgyud): 'das kade nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal toka byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin no// sems
66b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po de de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' se de'i chen po de dag pang yang 'dus par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thaMd la gsang ba dang / phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas
66b7(rgyud): phyag byas te mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o shin tu snang dka'// byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs 'di yin// rgyud kyi mchog gi mchog gyur pa// gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'i rgyud/ spras pa de ni rtog
66b8(rgyud): phyir dang // seMn rnams la phan 'dod pas// yang dag gsung bas gang bshad pa/ mgon po khyod la gsol bar 'tshal// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la
67a1(rgyud): ni 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang zhing sbas pa'i rgyud tshig de// de dag zang 'dri 'dong ba// sems dpa' chen po leg so logs// yon tan 'byung gnas leg so legs// de nas byang chub
67a2(rgyud): sems dpa' kun// rab tu dga' bas mig gdangs te// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas// 'di yi som nyi zhus par gyur// gsang ba zhes 'di gang la bgyi// 'dus pa zhes ni gang la brjod/ rgyud kyi 'brel ba ji
67a3(rgyud): lta bu// rnal 'byor rgyud 'dir ci la bgyi// de nyid rnam pa du ru bshad// de bzhin gsang ba rnam par// gsang chen zhes ni gang la bgyi// dam pa rnam pa du zhig mchis// byang chub sems zhes gang la bgyi/ 
67a4(rgyud): de bzhin rigs pa'i skyes bu ci// badz+ra d+h+r-ika ces ci la bgyi// de bzhin dzi na dzi ka na gang / de la rat+na d+h+r-i ka ni gang // de bzhin A ro li ka ni tsi// pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces gang la bgyi// rigs 'dir de bzhin
67a5(rgyud): gang zhig lags// mo ha zhes ni gang la bgyi// dwe wa zhes 'dir/ gang la bgyi// ra gra zhes ni ci la bgyi// badz+ra sngags ni gang la bgyi// r-i ti zhes 'dir gang la bgyi// phun sum tshogs
67a6(rgyud): ba gang zhig lags// ya mAn+ta krita don ni gang // de bzhin pradz+nyAn+ta krita tsi// bAng mAn+ta krita ming ci lce// de bzhin big+h+nAn+ta krita tsi// kun tu spyod po gang ci lags// de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa gang // 'dir ni bzlas
67a7(rgyud): pa gang zhig lags// rgyas btab pa zhes gang la bgyi// chos 'byung ba ni ji ltar sgom// de bzhin sdom pa ci lta bu zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags ches// sems can den mdzad ji lta bu// dkyil 'khor zhes
67a8(rgyud): ni gang la bgyi// / phyag rgya'i dgod pa ci ltar lags// 'dir ni me tog ci zhig lags// mchod rten zhes ni gang la bshad// ye shes 'khor lo ji ltar shes// nga bzhin 'dir ni gnas shes gang la
67b1(rgyud): bshad/ mgon po bskul ba ji lta bu// gtong ba dag kyang ji lta bu// ji ltar de rnams spyan drang bgyi// bcing ba 'dir ni ji lta bu// dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar stsal// de bzhin rig pa'i brtul zhugs gang // bdud rtsi lnga
67b2(rgyud): rnams ji ltar bza'// de bzhin dpa' bo lnga gang lags// dngos grub tha mal ji lta bu// de bzhin mchog kyang ji lta bu// de la 'das ni rnam pa dud// de bzhin thabs byung ji lta bu// rnal 'byor rdo rje can kun gyi/ 
67b3(rgyud): bka' ni ji ltar bsgo bar bgyi// las kyi mchog gi tshogs rnams ni// sna tshogs ji ltar byed par 'gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
67b4(rgyud): kyis zhus pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin po la dmigs par mdzad nas skad cig/ cang gsung por gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// snying
67b5(rgyud): rje'i bdag nyid rab dga' nas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba ra gshegs/ mgon la yang dang yang rab bskul// dan sa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sa
67b6(rgyud): de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lus ngag yid ni rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la// bzhag nas byang chub sems dbang po// zhus pa rgya chen mnyan par
67b7(rgyud): gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams pang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjesu gsungs pa'i bka' spyi bos rab tu mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das le gso legasaso// 
67b8(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa legaso lagaso zhes gsol nas// rang rang lus dang ngag dang yid rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang
68a1(rgyud): mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi thugs rdo rje chen po la dmigs par byin gyis brlangs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po ngag rnams la zhus
68a2(rgyud): pa de dag gsung gcig gis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum// gsang ba zhes ni bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas thaMd ces bya ba// tshogs pa 'dus pa yin par bshad// lnga pa dang ni dag pa
68a3(rgyud): dang bcu bdun pa dang bcu gsum pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis// bstan pa dag ni sgrub chen/ bzhi pa dang ni bcu drug pa// brgyad pa de bzhin bcu gnyis pa/ slob dpon spyi yi las dang ni// 
68a4(rgyud): dngos grub brtul zhugs sdom pa yin// drug pa dang ni ga nyis pa dang // bcu pa dang ni bcu zin pa// drag sbyong rdza su chags ba dang // nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o// bdun pa dang ni gsum pa dang
68a5(rgyud): bcu gcig pa dang bco lnga pa// dngos grub zhing dang maHna ma ni// bsnyen pa sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o// de bzhin gsheg sa ba kun gyi las// tshar gcod pan 'dogs spyod pa dag/ dul dang
68a6(rgyud): gdul dka' zhi ba yi// sems can rnams 'jug pa'o// bskyed pa'i rimra 'brel pa ya// bsnyen pa rdo rje cho ga bzhi// thun mong dngos grub 'brel pa yin// mchog tu gyur pa'i gzhung nyid // dkyil
68a7(rgyud): 'khor brtul zhugs 'brel pa yi// gzhung ni slob dpon phun tshogs pa'o// bla mas sngags kyi lam gyis ni// slob ma yongasu smin bya ba// brtul zhugs bzang dang dbang bskur ba// rang gi slob ma bdag
68a8(rgyud): nyid che// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// ston pas yongasu grol ba yin// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin// gang zhig dngos med shes rab ste/ 
68b1(rgyud): babs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid do// rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar grangs// rgyun de rnam pa gsum gyur te// gzhi dang de bzhin rang bzhin dang // mi 'phrogs pa yis rab phye ba// gzhi dang rang bzhin rgyu yin te// 
68b2(rgyud): bzhin mi 'phrogs 'bras bu'o// gzhi ni thabs zhes bya ba ste// gsum gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o// / rigs ni lnga dang gsum dag dang // ngo bo nyid gcig rigs brgya'o// byang chub rdo rje bcas gsung ba/ 
68b3(rgyud): da ni phyi ma'i rgyud du 'dod// de nyid rnam pa lnga ru bshad// gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad// lhag pa'i lha ni gsang chen te// dam pa'i rigs ni rnam pa brgyad// thog ma tha ma meng zhi ba// dngos dang dngos
68b4(rgyud): med mi zad gtso// stong ning snying rje mi phyed pa// byang chub se mas zhes bya ba yin// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis mi phyed phyed ba'i dngos po nyid// rig dang lhan cig ldan pas na// rig pa'i
68b5(rgyud): skyes bu zhes brjod// rgyu lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga// rdo rje zhe sa ni bshad pa yin// 'chang ba 'dzin zhes grags pa ste// rnam shes rdo rje 'dzin du 'dod// badz+ra d+h+r-ika ni rnam shes yin// 
68b6(rgyud): yod dang med dang dbus las 'das// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur las byung // sems can kun gyi lus yin te// skye las rgyal bas dzi na dzi ka/ don rnams thaMd 'byung bas na// sems ni rin po che zhes
68b7(rgyud): byad/ tshor ba pos ni nges tshor bas// tshor ba rat+na d+h+r-ika tu brjod// mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid dngos po yis// kun la kun gyis thams cad du// dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi ni// A ro lika ces bshad
68b8(rgyud): pa yin/ rnam shes rab mthar phyin byed pa// gang yin de ni shes rab ste// 'du byed sems 'dzin pas na// pradz+nye d+h+r-ika ces bya bar bshad// rigs kyi rgyud ces bya bar bshad// rgyud ni thog ma zhes brjod
69a1(rgyud): de mi 'jigs skye ba med gang yin// mgon po de ni yin par bshad// rgyu 'bras gnyis la snga bas na/ rnam shes zhe sdang yin par bshad// bems po bcings pa'i rang bzhin pas// 
69a2(rgyud): gzugs ni gti mug ces byar bshad// bdag tu rlob pa'i ngo bo bas tshor ba dregs pa yin par bshad// dngos la chag sde mtshan nyid can// 'du shes yang dag chags bdag nyid// rkyen gyis drangs pa'i bdag
69a3(rgyud): nga can// 'du byed rtag tu phrag dog yin// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid// srid pa kun 'byung thams cad du// 'dod chags zhe sdang rmongs ldan pa'i// sems ni 'dod pa zhes byar ba shang // dam tshig sna tshogs 'dra ba
69a4(rgyud): yi/ mngon phyogs las las skyes 'bras bu// gnyis med ye shes chos rnams la// nga rgyal byed pa rmongs nas bshad// de la phan tshun 'dzer ba ni// zhe sdang zhes ni bya bar bshad// mtshan nyid
69a5(rgyud): 'dod chagaso zhen pa yin// ye shes thabs ni rdo rjer bshang// dga' brdzogs pa'i longs spyod mchog/ bud med bde mchog phun sum tshogs// gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags dang // rdo rje la
69a6(rgyud): dga' rtag par gnas// des na sangs rgyas kyi thabs// rdo rje theg pa zhes bshad// mi 'jig bdag nyid chos rnams ni/ ma skyes pa yi ngo bo nyid// dngos po kun gyis dam tshig ste// de nyid
69a7(rgyud): gshin rje mthar byed do// rnam shes min bdag chos rnams ni// don dam mi 'gyur dag gyur nyid // sems kun gyi ni dam tshig ste/ des na rgyal po shes mthar byad brjod med bdag nyid chos rnams ni// ming
69a8(rgyud): rang gzugs blo dngos po med// chos rnams kun gyi dam tshig ste// des ma khyab bdag bang mthar byed// mi rtog bdag nyid chos rnams ni// rang bzhin gyis ni zhi nga ba'i dngos/ rdo rje kun gyi dmachin
69b1(rgyud): ste/ des na gtso bo bags mthar byed// mi 'jig rnam param shes pa/ brjod du med dang rtag bral ba// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// shes na breng ba thob par 'gyur/ ti mu gti mug longs spyod pas// gti mug
69b2(rgyud): zad phyir gshin rjes gshed/ des na lus mthar byed pa ste// / des na shes bya mthar byed 'gyur// nyes pa nyes pa long sprod pas nyes pa zad phyir shas mthar byed/ ka/ ngas na sems ni mthar byed// des na nyon mongs mtha
69b3(rgyud): byed 'gyur// 'dod chags 'dod chags long spyod pas// 'dod chags zang pas bang mthar byed// des na 'dod chags mthor byed te// de bzhin sgoms 'jug mthor byed 'gyur // zhon mongs kun zad gang yin dang // de ban
69b4(rgyud): las ni thams cad zad// sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni// bgegs mthar byang ces bya bar bshang // nyon mongs rdo rje sgrib dag na// las rnams thams cad rnam par dag/ las rnams thams cad rnam dag pas/ las skyes
69b5(rgyud): 'bras bu rnam dag 'gyur// gzung dang chags pa nyid dang ni// rnam pa de bzhin mi g.yo dang // rgyu nyid 'bras bu zhing dag ste// drug las thugs ni kun tu 'byung // 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs
69b6(rgyud): drug/ khro bo'i dbang por rnam par grag// dam tshig rdo rje la sogs drug/ sa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur par grags// rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bshadado// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs drug
69b7(rgyud): rdo rje bdag po zhes bshad do// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// bdag nyid chen po kun tu 'byung // thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// phung po khams dang skye mched gzugs// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i
69b8(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// sngags pas sbyor ba nges byas la// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// 'jigs pa thams cad spangs na su// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// sngags pas seng ge bzhin du spyod// 'di la
70a1(rgyud): mi phyici yang med// de bzhin mi bzar yongs yin/ sA ba sa srung zad med // rtag tu mi bsam ci yang med/ mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid dum rnam par 'jog pang
70a2(rgyud): gis sam kun la spyod pa// kun tu spyod pa zhes bshad do// dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi// rkyen gyis gang dang gang byung yid/ yid de mA na zhes bya bar bar bshad / tra ni skyob par byed pa'i don// 'jig rten spyod las
70a3(rgyud): nam grol bar/ gang ba shang dam tshig sdom pa ste/ rdo rje kun gyis bsungs pa ni// sngags kyi spyod ba zhes bshad da// rang rang gi ni ngo bo nyid / spri mo yid kyis rnam pas mos te// gsang sngags zlos pa'i dbye ba yis
70a4(rgyud): rdzob pa skyed cing shing bsdu/ sa sa rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje bdag ye shesas panogs sku/ byang chubabadag mengs pan/ dkyis/ brtul bu lus tsa gyim ma cho gom rba/ 
70a5(rgyud): dus gsum sa bon dag gis bai zla ka bzlas pa smra bar grangs pa / na// ngag kun bzlas pa zhes bshad la// sngags kun 'dod ba zhes bshad de// de nyid bskul bar smra ba'o// ji ltar thugs sa
70a6(rgyud): byin rlab pa/ ting nge 'dzin kyang de bzhin no// de rnams spyi bor dbang bskur dang // de bzhin kun tu mchod pa'o// rdo rje 'chang ba gang yin pa'i// rig pa yod pa'i sbyor ba dang // bdag byin chu sogs de bzhin te/ 
70a7(rgyud): de yi longs spyod bzhir shes bya/ dpa' bo rdo rje gcig pu yi// spyi bor dbang bskur re re ste// snying po phyag rgya sngags tsam dag/ rang rigs rims kyis rgyas gdab po// 'bras bus rgyu ni rgyas gdab cing ka rgyu sa
70a8(rgyud): 'bras bu rgyaso 'dab bar// sbom gyi gzhan du dngos grub ni// bskol ba bye bar 'thung mi 'gyur// longs spyod pa zhi dang yang dag ldan// rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis gru gsum du
70b1(rgyud): ni rnam par sgom// kun nas sar pa'i 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bcu de dbus rnam par sgom// rtsibs kun la ni khro bo bcu// ye shes bdag nyid bcu las byung // 'gog pa'i rdo rjes bsgom bya zhing // mchog tu mdzes pa bsgrub par bya// 
70b2(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar ba'i sprin spros pas/ mi g.yo ba dang mtshungs par 'khor// da ltar chos 'byung ye shas ni// rang bzhin dri ma mngon pa// bsgoms pas skad cig nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas spyan ni rab tu 'byung // rdo rje can gyis chos bstan pa// rim pa
70b3(rgyud): gnyis la yang dag bstan// bskyed pa yi ni rim nyid dang // de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// sgrub pa dang ni nan tan dang // dam tshig de bzhin sdom pa rnams// sngar ni da kun rgyas par ni// rim pa'i dbye bas phye ba yin// gzugs dang
70b4(rgyud): sgra sogs 'dod pa ni// bde sdug gnyis ka'i bdag nyid can// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// rtag tu snying las skye bar 'gyur/ chags la 'dod chags rdo rje can// rdo rje 'dra bar rin chen 'byung // rin
70b5(rgyud): bzhin du dam tshig shes// 'dzid pa de rnams dam tshig mtshungs// rnam bcas dang ni rnam pa med// kun 'gro yi ge gsum dag nyid// byar/ dang ni dbrog pa dang // spro dang rang gi bzlas pa bya'o// de ltar na sngang
70b6(rgyud): gti mug dgas gsum du ni bskyed par bya// gsang ba dag la rgyas gdab cing // rdo rje can gyi don byed do// zhe sdang sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas// ne sdang 'khor lo bskyed nas su// rdo rje drag pos bcom nas ni/ 
70b7(rgyud): shes rdo rje can gyis bsdu/ de ni spro bas bsdu byas la// de bzhin slar yang bsdu bar bya'o// 'di lta'i sbyor ba goms byas na// zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/ bsad dang de bzhin
70b8(rgyud): gso ba dang / skad cig tsam gyis byed par ni// mngon du nus par be tsom med/ gti mug sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas// gti mug 'khor lo bskyed nas ni// rgyan la sogs pa gang ci'ang rung // de dag thams cad rtag tu sku/ 
71a1(rgyud): gti mug sems kyi rgya mtsho sgom ka rin chen kun gyis rab tu dgang // gti mug 'khor lo can kun gyis// sbyin pa'i char ni rab tu 'beb ka rdzas rnams thams cad ma lus par// rab tu
71a2(rgyud): sprin dang dbrog pa nyid // sems kyi rdo rje brtan po yis// skad cig tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// 'dod chags sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor paso// 'dod chags 'khor lo bskyed nas ni/ ka/ lha mo thaMng phrogs nas su// 'dod
71a3(rgyud): po'o sbyor bas 'dod pa spyod// dga' sdug bde ba rangs pa yis// 'dod pa'i rtseng mor rnam par 'phrul kede nas 'khor lo can kun la// lha mo rab tu dbul bar bya// khams gsum dag tu byung ba yi// ljang
71a4(rgyud): lha mon chung ma yang // skad cig tsam gyis 'dod spyod na// mi yi bud med smos ci dgos// dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang bskur dang // las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dag/ nyam su len cing byin rlob pa/ 
71a5(rgyud): grub pa'i bgrod pa gzhan yino// b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor shes grags dang // byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang / lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad pa// gsum po dkyil 'khor
71a6(rgyud): yin par gsungs// phung po skye mched khams rnam ni/ sangs rgyas thaMd rgyas btab pa'o// de ni rtag par rgya dgod pa// dkyil 'khor zhes ni bstan pa yin// 'dod rgyal dbyig sngon stobs mi g.yo
71a7(rgyud): lcags kyu dbyig pa rtse gsumo dang // ral gri mtsham su rnam par dgod// steng du 'khor lo 'og gnod mdzes// rig rgyal rdo rje can rnams kyi// 'khor los bsgyur ba drug gi rgya// sa la sogs pa'i
71a8(rgyud): sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya rang gi dkyil 'khor pa// me long pi wang dung dang ni// de bzhin smod dang sna tshogs ras// cho ste 'byung ba yi phyag rgya drug/ rdo rje bdag po rdo rje can// sangs rgyas byang chub
71b1(rgyud): sems dpa' dang / dri rgyal rnams kyis rgyas gdab po la de na gzhan yang dpa' bo gcig/ rig ni kha dog dag gis brtag/ lha mo dgu dang na mkha'i khams// me tog ces ni bshad pa yin// sku gsung thugs
71b2(rgyud): kyi dbye ba yisaka/ rigs kyi rims kyis dgod par bya/ mchod rten sangs rgyas zad kyi ka bzhugs gnas pho brang yin par bshad/ ye shes sems dpas dang reg pa// ye shes 'khor lo zhes bshad
71b3(rgyud): mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum yi le/ sa bon yi ge gnas zhes bshad // sku gsung thubs kyi de nyid ni// sang par byas pas bskul bar bshad/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnamasu// 'od zer 'gyed pa gtas
71b4(rgyud): ba'o// rdo rje can kun spyan 'dren pas// rdo rje can kun spyan drang b.ro// / rdo rje can gyi gnas de yi// 'od zer gyis ni rdo rje kun/ bsdus nas gong bu'i tshul gyis su// bcings pa bcing ba yin par bshad/ 
71b5(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas btab ste// ri modakyil 'khor brtag pa bya// / dbang bskur dbye ba rnam gsum du/ 
71b6(rgyud): rgyad 'di la ni rab tu brtag/ bum pa'i dbang bskur dang po ste/ gnyis pa gsang po'i dbang bskur ba// shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste// bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no// mig yang so sngags kyi snod du
71b7(rgyud): rung / me tog bcas shing sa bon byung // blangs nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// sngags pas slob ma dag la sbyin// rnam pa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dri chu rkang dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje pad+ma'i sbyor
71b8(rgyud): ba yis// rdo rje can kun yang dag bsdu sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// de dag thams cad snying kar bsdu// rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas su// slob ma'i khar ni dbab par bya// 'di ni gsang sngabs
72a1(rgyud): kun gyi dbang bskur ba yi go 'bang mchog lngar chom ngo mom rnams dang // gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// mchog tu dang cing shes rab che// gzugs bzang sgrub pa po la dgar
72a2(rgyud): sbyor ba gcig gis bya ba goms// dam tshig dag gis dam tshig can// bla ma la ni slob ma yis// yon rnams rab tu phul nas ni// bla mas de ni byin rlab ta/ sgrub pa po la sbyin par bya// rmongs pas
72a3(rgyud): gau ti mug bdag nyid sbyor// gti mug dga' dang yang dag ldan// gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// gti mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// zhe sdang sdang ba'i bdag nyid sbyor// zhe sdang dga' dang yang dag
72a4(rgyud): ldan// zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'a gyur// chags la 'dod chags bdag nyid sbyor// 'dod chag dga' dang yang dag ldan// 'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ 
72a5(rgyud): chags rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid sbyor// rdo rje dga' dang yang dag ldan// ye shes rgyun gyi sa dbang bskur na// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur
72a6(rgyud): rig pa'i lha mo de nyid ni// rdo rje can gyi slob mas blang // lag par lag pa bzhag nas ni// de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang byas la// slob ma'i mgo bor lag bzhag ste// bla ma rdo rje can gyis bsgo/ 
72a7(rgyud): thabs gzhan gyis ni 'chang mi rgya// de bas rig pa 'di mchog yin// chos kun gnyi su med pa la// dngos po gnyi su brtag pa yin// de bas 'khor ba rnam bral ba// rtag tu khyed kyis mi bya'o// 'di ni
72a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla med pa'o// rmongs pa gang zhig 'das gyur na// de yi dngos grub mchog mi 'grub// tha mal lus kyi chos la ni/ dri ma lnga rnams snang ba ni/ 
72b1(rgyud): ye shes lnga yis byin rlabs pas// bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad // sngar dang de bzhin bsreg pa dang // snang bar bya dang gzugs snang ba// sngags kyi lus su rab sbyor bas// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' bar bya/ 
72b2(rgyud): rdo rje hUM las byung ba ni// bar snang la gnas bsam par bya// aHlas byung ba'i pad+ma ni// de yi 'og tu bsgom par bya// oM gyis mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi ni/ de yi dbus su bzhag par bya// rdo rje pad+ma maH
72b3(rgyud): bskor byaka/ 'bar bas rnam 'byor mchim par bya// shes dang mtshungs par sna gyur cing // ye shes ni ma gnyis par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi// mtshon cha mchog gis drangs
72b4(rgyud): nas ni// bdud rtsi de ru phab nas kyang // bza' ba'i sbyor bas bza' bar bya// bsgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis// de bzhin dpa' tsha lnga rnams bza'// yig gsum sa bon las bskyed bya/ 
72b5(rgyud): gzhan du ngo ni 'grub mi grub// mi snang la sogs dngos grub ni// tha mal pa zhes bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas nyid sgrub sangs rgyas kyis// dngos grub mchog mchag ces gsungs pa
72b6(rgyud): yin// thabs ni rnam pa bzhi po dag/ byang chub rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par bsngags// bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang po ste/ nye bar sgrub pa gnyis pa yin/ 
72b7(rgyud): sgrub pa yang ni gsum pa yin// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o// thun mong mchog gi bye brag gis/ bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyi su 'gyur// rdo rje bzhi po thun mong ste// ye shes bdud rtsi mchog yino// dang po stong
72b8(rgyud): byang chub ste// gnyis pa sa bon bsdus pa yin// gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs pa ste// bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o// rdo rje nam bzhi 'di dag gis// tha mal bsgrub la bsnan pa bya/ mchog ni ye shes
73a1(rgyud): bdud rtsi zhing // sbyor ba drug gis bya ba yin// bsnyen pa yan lag drug gis ni// byas pas sgrub pa mchog tu 'gyur// gzhan du bsgrubs par gyur na ni// dngos grub mchog ni 'byung mi
73a2(rgyud): 'gyur// so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang // srog stsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang // rjesu dran dang ting 'dzin te// sbyor ba'i yan lag drug tu bshad// dbang po bcu po rnams kyi yang // rang gi 'jug gnas thams
73a3(rgyud): cad du// 'dod pa so sor sdud pas na// so sor sdud pa zhes bshad do// 'dod pa lnga ni mdor bsdus nas// sangs rgyas lnga ru sbyor ba yis/ brtag pa bsam gtan zhes bshad de// bsam gtan de ni rnam
73a4(rgyud): lngar 'gyur// rtog dang dpyid dang dga' ba dang // de bzhin bde ba nyid dang yang // sems kyi rtse gcig nyid dag ste/ lnga pa dader ni bsam gtan bsdu// gsang ba'i rgyud ni thams cad du// 
73a5(rgyud): rnam pa du mar yongs bshad pa// gsang ba gsum byung rtog pa ste// de yi long spyod spyod pa'o// dag 'dang 'dra ba gsum pa ste// bde bsdus po ni bzhi pa'o// shes dang
73a6(rgyud): shes bya byung zad pa'i// rang sems lnga par shra bar bya// sangs rgyas kun dngos zhi ba ni 'dod pa kun la rab tu gnas// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs// 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid// gong bu'i gzugs
73a7(rgyud): gyis phyung nas ni// sna yi rtse mor rab tu brtag/ rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad/ rang sngags snying kar bsam+ba nas ni// srog ni thog ler gyur par bzhag/ rang dbang rin
73a8(rgyud): chen dgag pa yi// gzung ba 'dzin pa yin par bshad// sems ni 'gog pa'i rdo rjer gyur// mtshan ma nyer 'dzin 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan ma'i khams ni rnam pa lngar// byang chub rdo rjes gsung ba yin/ 
73b1(rgyud): smig rgyu 'dra ba dang po ste// du ba lta bu gnyis pa yim// mkha snang 'dra gsum pa ste// mar ma ltar 'bar bzhi pa'o// sprin med na mkha' lta bur ni// rtag tu snang ba lnga pa'o// brtan 'gyur rdo rje'i lam nas ni// na mkha'
73b2(rgyud): kham su spro bar bya// rjesu dran gang zhing rnam sgom pa/ de dang 'dra bar spro bar bya// rje su dran pa zhes pashad de// so sor snang ba de la skye/ thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas/ dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus
73b3(rgyud): bgong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// dbusu gzugs ni rnar sgom// yid kyis ye shes rdzogs byed pa// tinge 'dzin ces bya bar gnos// so sor sdud la snyoms 'jug na// sngags rnams thang byin gyis rlob// bsam
73b4(rgyud): gtan ye shes snyoms 'jug na// mngon shes lnga po thob par 'gyur// srog dang rtsol bas nges par ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs// rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stong ste ni// rdo rje sems pas
