73b5(rgyud): yang dag 'jug/ rjes dran mnyam par sbyor ba yis// 'od kyi la 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur// tinge 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis ni// sgrib pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur// snying po de ni thugs
73b6(rgyud): ru/ zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor bas blta// mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni// sems ni sngags kyi dngos bya ste/ sngags kyi gzugs kyi tshul gyis ni// byang chub tshigs bcad brjod par bya// cho ga yang dag
73b7(rgyud): sbyor bsgom pas// rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te// sems de ye shes gzugs kyis ni// sgom pa nye bar sgrub pa'o// ji srid mthong ba nga srid du// nam gnyis zla ba drug du sgomaka/ 'dod pa kun la longs spyod
73b8(rgyud): bas yang du mi rtag tu bya// ba la zla ba drug gis ni// ji skad gsungs pa ma mthong na// ji skad ba shad pa'i cho ga dang // sdom pas lan gsum brtsam par bya// de ltar byas kyang sgrub pa pos// mthong ba 'byong
74a1(rgyud): par ma gyur cing // gang tshe byang chub ma grub na// drag shul sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// de'i tshe de yi ye shes ni// 'grub pa nges par nye bar 'byung / rigs kyi dbyeng pa'i sbyor bas ni// rdo rje 'ur dus su ru
74a2(rgyud): rinas dang du byung dang // bsrung ba'i sbyor bdab cang bya// 'dod ma bra chen por tshul gyis ni// ye shes 'khor lo can rnams bsdu/ lnga mo dgu ni spos ma ru// bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la dgod // leng su gyur la
74a3(rgyud): bya chu gi kyil 'a khor ron bdago par bya// ngag 'i dbus su gnas byal/ 'khor lo can kun bsdus par bya/ thams cad rje rje ngos byas lnga/  'og bya chu'i bsgom par bya/ bskul ba'i klung bya sa pa'i
74a4(rgyud): der lha mos snying po bskul ba yis// dus gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin sems// ye shes lta bur lus sbom mo// bzhi yis kha dog rnam par dbye// de bzhin nyams kyi snying po ste// dbang bskur bos ni rang gi rgyu// bzhi yin
74a5(rgyud): 'bras du bye ba yin// sngags kyis chos ni byed 'gyur la// rig pa'ang chos kyi phyag rgyas so// 'khor los bsdu ba'i rgya la po drug/ gtsug tor zhes ni rnam par grangs// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i
74a6(rgyud): longs spyod ba ni/ rig pa'i rgyal mo zhes byar grags// de bzhin/ rdo rje'i bdag po rnams// 'dod pa thams cad ces byar ba shad // bsam gtan rdo rjes thams cang la// dbang bskur ba ni rab tu bsngas so// cho ga'i
74a7(rgyud): sbyor 'di yis ni// ye shes lus dang ldan cig tu// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis// gnyis su med par byed sgrub pa// sngar bshad pa yi rim gyis ni// rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can// bdag dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor
74a8(rgyud): bskyed// sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do// bstan pa'i dus su gtsug tor che// sbyor ba nyid kyi gzugasu dmigs// nye bar sgrub pa'i dus su ni// bdud rtsi ba khyil pa'i gzugs kyi bar// sngags pa cho ga shes
74b1(rgyud): bayis sgrub pa rang lnga'i sbyor ba bya/ sgrub chen po'i dus ni// gtso bo sangs rgyas bdag po'i sku/  'di ni rdo rje can kun dang // rnal 'byor mchog gi gsang ba che// de lha'i rnam byas shes byas nas/ dngos grub mcho
74b2(rgyud): ni bslab par bya/  gzhan du bsal po byi bas ni// sangs rgyas slob pa rnams kyis kyang // dngos grub mchog ni zhi ba dag/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// bsgrub bya sgrub par yang dab skyor gang yin de ni bsten par
74b3(rgyud): bshad// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// nye bar sgrub pa zhes bshad do// yi ge hUM dang phaT ldan pa// bskyod pa sgrub pa zhes bshad la/ ngo bo nyid ni zhi bde ba/ ka/ sgrub po chen po zhes bshad do// bcom ldan sangs rgyas kun
74b4(rgyud): gyi bdag rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i gnas// sangs rgyas ku na gyis thabs las byung // de nyid chos rnams chos nyi // las dang rjes 'thun gang gang gis// rnal 'byor pa yis sbyor ba dmigs// 
74b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de dang de bskyed nas// dam tshig mi zad ba sgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// dam tshig dang bo bsrung bar bya// de nas gtsug tor dam tshig nikau/ cho ga ji skad
74b6(rgyud): gsungs las byung // las dang gang gang rjes 'thun pas// rang gi 'khor la bka' yang bsgom// bsgrub pa'i lus gang yin pa la'ang // dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgoms nas su// de yi lus gnas
74b7(rgyud): 'khor lo la// de yi shes pa bsgrub par bya// de nas de rnams de bcom nas// byung bar gyur par rnam par bsgomi/ dngos po kun gyis rnam bsgoms nas// dngos po kun gyis drangs nas ni/ de ni rang gi 'khor lo
74b8(rgyud): gzhug ji skad gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// khro bas khyab pa'i sems kyis ni// rkang pas mtshan mnan par bya// de nas bka' mnos khro bo ni// sna tshogs tshogs kyis
75a1(rgyud): bskor ba rnams// sbub pa rdo rje can gyis ni// bsgrub byangs daphyir babang bar bya// blo bo'i rgyal po des bskor nas// de ni bcings shing brdeg pa dang / de nas brdungs shing skrag gyur ba// sgrub pa pos ni dbus
75a2(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags kyis ni// de yi gzugs brnyan la phab nas// sngags pas rdo rje ngag gis ni// spyi bo mgrin pa snying kha ru// phur bu'i sngags kyis phur bu gang ba// yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba kun// sna
75a3(rgyud): tshogs yul las byung ba rnams// gzugs de la ni phab nas su// de rnams kyi ni phur bus bdag// de nas sbyor ba thams cad kyis// cho ga ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi sbyor la sogs
75a4(rgyud): las kyi dbyabs sbar bar byaka mtshan ma ma mnan nas bzlas pa 'am// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg gam// bsgoms pas gang gus pa'i sems can ni/ zos par gyur par rab tu brtag/ zhi la
75a5(rgyud): zhi ba'i sems kyi byo// rgyas la dga' ba'i yid kyis te// dbang la/ chags pa'i yid du byo// khro ba gtum pas rab tu sgrub/ zhes pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
75a6(rgyud): bad dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi the tsom thams cad cad par mdzad nas// the tshom thams cad gcad par bar mdzad pa sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la
75a7(rgyud): zhugs te/ de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs
75a8(rgyud): pa dag thams cad la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod // thams cad sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// / thams cad gsung la phyag 'tshal 'dud// thams cad thugs khyod phyag 'tsha'o// thams cad/ 
75b1(rgyud): mdzad la phyag 'dud// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// sku gsung chu lo 'gyur bas// sems can sangasas rgyas mi mnyam mnyam// bsgrub bya su yin sgrub po gang // sgrub pa'i dbang po bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas zad
75b2(rgyud): gsod pa yis// ji ltar sdig pas gros mi 'gyur// log te gos 'gyur 'bras bu gang // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' se 'a chen po de rnams la leg so 'alnga
75b3(rgyud): so zhes bya ba byin te/ senga' chen po legaso lags/ bdag nyid chen po legaso legs// gsung dbyangs chen po legaso legs// mchod pa chen po legaso legs// slob dpon byang chub rdo rje can// dang ldan
75b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag// dngos rnams tha~Mng sgyu ma bzhin// bskye/ dra dang sdud par mdzad pa po// des na de yi sdig mi 'byung // bsod nams ngag kyang de bzhin te/ gang lo ldog dang bsod nams med/ 
75b5(rgyud): de ni byang chub yin par gsungs// mgon po de yi slu ba yis// lus can thams cad 'jigs mdzad kyang // ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur zhing // byang chub kyang ni rlung mi dka'// sngon ni
75b6(rgyud): mi bzang las byas pas// gal te dmyal ba rnamasu ni// skye bo skye 'gyur nga rnams kyi// dmyal ba rnams kyi 'bras bu che// byang chub rdo rjes bsgrung bya 'ang // ye shes kyis ni rgya sa btab bas// sems can
75b7(rgyud): rnams kyis sbyor ba des// byang chub sems dpa' sanga' chen// mchog tu phan btags shes par bya// tshar gcod pa dang rjes bzung las// bdag nyid chen po de yis bya// sgrub pa chen po'i mthar thug par// 
75b8(rgyud): byas nas los rnams brtsam par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa dang chen po de rnams rdo rje can gyi thugs rje chen po'i tshul gyis chos thos pas dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis legs
76a1(rgyud): zhes gsol to// mgon po chen po leg so legs// thub pa chen po 'i gsol/ chos rnams chen po legaso legs// thugs rje chen po legaso legs// e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// thugs
76a2(rgyud): rje chen po dri ma med// gdug pa mi bzad las kyis kyang // sang+yas nyid kyi 'bras bu stsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thaMd kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces
76a3(rgyud): bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis/ dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya zhing skrag par yang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
76a4(rgyud): bya'u 'o byung gzhe sdang rtsol sogs// sngags kyi rgyud ni bsdus pa dag/ yongasu spangs par mi bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' senga' che/ nu bo de dag tha~Md kyis// de bzhin gshegs thaM la mgron gcig tu
76a5(rgyud): tshigasu bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do// dus gsum rdo/ rje'i thugs yin srid dang thar gyur gang // zhi zhing sgrib med na mkha' dag pa'i ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas rnam rgyas byang chub
76a6(rgyud): dbang phyug rdo rje can// de la lus ngag yid kyi rtag tu phyag 'tshal// gang zhig gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang // rnam par shes dang skye mched drug dang dbang po drug/ sa chu me dang rlung dang na mkha'
76a7(rgyud): thams cad ni// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tsha lo// gti mug nyes pa 'dod chags rdo rje chos bcas gang // rig pa'i sbyor ba las byung rtag tu rab 'brel bar// rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bas/ 
76a8(rgyud): myos pa'i dngos gyur pa// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshalo// spro dang dga' dang rnam pa de bzhin mi 'gyur dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin sems rjes thogs chos// rmongs dang zhe sdang 'dod
76b1(rgyud): chags pa sgrib pa rdo rje ste// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tsha lo// gAng shig thog yang dngos po rnam dag 'di sgom pa// babs pa shes rab las byung spros dang rnam par bral// gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtul gug+sa
76b2(rgyud): dam tshig sbyor ba rtag/ byang chu rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang nig dngos grub mchog gi thabs ni 'di sbom shing // bsnyen pa'i cho ga nye bar sgrub dang sgrub pa dang // sgrub pa chen pos blo mi 'gyur ba'i sgru
76b3(rgyud): dbang po// byang chub rdo rje 'drang blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang shig thun bzhi'i rdo rje dag ni sgrub byang ba/ ka/ mi snang la sogs sna tshogs mchog dang rimin 'grub cing // bla ma'i drin gyis 'di na me nor lam te zlab
76b4(rgyud): byang chub rdo rje 'dra ba lta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhing rab gsang 'dus bya'i rgyud 'dinan pa dang // 'don par byed dang klog ba dang ni// sems pa dang // mchod par byed pa dang ni 'dri'am 'drir
76b5(rgyud): 'jug pa// byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang du zho sogs las tshogs shin tu brtags pa mI sa/ 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi cho ga de bzhin rgyas 'debs
76b6(rgyud): bi'i bsgrub bya 'di dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i dbang po na// byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang gis gtso bo sgrub pa po mthong reg pa dang // legs par dran dang ming tsam nges par
76b7(rgyud): thor pa dang dad par byed cing phyogs gcig tsam zhig 'dzin pa dag/ byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta ga de la rtag phyag 'tshal// bstong pa'i tshig ni zhi ba 'dis// 'dren pa kun la stong pa dang pa dang / byang chub sem
76b8(rgyud): mchod chen la// mgon po de dag rjes yang rang // 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang // rgyud kun bdag po'i dbang po yi// rgyud 'di legs lags par
77a1(rgyud): gsungs pa yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zang dang // byang chub seng 'de dag thaMd kyis de skad ces gsungs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la bzhugs te/ 
77a2(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dus pa
77a3(rgyud): las bsang badzad ston pa rdo rje'i ye shes kyis byin gyis rlong pa zhes bya ba le'u ste bco brgyad po rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po Atsar+ya shrad+d+ha kar badz+ra dang // zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang
77a4(rgyud): bos bsgyur cing bcos te btan la phab pa'o// !// rgya gar skad du// san d+hi byA ka ra/ nA ma tan+ta/ bod skad du/ dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sang
77a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tsho lo// de nyid 'di skad bdag gis thos// shin tu gsang ba/ 'i dus gcig na// bsang gtso rdo rje bcoM ldan 'das// dam tshig gacho ga ni rdo rje gsum// de bzhin gshegs kun
77a6(rgyud): ye shes ni// yon tan phun tshogs bsam mi byag/ yod med mtha' gnyis las 'das pas// gnas med pa la gnas nas bya// rnam par rang bzhin gcig pa 'dir// kun mkhyen ye shes rnam sgoms pa// 'gro
77a7(rgyud): snying rnam dag ces bya la// thub pa chen po bzhugs pa yin// ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang // rnam par shas dang ming dang gzugs// skyed mched drug dang reg pa dang / tshor ba dang ni sred pa dang // nyer len sring
77a8(rgyud): bskye ba dang // rga shi nas bya rig ma yin // nga rgyal che ba'i nga rgyal dang // nga'o snyam nga rgyal mngon nga rgyal// gzhan yang nga rgyal las pang rgyal// cung zad nga rgyal log par bcas// 'di dag rdo rje mtha' can mchog
77b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'ang bzhin gshegs// de rnams brjod mi lang ba'i grangs// brjod kyis mi lang nyid du gyur// sangs rgyas ning ni grangs med pa'i// ri rab rdul phran grangs mnyam pa// byang chub sems dpa'
77b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen// til gyi gang bu mtshungs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang // namakha'i khams kun gang bar snang // de nas dang ldan rnam snang mdzad// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// 'khor gyi dkyil 'jo
77b3(rgyud): la gzigs nas// de nying gsum skyes skur mdzod// tshangs pa khyab 'jug lnga chen dang // 'dod dang rig byed de bzhin zung // tshangs ldeng bzhin nub ste/ phung po la sogs grangs dang mnyam// sgra sgrogs de bzhin dga' byed dang
77b4(rgyud): skya bseng skem byed thub pa dang // sna yon dang ni dkon mchog gsum / de bzhin gshegs kun gcig pu nyid ka/ de tshe phyung la / sol ba yi// gsang sngags gsungs pa dang po nyid // thub chen byang
77b5(rgyud): chub sems tshul du// mdzad pa gnyis pa yin par bshad// rnam lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i// phra mo rnal 'byor gsum pa yin// dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhi// gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid
77b6(rgyud): bzhi pa// srung ba'i bslab bzhi pa rnam bzhi dang // spyod pa 'ang 'dir ni lnga pa ste// drug pa rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi gting 'dzin phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro// bdun pa de nyid mchod par bshad/ gsang ba'i dbang du gtso bos
77b7(rgyud): mdzad// phyag rgyas dbang bskur brgyad pa bstan// dam tshig bzhi po dgu pa yin// rnam pa bcur phye yang dag rtog/ bzlas pa'i sngags kyang gsungs pa yin// bcu gcig ming du byung ba ni// phyag rgyar cig par
77b8(rgyud): bshad dkyil 'khor// bcu bzhis pa yi bdag nyid sku// nyan thos byang chub ston par mdzad// de bzhin rig pa spyod grub paka/ mngon shes lnga ni bcu gsum pa// bcu dang bzhi par bzhi po dang 'phreng sngags tha ma
78a1(rgyud): ston par mdzad// phyogs dang skya bsang cing gyur pa// dngos grub dkyil 'khor bla med pa'o// sgra sgrogs dus dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor rdul tshon ldan pa'o// slob ma dbang bskur
78a2(rgyud): nyid zla dag/ chags bral sna tshogs nyid gyur pa// sna tshogs tshig gi don gyi brda' / sna tshogs ming can ming gcig pu// de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// so sor sdud pa rab tu bstan// gcig dang du ma las grol
78a3(rgyud): ba// yang dag mthong nas yongasu sgor// yongasu bsgoms par gyur pa'i bdag/ rten 'brel du yang bstan par bya// de nas ma skyes sbyor ba la// thub pa rnam par snang mdzad cha// rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis
78a4(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin de 'og ston par mdzad// 'dod pa'i yan la dag 'gro ba'i tshogs// gnyis pa thams cad de bzhin gshog/ sa// 'dod chags che tshul zhes bya ba'i// ting 'dzin la snyoms par
78a5(rgyud): zhugs// de bzhin gshegs kun gtso bo yi// rang gi sku la zhuH/ bar mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rgyun du la ni sbyor bar gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun dang // de ban
78a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams// de bzhin gshegs bdag mnyes bya'i phyir// de rnams zhugs nas byung gyur pa// srog dang gyen rgyu bur sil dang // mnyam gnas khyab byed ces bya dang // klu dang rul sbal
78a7(rgyud): rtsangs pa dang // lha sbyin gzhu rgyal zhes bya ba// 'di dag tu ni nyed sku mdzadaka/ bud med gzugasu slar sprul te// rang gi ngo bo ji bzhin du// nga yi sku las byung bar gyur// de nyid gsum ni mnyam sbyor las// rang gi
78a8(rgyud): gsang sngags de dag sgom// yan lag kun las nges grol zhing // shin tu phra ba nyid du gyur// dbu dgos mi las byung ba ni// zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong ste// dngos med ngo bo nyid yin pas// rang nyid kyang ni mi
78b1(rgyud): shes so// 'on kyang 'di ltar thug pa la// de bzhin gshegs rnams gsol ba 'dabs// bcom ldan dgongs pa lung bstan pa// chos kyi mchog ni bstan du gsol// khyab bdag khyed ni chos 'di rnams// dngos mang
78b2(rgyud): nyid ni thugasu chud// 'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pas// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mdzes// gang zhig yang dag shes gyur na// 'jig rten pa dang rtsod med cing // / de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang // 'jig rten shin
78b3(rgyud): tu 'das de bzhin ka gang 'di zhi ba nyid kyi chos// zhi gnas shin tu sngon 'gro ba// byang chub sems dpas thos na yang // de bzhin nyid kyi bde ba byed// de nas sa snying la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems
78b4(rgyud): dpa' che// mngon po rnam snang chen po la// de dag gis ni zhus gyur pa// gang shes bla mang byang chu ni// ma 'ongs skye bos pos 'aHro ba'i// gsang sngags de ning don 'byung ba// rnal 'byor bcom ldan
78b5(rgyud): bshad du gsol// lan gnyis gsol yang mgon po ni// mi gsung bar ni rnam par bzhugs// rdo rje can gyis de shes nas/ de nas slar yang zhus par 'gyur// gang 'di zhi gnas la sog
78b6(rgyud): ba'i// rnal 'byor zab mo bla med pa// de ni 'di bsngags pas bsngags// 'tshal 'gyur de ni gtso bos gsungs// bya ba dag bya'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig pa nyid dang // lung ni yang dag gang yin pa/ 
78b7(rgyud): de ni bstan par mdzad pa'i rigs// zhus pa'i don ni mkhyen nas ni/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// gsang sngags tshul ni mchog gyur 'di// gsang ba khyod la bstan par bya// 'di skad ces bya'i gsang
78b8(rgyud): sngags che// gsang sngags kun don sngar ster ba'o// ngar ni lnga yi bdag gyur cing / sbyor ba bin dang bcu yi bdag lnga pa lnga po'i ming 'ang ni// gsal dang mau gsal ngag tu sbyar/ rgya mngon phyogs pa'i sbyor
79a1(rgyud): bshad pa// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rgyan pa yin// bcu bdun zhes ni bshad pa 'di'i// gsungs pa'i don de ma shes pas// sngags pas gsang sngags sbyor ba dag/ de tshe ji ltar
79a2(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// don 'di rtogs par gyur nas ni// sna tshogs don ni ston pa dang // 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// gsang sngags rig pa mchog rnams byed// bdag ni stong dang yang dog sbyar// yi ge a ni sta
79a3(rgyud): du gnas// phye ma zhes byas sngags pas sems can don rnams bya// yi ge a gnyis sbyor ba gang // a sgo las skyes nyid du 'gyur// steng 'og phyogs kyi rnam pa de// dngos po meng po'i ngo bo nyid // 
79a4(rgyud): zhig 'di las gsungs pa ni// bsam mi khyab pa'i thabs chos zhing // bdag gis zhes rtogs de 'gyur ba/ thogs med rtogs pa/ 'digan so// ston pa po dang bstan dang gnas// phra rab tsam
79a5(rgyud): gyi ngo bo med// kun rdzob dus gsum sbyor gcig la// sngags pa rnams kyis thos de 'gyur ka/ shin tu grangs mang bskal pa ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang mkhyen pa// sngags pa
79a6(rgyud): rnams kyis dus gcig na// skad cig la rdzogs byang chub thob// kun mkhyen kun rig thugs chud pa/ gasdu sngags ston pa'i chos can te// de nyid kho na bcom ldan mchog/ sku gsung thug rdo rje las skyes// mi
79a7(rgyud): rtog na mkha' ji bzhin de// gsang sngags thams cad nyi ma 'dra// sa la rlung bzhin sngags pa ni// 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod// thams cad 'gyur ba gang gang yin// de de stong pa nyid du gyur// de bzhin sbyor
79a8(rgyud): ba de mthong bas// kun rig de ni de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin nyid gzugs brnyan gyur pa// de ni sku yi rdo rjer gyur// 'gro ba yang dag tshim par 'byung // mi phyed gsung gi rdo rjer gyur// na mkha'i gnas
79b1(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba gang // bsam mi khyab par spro bdag zhid // de nyid ye shes rgya mtsho la// thugs kyi rdo rje yang dag 'byung // sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/ namakha' yongasu brtag pa ste// de yang de ru kun gnas pas/ 
79b2(rgyud): bud med chos gcib bu yi gzugs// sangs rgyas kun gyis gang brten pa/ sar gyur de ni bcu gsum pa// de ni bud med ces bshad de/ de bas chos de b+ha ga yin// bya ba la sogs ji skad bshad // dam tshig
79b3(rgyud): gsum po gcig tu gyur// dngos med chos nyid gcig pu ruH// 'di ni de dag mnyam par 'gyur// dam tshig sku gsung thugs dang ni// ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs rgyal ba dang // sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ 
79b4(rgyud): rlung dang na mkha' nyid dag dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg dang de bzhin chos kyi dbyings// 'di rnams rdo rje'i mtha' can byung / byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul cha/ de ltar brjod mi lang
79b5(rgyud): zhes pa// brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur rnams// sangs rgyas zhing gi ri rab kyi// rdul phran gyi n-i grangs mnyam pa'i// byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen dang // na mkha' mnyam pa'i de bzhin
79b6(rgyud): gshegs pa mi bskyod rnam snang mdzad rin chen// dpag med tshe dang gdon 'i 'di dag na mkha'i khams mnyam pa'i// rdo rje snying po de bzhin gshegs// dper na til 'bru mtshungs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs
79b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis// na mkha'i khams ni yongs khengs pa/ de rnams der ni yang dag snang // de nas mgon po rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin nyid gcig tu gyur// gang yang dam tshig sngon 'gro dang // sku rdo rje sogs
79b8(rgyud): ming can gyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang // don yod thams cad de bzhin gshegs// 'di rnams sku yi yan lag grags// zhi gnas bsam mi khyab las byung // me skyes gcog pu
80a1(rgyud): gzigs pa ni// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul du gyur// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog gi ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi tshogs// de ni de dzin
80a2(rgyud): gshegs pa kun// de ni rnam par snang mdzad che// 'di nyid mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// nyid sku bud med nyid du mdzad// de nas mgon po bsam yas las// bud med bzugasu byung bar gyur// de ni sangs rgyas
80a3(rgyud): spyan 'dra dang / mA ma kI 'dra sbyor ba dang // gos dkar mo 'dra'i gzugs dang no// sgrol ma'i gzugasu yang dag gnas// sgra yi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang / dri yi ngo bo'i gzugs dang ni// de bzhin ro yi
80a4(rgyud): bo'i gzugs// reg gi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang // la la gzu gas kyi ngo bo yis// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams bzhugs// de nas tshul gsum ngon gcig dang // mi bskyod pa yang bstan
80a5(rgyud): phyir dang // 'jig rten rgyang pa na gdul don du// 'jig rten 'das nga'i tshul byung ngo // gnyis med mnyam pa nyid rnal 'byor// rje bud med b+ha ga mchog/ das tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du/ 
80a6(rgyud): de ni mi bskyod yang dag bri// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sbyor bzhi gcig tu sbyor ba nyid// dri ma mang bar byin rlabs pa// kun nas shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab// 'bar ba mang
80a7(rgyud): pos rnam par 'khrug/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de nas de ni bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus
80a8(rgyud): su yang // rna ba' lta bzhugs par gyur// mi bskyod rin chen dpal med dang // don grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs// de rnams byang chub sems rdo rje'i// thugs la rnam par bzhugs par gyur// de rnams
80b1(rgyud): zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// nga bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems// dngos meng ngo bor gcig par ni// mkha' 'dra rdo rje las byung gzigs// shes rab ting 'dzin gzhi gcig pu// de ni grib ma ltar thugs chung/ 
80b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i rang bzhin skur mdzad nas// 'gro don mnyam mdzad// ji ltar mtshams gnas nyi ma yis// 'gro ba gnyid log sad par byed// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa kun// byang chub sems kyis sang par
80b3(rgyud): byang sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje gcig/ de rnams skye bar bzhed pa yid // byang chub sems kyi ngo bo yis// rdo rje'i sngagasu mdzad par gyur// rig pa skyes bu'i gzugs dag ni// sngags kyi byin rlabs bla na
80b4(rgyud): med / der ni zhal gsum pa ltar bur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gzigs// de nas mgom po bcom ldan gyi// thugs rjes bzhugs pa las byung ste// byang chub sems ni rab bskor
80b5(rgyud): la lan gsum ched du brjed pa mdzad// bsam mi khyab cing dpag med gang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gas nga // rdo rje byang chub sems gcig las// spyod yul ngar ni rgyur
80b6(rgyud): ba yin// de nas gsang tshul thos pa dang // de 'og gsang ba'i bdag pos ni// khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad la// ji bzhin tshul du de btud zhus// phung po khams la sogs pa'i chos// 'dus
80b7(rgyud): la gang zhig gnas pa'i rnams/ rten 'brel las skyes yin par ni// khyed chos ston par mdzad pas khrums// dman pa'i chos rnams 'di dag ni// zhe sdang la sogs rkyen dang ldan// 'di dag
80b8(rgyud): ltar bde gshegs dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po rigs ma lags// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen de// lus la sogs pa ji ltar 'gyur// gang zhig byi dus skye bo yis// 'di dag 'tshal
81a1(rgyud): ngang mi 'byor//  nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ 'od chen ldan pas bka' stsal pa// ma 'ongs skye bo mthong nas ni// gang zhig khyod kyis dadris pa// le bso leg so sems dpa' cha// 
81a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po khyod lag so// smras don ji lta ji lta bar// de ltar khyod la lung bsten bya// ma 'ongs dus na mi rnams ni// 'jig rten rgyang pan mchog gzhol 'gyur// log par lta ba la gnas te// ci dpa'
81a3(rgyud): bar yang spong bar byed// la la bla dang gir la dga'// dgod dang sgeg la mchog tu gzhol// dri dang phreng ba la dga' zhing // de bzhin 'khrig pa la dgar 'gyur/ rmongs pa la la sdang ba dang // de bzhin gti mu
81a4(rgyud): la rab gzhol// la la de bzhin 'dod chags zhe na// shel gzhan// ngag 'dod par 'gyur// nya dang sha dang de bzhin chang / ga sha dang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni// skyes bu glen pa za byed cing // 
81a5(rgyud): med par sla bcosu sgrogs// ma dang sring mo la sogs pa 'grod min la ni bgrod pa dang // pha dang ma yang gsod pa dang // de bzhin sra ga chags gzhan rnams gsod do// brdzun gyi tshig zhing smrab
81a6(rgyud): dang / khyad ber du yang brku ba dang / gzhan gyi chung ma'i thang 'bro zhing // smad pa gzhan yang byed par 'gyur// la la dam chos spong ba dang // de bzhin mtshams med byengad pa ste/ sna tshogs sdig pa byas nas kyang
81a7(rgyud): sngags pa dngos grub 'dong bar 'gyur// gzer nang drug dang sbyar ba'i dug/ sna tshogs nang ni mi bzang ba// 'di rnams kyis ni gzir gyur nas// zhi ba nyid ni 'dod par 'byug/ 'dor bas byed pa rmongs pa de// mi
81a8(rgyud): bzeng sdig pa byas pas dang // log par lta la mchog gzhol rnams// ngan song gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur// de rnams rje su bzung ba'i phyir// gsang ba 'di ltar bstan pa yin// gang zhig yang
81b1(rgyud): dag thob pa nyid // 'dir mi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i bdag po mkhas rnams kyis// tshul mchog 'di ni rnyed gyur nas// de na gsal yang dag rjed pa dang // de yang nga rgyal dag tu ltung / de
81b2(rgyud): rnams ting 'dzin zhi nyid dang // shes rab nyid kyang shin tu ring // rab tu dga' dang ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor pa ni ngag nyid ces// mngon pa'i nga rgyal la rtag dga'// rgyu dang bcos ma'i chos dang ldan/ mya ngan 'das
81b3(rgyud): rang gzhan 'gro ba// phan tshun dag ni sun yang 'byin// gsang sngags smra ba la brten nas// gcig la gcig ni cod par 'gyur// de rnams bdud kyi byin rlabs kyis// gal te dngos drub phra thob na// des ni mngon
81b4(rgyud): par nga rgyal bas// mkhas pa snam du shes par 'gyur// tshogs pa'i nang du cod pa dang / khyi bzhin kha zas la spyod yul/ rang las 'bras las byung ba yi/ phan pa la ni gnod pa byed// de rnams dge
81b5(rgyud): dang mi dge rnams// bdag cag rnams kyi stobs yin zer// mngon sum sangs rgyas 'dra ba yi// slob dpon smod cing bsnan bkur med// skad cig gcig gis sdang byed cing // de la skad cig
81b6(rgyud): gis rjes chags// khyi dang phag dang khwa rnams kyi// spyod pa dag ni ston par byed// de rnams phan tshun rnam 'tshe bar// / mngon par dag par byed bar 'gyur// gsang ba 'dus pa mi shes par// dam tshig la sogs
81b7(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// gsang ba srung bar mi byed par// tha mam cang du ni ston par byed// 'jig rten la ni smad byas nas/ gzhan dag la yang rab gsal byed// bdag nyid rtsa ba med par ni// dam tshig 'das par
81b8(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// sgra bcas spror ldan gyis bskur bas// rang la rang gi glags rnyed med // de nyid ye shis 'byung ba yi// ting 'dzin de yis shes mi 'gyur// zhes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir// mngon spyod
82a1(rgyud): tu byed par 'gyur// rnal 'byor rang sbyor dman pa yi// sngags pa rnams ni 'grub mi 'gyur// phyi rol bstan bcos la rtag dga'// de yi sbyor la gcig tu mkhas// rang gi dam tshig
82a2(rgyud): yongs spangs nas// lcags kyu med pa bzhin du spyod // sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// de rnams 'tsho ba sgrub par 'gyur// gang du rnyed pa thob 'gyur bas// drim pa'i chos ni ston par bye// de rnams
82a3(rgyud): yang dag sdud byed par// gsang ba dgongs pas bo shad pa yin// dam tshig nyams te gnas pa rnams// 'di yis thams cad dgug par bya// rang gi rjes rig mi shes na// de rnams zhi bar go la 'gyur
82a4(rgyud): de bas rdza su gzung don du// tshul 'di dag ni gyur pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs// gcig tu 'dus par/ 'gyur nasu// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la// rang
82a5(rgyud): mchod de nyid dam tshig sprin// yang dag 'byung bas legs mchod du// phyag 'tshal nas ni 'di skad gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun
82a6(rgyud): bsdus pa// 'dus pa gnyis med rnal 'byor pa'i// nyams dga' rdo rje snying po 'di// de nyid bsdus pa rnams kyi mchog/ de nyi bcom ldan pashad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun la// 
82a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa// gang yang 'di ltar gsol 'debs pa// de bzhin gshegs rnams legaso legs// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs rnams kyang // the tshom skye bar byed
82a8(rgyud): yin na// byang chub ses gzhan ci smos shes// de bzhin gshegs de rnams la gsungs// de nas ngo mtshar rmad byung nas// the tsom thams cad gcod mdzad pa'i// bcom ldan de bzhin gshes/ 
82b1(rgyud): kun gyis// bdag po la ni 'di skang nus// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// yon tam kun gyis phul phyung yang // gtso bo 'dir ni ston mdzad par// ji ltar spro ba mang ba ma gyur// byin gyis brlang ba'i
82b2(rgyud): gnas mdzad de// de bzhin gshegs yid bde la sogs// ye shes rgyu 'bras thob pa'i phyir// de ni yang dag bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po ni// de rnams nu bar mkhyen nas su// ye shes
82b3(rgyud): sgron ma rdo rje grags// ting 'dzin zhe sdang rigs 'byung ba// gtso bos mi bskyod snying po ni// sku gsung thugs ni dang ldan pas// de nas yang dag phyung ba ni// badz+ra d+h+r-ig ces bya ba'i sngags// de nas 'di ni gsungs
82b4(rgyud): kham gyis// na sdang rigs byung las skyes pa// bca pa/ de ni rig pa skye sa bur 'gyur// mi bskyod rgya chen thabs kyis sbyor// zhal gsu ma genag dang dkar dang dmar// bdag nyid chen po
82b5(rgyud): sal yin// rdo rje gsum 'di de bzhin gshegs// bzhugs pa'o/ shes shes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// dam tshig 'byung rdor we yi/ ting 'dzin la gtso bo ni/ 
82b6(rgyud): snyoms par zhums pa nyid du mdzod// de nas ji na jig cas pa'i// snying po de bzhin yang dag phyung // de nas gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang // gti mug rigs byung las skyes pa// rig bcas skyes bur gyur/ 
82b7(rgyud): ba ni/ rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs// dkar dang gnag dang dmar bcas pa'i// zhal gyis mdun du bzhugs par gyur/ de nas rin chen byung ba yoM// dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
82b8(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas bde gshegs kun// bde dang yid bde gyur pa'i phyir// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rigs// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di// de nas rat+na d+h+r-ika ces bya'i// snying po
83a1(rgyud): dpal ldan de che byung // de ni phyung ba cam gyis ni/ rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// ser dang dkar dang gnag pa yi// zhal dang rin chen 'byung ldan ni// rdo rje gsum gyi dadag/ 
83a2(rgyud): bo yi lho phyogs logasu bzhugs par gyur// de yang byang du gzigs gyur ta/ ka/ mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan bdag po de// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig bdag/ 'dod chags chen
83a3(rgyud): po'i las byung ba// rdo rje zhes ni bya ba yi// ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// 'dod chags chen po'i rigs las byung // A ro leka ces bya snying po// rdo rje gsum las de nas byung // de nas byung
83a4(rgyud): ba tsam gyis ni// de 'og bcom ldan gtso bo ni// rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// 'jig rten dbang po 'od dang mtshungs// dmar dang dkar dang gnag pa'i zhal// dang ldan rigs chen
83a5(rgyud): bo yi bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi// nub phyogasu ni bzhugs par gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// don yod dam tshig ces bya ba'i// ting 'dzin rdo rje yang
83a6(rgyud): ngag byung // gtso bo de la snyoms zhugs nas// snying po mchog gi mchog ces bya'o// dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i rigs// snying po pradz+nyA d+h+r-i/ ces pa// rdo rje gsum zhes bya las 'byung // zhes phyung
83a7(rgyud): ba tsam gyis ni don yod rdo rje sbyor ba yi// de nyid mgon po bcom ldan 'das// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can ko/ rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// de bzhin ga
83a8(rgyud): pa'i bdag po yi// phyang phyogasu ni bzhugs par gyur// zhe sdang gti mug rigs dang ni// de bzhini zhishA rin chen dang // 'dod chags dam tshig ces bya ba// 'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrubs pa
83b1(rgyud): de nas khyab bangs rdo rje 'dzin/ dod chags dam tshig 'byung ba yi// ding 'dzin la sgoms zhubs te// rdo rje 'dzin pa btsun mo mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// dam pa dag ni phyung bar 'gyur/ 
83b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gcig pa// yum zhes bya bar yang dag bshad// de ni de bzhin gshegs bdag po// gang phyir lha mo btsun mo mchog/ sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung // de Sha ra ti zhes byar
83b3(rgyud): grags rig pa skyes du shes bya ba'i// de ni bung ming gzugs 'dzin nam// zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs kyis ni// me yi phyog su rnas par bzhugs// de nas rjes mnyes rdo rje brags// sku gsung
83b4(rgyud): thubs rdo rje las byung // ting 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste// rdo rje ga sum las byung ba na// de ni mo thar ti ste// gang phyir de ba ni/ na gshegs pa'i yang // rig pa skyes bu byung ba ste
83b5(rgyud): zhal gsum lta bu'i rnal 'byor ma// gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'a/ ra bas// sangs rgyas kun gyi yid 'ong cig// gsang ba bsdus pi'i sbyor ba yis// bden bral phyogasu rnam par bzhugs
83b6(rgyud): de nas rjes chags rdo rje nas// bya ba rdo rje gsum las skyes// ting 'dzin lnga snyoms pa zhugs nas// bde ba chen po phyung ba ni/ 'di ltar rA ga ra ti byung // zhal gsum pa mi gzugs can de// 
83b7(rgyud): gtso bo bud med gzugs 'dzin pa// de ni rig pa skyes bur gyur// gos med ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo ste// rlung gi phyogs
83b8(rgyud): rnam par bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig can// slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs kun bcu ni mo mchog/ 
84a1(rgyud): zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs panam// badz+ra ti zhes byab/ rdo rje gsum las byung bar gyur// de ni phyung ma thag tu yang / gtso bo rigs pa skyes bur gyur// bud med kyi nig
84a2(rgyud): 'dzin te// dbang ldan phyog su rnam par bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan mgon po de// rnam snang rdo rje las byung ba'i// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la/ dkyil 'khor 'dir ni
84a3(rgyud): gshin rje gshed// khro bo chen po byung ba dang // phyung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// bsnyengs par bya bar shar phyogs bzhugs// de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
84a4(rgyud): kyi rwa mngon byang rdo rje zhes bya yi// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// khro bo chen po phyung ba ni// pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita rdo rje can// de nas dang ldan byung ba ni// rig pa sus bur yang dag phyung // dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba las
84a5(rgyud): 'od chen phur bu'i gzugs lta bu// rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs byed pa// lha yi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs// de nas rin chen 'byung / gnas grags// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// gsu
84a6(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor// rdo rje gsum las khro bo che// pat+tAn+ta kr-ita 'ad bo che// bdag po de nas phyung bar gyur// de nas phyung ba tsam gyis 'dir// gtso bo'i rig pa skyes bur bcas// de bzhin
84a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi'ang // gsung gi tshul du rnam spru'i zhing // gos med ye shes tha med pa// na nas bgags mthar/ nub kyi slar ni zhugs par gyur// bcom ldan nying sna tshogs pa/ 
84a8(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje ting 'dzin la// kun nas snyoms par zhugs nas ni/ de nas gtso bos phyung bar gyur// khro bo chen po rnams byung ba/ kun nas bgegs mthar byed pa ste// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
84b1(rgyud): sbyar ba yis// byang gi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs// de nas dang ldan rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor mchog 'di thos pa dang // mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che// de la slar yang zhus gyur pa// mkha' dang dbyer
84b2(rgyud): mod sbyor gcig cing // dngos med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// dga' ba'i mchog sogs bgyis nas ni// ji ltar de rnams zhu bar 'gyur// 'di dag thog mtha' yod min na// 'di yi gtso bo ji ltar
84b3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// phyogs kyi cha rnams bzhag pa la// 'di ni gang gis rnam par sbyang // gsang ba 'di ni mi srid ces// theg pa gsum po rtog pa dang // so so'i skye bo'i tshig gis kyang // spang ba dag kyang bgyid par
84b4(rgyud): 'gyur// gang zhig nyan thos rnams dang ni/ de bzhin mdo sde las spang sa ba'i// zhe sdang sogs dang 'dod lnga sogs/ de bzhin gshe gas rnams bsten mdzad pa// rjesu spyod dang thun mong
84b5(rgyud): pa'i khya ba de dag phyin ci log/ dga' mtha'i spyod pa de rnams ni// de ban na gshegs de rnam mdzad pa// tshig gcig la ni dpa' med don// gsang ba dam pa 'di dag no// mgon po gang
84b6(rgyud): nig ma 'ongs pa'i// skye bos ji lta 'tshal bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdo rje tshul 'di ni// dgongs pa gsang ba bla med pa// dris pa rnams ni bshad par bya zhe sdang gi/ 
84b7(rgyud): chu bzhin chags/ lus la sogs pa'i phung po lnga// 'di dag bdag med rtogs nas mi rdzogs sangs rgyas ni tshul gsum gnas// pa ts+tshin bcas yin rjes s+ho/ ma
84b8(rgyud): ma yin par bshang / de bani mang gas dus su chur / ni ba na pa 'byor pa yi zag/ ji lta tshongs bde shigs kyi// sgor dazugs brnyan byas ra/ rang 'i cu lta dzu nu ba nam
85a1(rgyud): rnam pas gsung // thugs kyi rnam pas thub su ni// zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung // phung po la sogs chos rnams ni// stong zhing rten 'bral las byung mthong // ye shas nyim shar ba
85a2(rgyud): gzugs// ni las rnal 'byor pa rnams byed kang bas sku gsung thugs rdo rje// grib ma lta bur byung ba yin// de bzhin phung po khams la sogs// dam tshig gcig la rnam par gnas// de nas tshul gsum ngon
85a3(rgyud): gcig pa// zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung // de nas rdo rje tshul ying 'ong // gsang ba'i bdag po mnyan par gyis// stong pa rtan 'brel las byung bar// rnal 'byor pa yi rdo rje nas// na mkha' mtha' yas rnal
85a4(rgyud): 'byor ni// phung po la sogs chos byung ba// lus dang ngag sem/ das kun rtog ni// phung po sogs byung 'byung las gyur// 'di dang dngos meng yang dag sbyar// de las ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur// 'di
85a5(rgyud): ngag ting 'dzin gnyis med sbyor// mi byad rdo rje nying du 'gyur// zab dang rgya che rtog byang chub de rtogs pas ni sems par gyur// 'di ngag na mkha' mtshungs gyur pa/ chen po zhes bya shes byang pa'o// 
85a6(rgyud): de la rtogs pa mtha' yas pa// rdo rje theg par ston pa yin// ting 'dzin ni nga nyid las// rdo rje'i theg pa byung ba yin// 'di las 'jig rten 'das 'gyur zhing // de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das// dgengs
85a7(rgyud): don de bzhin nyid gcig pu// gsang ba 'jig rten pa zhes bshad// ma skyes pa las byung ba ni// kun rdzob dang ni don dam yin// bdud gyur lha yi bur bshad de// phung po nyon mongs 'chi bdag bcas// 'di
85a8(rgyud): las dngos med pas rgyal bas// rgyal ba'i rdo rjer rnam par bshad// lus sogs phyi yi phung por bshang 'byung dang 'byung las gyur bshang gang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ 
85b1(rgyud): 'di dag rdo rje'i rigs can 'gyur// dngos po gang dang gang dag gis// phur po lnga po brtags 'gyur ba// de rnams las gyur pa/ de rnams de bzhin yang dag dmigs// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
85b2(rgyud): su 'gyur// ji ltar me longs mtshungs gsal ba// dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid can// der ni bdag gis bdag nyid mthong // dkyil 'khor mchog 'gyur rnal 'byol pa// phung po de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur
85b3(rgyud): de bzhin nyid las spros byas pa// chos kyi sku can rgyal ba yi// mchod pa chen por nga 'gyuraro// 'di ni spos dang bsdus pa dang / de ni dga' bar yongasu grags// sems can gang zhig longs spong cig/ de ni
85b4(rgyud): gsol 'debs zhes bshad // yang dag shes rab thabs pa/ shis te// mkha' dbyings dbyer meng rab sbyor ba'i// de ni 'odang chags che tshul 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa ni mngon bzhugs pa'o// 
85b5(rgyud): rdo rje theg pa rnal 'byor cher// bdag nyid nges par sbyor ba ba/ nga/ dbang po thams bang bde skyed pa'i// yod bde ba ni skyel 'gyur// zhal gsum rnam thar gsum du gang // mthong zhing
85b6(rgyud): de la phung po sogs// lha yi bdag nyid rig 'gyur ro// de nyid gsum du bshad pa yin// dngos med pa ni lam gyi mchog mya ngan 'das par gnyis med 'jug/ 'on kyang so sor 'gyur ste// chos sku las zhe sdang
85b7(rgyud): byur/ bcom ldan bdag po de nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung shing // mya ngan 'das tshul rdo rje can// nga nying bdag po kun byeng pa'o// dam tshig la sogs 'byung ba'i chos// rang gi rig ber ma gyur kya
85b8(rgyud): ngar ni gnas pa yang dag bshad // de ni gti mug de bzhin sems// gang gi ji ltar brtags chos kyis/ longs spyod rdzogs zhes bya byed pa// da ni yid bzhin rin chen 'byung / rin chen chen po'i rigs kyi gtso/ 
86a1(rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags ni// kun ma khyen ye shes las byung ba// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor gyur pa// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ ji ltar 'dam dbus pad+ma ni/ da yi nyes pas
86a2(rgyud): gos mi 'gyur// de bzhin rnal 'byor rig pa mchog 'dong ba kun la nye bar spyod// 'gro ba gcig tu 'dod pa khyab// de nyid rdo rje rigs mchog yin// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste// gsum po de dag mdor bsdus
86a3(rgyud): pa'i zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags rdo rje dga' ba'i mtha' can gtso// ngan 'gro gsum 'don pas bud med// gcig pu yin yang du mar gyur// gsum po yang dang 'dug gyur pa// gshin rje shes rab gyur
86a4(rgyud): de bzhin// pad+ma bgegs 'gyur khro'o ste// mthar byed mtha' yi ming can no// 'jug pa la sogs gsum nyid la// phung por grags te de bzhin gshegs// sgeg byed gshin rje gshed kyis kyang / 
86a5(rgyud): thams cad 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// rdo rje dam tshig skrag bar byed// de bzhin shes rab mthar byed gtso// pad+mo'ang gsung na sa bya bar gyur// 'chi bral rnal 'byor grub pa yin// bgegs mthar
86a6(rgyud): byed kyang thugs kyi gtso// rigs pa'i bdag nyid can bdag po// 'di ltar rtag spyod rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba'i lus kyis rnam par spyod// dgongs pa lung ston la gnas par// gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur pa// 
86a7(rgyud): des ni de bzhin bya ba dang // de nas gsang ba yang dag 'byung // nub zho zas kyis bu bso bzhin// srid pa gsum na bcom ldan gtso// sems can bsam dbang ji bzhin du// chos kyi bdud rtsis tshim par
86a8(rgyud): mdzad chos dang longs spyod sprul ba yi/ sku gsum gcig tu sbyor ba las// bcom ldan gsang ba dgongs mdzad pa ka / bden pa ma yin brdzun pa'ang min// zhe sdang gti mug len chen dang / 'dod chags
86b1(rgyud): sna tshogs rigs byung ba// dgongs pa'i rigs kyi brdar gyur pas/ gleng gzhi yin nga po'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag la// slar yang de bzhin gshegs bkun// lhag par mchod pa byas nas ni/ 
86b2(rgyud): thub chen de la 'di skad gsol// dgongs pa'i rdo rje dam pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// gsang ba bcom ldan pa shung du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi sa zhu ba yang
86b3(rgyud): ngag thugs chud cing // byang chub sems dpa' yongs rtog pa// thub nyid kyi ni rnam mkhyen pa// de nas byang chub sems kun la// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs// lus sems de dang 'dra ba dang // de bzhin
86b4(rgyud): ngag ni tshig brjod blta'i// byang chub sem sa bla med pa/ khye/ du kun gyis ni bskyed par bya// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la// sto/ na pas ji bzhin ston par mdzad// de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ 
86b5(rgyud): sku dang thugs dang de bzhin gsung ka/ de 'dra'i tshul du sbyar/ nas ni// sku byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ sku gsu/ nga thugs rdo rje can la/ cheng du brjod pa chang du brjod// e ma kun tu
86b6(rgyud): bzang po yi// rten cing 'brel 'byung las skyes pa// skye bo meng ba'i tshul gyis ni// skye ba 'dir ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje gsum// de bzhin gshegs
86b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mngon rdzogs byang chub rdo rje yi/ ting 'dzin la sdoms zhugs nos// dang ldan byang chub sems 'di gsungs// dngos po med pa'i dngos gnas na/ dngos dang dngos med gnyi ga'ang min// de ltar ngos
86b8(rgyud): po mngog med pas// sgom pa ngos por yong ma yin// de nas dang ldan rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje grags ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// de bzhin gshes
87a1(rgyud): bdun gyi chos pabang nga dmongs pa rdo rje ban byang chub sems ni bams cangs de'i yang ngas bka' sprul po dag pa de bzhin gshegs kun gyi phung po khams soms mas
87a2(rgyud): spangs shing gzug dang 'dzin pa las grol ba chos bdag med pa'i stong nyid can// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs pas rten cing 'brel 'byung ming can te/ thog ma med nas ma skyes bdag rang sems mnyam
87a3(rgyud): pa nyid kyang yin// de nas mi bskyod de bzhin sems/ kun gyi gnyis med mi bzad pa'i// ye shes ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs te// byang chub sems ni 'di gsung so// dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas// phung por grags
87a4(rgyud): ba'i chos nyid med// namakha' ltar bur blta dka' bar// bdag med byang chub ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan do// na mtsho/ ga dpal bdag meng rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs
87a5(rgyud): nas// byang chub sems 'di rab tu gsungs// chos rnam sa thams cad dngos med cing // chos kyis kyi mtshan nyid rnam spangs ba// bdag med chos las yang dag 'byung / byang chub tshul 'di bstan po
87a6(rgyud): de nas 'od dpa' med mtshan can// ye shes 'bar ba sgron rdo rje'i// ting 'dzin la sdoms zhugs te/ byang chub sems ni 'di gsung so/ ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// dngos po med cing sdom pa'ang mang / rnam
87a7(rgyud): mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis// dngos po zhes ni rab tu bshad // de nas de bzhin gdon mi za// zil gyis banon pa'i rdo rje yi// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ byang chub sems ni 'di gsung so// chos 'di rang ba
87a8(rgyud): / 'odagasal zhing // gzong nas dag pas mkha' dang mtshungs/ byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// byang chub sems ni yin par bshad // de nas dang ldan rdo rje 'dzin// byang chub sems ni thos pa dang gang rdo
87b1(rgyud): ba'i don ni rangab bshad bar// rnam par snang mdzad chel gsungs// dngos po med cing dmigs meng ba// byang chub sems dpa' mkha' dang mtshungs// gsang ba'i tshul ni 'di thos nas/ dang po yi ni rtog pa ste// lus la
87b2(rgyud): sogs pa gsung sbyor bas// sems ni de rnams skyed par byed// yang dag byang chub du ma'i mthar// 'di la so so skye bo smra/ thub pa'i gsung ni de rnams la// rang gi sku bzhin 'dzin par byed // bsam pa'i dbang ni ji bzhin
87b3(rgyud): du/ 'gro ba'i don du bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'di rnam par snang mdzad thub pa che// legs shes lan gsum gsungs nas ni// lag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs// rnam par mi rtog don de nyid // rab tu
87b4(rgyud): phyed ste bshad par bya/ tshig tu brjod pa dmigs pa rab shang / brda' dang don dam pa yin no// rkyen dang nyan thos rnams kyis kyang // mdo dang gsang sngags spyod rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
87b5(rgyud): pa yi// byang chub sems 'di bla na med// de bzhin yang dag sbyor ba 'di// dgongs pa'i gsang dabla na mang ka gnyis med dam/ tshig rdo rje dang // pad+ma de las skyed par byed// tshig tu brjod pa thun mong ste
87b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku ni dmigs can yin// gsang sngags de nyid ces bya brda'// de bzhin nyid ni don dam pa'o// dang po gcig ni dgung bus na// gang zhing bcu yis ma bcings pa/ de ni bcings med zhes bya ste/ de shes
87b7(rgyud): pa ni mchog gi gnas// dbyangs dang gsal byed yi ge ste// grangs dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa// as bcings phan chun sbyor ba las// rang gis shes te 'gro ba'i bla// gang zhig shes pa rnam grol ba// 'bras
87b8(rgyud): bu lun tshogs grub 'dod pa// de ni de nyid grub 'dong ba/ gzugs med pas ni gzugs spangs pa/ 'byung ba'i mtha' ni yang dag ldan// cha la sogs pa bcu drug gnas// lnga pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ bzhin
88a1(rgyud): gsum du nges par sbyar/ yi ge a bcas ring po rababs// yom na sbyor sogs phyis dang mtshungs// thung ngu ma lus pab tu 'gyur// gcig min du ma ma yin no// ya yi don/ 
88a2(rgyud): gyis gang yang rung // bya ba'i dngos grub 'dod gyur pakar la sogs pa gsum nyid kyis/ 'gro 'i'i don la rab tu 'jug yi ge gang nang sngar bshad dang // gang yang mngon du phyogs pa rnams// bud med
88a3(rgyud): skyes pa ma ning ste/ khams la sogs par rab tu brtag/ 'og nas steng du bcas par ni// shes nas blos ni nges par sbyar// drug bshang bzhi dang gsum dang gcig/ dngos med ngo bo gcig las byung / de ni
88a4(rgyud): lo sogs don sbyar na// dus gsum shes pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur// mkhas pas sgyu ma mig 'phrul bzhin// 'gro ba rnam ni sgyu mthar bya// brjod pa yi ni sngags 'di dag / dngos med ngo bo las byung ba/ 
88a5(rgyud): de ni yongasu gyur po'i gzugs// lha runye bar mtshon pa gang // / brda' yis gsum gnas pa// rang bzhin bzlas pa'i ma ni nying do// ming med brjid du med pa ste/ byang chub sems mchog 'di
88a6(rgyud): yi no// gsum po de nyid gcig gyur pa// 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med// 'gag med rab tu zhi ba ste// rtag dang chad pa rnam spangs pa// dus gsum mkhyen pas ma byas pa'i// rtog pa na mkha' dbyer med mtshan
88a7(rgyud): 'di nyid kho na don dam ste// so sor rang rig mtshan nyid do// de 'di sems can kun zhes bya'i// sangs rgyas byang chub ngo bo nyid/ byang chub sems gcig yang dag 'byung // rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin cam/ 
88a8(rgyud): gang 'di byang chub sems dag nyid// rnal 'byor pa ni nyi 'drar 'gyur// 'di ni rnam rtog kun bral yang // rigs kun gyi 'jug par 'gyur sreg dang skams dang bde can dang // kun zar 'jug pa'i me banan
88b1(rgyud): 'di ni lhas kyang mchod bya bar// sems can kun la rnam par gnas// byang chub sems 'dod bdag nyid de// 'dra ba bu gcig bzhin lta zhing // gang zhig bdag dang mnyam gnas pa// byams pa chen po
88b2(rgyud): de bsnyung ba// phyin ci ma log 'di mthong nas// byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung // des ni snying rje cher gyur nas// des ni 'khor ba nges par 'joms// sems can kun dang de bzhin ngadag/ byang chub sem
88b3(rgyud): las mi mthong na// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i don byeng po// de las dga' ba skye bar 'gyur// 'khor ba dngos po yod min la// sems can rnamasas kyang de dang 'dra// byang chub sems ni mthong nas ni// btang sgom
88b4(rgyud): chen por gyur pa yin// nga nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// thos pa'i byang chub sems dran zhing // rnam par snang mdzad che la nus// 'khor dang gcig shos zhes bya ba 'di kun byang chub sem
88b5(rgyud): yin na// ji ltar so sor gyur nas ni// phan tshun 'gal bar rab tu gnas// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid la// gnyi su 'gog byed gang yang mang // gang zhig nor bu gcig las byung // mi
88b6(rgyud): mthun phyogasu ji ltar snang // dman dang bar ma de bzhin mchog/ 'khor bar nyon mongs mi bzang pas// sems can kha gcig gi zor ba dang // byang chub sems la'ang sbyar bar 'gyur// de ltar
88b7(rgyud): rnam rtog kun rtog par// ma 'ongs skye bo bgyid 'gyur gyi/ rten cing 'brel 'byung las byung ba// 'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyuraro// dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la/ byis pa rnams ni rtsod par 'gyur
88b8(rgyud): de rnams cod pa med pa'i phyir// dgongs pa bshad par mdzad du gsol// de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje can la gsang dgongs pa// shin tu rnyed dka' byang chub sems
89a1(rgyud): de nas yang dag bka' stsal to// phyi ma'i mtha gang stong pa 'icig/ sngon gyi mthar drug de bzhi mate/ sem se mngon du bya ma ni/ ci dga' bar ni bya ba yin// sems ni nga yis ma
89a2(rgyud): mthong bas/ lta ba so sor gyur pa yin// de bas de rnams 'khor ba ru// 'gro ba drug gi ming du gyuranges na yang tshangs pa khyab 'jug dang // dbang phyug che la kun tu rten// zla ba'i ma bya ba yi// kun tu spyod pa de rnams byed// 
89a3(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gsum par bshad dang // dga' ldan gyi ni gnas ngag dang // de bzhin gzhan dag dmyal bar yang // lta bas skad cig dag gis 'gro// yi dwags su yang 'gro ba dang // 'gro ba sna tshogs dag tu 'gro// gang tshe ma
89a4(rgyud): rig kun brtan pas// bdag nyid kyang ni mi shes so// 'du shes dacan dang 'du shes med// sems can du brtags 'di gnas pa// da rnams rlung las byung ba ste/ rlung las slar yang 'gag pa yin/ 
89a5(rgyud): nyin dang mtshan ma'i cha yis kyang // rang gi rnam par rtog par ltung / de nas 'khor bar skrag bzhin du// sna tshogs 'gro bde dag 'gro// mi rtog pa yi sems de ni// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas
89a6(rgyud): gyur kyang // da ni phyin ci log gyur pas// khyi dang lce spyang glang po dang // sems de ltar yang 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin du ni phag nyid dang // mi yi rigs ni smig mkhan dang // sme sha can dang rigs ngan dang / 
89a7(rgyud): bza' dang mi bza' bya kun tu// byang chub sems de skye bar 'gyur// bram ze la sogs 'jig rten shes// byang chub sems las 'byung bar 'gyur/ phung sogs dngos po med 'gyur las// rang gi myong ba shes par
89a8(rgyud): 'gyur// de ni 'jig rten shes zhes bai shang / 'jig rten pa ni byang chub sems// nye bar dmig pa'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas sku ru 'ang 'byung ste// sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nying // tshig gis brjod pa tsam
89b1(rgyud): du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje snying po'i don gsungs pa// 'gro ba'i bla ma gcig pu la// phyag 'tshal nas ni slar gsol pa/ 'jig rten pa yi lung nyid ni// byang chub sems ni rab gsungs nas/ 
89b2(rgyud): ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa// ma 'ongs pa yis ji ltar rtogs// lta ba thams cad rab spyang phyir/ khyed kyi chos rnam ston mdzad na// ji ltar byang chub sems de nying // lta ba de ni rab bstan 'gyur// dgongs pa
89b3(rgyud): tshig la rmongs pa rnams// gsungs pa'i don ni ma rtogs nas// gsungs pa 'di las gzhan min zhes// de ni dri bzhin sgrar 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa// khyad gsung dgongs pa
89b4(rgyud): ma rtogs pa 'dri bar byed pa legs nas/ byang chub sems ni/ rlung gyur cing / nam pa' la ni rnam gnas pa// sems can dun gyi de sreg gyur gang // lnga yi bdag zhing bdag cang bcu ming can// rten 'brel
89b5(rgyud): bcu gnyis zhes grags pa/ ngo bo nyid rnam gsum du 'gyur// rlung zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems// dbang po kun gyi gtso bdi yin// ji lta ra mi mngon pa ba las// rtag tu gsal bar brjod pa yin// 'gro ba yul so// 
89b6(rgyud): las byed pa/ 'dir ni de la brtan pa yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang de bzhin mngon spyod rnams// de nyid gsum gnas la rten nas// de kun byang chub sems kyis byed// ji srid 'jig rten brtags pa dang // de bzhin
89b7(rgyud): btags pa sna tshogs rnams// rnam rtog byang chub sems ces pa'i// rlung las rtag tu 'byung ba yin// bde sdug la sogs chos rnams kyi// sa bon lta bur bshad pa yin// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo 'di ka/ phung sogs gnyis
89b8(rgyud): meng mkha' dang mnyam// shes rab thabs dang sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni 'gro bar 'gyur// klog dang bsam gtan rnam spangs par// bdag por bdag nyid bzlos pa de// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis// nyi zla rab tu spor
90a1(rgyud): ba yis// dngos po med par 'gro khyab pa// byang chub sems kyi rlung gcig pu// dge dang mi dge 'bras spangs nas// rnam par 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin// 'gro ba'i don ni shes pas kyang / ming ni
90a2(rgyud): bzhin nyid ces bya// dbyangs kyi thung ngu nyin mor bshad// ring po mtshan mo yin par b.rashad// dbyangs dang gsal byed dbye ba las// de nyid ming las sbyar bar bya// e ma'o 'gro ba'i bya ba byung // de nyid gzhan las de nyid
90a3(rgyud): gsal// de las 'jig rten pa yi brda'// myur du mngon par shes par 'gyur// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos ni// byang chub sems 'di thos pa dang // gtso bo rnam snang chen po las// khyab bdag la ni slar gsol pa// 
90a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad skyed pa'o// sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni/ de bas dngos po med gyur kyang // srid pa dag tu rab tu grags// byang chub sems ni mkha' mnyam pa// legs par rjesu myong mdzad pa/ 
90a5(rgyud): 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa'o// skye bo mchog lang bstan gsol// sgrub du/ yi ni thabs tsam nig/ shes nas rgyud la rgyab kyis phyogs/ dzi ltar bdag ni slob dpon zhes/ ma 'ongs pa ni smra bar 'gyur/ 
90a6(rgyud): bdag gi tshig ni 'di nyid dag/ yin zhes smra zhing byas pa 'jig/ des ni dgongs byang chub sems// ji bzhin don du mi sheso// de bzhin 'jig rten pa rnams ni// skal mad chos kun rnam spangs la// rigs pa yang ni mi mdzad
90a7(rgyud): bas/ de rnams la yang gnas med 'gyur// de bas byang chub sems bdud rtsi// de ni smra bar rigs pa yin// 'brel ba'i nyi ma thob pa ni// ma 'ongs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// grags ldan rdordzo
90a8(rgyud): 'dzin pa las// byang chub sems kyi nges pa'i don// slar yang de nyid la gsungs pa// nang na ma yin phyir rol min// gzhig ming du'ang 'gyur ma yin// rtag pa ma yin skad cig min// de ni so so rang rig yin// mi rtag nam
90b1(rgyud): mkha' dri bzhin du/ byang chub sems ni rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshag pa 'gro ba'i don// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byung // 'das dang ma 'ongs pa nyid dang // da ltar zhes ni byang dang // sangs rgyas sku yang 'byung 'gyur ba// don dam gcig
90b2(rgyud): ni kun rdzob yin// rig byang dus dang me yi sgra/ nyi zla rlung gi gzugs can te// bzhi phyed gsum pa dag las byung // byang chub sems gcig dbye ba nyid// de ni shes rab thabs zung 'brel// de bzhin pade byed 'dzin pa dang kaha ni so
90b3(rgyud): la gnas pa yang / gnas skabs ji skad de bzhin du// ming ni yod pa ma yin pa// da 'di byang chub semasu 'gyur// rdo rje nang du zhugs gyur pa/ bsam bya'i snying po'ang de nyid yin// lhong pa gnas zhes bya ba ni// tsheg drag bcwa
90b4(rgyud): pa'i rlung yino// rang nyid lhod par byed pa'i mchog nga ni srog dbang yid kyang yin// / nga rgyal dang ni de'izhin blo// de dang ldan pa byang chub sems bshir// grags cha las yang dag byung // yod med rab tu zhi ba tsam/ 
90b5(rgyud): dngos po med pa'i sems 'di ni// rang rig gcig pu'i spyod yul yin/ de nyid don ni rig byed pa// dgongs pas yang dag bshad pa yin// de nas ga sang ba'i dgongs pa 'di/ chos kyi yi ge mchog thos nas/ 
90b6(rgyud): byams pa zhes la sogs pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ngo mtshar smad 'byung legs skyes nas// ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos// a ma'o chos ni sngon mdzad pa// dngos kun
90b7(rgyud): dag pa'i don gcig pu// dag pa'i de nyid don dag ster// rnam par mi rtog mkha' mtshungs bshad// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med chos las yang dag byung // byang cho ga ni rdzogs byed pa// de ba
90b8(rgyud): med cing dmigasu med/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tsha'o// kun bzang gcig las yang dag byung // dgongs don byang chub ster ba po// byang chub spyod mchog rdo rje mchog/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tsha lo// dag pa de
91a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// rdo rje gsum ni rang bzhin gcig byang chub sems la phyag 'tsha'o// dgongs pa lung ston la dang bar// gang gis yid ni bzod
91a2(rgyud): gyur pa// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las// des ni de bzhin bya ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las/ yang dag byang chub sems bshad pa// le'u gnyis pa yin par bshad/ 
91a3(rgyud): de nas de nyid gsang rdo rje// gsum dang tshul gsum lam gsum mchog/ rnam thar gsum dang dkon mchog gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkongad ba// 'phro ba'i sprin gyi rdo rje
91a4(rgyud): ngag ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de nas rdo rje 'dzin la gsungs// rdo rje bkod pa mchog 'di yi// le'u brtul zhugs bzang po zhon// da'adi ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun// phra mo rnal 'byor dag bzhugs// 
91a5(rgyud): ni gcig dang yang dag ldan// shUn+ya tA ni gnyis pa ste// dz+nyA na no/ sa ni gsum pa yin// badz+ra zhes bya ba ni pa'o// sa thA ba at+ma k+ShoHpar grags/ ma thegs pa drug par brjod kau ltar bder gshegs
91a6(rgyud): drug pa ni// skye bo mchog la bstan pa yin// oM shU n+tu tA zung dang po'o// dz+nyA na badz+ra gnyis pa yin// swa b+hA ba At+ma ko h+yaM gyur// de nyid gsum ni 'dir brtags pa'o// de nyid gsum ni gcig gyur par// mi gsal gsal
91a7(rgyud): ba'i ming can no// mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni// 'od zer sprin gyin tshogs chags chen po// yi ge ma yi 'od kyis khyab// kun nas yongasu zlum po'o// 'dod yon lnga yis kun tu khyab// mchod pa rnam pa lngas
91a8(rgyud): rgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su// dbusu gzugs ni bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad sa rgya mchog/ nga nyid gsum gyi rdo rjes mtshan// yang na rdo rje gsum mgon gyi// phyag rgya yang ni rnam par sgom// mi
91b1(rgyud): bskod pa yi phyag rgya // chogs ni gnyis med sbyor ba dang / dkon mtshogs dpal gyi rgya chen dang / tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang // de bzhin don yong gzugs can rgya sangs rgyas kyil 'khor dag tu sgom/ rdo rje tu
91b2(rgyud): gcig rdo rje can// in+d+ra ni la'i mdog 'dra ba// rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams// rnam par gtsigs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab tu 'khrigs// de ni bya
91b3(rgyud): rdo rje che// rtse mo dgu pa rnam par sgom// shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// thor tshugs cod pan dag gis rgyan// rab 'bar lag na 'khor lo bsnams/ sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// mar gang ta yi 'od 'dra ba// rdo rje
91b4(rgyud): 'bar bas rnam par rgyan// 'bar zhing 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis khyab// rin chen de la rnam par sgom// 'dod chags chen po rdo rje can// pad+ma ra ga'i mdog 'dra zhing // thor tshugs cod pan ngag gis rgyan// phyag na pad+ma
91b5(rgyud): bsnams par sdom// sna tshogs rdo rje gdon miza// 'od chen sna lnga 'i 'od 'dra ba// zhi ba sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du/ phyag na ral gri bsnams par sgom// de ltar rnal 'byor ba shang ba dag gsang ba'i bdan
91b6(rgyud): pos thos nas ni// phra mo'i rnal 'byor pa cha dag kyang // de bzhin gshegs bdag la zhus pa// phung po khams sogs sbyor ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal na// mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du nga rnams kyang
91b7(rgyud): ni ji ltar 'gyur// gcig shos phyi rol du bsgom pa/ dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas ming can ni// dngos po meng pa'i dngos po la// sgom pa po rnams ji ltar brtag/ mgon po pha mo'i rnal 'byor 'di// dkyil 'khor gang zhig bka' stsal
91b8(rgyud): bas gang zhig ma 'ongs pa rnams ni// 'di ltar mchog du'ang so mni 'tshal// lag na rdo rje grags ldan pa/ phra mo'i rnal 'byor de zhing skyes/ 'gro ba gnyis med spyod ba yis// phra ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin/ rnam lnga
92a1(rgyud): mngon par byang chub bdi// ma 'ongs skye ba rgyur gyung te/ chos ni yang dag sdung 'gyur gang // ji lA ji ltar ston par byed/ phung po nyid ni sangs rgyas gyur// byang chub don gyi rkyen las zung // de yang de bzhin gshegs/ 
92a2(rgyud): bshad pa// de nyid gnyis maud sbyang bas so// ston dang 'jog pa pa 'di ni// blo yi dngos grub sbyin pa pa// khog mtha' med pa nal 'byor ni// phra mo shes ni bya bar brtag mi gsal gsal bar yang dag sbyor/ dngos meng ngo bo las skyes pa'o// 
92a3(rgyud): gzod ma nyid nas rang grub pa// gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa// rten 'brel chos zhes grags pa ste// dngos po thams cad gcig tu byung // bdag nyid 'di 'drar byas nas ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// dmar dang gnag dang
92a4(rgyud): de bzhin ser// dkar po nyid ni mdo ru ste// bzhi bzhi gcig tu sbyor ba yang / gos dkar la sogs yang dag bri/ de rnams dbus su lha mor bcas// zhi sbyor mchog dang mchog min dang / steng dang bad ka ma'am dnga'o// 
92a5(rgyud): ji lta ji ltar gos dkar sogs// me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang chu sta so// so'i dkyil 'khor la// bco brgyad dag tu yang dag bshad// de yang 'di nyid dag la bshad// ji ltar 'o ma khyad par ni/ mar sar gnas par gyur pa
92a6(rgyud): yin/ de bzhin gos dkar la sogs la// zhi ba nyid ni de gnas so// gzugs la sogs pa nang gi chos// mthong ba de ni lhag mthong yin// mi bskyod la sogs grangs ji bzhin// rtog pa dag ni zhi gnas yin// 'di gnyis dngos po med pa'i
92a7(rgyud): bdag/ de bzhin nyid ni ni zhes bya// de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'jog/ sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs par bya// rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngub dbyung // sbyor ba de nyid gcig pa nyid// shes rab thabs la gnas nas ni// sngags kyi yan lag ma
92a8(rgyud): nyams bzlas// bya ba thams cad nyid du yang // rnal 'byor rig pas nyal sogs la// ming med brjod du med pa dang // dus gsum 'das pa rtag tu bzla/ gos dkar la sogs bzlas pa shang ba/ brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lda/ 
92b1(rgyud): bzhi pa legs par bsgres pa yi sbyor bzhis bsdus pas brgya phrag dgu// dgu brgya dab tu gang bstan pag/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rim gyis ni// rini so sor 'byung ba las// mi khri gcig stong drug brgya'o// de 'dir gsang ba dgo
92b2(rgyud): pa yis// phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa yin// klog dang bsam gtan med mod kyi// 'on kyang bzlas pa yin par bshad// de ltar rnam pa mang ba yi// 'gro la phan pa'i gsung thos nas// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la// 
92b3(rgyud): rje can gyis slar yang zhus/ gang zhig bsgoms na ma 'ongs 'gro// thams sa cad mi rtog par 'gyur ba// rdo rje gsum gyi snying po mchog N+DI gribashad du gsol// de nyid gsum gnyis mang sbyor ba// de ni phra mo'i rdo rje sgom// myur ba
92b4(rgyud): la sogs gsum spangs pa'i// rnal 'byor par yang bdag bag/ 'gyur// de ni bdag rig yid ches shing // zhi ba nyid ni mi shes 'gyur// / phra mo'i rnal 'byor gtso spangs te// log pa'i rnal 'byor kun tu bsten
92b5(rgyud): sten pa po yi 'byor ba zhing // phra mo zhes bya de nyid ni// ma 'ongs dus na spongs 'gyur ba// de nyid de ni nges par byed// de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i// lung bstan pa ni gsan pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun
92b6(rgyud): bdag po/ chos nyid ngo bo nyid ces bya'i// ting 'dzin de kun nas ni// snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzad/ dang ldan snyoms par zhugs mdzad nas// gsang sngags 'di ni bka' stsal to// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rjer bshad/ khyad
92b7(rgyud): par duni byir rlab pa/ gnyis med rdo rje gsum sbyor bas// de ni yang dag bshad par bya// oM ni dang por shes par bya// d+harma zhes bya gnyis pa'o// d+hA d+hu zhes bya gsum par bshad// swa b+hA bar grags bzhi pa'o// At+ma ko ni lnga pa
92b8(rgyud): yin ma du gyu drug par dod / sngags 'odo brjod nas ngo dog tu/ sdom pa dag zhing can gyis snyoma'i chen 'ang ba sna lnga ga yungs ga rtson 'bru tshong tsam/ zhams ngapa'i ri ring tse mo ma/ rnal 'byor pa yis rtam/ 
93a1(rgyud): par sgom// rin chen mi g.yor gyur nas spro// mi g.yor ma gyur spro mi bya// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od 'dra ba// mchog rab sprin rnams spro bar bya// 'khor lo rdo rje sprin chen dang // pad+ma ral gri mtshon cha mchog/ 
93a2(rgyud): ngachub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams/ spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyi spro// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// bzlas dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba yang // pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu sgon/ rin chen
93a3(rgyud): lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du// dngos la brtson pas rin chen sgom// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las byung ba// nam pa'i dkyil 'khor du dri bya// 'di dag sangs rgyas rab mchog gi/ phra mo rdo rje gsum sgrub pa'o// rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba
93a4(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o// dgongs pa gsang ba zhes pa yi/ lung stonangs pa 'di la ni// gang gis sems ni 'azong gyur pa// / de ni de bzhin byed pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang rdo rje
93a5(rgyud): phra mo de nyid las/ 'di ni rdo rje bkod pa'i mchog le'u gsum pa nyid yino// // de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad // dan su med par gyur nas ni// slar yang rdo rje gsum bdag la// bstod pas
93a6(rgyud): de rnams gsol ba 'debs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// zhi ba gnas rnams mchog gyur pa/ chos kun gcig tu bdag med ga dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bshad du gsol// yongasu rdzogs par yang dag rgyan// mtsha
93a7(rgyud): rnams kun gyis mtshan pa'o// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// ye shes spyod pa'i don las byung // zhi ba'i chos ni sbyong ba po// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dngos mchog dkyil 'tsho
93a8(rgyud): bshang du gsol// rang bzhin gyis ni dri med dag/ sems ni kun tu bzang po nyid// sems can kun gcig che ba'i mchog dkyil 'khor snying po bshang du gsol// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ khams gcig 'as
93b1(rgyud): ni gsum pa'o// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje mchog 'jig rten gsum gyis ston pa'o// nyams dbu' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas de bzhin gshegs pa kun dag la/ thubs de dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste/ dkyil 'khor
93b2(rgyud): dam pa bka' stsal to// de nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog rdo rje ye shes rab 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya// 'di ni gsal ba'i bdag nyid mchog/ legs spyil de bzhin nyid bsdu
93b3(rgyud): 'o// sna tshogs lung gi mtshan ma ni// mtshan ma bzang por de bshad // kun rdzob dang ni don dam ngag/ gnyis med pa mdzes pa yin// shes rab 'di ni thig yin te// thabs ni de yi rje su 'jug pa'o// shes rab thabs kyi theg gcig gis
93b4(rgyud): chos dang longs spyod rdzogs mchog ni// sems kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab ste// rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa// 'phags pa'i bden bzhi ngos bzhi ste// tshangs pa'i gnas pa zhi grwa bzhi yin// bsnga dngos bzhi grags
93b5(rgyud): sgo yin te/ re re 'ong bzhi'i ming can no// chos kyi de tid don gyi brda' 'kho/ rwa mo'i nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// mi byed ye shes mtshan ma ste/ rdo rje in+d+ra nI la rgya/ rnam pa lnga yis rab bye 'i// rtse ma 'khor ba 'jig
93b6(rgyud): byed pa'o// shar nas me 'ong rnga za ni/ 'khor lo 'bar ba'i 'od kyis rgyan// lho ru ku namanyam ye shes yin// gcig gi ming can rin po che// nub tu so sor rtog pad+ma/ bdA rA ga'i 'od 'drag/ byang du gong ma'i sems gang yin/ 'gro'i
93b7(rgyud): nam rtog 'joms byed pa/ bya ba sgrub pa ral grir 'gyur// 'od 'pho 'bar ba 'dra ba'i mdog/ shar lho byams pa'ang spyan yin te// sprin sngon dang ni mnyam pa'i 'od/ lho nub snying rje zhes bya ba/ mA ma kI ni rigs rdo rje// nub byang bad+ma
93b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba// dga' ba legs par gnas pa bzhin// byang shar ud pal ltar snang ba'i// btang snyoms bcas pa sngon po 'dra/ de bzhin shar sgor sbyin pa ni// tho ba mdangs ldan 'od dang bcas// de bzhin snyan smra zhes grags pa/ 
94a1(rgyud): dbyig pa 'ong bzang rdo rje 'bar// nub du don spyod ces bya ba/ rtag mgrin gyi ni pad+ma'o// don 'thun pa ni rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'khyil pa'i rdo rje can// phyag rgya dgong pa'i mtshan nyid de// 'di ni legs par
94a2(rgyud): bshad pa yin// ji ltar dbyibs kyis mchod pa ni// rnam gsum bsgoms pas 'gyur ba yin// dang por chen po yod pa yi// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// de ltar mkha' dang mtshungs gyur dang // shes nas 'gro la
94a3(rgyud): phan par 'gyur// rdo rje gsum dang lhan cig 'byung // de tshe zla gzer phreng ba yi// skad cig la sogs dus dbye bas// le grangs bcu drug pa yi ming // ma skyes par 'byung zhi ba ni// bud med zhes ni nges par bshad// zhi ba'i chos
94a4(rgyud): dang rjes dran pa// mdangs bzang 'od ni yin par gsungs// rten 'brel bag chag/ sa dri yin te// ye shes kha phye me tog go// dngos po med pa rigs yin te// kun mkhyen ye shes dbus nyid do// chos dbyings
94a5(rgyud): nyid kyi bud med ni// shes rab 'di 'dras ma nyes par byas/ nang na ma yin phyi ma yin// gnyi gar ma yin gzhan nas min// gnas med gnas pa'i rnam/ 'byor gyur/ de bas snga ma kir bshad// de yi ngo bo nyid
94a6(rgyud): gcig pa// byin gyis brlabs pas de bshad// nam mkha' dang ni gcig tu gnas// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnasu 'gyur// de bas yul du rnam brtags pa// bsdu ba dag ni gshang ba yin// ye shes dbang po stong pa
94a7(rgyud): gcinaHrnam dag chos nyid khu ba yin// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khrag/ rang bzhin cho su yongs brtag pa// de nyid lha rnams zhes bya ste// dngos med pa ni dbul ba yin// de byas sangs rgyas sras po rnams// khyad par/ 
94a8(rgyud): du ni mnyes par 'gyur// gang yang 'jig rten pas brtags pa// de rnams ji skad bshang pa nyid// mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pa/ sa ra pa nyid du bkal legs dang // shin tu tshang ldan mdzes pa yi// thig gi mkhas
94b1(rgyud): bas thig gdab bo/ blo ldan dkyil 'khor brtag bya ba// khru ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam la// ngos bzhi dang ni gra bzhir ldan/ babs kyis ni mdzes par bya// de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// dgongs pas dang po bshang ba ste/ de las bzlon/ 
94b2(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'din 'jig rten pa rnams rtog/ gang zhig 'jig rten 'das la gnas// de ni gzungs kyis rab bskur ba// dngos seng pa ni 'dzin pa dag yid ni rtag tu mkha' dang mtshungs// dam pa 'jig rten shin tu 'das/ 
94b3(rgyud): 'khor ba dang ni gcig shos spang // len pa ma yin gtong ba min// med pa ma yin gnas ma yin// blo ldan kun tu 'di shes pa// rnal 'byor thams cad rig pa mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor le'u 'di ni// nges pa'i rnal 'byor
94b4(rgyud): ba zhes bshad// dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la// gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur pa// / de rnams shes rab thabs dag ni// ji ltar gnas pa de ltar byed// gsang ba'i dgongs pa lung bstan las// thugs kyi dkyil
94b5(rgyud): 'khor gyi le'u skye bzhi pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa/ mchog/ rdo rje gsum bdag 'gro ba'i bla// slar yang rdo rje 'dzin pa la// sngags spyod don gyis de nyid zhus// sngags kyi brtul
94b6(rgyud): zhugs spyod pa cig/ khyad par du ni srang bslab pa// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung // spyod pa bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bdag po de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa dag gi tshig/ gsan nas 'gro ba'i don gcig pu/ 
94b7(rgyud): gsungs pa'i don can bka' stsal ti/ mi rtog don las yang dag byung // zhe sdang la 'jug mtshan nyid yin// ngos med la gnas ga'i mug ste/ 'dod chags 'dod chags las byung ba// 'dod chags ldan pa'i ming can yin/ 
94b8(rgyud): zag pa mchog ni bla med pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste/ 'di dag rig su yang dag bshad// dngos grub de ni 'di sgrub po// rigs ngan myur bar shes par bya// smig mkhan dag ni ngal ba yin// mtshams med byed pa gzhi
95a1(rgyud): ga sted gsod pa don gnar sems pa'o// theg pa chen po meng pa'i// theg pa mchog 'di 'grub par 'gyur/ sems can sdig chen byas pa dang // gzhan yang mtshams med byed pa po// gang yang slob
95a2(rgyud): dpon slong ba yis// bsgrubs kyang grub par mi 'gyur ro// 'di nyid dang bas myur du ni// zhe sdang dag la gnas pas gnas// gang gis phung sogs dngos med paro// zhi gnas las byung sems kyis byas// de ni srog gcod
95a3(rgyud): byed pa ste// theg pa mchog la gnas pa yin// nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dag rten 'brel gnyis su ston pa ni// de ni brdzun smra dga' ba ste// gnas med la gnas rnal 'byor pa'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang // de ni rjes su
95a4(rgyud): shes bya ste// de 'brog dang tshul gang yin pa// gzhan gyi nor la chags par 'dod// gang zhig de nyid dngos gcig pa// de bzhin nyid la rtag sbyor ba// / sems can de de 'dod la dga'// sgrub pa mchog la dam par 'gyur// 
95a5(rgyud): de yi stong nyid gti mug la// yul ni bshang ba zhes grags te// dbang po gcib zhes bya la// de dag zhi bza ba yin// theg pa chen po chos mchog 'dir// de dag sgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur// de tshe brdzun
95a6(rgyud): de 'dod pa dang // gshang ci zas su byed pa po// shes rab pha rol byin shes rab// chos kyi sku ni ma gcig pu ka/ gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor ba// dngos med ces bya 'dod spyod pa// longs spyod rdzogs dang mnyam gang yin
95a7(rgyud): de nyis sring mo yin par 'dong // rang lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// gsang sngags lus kyis mnyes par bya// gshang gci zasu byed pa yi// sbrul sku'i gzugs can bu mo de// sgrub pa pos ni bsgom par bya// ma dang / 
95a8(rgyud): sring mo bu mo pa sa ni// 'di 'drarnal 'byor pas mnyes byas// theg pa mchog gi chos nyid la// dngos grub rgya chen des thob bo// ji ltar mi rtog na mkha' ni// kun tu khyab par gnas gyur pa// 'di ni sgom pa
95b1(rgyud): zhes bshad de/ ting 'dzin pas mi khyab ces bya// de nyid 'jig rten bur byung ba// rtog pa dga' ba'i ming can no// sangs rgyas yul gyi ye shes la// 'jod spyong gos par mi 'gyur te/ rnam par mi rtog sbyor cig gis/ myur dus
95b2(rgyud): rgyas des thob 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsung ni// sgrib kun sel ba la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches// thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur// 'di ni bdag po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin ga
95b3(rgyud): bkun gyi bdag ci yi slad du chi ba ngan pa// de bzhin gshegs 'khor nang du gsung // 'dod chags bral dang chags bcas dang // gti mug bral ba rmongs bcas dang // zhe sdang bral ba sdang bcas pa'i// rigs kyi dngos
95b4(rgyud): grub ston mdzad cing // gang gzhan sdig pa'i nyes pa dang // 'tshe ba la sogs yongs spangs pa// 'di ni de byed sems can rnams// snod yin zhes ni thub gsung ngam// de nas mgon po thugs rdza can// 
95b5(rgyud): sems can la phan dgyes pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs pa// 'di ni sa khams rang mnyam pa// sems can kun 'dzin gcig pu pa/ chu khams rtog pa
95b6(rgyud): bral ba po// sna tshogs gsal bar 'gyur ba yin// bdag po me li gzugs can te// thams cad za bar nye bar sbyor// de bzhin byi nang bdag nyid mchog/ 'gro la gos pa'i dri gcig pu// bcom ldan sna tshogs nam kha
95b7(rgyud): mtshungs// thams pang snang zhing za ba bo// de nyid bdag nyid bdag yin par// bsgoms na rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// snying po zhes byasangs rgyas kyi// chos nyid dag pa 'di yin zhing / sngags kyi spyod don spyod rnams kyi/ 
95b8(rgyud): byang chub spyod pa'i mchog 'di yin// de nas brjod mi lang zhes pa// brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas zhing rdul grangs mnyan de// sgrib pa thams cad sel la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// 
96a1(rgyud): / kun nas 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de thams cad // gcig tu brgyal banying gyur to// de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsung // gnyis med de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/ byang chub sems
96a2(rgyud): dpa' brgyal ba ru/ gzigs nas gtso la 'di skad gsol// mgon po sgrib kun sel la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rang bzhin chos nyid ji lta bar// 'di rnams bslang bar mdzad du gsol// mi g.yo ba
96a3(rgyud): 'di gsang ba ste// zhi ba gcig pu bde ba'i mchog rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed pa// 'di ni dgongs pas gsungs pa yin// dngos po med cing 'khrug pa med// yid khyong rdo rje tshig gcig puka/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa'i dbye ba
96a4(rgyud): yis bye brag mang por gyur pa yin// na mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba/ yis// gzugs la sogs pa mtha' yas te// de yang de bzhin pa/ shegs mchogs dang // byang chub sems dpa' nyid du gyur// de las spro
96a5(rgyud): shing bsdu ba dang // zhi ba nyid las rab sbyor bas// ye shes lus / na yas can// brgyal lo zhes ni shes pa ni// yan lag dbye ba gang dang gang // 'gro ba zhes ni grags bdag pa// de de rang lha'i sbyor ba las
96a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rang lus gang yin pa// de nyid bsdus pa 'di lta bu// 'di ni 'jig tshogs lus rtog la// byang chub sems dpa' brgyal bar gyur// sa ni bden 'di ma shes pas/ dbyangs/ 
96a7(rgyud): bcas brgyal la bskul ba ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// brgyal ba zhes ni bshad pa yin// de nas gsang ba rdo rje gsum// dgongs pa'i tshig gis bshad pa dag/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshig gsan nas// ting 'dzin
96a8(rgyud): ni mngon du mdzad// gnyisu med par mnyam rdo rje/ 'gro la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i// 'di zhid gsum yul 'jig pa po// ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// mgon po snyoms par zhugs pa yis// 'od gang chen por
96b1(rgyud): gyur pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' des reg pas/ rang gi stan la gnas par gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// ngo mtshar rmad du gyur spyan dang // dgyes sdigu pa skyes gyur nas// chos kyi dbyangs ni 'di skad gsungs
96b2(rgyud): e ma'o chos e ma'o chos// e ma'o chos kyi don byung ba// bdag med chos ni yang dag dag/ chos kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal// rdo rje gsung gcig dag pa'i don// dri med mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// mi 'gyur don las yang
96b3(rgyud): ngag byung // rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshalo// thub mchog gcig pu de bzhin gshegs// dus gsum dag gi lam du byung // rdo rje dbyings gcig rdzogs longs spyod// na mkha'i lam gcig phyag 'tshalo// sku gsung thugs
96b4(rgyud): ni rnamapa' ste/ spyod pa'i mchog ste chos gcig ldan// de nyid lasu ma ston sna tshogs pa// spyong ba'i gnas la phyag 'tsha'o// dgongs ba lung bstan la gnas nas// gang zhig spyong mchog 'ong rten pa/ gsang
96b5(rgyud): ba yang dag srung ba dag/ de ni ci dga' bar yang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje mchog/ sngags rnam sa kun gyi dam pa yi// spyod pa'i le'u lnga po yin// // de nas dpal
96b6(rgyud): chen mi bstod pa// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba can// ting 'dzin la snoms zhugs nas// thugs byin rlabs pa zhes bya'i// / gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs pa yin// oM zhes bya ba dang po yin// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/ tsit+ta ga suM
96b7(rgyud): par yongasu brtag/ badz+ra bzhi pa'i gong mar ldan/ swa b+hA wa At+ma ko lnga pa/ a hi dus kyi ming can yin/ sku drug gsum pa'i can no// de nas dang ldan rnam snang mdzad// rdul phran rdo rje zhes bya yi// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/
