96b8(rgyud): sku ni byin gyis brlab pa gsung // oM zhes bya ba tshangs par bshad// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// ka ya chags thogs dbang phyug ste// badz+ra rig byed yin par bsgrags// swa b+hA wa At+mak+ko 'dong lha// a he skem byed ces/ 
97a1(rgyud): brjod de// dgongs pa yis ni yang dag brtags// shes rab dbye bas dbye bar bya// de ni tshe dpag med ces pa'i// kun tu mi gnyis rdo rje can// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// gsung ni byin gyis rlob pa gsu
97a2(rgyud): oM ni dang por bsgrags pa yin// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// bka ces bya ba gsum pa yin// badz+ra dus kyi ming du 'gyur// swa b+ha At+ma ko lnga pa/ a haM zhes pa drug pa ste// gsum po 'di dag bshad pa rnams ke re re zhing drug gsum
97a3(rgyud): du bshad// thugs dang sku dang de bzhin gsung // rim dang rim pa min pas gsung // bdag po las ni gcig pu las// rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba 'byung // yon tan chos 'di rdo rje gsung // de nyid gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ de
97a4(rgyud): bas 'di ni sgom par mchog/ g.yal ba med par rdzogs par bya// 'di bshad pa yi blo ldan pa// rab mchog rdo rje gsum byung bas// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyur cing // sngags kyi mtshan nyid mtshan mar bya// de nas dkon mchog
97a5(rgyud): dpal 'di yang // sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// / de nas gsang sngags 'di gsung so// oM ni zung gi dang po lnga na// sarba ta thA ga ta zung // de bzhin nyid ni ye shes tshogs// thams
97a6(rgyud): da me longs ming ban no// a nu rA ga skye med de// de ni gsum pa yin pa ra gsungs// rkyen dang nyan thos kyis bshig dka'// badz+ra yadzin bzhi par 'gyur// dngos med bdag nyid can ye shes/ swa b+hA At+maH
97a7(rgyud): zhes bshad// ye shes lnga po nyid kyi ming // chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// a haM so so na rdzogs longs spyod// dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can/ bde ba chen po'i ming gyur pa// mcho nga drug pa'i ming can no// dngos med gnas pa'i
97a8(rgyud): bdag nyid can/ de yi rje su mnyes bya'i mchog/ de lta'i chags pa'i de bzhin gshegs// mgon po thams cad mnyes par bya// de nas dpal chen gdon mi za// don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs
97b1(rgyud): des ni gsang sngags 'di gsung so// oM zhes bya ba dang por ldan// sarba ta thA ga ha gnyis// pU dz+ra rnam par thar pa'i ming // badz+ra sems ni rnam sgom pa// swab+hA At+ma ko zhes bshed // a ngaha pha rol byin zhes bya/ 
97b2(rgyud): lnga po drug dang gsum du bshad// gzug dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya dang ni chos kyi dbyings// de dag dngos med gyur byas pa// de ni sangs rgyas mchod mchog yin// mig sogs zhes las yang dag byung // mngon shes
97b3(rgyud): lnga yis nye bar mdzes// mchod ba lnga ba shing 'di rnams kyis myur dusangs rgyas nying thob 'gyur// de nas dang ldan rdo rje 'chang // so sor byang chub sto mdzad pa// rdo rje gsum rig gsang dbang po/ thub pa chen pos yang
97b4(rgyud): gsungs pa/ sku gsung thugs la dmigs pa la// gang tshe yid ni mgu gyur pa// de nyid gsum la nyer sbyor ba// dngos grub rab mchog de thob 'gyur// bdag med par ni sems dmigs shing // lus
97b5(rgyud): dang ngag kyang rnam par sgom// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gnas sgom zhing // sbyor ba rnam gsum rdzogs par bya// rdo rje de zhing gsum dmig san// shin tu phra ba'ang yong ma yin// sngags kyi rang bzhin
97b6(rgyud): spor ba yis// sgom pa med cing byang chub mang // rdo rje gsum gcig mtshan nyid du// mdor na rnam par brtags nas su// sngags la sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin// gnas la gnas med bsgom par bya// de nas de bzhi ga
97b7(rgyud): dbang po 'ang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// kun mkhyen sangs rgyas kun mchog gis// sgom pa'i mchog 'di bka' stsal to// namakha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa
97b8(rgyud): bya/ sangs gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas// phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam// sna yi rtse mo'i bdag nyid can// rgyu dang mi rgyur yang dag ldan// de ru gnas par mkhas pas bsam
99a1(rgyud): blo ldan ye shes kyis brtags pa'i// gsang ba'i ye shes gnas sgom mo// gsang ba mchog ces bshad pa ste// de nyid gsum ni dam tshig mchog/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 
99a2(rgyud): nyi ma zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor sgom// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms te// de yi steng du gnas bzhag go// dbang phyug chen po skem byed de// gzhi phyed na mkha' mtshon pa dag/ bdud rtsi zhos ni brtags pa gang // de ni
99a3(rgyud): hUM zhes bya bar 'gyur// nam pa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor yid 'ong sgom// spyan gyi gzugasu yang dag sbyor// rdo rje pad+mo gnyis pa'o// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyi
99a4(rgyud): 'khor bsgom par bya// dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis// de yi steng du rnam par sgom// nus pa'i dbyingongs kyi dbus gnas par/ bod kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid spros// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas dpyod pa/ 
99a5(rgyud): 'khor rnams kyis ni kun nas bskor// ut+pal mthon ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rtse mo lnga pa 'od po che// nas kyi 'bru tsam nan/ tan gyis// ri rab rtse mor rnam par bsam/ tsa na ka li 'bru tshong tsam/ 
99a6(rgyud): 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// sna yi rtse mo ri rab rtse// byang chub 'dod pas 'di bsgom bya// 'khor lo la sogs sgom pa'i// de yi khyad par dag tu brtag/ yid 'ong dngos grub kun gyi gnas// byang chub
99a7(rgyud): gnas mchog bla med pa'o// sangs rgyas yang dag byang chub bzhugs mdor na de ni spro bar bya// gang tshe chos ni legs mtshan pa// rdo rje gcig ni bsgom par bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po// dag pa chos
99a8(rgyud): rnams kun gyi mchog 'gro kun don tu ston pa pos// gsang ba mchog ni bka' stsal to// skad cig thang gcig yud tsam dang gazla phyed rtsa ba lo yi dus// bskal pa grangs med gsum po ni/ skad cig gcig tum
99b1(rgyud): bar bshad// zla ba drug bshad de nyid yin// dngos med rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o// skad cig gcig tu bsngags pa ste// dus gsum las 'das yin par dgongs// gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa// rnal 'byor
99b2(rgyud): bas ni zla drug sbon// mchod chen de ni byas nasu// gsang ba'i dri nyid rnam par sgo mo// yul dang dbang po sems pa ni// gshang gci zasu byed pa po// byas na de 'dra'i dngos grub ni// bza' ba rnam rtog med pa'o// nga nyid 'di
99b3(rgyud): ni bla med pa// byang chub sems gcig las byung ba'o// rtog med 'dus ni ma byas shing // mi rtog don ni 'grub par 'gyur// ma ni mA ma kIr bshad de// sa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o// bsam gtan de ni dga' spong ba/ 
99b4(rgyud): bya bar de bshad // nam pa' mtha' yas rnal 'byar ni/ sha chen ni yin par bshad// gsang ba ba yi go 'angang mchog/ rdo rje gas ni myur du 'grub// dam tshig chen po glang chen rtag/ de bzhin khyil so
99b5(rgyud): pa'i sha/ phung po la sogs rigs dbye bas/ gang gsung mnyam ba'i grangs kyi so// gang zhig rnal 'byor gnyis med zas/ bas ma gtan dga' ba'i ming gcig pu// 'jig rten rgyang pan 'jig rten pa
99b6(rgyud): bza' ba'i rang gi ngo bor gyur/ das pa'i bshes gnyen brtag pa dang // de bzhin drod gsher las skyes pa// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// 'di dag zasu kun tu bshad// de nas rdo rje gsum dgongs pa// bcom ldan
99b7(rgyud): 'das las thos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdaga'o// lag na rdo rjes tshig gsol pa// nyan thos rnams kyi dam tshig kyang / phra mo'i rnal 'byor ston mdzad cing / mgon khyod 'jig rten pa dang ni/ 'jig rten
99b8(rgyud): 'das padag kyang gsungs// chu dang 'om gcig 'gyur zhen// khyed ni chos rnams ston par mdzad/ 'jig rten 'ga' las yang dag pa// dang pas 'am ji bzhin len/ ji ltar sgom pas gdus pa yi// skyes pa
100a1(rgyud): la la de bsres 'thung // de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das// chos kyi bdud rtsi de rnams 'thung // dgongs pas sdug spyi de nyid du// gang zhig gsum du gsungs pa 'di// ji lta ji ltar 'jig
100a2(rgyud): rjen sogs// mgon po gsal bar bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gis// grangs ldan lag na rdo rje la/ bu khyed leg so cher legs te// bye brag gsum khyod la bshang ba// rgyan dang nyan thos zhes/ 
100a3(rgyud): grags dang // de bzhin mdo sde la spong rnams// 'di dag 'jig rten pa rnams te/ bya ba sbyor ba'i bya rab gnas// rnal 'byor grub nas 'jig rten gnas// 'jig rten 'das par gyur pa yin// de ni ting 'dzin rnal 'byor yang / 
100a4(rgyud): de dang 'dra bar byed pa ma yin// gang yang 'jig rten shin tu 'das// rnam par mi rtog 'jigs med pa// de ni de bzhin nyid dngos gcig 'kho ra ba dang ni gcig shes spangs// brtul zhugs bzang po'i rnal
100a5(rgyud): 'byor 'dis// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes 'gyur zhing // blo ldan byang chub sems rnams kyi kyis// byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// / 'dod khams kyi ni dbang phyug dang // rnal 'byor go 'phang
100a6(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur// gzi ldan stobs kyis phyug pa dang // mdang bzang mthong na dga' ba dang // mthong ngam tshig gis bskul ba yis// 'jig rten 'di dag dbang du byed// / gsang ba 'di ni mchog yin te// sang+yas
100a7(rgyud): byang chub dam pa yin// de nyid sngags kyi gsang ba 'di// rdo rje gsum las 'das pa'i mchog/ dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la// skyes bu gang zhig gnas gyur// gsang ba yang dag srang ba po// de rnams ci
100a8(rgyud): dgar byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kun dam pa ste// dam tshig las ni dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlangs pa'o// le'u drug pa yin par bshang // / de nas rdo rje gsum gsang
100b1(rgyud): dbang dang ma tshig chen po de nyid gcig/ ting 'dzin gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog/ mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di gsung so// de nyid dam tshig bzhi pa gang // 'dod pa thams cad ces te bshad// de rnams longs
100b2(rgyud): spyod ldan pa yis// ci 'dod par ni bsten par bya// rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor bas// bdag dang gzhan ni mchod par bya// de ni 'jig rten mchod 'gyur ba// 'jig rten 'das pa zhi ba zhing // dka' thub myur ba de yin la// sdom pa
100b3(rgyud): dam pa yin par 'dod // mi zad pa ni gnyi ga ste/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod tha~Md kyang // gzungs sogs lha rnams yin par 'dod// de dag bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa po rnams myur du 'grub// tha dang yi ge slong mo
100b4(rgyud): yin// de 'don pa ni za ba ste// gang zhig zlos la dga' ba de// de dge slongs mo za bar 'dod// dka' thub dag ni mi bya zhing // sdom pa mi bza de nyid kyang mi ni// 'dod gsum de nyid long spong cing // sngags kyi de
100b5(rgyud): nyid ma nyams bzlas// rdo rje gsum dbye ba de gnas na// sngags rig/ byang chub thob par 'gyur// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyu ro// sangs rgyas byang chub
100b6(rgyud): sems dpa' dang // gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog rnams gang // mi 'gyur chos ni brnyes pa yang / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes chags ldan pas// 'dod pa'i yon tan
100b7(rgyud): lnga rnams bsten// byang chub sems dpa' ma nyes bya zhing / byang chub pha rol phyin chags bya// de ltar gzugs la gsum shes nas// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// de nyid gtso bo bcom ldan 'das// sna
100b8(rgyud): tshegs rnam par snang mdzad che// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dngul bar bya// 'di ni bcom ldan sna tshogasas pa// sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso// dri la rnam gsum shes byas
101a1(rgyud): nas/ lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// 'dod chags chos ni 'dzin pa'i gtso// rol rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nying ngon
101a2(rgyud): yod rdo rje grags// sna tshogs gtso bo bcom ldan 'das// reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas// rang gi rigs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi bskyod me long gzugs can no// nang dang
101a3(rgyud): de bzhin phyi rol dang // gnyig rje su mi dmigs pa// gzugs la sogs gsum de yin te// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// gzugs sgra ro la sogs pa la// sems ni rtog tu sbyar bar bya// gsang ba bsdus
101a4(rgyud): par gyur pa ni// snying po sangs rgyas kun skyed de// mkhas pas gzug das sgra la sogs pa/ lha nyid du ni rtag tu sgom// de bzhin rigs su sgom pa ni// sgom pas der ni bsgom par bya// nam
101a5(rgyud): mkha'i rdo rje sbyor ba ni// sangs rgyas rjesu dran par bshad// sangs rgyas rdzas dran sbyor bas kyang // chos ni rjesu dran pa sgom// rje rje gsum sgom rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje rjes dran sgom
101a6(rgyud): pa'o// rigs dbye ji skad bshad pas kyang // chos dang longs spyod sprul skur byung // rigs ni rjes dran sbyor gyur pa// de bzhin khro bo rjes dran pa'o// de nyid gsum yongs gyur pa gcig/ rdo rje gsum nyid med
101a7(rgyud): chos nyid// lha rnams rjes dran sbyor ba ste// de sgom byang chub thob par 'gyur// bzhi po dag ni re re bzhi// ji lta ji ltar mgu bcas sogs// de nyid lo yi grangs yin te// bcu drug par ni yongasu brtag/ sa
101a8(rgyud): kun gyis bsnyen pa yin// bud med lo grangs bcu drug par gzugs bzang phra dang mchod pa ni// dben pa zhes byar brtsams par bya// byin gyis brlabs nas yid 'ong ba// khyad par gsum zhes bya ba
101b1(rgyud): yi// de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo che// sman sogs nyid ni bsgom par bya// bsgrub bya de nyid yang dag sbyor// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// dang por sbyor ba 'di bsgoms na// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par
101b2(rgyud): 'gyur// yi ge hUM dang de bzhin oM// phaT kyong der ni bsgom par bya// de nyid gsum tshul gsum bdag nyid// ci rigs par ni rnam par spro// 'od zer rnam pa lngas khyab pa'i// rdo rje pad+ma 'di mchog ste// gas
101b3(rgyud): dang snying la sna tsa ru// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgom bya// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin dkar bar// shes rab de ni rtag tu sgom// gang phyi ying ni dgar gyur pas// de bas de nang yid 'ong ba'o// gnas med gnas
101b4(rgyud): par lags sbyor bar// bzhi mtshungs gcig tu sbyor ba rig/ sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs// byang chub 'dong pas bsgom pa/ rabya// nyams dga' sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten// bla ga
101b5(rgyud): zhi ba gcig pu'i ming // rang gi de nyid gnyis med byung // rdo rje de bdag nyid du sbyor// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba ste/ b+ha ga ling gi ye na par bsgrags// gzhug pa gnyis med sbyor ba ste/ sa
101b6(rgyud): rgyas gzugasu sgom pa'o// de las blo ldan gyis spro ba// ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mor gnas// mnyam pa med pas khyad par du// sangs rgyas sprin rnams der spro'o// chos rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang // rdo rje chos kyi rang
101b7(rgyud): sbyor bas// rdo rje pad+ma yang drag sbyar// b+ha ga'i ling gar brtag pa'o// de nas ba spu'i bu ga las// 'bad pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro// de nyid bsam kun rdzogs byed pa'i// 'di ni chos kyi bdag po yin/ rdo rje
101b8(rgyud): rjes su dran pa skes// dngos med gcig pu la sbyor ba// stong la rdo rje rab sbyor 'gyur// bla ga ling gzhes bshad do// de nas pa spu'i bu gnas/ rdo rje sprin rnams ku sgo/ rdo rje byang chub sems sgom nyid// myur
102a1(rgyud): du dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// rigs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas stong nyid rdo rje las// de bzhin rnal 'byor pas spros nas// rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// khro bo rjes dran sbyor ba
102a2(rgyud): la dang // stong dang rdo rje gnyis ldan pa'i// khro bo'i ba spu'i bu gnas// khro bo'i sprin rnams spro bar bya// de nas dang ldan rdo rje 'dzin// khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad chen la/ rjes dran sbyor ba'i dgongs pa ni// thub pa che la slar zhus
102a3(rgyud): bakhrub khyod kyis ni gang gsungs pa// b+ha ga'i ling ga'i sbyor ba ni// 'jig rten 'das pa'i sbyor 'di las// sangs la sogs spro gyur pa// tshul 'dim 'ong skye bo la/ byi dus kun rmongs skyed pa ste// bde gshegs rnams
102a4(rgyud): kyi bdag pos ni// ci phyir gsungs zhes de rnams smra// 'gro bas na ma kha de' mtshan ma can// rten 'byung khyod nyid mi shes shing // de rnams/ shin tu rmongs dbye bas// ji bzhin par ni rtogs par byed// mgon
102a5(rgyud): khyod bde ba chen po ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi ston gcig pu// sku mang srid gsum bdag nyid can// dgongs pa gnyis ka'i mtshan dang ldan// de bas khyod ni chos kun gyi// yon tan gsum bdag de nyid
102a6(rgyud): gsum/ dgongs pa bya ba dri med gsum// sangs rgyas kyi ni bdud rtsi 'byung // khyod 'dir b+ha ga khyab 'jug ste// ling ga drag po'i ming can nyid// khyod ni sa bon tshangs la brtags/ khyod ni rten 'byung 'gro ba 'byung // 
102a7(rgyud): dus gsum las 'das rnal 'byor che// dus dang ci su gyur pa nyid // shes dang shes bya rnam par grol// de bas khyod ni 'gro ba'i bla// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// de la sogs pa'i tshig gsan nas// dam tshig rjes
102a8(rgyud): su dran sgom pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ston par mdzad// rang gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor las// rang gi khu ba'i thigs skyes pa'i// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' sgom// dkyil 'khor rje su dran pas
102b1(rgyud): shing // dbang po gnyis nyid sbyor ba las// rang gi tshangs brtag grangs te// rnal 'byor pas ni dkyil 'khor bya// sku rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi zung blo lnga/ sangs rgyas de zhing sogs banas
102b2(rgyud): ba bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar rog/ gsung rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba lnga// rdo rje chos gsung phun sum tshogs// de lo gsung mi 'dra bar 'gyur/ bdag kyang dri dang 'drar chos 'dzin// thugs rjes dran ba'i sbyor ba gang / 
102b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni/ kun tu babang ba'i thugs gang yin/ ngag tu dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ sems pan rjes dran sbyor ba gang / sems can rjes drA rje nying / spyod pa ma 'a' ma chung mjo ba'in du/ 
102b4(rgyud): bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sngags sku rdo rje sasum zhes pa// de sbyor dran pa sgom pa ni/ rdo rje sngags kyi sku ga yin/ gsung dang skuni rnam sbom po/ de nyid gsum mnam gcig sa
102b5(rgyud): shing rtag tu gsum 'das gyur pa yi/ sngags 'dzin mchog ni ci 'dra ba// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// dam tshig rjes dran rnams kyis ni de bas tshangs pa shin tu byung // dngos med
102b6(rgyud): gcig tu sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du gsung // de bzhin gshegs mchog che ba ni// dngos med ces bya bsad pa ste// blo dang ldan pas 'di bsad na// dngos grub sngags mchog thob par 'gyur
102b7(rgyud): shes ra bo dam tshig sbyor gyur pa// rje su dran pa zhes bshad // pha rol phyin pa zhes grags pa// yod med gnyis dang bral ba'o// thams cad rang bzhin dri ma med// ma skyes pa dang zad pa med// byang chub
102b8(rgyud): med cing mngon pa rtog sa med// khams med 'byung ba'ang med pa'o// ma skyes rjes su sbyor ba dang / de ni ci yang brjod ming shing // ma skyes ming ni gcig pu pa// dran pa de na yin par bshad/ ji ltar
103a1(rgyud): namakha' 'od gsal ba// mtshan ma med cing 'gyur ba med// rang bzhin mkha' dang 'drar gyur cing // gnyis med gnyis su yod min zhing // yan lag bcu gnyis sbyor gcig gang // zhe sdang
103a2(rgyud): rdzogs logs spyod pa'i ming // sangs kun gyis bsten gyur cing // de ni rigs rjes dran zhes bya// rten 'byung las skyes rdzogs sangs te/ bud med lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// brtan pa'i sems ni thob pa las// 
103a3(rgyud): rang gi khu bas mchod par bya// dngos med bdag nyid dag pa gang // da ni dag par bshad pa yin// de nyid kyis ni mchod par bsngags// shes rab pha rol phyin pas 'gro// 'di yis lus la mchod pa dang / khyad
103a4(rgyud): bar du ni de bzhin gshegs// rdo 'dzin bshad de bzhin thugs// chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs ni gang dag grub// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// gang bshang rigra ni dman
103a5(rgyud): bshad pa// de la'ang tshul de grub par 'gyur// de nyid mchod pa ra bshad pa nyid// de bzhin so sor rab tu brtag/ mi phya da rdo rje'i sbyor ba yang // gsung gi dbang bskur nyid gsal
103a6(rgyud): dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/ gang zhing sems mchongs pa// mkha' la gnas pa'i nyi ma bzhin// de ni cing gar spyod par byed de// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba
103a7(rgyud): sngags spyod pa yi mchog gyur pa// le'u bdun pa rab tu bstan// // de nas dang ldan de bzhin gshegs// dkon mchog dpal ni 'od chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bla ma rdo rje gsum gyi
103a8(rgyud): bdag/ mgon po rdo rje 'dzin chen po// dbang phyug dbang phyug dam pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi ston pa la// bstod pa 'di yis gsol ba btag/ nam kha'i spyod pa rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa'athub pa che// theg
103b1(rgyud): pa chen po'i rnam snang ba// kun tu bzang po brtul zhugs bzang // dngos kun dngos po gcig pa'i mchog rigs mchog thams cad yang dag 'byung // rgyal ba'i dam pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/ mchod pa kun mchog
103b2(rgyud): bshad du gsol/ 'dod chags chen po zhe sdang tshe// gti mug chen po blo gros che/ dzeg pa gsum por rab ston cing // rdo rje theg pa ston pa 'o// nam pa' gcig pu dngos po'i mchog/ ye shes rgya mtsho tham
103b3(rgyud): rdo rje gsum po chags med pa// rgyal gnas mchod par bshad du gsol// rdo rje gsum po lam gyi mchog/ thar lam gcig pu ston pa po// sangs rgyas skal mchog shin tu dag mi mchog mchod pa bshad
103b4(rgyud): du gsol// dngos po kun gcig shin tu dag/ byang chub sems ni rgya mtsha tshe// chos kyi 'khor lo gcig bskor ba// rten 'brel po/ shes las byung ba// rdo rje gsum gcig rnam dag don/ sna tshogs
103b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bya ba mdzad// bdag med med chos shin tu dag/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// tham sa cad namapa' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur kun
103b6(rgyud): dbang po// kun don rin chen mchog 'dzin pa 'ang kan chung maug yangs btsal nas ni// gzugs dang na tshod rnams kyis rgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa// rnyeng nas mi yi skye gnas brtag/ rnam par dben nam gtsang
103b7(rgyud): ba yi// sa phyogasu ni rgyal bdag nyid// zhi ba ni ba'i gnas yid 'ong // bshang gci chu yis byugs nas ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster ba'o// rtag tu mchod pa nyid bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yi// phung
103b8(rgyud): po zhes bya sna tshogs sus// rdo rje gsum po mi byed khams/ rgyal ba zhes ni bya bar bshad// kun mkhyen ye shes lang mo ste/ len pa mi gsal la sbyor la// de nying na chung yin par brtag/ 'jig rten pa mam
104a1(rgyud): // 'tho'i byang rgyag/  'gro ba'i don ni rang grub pa// gang zhig dngos med ces bshad ba/ mtha' skyes bzhin du brtag pa yin// gabang ba rnam dag sems yin te// rnam par dben pa dnges med pa// sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin
104a2(rgyud): sa phyogs rgyal ba 'byung ba yin// zhi ba sna tshogs nges 'byung ba// zhi ba'i gnas ni myur la sogs// bshang gci yul dang dbang por grags/ chu ni shes rab la sogs drug/ 'di dag gis gang byugs gyur pa// rdzog
104a3(rgyud): longs spyod pa'i 'dod 'byung ba// de dag rgyal ba'i chos bshad pa// dgongs pa sbyor ba chos nyid do// mchod pa'i yan lag gnyis pa yi// bkod pa'i yan lag mtshan nyid bshad// 'jig rten shin tu 'angs spyil
104a4(rgyud): 'jig rten 'das pa'i snying nga ru// rkang pa'i bar dang lte ba dang // / rked pa gsang ba 'jig rten pa// rgyal sras rnams kyi 'dod ba ni// rigs ni lnga po bya ba yin// rnam pa'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ 
104a5(rgyud): ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par sbom// bdag nyid zla ba'i ma gnas par// brtul zhugs can gyis snying kar sgom// chu de sbyor bar gyur pa ni// mA ma kir ni yongs su brtag/ zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin
104a6(rgyud): 'dod pas// bsdu ba de yang rab tu bya// rin chen rang bzhin mchod rten ni// 'od zer sna tshogs nyid kyis rgyan// ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum po// gnas de ru ni bsam bya ba// blo ldan pa spu'i bu ga las// ji lta
104a7(rgyud): ji ltar spro bar bya// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mchog gzhol bas// mchod pa'i sprin ni na des spro bya// gos dkar pad+mar yang dag dgod // rnam lnga gcig la rnal 'byor ma// me yi sbyor ba bshad pa ni// de ya
104a8(rgyud): mi gsal zhi la gnas// sgron mar ud pal nyid gyur pa// rlung ste sbyor ba lnga pa'o// 'jug dang gnas dang skye ba dang // de bzhin sdang ba'i ming can no// de nyid rnam pa gsum byas pas// rdo rje gsum
104b1(rgyud): gyi dam tshig gnas// de nas blo ldan gyis dbul bka/ lnga rnams kyi yang dngos med nyid// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ khyab bdag rnam snang chen po las// me tog dgongs pa thos nas ni// rdo rje can gyis
104b2(rgyud): thub chen zhus// me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang // chu ru yongs su brtag pa yin// re re'ang dang po sbyor zhes bya// me tog de lnga gsum du bshad// bya rgod me tog za ba dang // bung ba sha za zhes zer zhing // me tog
104b3(rgyud): 'di yi dgongs pa ni// ma 'ongs skye bos mi sheso// ma rtogs pas de ni rnams kyi// dngos grub ring du gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar bdag ni skal min zhes// smra zhing de rnams bdag nyid// de ltar bdag nyid kyis
104b4(rgyud): smad pas// sangs rgyas thams cad smad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams smad gyur pas// mi las 'das nas gzhan du 'gro// // gtso bo sangs rgyas nang na min// phyir rol na min gnyi gar min// 
104b5(rgyud): tshogs pa las ni ma yin te// rkyen gyis 'gro ba dag la/ gnas// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs sangs rgyas// lus la gsang sngags 'di nyid las// gsang sngags 'grub par dka'
104b6(rgyud): ba'i rgyus// des ni bdag dang de dag smod// de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// dgongs pas de ni bshad du gsol// rang gi ngo bo ma 'tshal na// mkhas pa dag na nyams par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan
104b7(rgyud): sna tshogs pas// gsang ba'i bdag po la gsungs pa// nyin dang mtshan mo dbye ba yis// me tog don ni bshad par bya// pad+ma ud pa la nyin mor bshad// dzaM ti mtshan mo yin zhes bshad// lnga yi
104b8(rgyud): bdag nyid gsum dang gcig/ gnyis lnga gcig dang gsum du 'gyur// de yi thabs ni nyin mor bshad // mtshan mo shes rab ces bshad do// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis// 'jug du 'byung ba nyid du
105a1(rgyud): 'gyur// de gnyis dbus kyi sbyor ba gang // dgongs pas yongasu brtags pa yin// de ni sang+yas snying por 'gyur// de bas lha tshogs kyis de min// rnal 'byor pa dang sngags pa rnams// dgo
105a2(rgyud): ba'i chos la rab brtson bya// dgongs pa byin rlabs rgyu yis ni// de rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig rlung ni bcur grags pa// de ni pad+ma ud pal ming // de nyid ces grags rdo rje gsum dza ti
105a3(rgyud): gcig pu gsum du 'dod// kar ni ka dang mA le ka/ yug ti ka ri bi ra ni// go rims bzhin du spyan sogs te// sa la sogs par 'dir sbyaro// dngos med go 'phang la bkod pas// lha rnams kyi ni skur sbyor
105a4(rgyud): bas/ gcig tu sangs rgyas kun mnyes pa'i// mchod pa chen por de 'gyur ro// lnga po'i bdag nyid yang dag bzhag/ lnga bcu dag ni gnyis 'gyur byas// de nyid gsum sbyor 'khor lo ni// dpog
105a5(rgyud): tshang brgya yi dkyil 'khor ro// der ni mkhas pas rtag par ni// rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya// pad+ma 'khor lo rdo rje dang // / de bzhin u nga la rtag tu sgom// dpag tshad bzhi po sbyor gas
105a6(rgyud): pa/ dpag tshad rgya khyon de nyid gsum// byams pa la sogs gru bzhir 'gyur// mdzes pa phung pos rgyan pa yin// gru bzhi de ni rigasu gyur// zhi ba sbyor ba gcig ming can// mchod rten ye shes se mos rang
105a7(rgyud): bzhin// gsal zhing lngasti dri ma med// rigs rnams mchod phyir de nyid ni/ shes rab can gyis gnas sgom mo// mngon shes lnga yi gnas 'dod rnams// de yi mchod pa rgya mtsho gsal// rin chen ya shes spro
105a8(rgyud): bdag nyid// gos ni bsdu ba zhes bya'o// mchod pa mchog rnams de dag gis// byang chub 'dod pas mchod par bya// shes rab can gyi mchod mchog las// lha rnams rtag tu mnyes par bya// sbyor gcig da
105b1(rgyud): las yang dag byung // rin chen 'byung gnas na chung yin// dga' mgu yang dag ldan pa yin/ dngos grub shin tu grub pa'i phyir// nga rgyal la sogs bdun nas bya/ rin chen thams pa dbul bar bya// chos dang rdzog
105b2(rgyud): longs spyod las byung // rin chen bdun gyi nor de ni// des bkang ba yi zhing 'di ni/ shes rab thabs gcig las byung ba'i// dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir// zhing de nyin re dbul rab ni// na mkha' mtha' ya
105b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa'i// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin 'dir 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus su de// phyag rgya'i bdag por mnyam gzhag ste// 'dod chags blo ldan sangs rgyas la// reg par yang dag sbyor ba
105b4(rgyud): dngul/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa sgom// bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// yul dang dbang po sun 'byin pa// dngos med gcig par
105b5(rgyud): yang dag 'byung // yul dang dbang po zhes bya ba'i// bshang gci ji lta ji lta bar// de nyid mchod pa rnams kyis mchod// skal bzang bzhin ni mdzes pa yi// bud med gzugs
105b6(rgyud): bzang rnyed pa dang // gsang sngags yi ge'i gnas 'gyur bas// rnal 'byor ma de byin rlabs la// byas nas gnyis med sbyor gcig pu// rang gi lus ni nang du gzhug/ spyan sogs ji lta ji lta
105b7(rgyud): bar/ byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas bkod de// mig bzang dag pa'i bya ba yi// ngag byung khu ba blangs nas mchod// gang zhig de ltar rtogs pa de// blangs pas rdo rje 'chang bar 'gyur// sa la sog
105b8(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor gang // spyan la sogs par rab brtags pa// don 'jug sogs sbyor ba yang // de ni khu ba za bar 'gyur// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi ka sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa/ 
106a1(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes can gsang gi// gsang sngags dngos grub byed pa'i mchog rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/ gang zhig sems ni bzod gyur pa/ 
106a2(rgyud): de ni ji bzhin nyid du'ang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje gsung gi gsang ba las// bshang gci'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i// le'u brgyad pa yin par bshad// de nas de bzhin gshegs
106a3(rgyud): mchog gtso// thams cad na mkha' mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ gzugs don dbang phyug dam pa yin// rdo rje gsum nyid longs spyod pa// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil
106a4(rgyud): 'khor// sangs rgyas ye shes sbyor gcig pa'o// gsang ba nyams ni dga' bar bshad// na mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// rdo rje
106a5(rgyud): rtse gcig rdo rje yang // sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sgom// 'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang // 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang // dus gsum sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung // bsgoms
106a6(rgyud): la rdo rjes bye mar brlag/ rdo rje gsum gcig longs spyod ni// rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur pa'i// thugs kyi dngos grub byed bsam gtan// bsgoms na myur du thob par 'gyur// rdo rje mchog ces/ 
106a7(rgyud): byab/ rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bu// rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa no// sems can thams cad bsad na ni// de ni myur bar mi bskyod pa'i// rgyal ba'i srasu skye bar 'gyur// zhe sdang rigs chen po nyid kyis// zhing de
106a8(rgyud): 'gengs par byed par 'gyur// de nas dgongs pa chos gcig pu// gtso bo kun mkhyen thams cad rig// dam tshig de nyid gsungs pa yi// mgon la phyag na rdo rjes gsol// 'di ltar dngos
106b1(rgyud): med mchog gyur pa// khyod ni chos rnams ston mdzad pa// 'jig rten pa dang 'gal tshig gis// mgon khyod ci phyir ston par mdzad// gang zhig de bzhin nyid dngos gcig/ dus gsum byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams
106b2(rgyud): chos sku gcig pu las 'khrungs pa// ji ltar rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ de ni phyer brlags gyur pa las// ji ltar yang dag sems 'grub 'gyur// chos sku gcig pu las byung las// lhag pa zhes bya gyur nas
106b3(rgyud): sun/ dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// phye mar brlag pa ji ltar nus// khyer brlag byed pas dngos med pas// phye ma nyid kyang khyad par du// sangs rgyas sngags ngan rnal 'byor pa// nus pa bsam mi
106b4(rgyud): khyab ldan la// de 'dra bar ni phyir brlag par// sngags pa gzhan gyis mi nus so// sems can gyis ni sems can bzhin// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyer brlags pas// 'di gnyis khyad par med
106b5(rgyud): de zhes/ ma 'ongs skye bo smra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas gcig pu/ mthar thug pa// min zhes/ mi rnams nges smra zhing // gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi gsungs bzhin// rab tu spong bar byed par
106b6(rgyud): 'gyur// khrag bzang bsgrubs na 'tshang rgya ba// dgongs pa'i bum pa bzang po mchog// de ni bcom ldan myur sbyor bas// mi bskyod zhing du skyes 'gyur ram// sems can 'khor bar 'khor gyur pa// de tshe
106b7(rgyud): zhe sdang che skye 'am// snying rjes bsad par bya'o zhes// sngags pa rnams ni de mi spong // 'das tshe ston par gyur pa dang // da ltar rjes su ston mdzad dang // mnyes bya ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// sangs
106b8(rgyud): byang chub stsol ba'o// mi bskyod gzugs can rdo rje yis// de rnams ji ltar gnom par bgyi// de nyid sna tshogs don ldan tshig/ de rnams kyis ni ji ltar rtogs// gang zhig shes pas rgyal sras
107a1(rgyud): rnams// dgongs pa'i don la rtog med 'gyur// ma 'ongs skye bo'i don du ni// de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra yi// 'gro la phan pa'i tshig gsan nas// de nas ga/ 
107a2(rgyud): bo rdo rje 'chang // khyab bdag gis ni slar gsungs pa// legaso bu khyod cher legs te// kun tu bzang po khyod leg so// dgongs pas bshad pa'i don dri na/ khyod kyis nga la gang dris pa// gsungs don
107a3(rgyud): lha ji lta bar// de ni nga yis bshad par bya// phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa// sangs rgyas sems can rab brtan zhing // sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yang // dbye ba sna tshogs rab tu brtan// 'khor ba mi skyod
107a4(rgyud): med can te// de'i sngags rdo rje zhes bya ba// mi gsal rdo rje zhes shad de// dngos med gcig pu rdo rje nyid // des gshegs pa ni bsad pa ste// sangs rgyas sems cam byed par du/ sna ni tshogs
107a5(rgyud): kyi dbang po yi// kha ni rang bzhin nyid du g.yo// rnal 'byor pa yi// lag gyur pa// 'gro ba rlung gi ming can no// mi skyong rdo rje'isbyor ba nyid// lag tu rdo rje bzhag nas ni// de tshe myur la sogs bya ba
107a6(rgyud): klu yi rang bzhin sna tshogs nyid// phung sogs brtag pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsung thubs las yang dag byung // de yo yan lag phung por bshad// de ni phyir 'gyur bsad pa yin// 'di ni zhe sdang rigs yid
107a7(rgyud): 'ong na/  mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje zhing // de'i zhing skyed dam pa yin// dngos grub chen po des 'thob 'gyur// de nas dang ldan pade chen po// ye shes par ba rab sgrub pa// rang bzhin dag gis gos med pa// byang chub spyod pa rab
107a8(rgyud): smrab pra// phyag na rdo rje 'od chen po// gsang po gsum gyi gtso bo la// bos nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ sgrub pa'i dam tshig de nyid gsungs// namakha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor/ 
107b1(rgyud): dam pa la// rnam par snang mdzad bsngos bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sgom// rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje bcu ni rnam par sbom// rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis// rdzas rnams thams cad
107b2(rgyud): dbrog par bya// shes dang dadang po ldog par 'gyur// rnam smin dngos po med pa yang // da ting brog par rdo rje/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub po// rin chen rdo rje mchog sbyor ba/ rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur ba
107b3(rgyud): nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni gti mug rigs de nyid // dam tshig yin par yongs su bsgrags// rigs kun rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de las grub pa'i skyes mchog 'gyur/ 
107b4(rgyud): de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ 'dod chags thar par rab 'jug pa// gsang ba dag pa gnas med pa// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bka' stsal to// rnam pa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ 
107b5(rgyud): rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dpag med chos ni rnam bsgoms te// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang // bud me da lta bu'i sbyor ba yang // ting 'dzin gyis sbyor ba yis// thams cad
107b6(rgyud): de ru bsgom par bya// 'di ni rdo rje tshul mchog yin/ dngos med bsom pa'i sbyor ba yis// gsal mi gsal la yang dag sbyar/ chos dang rdzogs longs spyod sbyor ba/ gsang sngags kyis sprul dbang po gnyis
107b7(rgyud): sbyor ba bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// dbang po gnyis ni rab 'byor pa'i// snyoms zhugs sbyor ba de yis ni// de dag thams cad nye bar spyod// sku gsum mi phyed sngags rnams kyi/ 'di ni sgom pa mchog
107b8(rgyud): yon// de nyid dam tshig sbyor ba 'di// 'dod chags rigs gcig sgom pa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog ste// sngags pa rnams kyis nyin re zhing // rab tu 'bang bas/ 
108a1(rgyud): bsgoms par bya// de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsum// rdo rje sngags don sgrub pa'o// bdag med ye shes las byung bas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam pa'i dbyings kyi yum
108a2(rgyud): gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// den yod rdo rje rnam bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// rdo rje tshig gi brdzun smra ba// rgyal ba thams cad slu ba ste/ 'di ni sangs
108a3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi/ namakha'i gsung ni dri med pa'o// gang zhig brdzun du smra bshad pa// brdzun de nyid ni dam pa ste// dpa' bo gang zhig sgom byed pa/ de ni rgyal ba'i mchog du 'gyur// gsang ba'i ye shes dam par/ 
108a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dngos grub byed pa'i mchog / dam tshig 'dra/ gas par gang gyur pa'i// rigs kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa da'o// kun tu kun nas 'bad pa yis// ji bzhin don du drang byas te/ so
108a5(rgyud): sor rtog pa'i sbyor ba yis// de ni dngos grub rgya chen 'gro pa// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// mi phyed rdo rje gsum rgyal bdag/ rdo rje'i dngos grub rab ston pas// gsung ni 'di skad
108a6(rgyud): bka' stsal to// na ma kha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// der ni dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas sku ru rab brtags pa'i/ dam tshig de ni yang dag bshad// dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms
108a7(rgyud): te// gzugs rnams kun gyis sa 'di gang // phung po sogs grangs mnyam pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis thams cad du// rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni// sa rnams dman pa zhes bya ba'i// bsgoms
108a8(rgyud): na dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan thub pas de skad gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa// sna tshogs gzugs can 'od po che// bsam bsad dang ldan gcig pu nyid// dpag tu med
108b1(rgyud): bar gyur pa yin// de nas gang zhig dam tshig sogs// chos dbyings rdo rje gsum zhing ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// dam tshig rdo rje dpal la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ngo mtshar
108b2(rgyud): rmang du gyur nas ni// tshig las rdo rje zhes bya 'dri// do ni de rnams brjod par byed/ ci 'di mgon po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ gang zhig khams gsum las 'das shing // 'jig
108b3(rgyud): rten thams cad las 'das pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog dang // byang chub sems pa'i tshogs chen gyi// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ngo mtshar che ba'i tshig gi lam/ gtso bo'i yang dag rdo rje
108b4(rgyud): tshig/ dgongs pas ci slang gang gsungs shes// brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang // brjod mi lang ba rnams kyis gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang // brjod
108b5(rgyud): kyis mi lang grangs kyi ni// ri rab rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // dam tshig rdo rje dpal sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen la/ 
108b6(rgyud): dngos med las byung gsal ba gsungs// dman dang dmad pa'i 'du shes ni/ rgyal ba'i sras rnams ma skyed cig/ ci'i phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs// 'byung ba gang 'di spong mchog yin// 'di ltar sngags
108b7(rgyud): kyi spyod mchog 'di// rnam par dag yin rigs kyi bu// sangs rgyas mnyam med 'byung 'gyur 'di// gsang ba'i sngags don spyod pa nyid // 'di ltar dbar na rigs kyi bu// na mkha' kun tu song ba ste// chos rnams
108b8(rgyud): kun kyang der rtogs shing // rab dbye'i sbyor bar gyur pa nyid// 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas shing // de ni gzugs kyi khams mi gnas// de bzhin gzugs med khams na'ang min// 'byung ba bzhi la de mi
109a1(rgyud): gnas// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang // de ltar don gyi dbang mkhyen nas// dgongs pa'i dbang gis rgyal ba rnams// de bzhin gshegs rnams dgongs nyid kyis// chos rnams
109a2(rgyud): ston par mdzad pa yin// de bzhin du ni khyed rnams kyis// mdor na khong du chud par bya// yang dag byang chub don rnams kyis// na mkha'i nges tshig sbyor bas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba byung // dam tshis
109a3(rgyud): rjesu rig par bya// 'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu// gtsub shing gtsub stan bcas pa dang // skyes bu'i lag pa bskyod pa yi// rkyen las du bo 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas me yang 'byung mod kyi// gtsub
109a4(rgyud): shing la sogs re re nas// 'di ltar so sor brtags na go/ me de gang nA'ang mi gnaso// brag cha dang ni gzugaso ban na dang // sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang // de bzhin chu zla rmi lam ste// chos
109a5(rgyud): rnams thams cad de dang 'dra// mgon po pi bang sgra lta bu/ rkyen don las tshig yang dag byung // de bzhin 'gro 'ong gnas ba rnams// cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin// gnas med gnas pa'i
109a6(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// gnas pa na mkha'i mtshan nyid yin// des na khyed kyis rdo rje yi// dam tshig rje su rig par bya// de ltar chos rnams dngos med ces// gsangs pa'i de nyid don mkhas pas// rnam par smin pa ldog
109a7(rgyud): bya'i phyir// phung po de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// ngo mtshar smad du b+ha n+da ni// rngams pa yis ni mig gdangs te// tshig ni 'di skad ces gsol to// chos 'di ngo
109a8(rgyud): mtshar rmad byung ste// nam pa' dang ni mtshungs pa yi/ mi rtog rnam par dag pa yang // kun rdzob du ni bshad par mdzad// dam tshig chen po yang dag gnas// dgongs pa lung ston mchog la ni// gang zhig
109b1(rgyud): yid 'ong bzod gyur pa// de ni bzhin spyod pa yin// mchog tu dag pa'i de nyid don// gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba// dam tshig tshul ni yang dag bshad// le'u dgu pa rdzogs pa yin// / de nas de bzhin ga
109b2(rgyud): ba kun// rdo rje gsum 'byung bcom ldan 'das// slar yang dgongs pa 'dus nas ni// bla ma chen po bcom ldan 'das// dam tshig rdo rje de nyid gnas// mngon par byang chub ded dben nyid// sku dang gsung thugs
109b3(rgyud): gtsang gtso la/ btud de de bzhin gshegs pas gsol// snying po sngags ni kun bsdus pas// gsang ba yang dag rdo rje gsum// dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi ni chog/ de nyid bcom ldan bshad du
109b4(rgyud): gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol// gsung gcig du ma'i rnam par rtog yang dag bsdus don de bzhin gsungs// de nas bdag po
109b5(rgyud): ldan 'das// nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso// 'brar drag po spyan yangs pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje gsum// sku dang gsung thug
109b6(rgyud): sgrim pa ni// mnyam zhing rnam par mi rtog pa// dmigs pa med cing gnas mod pa'o// de nas bgon po bcom ldan 'das// rang bzhin dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs// pha rol phyin pa sngags tshul
109b7(rgyud): phyir rdo rje zhes pa'i ting 'dzin la// dpa' bo chen po snyoms thug te// de bzhin gshegs kun la gsungs pa// gang phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'di na/ mgon pa
109b8(rgyud): mi bskyed la sogs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa du ma dang // rig pa bye ba khrag khrig ni// brgya stong du ma zhes bya ngo // sems can der bya la ril dang // mchog ni de rnams ston par mdzad/ phyogs
110a1(rgyud): bcu'i 'jig rten khams mchog tu// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pas// rol cing dgyes par gyur pa dang // yongasu spyod pa yod kyang ni// sngags spyod pa la brtson rnams la/ 
110a2(rgyud): ma dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs// rang gtso gsang sngags spyod tshul mchog/ chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin can// 'di dag rdzogs par gyur mnyam nas// spyan ras kyi no tsho mi mdzad// de ltar rnam par
110a3(rgyud): spyad pa'i don// gsang sngags brtul zhugs spyod rnams la// yang dag par ni byin rlabs phyir// de ni ston par mdzad 'di yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ thub la phyag na rdo rjes gsol/ mngon
110a4(rgyud): bau de bzhin gshegs de rnams// so so skye bar gyur pa la// dngos po med cing dmigasu med// na mkha'i khams dang mnyam gyur nas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan nas// ji ltar de rnams rel par
110a5(rgyud): mdzad// de rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// nges par gyur/ pa'i 'khor rnams dang / sems can don gyi bya ba kun// 'dod pas ston par mdzad pa yin// mgon po 'dod pa'i
110a6(rgyud): yon tan rnams// sbyin sogs drug ces bya bar 'byung // tha ma sa cad dag kyang de nyid 'byung // pha rol phyin par mnyam gzhag nyid// de ltar pha rol phyin 'byung ba'i// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan
110a7(rgyud): 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba yang // 'dod pa lnga po 'di yis mdzad// 'di rnams kyis ni mgon po 'di// mi bskyod la sogs rgyal ba rnams// rol cing dgyes par mdzad pa dang // 'gro ba'i don kyang mdzad gyur
110a8(rgyud): cing // 'jig rten pa dang 'gal bya rnams// de yang de bzhin mdzad gyur pa// dag pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog 'di// de rnams kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur// phyag byar 'os pa'i rig pa ni// nges par ldan pa nges
110b1(rgyud): 'dod yod med la sogs byed pa ni/ gnyis 'gyur mtshan ma can du 'gyur/ phyogs bcu lam du chos gsungs pa/ gang zhig 'jig rten phung po lnga/ khams la sogs par mtshon pa gang // gzugs
110b2(rgyud): sogs zhes bya'i ming can yin// 'di ni yan lag thams cad ni// bya ba nyan thos theg pa'o// de nyid rkyen gyi theg pa ste// tshig de ston par mdzad pa 'di// gang zhig rdo rje theg par gnas// de bzhin ji
110b3(rgyud): bzhin sgra ru 'dzin// shes rab pha rol phyin pa la// nges par 'thung ba'i tshul gsum po// chos sku ngo bo la sogs pa// mkha' dbyings mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa// gnas med gnas par sbyor ba
110b4(rgyud): yis// 'gro ba'i snying du rnam rol pa// zhi ba gcig la gnas pa'i mgon// 'khor ba dang ni gcig shos spangs// sngags las yang dag 'byung ba de// mi bskyod la sogs par brtag
110b5(rgyud): rnams// dngos med gnas pa ga / sgrub pa po rnams gzig sa mi 'gyur// gsang sngags rkyen gyi sbyor ba yis// de ni rdzogs longs spyod gzigs 'gyur// bcom ldan gsang ba
110b6(rgyud): gsungs pa 'di// don de 'tshal bar mi gyur pas// rnam rtog du ma'i kun rtog las// chos nyid de yis shas mi 'gyur// ji skad gsungs pa mi shes pas// phyi dus skye bo la la smra// 'jig rten pa/ 
110b7(rgyud): rnams drang bya'i phyir// gsang bar gyur pa bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// lag na rdo rje grags pa che// dgongs pa'i don ni rtogs gyur pa// bu khyod shes rab chen po 'a
110b8(rgyud): gang zhig shes pas ma 'ongs pa'i// skye bo rnam par mi rtog 'gyur// tshig gcig la yang sna tshogs don// yang dag bsdus nas khyod kyis bshad// de nas dam pa bcom ldan 'das// bla ma kun
111a1(rgyud): mkhyen thams cad rigs// skyes bu dam pa de dag la// spyanangs kyis ni 'tsho bya'i phyir// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mtsho// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
111a2(rgyud): yi/ gsang ba yi ni mchog gi gnas// snying po sngags rnams thams cad kyi// bskul ba gcig pu zhes bya ba// de bzhin gshegs kun gsang gcig pu// mchog las mchog tu gsungs gyur pa/ 
111a3(rgyud): sku gsungs thugs kyi yang dag rtogs// dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs// dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang // chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs// dam tshig la
111a4(rgyud): dmigs de bzhin// nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las// tshig lam / dper brjod pa ni// de nyid sngagasu yang dag bsdus/ sna dgas gsung ba gzugs gcig pu// yi ge hUM ni sku gas
111a5(rgyud): la/ de nas yi ge oM gsungs te// de bzhin mgon pos yi ge AHsA ni de bzhin bzhi pa yin// hA yang 'dod lhar gyur pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas lnga// hUM oM AHswA de bzhin hA/ 
111a6(rgyud): 'di ni gsungs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// rab tu 'ang re zhing brgyal bar gyur// de rnams gnyis med sbyor la gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// zhi ba'i sbyor bar tshes gcig
111a7(rgyud): ba'i/ rnam par mi rtog chos gcig skyes// de nas bcom ldan 'das de yang // de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po yis// de yi byin rlabs sbyor don du dam tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to// nam mkha'a'i dbyings
111a8(rgyud): kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor bkod pa zhes bya ba// re re'ang gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// sgom par sbyor ba bsgom par bya/ bye brag go sum po gcig brtags pa'ang // bkod pa mi gsal ba nyid do// 
111b1(rgyud): zla ba'i dbus gnas yi ge hUM/ rang gi gzugs gcig rab tu brtag/ rdo rje 'od zer rab 'bar ba// rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// snying la de yis rnam bsgom
111b2(rgyud): nas sadang ldan de nyid skad cig der// rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang chen gtso// 'di ni kun mchog chen por skye// rang gi sngags kyis bskyed bya ba// sngags kyi cho ga dam pa'o// 
111b3(rgyud): snying po rang gi rdo rje sngags// rdo rje bsdus pa zhes bshad// rang sngags tshul las byung ba'o// skyes bu'i gzugasu bsgom par bya// sbyor ba bzhi po sbyor gcig pus// gnas bzhi dag tu dgod do// kha dog
111b4(rgyud): gsum po zhal gsum lta'i// de nyid gsum gcig rnam sgom zhes// / bcom ldan 'das mchog na mkha' ni// rdo rje dam tshig go/ bos gsungs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog zhi ba'i
111b5(rgyud): bdag nyid thub pa me// gcol phyag na rdo rje yis// gsang ba 'di ni slar zhus pa// hUM oM AHdang swA hA zhes/ de nas 'di ni ga/ sungs gyur pas// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas btsun
111b6(rgyud): de nas rab 'angar brgyal gyur cing // rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pa// thub chen de 'dir ji lta bur// mgon po de ni phye dus na// ji skad gsungs pa mi rtogs la// gcig pu mkha' mnyam sangs rgyas dang // byang
111b7(rgyud): chub sems dang 'thu chen rnams// rab tu 'dar shing brgyal 'gyur ces// byis pa rnams mi rtog so// lan brgya stong dang bya ba yi// grangs dag tu ni ston mdzad cing // ston pa sna tshogs ston mdzad kyang // 'drar
111b8(rgyud): zhing brgyal bar de ma gyur// ma 'ongs dus na'ang 'byung 'gyur ba// mi ni mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can// bla ma'i lung ni blangs nas su// rtags ni rang nyid 'dzin par byed// de ni sngags don gsungs pa yi// 
112a1(rgyud): mtshan cing garang 'di mi shes par// sngags don de nying mkhas pa yis// gzhan rnams la ni mi snyan sgrogs// 'phrul pa cung zad tsam mthong ma/ khan gang dag ni byed par 'gyur
112a2(rgyud): reg na dug dang mtshungs pa yi// mi de zhi bar mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig yid ni rin chen 'dra'i// 'gro la phan pa'i sngags pa rnams// 'di ni ma'adri dus su yang // dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// de rnams yang
112a3(rgyud): ngag bsdu ba'i phyir// skad cig rjes gsungs grub don du// sbyar bar dgongs pa'i bsam pa can// bcom ldan 'di ni bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ngan phyag na rdo rje la// de ltar bya yang
112a4(rgyud): ngag sbyor// sgom pa'i dngos po rtog byed pa// dbang po nyi mthu/ ba pa nyid// gang zhig phyogs bcur gnas pa rnams// sras bcas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
112a5(rgyud): nga gyur// phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i// lus las skyes te yod pa 'di// stong pa'i rkyen du sbyor ba las// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas gyur 'dod // sngags de sngags pa sangs rgyas de/ 
112a6(rgyud): bdag nyid de sras yang dag sbyor// ni sogs mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las// zhi ba'i bde ba de nas brtsam// bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis ngag cing // rang bzhin dri ma med byas la// ngal dang myur dang gnas pa
112a7(rgyud): sna tshogs de gcig dgra la gzhug/ yid dman rim la sogs pas kyang // sbyor ba de nyid dag la gnas// de nas dbang po med gyur pa// gang che zhi ba'i bde gcig pu// rang bzhin dag pa'i sbyor ba ste// / 
112a8(rgyud): de yi chos ni lta ba po// de nas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sngags// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam las byung // gang phyir rang ni zlo gyur pa// yi ge hUM gi gsang sngags lnga// de tshe snying las rab 'dar cing // 
112b1(rgyud): dbang po thams cad brgyal bar gyur/ gang yang phung sogs yan lag ni// sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad de/ den kyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i// rnal 'byor pa yi lus rab 'angar// rke bar mtshon sogs tshig
112b2(rgyud): rnams ni// phung po la sogs bshad pa gang // sangs rgyas sras bcas par gyur te// de ni brgyal zhing 'angar bar 'gyur// de gnyis la ni snyoms 'jug pa// sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas/ rdo rje
112b3(rgyud): sems dang shing dras// de sngags bdag nyi ngos las byung / de 'di mchog tu 'byung ba yin/ rdo rje gsang brdang byung ba// bla mo'i snying ga drang dus gnonas par/ dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam pa'o// 
112b4(rgyud): yi dbus gnas ni ba yi// go 'bang mchog ni bsam pa bya/ de hUM zhes phyi'i 'od po che// nga yongs gyur pa'i rdo rje ni/ 'di ni mchog gyur rtse lnga pa/ rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu smos// rdo rje lcags cu'i
112b5(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum ni bsam par bya// de yi snying khar bsdams nas ni// lha rnams rab tu bskul bar bya// 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// 'khor lo
112b6(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs sogs pa'ang // rol mo 'di ni dag pa ste/ rdo rje lcags kyu rnam bsgoms nas// snying kha ru ni bskul bar 'gyur/ rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di// zhag bdun par du byas nas ni// ye shes rdo rje
112b7(rgyud): can gyi gsang // rdo rje gsum po yang dag sprug/ phung ba la sogs sangs rgyas gang // de ni dngos po med lta ba// de nyid mchog gi gsang sngags kyis// skrag pa rnam smin mthong ba la// sgrog pa mi rnams 'di gi
112b8(rgyud): ste/ gsang sngags gnyis med sbyor cig byung // mthong bas skrag ste mchog ster cing // 'di dag 'di nyid brtags pa yin// zhi ba gcig pu'i sbyor ba las// sngags lus rdzogs pa nyid gyur nas/ yid la
113a1(rgyud): mahU~M la n+d+haba'o// chos grub tu myer skyer bar 'gyur/ zung pol btugs sas rgyas dang // de na bya chub sems pa sas// sngags kyi byung ba nga
113a2(rgyud): bas rmongs pas 'da' ba byas nas ni/ de yi srog ni der zang 'gyur// bri ba nyid kyi sbyor gcig las// 'di ni 'jig rten 'das pa mchog/ de las bzlog pa 'jig rten pa'o// de nas bdag po bcom ldan
113a3(rgyud): 'das// 'jig rten gsum gtso ston pa po// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtses// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// gang zhig sngags kyi skyes bur bshad// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes gzugs// de ni dang
113a4(rgyud): bo gnyis sbyor ba'i// gcig par sgom pa rtag tu byed // bdag dmigs sems can yod min pa'i// sngags kyi dbang po rnam sgom pa// dbang po gnyis sbyor bzang po ste// dngos po thams cad rnam
113a5(rgyud): brtags pa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dam tshig mchog sgom pa'o// rang gzugs rdo rje yang dag sgro ra// rig ma dbang phyug bdag kyang sbom// gnyis med gnyis
113a6(rgyud): su med chags pa// lta ba dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro// gsang ba zhes bya der sbyar ba/ de nyid mnyam pa'i bdag nyid do// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// thams cad dbang bskur dam pa ni/ mi phyed rdo rje gsu
113a7(rgyud): grub pa/ gsang ba'i dgongs pa bka' stsal to// nam pa' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis// phung po bdag nyid mi dmigs pa// chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i rim// bud med de ni rgya chen 'gyur/ rab tu spyod pa
113a8(rgyud): 'di yis ni// 'gro ba'i bud med ces bya ba// gsang sngags de nyid don gsang zhing // de ni gsang bar nye bar spong // der ni yi 'o sangs rgyas rnams// bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin/ sngags rig dam pa sgo'o zhes/ 
113b1(rgyud): der ni bcom ldan gtso bos gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig ni// ston pa 'dir ni bla ma cher// 'jig rten pa la 'dir bshad de// 'jig rten 'das pa bzlog pa'o// nam pa' lta bu'i byang chub ni// 'di
113b2(rgyud): yis shin tu 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi yon tan mtsho// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog des 'thob// dgongs pa lung bstan gsang ba la// gang zhig sems ni dang gyur pa// gsang ba 'bad de yang dag
113b3(rgyud): srung 'di ni rtag tu legs par byed// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yang // de nyid bskul ba zhes bya ba/ le'u bcu pa yin par bshad// / de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ 
113b4(rgyud): rdo rje gsum mchog mchog gsang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun mtsho grwa gcig / nyi shu rtsa lnga mchog zhes bya'i// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje yis// sngags rig
113b5(rgyud): skyes bu ba'i// le'u 'di ni bka' stsal te// sngags mchog de ni phyag rgya che// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes sgom// rtogs dang bri ba 'thob pa'i phyir// rdo rje ye shes dag gis kyang // tshangs pa la
113b6(rgyud): sogs yang dag bshad// ye shes snying po dam pa ste// rdo rje gsum sogs bshad gyur pa// sku yi rdo rje 'thob byed pa'o// a dang zung ni gsung rdo rje// byang chub bdag med 'thob byed pa'o// hUM ni rdo rje gsum mtha'
113b7(rgyud): nyidaH sku gsung thugs ni 'thong byed pa'o// de ni 'jug sogs gnas nyid dang // ldang ba dag tu rab tu bshad// kau shu lnga sogs ming can gyi// skyes bu'i gzugasu 'di 'gyuro// de bas re re'ang gsum nyid de// 
113b8(rgyud): rdo rje gseng sngags nyid du gyur// brjod med sa bon brgyad pa las// de ni namakha' las brgyal 'gyur/ brgya phyed rlung ni gcig pu la// do las nges par nyi shu lnga/ skyes bu nyid du byung ba na/ mgrin bcu
114a1(rgyud): sa kyi ming sa dang // sgra smos gsod pa'i das bye 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa gcig zhi gyur// tshangs pa khyab 'jug drug po ste// 'jug pa la sogs rim du bshad / 
114a2(rgyud): 'di dag bsnyengs med de gcig pu/ de ni zhi ba dngos med nyid/ de las kyang ni yang dag 'byung / longs spyod rdzogs sku dam pa'o// de nas sngags gcig sprul pa las// 'gro ba'i don gyi bya bar 'gyur
114a3(rgyud): mtshams dang skye mchod nor lha'o// zla ba zung cig rig byed de// de la sogs pa'i grangs gyur rnams// de ni rigs pa'i skyes byar gnas// 'di rnams las gcig gzung nas ni// sangs rgyas rol mo
114a4(rgyud): bstan par bya// rdo rje sengal de nyid 'di// na mkha' rdo rje dbus bsam// dkyil 'khor brgyan pa zhes bshad po// yi ge/ b+hu ni nges pas bsam mo// rdo rje sprin ni spro bskyed pa'i// de bzhin
114a5(rgyud): gshegs pa drug gi sku/ de dbus gnas pa'i rnam 'byor par// / sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sgom// sngags rnam/ saM kun gyi gtsug tor ni// sngags kyi skyes bu gsang ba pa/ 
114a6(rgyud): gcig pu nyid ni bdag par gyur// sngags spyod don ni sgrub pa po// chos 'khor lo gcig 'khor lo mchog/ rgyalnga dang rmad byung tshe gtsug tor// lus dang rnam par rgyal de bzhin// bya ba mchog tu ya
114a7(rgyud): dag bshad// sbyor dang bya ba gnyis med bzhin// sbyor ba 'ba' shig nyid la 'di// b+h+rUM ni gtsug tor yin par bstan// ye shes rdo rje snying po 'di// dus sbyor gcig gi ming can no// na mkha'i khams dang mnyam
114a8(rgyud): nying ldan// sngags kyi skyes bu dngos grub stsal// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// oM zhes bya ba de ruM sgom// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge AHni rnam par sgom// chos kyi
114b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la'ang // yi ge hUM ni de ru sgom/ yi ge bruM ni gnas ming can// rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid// rdo rje gsum 'byung bka' stsal to// snying po dus gsum
114b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi// rdo rje gsum ni mnyes byed mchog/ sku dang gsungs thugs thogs ma mtha'// oM AHhUM ge grangs dang mnyam// sangs rgyas sku mchog gsung gi lam// thugs kyi ye shes 'a
114b3(rgyud): su bya/  rang zhing 'don pa nyid du ni// re re zhing ni yang dag bshad// sngags kyi skyes bu'i sbyor ba yang // rgyu yi bdag nyid ming can yin// byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rab
114b4(rgyud): sgrub pa'o// rdo rje ye shes sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas 'bras bu/ thob byed pa'o// sngags kyi rig pa zhes bsgrags pa/ 'di ni sangs rgyas skyes bu yin// rdo rje gsum mnyam mi phyed
114b5(rgyud): // rdzogs pa la sogs sgrim pa yi// de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje ni// gsum po yis rdo rje stsol// byin rlabs dpal chen zhes bya ba'i// dam tshig ting 'dzin gyur pa
114b6(rgyud): yin// rnam par dben dang ci rigs pa'i// stan dag lnga ni sbyor ba bzhin// rig pa'i skyes bur yang dag sbyor// brtul zhugs can gyis kun tu brtsam// thabs dang shes rab nyin zla phyed/ 
114b7(rgyud): thun gcig du ni rab tu brtag/ de yi phyed nyid zla phyed kyis// rdo rje gsum ni nges par 'grub// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rang bzhin nyid// 'jig rten pa'i yang phyin ci log/ rdo rje gsum sbyor
114b8(rgyud): stsol dngos grub grub par 'gyur the tsom med// na mkhang rdo rje dbus gnas par// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig dus/ bskyed pa yi ge oM bsgom bya/ sbyor ba
115a1(rgyud): bzhi yi gtan tshigs gang // snying por yongs su brtags pa yin/ sna rtse dang ni rtsa ba nyid// spyi bo mtha' ni dga' ldan gnas// gcig dang gsum gyi dngos por 'gyur// dag pa'i gnas
115a2(rgyud): kyi grong khyer ba/ phyed pa gsum gsum gyi ming can ni// rigs kyi dbye ba rdo rje gsum// sna yi rtse mo sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum sbyor brtul zhugs can// mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo// sgrol ma gtogs pa sangs
115a3(rgyud): rgyas spyan// 'od zer snga yi sprin chen po// rnam par snang mdzad gnyis med gnas// rdo rje rnam snang de las ni// dngos grub rgya chen gsol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku yi 'od 'dra ba// skad cig der 'grub rnal 'byor
115a4(rgyud): pa/ ye shes lnga po bstan nas ni// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// ye shes 'das dang ma 'ongs dang // da ltar byung ba rdo rje gsum// de 'dir bskal par brtags gyur pa// grangs med ces bya ni
115a5(rgyud): sku yi gsang ba de nyid 'di// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rim par gsu ngas// zhi ba'i bde las shes bya ba// rang myong sbyor ba gci ga las de// sku yi gsang ba mchog 'di ni// de bzhin gsheg
115a6(rgyud): bo kun gyis gsungs// rdo rje 'od zer bkod pA yi// ting 'dzin yang dag bka' stsal to// a dang u ni lkog mA'i dbus// rkan gyi steng gi ming can no// i dang ba ni lag g.yon nyid // u dang mu ni g.yas
115a7(rgyud): par brtag ri rdzu 'di ni gsang bar dgod// li ti rkang pa gcig shos la/ dkyil 'khor gcig ni de nyid// dkyil 'khor lnga las rgyal gyur pa// ha ni lus skyes gtsug tor dang // gcod ni gsum po gad
115a8(rgyud): pa ban/ yon tan 'ani yi bzhi po de// lnga po'i lnga par de 'gyur// rnam pa'i rdo rje gcig byed sbyor// da ni 'od zer lngar 'gyur// rig pa chen po de nyid 'di// tshe zhes bya bar de yongs bsgrags/ dus can
115b1(rgyud): bdag nyid sbyor dbang po// de yi rang sbyor gzugs can gcig/ a ni thabs 'gyur sbyor ba ni// dbang po gnyis po gcig tu'o// na mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog bsam pa// rang sngags
115b2(rgyud): skyes bu bsam nas ni// AHning gau gi lam du bzhag/ kha dog lnga yis kun nas ni// dbang ba gnyis pa gcig tu// rgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po dag/ 'jig rten dbang phyu mchog sgom pas// dam tshig ya shes bsgo
115b3(rgyud): por bya// gsung gi dam tshig spros par bshad// khyab bdag mi zad rtag pa ste// thog mtha' med pa'i mthar thug pa// zhi ba mya ngan 'das zhes bya// chos kyi gsung las rnal 'byor dbang // rdo rje chos dang 'dra
115b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje gsung gyi bskal pa ma gnas// gsung gi gsang ba 'di nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs// dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba// ti
115b5(rgyud): 'dzin du yongs su bsgrags// rnam par rdo rje dbus gnas mchog/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// der ni rang sngags skyes bu ngag hUM ni sems la gnas rdzogs bya// ngas tshig chen po de
115b6(rgyud): de nyid can// kha dog rnam lnga bsgom par bya// rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// ston pa rdo rje thugs 'dra ba// yang dag ye shes yon tan mtsho// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// 
115b7(rgyud): rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// srog ma rkan dang de nas mnu// spyi ngos yi ming can te// rdo rje gsum thugs gsang ba gcig/ de nas haM las zhugs pa yin// de bzhin gshe kun ye shes ni// dam tshig rngu
115b8(rgyud): rje zhes bya ba/ rdo rje ye shes gcig las byung // ting 'dzin gsang bar bshad pa yin// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje chen por bsams nas ni/ lus kun la mi baM dmigs na/ 
116a1(rgyud): rjes shes skye bar 'gyur// dngos po med don gas la byed pa// la nyid kyis ni thams cad bshad / rlung gi rkyen dang kun sbyor las// kham du'ang 'gro bar gyur pa yin/ sangs rgyas bya
116a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' yis// yang dang yang du mchod pa dang // rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas// gnyis med ldan gyi ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid sbyor ba// so so ru ni yang dag gnas// nam mkha'i rdo rje dam
116a3(rgyud): tshig cha// chos rnams des ni mi gzig so// sangs rgyas kun ni gnyis med rang // mi snang 'di yi dam tshig yon// dngos po med pa'i gnas thob na// songs kyis kyang mi gzig so// sku gsung thugs las
116a4(rgyud): yang dag byung // mi snang rdo rje gsum 'di yin// de yi bkod phreng shes bya/ nye ba// ting 'dzin ni yang dag gsungs// ma 'dres pa yi chos bdag nyid// sku dang ldan pa'i 'od po che// rdo rje dkyil 'khor
116a5(rgyud): dbus gnas pa'i rang sngags skyes bu bsam par bya// haM ni rdo rje bzhir bshad pa/ snying khu ru ni yaM mdzes pa// rtag tu sbyor bas gzhug pa ni// 'od zer rnam par bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs
116a6(rgyud): kyi longs spyod ni// 'jam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje can// sa bcur rab tu gnas na ni// dgongs don de tshe kun tu byung // ye shes nyid ni zla ba 'di// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can// snang ba can zhes bya ba yi// ting
116a7(rgyud): 'dzin ni yang dag bshad// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// b+hU ni 'bar ba'i 'od bzang ba// mtshon cha mchog ni rdo rje yis// rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje mkha' 'dra sbyor// dam tshig bkod
116a8(rgyud): nga'i gnas gyur pa// tinge 'dzin dam tshig mi snang ba'i// b+h+rUM ni yang dag 'byung ba bshad// sangs rgyas mngon par shes gnas pa// dam tshig tu ni yang dag bshad// mngon pashes lnga dang 'dra ba 'di// de ni skyes
116b1(rgyud): bu mchog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas mngon par shes mchog sgrub pa// 'di ni dam pa yin par shad// de yi dngos grub thams cad kyi// dngos grub chen po sgrub pa'i mchog/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 
116b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i mchog bsgoms la// yi ge oM ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di // yi ge oM ni mi zad gamo// 'di ni mi phyed sbyor ba yis// 
116b3(rgyud): bsgoms pas mi bskod 'dra bar 'gyur// mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig mchog/ de sku byang chub rdo rje can// ting 'dzin du yang dag bshad// de ni skyes bu dam yin// mi bskyod mtshungs pa'i sku dang ni// gsung thugs
116b4(rgyud): rtse gcig 'dzin pa los// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// rdo rje can gyis mchod par 'gyur// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas dpar// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan pa bsam// na ma'i
116b5(rgyud): rdo rje rab bsgoms te// de nas rdo rje rnam par sgom// rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// dkon mchog dpal dang 'od 'dra zhing // dkon mchog gsum dpal mtshungs pa yi// bcom ldan
116b6(rgyud): dkon mchog dpal 'dra zhing // sku gsung thugs sgor rdo rje yis// ye shes gsang ba'i gnas su 'gyur// ting 'dzin dpag med las byung ba// rdo rje ye shes 'dzin de 'gyur// longs spyod dam tshig ces bya ba// 
116b7(rgyud): rin chen rdo rje gcig tu 'byung // de nyid gsum gsod dgongs pa las// rin chen rdo rje de gnas 'gyur// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug
116b8(rgyud): rab bsgoms la// der ni chos kyi oM sbom mo// chos kyi oM ni de tshe yang // rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis// rdo rje dpag mad 'dra ba ni// bcom ldan dpag med rdo rje can// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// dpal
117a1(rgyud): med tshe dang 'dra bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po lam gyi mchog/ 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// ye shes rgya mtsho dpal dang ldan// 'gro don gcig tu 'byung bar 'gyur// don yod pa yi
117a2(rgyud): dam tshig mchog/ sems can don ni sgrub gyur pa// 'od zer ye shes mchog ces bya'i// ting 'dzin du yang dag bshangad // sems can khams ni ma lus pa'i// longs spyod kun tu 'gyur ba yi// namakha'i dbyis
117a3(rgyud): kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// de ni nam snang rdo rjer bshad// 'od zer der ni rab tu sgom// rnam par rgyal ba'i yi ge oM// 'od cheni dar ni rab tu sgom// de nas 'di ni rdo rje
117a4(rgyud): gsum// rnam par snang mdzad 'dra bar 'gyur// de ni bcom ldan mgo na bos bshad// rnam snang rdo rje can de yin// rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor las// rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'ong // de nyid ye shes
117a5(rgyud): rdzogs byang chub// rdo rje sku gsum sgrub pa po// skra dang gsung thugs rdzogs byang chub// de la dmigs pa'i rdo rje can// ting 'dzin zhi ba nyid sbyor ba// 'gro ba'i don ni sgrub pa'o// tshig gcig la
117a6(rgyud): ni sna tshogs dog// sngags kyi de nyid gsal gyur pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog la// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ni// gsang dgongs rdo rje zhes bya ba// thub pa che la slar yang zhus// oM A hA ni
117a7(rgyud): gsum la sogs// b+h+rUM sogs thogs mar gnas pa yis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sngags kyi skyes bur de 'gyuraro// oM ni nam snang rdo rjer 'gyur// AHni 'ji rten dbang phyug gtso// sI ni rdo rje sems
117a8(rgyud): dpar bshad// skyes rdo rje can du 'gyur// b+h+rUM ni gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur// baM ni nges par mi snang ba// ho ni 'jam dpal yang dag bshad// sprin rdo rje bkod ces bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i rin po che/ 
117b1(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug dngos grub stsol// de bzhin mgon po nas snang mdzad// oM la sogs pa lnga las skyes// oM AHhUM ni de nyid gsum// rnam snang rdo rje can gyur pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje grags/ 
117b2(rgyud): shin tu rnam par nges bshad// gsang sngags dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor pa// lnga po bco lngar yang dag bshad// khrag gi sbyor ba las byung ba// gsang sngags skyes bu zhes bya ba// gsang sngags chen
117b3(rgyud): bo'i sbyor ba yang // ting 'dzin skyes bu dam pa yin// sna tshogs sngags don de nyid 'gyur// phyag rgya gcig par dkyil 'khor te// de dag gsang bar bshad pa ni// dgongs pa gcig las yang dag
117b4(rgyud): 'byung // dga' ba gcig cing dga' ba'i ming // de dag ji ltar to/ gas par 'gyur// mgon po rkyen dang bral ba'i mi// pi bang / sgra ni mchis ma lags// de bzhin phyag rgya med pa ni// gas
117b5(rgyud): sngags dngos grub mi 'byung // brda' gsum gyi ni de nying 'di/ gang gi don du rab gsungs pa// lag pa'i sbyor bas rab smra ba pa'i// spyan rgya ji ltar gnas par mdzad// sngags dang phyag
117b6(rgyud): rgya sbyor ba ni// phyag rgyag gcig pu'i sbyor drang // gsang sngags gcig pus mi 'grub ces// khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad// 'dir ni sngags sbyor cig pu las// phyag rgya bstan par ma mdzad na/ 
117b7(rgyud): gsong sngags gcig skyes dngos grub ni// 'jig rten pa rnams ji ltar sgrub// sngags la dmigs pa'i sbyor gyur pa// lha rnams kyi yang sbyor la so byung // 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// yid bzhin
117b8(rgyud): nor bu lta bur 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa zhes bya dang // yang na shin tu 'jig rten 'das// mgon po 'jig rten pa rnams kyi// ji ltar 'gro la de phan 'gyur// spyan drang ba dang gshegasu gsol/ 'dir/ 
118a1(rgyud): ji ltar legs par brjod// gang gis 'dir ni dngos grub 'grub// lha rnams mngon phyogs ji lta bu// 'di dag ma 'ongs skye bo yis// gang zhing shes na yang dag par/ nges/ 
118a2(rgyud): par rnam rtog med 'gyur ba// mi yi skyes bu 'di dag gsungs// de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das// dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ste// phyag rgya'i nges par 'jig rten pa'i// phyag na rdo rje la gsung so// 
118a3(rgyud): rnam rtog sna tshogs lcags zhes bya// zhes pa gsum tshogs bdag nyid las// gsang sngags skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis// de ni mi mchog dag tu 'gyur// gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa yis// lpags
118a4(rgyud): ni gser du byed pa yin// de bzhin sngags kyi de nyid kyis// mo ni bder gshegs byed pa yin// nges byas sbyor ba'i ga sang sngags ni// zhi 'ang dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// phyag rgya
118a5(rgyud): med pa'i sngags gcig pus// sngags kyi skyes bur 'gyur/ ra ba yin// dngos med pa las yang dag skye// sngagasakyi skyes bu 'byung ba ste// 'di ni phywa rgya chen po ste// 'gro ba'i don
118a6(rgyud): ni rab sgrub po'o// spyan drang bar ni bzhugs pa yis// myur ba yis ni gshegasu gsol// gnas pa yis ni de sgrub pa'o// yid ston dngos grub dam pa yin// de ni skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis// phyag
118a7(rgyud): rgya che dang gcig sgrib las// myur ba la sogs gsum ldan pa// de ni phyag rgya yi bar bshad// 'bad de bla mas slob ma yi// rna ba'i drung du bshad par bya// myur ba dang ni 'jug pa dang // gan
118a8(rgyud): ba'i rjesu sbyor ba rnams// spyan drang ba dang gshegasu gsol// 'di dag phya rgyar yang dag gyur// sgrub pa la ni myur la sogs// ci rigs pa ni nges par sbyar// phung po la sogs chos rnams
118b1(rgyud): kun la stong zhing rten 'bre las byung ba// mthong zhing de bzhin sbyor ba las// chos kyi skur ni de gnas 'gyur// 'dir ni gsang sdug sbyor 'gyur med// phyag rgya'ang chos sku 'di nyid yin// de lta na yang 'gro
118b2(rgyud): ba'i don// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byed// 'on te rdo rje 'dzin gong zhing // sbyor ba gsum dang ldan pa'i mi// spyan drang ba dang gshegasu gsol// de bzhin du ni gnas gyur pa'o// nye ba'i tshig ni spyan drang ba/ 
118b3(rgyud): riganas lag par rab tu sbyor// de bzhin gsang sngags de nyid kyang // gnyi ga la ni yang dge sbyor// rigs kyi dbye ba sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya bu med yin par bshad// sems kyi rkyen sbyor bdag nyid ni// 
118b4(rgyud): 'jig rten par ni rab tu rtag/ rang gi mtshan mar yang dang / sbyor// rigs kyi dbye ba'i spros yis// phyag rgyas sa gsum la gnas pa// sa 'og klu yi bu mo yang // bortul zhugs can
118b5(rgyud): gyi sems kyis dgug zhugs pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni// de na mas gnas nga'i sbyor ba zhidang // dngos med de gcig pu yis/ 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// gzhan yang gsang ba pa yi
118b6(rgyud): mchog/ sems kyi rkyen ni nyid ltos dang // dngos med byang chub 'thob pa la// gsang sngag mang cod phyag rgya yad// 'jig rten ni rtog ci rnyed// dus gsum du ni kun 'byung ba// da ni dngos med sems gcig las// rnal
118b7(rgyud): 'byor ngas ni skad cig rtogs/ byang chub kun rdzob ma yin la// de las gzhan du 'di rnyed mi 'gyur// gzhi ga las mi ni gzhan las min/ mun pa'i sgron ma mtshungs par 'gyur// sems can bsam pa'i ba
118b8(rgyud): gau sngags// gsang ba 'di ni rab ston te// de ni sgrub dang bsgrub bya dang // rnam par mi rtog brtags pa'o// sems can kun gyi longs spyod du// sngags kyi skyes bu rab tu gnas/ nam pa' mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni/ rnam
119a1(rgyud): par dben par rab tu brtag/ gsal dang mi gsal yang dag ldan// rlung dang 'bab chu la sogs yin// mya ngan 'das pa gnas sbyor ba// dur khrod la sogs pa yi ming // 'di ni sngags rig
119a2(rgyud): tshogs rnams kyi// bsam gtan bsdus las spong pa'o// 'jig rten 'das pa de nyid 'dir// 'jig rten po bzlog pa'o// mi bskyod ye shes la sogs pa// rdo rje na mkha'i dkyil du bsam// mngon shes lnga yi
119a3(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas spros// rdo rje mngon shes rdo rje che// dam tshig mchog tu bka' to// rdo rje chen po rab mdzes pa// rtse lnga pa la de bzhin 'bar// rang bzhin lnga ru sbyor ba yis// 
119a4(rgyud): mngon shes lnga por 'gyur ba yin// mngon shes lnga yi ting 'dzin la// gnas nas bla na med pa brtag/ gtso bo me rtag mang po 'khrug/ rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje la rab dgod byas
119a5(rgyud): bas/  rdo rje mngon shes skye bar 'gyur// namakha' rdo rje dbus gnas par// 'khor lo rdo rje 'bar 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas 'jug par rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas mchog dang 'dra bar 'gyur
119a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus par// lus la rnam par snang mdzad bzhag/ snying khar yi ge oM bsams na// sngags la mngon shes sgom par 'gyur// 'gog pa rdo rje gyur pa'i sems// nam zhig bdag
119a7(rgyud): nyid bdag las skyes// sangs rgyas kun mchog 'byung ba yi// dang ldan yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// der ni mi bskyod rab tu sgom// hUM ni steng kha'i zla gnas/ 
119a8(rgyud): par 'basams la sems ni de ru bzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sbyor// AHni snying kha'i thig ler gnas// bsams las rdo rje'ang yang ngag bzhag/ 'di ni
119b1(rgyud): dgongs pa'i mchog cag rdo rje mi phyed gsum sbyor skyes// 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas dngos grub cher 'byung ba'o// rnam pa'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom
119b2(rgyud): par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM// bsams na bskal pa gcig tu gnas// rnamakha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus dang ngag sems yi AHbsam
119b3(rgyud): na bskal bdag tu gnas/ ma par dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus dang ngag sem sra yi ge hUM/ bsams na don bsgral par gnas// bcom ldan bdag po
119b4(rgyud): rdo rje gsum// dam tshig rtog pas de skad gsungs// dgu mdza' can gyi yi ge 'di// sngags kyi skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// brjod du med cing ming med la// shes dang shes bya rnam
119b5(rgyud): spangs pa 'ang // kun rdzob la ni legs gnas na// tshi ga gi sngagasu 'di brjod// rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje can// rnal 'byor 'dir 'gyur phyin cad ni// gang zhig klog gam sems kyang rung // rdo rje ye shes lta
119b6(rgyud): 'gyur// ji ltar gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po// dgongs pa lung ston 'di byur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis de lung bstan// khyad par du yang byin gyis rlob// klog cing sgom dang ldan par ni// bris nas gang du
119b7(rgyud): 'jog gyur pa// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig skyes rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// khams gsum thams cad bcom nas ni// myur ba de bzhin gshegs 'gyur zhing // 'khor los bsgyur
119b8(rgyud): ba'i bu bzhin du// byang chub myur du nges 'thob bo// khams gsum sku dang gsung thugs kyi// sngags pa'i yan lag gyur pa ni// sangs rgyas 'dus la brtan pa yis// de ni dngos po med par 'dzem
120a1(rgyud): dngos med gcig pu rdzogs longs spyod// phung sogs yan lag don las byung // bde gshegs sems can spangs pa ni// sngags bsngags las las gyur pa yin// ji ltar rnam par
120a2(rgyud): rang mtshan nyid// skad cig kyi ni 'dor mi byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas thams dang // rigs las skyes la byin gyis rlob// dgongs pa lung ston la gnas nas// gsang ba'i rin chen yang dag srung // migs cu
120a3(rgyud): rang gi ngo bo nyid/ spyod pa ci dga' byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// gsang so ba'i dgongs pa'i ming can te// sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba dang // gsang sngags dam tshig de nyid byung // 
120a4(rgyud): ni rig pa skyes mchog/ bcu gcig par ni yang dag bsha/ ras ni bris dang mchung bar 'thub 'thob pa'i phyir ni les gyur// de nas dang ldan rnam snang mdzad// bskyed pa ye shes bla ma gtso/ 
120a5(rgyud): de nyid dam chog mchog gyur ba// rdo rje gsung gis bka'astsal to// mapa dang mtshungs shing mi rtog la// rang zhin gyis ni dmachos can// dngos meng shin tu dri med la// dam tshig ni
120a6(rgyud): tu gyur kyang ni// gar dang glu dang rol mo dang // dgod dang sgeg pas rab mdzes pas// 'jig rten sangs rgyas gar mkhan gyi// rol mo 'di dag rab tu sgom// gzhon nus bsgrubs pa sems can ni// ji ltar ji ltar
120a7(rgyud): ston pa bzhin// gar sogs cad mos byang chub ni// myur du de nyid las 'thob 'gyur// 'dod du'i yon tan lngar ldan pa// de yi ming ni yid ldan pa// dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu gnas// lhun gyis grub pa'i
120a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'gyur// sems can gang 'di mthong ba dang // thos shing reg par gyur pa ni// de ni um par yi/ me tog 'dra bar gyur ba yin// sems can kun gyi gtso bo 'di// gsung gi rdo rje chos nyis skye
120b1(rgyud): gcig dang du ma las grol ba/ rten 'byung gsal bar byed pa yin// de nas gsang ba'i bdag mchog de// chos kyi de nyid rab ston pa// thub chen rnam par snang mdzad la// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus// mgon po de nyid
120b2(rgyud): bsdus pa las// rol mo 'dir ni gyur pa dang // 'jig rten pa de gar byed pa// gsungs te ma 'ongs skye bo ni// chos dbyings de ni gar min na// gtso bo ji ltar gar bgyid lag so// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan gas
120b3(rgyud): gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba yin// chos dbyings de ni glu min na// gtso bo ji ltar glu len 'gyur// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan glu// gsang mthon myos pas bskal ba lags// chos dbyings de ni rol mo
120b4(rgyud): mem/ gtso ba dri ltar rol mo 'gyur// 'jig rten rkyong ban mo dngas rol mo// gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/ chos dbyings deng gong ma lags ni// gtso bo ji ltar rgod par 'gyur/ 
120b5(rgyud): rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pa na rjod// gsang mthon rgyo pas bskul ba lags/ chos dbyings de sgeg ma lags na/ gtso 'dza ltar sgeg par 'gyur// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan skrag
120b6(rgyud): gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags// de ltar rnams pa mang po la// gzhan rnams kyang ni sbyor byed cing // bza' dang min las sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor pa ni bdag yin snyam// rdo rje yi ni tshig mchog 'di // 
120b7(rgyud): yod med rab tu zhi ba nying / de yi rang bzhin gcig sbyor bdag/ yang dag mchog bsdus de seng mchog/ de nas de ning yang dag bzung nal 'byor rigs mchog rnal 'byor pa// dacing gsum mnam zhing sbyor gsam
120b8(rgyud): rgyam ponir mi stog sgra tshogs chur byis nam dadod pas no na'i nirnams la so des / gcig pu ra ba da med dus pashang pa'i/ gar gyis myong bung nga'abar byed/ rdzogs pa'i byang chubasogs ngos su'o//  lnga
121a1(rgyud): khyod kyis gsungs pa rnams// sems ni ba yi rnal 'byor pa// de rnams lhun gyis grub par gyur// mngon po shes rab 'di srid du/ thabs kyis mchil bar nye bar sbyor// sngags kyi
121a2(rgyud): gzan gyi sbyor ba yis// khyed ni 'jig rten pa rnams 'dzin// bshad du zin kyang min rig pa/ dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ni// gzhan rnams la ni ston mdzad pa// ngo bo nyid ni gzhan min pa'o// phyi rol sngags
121a3(rgyud): don dngos grub ni// de nyid du ni chol mod kyi// 'gal ba'i rjes 'jug chos nyid can// der yang 'grub par 'gyur ma yin// de rnams gsang ba mi srung zhing // sred pa yis ni ston par byang // bcom ldan 'das gsung
121a4(rgyud): gsang ba ni// gsang mchog tshig gis sgrogs par byed// khyod bka' las 'das dman pa rnams// sngags kyi nus pa rnam spangs pa// 'dzi garten pa rnams sdang 'gyur zhing // de rnams 'grub par
121a5(rgyud): 'gyur ma yin// sred pa 'am dang pa dag gis kyang // rkyen dang de bzhin nyan/ thos rnams// gsang ba la ni smig rgyu bzhin// rigs skye sa gzhan yang ltung bar 'gyur// mgon po de na der bcwa
121a6(rgyud): shang // nyams shing blo gros dman par gnas// de nas tshig min gyur par 'byung // tshig gi bdud rtsi sbyor ba las// chos kyi tshul 'di thos pa dang // phyi nas 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur// byang chub
121a7(rgyud): sems dpa' lhung 'gyur bar// bdag nyid che de byed par 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub 'gyur ba dang // sngags pa rnams kyang gsang ba lags// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// gsang ba mdo sde rnam
121a8(rgyud): smra ba// gdong g.yogs pa yi sbyor ba yis// de tshe tshig gis rig skyes pa// gsang sngags la sogs chos rnam la// dad pa rnams ni snyed mi byed// logs pas mkhas pa'i nga rgyal ni// byis pa phyi
121b1(rgyud): nas byed par 'gyur// a yi dog pa'i ras 'di ni// sbyor shes rnams kyi 'di ma yin// de rnams dad pas rjes 'jug pa// gtam dag yang ni byed par 'gyur// sgra ni g.yo yi tshul gyis ni// rgyal po rnams ni
121b2(rgyud): sra bar byed// steng du g.yogs pa dag gis ni// brgyad gnyis pa la tshul du byed// de ni ma skyes pa yi bdag/ ras kyi rgyu med pa nyid ni// A yi dog ras nyid rgyal po'i// yang dag dngos grub byed pa'i
121b3(rgyud): tshig/ dam pa'i skye bo nyid mthong na// de ni longs spyod lam skyed min// de bas skye bo med gcig pu// bya ba'i sems ni rab tu 'jug/ der ni mche ba can mi 'gro// de la brtsal ba 'ba' shig yin// rgyal po
