121b4(rgyud): dngos grub chen po'i ras// bar chang shin tu mang po pa// bya ba de ni nam par 'joms// sgrib pa med pa'i rnal 'byor ca na// de ni tshig de thos pa dang // rgyal po'i bar du yid dga' zhing // dngos
121b5(rgyud): grub chen po'i rigs mtshogs las// su zhig bdag ni zlog par byed// ras kyi bar chang byed pa dag / de la chad pas bcad par bya// 'di la 'jigs pa'i sems bor la// skye bo med par khyed kyi
121b6(rgyud): ning rgyal rigs dag gam rigs bzang sram// gang zhig mi sran rigs can rnams// dog med pa ras 'jig pa// de dag thams cad brlag par bya// de nas rgyal po sbyin pa ni// rgyud kyi slob dpon bdag nyid
121b7(rgyud): che/ rin chen rin thang med lnga sogs// bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu'o// 'di yis gdong ni g.yegs nas su// rgyal po 'bras bu longs spyod cig/ AHyi dog paras do byin// ji ltar skye bzhin rgyal po byas/ 
121b8(rgyud): rin chen rin thang med blangs rnams// 'di ni ji ltar bzhag nasu// de nas de ni mi snang ba// rgyun can des ni de tshe byas// de la so gra'i snatsan+do tshig/ rigs skyes pa la de rnams smra// rang nyid 'jigs shing gan
122a1(rgyud): rnams kyang // skrag par byed cing the tsom med// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// 'byin pa ston pa mnga' bdag gtso// phyag na rdo rje go byed pa// snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal
122a2(rgyud): pa/ rdo rje rdo rje chen po legs// rdo rje thal mo bstan byas te// rdo rje 'di ni zhus gyur pa// de nyid bsdus pa dam pa'o// rdo rje thal mo de nyid 'di// lung bstan bya yis de nyon cig/ de nyid gsum du gyur pa de// rdo
122a3(rgyud): rje thal mor yongs su brtag/ de nyid gsum ni lha gsum ste// tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// de rung ni lha gsum 'gyur// oM AHhUM dang grangs mnyam pa'i// gsang sngags 'jug pa thams
122a4(rgyud): nga ni/ sna tshogs lus can gcig ming can// ni bzhid ni gang du ston// der ning yang gnas pa yin// dpral yon de la bzhin mo sdug/ de yi skyes bu ming ldan ming // de rnams lag
122a5(rgyud): ba'i dbus nas ni// mthe ba sogs ji bzhin grangasu ba shang / lag sa/ g.yon ni drag po 'gyur// g.yas pa de bzhin na dz+nyA// gnyis po sbyor ba tshangs pa yin// de bas yon na
122a6(rgyud): gsum bdag dang // rigs dang mchod sbyin snyan tshig ste// rigs byed der gyur gsum du bshad// srid bsrungs ni bang yin te// ma thar ni 'gro ba gnas pa yin/ lag pa gnyis pa 'di dag
122a7(rgyud): ni bzhi po'i byed phyed rnam brlad pa// myong po'i chams kyi hU~M mchog ni// rab tu zhi bar rab tu bsgrags// nyi ma zla ba mi rnams der// so sor yongasu bsgrags pa yin// yi ge phyed tsam mchog
122a8(rgyud): gyur dang / shes pa zhi ba skyon med pa// yon tan oM dang yi ga phyed// oM zhes gsal bar brjod pa yin// sna yi rtse mor yang dag ldan// gtsug mtha' dang lag par gnas// nyi ma zla ba'i sbyor ba/ 
122b1(rgyud): las de ye shes me ni nges par skye// lce dang rkan gyi mtshan ma ni// AHna khyab 'jug yin par bshad// hAn rlung du gyur pa yan/ da 'ang drag pa zhes pa'o// sbyor las thar bar de bshad de/ AH'og tu
122b2(rgyud): a dang yang dag ldan/ de steng yi ge AHnyid de// thad ka ru ni ni ma ba sha // khyod ni yig phyed zhi ba nyid// yi ge oM ni tshangs pa ste// A ni khyab 'jug yin par bshod // hUM ni rlung du gyur pa yin// de nyid drag po
122b3(rgyud): zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i byed byed zhes bya ba// der ni bdag yongs bsgrags pa yin// gnas dang 'pho dang skye ba dang // gzhan gyi lus las yang dga'a'o// ye shes rang nyid med yin te/ khyab par 'dzin pa de bzhin no// 
122b4(rgyud): ral gri la sogs dngos grub der// byang chub phyi rol nyid 'grub 'gyur// gnyis po 'di dag gnas pa yi rnam dag 'di dag rab tu brtag/ tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams der// ma 'ongs pa rnams
122b5(rgyud): sgom par 'gyur// de ni mtho ris sogs 'gag pas// de bzhin 'byung ba sel ba yin// rnal 'byor pa rnams srog spangs nas// gnyis spyad par ni rnam par gnas// shin tu sbyor gcig gyur song bas// 'jug
122b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni drag po yin// nam dgag pa yi sbyor ba yang // tshangs par gzhol ba'i bdag nyid can// mngal gyi gzugs gyur khyab 'jug ste// de yi dbus na dbus bzung ba// spu yo cha ni stong las gcig/ zhi de
122b7(rgyud): rnam par mi rtog nying // thar pa gcig par de ston bya khar ba'i ngo bzhing ma yin/ de lta bas na 'di log pa// zhi ba zhid ni sgregs pa'o// ston pa de rnams phye nas ni// zhi ba'i chos rnams smra bar 'gyur// thangs chen
122b8(rgyud): de bzhin shes rab dag 'di 'dra mthong bar mi 'gyuraro// tshangs la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun// khyed kyi thal mo dag la gnas/ de rnams phyag rgya ston byed cing // sngags ni bye ba mtha' yas pa/ 'di nyid
123a1(rgyud): du ni he zla dang // sbyin sreg las can me dang ni// lo dang zla ba'i sbyor ba dang // rtag tu 'char dang 'phel 'grib dang // de nyid gsum gyi sbyor skyes 'di// de nyid gcig pu rnam par gnas/ zhi ba nyid kyi
123a2(rgyud): sbyor chos la// de yang gcig dang dum spangs// khyed kyi thal mo las byung ba// de bas de ni 'da' mi bya// de bzhin gshegs kun sngangs 'gyur bas// de ni spong bor mi bya zhing // 'di dag dngos med la ltos pas// rnal
123a3(rgyud): 'byor pa ni mchog tu 'dod// gzhan du rnam rtog nyid las ni// dngos grub 'bras bu'i snod mi 'gyur// de bas thal mo sbyor ba 'di// sems can rjes bzung ngam pa yin// ma bsdus pa yi sems can rnams// 
123a4(rgyud): bsdu ba'i don du khyod kyis bya/ smang bya 'on pa lkug pa dang / rade bzhin long bar gyur pa dang // gang zhig 'phye bo la sogs gyur// / de rnams la ni ngan phyir bya// de la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa// de ni khyed
123a5(rgyud): kyi thal mor gnas// de ni 'jig rten 'das gtsar gyur// de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyu can no// de ni nang min phyi ma yin// gnyis ni/ na gzhan gyi rgyu las min// phyag rgya tshogs pa las skyes min// 'jis
123a6(rgyud): rten rkyen las byung ba min// rdo rje thal mo bsdams pas na/ ming ni rdo rje thal mor gyur// sems can rnams kyis rtogs dka' ba'i// snying po brtag par bya'i mchog/ phyag rgya 'di lta bu 'di yin// phyi nang gnyis kyi ming
123a7(rgyud): phan no// mi bskyod rin chen dpag med de// ngos grub nam snang de bzhin gshegs// 'di dag lag pa g.yas pa yi// mthe'u chung la sogs rnams la gnas// gnyis pos gcig gyur dge bdun te// de ni sgrubs/ 
123a8(rgyud): ni gsum yin te// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams// gcig dang gsum du brtags pa yin// phan tshun bcings pa'i rdo rje zhing / shes rab thabs kyi gnas mchog yin// thal mo bcings pa tsam
123b1(rgyud): gyis kyang // sangs rgyas thams cad nyid thob 'gyur/ skyabs mchog gsum dang de nyid gsum// rdo rje gsum dang rnam thar gsum// zhal gsum mdog gsum spyan gsum dang // lha gsum dang ni
123b2(rgyud): khams gsum dang // dus gsum dam tshig mchog gyur gsum// tshul gsum dkyil 'khor gsum du 'gyur// sbyor ba gsum dang lam gsum ste// ji srid rtog pas brjod pa rnams// de ni thal mo
123b3(rgyud): sbyor 'di yin// 'dod nar yon tan gsum gyi mchog/ rim dang bslab pa ster bdag ma 'ongs skye bos 'thob par 'gyur// de nyid du ni der 'gyur na// gcig dang du mar rnam par spangs// chos bshad
123b4(rgyud): bshad pa dngos med pa// 'gro ba rkyen gyis yang dag sdud// / 'di ni mkha' ltar rang bzhin gcig/ gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba// bsdu ba byas par gyur pas kyang // sku gsung don gyi chos
123b5(rgyud): nyid do// 'di ni thog mtha' med pa ste/ dngos po med cing gnas memang pa// mtha' med zad pa med par 'byung // skung gsung thugs kyi rkyen las ni// rnam pa'i 'jug pa'i ye shes te/ de las sangs
123b6(rgyud): rgyas snying por gyur// hUM gis sems can yang dag 'byin// sangs rgyas skur ni rab tu brtag/ oM ni thams cad sdud pa ste// A ni gnas pa par 'gyuraro// gcig pu rnam gsum de bzhin lnga// gsapa
123b7(rgyud): dang mi gsal sbyor ba ni//  'brel chos nying 'di yin te// de nyid kyi ni sngags the shang ba'o// zlos na bsam gtan rnam brel bar// de yi lhun grub 'bras bu ster// rang bzhin grub pa 'di yin te// 'dod pa'i
123b8(rgyud): bzlas par de bshong / rnal 'byor ba la de gsal te// byis rnams de la phyin ci log/ chen las byung ba de nying gsum/ dngos po med par de bshod// de nying bsdus pa bshad pa ni/ yid min pa yi bzlas pa
124a1(rgyud): 'gyur/ yid ston gcig ni mdor bsdus las// rings dang ngal dang gnas pa rnams// zhi ba'i chos nyid la skye ste// namakha'i dbyings dang mnyam par brim/ dngos po med pa'i/ 
124a2(rgyud): de nyid 'di// rten 'byung chos zhes bya ba yin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bsdus te gyur// sprul pa bsam mi khyab ces dben// sdud pa por ni gang gyur pa// de yang phul du gyur pa'i ming // rdo rje la sogs
124a3(rgyud): yang dag sbyar// sems can rnams ni de sbyor byed// dam tshig la sogs sngon de ni// de nyid kyis ni rdo rje sbyar// sems can dgongs pa'i sbyor ba yis// de yid chos rnams ston par byed// rnam pa dgu po thos
124a4(rgyud): mtha' can// sdud pa po rnams byas pa yin// gsang sngags de nyid gnas dgod pas// sems can rnams ni der 'jog s+ho// gsol ba 'debs dang phyag 'tshal dang // 'jig rten
124a5(rgyud): rnams la gsol ba dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams mnyes byed de// khyod kyi thal mor gnas pa yin// gang zhing sems can sangs rgyas gyur// de bzhin gnyis med chos nyid can/ 
124a6(rgyud): gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad sangs rgyas rnams gnaso// sna tshogs mtshon pa de nyid do// mthong ba gsal byed thal mo yin// de bas de rnams mgu gyur pa// chos kyi de nyid rkyen las so// 
124a7(rgyud): rgyu med rang gi ma tshade nyid 'di// khyed kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor las byung // gang zhig shes pas 'dod 'grub pa'i// dngos grub des ni 'thob par 'gyur// AHnyid der ni mi gsal ba'i// rgyu las
124a8(rgyud): sbyor bar gyur pa yi// dog par de ni yongs bshad de// dngos po med par ras kyi ming // 'phags pa gshin rje gshed bsgoms la// gzhon nu'i gzug su'ang bsgom par bya// dog pa de yi ris don/ 
124b1(rgyud): las mi snang ba la sogs grub cing // yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i don gcig yang dag byung / AHyi dog ras mtshon pas ni/ 'jig rten pa la dgongs pas bshad// 'di ni chos dang
124b2(rgyud): rdzogs longs spyod// sprul pas de ni gsum du 'gyur// byis pa rtog par bya ba'i phyir// de ni rnam pa lngar yang 'gyur// ba mal byis pa'i chos rnams gang // rnam lnga gcig pa'i rnal 'byor ga/ de la
124b3(rgyud): shin tu ldan sems can// sems can sogs la rnam par gnas// rtag pa ltar ni so sor snang // 'gro ba dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig/ skye ba med las skyes pas na// gcig drang du ma rnam spangs pa'o// 
124b4(rgyud): shes 'dong de tshe sngags pa ni// 'gro ba byis pa de tshe spyod/ de nas gas nga sngags grub 'gyur ba// rnam par mi rtog gcig shos nyid/  ya yi sde sogs gnas byas te// sngags ni na ri bri bar bya
124b5(rgyud): rang gi sde bcas gnas ni// yi ge a bzhinani 'gro ba// so so gnan ba'i bzhi pa ni// i u dang ni ring por bcas/ a e a~M/ u ye ste mtha'// bzhi po dang bcas zlum por bri/ 
124b6(rgyud): gyis mi khyab sbyor ldan pa'i// 'gro ba mnyam gzhag bskyed pa yin// 'di dag rang skyes gnas gzugs kyi// chu yi yi ger zhugs par 'gyur// de nas gzhon nu'i gzugs nyid kyang // rnam par bsgris
124b7(rgyud): pas skye bar 'gyur// cha bcas dbang gnas sngags pa ni/ bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// nag yi grangs bzhin du// skad sogs sbyor lo gang gnas pa// nyi shu yi ni sgron ma yang // de ni ras te ba
124b8(rgyud): pa'ang yon// sngon meng cha lugs gzugs kyis ni// khams gsum dag ni lta bar 'dong / 'gro ba'i don ni byed gyur pa 'am/ mnyam zhing ye shes de nyid las// yon tan gsum ni brdar byas pa// yon tan
125a1(rgyud): med pa'i yon tan ming // gnon nu'i spyod pa'i lus kyi ming // lta ba 'di ni bar skyes// de ni sgom glegs mtha'i yin te/ e u dang ni ring por bcas// yi gsum bcas thig ler ldan/ 
125a2(rgyud): cheg drug mtha' yi ring sde can// yi ge a ni yig sbyor ba 'ang // bcu gcig par yang gyur pa yin// de nyid ring po ring po'i mthas// bcu gnyis pa yi grangasu 'gyur// de nyid yi le ur sbyor las// yi
125a3(rgyud): ge oM zhes brjod pa yin// snga ma'i ri mo'i sbyor ba yis// ming ni bcu bzhi par 'gyuraro// tsa ste a las sngags pas ni// A nyid du ni blta bas bya// de bzhin A yo sbyor ba las// yi ge oM ni ci 'dod pa
125a4(rgyud): ji bzhin grangs kyis yang dag blta// re re'ang a yi sbyor bas bsgo// i r-i l-i u'i tshogs las kyang // sngag pa ya ra la wa'i gzugs// lkog ma mkha' dang bar dang ni// rkan dang
125a5(rgyud): spyi bor gang gnas pa// gang tshe a ka'i sde grangs las// A yi kha yi rgyab na gnas// i tshan phrag pa lag pa dang // tshogs rnams la ni de bzhin no// dpung pa dang ni lag pa dang // lag pa
125a6(rgyud): g.yon par rab tu brtag/ dpyi dang brla dang byin pa dang / rkang pa g.yas g.yon de bzhin no// gzugs de yi ni grangs mnyam pas// ta mtshan shin tu dngos grub ster// u tshan de bzhin dbus dang ni/ la
125a7(rgyud): ba ru ni yongasu bshad// rkang pa yang ni ri ti'i tshan// 'das pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa yin// de bzhin nyid kyi sbyor ldan pa'i// sngags pa rnams kyis shin tu mthong // lhun gyis grub pas dngos grub
125a8(rgyud): pan me tog gis mdzes phreng ba bzhin// rang rgyud kyin na shing du// lha mchog dag ni bya ba yin// dgongs pa la sogs rnam pa kun/ de nyid las ni bdage 'brub 'gyur// mtho'i bzhi ba ni sde sbyo
125b1(rgyud): mangs pa yi ni sgo rnams bya// ka tsa Ta ta pa tshan yang // dbus dang shar la sogs sngon 'gro// 'gro la phan pa'i 'dod pa yang // ma spel bar ni mthong ba yin// thams cad kyang ni rdzogs yi ge/ yi ge hA
125b2(rgyud): yis mchod par bya// sna tshogs pa ni 'byin byed cing // 'gro ba dus gsum gcig pa'i dngos// yi ge a ni lus su bya// lhag ma rnam pa dang bcas pa// mtshams med lnga yi sbyor ba las// sdug/ 
125b3(rgyud): pa 'gro ba phan par ston// sha thogs mthar gnas sngags las skyes// dbang bskur gsum po spyi las skye// gzugs med rtogs pa'i chos rnams ni// skad cig gcig gis nges sbyor gyur// de tshe
125b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor med byas pa// 'jig rten pa rnams chos dgar 'gyur// a ku he gnas byang phyogs gnas// yod pa nyid kyang dus gsum 'das// gang dang gang nas byung ba yi// gsang sngags
125b5(rgyud): bsam pas mi khyab gsungs// de dang de ni bzhugs gyur pa/ rang gi mtshan ma gcig shos nyid// gzugs// med 'di la gnas yod pa// cha ni gsum zhes bya bar 'gyur// steng
125b6(rgyud): 'og phyogs kyi cha rnam su// dngos med pa ni rnam par gnas/ dngos po gcig gyur mthong ba dang // 'gro bcas tshangs pa 'gra bdag nyid// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po las// smon lam la sogs
125b7(rgyud): bsgom bya ba'o// 'gro ba don gtogs 'dod pa'i yon tan gyur rnams la// dgyes pa'i bdade mchog dga' ba'i 'dod pa mdzod// sngon chad mdzad pa'i smon lam rab mchog dgongs nas ni// thub pa rdo rje
125b8(rgyud): tshig mchog rnam par dbye bar gsol// nor bu rin chen dag gis rnam rgyan sku yi mchog/ 'gro ba'i don byed sring mo bdag la brten par mdzad/ lhag pa'i snying rje las byung rab mchog ldan pa'i
126a1(rgyud): sku bdag ni yongs bzung la chos rnams don yong mdzod// snying mos kyang mi byung bar du// de ltar bskul btsam gyis ni// de nas yongasu 'dzin mdzad de// rig pa'i bad+ma
126a2(rgyud): dpal du mdzad// shin tu snyan cing yid 'ong dbyangs kyis ni// phan pas myur du 'gro ba gnyis med 'dir snod gyur// bla ma bdag ni gal te gson par mchis bzhed na// dga' ba las byung chos dga'
126a3(rgyud): bdag la dgyes par mdzod// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong dang gnas pa tsam 'dzin// nam yang lhod par gyur pa dag gi mnga' ba lags// kun tu song ba'i bdag nyid can gyi dam tshig ston// 'dod pa'i
126a4(rgyud): yon tan rnams dang khyed bdag 'dod pa mdzod// gongs pa'i ye shes rdo rje yis// sangs rgyas yon tan gcig la bzhugs// / bzlas brjod sbyin sreg de bzhini khrus// dkyil
126a5(rgyud): 'khor yongasu brtags pa mdzad// 'dod pa med cing chags la zhi// de yang dron dam ngag gyur yin// sbyong dus de bzhin sngags pa ni/ bzla sa brjod dngos po med pa yin/ bsnyengs pa yang ni yid pa
126a6(rgyud): ldan ma dang mig byed yon tan dang / zung dang zla dkyil rnal 'byor pa// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhag par bya// ha yi sngo tshan ka sde dang // bcu gnyis phyed phyed dag tu sbyar// gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs 'di
126a7(rgyud): ni/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la dgod// de nas sngags pa mdun 'dug ste// dgongs don gyis brtag par bya// phung po khrims la sogs lta ba// brda las ji ltar lus yin bzhin// ma byin len pa
126a8(rgyud): byang chub sems// kun rdzob bstan pa brdzun smra ba// phung po srog chags gyur pa ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bud med yin// mi sbyin tshig dang rkang pa ste// de bzhin rten pa nyid kyang ni// dus gsum
126b1(rgyud): sbyor ba gcig pu ru// sngags pa yis ni de bya'o// bshang bzhes ni yul la bshang // gci ba zhes ni dbang po pa yin// de dag za bar bshad pa ni// ma skyes gcig pur mthong ba'o// khrag ni ldug
126b2(rgyud): par yang dag bshad// sa bon lus zhes bya ba yin// rkang ni sems kyi kun rtog pa// za ba dngos med gyur pa'o// smon lam dbang gis 'di rnams ni// biM mu ru sha pa sa 'di// lha rnams sbyor ba'i chos/ 
126b3(rgyud): nyid du// bdud ci zhes ni brjod pa yin// dgongs pa yis ni bshad pa la// byis pa rnams ni yi ger rtog/ rdo rje theg le gnas khyod kyang // chos nyid de yang mi sheso// rtog pa kun las rnam 'das pas
126b4(rgyud): chos kyi dbyis te mtha' dang mtshungs// de 'dra 'jig rten rgyang pan pa// mthon po'i gsang gis rtog par byed// yi ge gang gis mi gang zhig/ 'gro la gsal bar rtog byed pa// 'gro
126b5(rgyud): don gcig pa'i sbyor ba las// de nyid kyis ni de nyid mthong // gang ni/ ga rnam smin smin pa yi// sems ni dngos grub la gno la ba// rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur sbyor las// 
126b6(rgyud): dngos po med pa nyid du byung // bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs// kun rdzob don gyi gnyen por 'byung // sprul pa'i lus las bsngags pas ni// sgyu ma bzhin du ston par byed// gsang ba'i
126b7(rgyud): dgongs pa de nyid 'di// 'jam dpal yas dam pa'o// rdo rje gsum gnas sbyor ba yis// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sbom// nam par brtag pa ro rnal 'byor la// phung po dgon pa chen
126b8(rgyud): 'dod/ gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin nyid gnas sa phyogs yin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dpag bsams shing // dngos grub sna tshogs me tog ldan/ sprul pa'i
127a1(rgyud): 'dus bu shin tu mdzes// rang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'i// dngos med dben pa rnams dga' ba/ rdo rje zhes bye de bstsu bya/ phung sogs yan lag thams pad de// sangs rgyas 'byung ba jo
127a2(rgyud): grub gyur// sngags 'don par ni gang gyur pa// bsdus pa sngags ni gcig pu pa// lus sogs rdo rje gsum la ni// rdo rje 'jam pa bsgom por bya// lus la sogs pa rdo rje gsum// de nyid gsum nas spro bar bya// 
127a3(rgyud): rdo rje gsum dang leg sbyor las/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// nam pa mtha' yas yang gartog/ sems sbyor ni dang ga chang yin// lnga bcu gnyis byur gang yin pa/ brgya po rgya nas mngon phyogs lo/ 
127a4(rgyud): rigs gcig pa'i yang dag rtogs// sna tshogs rdo rje 'ag// ra cig stsol// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// 'bar ba'i// rdo rje snang ba yis// sa la sogs brgyan pa ni// de ni snang ba zhes pashod/ 
127a5(rgyud): tshangs pa dbang po la sogs lha// dad pas de la phyag kyang byed/ 'di ni mi snang byed pa ste// ting 'dzin 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid// rnam par smin pa ldog gyur cing // ji skad gsungs pa 'grub par 'gyur/ phung por
127a6(rgyud): sogs grangs mnyam par// mi bskyod la sogs rab tu brtag/ bshang gci spyang las der gyur pa// gang shig dam tshig ces bya'o// dam tshig ces bya de dag mchog/ mi phyed rdo rje gsum 'byung ba// 
127a7(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum ni mnyam byas te// bdag med pa yang bsgom par bya// dkon mchog gsum ni ljags gsum yin// bdag ming ces bya ba yin te/ gang 'dinam rtog gcig nyid du// 'acug
127a8(rgyud): pa ril bu yin par 'dong // sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi phyed pa'i// sgom pa sems kyi dam pa'o// de ltar de nyid shes bsgoms nas// skad cig gis 'jam rdo rjer 'gyur/ 'khor lo 'od 'gro mamus/ 
127b1(rgyud): par 'gyur// rang gi sngags kyis rnam bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gnas bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur bar bshad// sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i/ ri rab kyi ni rdul phran rnams// de snyed
127b2(rgyud): de yi rjes 'brang rnams// ngam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'o// gnas ni lha yi sbyor bste// sna ni ri rab ces bya'o// bdag nyid chen po sum cu bdun// nam khar spro ba bsam mi lhag 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag po ste/ 'a
127b3(rgyud): ngag 'khor du gyur pa yin// 'jig rten pa yi ngo bo ru// phyi yi ri rab bstag pa yin// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// 'khor lo'i ting 'dzin ces bya// 'khor lo dngos grub rlang sla ba// skad cig sbyor bas sgrub
127b4(rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms pa// rdo rje kun gyi gnas mchog ste// thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran dzi srid yod pa yi
127b5(rgyud): de snyed bud med de yid ni// gsum 'gyur gnas su 'gyu ra ba yin// khams gsum gyi ni rdo rje che// drag po yis ni phyag byas 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i// ting 'dzin 'di ni yang
127b6(rgyud): dag bshad// pad+ma chen po mdab brgyad pa// rang sngags rdo rje las byung ba// chos rnams kun gyi gnas bsgoms na// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sum bu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i// ri rab rdul phran grangs
127b7(rgyud): snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gi ni// dkyil 'khor la ni bdag nyid 'jog gos med mnyam nyid ye shes kyi// rdo rje pad+mo grubacas sbyin// so sor rtog pa zhes bya ba'o// ting 'dzin ni yang dag bshad
127b8(rgyud): shin tu grangs med paskal par ni// grangs kyi ming gis gnas par ni// gnas shing sgom par byed pa yin// de yi ye shes lnga ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni/ 'jig rten pan phyir gsungs
128a1(rgyud): pa rnams// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i// yon tan gsum ni yongasu bsten// 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra ba'i// rang sngags las byung ral gri ni// blo ldan lag
128a2(rgyud): par de bzhag na// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rang gi sngags kyi khongs chud 'di// ho ho hUM de khams gsum pa// pad+ma spangs pa'i tshangs pa cher// rnal 'byor pa de 'gyur ba yin// khams gsum kun
128a3(rgyud): gyis cher mchod cing // tshangs dang lha min phyag byas pa// stong gsum mi yi mchog gcig pu// dbang chen po yi tshangs par 'gyur// thugs kyi rdo rje mchog bsgoms pas// dngos grub ji ltar 'dod
128a4(rgyud): padag / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// de ni de ma thag tu 'thob// rang gi rdo rje ting 'dzin 'di// dngos meng gcig pu yang dag byung / byang grol la yang de mi gnas// ral gri kha dang 'dra bar
128a5(rgyud): 'gyur// oM ni ril bu tsa na ka'i// 'bru tshang tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsam te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na// byang chub ye shes 'ong po che// blo ldan
128a6(rgyud): de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog gam// nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog 'dra ba'i// tsa nu ka yi 'bru chod tsam// yi ge'i dam pa AHbsam mo// de yi dbusu lha yi gzugs// khar ba
128a7(rgyud): nas ni rnam bsgrims na// byang chub ye shes 'od po che// de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog dang // nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// na mkha'i dbus na gnas pa yi// tsa na ka yi
128a8(rgyud): 'bru tshod tsam// yi ge hUM ni rnam bsams te// dbus su rang gi lha bsams nas// khar bcug nas ni rnam bsams na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che// dpal ldan dam thag tu 'gyur// 'dzam bu chu
128b1(rgyud): bo'i gser mdog dang // nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// rnam par snang mdzad mkha' dbyings kyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms la// lag tu 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na// 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin
128b2(rgyud): par 'gyur// rdo rje'i sku mdog sbyor ba yang // 'di ni ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o// 'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog gam// nyi ma
128b3(rgyud): 'char ka'i 'od 'dra bo'i// namakhe'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje mi phyed rab bsgoms te// lag tu rdo rje bsgoms na ni// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// rdo rje sku
128b4(rgyud): yi sbyor las// rdo rje rigs kyi mchog bsgoms pas// ye shes rdo rje ngag gis bya// na mkha' khams kyi dbus gnas par/ da rin chen la ni rin chen sprom// de nyid yig tu legs bzhag
128b5(rgyud): na rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rin chen mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/ rin chen sku yi sbyor ba las// rin chen rigs kyi mchog sgom pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ nam kha
128b6(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// me dpag med pa rab bsgoms la// lag tu pad+ma bsgom na ni// baid+ma'i rog pa kyis cha 'dzin par 'gyur// pad+ma mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/ pad+ma'i skur ni sbyor ba las// paN+Di
128b7(rgyud): rigs chen bsgoms pa ni// ye shes rdo rje ngag gis bya// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// don yod mchog ni rab bsgoms la// lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na// ralo gri'i rig pa 'dzin
128b8(rgyud): par 'gyur// ngam tshig mchog ni 'di sgrub pa// sku yi dam tshig sbyor ba las// ngam tshig rdo rje rigs bsgom pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// bsgrub bya rdo rje'i bye ba yis// mdung zung
129a1(rgyud): rdo rje lugs kyu sogs// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis// bsam gtan nyid kyis sgrub par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po 'byung ba yi// dam tshig dngos grub ces bya ba'i// 
129a2(rgyud): mi phyed rdo rje gsum dbang phyug/ sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung zhing // 'gog dang lam ste bzhi po ni// lam gyi ba ni mdor yang dag bai shang // sgrub pa po
129a3(rgyud): ni gnas ming can/ shing gcig drung du yang dag rtog/ chos dang rdzogs longs spyod ming can// sna tshogs mtshan gcig yang dag dgod// mtshan ma rkyen gyi gzugs can no// 'byin dang rngub pa nyid
129a4(rgyud): dang ni/ gnas pa yis ni zher mdzes pa// yid ston pa yi mnyam sbyor la// rab tu zhi ba'i ni gnas su// dus gsum rtog pa gcig/  las 'das// rdo rje lcags kyu khyad par dang // sgrub pa po
129a5(rgyud): ni rtag tu sgrub// sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu ni// sbyor gsum rje rje can bsams pa// sku gsung thugs kyi lpags kyu'o// sa sa rgyas ye shes blo can gyi// mi gsal gsal bar
129a6(rgyud): yang dag ldan// de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo las// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa// sang+yas dgug pa dam pa yin// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de nyid
129a7(rgyud): sngags don rnal 'byor pas// 'gro ba 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang // mi gsal sbyor bas sbyor bar byed// gang yang dam tshig phyogs rnams ni// mkha' dbyings dbye bas gnas pa rnams// de nyid rdo rje/ 
129a8(rgyud): bkug nas ni/ sngags rigs pas ni spyad par bya// namakha'i khams ni dgug pa 'di// dam tshig chen po rdo rje can// sngags kyi de nyid gcig sbyor las// lpags kyu de rnams 'grub par/ 
129b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i mchog / rgyal gnas lpags kyu bsams nas ni// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che// rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bya// me long lta bu'i sngags pas ni// sangs rgyas sku na
129b2(rgyud): rnam par sgom// lag tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi// lpag kyu la sogs rab tu sgom// de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// de nyid las ni lha rnams dgod// de ni de ma thag tu yang // dngos grub kun ster las byed
129b3(rgyud): 'gyur// sku dang gsung thugs thams cad ni// mtshan nyid gcig par bsgom par bya// lho yi rdo rje sbyor ba yis// gsung gi rdo rjer de mnyam sgom// brtul zhug can gyis phyi nang gnyis// gsang
129b4(rgyud): rdo rje mchog mcho do// dngos med dam tshig sbyor ba yis// ji lta ji lta ra rab sgrub pa// dam tshig gsum gyis rnal 'byor pa'i// dade ni yang dag yin par bshad// gsang ba'i snying po
129b5(rgyud): bsdus pa yi// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'dong // bcom ldan pa tshig chen po yi// rnal 'byor pas ni de skad gsungs// de na phyag na rdo rje ni// go byed gsang ba yang dag gsungs/ 
129b6(rgyud): gang zhig shes na rnal 'byor pa'i// mnyam gzhag mchog ni thob 'gyur ba'i// gsang dbang de nyid dam pa yi// de ni de yis yang dag bshad // rnal 'byor chen gcig bdag nyid// ma mkha' dang ni man
129b7(rgyud): pa'i gnas// byas na dam tshig yang dag pa// sha chen la ni yang dag sbyar// dngos med pa yi sha chen gyi// dam tshig mchog la gnas nas ni// blo ldan bdag nyid sgom pa ni// rdo rje dngos grub longs
129b8(rgyud): spyod ster// rdzogs longs spyod yul bshang bshang ba yin// de nyid ye shes dbang po gci// dam tshig 'di dag nyid kyis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// longs spyod rdzogs phung las
130a1(rgyud): drung ba/ zung ba ga ba ga/ dam tshig bcig tu legs sbyor las// 'angon shes lda ga thob par 'gyur/ dang po gnyis ni/  sha ste/ ngos myed cing las
130a2(rgyud): las dadam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor na// mi snang gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur// dgongs pas gcig shos bzlog pa yin// lung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa// dngos med de ni khyi sha yin// dam
130a3(rgyud): tshig tu yang dag sbyor// ngos grub thams cing rab sgrub pa'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas can pa lang sha khro bo'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor// rdo rje dgug pa das pa'o// 
130a4(rgyud): 'di ni 'jig rten por gyur las// dgongs pas gcig shos bzlog pa yis// / sha chen dang ni bshang gci dang // glang po rta khyi ba lang dag/ mi rtog gcig pa'i sgrub pa yis// dam tshig gcig tu
130a5(rgyud): de 'grub 'gyur// bstan pas 'di ni sgrub pa ni// sngags kyi longs spyod rnam/ 'byor pa// rdo rje sbyor ba'i gsang ba yis// sgrub pa 'di dang ldan par ldan par 'gyur// de ni sangs rgyas byin no
130a6(rgyud): cing // rnam kun rdo rje can gsum dang // snying kar ye shes dam tshig dang // dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas thams cad tshi mi 'gyur ba'i// 'di ni dam tshig sdom pa'o// dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i
130a7(rgyud): mchog/ dam tshig mchog 'dis rab tu bya// dam tshig kun gyi dam pa ste// rdo rje zas kyi ting 'dzin no// de nas 'gro la phan pa'i mgon// gtso bo rnam snang chen po la// gsang ba'i dgong pa dam pa ni// 
130a8(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pas slar yang zhus// gang zhig spyi bor brtags pa ni// gcig pu nyid du gyur pa des// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug tu// mu stegs rnams kyis 'tshal mi 'gyur// rang gi bstan bcos brda' yis
130b1(rgyud): ni phyi rol pa de na mchog la ting 'dzin brtags pa 'di dag kyang // 'di la rang gi ngo bo med// tshangs sngo mdzod kyi rgyud la ni// ri rab gcig dang bcas par bshad// byis pa mchog ni rmongs byed pa/ 
130b2(rgyud): gsung 'di skye bo ltung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'dis// rdo rje can la sgrar gsungs pa// leg so rdo rje legs pa che// skyes bu dam pa khyod legs pa// rkyen dang nyan thos theg pa dang // 'dir ni
130b3(rgyud): nga yis gsal bshad pa// sangs rgyas kyis bshad ye shes dag theg pa chen po mi mthong ngo // tshad yod dang ni yongs chad pa'i// rang gi lus la gang bshad de// ye shes de rnams dri med 'dod// 
130b4(rgyud): khron pa'i rus sbal zhes bya'o// nam pa dang ni mnyam ye shes// rdo rje the ga ba bla med pa// mchog sbyin nga ni khyed bzhin du// rgya/ chen de yis mi mthong ngo // rdo rje theg pa rgya mtsho ste// 
130b5(rgyud): de yis yang dag ma mthong bas// rang gi lung ni tshad ma yis// gzhan yod pa ni min zhes smra// theg pa chen lo gsang po rnams// srang la ba cal te nga smra ba// de rnams sngon bzhin gsal min zhes// 
130b6(rgyud): nga yi tshig las bltas te smra// de nyid rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// rdzogs sangs rgyas la sgom pa rnams// gang gis shes na rtog med 'gyur// gsang ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin// sngags
130b7(rgyud): kyi de nyid don byang chub// sna tshogs dngos grub 'bras bu ster// dgongs don ji lta ji lta bar// de ni nga yis yangs bshad// dam tshig rdo rje lce la ni// rdo rje can gyis hUM bsams te// rnal 'byor
130b8(rgyud): bas ni bdud rtsi lnga/ zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur/ AHdang oM gyi gsang ba dag 'don rdo rje gsum mchog ste/ 'di lta bu yi spyor yis// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'di chen 'gyur/ 'di na rdo rje
131a1(rgyud): bdud rtsi yi// phreng 'gyur dam tshig rdo rjer bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'byung // ting 'dzin ni bshad pa yin// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ sku gsung rdo rje can du 'gyur// de nyid sems can thams
131a2(rgyud): cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtsho che// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog/ rdo rje bdag nyid de snang byed// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
131a3(rgyud): steng / sangs rgyas zhing ni thams cad du// grub nas 'di ni der sbyor ba'i// rig pa 'dzin par de 'gyu ro// sku yi rdo rje sgom bdag nyid// grub mchog dam tshig la gnas pa/ mi snang gyur pa kun gyi mchog
131a4(rgyud): stong gsum dag ni snang bar byed// lha li bu mo mchog phrogs nas/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor mar legs sbyor// gad+hA'i bye snyed ces bya ba'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus kun/ dpe/ 
131a5(rgyud): de dang ni grangs gcig pa// sangs rgyas dus gsum rnams spangs pa// lag tu skya ru bzhag bzhin// rdo rje mig gis de mthong 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni gang dag tu// sgra grag pa ni ji snyed
131a6(rgyud): gnas pa la gnas ma nor bar// skang cig gis ni de kun thos// pad+hA'i byed snyed zhing dag dang // sku la sogs pa gsum gyis mtshan// sems zhes bshad pa'i sdom pa mchog/ sems can rnas
131a7(rgyud): kyi de nyid rig/ bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyeng du// sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gis 'gengs// rdo rje bas me mi khyab sngon 'gro// rang gi rna ba sems bcas pa// gad+hA'i bye ma'i ming can gyi// gnas kyi dngos
131a8(rgyud): po bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon shes gnas// 'dri ni yang dag bka' stsal to// mngon shes drug ni don grub bo// de ni sangs rgyas 'dre bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed
131b1(rgyud): 'khor rnams kyis ni rab mdzes pas// sku sogs rdo rje gsum 'di ni// 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu spyod // yid rton bden gcig bsnyen pa ste// de nyid gsum mnyam gnyis med pa// brten te
131b2(rgyud): dam tshig gcig gyur pa// ye shes nye bar sgrub pa'o// yid rton mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las// sgrub pa yid ni dam tshig 'gyur// 'bras bu mngon sum byas sbyor ba// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o// rkyen dang
131b3(rgyud): nyan thos mdo sde pa// 'di dang ldan pa rab tu bsngags// sems la dmigs dang 'dir sbyor ba// skad cig gis kyang de 'grub 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor gcig dang // nye bar bsgrub par
131b4(rgyud): gang gyur dang // sgrub pa'i dam tshig nyid dang ni// sgrub pa chen po bani pa yin// 'di la yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba// ji lta ji ltar 'a/ 'jig rten sogos// sa dang shing gi rin chen sogs// 
131b5(rgyud): lha nyid du ni rab tu brtag/ chos kyi dbye bas shes par bya// rdo rje ye shes sgrub pa po// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig yang dag sbyor// byang chub mchog ni rnam par sgom// gzugs dang sgra
131b6(rgyud): dang de bzhin dri// 'o dang reg bya chos rnams la// dngos grub mchog ni rnam dpyad pa// de ni nye bar sgrub par 'gyur// sngags bdag gang yin bsgoms nas ni// bskul ba sgrub par 'gyur ba yin// 
131b7(rgyud): rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// de ni sgrub pa chen por 'dong // bsnyen pa rdo rje bdud rtsi dag/ sngags pas kun tu brtag par bya// dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni// dbu rgyan la ni mtsho/ 
131b8(rgyud): gang bsam// 'di ni sdug rnams thams cad kyi// de nyid gsum gsang yang dag 'byung // sngags kyi de nyi don nyer ba'i// sgrub pa pos ni dben pa bsten// sna tshogs lung gi yang dag
132a1(rgyud): rtog sngags ni dgon pa chen por 'dod// de yi dpag bsam shing longs spyod// sa phyogs zhes ni yongs bsgrags// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni// rnam pa'i dben pa
132a2(rgyud): chen por bshad// ri 'or rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de rigs dngos med las byung ba'o// de 'dra'i dben po'i mtshon pa ru// dar ni 'od chen rnam gnas te// gnas med pa yi sbyor ro yis// rtag tu dngos grub thob
132a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur// bcom ldan rdo rje'i sgrub pa ni// chen pos de skad bka' stsal to// dgon pa chen ngo'i sa phyogs sogs// 'jig rten pa rnams smra ba gsal// bsnyen pa sku yi brtul zhugs mchogs// / blo dang
132a4(rgyud): ldan pas rdo rje bzhis rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor bas/ basboms na dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// me long zhes bya go/ nA pa chu// rin chen nas byang ban pa'o// chen po zhes bya 'o dpag med/ 
132a5(rgyud): don yod pa ni ri bor yin// chu ngogs dag pa'i chos kyi cha// gnas lnga dag tu rab tu brtag/ ji srid don ni sbyor ba bzhis// yi ge oM ni sdom par 'gyur// ji ltar na kha'i mtshan nyid gci ga/ rang gi
132a6(rgyud): mtshan nyid 'dor mi byed// de bzhin de nyid gsum bzhi'i phyed// yi ge oM gcig sdom pa'o// gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba'i// oM gcig gis ni 'gro la khyab/ de nyid mi gsol sbyor dbang po// gtso
132a7(rgyud): bo rang nyid zlog pa yin// la la glang po spangs nas ni// rjes la dbyibs ni tshol bar byed// de bzhin ma 'ongs sngags pa ni// oM las sdom pa gzhan du 'dod// gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// dus thub
132a8(rgyud): de bzhin nor can dang // phan tshun sbyor gnas brjod pa las// bsam mi khyab pa'i grangasu 'gyur// bcom ldan gcig kyang du ma ste// tshig tu brjod pa rnam par spangs// brda' tsam du ni oM zhes bya// dngos
132b1(rgyud): med sbyor ba'i chos nyid yin// chos dang long skyo sprul pa ste// sku gsum du ni yang dag bsha/ gsum po yang dag 'dzin pas ni// des na oM ni sdom pa yin// dang po gcig pu mi bskyong dgod // de nyid sdom pa
132b2(rgyud): gyur pa yin// brda' ru brjod pa sna tshogs pa// bsams nas sdom pa kun tu bshad// mi phyed na mkha'i sbyor ba yis// bsam dang gdon dang rnam par bral// rten 'brel rig las yang dag 'byung // rjes
132b3(rgyud): bcas zhe kyang bsgom bya// rtag tu 'byung ba'i ye shes bzhag/ mi ge la sogs pa bdun brgya la// g.yas dong gcig shos zla phyed de// shes rab thabs kyang sgrub pa'o// 'di dag zung gyur zla ba ste// rdo rje ming can
132b4(rgyud): phyed dang gnyis// de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhag ni thub pa zla phyed dang // zla gcig zla ba phyed gnyis pas// 'jig rten pa yi zhag dbye bas// rgya cher ngas ni
132b5(rgyud): bshad pa yin// gsang ba mchog las byung ba ni// zla ba phyed kyis sgrub par gsungs// de nyid nye bar 'grub bshad pa'i// sdom pa'i yul ni dam pa yin// gang tshe shes rab thabs shes/ 
132b6(rgyud): de bzhin nyid shes las byung ba// sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje byin rlabs mdzad par 'gyur// 'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas dang // gang zhig phyogs
132b7(rgyud): bcur bzhugs pa rnams// chos sku mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas de rnams byin gyis rlob// 'das pa rnams ni chos sku yis// bsam mi khyab pa'i phyogs na bzhugs// sngags mchog bsam
132b8(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pas// ma 'ongs rnams kyis byin gyis rlob// sangs rgyas gsum la dbye ba ni/ cung zad tsam yang yong ma yin// 'on kyang dngos med las byung ba'i// sngags pa rnams la byin gyis rlob// phyog/ 
133a1(rgyud): bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// mi byed rdo rje gsum bsgoms la// sku ni dza ji lta bar 'tshams pa/ de ltar byin gyis rlob par mdzad/ 'igadang ma rig ya ldan// srog la
133a2(rgyud): sogs te bcu gnyis bshad// dus kyi zhes 'gyur lam la sogs// de nyid zla ba la sogs 'gyur// zla ba la sogs grangs mnyam pas// zhim bcu gnyis ming can yin// khyab 'jug de zhing dbye ba yis// 
133a3(rgyud): lam com pa'i ni brtags pa yis// de nyid du ni sgrub pa mchog/ sdom pa yul zhes bshad pa yin// sngags dang dngos med de byed pa// mgal me 'khor lo bskor dang mtshungs// rtog pa las
133a4(rgyud): byung de 'di ni// dngos med pa ni sgom paso// ma 'ongs pa yi skye bo ni// lha yi gzugs la 'dud par byed// mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang // lce dang de bzhin lus ngag dang // lpags pa rkang par yang
133a5(rgyud): dag ldan// 'dzin pa dag ni mi nus pa// lha dang nyan dang dri dang ro// reg bya rnams ni dngos med pa// rang bzhin sems med gyur pa yi// 'jim gzugs sangs rgyas sku can te// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i bla
133a6(rgyud): ma'i sku// sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis// de bzhin sngags sbyor bdag nyid can// dngos med rdo rje'i sku nyid yin// shing dngas dang rin chen sogs// rang gi lnga yi gzugs byas la// rang gi chos ni
133a7(rgyud): spangs nas su// tshig gi lam de ston par byed// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa mchog/ cho 'phrul de la ga les byung // de nas dang sogs yang dag pas// slar yang da la gsol 'debs kyang // gsol ba
133a8(rgyud): 'debs pa tsam gyis ni// de dang 'dra bar ga la 'gyur// phyi rol chos la gang zhig dga'// lce rnams thams cad spong ba yin// de ltar sku las sku byung ba// dpal ldan chos 'di'ang gsum gyi lam/ 
133b1(rgyud): byi rlangs pa dag 'ongs spyod na// gsung gi rdo rje can du byed// 'das drang sa 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// phyogs bcun ni gang bzhugs pa// zung dang 'byung 'gyur de rnams ni// mi phyeng gsum gyi lam du 'gyur
133b2(rgyud): yid rton bde bzhi bdag nyid // de bzhin nyid shes las byung ba/ yi ge gcig ni gsum drug 'di// rang nyid 'gro ba'i khar brjod do// de yi byin gyis brlob pa'i gnas// rdo rje mi phyang rdo rje ca// gang bzhin
133b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis gsungs dang // 'gro ba'i sgrar ni 'di gyur te// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum rnal 'byor// gsung gi rdo rje mi phyed pa// rdo rje can mchog de byin rlob/ 
133b4(rgyud): 'jug pa gnas pa'i sbyor ba dang // ldang ba dang ni yang dag ldan// gsung gi rdo rje dngos med pa// de ni sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob// ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur rgyal ni// tshig gi lam gyis las byed 'jug
133b5(rgyud): gsung byin rlabs pas sngags pa ni// de bzhin don yong nyid du byed// der ni yang dag bshad pa 'di// sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba'o// sang sa rgyas de rnams byin rlob pa// sdom pa yul ni dam pa
133b6(rgyud): rdo rje thugs ni 'dzin rgyal po// de ni bdag la byin rlob mdzang // mi phyed rdo rje gsum sbyor bas// na mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i gnas/ gang zhig byung dang 'byung 'gyur ba'i// phyogs bcur bzhugs
133b7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// de yi byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas// lan gsum las ni byung ba mdzad// sku yis ston pa'i mdzad pa mchogarang sangs rgyas ni sgom pa yin// mdo sde pa dang nyan thos kyi 'ang // sgra
133b8(rgyud): bsgrub pa por gyur yin// sems ni rnal 'byor ldan mchog gis// 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o// 'gro 'ong gnas dang bral ba ni// rdo dang sa dang dbyig byed pa// lus la sogs pa mtshon pa yis// 'on kyang
134a1(rgyud): dadi bsung du 'gyur/ sems dang lus dpa mi ldan pa ga/ de bzhin na gro can// sku bsrung thugs pa rdo rje cig/ rdzu ngas pa bstan pa yin/ sangs rgyas rje chos dganas/ 
134a2(rgyud): de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung // sku gsung thugs kyi sangs rgyas sogs// rdo rje gsum po mi phyed brtag/ de 'das mongs pa'i bdag nyid can// so sor rtog pa 'grus par 'gyur// sku la sogs pa'i grangs
134a3(rgyud): mnyam par// sangs rgyas kyang ni gang rtog gyur// stong pa shin tu sbyor ba yang // / de ni gsal bar the tsom med// sna tshogs sbyor gyur sngags rnams ni// gang zhig stong par mngon sum byed// 'das pa dag
134a4(rgyud): ni de thams cad // rmongs pa'i bdag nyid de 'gas 'gyur// zhan thos rang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi/ byang chub bsdus nas bshang ba/ yin// 'jig rten pa yi gang bshad pa// mdor bsdus
134a5(rgyud): pa ni 'di yi no// sangs rgyas yang na rdo rje chos// yang na rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung / rmongs pas 'di las 'das na ni// don 'gas par the tshom med/ dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gsang ba ngas pa yang
134a6(rgyud): ngag srung // ldan gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba yis// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba mchog/ rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i/ mis sgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i// le'u bcu gnyis gsungs
134a7(rgyud): ba yin// dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+m+ma shrI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo slob dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 
134a8(rgyud): / rgyag shang du/ shrI badz+ra mA la sa d+hing+ka nam mo ga nas nga/ hring sa ras s+ya b+ha da ka ma mai ti/ bong skang du/ rnapa 'phyir chen po'i rlung dpa la rdo rje phreng ba mngon par brjod pa cung thams cang kyi
134b1(rgyud): po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tsha lo// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po phyag 'tsha lo// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tsha'o// 
134b2(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnam
134b3(rgyud): la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mngon par rtogs pas bzhugs te/ dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i rigs dang 'brel pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs gcig tu bde
134b4(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya chen po mngon par rtog pa la mngon du bya ba la bzhugs pa// gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po nyamasu myong bas// dgyes pas mtsho ga tu pad+ma dgyes pa// chos thams cad kyang ji lta ba ba
134b5(rgyud): nyam su myong bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid la mngon du phyogs pa// rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dam tshig bla na med pa'i dbang du gyur pa la rab tu mkhas pa 'di lta ste/ 
134b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe sdang rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags pa rdo rje dang // byang chub
134b7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
134b8(rgyud): chen po chung dang / byang chub sams dpa' sems pa'i chen pa ma rdo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po chung ngo dang / de la bu rnams pas por thur pa des tshig chen pa'i rigs pa
135a1(rgyud): 'brel pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang / gzhan yang rigs chen po dang 'brel pa'i ba'i byang chub sems dpa 'bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la 'di lta ste/ 
135a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnamapa' rnam par rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i zla ba dang / 
135a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i gtsug tor dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshams kyis nges par grol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje
135a4(rgyud): sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen de rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
135a5(rgyud): lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'chen po rdo rje rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po rdo rje dam tshig dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems
135a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po rdo rje longs spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyi bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bo rab kyi rtsal
135a7(rgyud): gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i spyi gtsug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dang // byang chub sems
135a8(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i dam tshig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
135b1(rgyud): dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dpa' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna tshogs dgra' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
135b2(rgyud): chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje dang / gzhan yang dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i theg pas lhag par grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// bcom ldan
135b3(rgyud): 'das de yang chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor// sangs rgyas mdzad pa shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongasu rdzogs pa de 'khor la zhal rab tu
135b4(rgyud): 'dzum par bcas pas bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po rnams la gzig nas// de nas snod du
135b5(rgyud): rung bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa'i rdo rje theg pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po bkye sta ba
135b6(rgyud): so// 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la reg par mchog tu dga' ba thob pa ni gnyi su med pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
135b7(rgyud): 'chang chen po ji lta ba bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag nyid dga' ba dang bde ba dang / mchog tu mgu ba skyes nas borgyal bar gyur to// de nas yang de'i dus
135b8(rgyud): su bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po bsdus par gyur to// bsdus pa de yang rdo rje'i lam nas lpags kyu'i rnam pa can gyi 'od zer chen po nye bar phyung bar gyur pa nges
136a1(rgyud): brgyal ba de dag la reg nas rdo rje phreng ba lta bu nyid rdo rje lam nas gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo la zhugs nas gnaso// slar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
136a2(rgyud): chen po de dag bde ba chen po rjesu myong bar gyur to// rdo rje'i yi ge hUM brjod pa de nyid kyis bde ba chen po de nyid nyam su myong ba nyid kyi thugs ka'i lte ba'i rtse sbugs nas 'od zer chen po phyung
136a3(rgyud): ste rang gi stan la 'khod par gyur to// de nas de rnams chu'i gting nas 'thon pa lta bur sems dga' ba skye ste// bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo mtshar chen po'i cho 'phrul mthong nas/ shin tu mig gdangs
136a4(rgyud): te bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs gcig gis yang dag bar bstod// bcom ldan ro gcig gyur pa yi// lhan cig/ skyes pa'i dga' bas rgyas// bcom ldan mchog tu ngal bso kye/ 
136a5(rgyud): ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul 'das// bcom ldan nyid kyi/ dgyes nyams ster// 'gro ba gsum po yang dag bde/ oM ma'o lhan cig skyes bdud ci// ro bsten thugs rje chen po ste/ 
136a6(rgyud): bcom ldan sems can thams cad kyi// sems can don kun gsal bar mdzad// de nyid gsum gyi ro gcig pa// phyag rgya chen po rab dbya ba// bcom ldan rnal 'byor cha la dgyes// 'ching
136a7(rgyud): ba thams cad gcong mdzad kyi// bcom ldan dgyes pa cher mdzad cing // 'gro ba skal bzang nges par mdzad// e ma'o rdo rje theg pa bde// rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba stsol// e ma'o/ 
136a8(rgyud): sngags ni rab rgyas pa// rang 'byung go 'phang sgrub pa po// e ma'o shin tu zab mo'i chos// dmigs pa med par ston par mdzad// e ma'o rdo rje 'chang chen gtso// gsang ba'i dbang
136b1(rgyud): bo shin tu gsung // e ma'o mchog tu byang chub pa/ e ma'o spros pa rnam spangs shing // bden pa'i don ni gsal mdzad pa// theg pa'i sgron mas snang bar mdzad// mgon po bdag cag khyed
136b2(rgyud): drin gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang thob// mgon po bdag cag lam log zhugs// khyed kyis yang ngag lam la bkod/ mgon po bdag cag mun par 'thoms// ye shes snang ba thob par mas
136b3(rgyud): dam tshig rdo rje nyim kye/ phyag rgya chen po'i don ston mdzad// bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rje'i phyag rgya che bdag nyid// phyag 'tshal gnyis med dga' ba'i mkha'// dga'
136b4(rgyud): ba'i zla ba khyed la 'dud ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig/ su bcad pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa mdzad nas slar yang 'dus par gyur te// rdo rje'i phreng ba mngon par brjod pa
136b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba shin tu phra ba'i sa ji lta ba'i ngo bo 'dri bar 'ang nganas yid la byed pa gcig pa dang // sems ca gcig gi/ sa dga' bar byed pa'i gsung nyan par 'dod nas pa spu ldang ba dang
136b6(rgyud): dbugs g.yo ba dang bcas pas yang dang yang du bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed cing rang gi stan la 'khod nas sems re dog dang bcas gan so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi de lta bu'i sems/ 
136b7(rgyud): kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas slar yang rdo rje'i phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang ba'i rdo rje las rang gi rig ma phyung ste// sgeg pa
136b8(rgyud): la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa bdag nyid kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs nas sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i gzugs blangs nas rang rang gi
137a1(rgyud): rig ma la 'khyud de phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor la rje su zhugs nas slar yang de dag de lta bu'i gzugs nyid du mthong ste// ngo mtshar skyes nas mig gdangs te ri mo
137a2(rgyud): bkod pa lta bur mthong ba nyid kyis tsa yang mi smra bar gyur pas de la 'khor rnams yang dag par 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rang gi rig ma yang dag par bskul te// phyag rgya
137a3(rgyud): chen po'i rnal 'byor dor nas nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las btsun me rdo rje rigs kyi snying po 'di gsungaso// oM aHsU de nas de skad du gsungs ma thag bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga las de bzhin
137a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dang / rig ma dang / byang chub sem dpa' dang / khro bo'i rgyal po rnams phyung bar gyur to// byung nas/ kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi shar la sogs pa'i phyogasu rang rang gi stan la
137a5(rgyud): gnas par gyur te/ kha cig ni rnam par snang mdzad kyig thugs kyis so// kha cig ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs kyiso// kha cig ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i gzugs kyiso// ji srid gnod
137a6(rgyud): mdzes rgyal po dang / gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba yi// rgyal po'i bar gyi gzug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das cung zad cig ci yang mi gsung bar bzhug so// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag dzad
137a7(rgyud): kyi dbyangs cig gis ched du brjod nas smras pa ni// e ma'o rdo rje rigs chen po// rdo rje phreng ba'i don ston mdzad// a ma'o rdo rje theg gsal ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi don ston modzad ces lan gsum brjod
137a8(rgyud): nas de dag gis rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'dug par gyur te// de nas de'i tshe skad cig zang yud tsam de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po 'dus pa de dag
137b1(rgyud): mdzong nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan ye shes rdor dbang phyug/ gsang ba'i pad+ma'i nang bzhugs pa// dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor dbang // rdug
137b2(rgyud): rjes bdag gi tshig gson cig/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje theg pa mngon 'dod pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe// 'di dag lus kyis phyag 'tshal 'khod// sdigs ma
137b3(rgyud): lnga yi dus na ni// ma 'ongs pa yi sems can rnams// brtson 'grus chung zhing bsod nams chung // lta ba ngan pa mang po dang // tshe thub pa yi sems can rnams// go 'phang mchog ni thob phyir nu// rgyal ba'i
137b4(rgyud): sras ni nga dag dang // ma 'ongs pa yi sems can rnams/ 'khor ba las ni pha rol tu// gang gis myur thar par 'gyur// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen la// 'di ltar bdag ni gsol ba 'debs/ 
137b5(rgyud): 'gro ba'i gtso bo khyod drin gyis// de nyid mchog ni bdag gis 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun gyi gseng ba yi// rgyud rnam kun gyi don bsdus pa// bla na med pa'i rim pa gnyis// rdo rje phreng ba
137b6(rgyud): mngon rtogs pa// cung zad 'dri bar 'tshal lags kyis// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ni// khyod kyis bdag la bstan du gsol// dpa ldan 'dus par brda' tsam gang // rnal 'byor bla na
137b7(rgyud): med rgyud du// thub pa chen pos chos zung ngo po// brgyad khri dang ni ba'i stong ngo // de skad smras nas mdun 'jug ste/ lus kyi phyag ni byis nas kyang // ye shes chen po bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje sems dpa'
137b8(rgyud): 'gro ba'i bla// rdo rje gsum ni ro gcig don/ de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang thob// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi sbas pa'i don// bdag la bstan par mdzad du gsol// rdo rje phreng ba'i ming ni ci// 'dus pa ci zhig stong pa
138a1(rgyud): ci mig le'i dbye ba dang ni sgra// gsang ba dang ni dam tshig dang // sdom pa dang ni sgra tsam dang // rlung gi de nyid dbade chen ci// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor dang // sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor pa// rlung rnam
138a2(rgyud): dang ni 'khor lo dang // grangs ni ci tsam gang du gnas// rnal 'byor lus la rdza gang legs// rnam sna tshogs sogs skad cig/ dga' ba bzhi dang rdzus dang ni// sngags dang rlung dang thig le zhes// yi ge
138a3(rgyud): gsum gang de nyid gsu// de bzhin sna yi rtse mo gsum// lus kyi stong zhing ye shes dang // lha rnams kyang ni ji ltar gnas// de rnams kyi ni ming ni Ti// 'char ba dang ni nub pa ci// mgon po dga' rnams
138a4(rgyud): ji ltar ni// yang dag skye ba gsal bar gsungs// sngar bshad ca rnam sa rtag tu ni// rdo rje'i lus la ji ltar rgyu// mtshams kyi rtsa gsu ma de dag ni// gtso bo ru ni ji ltar gsungs// rlung rnams
138a5(rgyud): ji ltar ldang ba dang // gtso bo de rnams ji ltar thim// de ni mkha' 'gro mar sdud pa// gtso bo ji ltar yang dag 'thob// rnam to// ga rlung gi rab bcad nas// rnam rtog med par ji ltar
138a6(rgyud): 'charaha ca rnams ji ltar nub pa dang // sbyor ba drug gis ji ltar rtsom// dus kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// gsang ba'i yang ni 'bras bu ci// chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje dang // rigs kyi dbye ba ji lta bu// bya
138a7(rgyud): rgya'i dbye ba ji tsam zhig/ phung po la sogs skye mched dang // phyag rgya chen po'i ming ni ci// ro rnams kyi ni dbye ba dang // bdag gi sgra ni gang la gnas// stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa dang // stong pa nyid ni
138a8(rgyud): du skye// nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo gang // A li kA li brda' dang ni// mtshams kyi 'char ba ji lta bu// rgyud gsungs sngon ni bsnyen pa sogs// cho ga nyi shu'i las dang ni/ rgyu mtshan ci zhig 'bras bu
138b1(rgyud): dang ci mchod pa'i cho ga ji ltar gsungs// de bzhin lha mo'i rang bzhin dang // lha mo'i ming ni ji ltar gsungs// rgyud du thog mar gsungs pa yi// 'di skad bdag sogs ji lta bu// 'di skad ces sogs dang / 
138b2(rgyud): po'i ngag/ don rgyas par ni ji ltar 'gyur// nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg ci// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' ba dang // rnal 'byor ma tshogs 'dus pa dang // de bzhin gsang ba'i 'ja' dang ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo
138b3(rgyud): rje yi// dkyil 'khor rnams ni ji ltar gsungs// sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun gyi// ming rnams bshad pa ji lta bu// bla ma ston pa slob dpon dang // rdo rje 'chang ni bshad pa ci// slob
138b4(rgyud): ma'i yon tan gang ldan na// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi snod du 'gyur// de yi spyod pa'i dbye ba du// de yi 'bras bu ji lta bu// zhi ba rgyas pa dang dbang dang ni// de bzhin bsad dang bskrad pa
138b5(rgyud): dang rangs par byed pa nyid dang ni// bsgrub bya la ni mngon spyod dang // sngags kyi tshig ni ci zhig dang // mgon po khro bo'i bzlas pa ci// dngos grub brgyad ni thob pa dang // mngon shes lnga ni ji ltar
138b6(rgyud): thog rnal 'byor rnams kyis de nyid mthong // skad cig cig la mngon byang chub// lus brtan pa dang rgas pa med// bcus kyis len gyis sbyor ba dang // gser 'gyur sogs kyi sbyor ba dang // rdo rje'i
138b7(rgyud): phyag rgya dngos grub che// 'gro ba'i bla ma ji ltar 'thob// lus kyi rang bzhin gzhal yas khang // de ni rang bzhin ji lta bu// 'dis ni gnas sogs ji ltar gnas/ thi mo dang long spyod
138b8(rgyud): bdag po dang // rlung ni gang gi mtshan nyid ci// de dag 'jig par ji ltar 'gyur// de ltar dri chog rdzogs pa dang // lag na rdo rje thal sbyar te// 'gro ba'i bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas lus kyis phyog byas
139a1(rgyud): de nas ni// gtso bos rdo rje sems dpa' la// legaso bya ba byas nas ni// tshangs dbyangs zab mo snyan pa yis// 'gro ba'i mgon pos gsungs pa yin// rnal 'byor chen po
139a2(rgyud): rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa la gsol ba gdab pa dang / dri ba dang / slob ma'i las nyid la sogs pargyud kyi gleng ba ni'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan
139a3(rgyud): rdo rjes gsungs// de nyid gsung gi 'gro mgon gyis// lag na rdo rje la bos te// yang dag dris pa nges bshad pa// snying ba'i don ni dor bsdus pa// dbye bar dka' ba'i dngos po kun// khyod kyis dri
139a4(rgyud): bar byas pa rnams// rdo rje dbang phyug gsang chen bdag/ bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud rnams dang // rnal 'byor rgyud ni gang du/ yang // mchog tu gsang ba ma gsungs pa// rdo rje'i dbang
139a5(rgyud): phyug de nyid mchog/ dris pa'i lan rnams gsal por ni// / nges por nga yis rab bshad bya// skad cig gis ni spyan phye la// mchog tu rmad byung ston mdzad la// thugs rjes khyab
139a6(rgyud): par de skad gsungs// de phyir khyod ni legs par nyon// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rjes thugs brlar cing the tshom thams cad gcod pa la phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab ste mchog tu gas
139a7(rgyud): ba'i tshig gis bshad pa gsungs pa ni// dbang bskur ba ni gtso bo ste// dngos grub thams cad rtag tu gnas// nga yis ji bzhin don bshad kyis// de phyir thog mar yang dag nyon// thog mar slob gang / 
139a8(rgyud): gi tshe/ blo ldan yang dag dbang bskur na// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la// de yi tshen snod du 'gyur// yang dag dbang bskur gyis dben na// sgrub pos rgyud kyi don shes kyang // slob dpon slob
139b1(rgyud): mar mtshungs par ni// mi bzad dmyal ba chen por 'gro// de phyir yang dag bla ma ni/ rab tu gus pas bsnyen bkur bya// dbang bskur thob cing de nying shes// blo ldan snying rje'i bdag nyid can// zab cing
139b2(rgyud): rgya che dri ma med// gnod dang 'che ba rnam par spangs// skal bzang lus ni rdzogs pa dang // mtshan dang dpe byas rnam par rgyan// tshogs pa che la gcig tu dga'// yul la phrag dog rnam par spang
139b3(rgyud): bag yod rtag tu dga' ba dang // rnal 'byor ma yi mngal nas skyes// rdo rje zag la gcig tu mos// thags pa dman la rgyab kyis phyogs// dra la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan// bla ma slob mas bsna/ 
139b4(rgyud): bkur bya// yang dag bla ma rnyed nas ni/ slob ma'i rang bzhin dri ma rnams// ngag dang rtogs dang smin byas nas/ ji bzhin ye shes bzang dang ldan// ji ltar rin chen bdar
139b5(rgyud): ba dang // gser ni bsregs dang bcad pas brtag/ de bzhin du ni slob ma yang // lo ni bcu gnyis bor du bar+Na ga/ de phyir phan tshun de lta bus// dus kun tu ni de ltar brtag
139b6(rgyud): gzhan du bgags ni 'byung 'gyur te// dngos grub 'joms shing sdug bsngal che// dug ni sngags kyis 'joms pa bzhin// sngags kyis dge byas bcud len byed// da byar 'bad pa thad
139b7(rgyud): kyis// sngags kyi slob ma rtogs byas nas// bla ma dbang bskur la sogs kyis// dngos grub phyir ni ji lta'i don// de phyir dbang bskur slob ma ni// ma dag pa yang dag par 'gyur// rdo rje sems
139b8(rgyud): dpa' bde chen la// nga la lag na rdo rjes zhus// dbang bskur ji ltar rgyud du ni// gtso bo run gsungs pa lags// rdo rje sems dpa'athams cad mkhyen// the tsom thams cad gcod mdzad
140a1(rgyud): pa/ de kho na nying mkhyen pas ni/ lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa// don de ji lta ba bzhin du// nga yis yang dag bshad kyis zhon// dbang bskur ba yi dbye ba ni// dang po'i dbang ni
140a2(rgyud): gtso bo ste// gnyis pa gsang ba'i ming cano// gsum pa kun nas sbyor ba ste// bzhi pa'i don ni dam pa'o// gtso bo dbye ba bcu gcig ste// bcu gnyis pa ni gsang ba'o// bcu gsum pa ni yang dag sbyor
140a3(rgyud): bcu bzhi pa ni don dam ste// dbang bskur re re sa re'o// rnam pa gsum ni rgyu yi dbang // bzhi pa 'bras bur shes par bya// dga' ba la sogs rim pa yis// thams cad la ni nga yis khyab// mar ngo yin
140a4(rgyud): tshes gsum dang // de bzhin tshes bcu tshes bcu bzhi// yon tan bzang ldan slob ma la// bla mas cho ga bzhin dbang ba skur// lus phra lo ni bcu drug lon// gzugs dang skal ba
140a5(rgyud): ngag gis rgyan// sngo bsangs mig ni yangs pa dang // snying rje'i bsam ldan yang dag mos// ngag snyan dbang skur ra thob pa dang // rnal 'byor rgyud la lhag par mos// yang na
140a6(rgyud): lo ni nyi shu lon// nyams dga' bde bar byed pa ste// de las lhag pa skal med 'gyur// de nas dngos grub ring du byed// lhag par 'jam pa'i bu mo la// chung ma 'am yang na sring mo 'am// yang na bu
140a7(rgyud): mo 'ang dad pa yis// bla ma la ni dbul bar bya// gser dang rin chen gos dang ni// me tog phreng ba sna tshogs pas// mchod nas bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas// slob ma yis ni 'di skad brjod// deng nas brtsam
140a8(rgyud): te bdag bran du// gtso bos bdag ni mchod pazhes// de lta'i rnam pas mnyes nas ni// bdag nyid kun gyis bla ma mchod// bla ma'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang // de phyir yang dag bla ma mchod// de nas bcom
140b1(rgyud): ldan yum phyag rgya// yang dag mchod nas bsten par bya// bsten pa las ni gang byung ba// ltung ba skal bzang kha la ni// sbom po tha stag sbyor ba yis// yang dag par ni longs spyad bya// de las
140b2(rgyud): skyes pa'i ye shes ni// bde ba chen po rang rig pa// 'byung rngub pa ni ro gcig cing / rab tu dga' bas mchod par bya// hUM phaT sngags ni nor bu'i sgor// bkod de rdo rje rab bskyod bya// doga'o rnams ji
140b3(rgyud): lto ba bzhin du// skad cig de la skyes gyur pa// dga' ba'i sems kyis bde ba la// rdo rje btsun mo'i kha nas brjod/ de yang slob ma'i lag tu ni// gtad nas gsal bar 'di skad brjod// ji
140b4(rgyud): ltar pad mchod bya ba ni// byos la oM baM mchog gi gdong // gang phyir rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ rang nyid 'di yi snying la/ zhugs// thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas zhing // rnal 'byor
140b5(rgyud): pa yis thob mi 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i dngos de yang // bde chen rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs// rab tu 'bad pas bsten par gyis// lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid ni// dang
140b6(rgyud): bskur gtso bor gyur pas na// thams cad ji lta ba bzhin thob// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las slob dpon dang sgo ma brtag pa dang dbang bskur ba'i le'u
140b7(rgyud): ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas de nyid gzhan yang zhon// rdo rje phreng ba'i don gsal ba// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa ni// dri ba gzhan la brjod mi bya// rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya'i ming // de yang sa ni
140b8(rgyud): bcu gsum pa// dga' ba bzhi yi don gyi gnas// thams cad stong pa dga' ste// ngag gi spong yul rnams las 'das// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// skal bzang rnal 'byor kun
141a1(rgyud): gyi mtha'ang rnal 'byor ma yi ngag gi yul// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang // rdo rje phreng ba zhes bshad do// stong zhing rdo rje gsang pad+ma// tsa ni rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ ye shes
141a2(rgyud): mchog tu bde ba che// lhan cig skyes dga' rmad byung ba/ rdo rje de yang rnam rtag rnams// 'bigs par byed par yongasu grags// phreng ba de rnams kyi yang rgyun/ byang chub sems kyi rdo rje rnams// mi phyed pas ni rdo rjer gsungs// rgyud
141a3(rgyud): rnams kun tu sbas pa ni/ gang yang rung bas brjod mi bya// de ni dbug su yongasu grags// phreng ba rgyun ni mi 'chang bar// dga' ba rab 'bab bdag nyid kyis// nam rtag rlung kun 'bigs par byed// rlung la 'bigs par mi nus/ 
141a4(rgyud): nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu ni/ brgya dang brgyad lhag gsal bar yang / namartog rang bzhin rlung rnams ni// 'char ba dang ni 'joms pa dag / ji lta ba bzhin rab dpya yis// rlung rnams kyi ni ming
141a5(rgyud): nyon cig/ btang bzung dang ni dung phyur dang // myos pa dang ni blo ngan dang / bsil byed dang ni g.ya' ba dang // ngar rnams dang ni ster dang // gzigs pa chu srin dza sha dang // rnam par gtsigs dang
141a6(rgyud): myos pa'i dus// 'ad myos chu ba che 'chu srin dang // sna tshogs skyed dang 'dud pa dang // snyems dang rnga dang sgra sgrogs dang // rlung lha dang ni gnang 'bigs dang // me dang dus dang ci bgyi dang // rdo rje mchog sbyin
141a7(rgyud): Tu ta dang // sbrang ma dang ni zla ba'i 'od// kam po dza dang ral pa can// yungs nag rab bkram dus 'gugs deng // sdig pa dang ni g.yon can rten// grims mo dang ni mgrin pa dang // kun sel mchog ster
141a8(rgyud): spro byed dang // nga rgyal mtsho dang tshogs bdag dang // cangs pa dang ni sa yi bla// theg pa bzang dang mchog tu skyes// dri med phrag gu nyi ma dang // gsal byed dang ni nyi ma gnon// stobs bzhin nga ro nga
141b1(rgyud): ni dus sdom dang ni mchongs nas 'gro / snang ma khyi dang mtshan ma dang // thong dang sgur po drag po dang // sa dngas la 'gro ma dang // bram ze dang ni sna 'gyur gnas/ ma mo'i rigs dang lce bskyod pa/ mi sgra dang ni rnga sgra'i
141b2(rgyud): sprin/ dga' bar byed dang migs yang se dang // dri med 'od srung ne co dang // sna tshigs mchu dang mig mnyam dang // mdzes dang chos kyi dbyig pa dang // 'gro kun snying stobs bstan pa dong // za pho de bung bu sdom
141b3(rgyud): las dang // kha gdangs sgra chen stobs kyis ce// rtsa bran dbang byed g.yo sgyu can// gtso bo che dang rtag tu dga'// glog phreng dang ni ngag 'byed dang // dbugs 'byung rag lce dang ni// gnas rnams kyi nang bangade mchog
141b4(rgyud): u dum par rmongs// pad+ma 'dra ba pad+ma bskor// dgra starma bya rlung dang ni// rdo rje dbang phyug rlung gi ming // de ltar nga yis bstan po yin// bcom ldan dris pa'i rlung rnams kyi// gnas rnams kyi ni

141b8(rgyud): las dgu bdag nyid // mtshan phyed gye ni dus kyi mthar// rlung rnams gsal bar rgyu ba dang // de nyid gnas kyi dbye ba yis// sna tshogs pa yi rtag par 'gro// rnam par rtog pa rnam byed nas/ de ngag ming rnams pa sha
142a1(rgyud): / par ga 'ad chags sde sdang gti mug dang / rgyags dang rgyal mngon pa zhen khrag dog gro dang se sna dang / gsong rdul ma khrugs pan/ khron dag ma chags gzhid dang ni thecom

142a6(rgyud): khrung khrung dang // 'che ba le lo yon po nyid// bsam dang spyod dang zhum pa dang // kun rdzob de nyid don yod dang // ster dang dga' 'dod pa dang // 'jigs dang 'dar dang phra bdag nyid// gsal dang rnam gas
142a7(rgyud): lhang 'jug dang / 'brel dang rtag pa'i de nyid dang // ru sbal ngoms med gnod pa dang // mi gsal ba dang yid du 'ong // gnas med mang du smra ba dang / bdag nid skyes bu nyid dang ni// ye mtshan dga' dang skye

143b2(rgyud): bla khyen yang nga byung mchog tu ma byung ba'o// rjod pa y-i ni kun rdzong du// de ning yis yang dag pa shang / ra mig shin tu dra 'i'i byung // de don ni thong ba med/ dag rang gi dro bo rig 'a rlom gas

143b7(rgyud): ltar yang dag sgom pa ni// 'di ni stong nyidang sdom byed pa'o// don dam gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// yang na rgyu 'bras sbyar ba'i phyir// de ni rang bzhin 'grub par sgom// don dam rang gi ngo bor ni// kun rdzob kyang ni dri
143b8(rgyud): bzhin du// bsgoms pas 'khor ba 'joms par 'gyur// ji ltar til la ti la mor ni// gnas pa nyid la mthong mi 'gyur// de bzhin lus la stong pa zhid // gnas kyang bsgribs pas mthong ba me/ 
144a1(rgyud): bla ma'i zhal las 'di shes par/ yang dag rig pas kun rdzob spangs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las stong pa nyid kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga
144a2(rgyud): nga'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// thig le'i dbye 'a bla na meng // 'jig rten thig la dbye bas dben// 'khor bar yang dang yang du 'khor// mdzod spu'i dbus na gnas pa ni// thig le rlung du
144a3(rgyud): yang dag bshad// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'byed// rnal 'byor mdung pa bkrol nas ni// rlung gi de nyid rig pa de// mchog tu 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba de yang mi shes par// rlung dang sngags kyi rnal 'byor
144a4(rgyud): gyis// brjod dang brjod bya'i dpe las 'das/ mi gsal log bar mthong rnams kyis// bsam gtan bsgom bya dang bral po'o// sangs rgyas rnams ni thob pa dka'// rnal 'byor ma yi drin gyis ni// zhal nas
144a5(rgyud): zhal du brgyud nas gnas// bcom ldan 'de ba chen po la/ rdo rje sems dpas slar zhus pa// 'gro ba'i mgon gyisabastan du gsol// thig le'i dbye ba rig bcas pa// rnal 'byor mchog
144a6(rgyud): ni gang gis shes// sbyor bas mad pa 'byed par byed// khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba 'di// myur du dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// de skad nus nas rdo rje can// rdo rje dbang phyug la gsungs pa// mchog tu gsal
144a7(rgyud): ba 'di nyid ni// gang du 'ong gsal bar ma gsungs pa// thig le'i dbye ba de yang ni/ nga yis bshad kyis de nyon// snying gi pade sbugs na mkha' la// ye shes rdo rje rtag tu bzhugs// steng dang
144a8(rgyud): 'og la bsten nas ni// srog dang thur sel rlung chen gnas// de la 'ang dbye bar dka' ba yi// dbus su mdung pa gsum gyis drakri// de yis mchog dang bcom byas pas// stang du 'gro ba thob mi byed// 
144b1(rgyud): des bcom slar yang rnam lnga rgyu// srog dang thun sel gyen rgyu dang // khyab byed dang ni mnyam gnas nyid // rtse mo lnga las rgyu du ni/ rtsa lnga la ni yang dag sen// rgyags dang rnam par nus pa dang // myos dang
144b2(rgyud): gtung dang mdza' bo ste// de dag car ni lngar shes bya// rdo rje'i 'og tu gsal bar khyab// steng gi sro gi dbus na yang // rdo rje'i lta ba'i mkha' dbyings 'gro// srog ces bya ba'i rlung chen po// lte ba mdung ba dang
144b3(rgyud): phrad pas/ bcom nas kyang ni rnam lngar rgyu// rtse mo rnams la ca lngar ni// zla ba'i cha dang sna dang ni/ bsnyen bkur lkog shal mchin pa ste// Ta ni lnga yi ming yin no// rtswa ni lnga las rgyu ba'i rlung / krung
144b4(rgyud): ru sbal rtsangs pa dang // lha sbyin dang ni gzhu las rgya/ la// de ltar rnga de dang bcas pa// lus kyi thur du 'gro ba/ sa na// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams ni// yang dang ying du bskul byas
144b5(rgyud): nas/ bskul bas kyang ni rgyas pa na// gti mug chen pos dbang du byed// de steng chos kyi 'khor lo ni// gnas pa'i rtsa ni bskul byas nas// de rnams lhan cig rtsa de dag/ zhe sdang gis ni dpung
144b6(rgyud): du byed// yang dag bskul nas de steng gi/ longs spyod mchog tu ngo mtshar skye// rtsa dang de rnams dang lhan cig tu// chags pa chen pos dang byas na// bskul ba dang ni de steng gi/ spyi bo'i 'khor lo'i
144b7(rgyud): bde chen du// rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu// byang chub sems kyis gang bar byed // rnam rtog rnam par rgyu byed cing // sna tshogs dbye pa thams cad las// steng ma rnams kyang thor du 'gro// srog
144b8(rgyud): gi ra tu bcim nas ni// de dag thams cad rdo rje'i cher zhugs nas zur du la bltas pa'o// de lang thur du mi 'gro ste// mi rig mdzu pa'i 'khor ba ni// rnam par shes po'i shing 'i
145a1(rgyud): rlung / de ni bag chags dang 'dres pas// mig dang rna ba de bzhin sa// lce ste rnam par shes pas phyo gas byung nas ni// ngag chags rnam shes dang 'das nas// rnam shes dbang po
145a2(rgyud): lhan cig tu// don ni rab tu rgyas par byed// slar yang lam de nyid nas ni// ji lta ba yi rim pas 'jug/ de yi dngos nyid de sbyor bas// rnam shes bstan pa'i skad cig la// de yi chags bcas kyis slar 'phel// 'khrul
145a3(rgyud): byas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las// de ltar bag chags kyis bslang pa'i// rnam shes las kyi ngo bor 'gro// de nyid kyang ni srog sbyor bas// khams gsum par ni 'khrul pa'o// byed po las kyi 'bras bur mong // gzhan
145a4(rgyud): nyid du ni 'khor ba med// de phyir 'khor ba gzhom don du// thig le go/ 'phangs gsal bar dbye// sgom pa la ni 'bad par byed// ma da rig gzhan ni mi shes pa// dbus kyi mdung po de yang ni// 
145a5(rgyud): debyed na ni dngos grub 'gyur// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor grub pa ste/ ye shes lnga ni thong nas ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob pa dang // mchog tu gsal ba thob nas ni// blo bzeng ji lta ba
145a6(rgyud): bzhin gnas// phreng ba mi dgos sgom mi dgos// bya ba mi dgos da pa ngo kyi de nyid gcig pu yis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thog// las chos dam tshig phyag rgya ni// dbye ba 'di ni ma gsung so// 
145a7(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dbye bas ma yin zhing // de bzhin dga' ba sogs kyis min// phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phangs gsal sngag kyi de nyid kyis ni thob// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang // gnyis maud bde ba de nyid dang // 
145a8(rgyud): gsang ba'i thig le'i dbye ba dang // rnal 'byor grub pa'i bde chen po// ma rig sgo nga'i sngabs 'byed cing // 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo 'joms// phyag rgya chen pa'i dngos grub dang // rab tu byed pa
145b1(rgyud): mchog tu bshang // sngags kyi de nyid nges sbyor bas// rigs shing yan lag gsal ba gang // rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin dang // bla ma'i zhal las nges rtogs 'gyur// man ngag med pa'i
145b2(rgyud): bzlas pa ni// sngags kyi rgyal po tho rmongs byed// de yi dka' ba gcig pa dang // chu bsrubs mar ni mi 'gyur ltar// de bzhin man ngag dang bral sngags// skyes bus ji srid 'tsho yi bar/ bzlas kyang de yi
145b3(rgyud): 'bras bu yi// che tsam thob par mi 'gyur ro// mi shes pa yi mi 'ba' zhig/ rgya mtsho'i gzhi yi pha mtha' yi// sa la shin tu 'gro 'dod pa// lam ni gang yin mi 'dri gang / de ltar bdag nyid 'gro ba
145b4(rgyud): byed// de bzhin dga' ba cher byed pa'i man ngag dang bral sgrub pa do// / 'bras bu med cing mkhas pa yang // sgrub pa po ni khong khro/ skye// khong khro skyes pa'i skad cig la// 'bras bu med cing
145b5(rgyud): ngu 'bod 'gro// de phyir 'bad po thams cad kyis// dad pas bla ma brgyad pa las// man ngag dag ni bslab par bya// gang phyirabargyud pa'i lung gis khyab// brgyud pa'i rim pas gran
145b6(rgyud): par byed // do ni rnal 'byor ma zhal dang // bla ma'i zhal las 'bad pa yis// de nyid mchog ni bslab par bya// sngags kyi mnangag brgyud pa'i lung // de thos lag na rdo rjes kyang // rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ 
145b7(rgyud): the tshom thams cad gcod pa la// phyag byas nas ni zhus pa ni// khyed kyis bstan pa de nyid mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ni// sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med// gang bslabs skad cig dngos grub
145b8(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba// de nyid mchog tu gsang ba ni// gang du'ang nga yis ma bshad pa// skal pa med pa bsam pa'i rgyus// rgyud rnams kun tu
146a1(rgyud): sbas byas la// de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med// sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa yis// gang gi myur du dngos grub 'gyur// thog mar uSh+ma'i bam
146a2(rgyud): dring dpangs yig drug pas rnam par rgyan// sde tshan tha ma'i mtha' dang ldan// dbyangs med pa yi cha dang bcas// uSh+ma'i mtha' la dbyings yog 'ong // dgu pa dang ni yang dag ldani// mthar ni tshig drag mchog gi
146a3(rgyud): sgra sngogs kyi gtso bo btu bar bya// de ltar yi ge gnyis kyi ming // sngags kyi brda' ni rmad byung ba// 'dzin pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir// sgra dang thig le'i ming du byas// rlung gnyis kyis ni phyi nas ni/ ma rig
146a4(rgyud): mdud pa phyed pa byed // phyab rgya chen po mchog gi rgyu// chog/ zhi ba'i yi ge grinyis/ man dag thob pa'i rjod pa'i don/ la ngagis zla ba drug 'bris ma/ thig lo'i stso la go 'phangs
146a5(rgyud): gsal/ 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed// skye bos dben pa lha yi gnas// sgra yi tsher ma rnams dang bral// bgegs med skal bzang nyams dga' ba// bskyed mos tshal zhi bde ba che// 
146a6(rgyud): 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod pas// sngags kyi gtso bo 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// khyim du bde ba'i phyag rgyas gnas// gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// sgrub po bde ba'i
146a7(rgyud): stan 'dug nas// mig gnyis sna tsar gtad bas nas// sna ni lte ba'i tshad du bzhag/ phrag gong bsnams la lce rkan sngar// so dang mchu ni bde bar gzhag/ dbugs kyi 'byung rngub klong nas ni// cung zad
146a8(rgyud): bung zad tsal bral// ji lta ba bzhin 'byung rngub ni/ rdo rje skyil krung legs gnas pas// de ltar phyag rgya dang ldan pas// yog gnyis ni rtag tu bzlas// thig lo dbye bas bad ba che// zla ba drug gis rnal
146b1(rgyud): mchog/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// rtsa ba'i rgyun ni dang po 'di// a ba d+hU ti dri med gnas// rlung gi de nyid ye shes che// rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni rgyu// ri lu ral gri ro langs dang // rgyal po mig sman
146b2(rgyud): bcud kyis len// dmag dpung rengs dang rtsig pa 'bigs// rig 'dzin gyi no go 'phang mchog/ mi snang ba dang gter mthong ba// 'dod dgur sbyar dang gzugs mthong dang // gser 'gyur dang ni dug las
146b3(rgyud): rgyal dam yi nang du 'jug pa dang // mngon shes lnga yi go 'phang dang // ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de ltar skad cig gcig la ni// byang chub mtshan nyid go 'phang ngo // dka' ba spyod pa spangs nas ni/ 
146b4(rgyud): shes rab snying rje yang dag ldan// bshad pa'i bde ba chen po ster// sdom pa mi dgos sbyin sreg min/ phreng ba mi dgos bgrang mi dogos// 'di ni bskyod rim deb mi dgos// gsungs pa
146b5(rgyud): dka' thub sogs mi dgos// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gcig pu yis// bla ma'i zhal las brgyud pa dang // zla ba ma drug gis mngon sbyor bas// go 'phong mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal
146b6(rgyud): 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon rtogs pa las thig le'i dbye ba dang // rnal 'byor mchog thob par byed pa'i le'u ste drag pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// bla na med pa na de
146b7(rgyud): don/ gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub 'gyur// sgra yang mi shigs par ni bshad// rang bzhin 'od gsal dri ma med// rnam pa kun las rnam par grol// lte ba sprul pa yang
146b8(rgyud): ngag gnas// sbrul gyi lce ltar phra ba ni// gnyis med ye shes mang byung ba// tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag pod dpa/ dbang phyug dang ni rtag zhi ba// de dag de ltar rin po che// skyed pa po ya pha dang mas// yi ge
147a1(rgyud): me cing gong bu med/ 'byung ba chen po rnam par spangs// dus dang rtog pa rnams las grol// skye med zad med mang du zung // 'dzin pa kun la zhen la sogs// spangs shing
147a2(rgyud): ma med pa dang // mchog gi mchog ste zhi ba med// dngos po kun gyi dbus na gnas// rnam rtog med cing rten pa med// kun gozhi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa// nyon mongs can gyi yid kyis ni// khams po rnam
147a3(rgyud): kyis sad par bya// mchog tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// thob pa'i go 'bang bla na med// gnyis ming mchog tu gsal ba dang // rlung gi de nyid yang dag rten// yi ge hoHyis bskul nas ni// me yi 'khor
147a4(rgyud): lo sang bar byed// de lta'i ni de'i go 'phang don// bla ma'i zhal la yang ngag gnas// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje bri'i mdo na bar rtogs pa las ni de'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i
147a5(rgyud): le'u ste bdun pa'o// de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i don// bla na me dpa bshad kyis non// gsang ba b+ha ga zhisu gsungs// b+ha ga/ de bzhin chos 'byung ba// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang rten// 
147a6(rgyud): dga' ba bskyed par byed pa'i rgyud// rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni gnas// ye shes lnga bdag nyid gsal// ye shes chen po spros pa med// rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs// bral dga'i mtha' ste mchog tu
147a7(rgyud): phrad lhan cig skyes dga' kun bdag gnas// dga' bral la sogs skad cig gnas/ phra ba yang dag byang chub sems// srog la phan par 'tshe ba ste// srang mda'i 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas/ 
147a8(rgyud): dus bral rnam rtog mang ste// snying zhid skye med 'chi ba med// sprul pa'i 'khor lor thim pa dang // bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo skye// bsam gyis mi khyab zhi ba ste// chags bral 'gro kun skye ba med// 
147b1(rgyud): rdo rje dad+ma ma'am sbyor bas// bde ba thams cad ster bar byed// rlung gi de nyid rig pa yis// rtsa yi dbus su 'dzin par byed// gang de skye ba nyams myong bar// gsang ba zhes ni bya bar grags// de nyid gas
147b2(rgyud): ba yi ni mchog/ bla ma'i zhal la lhag par gnas// phan tshun brgyud pa'i rim pa yis// bla ma bzang po'i zhal las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs
