147b3(rgyud): ba las gsang ba chen po'i tshogs ma lus par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u sa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang sdom pa'i don// de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon// sdom pa srung bar byed pa gang
147b4(rgyud): de ni byang chub sems zhes brjod// rdo rje'i rtse mor sems 'dzin pa // da ni srang ba zhes ni grags// dbang po rnams ni yul rnam sa la// 'jug cing rtag tu gang gnas pa// de ni sdom
147b5(rgyud): bsrung ba dang // dam tshig srung bar bshad pa yin// gdul du ka' tshul 'chos g.yo rgyu can// rmongs dang sems khros g.yo ban dang // dang med rtog ge ba lhan cig/ rtags
147b6(rgyud): kyi nye bar 'tsho ba dang // nyan thos nor la brkam chags can// de kho na nyid sun 'byin cing // don dam pa ni mi shes pa/ med par lta dang tshul khrims 'tshal// gtam dang tshig ni rgyal ba dang // 'dri ba
147b7(rgyud): la sogs mi bya zhing // sa gol gtogs pa tsam du yang // de dang lhan cig gnas mi bya// las kyi phyag rgya nyams dga' ba// gal te byas pa'i skyo bo dang // de dang lhan cig dam tshig ni// mi bya
147b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur// skyed na dam tshig dbus zhugs dang // pang snod phyag rgya sogs brtan dang // brkam dang 'brel bas 'jug pa dang // dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya// snod dang cang
148a1(rgyud): te'u gri gug dang // glegs bam dang ni bgrang phreng dang / dam tshig med pa gzhan dag la// gang du'ang bstan par mi bya'o// dge slong sdom la gnas pa la// rnal 'byor spyod
148a2(rgyud): sogs bya ba dang // man ngag rnams ni bstan mi bya// ras ris la sogs mi bstan cing // gang gis dam tshig lhan cig tu// ji ltar spyod pa yang dag spyod// bla ma la yang smra min na// gzhan rnam
148a3(rgyud): la ni smos ci dgos/ dbang po yul la spyod pa ni/ gang nas de ni bsdoms nas ni// stong nying gnyis med sgyu ma las// sogs pas kun rdzob ldag spyad no// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur sog/ 
148a4(rgyud): nyams myong ba'i bde ba yis// bde ba chen po'i dran pa yis// dbang po rnams ni yul las ldog/ bdag stong gzhan la smod pa dang // / ye shes snams sogs nges spangs pa// blo ldan rdo rje
148a5(rgyud): dbang phyug gi/ yang dag sdom pa bshad pa yin// de lta bu so gas dam tshig ni// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag bsrung bya// / gzhan du rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur// rnal
148a6(rgyud): 'byor ldan pa rdo rje can// bgreng phreng dang ni dbu rgyun dang // rus pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya dang // glegs bam bsam gtan res ris dang // thod pa la sogs rnal 'byor ma// thams cad du ni dngos
148a7(rgyud): grub phyir// bla ma la yang sba bar bya// sngags ni tshig du brjod mi bya// mchu 'gul bar yang mi mngon zhing // cung zad mgrin par brjod bya yis// sngags kyi rgyal po de ltar bzlas// gsang
148a8(rgyud): dngos grub mtshungs pa med// gang phyir de ni sdom par bshad// snod min norare ni chen po dang // ldan yang rgyud las skyon du gsungs// bla mas bla med dngas grub phyir// 'bad pa yos ni spang
148b1(rgyud): bya bza' btung gos la sogs pa dang // nor ni chen po la chags shing // snod min slob ma man ngag mchog/ rmad du byung ba smra ba gang // rnal 'byor shes pa che 'di la// de ni dmyal ba ngu 'bod
148b2(rgyud): 'gro// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje drang ba mngon par rtogs pa las sdom pa'i tshig gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// dam tshigadon
148b3(rgyud): ni bla na med// bza' ba yi ni dam tshig gang // de ni nga yi bshad bya// bza' ba runi bshed ba gang // de ni dadung rtsi lnga ru brjod// rlung gi de nod sbyor ba yis// zhus nas ro cig sngar yang ni// rdo rje lam nas steng so
148b4(rgyud): sta/ gcig tu gyur pa bza' ba'o// dam tshig/ lus dang ngag yid kyis// de nyid gsum dang gang shar dang // 'khor lo bzhi po rnams la yang / bde ba nyan su myong ba
148b5(rgyud): gang / de dngararo gcig rnal 'byor pa// rtag tu spyod pa bza' ba'o// byang chu ba sems kyi de nyid mchog/ bde ba chen po'i go 'phang thim// zhu ba rlung gi de nyid kyis// bza' ba bsam gtan bzang po'o// 
148b6(rgyud): spyi bo thod pa'i slad nas ni// de tsam rnal 'byor pas rtag tu// da li snong rje datung ba ni// byang chub sems dpa' bde ba che// snod ra cho ga gsang ba'i pad+ma blugs// rten ni bza' ba rab rtogs byed// sems kyis bdud rtsi
148b7(rgyud): 'jung byad na// bdud rtsi lnga yi ro rjes 'thung // de rba ba ni rdo rje 'chang // bla ba rta khyi ba glang mi// byang chub sems dang bcas pa'i khrag/ sres nas skad cig de la bza'// de ni bdud rtsi lnga zhes brjod// rnam rta/ 
148b8(rgyud): dang ni kun rtog gis// stong pa nyid du gsal ba'i snod// rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'// stong nyid ye shes pha rol 'gro// dga' ba gsum pa'i bde ba ni// lhan skyes lhan cig snod du ni// rdo rje can gyis rtag tu
149a1(rgyud): bza'/ bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas// rnam rtog rlung rnams thams cad ni// zhi ba'i de zhing snod bzang por// rlung gi de nyid shes pas bza'// rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang gnas// phyag
149a2(rgyud): rgya gsum dang yang dag sbyor// phyag rgya ga chen por bshad snod du// rnal 'byor de nyid shes pas bza'// srog dang rtsol ba'i go 'phang gnas// rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis// sgom dang sgom min sogs 'khrul pa
149a3(rgyud): srog chen po yi snod du ni// rnam rtog dra ba'i sa bon tshogs// phung po'i bud shing snod bzang por// ye shes chen po'i me yis min// sngags kyi de nyid rtogs pas bza'// bdud bzhi khro bo chen po yi// stobs kyi
149a4(rgyud): rig pas sgrub pa'i/ sgrub pos legs pa mnyam gzhag nas// rtag spyal 'byor sdong du bzal// rlung dang sngags drang rdzas rnams kyi/ thig le gsum ste bla na med/ mi shigs go 'phang snod du ni/ 
149a5(rgyud): zos na rnal 'byor pha rol 'gro// stong nyid ye shes mtshungs med pa// snying rje'i snod kyis mchog tu ni// ye shes chen po mnyam gzhag nas// gtung zhing rtag tu btung ba'o// phyag rgya'i dam tshig
149a6(rgyud): zhesu bshad// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyor// de kho na nyid mchog skas gang // de ni skal ldan snod la ni// rnal 'byor pas 'thungs nyams dga' ba// bsgrub par bya ba'i de nyid mchog/ nyon mongs dang bral lhan cig
149a7(rgyud): skyes/ phyag rgya chen po'i don bsgrub bya// da lta bu sogs dam tshig sogs// gzhan ni gang du ngas ma bshad// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog/ bla ma'i zhal las gsal bar rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i
149a8(rgyud): spyong dpa la rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las dam tshig gi don gtan la dbab pa'i leru ste bcu pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis zhon// smra tsam don ni bshad par bya// gang gis/ 
149b1(rgyud): shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'pho ba med pa'i go 'phang 'thob// chos kyi 'khor lo'i bang sprug su// sgra tsam yang dag gnas pa ni/ chags med snang ba med pa dang // gnyi su med cing dri ma med// dpe bral g.yo ba
149b2(rgyud): med pa dang // gzhi med bla gab med pa dang // lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog/ 'byung dang rngub pa rnam par spangs// rnal 'byor rnams kyi lha dbang phyug/ de lta bu ni rnyed par dka'// mchog tu zhi ba bde ba che
149b3(rgyud): gzugs mchog 'chi ba med pa'i mchog/ rten cing 'bral 'byung rang bzhin gyis// rgun tshang ro yis myos pa ltar// mchog tu nang du song gyur nas// de bzhin rnam pa kun gyi gnas// sngags kyi de nyid
149b4(rgyud): rig pa'i rten// rang gi nyams myong rtog pa'i gnas// de nas ston pa bla med pa// rdo rje sems dpas zhes pa ni// bcom ldan do nyid zhi ba mkhyen// sngags kyi dri zhing rab dbye ba// gang gis rnam
149b5(rgyud): bar shes tsam gyis// de kho na nyid 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje/ can gyis gsungs// sngags kyi de nyid bla na med// mchog dang / rab mchog phra ba dang // ye shes chen po mchog chen
149b6(rgyud): po snying yi yang snying po mchog/ yang dag bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa rnams// gsang ba'i go 'phang po ba med// lte ba'i 'khor lo de nyid mchog sgra tsam du
149b7(rgyud): ni yang drag gnas// stong nyid chen pa'i dbus su thim/ bde ba chen po go 'phang gsal// gnyis med 'jigs bral zhing dang / snang ba med cing kun rdzob med// gnyis med ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis/ 
149b8(rgyud): sngags kyi de ning rab gsal pa// thog ma meng cing zhi ba dang // dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso// stong shing snying rje dbyer med pa/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// de ma thog mir stong zhid
150a1(rgyud): sgom/ snang ba med pa'i go 'bang zhing // rang bzhin med gnas nyams dga' ba// rnam rtog med la mchog tu rten// stong nyid ye shes mtshungs pa med// byang chub sems kyi rgyud dang ni/ 
150a2(rgyud): ge hAM las yang dag byung // rnal 'byor shes pa rmad byung che// de nyid gsum ni ro gcig don// a ba d+hA ti'i go 'phang gnas// slar yang dga' ba'i sbyor ba yi// 'jug pa la sogs rnams rnam par spadra/ 
150a3(rgyud): bde bo chen po'i go 'phang ni// byang chub sems dri ma med// sna tshogs skad cig dbyer med pa// brjod bye dag nyid dbyangs bral ba// rtag tu gnas pa'i rgyun gyis kyang / byang chub sems ni 'bab pa ni// 
150a4(rgyud): sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni thob// skye med zhi ba'i thig la tsam// sngags kyi spyod pas spyad pas na// yis mog ni rang rig pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon pa
150a5(rgyud): rtogs pa las sgra tsam gyi don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rlung gi de nyid mchog don dam pa ni bshad kyis nyon// rnal 'byor pa yis rlung bsgoms na/ myur du
150a6(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rlung gi thig le shes che// phra zhing de gnyis go 'phang gsal// dngos grub kun byed nyams dga' ba// gnyis med rnal 'byor mi zad pa// skye med kun 'gro zhi ba dang // lus
150a7(rgyud): rnams kun la khyab pa dang // ma pham stong pa bsam mi khyab// thams cad bdag nying rtag tu bzhugs// sgom dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor gyis// thig le rang gi ngo bo shos// chos rnams gcig tu gyur
150a8(rgyud): ba'i gnas// sngags kyi nyid kyi ni rgyu// bag chags kun las rnam par grol// kun mkhyen bde ba kun gsol ba// sna yi rtse mor de nyid mchog/ 'od zer thig le bsam par bya// srog dang rtso la
150b1(rgyud): yang dag sbyor// rtog pa rnams kyi grangs ster ba// skal bzang ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga yi cho ga ni// rin chen lnga yi sbyor ba'i gzugs// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid tsam// thog ma lus kyi phyag
150b2(rgyud): rgya'i dngos// ngag gi grangs kyi zlos mtshan nyid// yid kyi rnal 'byor che la zhe na// sgom pa'i go 'phang mi bzad pa// dbugs kyi cho gas ni bgrang ba dang // rlung gi rnam par dbad pa dang // gnas kyi dbye ba rtsa rnam
150b3(rgyud): kyi/ dus kyi dbye ba rtog pa dang // rlung rnams kyi ni bzlog pa dang // rtog pa dang bcas spangs pa ste// de ltar mdor bsdus rnams drug gis// 'byung dang rngub pa zhesu brjod// thog mar 'byung rngub pa rnams// nyi khri dang ni
150b4(rgyud): tshig stong ngo // de bzhin grangs ni brgya phrag drug nyin dang mtshan mo nges pa ni// ji srid grangs ni thob pa'i gnas// nyin shag nyi shu rtsa bdun du// grangs kyi rjesu sbyor ba yis// grangs ni yang
150b5(rgyud): dang yang brtag/ dus mtshams kyi ni rab dbye bas// de nas rjesu zlos par 'gyur// thun tshod so sor srog rnams dang / rtsol ba ru ni brtag pa ste// nyis stong bdun brgya'i grangs kyis ni// yang
150b6(rgyud): dag par ni ngas bzung med// yongasu gsal bar bcad nas ni// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// nyin dang mtshan du nges par ni// de rjes gnas ni rdol ba yis// tha dang du ni rab tu brtag/ 
150b7(rgyud): rtsa yi 'khor lo rgyu ba yis// 'byung dang rngub pa nges par ni// nges par gzung ba'i sbyor ba las// rtsa yi 'khor lo sprad par bya// de yi 'khor lo'i rtsa dbye bas// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las// de rjes gnas
150b8(rgyud): kyi sgrol ba'i sa// gnas kyi dbye bas brtag par bya// gnas ni so sor brtags pa yis/ brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu// rnam rtog med pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ rtog pa spangs pa'i mtshan nyid can/ dngos po
151a1(rgyud): kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu// 'di ni yang dag rnal 'byor mchog/ nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis// mtshan nyid sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ ji ltar gnas pa
151a2(rgyud): rang ngo bo// rtog dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de nas rnal 'byor logs nas ni// rtog pa dang bral rlung chen po// rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam par rgyu// de thob nas ni log pa dang // kun nas nyon mongs rnal 'byor pas// nges pa
151a3(rgyud): la ni don dam pa// nyin zhag nyi sha rtsa bdun las// las dang po pa'i sbyor ba yis// blo dang ldan pa log pa las// de nas dgag pa de dag kyang // yang dag rnal 'byor stobs kyis ni// srog dang rtsol ba'i rnam rtog
151a4(rgyud): rnams// kun nas rab tu spangs nas ni// rlung gi de kho na nyid rgyu// rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya// gnyis med mchog gi rnal/ 'byor gyis// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la// rlung gi de kho nan
151a5(rgyud): rten 'khrul pa'i rnal 'byor dag pa ni// de la rtswa gcig sems kyis ni// rtog med de kho na nyid kyis// rlung gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ yang dag rtsol la byas pa gsal// khang bzang byed pa
151a6(rgyud): bzhin du ni// thog mar sa ni yongasu sbyang // de stengs bgegs dang bral byas la// gnas ni legs par dag par bya// khang bzang skal ba nyams dga' ba// blo ldan ji ltar 'dod par bya// de bzhin rnal
151a7(rgyud): 'byor spyod pas mchog/ rlung gi de nyid rnam par sbom// snga ma bzhin du mnam gzhag nas// srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba dang // rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes che// rnal 'byor rig pa bsgom par
151a8(rgyud): bya// thog mar rlung gi de nyid dang // de nas sngags kyi de nyid gsal// de la rlung gi 'od zer mchog/ gsal ba chen po'i kha dag lnga// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rang bzhin// phung po lnga yi rang ngo bo// da ni
151b1(rgyud): ye shes lnga dag pa// rlung lnga ru ni rgyu bar byed// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga'i// de nyid mtshan nyid go 'phang mchog/ sna yi rtse mo de nyid mchog/ rlung lnga dang ni rang ngo bo// rlung gi thig le zhes ni bshad/ 
151b2(rgyud): yang dag de nyid gsel ba yang // sna rtse yungs kar de yang ni// rgyud gzhan rnams gsungs pa ni// sna rtser yungs kar de yang ni// srog dang rtsol brtag pa ste// srog dang rtsol ba gnas pa// 'od lnga
151b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnamasu sgo/ stang gi sna las nges 'byung ba// g.yas dang g.yon dang gzhig yang // dal bar rgyu dang rnam bzhir 'gyur// nang gi dus ni yin par bshad// lkog ma snying kha lte ba dang // 
151b4(rgyud): gsang ba'i pad+mar 'gro 'ong ston// thun phyed kyi ni dus dag tu// gau ri mas ji bzhin gnas pas bstan// g.yas pa nas ni 'byung / ba'i khams// me yi dkyil 'khor nying yin te// kha ngos
151b5(rgyud): dmar zhing gsal ba nyid// pad+ma'i mgon po rgyu ba'o// g.yon pa/ nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyi 'khor zhes bya ba/ ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste// las kyi mgon po rgyu ba'o// 
151b6(rgyud): gnyis ka las ni 'byung ba'i khams// gser gyi mdog tu snang ba ste// dbang chen gyi ni dkyor nyid// ri ni chen mgon po rgyu ba'o// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni/ chu
151b7(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor zhing yin te// rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o// lus kun la ni gnas pa'i rlung // bya ba kun la 'jug pa'o// 'di ni rnam snang ngo bo ste// 'chi ba'i lus la 'byung bar 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid
151b8(rgyud): gsal ba 'di// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor byis pa'i yul min zhing // rtog ge pa yis mi sheso// dngos grub thams cad gsal byed pa// rnal 'byor kun gyi dngos grub pa/ 
152a1(rgyud): de nyid kun gyi go 'bang gsal// rnam 'byor kun gyi don bsdus pa/ rdo rje sems pa'i go 'bang gsal thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de nyid mchog ni shin tu phra// bla ma'i
152a2(rgyud): lanal las rtogs par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi de kho na nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bsha
152a3(rgyud): kyis chos/ bde ba chen po'i gsal ba'i tshig/ rdor sems go' 'angam byed pa// rang rig pas ni mchog gi mchog/ kun rtog gis brtags kyis stong pa// bde ba chen po zhes 'di brjod/ ldan cig
152a4(rgyud): skyes pa'i dus su ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// bde dang sdug bsngal rnam par spangs// zhi ba gnyis med rnam par bra 2// dngos po kun gyi rang bla dang // bde chen zhes ni 'di
152a5(rgyud): la brjod// rdo rje ye shes lnga yi dngos// sangs rgyas lnga rang bzhin cin// lnga ni rtsa nas 'bab pa'i rgyun// stong nyid rdo rje'i go 'ab nga gsal// rang bzhin med cing rten pa med// gnyis me
152a6(rgyud): dngos po rnam bral zhing // ma med cha ni nir spangs// rtag tu rtog pa kun las grol// 'pho ba med cing zhi ba dang // zang med bde ba thams cad gsal// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol ba// bde ba thams cad la 'jug
152a7(rgyud): ba stong pa stong pa chen po dang // shin tu stong pa mchog gi mchog/ stong pa gnan stong pa'i gnas// namakha' lnga yi ngo bo nyid// mi chod mi 'gyur ngo bo nyid // mi tshig pa dang mchog 'bigs// sangs rgyas lnga
152a8(rgyud): yi ye shes mchog/ rang bzhin rdo rje na so na brjod// snying rje rnal 'byor yang dag 'dres// mchog tu skye ba'i bde ba 'di// de nyid gsum po ro gcig pa// brjod dang brjod pa rnam par spangs// bde chen zhes bya'i 'kho
152b1(rgyud): lor gnas// dbang po rnams kyi spyod yul min// mchog tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis/ zhi ba dga' ba'i mtshan nyid gcig/ 'khor lo bzhi yi rim gyis thobag rnal 'byor ba ni yi go 'phang gsal// stong nyingad lnga yis
152b2(rgyud): kun nas gang / chang ni yini rnam bkag pa// rdo rje rtse mor 'dzin pa ni// sems dpa' zhes byar gtan la dbab// nam khA lnga yi cha yis gang // 'di ni rdo rje sems dpang brjod// de nyid bde chen ga 'phang ste// bzhi pa dag
152b3(rgyud): ba kun la khyag dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor skyes// mi byid dbye ba rnam par spangs// de yi ngo bo de nyid de// rang nyid tshor ba rig pa'o// pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul min// dpe bral mtshon par dka' ba dang / rang gi blo la yang
152b4(rgyud): dag gnas// rang rig pa zhes bshad po'o// gzhon nu ma yi rab dag bzhin// mchog tu gsal bar nyam su myong // de nyid mchog dang / pha rol 'gro// mchog ni thub pa kun la sogs/ rtog pa
152b5(rgyud): gsal ba'i go 'phang ni// de ni mchog dang bde ba che// de nyid gsum du ma tshan nyid gcig/ dngos dang dngos med las grol bde ba'i bdag nyid 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ni grol pra rtogs// gnyis dang gnyis
152b6(rgyud): med rnam dpyod rang bzhin dang bral blo ni zhi ba'i bdag nyid can// gsungs pa'i nyon mongs gcod cing 'jig rten kun rtog dang ni bral ba zhes/ shes dang shes bye ni rtog dben pa spangs shing bden pa'i rang bzhin dang
152b7(rgyud): mthar gyur kun bya ba zhi pa mchog dang mchog rab de nyid 'gro ba de la stsol// dus ni dus kyi mtha' zhes brjod// bzhi pa'i dus sbyor zhes bya ba// 'khor ba 'khrul pa'i rtogs spangs shing // mya ngan 'das pa thob pa spangs/ 
152b8(rgyud): mnyam pa'i nyams ni chen por myos ma'am nying ye shes mtshan nyid can// gzung ba rnams kyi yul rnams zhes/ kun nas gzugs la sogs pa las// 'dzin pa dbang po rnam shes rnams/ mig la sogs par
153a1(rgyud): / rang bzhin gyis// de dang bral zhing mchog tu phra// ye shes pade bkun gyi bdag/ sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// bde ba sems ni ni bzhid // sdug
153a2(rgyud): bsngal 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid des// de las rnam grol 'jigs pa med// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po// stong nyid ye shes chen po'i bdag 'khor ba'i sdug bsnga mi 'byung zhing // thugs rje zhi bar mdzad ba'i phyir// mya ngan
153a3(rgyud): 'das pa'i bde mi gnas// zhan thos ye shes zhi ba nyid // gnyis med mchog dang bse ru'o//  dag bde ba stobs pa yi// de dang bral ba'i bde chen po// dgang phyir mchog tu dga' ba'i dus// nyan thos ye shes brjod do// de mtha
153a4(rgyud): bral ba'i dga' ba ni// rang rgyal mya ngan 'das pa dang // de ni gnyis med ye shes zhi// bde ba yis ni bye brag byas// dngos po mkhyen pa'i ye shes che// byang chub sems kyang 'dzin par byed// rtsa rnams kun la
153a5(rgyud): bde ba ni/ bde ba chen po go 'phang gnas// de yi bdag nyid de nyid ni// bde ba chen po zhes brjod// rnal 'byor gcig pus de nyi ni// rtog pa rnam rtog bdag nyid min// bsnyen nas bzlas pa sbyin sreg min
153a6(rgyud): bsam gtan rlung ni bgag pas min// bya ba ma yin phreng bas min// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgoms pas min// bud snang bzhi pa'i dbang bskur gyis// bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas 'thob// rnal 'byor ma kun kun spyod ni// 
153a7(rgyud): mchog gi ye shes bde ba che// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las bde ba chen po/ tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// de nas gzhan yang
153a8(rgyud): bshad kyis nyon// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par sbyor// gang gi yang dag dngos grub 'gyur// tshe 'di nyid la rnal 'byor pa// mi phyed rdo rje nas ni brjod// de ni rlung ngu yang dag grags// yi ge a ni phye ba yis// rnal 'byor
153b1(rgyud): shes pas rtag mchog sgrol// de rten snying kha'i pad+ma yis// 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// chos kyi 'khor lo skal ba bzang // thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de yi 'dab ma la skyes pa// rnam
153b2(rgyud): shes brgyad ni kun rdzob bo// mig la sogs pa yang dag rten// 'gro ba gsum du rnam par spyod// de dag 'joms pa rlung rdo rje/ bgegs mthar byed pa zhes ni brjod// rnam shes rnams dang gang de la// 'jig
153b3(rgyud): rten skyong ba rnam su brjod// 'jig rten gsum du kun nas khyab// 'jig rten pa yo lha rnams gnas// skyong ba yang ni thams cad kyis// yul la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gnas// de la rlung gi yang dag sbyor/ 
153b4(rgyud): rdo rje pad+mo zhes ni brjod// rdo rje snying rjes shes par bya// pa d+ma yang ni stong pa nyid // de dag sbyor ba'i mchog tu shes// rdo/ rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje nyi ma zhes ni gsungs// 'od zer tshog
153b5(rgyud): kyi bdag nyid can// de rnams kyi ni 'byed pa gang // de ni pad+ma zhes su brjod// de yi rnal 'byor mchog tu shes// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// byang chub sems kyang rdo rjer 'gyur// bde chen 'khor lo pad+ma
153b6(rgyud): de la'ang de yi sbyor ba gang / sbyor ba mchog de rmang du byung // bla ma'i gsung ni rdo rje ste// slob ma bzang gis thos pa'i snod // pad+ma do y-i gnas de la// de yi sbyor ba 'ang mchog tu gsal// zhi gnas
153b7(rgyud): pad+ma zhes gsungs la// de lo lhag mthong rdo rje'o// de gnyis gcig gyur rnal 'byor ni// sgom pa yis ni de nyid mthong // rnal 'byor ma zhal pud+mar gnas// rdo rje bde chen bla na med// pad+ma slob ma bzang gi
153b8(rgyud): khi man ngag gi ni don gyi snod// de nyis rnal 'byor kun bdag nyid// yang dag de nyid don mthong byed// blo ldan nam rtog bral ba yi// rdo rje ling gzhes ni bshad// rnam rtog bral ba'i blo ldan gyis// b+ha ga pad+ma
154a1(rgyud): zhes ni brjod// dam tshig gis brlan rnal 'byor ma// de nyis dngos gcig yang dag sbyor// gnyis med ye shes mthong bar byed// stong phrag gnyis dang bdun khri yi// rtsa rnams rdo rje
154a2(rgyud): zhes ni brjod// byang chub sems ni 'bab pa'i rtsa// pad+ma zhes ni yongasu grags// de ni kun tu sbyor ba des// dgo' bskyed par byed pa yi// rdo rje yi yang nyams dga'i stan// rang gi rdo rje 'chang pad+ma// de la de gnyis
154a3(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas ye shes go 'phang gsal// dbang bskur mchog ni rdo rje ste// pad+ma slob ma snod bzang po// de gnyis mchog tu yang dag sbyor// yang dag de gnyis kyi ni rgyu// e ni pad+ma zhesu brjod/ 
154a4(rgyud): yi ge ba ni rdo rje nying // thig le de nyid mi shigs pa// de gnyis sbyor ba'i ngo mtshar ni// de ltar sbyor ba mchog tu shes// rdo rje pang snod sdom pa ni// rnal 'byor ma yi man ngag dang // bla ma'i drin gyis
154a5(rgyud): yongasu shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon/ par rtogs pa las// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba bsha dpa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / sngags
154a6(rgyud): kyi donyid ye shes mchog bshad kyis rdo rje can ni nyon// sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pa yis// gang gi dngos grub myur 'grub 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// sngags ni gzungs bzhin bzlas sdod
154a7(rgyud): bya// de yis myur du dngos grub 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid pa mthar phyin// rdo rje'i phyag rgya go 'phang zhi// phyag rgya chen po'i sdom pa'i don// mchog gi de nyid ye shes che// sngags kyi nga nyid bstan pa yin/ 
154a8(rgyud): dmigs med pa'i go 'bang gsal// rdo rje sems dpa' nges pa'i rgyu// sngags ni yon tan kun gyis gsal// lus ngag yid kyi sdom pa'o// de ni de skyes ye shes mchog de nid kun gyi don ba
154b1(rgyud): pa snying kha'i pad+mar mchog tu gsal// de nyid ye shes bla na med// zla drug bzlas pas 'grub par ni// 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no// rnal 'byor mchog gi thabs dang ni// rnal 'byor pas ni yongasu grags// 
154b2(rgyud): dmigs med nas ni gang gsungs pa// de ni don dam par ni brjod// sbrel sogs pa yi dbye ba yis// sngags ni bzlos pa gnyi su med// 'on kyang mi byed de nyid gsum// sngags kyi don bsdus pa'o// bzlas
154b3(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub mtshungs pa med// yang dag mnyam par gzhag bzlas na// dngos grub mtshungs pa med par 'gro// rnam dag go 'phang bzang po gsal// gang shas de ni 'gro ba'i bla// sngags don sngags de nyid
154b4(rgyud): dang ni/ sngags kyi mnangag kha brgyud pa// sngags kyi man ngag mi gsal pa// gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i tha// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' ni kun ma khyen 'gro ba'i bram la// rdo rje sems dpas yang
154b5(rgyud): nas yang // phyag byas nas ni yongasu zhus// sngags kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyi ming dang don// rang bzhin ci zhig rab gsal ba// sngags kyi de nyid man ngag ni// sngags kyi sdom ngon
154b6(rgyud): ji lta bu// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// rnal 'byor gsum gyi 'bras bdag nyid // sngags kyi don dang ming mchog dang // gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid can// de kho na nying bshad kyis nyon// 
154b7(rgyud): don bsdus pa// thog ma med cing zhi ba dang // dngos dang ngos med bdag nyid gtso// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ sngags don rig pa'i zhing mtshan nyid ni// nyon mongs med cing mi gsal ba// rang bzhin med pa'i
154b8(rgyud): mchog gi mchog/ ming med rang bzhin med pa dang // rnam pa med pa'i chen po'i mchog/ gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// bde ba yang dag 'brel bar byed/ skal bzang bde ba 'phel bar byed/ zang
155a1(rgyud): shes shing cha dang bral// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor skyes// de nyid de ni don dam yang // de shid de bzhin nyid gzhan min// de nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i dngos// ye shesas lnga yi rang bzhin
155a2(rgyud): nyi // khyab pa kun 'gro stong pa nyid// nyon mongs thams cad rab tu 'joms// dri med dri bral dga' ba dang // rang rig pa yi go 'phang mchog dang po'i lha ste nyams dga' ba zang / cha yis tshogs rnams rgyas par
155a3(rgyud): byed man ngag gnas kyi byed brag gis// 'khor lo'i dbye bas bcu bar bya// Na dang mgrin pa snying kha nan/ rtsol ba ji bzhin brjod pa yi// de bzhin du ni las bya ba/ zhi ba la sogs go rims bzhin/ ji bzhin ngos
155a4(rgyud): grub ye shes dang // ji bzhin nyam su myong mtshan nyid// rang // bzhin rdzogs pa ji lta bu/ rgyun gyi dbye ba ji lta bu// rig pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin// 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin gnas// yang dag bas
155a5(rgyud): gtan phyag rgya'i rim// gzugs rdzogs pa la sogs pa yi// bla ma brgyud pas yang dag gnas// rab tu 'bad pas bslab par bya// gser dang do shal gos dang ni// rin chen sna tshogs yon tan mchog
155a6(rgyud): bran dang las byed grangs med dang // dad cing gus pa la sogs kyis// ji ltar bzhed pa ston pa la// rnyed par dka'i ba'i dngos rnams kyis// sngags kyi don ston bla ma ni// dgongs pa yongasu rdzogs par bya// 
155a7(rgyud): phyag byas de rjes sngags pa yis// yang dag gzungs nas 'bras bu'i don// mi yi rus pa'i smyug gu dang // sna bzhi rin chen rab 'bar ba// yang na dur khrod thal ba ni// rab brdal dngos grub ster
155a8(rgyud): byed log mar dbang bskur blangs byas nas// mdun du dkyil 'khor la sogs bya// bges mtha ra byid la gtor ma ni// chen po gtsug lag khang du sbri/ sku gsung thugs ni sgrub byed pa'i// 
155b1(rgyud): mtshungs pa med pa'i sngags btu bya/ dang po'i yi gzog mar gri/ dbyungs yig lnga pa yang dag ldan/ sde can pa mi'i mnga'am ldan/ sku yi sa bon du ni brjod/ 'og ma'i yi ge nyis 'gyur la/ ung+kA
155b2(rgyud): yi chu dang ldan// mtshungs pa med pa'i sngags btu bya// gsung gi rdo rje snying po mchog/ uSh+ma Sha yi cha dang bcas// dbyangs yig drug par yang dag ldan// sde tshan mtha' yi mtha' char bcas// thugs kyi
155b3(rgyud): rdo rje go 'phang gsal// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gsum/ 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub par byed// rnal 'byor pa yi de nyid mchog/ sngags btu ba ni bla na med// de nyid dngos grub thams cad
155b4(rgyud): byed// sngags rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa// sngags kyi theg pa kun yin no// rgyu dang mi rgyus nyid la// dngos grub rnams kyi rnal 'byor mchog/ rnal 'byor ye shes bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa'i
155b5(rgyud): snying po ni// ye shes bla na med pa'i mchog/ man ngag ji bzhin sngags zlos pa/ dngos grub phyir ni lung bzhin gyis// de yi dngos grub rgya chen 'gro// tshe 'di nyid la sngags shes
155b6(rgyud): bas// ye shes chen po zhes bshang ba'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor che// rab gsal sngags ni mtshungs pa med// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod byung // gang zhig sngags mgul pa ru// rtag
155b7(rgyud): 'chang de kho na zhing shes// rtog pa kun yang 'grub par byed// dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang // dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang // blo bzang 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub/ rnal 'byor chen
155b8(rgyud): rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las sngags kyi de kho na nyid gsungs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// grangs kyi rim pa bla na med/ 
156a1(rgyud): ji lta gnas pa'i drung rnams kyi/ rin 'ji lta ba bzhin du/ gang gis thob bskal pa brdang // srod ni thams cad bdag zhid gnas// gang gis yang dag yong shes/ nal 'byor mchog
156a2(rgyud): ni thob par byed/ rlung gi mtshan nyid mi shes pa// 'jig rten gsum du rnam par 'khor// goms 'jos de ni// bla ma rnal 'byor de shes brgyud// rlung gi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// lo tshigs kyi ni mtshan nyid
156a3(rgyud): ni/ mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ sprin gyi dpal las gsal ba gang // mdor bsdus nas ni dus ni drug lo tshigs ni yongasu grags// sbyor ba gnyis ni dus yin te// dus de nyis zhag drug cu'o
156a4(rgyud): byin dang mtshan du nges pa la/ zhin zhag gcig ces yongasu grags/ zhin mtshan chu tshong drug cu ste// de bzhin dbyug gra tsa sha'o// byung dang rngub pa'i dus drug la/ c-ing gi zhes ni
156a5(rgyud): yongasu grags// skad cig ma drug la ni dbugs/ de nyid se gol gtogs ba'i chad// thang cig gsum la skad cig go// de la yung sa kar bskor ba tsam// dbugs gsum la ni thang cigo/ 
156a6(rgyud): de la yungs kar bskor ba tsam// dbugs gsum lan thang cag// thang cig da ni yud tsa mo// thang cig gsum la mig btsums te// de yang mig ni 'dzums pa yi// tsam gsum la ni mig
156a7(rgyud): btsums te// tsam ni thal mo brdabs pa'o// bde ba 'char ba de gsum me de ni thig le 'pho ba'o// sngags pa gsum la bde bar gnas// da ni rab 'gyed 'jigs pa brjo// dus gsum la ni 'jigs par
156a8(rgyud): bshad/ dus ni phra ba skad cig bdag/ 'das pa dang ni da ltar dang // ma 'ongs pa mtshan nyid do// 'das pa'i skad cig gsum du gsungs// da ltar yang ni skad cig gsum// ma 'ongs skad cig gsum du
156b1(rgyud): bshad/ de las slar yang skad cig gsum// da ltar skad cig gsum gyi cha// de las cha gsum de las cha// de srid grangs ni ji srid du// rtog pa rtog pa gnyisu med// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par 'gyur// 
156b2(rgyud): srog gi gnas ni bla na med// phyogs dang dus kyi rtog pa bral// rigs pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa dang // de yi srog ni shar nas thim// gnyis med de ni bsdus pa'o// gzhan yang bshad par bya yis nyon// srog
156b3(rgyud): ni thim dang 'char ba yi// gang tshe skad cig la sogs rtogs// kun nas rab tu ma zhi ba// de srid srog ni rlung gi gnas// grol ba'i gnas ni mi sheso// bshing sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas// ming ni ma skyes cha chen
156b4(rgyud): po/ de yang rnam shes dang bral ba/ ye shes lus ni bdag med pa// de de ni skye ba mchog gi mchog/ srog chags rnams kyi mchog tu/ brjod// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo sten// thog mar 'byung ba
156b5(rgyud): bzhi po la// sgro 'dogs skyed pa'i ngo bor byed// de tshe rang gi gnasu thi ma/ nam shes las ni skye ba rlung / de las me ni skye bar 'gyur/ me le sa chu ni 'byung bar byed// de las sa ni yang dag skye// de dag
156b6(rgyud): rnams las phung por 'byung // de phyir skye mched rnams dang ni// de las rnams shes rang bzhin med// brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim// ji ltar skye bo de yi gnas/ thim nas 'gro ba'i rang bzhin du
156b7(rgyud): rgyags pa bskyed pa chung chen po// nyon mongs yini 'das nas ni// sngags thob nas ni nas rgyas te// skye mched rnams ni sdud par byed// de las rgyags pas chu yi rlung // rgyags pa bskyed pa zab
156b8(rgyud): phyir phung po rnams kyang sdung byed zhing // rim gyis lus chen sgra sgrogs byed// de las rgyags pa'o cha ni 'byung // rgyags pa'i chu ni sdud par byed// 'byung ba rnams kyis bsdus nas song // gongams
157a1(rgyud): // ji lha ba bzhin du// de la rlung ni btang bzung 'thung // rgyags pa'i chani za bar byed// de nas kyang ni rlung ni rdung // khyab cing phra ba sgrib par byed// de las mi bzang btang bzung dang // rnam shes
157a2(rgyud): skad cig sgrib par byed// bsgribs nas de las rnam shes kyang // bems por song nas brgyal bar 'gyur// skye mched che ni sgrib par byed// dag de'i ye shes mchog gi mchog/ de las thim par gyur pa'i
157a3(rgyud): srog/ rnam shes dang ni mtshangs par ldan// de nyid mchog ni de ltar bshad// srog ni thim zhing 'char ba dang // ji lta ba bzhin yingasu shes/ bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa 'byung // rigs pa gzhan yang bshad par bya// 
157a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i sku ni sgrub pa'i phyir// 'chi ba med pa'i sgrub pa ni// gang gis 'chi med lus mchog ni/ thob pa yon tan rnams kyi rten/ gang phyir se mas can tshe thung bas// 'chi meng go 'phang sgrub mi nus// de phyir
157a5(rgyud): 'bad pa thams cad kyis// 'chi ba med par rab bsgrub bya// bcom ldan mgon po ye shes mchog/ rnal 'byor de nyid pha rol byon// rdo rje sems dpas phyag byas zhus// 'chi ba med nyid rigs par
157a6(rgyud): ni/ ji ltar yang dag thim pa lags// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// bya ba kun sgrub go 'phang ni// 'chi ba med pa'i rnal 'byor che// yang dag de nyid rnamangs pa// sems can tshe ni thung ba yis// dngos grub 'grub pa
157a7(rgyud): gang yang med// de bas rnal 'byor bzang po rnams// tshe ring ba ni dge pa'o// de la thog mar rnal 'byor mchog/ blo bzang nang gi bdag nyid sgrub// lce ni rkan gyi dbus sbar ba/ byas nas de kho nyid tshim bzla// sems dpa'
157a8(rgyud): skyil krung bcas nas ni// yang dag rnal 'byor rjes dran bya// sna rtser dbugs ni rgyu bya zhing // kha ni gsal bar dgag par bya// skad kyi gnas son zla ba ni// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni zhu// zhu ba rlung gi
157b1(rgyud): nal 'byor gyis// rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos btung / mtshan byed kyini dus tshod mthar/ ji srid phun gcig ma chad par/ de srid rnal 'byor pas sngags bcu/ rdo rje'i lus ni byed par 'gyur/ sde ma tshan gnyis
157b2(rgyud): pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs bcas bcas pa dang yang dag ldan// yan lag ma nyams rtag tu bzla/ sgrub pa po yi srog ni 'gugs// rdzas kyang rtag tu brten par bya// de nyid lnga yi rims pas skye// bzlas pa
157b3(rgyud): rdzogs nas rtag tu ni// lus la 'byung ba'i dri ma med// lcags lnga'i rang bzhin snod du ni/ bzhag nas ji srid nyi ma ni// 'char kar de nas de la yang // yo ShI rak+to bde ba ni// blugs nas rtag tu rdzas kyi mtsho
157b4(rgyud): bdud rtsi bdun pa'i ming can ne// nyal kar yang ni de 'thungs na/ rdzas kyis cha ni 'phel bar byed// sngags kyi rgyal po oM AHhUM/ de nas lan bdun bzla bar bya// lag g.yas ba dan gyis
157b5(rgyud): mtshan la// sna bzang de la bkab nas su// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyi ni// lan gsum du ni dag par bya// de phyir bud med gzhon nu na/ rtag tu 'khur ba bkang zhing btung // de ni bza' ba sbyin pa
157b6(rgyud): yang / mar la bsdigs pa'i 'bras dang ni// ma sha dang ni nyi dga' dang // ra yi 'o ma kha ra kar// til rnams cha mnyam byas nas ni// myos pa yis ni sbyin bsreg bya// nyal kar de la bza' ba sbyin// bla na med pa'i
157b7(rgyud): bza' ba po// de ltar rigs pas chog shes nas// su la'ang smra bar mi bya'o// thams cad sngon bzhin zhi ba ni// myur du dngos grub ster bar byed zla ba drus tu'ang gang bsten pa// de ni rdo rje'i lus su 'gyur/ 
157b8(rgyud): bcud kyis len dang gser 'gyur sogs// tshe dgu pa ni bla na med// rab tu 'bad pas bsten par bya// phyag rgya che ngon sgrub pa pos// rgas pa med cing srin nad med// snyoms las med cing lkugs pa mang // gla
158a1(rgyud): skams rlung mkhris nad sogs med/ nang dang 'bras dang 'brum bu dang // zhu ba g.yan pa 'brum phran med// mdzen mtshan par rdol ba med// dud dang pang dkar dpal lus ldan// 'dzam bu cu
158a2(rgyud): bo gser ltar 'bar// rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog/ de ni rtag tu 'gugs par byed// de yi mdza' chen lnga rnams te// rnal 'byor ma rnams sems par byed// lus kyi rang bzhin rtag tu ni// phyag bya ba dang / 
158a3(rgyud): mchod par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi grangs kyi rim pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rtsa rnam
158a4(rgyud): nigrangs dang gnas ni bsdus pa zhon// 'khor lo'i gra ngas kyi dbye ba yis// ji bzhin mad du byung ba'i mchog/ 'tsha ra lo drug la rten bcu drug/ lus la lnga yi gzhal yas khang // 
158a5(rgyud): 'byor dri bzhin gnas ji bzhin// mdor bsdus nas ni ba shang bar bya// rlung gi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa// 'dab drug rlung ni mkha' la spyod// 'dab gsum me yi 'khor lor bshad// 
158a6(rgyud): gsum gnas ni rim gyis 'char// de bzhin longs spyod 'khor lo yang // rtsa ni bcu drug yang dag brjod// chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa// brgyad ni kun la khyab pa'o// de bzhin sprul pa'i 'khor
158a7(rgyud): lo yang // drug rtsa bzhir 'char bar bshad// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo cher// rtsa no sum cu gnyisu bshad// de ltar mdor bsdus rim pa yang // brgya dang sum cu gcig lhag par// rtsa rnamasu
158a8(rgyud): ni yang dag ba shang // gzhan dag tu ni rgyas par yang // tsa ni bdun khri nyis stong du// gnas kyi dbye bas phye ba ni// nges par brjod pa 'bum sder gsungs// rgyud ni chung ngu'ang 'di nyid du// snying po las/ 
158b1(rgyud): ni snying por gsungs// smin ma'i dbus nas rlung 'khor lo// bye ba 'khyil pa mi bzang ba/ mi bzang brtan dang mtshan nyid can// rtsa zung drug gi mtshan nyid do// 'dzin pa rtog med gang pa ni// rtsa gsum gru gsum
158b2(rgyud): me dkyil 'khor// mgrin pa'i 'og tu bshad pa yin// dri ma dang bral gsal ba dang // drag po dang ni gsum yin no// yang dag zhugs dang shin tu zhugs// shin tu bzang dang yang po 'gro// stobs chen dang
158b3(rgyud): ni mi bzang che// mdzes chen mdun du skyes pa che// rgyags pa'i rtags dang rgyags pa'i cha// rgyags pa'i chu dang rgyags spro byed / rgyags dang rgyags pa'i rgyu 'thun dang // rgyags pa'i rlan dang rgyags
158b4(rgyud): chang rtsub dang mkha' dang 'byung bachang dang // dbugs/ mi bde dang g.ya' 'gro// 'dab chags yan lag khra yi grong nga // za bod mi zang sgra sgrogs dang // dri ldan rdeg dang rdul ba dang // 
158b5(rgyud): dbyangs dang dbyangs skyes dang ni sprin// chub mthong dang / rgyun ltar sngo// yud tsam gtso bo yung mi skyes/ rgyab tu kha bltas dbyug pa dang // dbyug snyoms dang ni steng pa dang // tshigs
158b6(rgyud): kyi lho dang tshigs kyi tshigo// tshigs kyi tshad dang brtul ba dang // tshigs kyi de nas dang tshigs kyi gdong // tshigs 'od tshigs kyi lu gu rgyud// dul byang dud 'gro gzi brjid dang // dri mad dul ba'i snams pa
158b7(rgyud): dang / chu 'phyang lto dang chu 'phyang chags// chun 'phyang chun 'phyang phyed sbrang bu// phru gu phru gu ster dri ba// lo ma lo ma'i mgrin pa dang // rab mchog me dang rab gsal te// de ltar drug cu bzhir bshad// 
158b8(rgyud): lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas// bdud rtsi mchog gis yongasu gang / 'on chen cheni bai pad+me dang // rdo rje chen po stobs po che// mgo bo che dang sgra che dang // zhes dga' chen po myos pa che// 'ong brgyad chos kyi/ 
159a1(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dbus// snying kha'i pad+mar yang dag gnas// longs spyod longs spyod ster ldan dang //  'gro gsal dang skal ba dang // sgom pa dang ni thal ba'i gdong // bzang ster bzang dang bkres pa
159a2(rgyud): dang bcud len ro ni sbyar ba dang // ro 'jigs pa dang ro dang ni// khrung khrung longs spyod 'khor lor gnas// grangs ni bcu drug tu ni brjod// de snang rim rigs 'dod pa can// 'dod can ma dang srog gi lus// 
159a3(rgyud): zla 'thung zla ster mdzod dang ni// 'dod chags min sma ku sha dang // shi bi sngo dang dag pa dang // mi dang mi re ne tso dang // gang la gnyis ro ldan pa dang // kis ring chang steng bdud rtsi dang // dung can dang ni dung rna dang // dug gi
159a4(rgyud): mig dang dug gi sna// rgyags dbang rgyags pa brkam pa dang // rgyags pas brgyal dang ngo mtshar rgyags// snyems pa dang ni tshogs kyi rten// sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes ni brjod// bde ba chen po'i 'khor
159a5(rgyud): lo che mchog tu dga' ba ster bar byed// phra dang reg bya// mchog tu phra// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// rang ni// dbade chen rang bzhin dang // gzhan dag la yang ster bar byed// de ltar yA
159a6(rgyud): ngag rtsa yi rim// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// rtsa yi rim med nges par ni// phung po la sogs mi 'byung // phung po med na ye shes che// rnal 'byor pa yi mi thob mi 'gyur// phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus// 
159a7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro lngar ni rab tu grags// de nyid 'byung ba lnga yis ni// ye shes lngar ni rnam par gnas// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rtsa yi 'khor lo shes par bya// ji ltar chu yi dbus kyi shing // myur du yang
159a8(rgyud): ni 'phel bar 'gro// de las 'bras bu sogs ldan pa// ster ba 'di la the tshom med// de bzhin phung po shing zhes bya// rtsa yi chu yis 'brel nas ni// 'phel bas yang dag 'bras bu ni// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
159b1(rgyud): ster byed// lha yi rnam pa'i ngo bo yis// rtsa rnams rang bzhin bsgom par bya// gnyis phrad pa las reg bya gnyis// gal te rdo rje lhag gyur na// de tshe me ni yang dag 'bar// de rjes me yi 'khor lo'i dbus// 
159b2(rgyud): 'khor lo'i ming can pad+ma rnams// rim gyis rim gyis bya bar 'gyur// 'di ni rtsa las 'bab de las// byang chub sems ni bde ba che// sprul pa'i snying po yang dag thob// ngo bo gcig gyur bsdus nas ni// 'bab
159b3(rgyud): pa nyi ma zla ba'o// mi dbang dkyil 'khor dbus su yang // gang phyir srad bu'i rnam par gnas// rgyu gcig tu yang shes nas ni/ de nyid 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis// g.yas pa nyi ma'i rnam pa dang // g.yon pa zlang
159b4(rgyud): rnam par 'byung // gang che g.yas pa'i nyi ma nyi// de tshe khra/ ga 'gyur bde ba'o// gang tshe g.yon pa'i zla ba gsal// bde ba kun kyang de lta ba'o// de gnyis khongasu chud pa'o me// yan lag bdun
159b5(rgyud): zhing yang dag gnas// sngon la rlung gi rnam shes ni// brgya lam gang tshe 'khrul gyur na// pa yi mkha' la mtshungs par gnas// de cha chags pa'i dbang du 'gyur// gsang gnas zla mtshan ldan pa'i rtsa// 
159b6(rgyud): dang nyi ma 'char ba ni// de tshe lhag par chags pas nan// chags pa mchog tu 'dod par 'gyur// rdo rje pad+ma 'dres pa'i gdong // 'jug pa pha yi kha yi rlung // de che sa bon du ni 'gyur// sa bon las ni sems can
159b7(rgyud): 'byung // de phyir rtsa las yang dag 'char// 'bras bu ngo mtshar can ni skye// de nyid byang chub sems kyang ni// 'dzin pa srog ni bsdus pa'o// ye shes mchog dang de nyid mchog/ mchog tu bde ba rmang byung
159b8(rgyud): che// ye shes rnal 'byor thob pa yi// mchog tu bde ba bla na med// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rtsa'i 'khor lo'i gnas kyi rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun
160a1(rgyud): pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor lus la rim ji bzhin rtsa rnams rtag tu yang dag ni// brgyud pa yi ni rigs kyis skye// gsal ba ru ni ma gsungs pa/ dang
160a2(rgyud): pa'i bsam pa rnam spangs pa/ skye bo skal ba med don du// gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs pa// sdigs ma lnga zhes bya ba'i dus// sems can myur du dngos grub don// snod du bya bar 'dod pa yis// rang
160a3(rgyud): byung ye shes mang byung ba// rnal 'byor lus kyi bde chen po'o// 'khor lo'i ni sum cu gnyis// byang chub sems ni gsal 'bab pa'i// rtsa rnams yang dag nas bshad bya// da ni bde ba chen po'i gnas// de ni ma
160a4(rgyud): nyid bshad par bya// ka tse Ta ta pa'i sde tshan// ya ra la wa ba sha sa// de dag rim par shes par bya// slar yang de dag bsdus nas ni// sde tshan tsam ni gcig tu 'gra/ de yang zhi ba'i ye shes
160a5(rgyud): mchog byang chub sems la thim nas 'gro// kun rtog thams spangs nas ni// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ shes dang shes bya rnam par spungs// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ 
160a6(rgyud): de las 'khor lo gsum dbye bas// rtsa ni brgyad kyi dbye ba las// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyis ni// gsum phyed bdun cu rtsa gnyis gsal// de ni stong du rab phye ba// so ser 'phros pa'i bdag nyid
160a7(rgyud): can/ stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis// rtsa rnams kyi ni grangs zhes bya// rlung dang mkhris pa bad ka ni na// khams gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir ni// 'khor lo 'khor lo'i dbye/ 
160a8(rgyud): yis// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ni// nges pa'i man ngag rjes 'brang nas// phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor de nyid mchog/ lha yi rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rtsa ni so sor de bye ba yis// bla ma'i zhal las shes par// 
160b1(rgyud): bya dngade las yang ni sdom sbyor bar// song nas phan tshun nas rten pa// slar yang bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gro// bde chen 'khor lo rtsa yi gnas// rtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// de yang 'khor lo sdom par 'gyu
160b2(rgyud): 'khor lo re re'i gtso bo'i rtsa// brgyad brgyad du ni 'gyur bar gsal// rnal 'byor lus kyi rtsa mchog ces// rmad byung sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// yi ge sum cu gnyis dbye bas// rtag tu rnal 'byor/ 
160b3(rgyud): gtso bos thob// phung po khams dang don yul nyid// dbang po'i sgo ni srung ba'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis dbye bdag nyid// gsal ba yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ lus kyi gzhal yas khang du yang/ 
160b4(rgyud): de nyid kyi ni nang bzhugs pa// de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo dang // gzugs la sogs dang rgyal sras rnams// khro bo bcu zhes bya ba yi// de nyid mchog ni yang dag
160b5(rgyud): bzhugs// sngar yang khro bo rgyal sras la// nang du ming snang ni 'gro// rgyal sras rnams ni gzugs la sogs// lha mo rnams la bsdus nas ni// de rnams kyang ni sa sogs 'gro// de dag
160b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs lnga la// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la// de dag la yang bsdus nas 'gro// de kho na nyid bde gcig pu// de la yang ni thim nas 'gro// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams las grol
160b7(rgyud): bde ba kun rten pa yi mchog/ de yang nyams myong tsam las slar// de ni yi ga tsam la thim// yi ge tsam ni thig ler thim// thig le yang ni sgra la thim// sgra tsam 'od gsal ba la'o// 
160b8(rgyud): 'od gsal go 'ayang yang dag par// spro dang bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid do// rnam par shes dang chos dbyings dang // don dam pa dang bde ba che// gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba// byang chub
161a1(rgyud): sems ni dri ma med// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing che/ gnyis med ye shes rmad du zung // dbang bskur bzhi pa bde bdang // bzhi pa'i dpa' bgo 'phang mchog/ de la sogs ming byed
161a2(rgyud): brag gis// go 'bang mchog ni gsungs pa yin// spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye ba yis// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du / de ltar bskyed de rdzogs pa yi// rim ngon tha ma brgyud las shes// zhi ba gnyis med mtshan nyid
161a3(rgyud): can rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi rtsa bsdus pa'i lo ru ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba// sna tshogs la
161a4(rgyud): sogs skad cig bdag/ yang dag gzhung lugs mtshan nyid ni// de nyid ji lta ba bzhin nyon// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin// rnam par 'joms dang mtshan nyid bral// skad cig ma ni bzhi
161a5(rgyud): zhes gsungs// rnam par phye nas slar bshang bya// rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'dod// de yi skad cig dbye bar bya/ a lig ga dang / tsum+ba na dang // tsum shan dang // ku tsu gra ha dang / 
161a6(rgyud): bu la tra tra ha na dang / da shAn dang // nga kha dan dang // ngo la dang // pu tsi tsi dang // kur ba la sogs pa'i ka ra na dang // rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig go// na li stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// lus ni bde ba rgyas pa na/ 
161a7(rgyud): mgrin pa dag tu gang phyin pa// rnam smin zhes bya skad cig go// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni// rdo rje phreng ba'i mtshan nyid can// thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'o// rnam pa med pa'i skad cig go/ na la
161a8(rgyud): las byung shu kra 'das/ rnam pa dang bral skad cigo// ye shes bzhi dang stong pa bzhi// skad cig ma ni bzhi las rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las// 
161b1(rgyud): skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bshad ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba// dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yi// dga'
161b2(rgyud): ba'i bde ba dang po ste// mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa dang // dga' bral zhes pa gsum pa dang // bzhi pa lhan cig skyesau par bshad// sprul pa'i 'khor lor dga' ba dang // mchog dga' chos kyi 'khor lo/ 
161b3(rgyud): gnas// longs spyod bral ba'i dga' ba dang // lhan cig skyes dang bde ba che// lugs bzlog rim pa nas ni gsungs// de rjes lugs 'byung ba shad bya ste// bde chen 'khor lo spyi bo la// de ni dga' bar bshad
161b4(rgyud): pa yin// longs spyod 'khor lor mchog dga' dang // dga' bral chos kyi 'khor lor gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor lor lhan cig skyes// dga' ba nyamasu myong bar byed// blta dang dgug
161b5(rgyud): dang de bzhin brda'o// kha la tsum pa byed pa yi// dga' ba rnam su myong bar shwe/ rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid do// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mchog tu// de bzhin sgra la 'dzin pa dang // rdo rje pad+mar bzhag nas
161b6(rgyud): ni/ nyams myongs sa ni skad cig mchog/ rnam smin zhes bya skad cig nyid// de nyid rgyar ni rnam par shes// rtsa yi dbus na rab gsal gnas// gtum mo yang ni rnam rtog 'joms// bde ba chen pa'i 'khor
161b7(rgyud): lo che// mchog gi chan zhu bar byed// bral dga'i gnasu myong ba na// rnam rtog skad cig mtshan nyid ngo // de la ro gcig rang bzhin ni// rtsa ni gcig gi rgyun la rten// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ni/ lhan cig skyes
161b8(rgyud): ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig gsungs// stong zhing kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo de las stang // rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub bya ba// ma su myong ba mchog dga' ste/ 
162a1(rgyud): rnam smin skad cig mtshan nying ngo // longs spyod 'khor lo de las ni// steng du byed pa'i skad cig la// nyams myong bral ba'i dga' ba ni/ rnam 'joms mtshan nyid skad cigo// bde ba chen po
162a2(rgyud): 'khor lo che/ de thong mtshan nyid skad cig ma// ldan cig skyes dga'i nyams myong ba// mtshan nying dang bral skad cig go// rtsa gsum kun gyi na mkha' che// rnal 'byor mtshogs yang dag gzung // de las rab sang nyams
162a3(rgyud): myong ba// mtshan nyid dang bral skad cig go// rtsa gsum kun gyi na mkha' che// rnal 'byor ma tshogs yang ga gzugs// de las rab sad nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid gcig par ro mtshungs pa// rnal 'byor chen po
162a4(rgyud): nyam su myong // slar yang mtshan nyid med par 'gro// rab tu sad pa nyam su myong // stong phrag bcu drug bdag nyid do// bde chen go 'phang mi byed pa// gnyis med rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas// de ltar 'di
162a5(rgyud): ni dga' dbye ba/ gzhan du gsal bar ma gsung so// rnal 'byor ma na/ bka' drin gyis// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor che/ na po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las dag
162a6(rgyud): ba'i mtshan nying rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// thig le gsum ni bla na med// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub 'gyur// rtsa rnam/ 
162a7(rgyud): kun tu 'bab pa dang // byang chub sems ni Ta byas pa// rdo rje 'am ni pad+ma'i rtse// rlung ni bzung ba'i skad cig la// rkan dgugs pa yi sbyor ba dang // g+ha~M gyi sngags kyi sbyor yis// rnal 'byor mtshig ni thob par byed/ 
162a8(rgyud): bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo de nyid mchog/ snying kha'i pad+ma'i lta ba la// dbus su hUM ni bkod nas ni// thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni// dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// de kho na/ 
162b1(rgyud): nying lus skyob pa/ phyogs yul dus dang rnam par bral/ steng dang 'og ni rnam par spangs// sems bral rang gi ngo bor gnas// ngag gi dra ba yongasu spangs// rgyud dang mtshan ma dang bral zhing // rtog pa'i spyod yul
162b2(rgyud): rnams dang bral// gnyis pa kun las rnam par grol// mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba'o// rlung gi thig le rnal 'byor mchog/ kha dog lnga pa gsal ba che// sna rtser sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// kun nas kyang ni bsgom par
162b3(rgyud): byang+ga yi ge oM ni sngags kyi mchog/ rnal 'byor pa yis bzla bar bya// snga ma bzhin du ye shes lnga// zhi ba la sogs de bzhin sgrub/ bag chags rim pa'i mtshon nyid ni// sku gsung thug kyi dbye ba yis// rtsa ni
162b4(rgyud): gsum po 'di ni mchog/ bsdus nas slar yang dbye ba ni// phan tshun du ni so sor 'gro// rdzas kyi thig le khong chud pa// thig le gnyis te sngags dang rlung // sngags kyi thig le de nyid mchog/ 
162b5(rgyud): thi pa gnyis ni 'ang dang rdzas// slar yang rlung gi thig le yang // thin/ la gnyis kyi nang du 'gro/ sngags dang rdzas kyi bdag nyid can/ rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag shes// zla ba'i ma me yi tsa/ 
162b6(rgyud): gsum zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid do// la la nA dang ra sa nA// a ba d+ha ti zhes bya'i ming // sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang // de nyid du ni yongasu grags// steng dang 'og du khyab pa nyid // so sor lu gu brgyud tshul du/ 
162b7(rgyud): rtsa rnams kun la khyab nas ni// yang dag man ngag rim pas gnas/ de ltar rnal 'byor mchog tu phra// shes dang shre bya rnam par spangs// dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gzhi// rnal 'byor chen po'i rmad byung che/ 
162b8(rgyud): gso sbyong gis mi min bzlas pas min// phreng bas ma yin 'gog pas min// grangs min dus min sbyin sreg min// 'byin byed 'gog byed kyis ni min// ye shes chen po'i go 'phang ni// rnal 'byor gcig
163a1(rgyud): bus rtogs par byed// mngon par shes dang lnga dang ni// de bzhin ye shes lnga yi mchog/ thig le gsum ni rnam sgom pa// ni sogs bya ba yang dag ni// rnal 'byor mchog gis 'gru
163a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// stong nyid ya shes mtshan nyid ni// ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems// dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya gsungs// gnas kyi grangs kyi dpe ba yis// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen
163a3(rgyud): bo'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las// thig le gsum rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang mchog/ sku gsung
163a4(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje yi// snying po bdag nyid dam tshig ni// yi ge gsum ni sku gsung thugs// snying po yang ni bshang par bya// de ni rnam phyed/ khyod nyon cig/ de ni ji lta ba bzhin bshad// oM ni sku
163a5(rgyud): yi rdo rje yi// snying po ru ni yang dag bshang // yi ge a dang yi ge u yi ge ma zhes bya ba pa gsum/ AHni chos 'khor pad+ma la// rlung gi 'khor lo la mi byab// sgrib med sgrib pa'i rlung chen
163a6(rgyud): bo srog tu gsungs pa thams cad bsdus// cha med cha dang bral ba dang // dngos po dngos med dbun gnas// thig le 'khor lo'i cha li khyab/ na mkha'i khams kyi yi ge mchog/ sngags rnams kun gyi
163a7(rgyud): don gyi gnas// sngags rnams thams cad rab sad byed// sngags rnams kun gyi phan byed cing // ngag gi 'khor lo rabasang byed// dngos su lan gsum gyi ni gzhi// 'byung ba thams cad dbang du byed// 
163a8(rgyud): zang med 'phel ba med pa'i gnas// byang chub sa bon bde ba che// gzugs med kham su yang dag bshad// 'khor lo bzhi yi don bsdus pa'i// u ni longs spyod 'khor lor gnas// me dang ny-im
163b1(rgyud): 'dra ba yi// mgrin pa'i mtha' nas spyi gtsug mtha'// khyab pa gzi brjid kyi ni lus// gzugs kyi khams shes bya bar shes// gnas ris bcu bdun bdag nyid can// bde chen 'khor lo zhes
163b2(rgyud): byar bshang // yi ge ma ni thig le tsam// gdong tshad mtha' yis sor bzhi tsam// dga' ba'i gtsug tor gnas na gnas// zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhi// rtsa na kun la
163b3(rgyud): khyab pa po// mi phyed lus kyi go 'phang ni// 'dod pa'i khams zhes bshad pa yin// bsdus na gnas ris nyi shu'o// de ltar rlung ni gnas gsum gyi// rtsa gsum gyi ni gan su 'das// yi ge oM byi
163b4(rgyud): brda' shes na// khams gsum rnam par sang par byed// rnam par snang mdzad 'gro ba'i gzugs// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu // rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni// sna yi bu ga nas ni
163b5(rgyud): byung // yang dag nyi ma zla ba gnyis// sbas pa nang nas rgyu bar byed/ me ni 'bar brtse mo la/ smin ma'i dbus su srog gi rlung // de lta ra gcig pu'ang gsum du bshad// gtan la phab te de
163b6(rgyud): nyid gsum// zhi ba khams gsum la khyab pa// skye bo'i sa bon rgyas pa'o// yi ge a ni ye shes mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje snying po mchog/ a ni gnyis dang yi ge haM// ring por byas te dbye ba gsum// chos
163b7(rgyud): kyi dbyings kyi don bsdus pa/ yi ge AHni sngar bo shang zin// gnyis pa yang ni srog gi rlung / stong zhing ye shes meng can te// srog dang rtsol ba gnyi su rigs// yul dang dbang po bsdus pa'o// kun
163b8(rgyud): gzhi dang ni nyon mongs ying // gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid// ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni// gsung gi rdo rje brjod pa'i mchog/ AHni chos 'khor pad+ma las// mgrin par yi ge AHnying 'gyur// 
164a1(rgyud): / khrog shing dang ni zur mel dang // yi ge ga yis kun nas ni// mgrin pa'i dbus na gnas pa 'acings// a 'a nas gsal bar brjod// ro'abab pa yi khrung khrung ni/ ro sbyar ba zhi bya bar bsu
164a2(rgyud): bkug nas rtag tu khyab par byed// gzugs kyi khams ni 'bar ba'o// ha dang de bzhin yi ge u/ de ni yi ge ma dang gsum// rkang pa nas ni mgo mtha'i bar// 'khor lo ba zhi yi don bsdus pa// tan gyu
164a3(rgyud): sel ming can rlung // bshang sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas// yi ge A ni khyab byed rlung // mgrin pa pad+ma'i dbus na gnas// yi ge ma ni srog rlung yin// dpral ba rlung gi 'khor lo la// de dag gcig
164a4(rgyud): gyur snying kha nas// thugs kyi sa bon du ni brjod// mi bskyod snying po kha dog gnag/ gzugs med khams kyi ming can no// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// snying po gsum du rab tu bshad// lag na rdza
164a5(rgyud): rjes thal sbyar nas// slar yang thams cad mkhyen la zhus// rdo rje gsum// gyi sngags don dang // gnas kyi dbye ba 'tshal lags na// 'di rnams dbus na bdag po gang // ji lta bu zhig
164a6(rgyud): gtso bos gsungs// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang ba che// bcom ldan 'das kyis sgor gsungs pa// gsang ba'i mchog pa gsungs pa yi// sbas pa'i don ni khyod 'dri ba/ rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa/ 
164a7(rgyud): rab tu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// thugs kyi sa bon bdag po ste// kun gyi nang na rnam rtog med// gang phyir gtso bos gzhan rnams ni// sgri ba dang de bzhin 'phrog pa dang // rnam par rtog pa'i rlung
164a8(rgyud): gnyis ni// lus kun la ni khyab par byed// sna yi bu ga las ni rgyu// lus la rtag tu 'byung bar byed// 'gro ba drug gi 'khor lo'i lam// gang gi stobs kyis khyad par byed/ gsum pa rnal
164b1(rgyud): 'byor pa yis rtogs// rnam rtog med par rmad byung che// rlung rnams thams cad 'gags pas na// skyes pa de nyid rtogs pa'o// rlung ni thams cad 'gog pa yang // yang dag rigs par nga yis ba
164b2(rgyud): sprul pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus// rgyud 'di pad+ma gnyisu gsungs// drug cu rtsa bzhi brgyad 'deb gnyis// steng dang 'og tu kha ltas nas// slar yang kha sbyor tshul du gnas// srog dang thur sel rgyu
164b3(rgyud): bar byed// de nyid rtog pa dang bcas pa// rlung gnyisu ni gsal bar gsungs// sku dang gsung gi snying po gnyis// la la nA dang ra sa nA// a ba d+hA ti mcho gau gi gnas// de gnyis dbus ma mchog
164b4(rgyud): gi mchog/ rnam rtog med pa rlung gi rlung // rtag tu rgyu zhing kun la khyab// / rnam rtog gang thob rtag tu ni// las kun byed cing mkhas par 'gyur// rlung gi rang bzhin bye brag ni// brgya
164b5(rgyud): rang brgyad la gang rgyal ba// dus kun tu ni 'phel bar rigs// rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes pa// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub// de yis thob par rgyud 'dir gsungs// de ni
164b6(rgyud): gang tshe skad cig thob// de ni skad cig chog tu gsungs// de yang ji ltar thob par byed// de la rigs pa ru ni brjod// thog mar rnal 'byor pa chen po// blo bzang gis ni zhi gnas sgom// bskyed pa'i
164b7(rgyud): rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i phyag rgya byas nas kyang // dbang po yi ni sgo dgu la// thams cad du ni kun rdzob pa/ hUM bzlas pa ni mtshungs pa med// mchog tu rgyun mi 'chad par ni// zla ba gcig tu
164b8(rgyud): bzlas byas na// de rjes skad gcig de la thob/ gang phyir de ni bzlas byas na// snying kha'i pad+ma'i 'ang ste bltas 'gro// de nas gsang ba'i pad+ma las// kha sbyor ba ni de bas kyang // rnam par rtog pa'i
165a1(rgyud): rlung gnyis ni// de las rnam par bcas nas 'gro// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen de// sku gsung rdo rje bcad nas ni// rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba ste// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'beb
165a2(rgyud): a ba d+hU ti'i rgyun la gnas// smin dbus rlung ni phye byas pa// de thob byas pa'i dga' ba ni// rgyun tu 'chang zhing mi zad pa// chags sogs bral zhing zhi ba dang / rang rig bde ba chen po'o// 'dir ni rgyu
165a3(rgyud): mtshan pa shad par bya/ sngags grub pa yin la 'byor bas// 'ad dang rdul dang bskulangs/ jig tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang / gdong ni grangs mdog ying du 'ong // kun gyis mthong dang dga' ba dang / gra
165a4(rgyud): chang la sogs dang // 'jig rten chos dang de bzhin gnas/ rnal 'byor sngags kyi de nyid ni// gnod pa nyid du mi 'gyur// rnal 'ad ri chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa
165a5(rgyud): las sku gsum gyi snying po bshad pa le'u ste nyi shu gnyi s+ho// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// de nyid gsum gyi tshig bstan bya// bdag nyid sngags sogs byed pa yis// 
165a6(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin rim pa rnams// bdag gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rgyu// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig cig pa// kun mkhyen go 'phang mi gas
165a7(rgyud): byed rigs kyi dbye bas rab gsal byed// rigs ni lnga yi rnam pa gang // de ni phung po'i mtshan nyid do// bra rags la sogs dbye ba yis// thogs bcas thogs med mtshan nyid dag/ 'byung ba chen po'i na
165a8(rgyud): yi dngos// 'di ni gzugs kyi phung por gsungs// der ni rnam snang ngo bo dang / thams cad spros par byed pa'i rgyu// bde dang sdug bsngal mchog tu zhi// grang dang dro ba mcho'i 'chog sngagi shin tu rig pa
165b1(rgyud): ni/ de ni tshor ba'i phung por bshad// rin chen 'byung ldan nyid kyi mtshan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spros bdag nyid// glang po bong bu lce spyang dang // rta dang ri dgas dang ni phag/ pha dang mdang pa yi spun// 
165b2(rgyud): mdza' bo snag gi gzhan tshan sogs// gang gis yang dag shes pa ni// 'du shes phung po'i mtshan nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med// de ni spros pa kun nas gsal// 'gro ba khyab par yongs
165b3(rgyud): su shes/ dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras bu// gzhan yang lung du ma bstan min// de yi 'du byed du ni bshad// don yod spro ba'i rang bzhin can// 'khor ba dngos dang dngos med sogs// kun rtog
165b4(rgyud): 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can// rnam shes zhes ni rnam par shes// mi bskyod spro ba'i bdag nyid can// de ltar phung po yongs shes na// lung dang rigs pa'i shes pa skye// dzi na dzi ka dang rat+na d+h+r-ika/ a ro li ka
165b5(rgyud): dang pradz+nyA d+hi ka/ badz+ra d+h+rika ces bya ba'i sngags// ci rigs par ni rim bzhin shes// sman la sogs pa bzhi po gang // de ni khama?/ gsum yongasu brtag/ sra ba la sogs bzhir phye bas/ 
165b6(rgyud): sa yi kha ma su yongasu brtag/ gti mug dga' bas mngon par brjod// de yi sman du yongasuM grags// zhu ba ci mchi khu ba sogs// rdzas kyi bye brag yang dag bstan// chu yi khams rnam par shes// 
165b7(rgyud): mA ma kI yi bdag cing can// dro ba bza' btung smin pa dang // gzi brjid 'phro ba nyid thams cad // me yi khamasu shes par bya// gos dkar spro ba'i bdag nyid can/ 'byung ba rngub pa rab tu 'phel// rlung
165b8(rgyud): rnams kyi ni tshogs kyi mchog/ brkyang ba dang ni bskum pa dang // steng dang 'og tu byed pa dag/ de ni rlung gi khamasu shes// sgrol ma spro ba'i bdag nyid can// de ltar 'byung ba bzhi po yang // rnal 'byor mchog
166a1(rgyud): nyid rnam par shes// mo hA ra ti dwe Sha ra ti/ ru ga ra ti badz+ra ra ti/ de ltar rim pas sngags rnams ni// de dag mngon sum cho ga yis// gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi tshogs// lha mo'i/ 
166a2(rgyud): gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du// rnal 'byor mchog gis rnam par shes// stong nyid gcig pu rgyu gcig pu// sngo ser sogs kyi dbye ba dang / ring dang thung ba'i rnam pa yis// lha mo de gzugs rdo rje ma khyi
166a3(rgyud): rol gzung ba'i rang bzhin can// mkhar rnga sil snyan sbugs rol mo// de bzhin rnga snyan pi bing dang // bstod dang smad sogs sgra dag ni// sgra yi rdo rje ma zhes bya// gzung ba dang ni rang bzhin mchog/ rnam par
166a4(rgyud): shes pa sang par byed// dring ba dang dri bzang dang // sbyar ba'i dri yi ma/ cho ga rnams ni// dri yi rdo rje mar shes bya// gzung ba'i/ rnam shes cher dmar ba// ro drug mchog tu ldan pa ni// 
166a5(rgyud): lan tshwa skyur la sogs dbye yis// rdo rje ro ma re dau shes bya// kun kyang gzung ba'i rnam pa'o// mig sogs dbang po la brten pa// / rnam par shes pa'i cho gas brgyad ni// rim pa ji lta
166a6(rgyud): ba bzhin du// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad du shas// byang chub seseMd pa'i bdag nyid che// mig gnyis sa yi snying por gsungs// gzugs la sogs pa ci rigs par// rang gi ngo bo spro bar byed// sma yi// 
166a7(rgyud): rnam pa thams cad nas// bye brag so so ci rigs par// sgra yi rnam par shes pa na// phyag na rdo rjer yang dag bshad// dri yi bye brag la spyod pa// so sor ji ltar rig pa ni/ sna yi rnam shes mtshan
166a8(rgyud): shing ni// nam mkha'i snying por rnam par shes/ ro yi bye brag la spyod pa// dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin// lce yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// 'jig rten dbang phyung tu ni shes// reg bya'i bye brag
166b1(rgyud): la spyod pa bye brag so sor go rims bzhin// reg bya'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni/ sgrib pa rnam par sel bar shes// yid kyi bye brag la spyod pa// dbye ba so sor go rims bzhin// yid kyi rnam shes zhes
166b2(rgyud): gsungs pa/ 'jam dpal zhes bya'i ming can no// rgyus pa kun la yang dag sbyor// dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin// bag chags yul gyi bdag nyid can/ byams pa ru ni rnam par shes// rtsa rnams
166b3(rgyud): so so'i mtshan nyid can/ bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can// 'di ni kun tu bzang por bshad// de ltar rnam shes tshogs brgyad mchog yang dag de nyid bla na med// 
166b4(rgyud): mig sogs dbang po'i rnam shes ni// gzu gas sogs mthong ba'i rang bzhin no// rje rang dpung pa brla thal gong // sgo gnyis dang ni thams cad kyi// shes pa bcu yi mtshan nyid ni// khyab pa rnams
166b5(rgyud): su yongasu shes// gshin rje mthar byed shes mthar byed// pad+ma/ mthar byed bgegs mthar byed// 'dod pa'i rgyal po mi ga/ yo gang byug sngon dang ni stobs po che// gnong mdzes bcu
166b6(rgyud): tor 'khor lo sbyar// de ltar de rnams gnas dbye bas// ye shes gsum gyis yongasu gsal// ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni// yang dag de kho na nyid rten// gang gis de nyid cho ga bzhin// bla ma brgyud
166b7(rgyud): ba las shes bya// sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ ye shes chen po legs rgyas pa// skye med zad med mi gsal dang // 'gyur ba med cing sgrib pa med// gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang / 
166b8(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ sbrul dang btus dang mtha' med dang // mgo med yongasu dbye ba yis// oM dang hUM phaT swA hA'i mtha'// sprul zhes bya ba mngon par brjod// rang ming yon tan
167a1(rgyud): dang ni gzugs// btus pa'i mtshan nyid ming can no// oM la sogs pa zhabs med pa// mtha' med ces bya'i ming can no// sA'i mtha' can oM med pa// ma go med ces ni
167a2(rgyud): bshad pa yin// thams cad yod la oM med pa// mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin// de ltar mtshan nyid shes nas ni// sngags kyi de nyid bla na med// rtse ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// 'di yi
167a3(rgyud): rgya chen don shes bya// ye shes de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ gnyis pa tha~Md rnam par spangs// dbang po thams cad mnyam par sbyor// dngos po thams cad gcig pa'i lus// ngag gi rnam rtog
167a4(rgyud): kun tu spangs// snang ba thams cad rnam par spangs// bdag/ byin chub pa'i rang bzhin can// kun la khyab pa mang du gyu// rang rig pa yi rnal 'byor mchog/ skad cig bzhi yi mtshan
167a5(rgyud): nyid ni/ cha bral kun 'gro khyab pa dang // rnal 'byor byis pa mi shes shing // kun rdzob yongasu mi shes pa// don dang/ rang gi ngo bo ni// rdzogs pa'i rims pas dbye ba dang // sngags
167a6(rgyud): de nyid ni rab tu gsal// a ni de nyid mtha' thig ler// yang dag thim par rnam par sgom// thig le yang ni a la thim// e no mtha' yi ha tsam la'o// ha yang yi ge hU la'o// yi ge A ni ha
167a7(rgyud): la'o// yi ge haM yang au la thim// yi ge a ni thig le tsam// thig le yang ni sgra la thim// sgra yang sgra tsam la ni'o// sgra tsam mchog ni na mkha' la'o// de yang 'od gsal ba la the mo// 'od gsal go
167a8(rgyud): 'phang gsal ba ni/ shin tu rnam dag chos dbyings te// gnyi su med pa'i ye shes mchon// rab tu sad cing rab tu 'char// ngag gi spyod pa rnams dang bral// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ 
167b1(rgyud): phung po lnga ni gcig pu'i gzhi// 'byung ba lnga ni yang dag bsten/ rnam shes brgyad ni tshogs dben pa// phyi yi yul drug bsdus pa ni// rlung bcus shes pa bcu bsdus pa// de ltar mtshan nyid kun
167b2(rgyud): bsdus pa'o// kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// gang gis bzhugs gnas srid pa gsum// dngos grub kun byed dpal dang ldan// skal ba bzang po kun 'phel ba// rdo rje de ni rdo rje sems// rdo rje
167b3(rgyud): 'jigs byed dbang phyug dang / he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo// dang po'i sangs rgyas thug pa che// kun tu bzang po 'jam dpal dang // sna tshogs spro ba'i bdag zhing can/ sna tshogs yon tan tshogs
167b4(rgyud): kyi bzhi/ kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor ni// rnal 'byor chen po dri ma med// ye shes de nyid gsal bI// rtog pa med cing gnas pa med// chos dbyings 'pho ba zhes bshad do// bskyed
167b5(rgyud): dang rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid dag/ sku yi rtse mo brgyang stong / 'dra// shin tu gsal zhing 'od gsal ba/ lung dang rigs ba'i dbye ba yis// bla ma brgyud pa las ni shes// de ltar de nyid
167b6(rgyud): gsum dam tshig/ zhal nas brgyad pa'i rim pa skye// gsang ba yi ni ye shes mchog/ bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid skad cig mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las
167b7(rgyud): de kho na nyid gsum gyi dam tshig gtan la dbab po'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad kyis zhon// sna rtse gsum gyi mtshan nyid ni// gsang ba snying kha gdong sna'i
167b8(rgyud): ming // gsum po rgyud las gsal ba ni/ 'khor lo gsum gyi dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor pa yi sgom pa'i rim// shin tu chags pa'i dbang song ba'i// sems kyi bde ba ster bar byed// rlung gi de nyid
168a1(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// rtsa yi 'khor lo sang par byed// bde ba chen po kun nas skye// khams gsum ro gcig gyur nas na// dgug dbang cho ga bzhin du bya// byang chub sems ni bde ba che
168a2(rgyud): lhan skyes skang cig mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje rtse mor gzung bar bya// de nying bde ba chen po ste// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// kun rtog thams cad rnam par spangs// gsang ba'i sna cher rdzas thig le// yang dag
168a3(rgyud): gzung ba'i bdag nyid can// chags chen sems ni gcig pa yis// rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya// bang 'dub drug cu rtsa bzhi la// rtsa yi 'khor lo rim bzhin 'char// de yi lte snar ni bshad// 
168a4(rgyud): gsang bar bde ba thams cad ster// snying kha'i pad+ma mdab ma brgyad // de yang lte ba snar ni brjod// zhe sdang nyid kyi sems ni/ sgom// gsang sngags 'bar ba'i ye shes sos// yang dag spro bar byed
168a5(rgyud): pa'i rgyu// ngag ni rtog pa kun spangs pa/ rmad byung chen po ye shes mchog/ rtag tu sngags ni nad 'byung // rnam rtog me da pa'i bde ba che/ bsam gtan la sbyor bde ba'i mchog/ man ngag thob
168a6(rgyud): pas bde ba rgyal// zhe sdang myur du dbang byas nas// zhi ba'i de nyid rgyu gcig ni// zla ba zhi ma med dang gsum// lam gsum gyi ni dbus nas khyab/ gdong gi sna ni zhes byar bshad// rlung rnams gnas kyi
168a7(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang // de la gnas pa'i ye shes che// thig le mu tig gis gnon yin// bsam gtan gti mug mchog las rgyal// dngos po thams cad rnam par spangs// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gas
168a8(rgyud): de kho na nyid lnga brten mchog/ de yi 'od zer thig le tsam// gdong gi sna rtser yang dag brten// rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya// gti mug rgya mtsho las ni rgyal// de nying dam tshig sems dpa' yi// 
168b1(rgyud): ming can du ni yang dag bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi/ dam tshig ni// ye shes lnga yi mtshan nyid can// rnal 'byor mkhas pa rnams kyis ni// gti mug mun pa rnams 'joms pa/ kun mkhyen rtogs
168b2(rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi rigs gnas na// sna rtse bu ga las byung zhing // rlung lnga steng du yang dag rgyu// kun rdzob lngar ni rgyu ba yi// sgo de las ni rnam par byung // g.yon dang g.yas dang / 
168b3(rgyud): gnyis ka dang // ngal bar rgyu dang rnam pa bzhi// g.yas pa las ni 'byung ba'i khams// / me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ kha dog dmar ba bzang po 'di// pad+ma mgon po rgyu ba'o// g.yon pa nas ni 'byung
168b4(rgyud): ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dres pa// ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste/ dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor zhing // da rin chen mgon po rgyu ba'o// ngal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// dag
168b5(rgyud): pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni// 'di ni chu yi dkyil 'khor // rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o// khams gsum las ni yang dag / byung / rten dang brten par bzung ba ni// rnam par snang mdzad rang
168b6(rgyud): bzhin te// 'chi ba'i mthar ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag ni// mnyam par gzhag pas rtag tu zlos// sngags bzlas pa yi grangs kyis ni// nyin mtshan rtag tu zlos pa yin// de ltar
168b7(rgyud): rlung ni sne rtser ni// kha dog lnga par rnar sbom// gnyis med mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis/ 'od zer tshogs ni dri ma med// de yis ni sogs bya ba ni// rim gyis sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje se
168b8(rgyud): dbar 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpar 'gro mgon la// de nas lag na rdo rjes zhes// thig le gsum gyi gzhung lugs ni// khyod zhabs bsnyen bkur gyis 'tshal na// 'di la cung zad the tsom
169a1(rgyud): mchis/ srid pa mthar mdzad gsal bar mdzad// rdzas dang sngags dang de bzhin rlung // thig le/ gsum ni bsgoms pa na// rnal 'byor pa gzhi nyi dam ni// yang na rnal rgyang
169a2(rgyud): so sor sgrom// de la the tshom kun gcod gtso// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// yun ring chags chen dbang song bas// srid pa gsum du skyob pa rnams// de dag 'gro ba'i don du ni// rdzas
169a3(rgyud): kyi big le gsungs pa yin// zhe sdang chen po dbang song ba// mi gang mi srun pa yi lus// de rnams myur du grol don du// sngags kyi thig ler gsungs pa yin// gti mug chen pos kun na
169a4(rgyud): 'khrul// srid pa'i rgya mtsho las skyob gang // de dag dngos grub bai rgyad 'bras bu// thob phyir ye shes rgya mtshan// rlung gi thig ler gsungs pa yin// yang dag de nyid spros pa
169a5(rgyud): ni/ de lta yang dag thig le gsum// bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin// tshe 'di nyid la grub don du// sI pa thams cad dag pa'i phyir// rtse gcig pa yi sems kyi ni
169a6(rgyud): ye shes gsum gnas nyams dga' ba// me tog 'bras bu chu yis rgyun// skye bos dben pa'i ri yi rtser// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// rnal
169a7(rgyud): 'byor chen po'i rgyad dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las sna'i rtse mo gsum gtan la bab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad kyis nyon// stong
169a8(rgyud): nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni// lus la gnas pa de nyid mchog/ thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// chos rnams thams cad snang bar byed// mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'dod// de las
169b1(rgyud): ye shes bde ba che// 'od gsal ba ni rnam dag pa// gang phyir a ba d+hU tIr zhugs// yang dag stong pa zhing du 'dod// chos rnams rnam rtog snang ba mched// rtog pa thams cad gcod par byed/ 
169b2(rgyud): rnam rtog rlung gi ngal bso ba/ de ni stong pa nyid du natso bo chen po mi bskyed pa'i// 'jig ni khams ni de nyid de// der ni rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sa// srog gi ye shes ming can te// gzugs
169b3(rgyud): med dag po chen po yi// zhi ba'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid can// de la ye shes bde ba che// byang chub sems kyi sa gang nyid// de nyid bde chen gang 'phang gnas// ye shes yang dag byang chub sems// / 
169b4(rgyud): de la sogs pa ming gi sgras// brjod bya gcig pu bde bache// dngos po gcig dang ldan pa nyid// stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod// bde ba can zhes de la bshad// bde ba dge ba'i thob mtshan nyid
169b5(rgyud): gang de bde bar gnas pa ni// de ni bde ba can zhes brjod// tshe dpag med zhing khams na// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ byang chub sems ni tshe dpag med// de las byung ba'i skye ba'i 'od // 
169b6(rgyud): de phyir 'od dpag med du shes// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ stong zhing rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ de zhing mnyam par sbyor ba ni// stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod/ shes rab pad+ma la la nA// zla mtshan nyim
169b7(rgyud): 'bab pa na// de yang stong par rnam par shes// gnyid pa thams cad rnam par spangs// thabs kyi rdo rje ra sa na// zla ba shu gra rab tu 'bab// de ni ye shes mchog tu gsungs// bde ba chen po'i go 'phangs
169b8(rgyud): mchog/ de nyid sbyor ba mchog tu shes// stong nyid ye shes mi zad pa// zla ba na dang de nyid yin// rnal 'byor me yi zhal las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs
170a1(rgyud): b.las stong pa nyid kyi tshig bshad pa'i le ru ste nyi shu ny+dza 'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// lus ni stong pa nyid kyi gnas/ lus ni gang gis shes pa ni/ 
170a2(rgyud): rnams kun gyi pho brang mchog/ longs spyod chos dang sprul pa dang // bde ba chen po yi ni rten/ 'khor lo yang ni gang bshad pa// rim pa ji bzhin ma lus pa// de ltar rtag tu yang dag bzhugs// thim dang longs
170a3(rgyud): spyod bdag po ni// lha nyid mchog tu gnyis su med// yang dag ngo bo'i go 'bang rten// ye shes chen po'i go 'phang phyir// bde ba chen po'i yang dag rten// zhe sdang che dang gti mug che// pha dog tshe dang chags dngos
170a4(rgyud): kyis khro bo che dang rnam pa'i mchog 'khor ba'i mdud pa nges gcod pa// sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang na mkha'i dbye ba yis// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya nyid dang ni// 
170a5(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings dang mig bzang dang // rna ba sna dang lce dang ni// lus kyi rnam shes chos dang ni// kun gzhi nyon mongs can gyi yid// dang dang brtson 'grus dran ting 'dzin// shes rab
170a6(rgyud): dbang po'i dbye ba yi// dang stob brtson 'grus stobs dang ni// dran pa'i stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs// shes rab stobs ni bla na med// ji bzhin gnas su yang dag shes// lus kyi lha ru gsal ba yin// sngon
170a7(rgyud): bzhin ming gi dbye ba yis// sngags kyi dbyi bas rim pa dang // sngags dgong pa yi rnal 'byor gyis// rim bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yis// lung gis rnam par nges byas pa'i// yang dag gnas kyi dbye ba dang / 
170a8(rgyud): lha mo rtag tu rnal 'byor pas// bdag la byin rlabs go 'phang nas// 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod cing // / rab tu 'bad te mchod pa byas// rdo shing sa yi rang bzhin gyi// phyi rol lha la phyag mi bya// 
170b1(rgyud): bdag la byin rlabs rim de zhing // gzhan du srid pa gsum na med// de kho na nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ bdag la byin rlabs sgrib med pa// sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pa sogs// phyi yi dngos po mi bsgrung ste/ 
170b2(rgyud): de nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu ni// 'bad pas byin gyis brlab par 'dod// bdag byin rlob thabs mtshan nyid do// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rdzogs/ 
170b3(rgyud): ba las lus kyi lha ye shes kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi// de rnams kyi ni ming bshad bya// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// rtsa yi rim pa'i grangs
170b4(rgyud): kyis ni// las dang rdo rje pad+ma dang // 'khor lo la sogs rigs dbye bas// rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba yis// rtsa yi rim pas yang dag bzhugs// 'dir ni rigs ni lnga par yang // de kho na nyid nyams
170b5(rgyud): myong mchog/ tshor ba nyamasu myong ba yi// thams cad la ni khya kha~M par gnas// sprul pa rang gi rigs las skyes// lha mo 'di dag yang dag zhugs// mkhyen ma gtum mo dpa' mo ma/ 
170b6(rgyud): las sgrol ba dang yid bcugs ma// 'khrul 'khor ma dang 'bud ma dang // snying stobs yang dag sangs rgyas ma// rob dang ma dang yid 'ong ma// grub ma sprul 'tsho sgyu ma dang // gter 'dzin lha yi dang
170b7(rgyud): phyug me// ge sar pad+ma dri med ma// rlung gi lu gu brgyud byed ma// bzang mo dang ni khwa yi gdong // gnyid log ma dang mi 'phel ma// 'phar ma sngo sangs dus mtshan ma/ rtse 'joms ma dang skal bzang 'a
170b8(rgyud): na ga dza na bi gdong ma// chags ma dga' ma rnam sgeg ma// brtson 'grus dang 'phel dkar mo dang // bdud rtsi lnga ni 'phel ba ma// dngos 'bebs shin tu dpa' mo dang // pad+ma lnga dang 'dod ma dang // sgyu ma
171a1(rgyud): yid 'ong mdza' mo dang // sgur dang chang gi dbang phyug ma/ mi bzang che dang las skal bzang / me tog bzang mo gdug rmongs ma// steng gzigs nas dang rtse gsum mtshan/ 
171a2(rgyud): mdzes ma dang ni ljang bskyod ma// rtag bam ma dang gir ma dang // ri dgas mig dang chags dga' ma// sna tshogs mongs par/ rol ba mo// / dkar mo 'jig rten gsum pa mo// ro bran dra
171a3(rgyud): med 'gro bstan ma// ral ga rnams ni yang dag bzhugs// rtag tu brgyad dang spel ba'i grangs// zhal gsum phyag drug dri ma med// rigs kyi phyag rgya dbye ba yis// mtshon cha rnams kyis snga ga / 
171a4(rgyud): tshogs rdo rje g.yas// g.yon pa 'gying bas ud pa la/ g.yas na 'khor lo rin chen dang // de bzhin ral gri chos 'byung ni// g.yon gyi phyag gnyis la ni 'gyur// sems dpa'
171a5(rgyud): / skyil drung gis legs bzhugs// zhal ni ljang ku spyan gsum pa// don yod grub pa'i cod pan can// zhal rnams bzhad par sgom pa dang // bde ba thams cad 'phel bar byed// rang
