171a6(rgyud): gi ming gi dbye ba yis// yi ge gsum dang rnam par spel// sngags kyis kyang ni yang dag mchod// 'dod pa'i de nyid rab stsol mdzad// chos kyi 'khor lo rtsa brgyad dbus// lha 'di dag ni yang
171a7(rgyud): ngag bzhugs// rdor dbyings dbang phyug lAm dang // rdo rje phyag rgya stobs chen mo// rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje gdong // rdo rje chos ma rdo rje bzang // rdo rje rol mor shes par bya// chos kyi 'khor dgu bdag
171a8(rgyud): nyid// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa dang // sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // g.yas pa yi ni phyag na 'dzin// g.yon na ral gri pad+ma dang // dril bu/ 
171b1(rgyud): 'dzin pa bla na med// sku mdog sngon po spyan gsum pa// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// rang ming yi ge gsum dang spel// sngags kyis de dag rab tu mchod// long spyod mdab ma bcu dag la// pad+ma'i
171b2(rgyud): dbus na lha rnams bzhugs// pad+ma'i sgrol ma bang dkar mo// pad+ma kun mu dra 'phel ma// pad+ma'i spyan dang pad gtsug pud// pad+ma'i phreng ba pang skyes ma// pang gdan pad+ma'i dro ba ma// de bzhin pad+ma'i 'od dang
171b3(rgyud): ni/ pad+ma'i spyan dang pad bzang ma// pad+ma'i nang bzhugs pad skyes ma// pad+ma'i ga sar pad+ma ma// de ltar 'di ni yang dag bshad// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis leg
171b4(rgyud): bzhugs// g.yas na pad+ma 'khor lo dang // rdo rje yang ni 'debs par mdzad// g.yon na ral gri dril bu dang // rin po che yi rnam par sgog// sman gsum rnam par 'char ba dngo // pad+ma dmar po'i
171b5(rgyud): mdoge ltar dmar// nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor nyer bzhugs shing // sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rang ming yi ge/ gsum dang bcas// 'di rnams sngags ni bla na med// de
171b6(rgyud): ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// bang 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis la// rtag tu lha mo rnams ni bzhugs// rab tu sang ba 'bed pa can// 'khor lo'i shugs ma rdo rje ldan// rin chen sgrol ma pang zhugs ma/ sna
171b7(rgyud): tshogs las ma gti mug dga'// zhe sdang rdo rje dga' chags ma// rdo rje las chags gzugs rdo rje// sgra yi rdo rje re rdo rje// rag bya rdo rje chos dbyings ma// spyan 'ongs dang zod dbyangs ma// sna yi snang ba
171b8(rgyud): ro dga' ma// sku yi rgyal mtshan yid dga' ma// khams bcas ma dang rgyu 'bab ma// gshin rje 'joms pa'i blo yi ni// bye brag rnam par rgyas ma dong // pad+ma'i ral pa gyen du brdzes// bgags
172a1(rgyud): rnams thams cad 'joms pa mo// sbas pa'i mngal dang dbyug sngon ma// shin tu bstan ma stobs chen ma// rang byung ma dang 'khor lo'i gtsug// de ltar rtsa yi dbus nas
172a2(rgyud): shar/ slar yang lha mo zhal gsum dang // phyag drug bde ba 'phel ba can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang bzhags// dri med pad+ma dkar mo'i mdog/ zhi ba zhal gsum spyan gsum pa// g.yas pa'i
172a3(rgyud): phyag na bsnams pa ni// 'khor lo lcags kyu rdo rje rim// de bzhin g.yon pa'i phyag gsum la// pad+ma zhags pa rin po che// 'char dang 'debs dang sgeg par mdzad// pad+ma dkar po 'dra ba'i 'od // spyi bor
172a4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad 'chang // rang gi ming dang yig gsum ming // 'di dag sngags ni go rims bzhin// de nyid mchog ni rab tu gsal// sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa ni// de lta bu yi sdom pa
172a5(rgyud): mchog/ lha mo rnams kyi de nyid mchog/ rtag tu gnyis log lus la gnas// 'dod pa lnga yi longs spyod bsten// ma chod pa nyid kyis yang dag mnyes// rdo rje pad+ma'i bde bas myos// rdo rje
172a6(rgyud): sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog/ mnyes nas slar yang gso bar byed// de yi zhi sogs bya ba rnams// 'gra' 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// bsam gtan rnal 'byor sogs spyod dang // sngags dbyibs la
172a7(rgyud): sogs bya ba ni// dgos med mchog tu cung zad ni// bla ma'i lus las yang dag skyes// de phyir rdo rje slob dpon ni// 'thad pas dngos grub kyis mnyes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje
172a8(rgyud): phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa la 'khor lo bzhi'i lha mo bzhi rim pa rnam par phye bo'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ 'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ 
172b1(rgyud): rnams kyis ni rnal 'byor mchog dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gnas// mdun gnas pa yi yul rnams las// yid la byed pas der mi 'gro// sngon gyi bag chags nang gnas pa// de tshe dbang po rab tu
172b2(rgyud): gsal// de yis de ni rab tu sad// de rnams rtsal rim bzhin gnas// raT sang de yis sad byas nas// lha mo rang yang 'khor lo las// de yis 'char ba'i rim par gsungs// nub pa yang ni
172b3(rgyud): bshad par bya// yul rnams kyang ni dngos bral med// yid la byed nas gzhan du gnas// bag chags kyang ni sad mi sang // rtsa rnams 'char bar mi 'gyur zhing // lha rnams yang dag sad par ni// de yi
172b4(rgyud): phyir ni mi 'gyur te// snying gi dbus nas bde ba'i dngos sangs rgyas nyi ma gsal ba'i 'ong // gzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis kyang // de ni 'od zer bcu gnyis te// 'od 'phel
172b5(rgyud): 'od zer gzi brjid ma/ gsal ba 'bar ma 'od 'bar ma / mig la sogs pa la brten nas// phyi rol gzugs so/ gas 'dzin pa'o// mun sel 'od ma snang ba mo// gsal mdzes
172b6(rgyud): gsal 'od nyi ma gsal/ phyi rol gzugs sogs rnam pa'o// drug po 'di dag 'og tu 'dod// lha mo rnams ni gang 'char ba'ang // ye shes nyi ma 'char ba yin// de yang yang dag nub pa ni// de yang
172b7(rgyud): mchog tu nub pa'o// 'char ba nub pa rnams 'chad pa// go 'phang mchog tu shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po legs par sad// sangs rgyas nyi ma sdom pa'o// 'di ni rnal 'byor de nyid mchog
172b8(rgyud): 'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid do// rdo rje gsang ba'i rjes 'bangs nas// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las 'char ba dang
173a1(rgyud): nub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// / de nas gnan yang bshad kyimangon// dga' ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ gang gis yang dag shes pa yis// rdo rje sems
173a2(rgyud): dpa' go 'phang mchog/ de ni rtsa yi 'khor lo la// slar yang rgyas dang bsdus pa yis// 'khor lo bzhi yi yang dag sbyor lha rnams brgyad dang gnyis lhag pa/ mtshams kyi rtsa yi rim pa yang // rtsa ni bcu
173a3(rgyud): drug la yang brten// bzhi dang bzhi yis rtag tu khyab// de rnams dga' bo'i rim pa'o// chu khams khong du chud pa tsan/ pad+ma rin la ma lta bu yis// de ni de yis khyab byas shing // bde ba chen po phan
173a4(rgyud): par byed// 'khor lo so so'i dbye ba yis// cha bzhi pa yi yi ge hA/ shin tu phra ba'i cha rtag tu// khyab pa brtan gyi tshul du gnas// / rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba las// rim pa bcu drug dab
173a5(rgyud): bas 'thog/ 'phro ba'i bdag nyid rmad dbyung ba'o// ro cig pa'i go 'a'athog rim gyis so sor nyams myong las// sna tshogs chu yi sbyor ba las/ ri mos kyis rgya mtsho chu bzhin du// spyir ba
173a6(rgyud): yi 'khor lo'i dus// dga' ba bzhi ni de la brjod// rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod pa las// go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor che ni rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las dga' ba bskyed
173a7(rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le ru ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang yang dag nyon// rdo rje bstan pa'i lus kyis ni// rtag tu rtsa rnams kyi ni rgyun// de kho na nyid ngas bshad bya// stong phrag nyi shu
173a8(rgyud): ca bzhini// rtsa ni rtag tu rmad byung ba/ byang chub sems ni 'bab par shes// bde ba thams cad rab tu 'phel// rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa/ stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// khrag 'bab par ni
173b1(rgyud): par bya zhi ma 'pho ba'i bdag nyid can/ rtag tu rmang du byung ba rtsa// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni rlung rgyu bar ni shes par bya/ rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyud las ni// lus kyi gnas ni dbye ba yis// de nyid nyi shu
173b2(rgyud): rtsa bzhir brjod// thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid// grangs ni bdun cu rtsa gnyis brjod// re re'ang 'khor lo stong stong ngo // thim pa longs spyod bdag 'dor ba// gtso bo yang ni bangs pa las/ gnas
173b3(rgyud): rnams kyi ni grangasu 'gyur// slar yang bsdus nas 'gro ba ni// gsum po brgyad brgyad dbye ba'ang ni// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba dang // thun tshod skad cig sbyor ba yis// ca rnaMs gong/ gong du ni// nang
173b4(rgyud): du 'gro bar shes par bya// g.yon pa byang chub zla ba 'bab// g.yas pa khrag dang nim 'bab// dbus na rlung rgyu ba yis ni// me srang byed par shes par bya// la la nA dang ra sa na// a bar+b+ha
173b5(rgyud): ti zhes bya'i ming // de rnams spro'i sbyor ba yis// re re'i rim gyis bru/ na brgyad brgyad// gsum po nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gro// thim da nga long spyod bdag po'i phyir// rim gyis grangs ni bdun
173b6(rgyud): cu gnyis// slar yang de sgo sbyar ba yis// re re'ang stong stong dbye ba yos// rtag tu grangs nyid 'gyur ba ni// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so// gtso bo gsum po slar yang ni// ster bar gcig pa
173b7(rgyud): nyid du 'gro/ dang po las ni rnal 'byor pas/ pra ba de ni shes par dka'/ zam ma gyis mi khyab mchog tu ni/ thig le nAng rnam par spangs// de rnga kun gyi gzhi gsang ba/ srog gi rten gyi mtshan na
173b8(rgyud): dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang // dus kyi cha ni rnam par bshad/ ro gcig go 'a'ang bdag nyid can// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud las shes/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i
174a1(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa las na'i 'bab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis 'on/ mtshams kyi rtsa yi ngo bo nyid / 
174a2(rgyud): rnams sdom pa 'char ba ni// gang gis shes na rtag tu ni// mchog tu dga' ba nyams myong ba// lha yi ye shes gsal bar byed// lha yi sngagasu yang dag sbyor// lha yi rnal 'byor don nges pa// de nyid gsum
174a3(rgyud): sbyor dri ma med// de gsum gcig car bdag nyid sdom// 'jig rten gsum du khyab cing khra/ lus kun la ni yang dag brtan// ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems// gang phyir dam tshig sems dpa' bde// rnal 'byor
174a4(rgyud): mchog tu shes par bya// khyab pa'i de nyid rmad byung ba// mchog rab mchog dang phra ba dang // rang byung ye shes mi zad pa/ byang so sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab/ rtsa ni thams cad mchog tu rgyas// bde ba chen po'i
174a5(rgyud): 'khor lor gnas/ cha kun dang ga nyid rtsa ba ni// de yi dbus su rtsa gsu/ ma ste// gtso bo yang ni yang dag bshad// zla banyi ma me rgyug/ 'byung ba thams cad la ni khyab// ji ltar shing rtsa cung zad pa
174a6(rgyud): sa la stan par gnas pa na// sdong bu yal ga 'dab phre'u// sogs pa yis ni kun nas khyab// de bzhin skyes bu mgor ldan pas// phung po khams la sogs tshogs la// mchog tu kun nas khyab pa'o// rnam par thar
174a7(rgyud): pa'i sgo gsum dngos// de kho na nyid gsum sdom pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // rang bzhin mtshan nyid dbye ba gsum// mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams kyis kyang // dam tshig mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum// sangs rgyas
174a8(rgyud): dam chos dge 'dun ni// gsum phye dam tshig mtshan nyid dang // stong nyid ye shes rdo rje ni// rnam gsum de nyid mtshan nyid ngo // rgyu dang 'bras bu nye 'khor ni// rnal 'byor gsum gyi mtshan nyid do// rlung dang bad kan mkhris
174b1(rgyud): pani/ gsum phye khams gsum bsdus pa'o// dang khams 'azugs khams 'jugs med khams 'jig rten gsum po'i mtshan nying ngo // rtsa ba gsus dang 'bras dugaciga'i ma bzhin rgyunas chos 'khor chu
174b2(rgyud): de ni sprul pa gsum du gsal// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis// gang che de la rab sbyor ba// de ni gzas zin mtshan nyid // gang tshe cung zad sngon na// de tshe phyed 'dzin mtshan nyid do// gang phyir srog ni rlung bcom na// de tshe
174b3(rgyud): 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid yin// rtsa yi btso bo'ang zhing rnams ni// gsum po nges pa zhes ni bya/  / rgyas par rnal 'byor ma rgyud las/ rnal 'byor pa yos gsal por shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng bar
174b4(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa las mtshams kyi rtsa gsum gyi nges pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bsha dkyis 'on// rlung skye ba yi mtshan zhing ni// dus kyi glags ni
174b5(rgyud): brtsal ba na// ji ltar dngos su yang dag shes// bag chags nyon mo/ sa can gyi yid// rang gi ngo bo gzugs gzhan mthong // don ni shes par mi shes shing // rlung tsam gcig pus rmongs
174b6(rgyud): ba'o// kun gzhi rnam shes bkug nas ni// bag chags nang du rnam par spyod// bag chags kyis ni rnam shes bzung // bag chags drang 'dres rim pa las// nang gi bag chags bgos pa yis// de rnam
174b7(rgyud): zla mtshan dus su ni// mngal gyi rdza la 'jug pa na// rdo rje khu khrag zhu thig le// 'dres pa ru ni gyur pa dang // kun gzhi las ni rnam shes skye// ji ltar chang ros myos pa bzhin/ kun gzhi rnam shes bag cha
174b8(rgyud): las rnam par shes pa'i rgyun skye// nyon mongs can ni srog rlung nyid// skad cig gcig la yang dag 'gro// thog mar 'pho ba'i dus su ni/  yi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur// 'pho ba gnyis pa'i dus su mi
175a1(rgyud): slar yang brag dang 'dres pa ni// steng dang 'og gi dbye ba yis// srog gi rlung ni gnyis su 'gro// thur sel rlung gi 'gro 'ong la// ru sbal rnam par 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas 'pho ba gsum
175a2(rgyud): ba la khrag dang khu ba zos pa na// thur du sel ba'i rlung gi tshogs// bskams nas gyen du rlung ni 'byung // sdang du kha bltas nas ni gnas// ngag rgod 'dra ba'i lus 'chang 'gyur// slar yang 'pho ba bzhi pa
175a3(rgyud): la/ khrag dang khu ba bsgos pa ni// gyen tu rgyu ba'i rlung bkug nas// 'og tu kha bltas nas ni 'gro// seng ge'i rnam pa yis kyang ni// khyab byed rlung ni spro bar byed// de nas 'pho ba lnga pa la/ khrag dang khu ba
175a4(rgyud): 'phel nas ni// mnyam gnas rlung ni 'angar nas ni/ me yi gzugs red rim bzhin 'gro// mnyam gnas rlung gi khyab byed spro// gang gis 'gul dang 'dar bar 'gyur// phung po lnga ni rdzogs pa na/ 
175a5(rgyud): de ltar gsungs pa de las slar// 'pho ba drug pa'i dus chod la/ sa/ yi khams dang mig gnyis dang // khyab byed rlung gis klu rlung spro// rlung gi dngos po 'phel bar byed// de nas 'pho ba
175a6(rgyud): bdun pa la// chu yi khams dang sna bug dong // klu yi rlung gis rul sbal rlung // spros nas gnyisu med pa'i spong // de nas 'phro ba brgyad pa la// me dang sna yi bu khe 'byed// ru sbal rlung gi rtsangs rlung spro// rang gi
175a7(rgyud): rang bzhin shes par byed// de nas 'pho ba dgu pa la// rlung gi khams dang ro ni tshor// rtsangs pa zhes bya'i rlung chen pos// lha sbyin rlung ni spro bar byed// de rjes 'pho ba bcu pa la// lhan sbyin rlung gis gzhu rgyal
175a8(rgyud): spro/ rlung kun bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid can// dgu pa'i dbus na khyab pa'i khams// phra zhing thogs med mtshan nyid can// rtsa dang sgyu ma rgyus pa'i sbubs// sgo ni dgu po rgyas par byed// lus kyi mchog tu char/ 
175b1(rgyud): ba dang / gcig tu reg pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin// rab sang mchog ni namakha' la// 'od gsal bzang po yang dag gnas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa bcu// de lta bu nyid bshang bar bya// 'pho ba bcu ni sa bcu
175b2(rgyud): ste/ rim pa yis na rnam par shes// ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ b+ha ga phyag rgya chen por brjod// byis pa yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad mkhyen cing thama'ang gzigs// mgon po'i
175b3(rgyud): skra ni bregs pa dang // phru ma'i chos gos dmar po bgos// dpal dang ldan pa zil mo sbyar// spyi bo sa la gtugs pa phyag// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis 'chang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rgyan// ye shes
175b4(rgyud): chen po legs par sang // 'du byed thob pa grol dang bcas// dpa' dpo chen po rnam rtog med// bskyed byed sha ni 'jigs par byed// / bdung rdzi ni ye shes che// rtag tu bdud rtsi lnga myang byed/ 
175b5(rgyud): dngos po thams cad rnam spangs la/ rnal 'byor seng ge bzhin du spyod// 'di gnyis mchog ni gsang ba ste// gang du yang na ma gsung so// rlung skyes pa yi nges pa ni// bla ma brgyud
175b6(rgyud): pa las shes bya/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi bskyed pa skyes bu skye ba 'jug pa'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang ba
175b7(rgyud): bya ba/ rlung rnams mchog tu nub pa ni// gang gis yang dag shes pa yis// 'chi ba'i srad cig mtshan cing ni// phan tshun du ni yang dag sdud/ skye ba'i rim ltar thim par 'gyur// rlung rnams yang dag skye
175b8(rgyud): ni/ phan tshun nub pa'i nyi ma bzhin// thog mar lo bcu lon nas ni// rgyags pa'i myos pa'i rlung skyes nas/ gzhu las rgyal ba'i rlung zos te// rim gyis sgra gcan zla ba bzhin/ de rjes lo bcu phyin
176a1(rgyud): pa ni// rgyags chu rlung gis yang dag skye// lha sbyin zhes bya'i rlung ni za// rlung gi rim pa ldum bzhin// gzhan yang lo bcu phyin pa ni// rgyags nga'i chu rlung skyes par 'gyur// rtsangs pa
176a2(rgyud): zhes bya'i rlung ni za// de nas gzhan yang lo bcu phyin// lo las skyes pa'i rim pa yis// btang bzung rlung ni chen po yis// ru sbal rlung ni za bar byed// klu yi rlung dang bting bzung rung // stobs dang gzi
176a3(rgyud): brjid mtshungs pa'i phyir// dus gzhan lo bcur phyir pa na/ gnod pa byed par mi nus te// stobs dang nus pa mtshungs pa'i phyir/ gang gis gang la gnang ba ni/ byed pa nying du mi nas so// bcu pa gzhan
176a4(rgyud): du phyin pa'o// long ba btang bzung stobs chen thob// klu yi rlung ni rim gyis za// de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin na// khrag dang sha ni rnam par 'phel// rgyags shing myos pa'i rim pa yis// btang
176a5(rgyud): bzung rlung ni za bar byed// de rjes lo bcu lon pa na// myos chu rlung ni bkun nas ni// tshil dang kha chu rnam par 'phel// de yis btang bzung klu za byed// de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin pa// 
176a6(rgyud): lo la btang bzung rlung stobs skyes// myos pa'i dus rlung za bar byed// me dang rlu ni 'phel bar byed// btang bzung rlung nyid rnam gyur nas// long sprod chen po 'phel gyur nas// de nas lo bcu gzhan lon
176a7(rgyud): nas rlung gis lus rgyas lci bor 'gyur// chu dang rlung ni 'dres pa ni// khyab cing sgrib byas rim pa las// de las lo bcu gzhan du phyin chu shing 'bras bu bzhin du mad// rtsa ba dang bcas med par
176a8(rgyud): 'gyur// las kyi rnam smin mtha' yis ni// de ltar rim pa bcu pa yis// zla ba 'im ni nyin nag gzhan// tshe ni nyung ngur byas nas ni// srog zad par ni shes par bya// mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i rgyud las
176b1(rgyud): ni shin tu rgyas par shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi rim pas srog zad pa rgyas par bshad pa'i ste sum cu gsum pa'o// 
176b2(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// chen po'i chen po ye shes mchog/ bsdu ba'i mkha' gro rnal 'byor mchog/ snying pos snying po'i don bsdus pa// gang phyir mkha' 'gro mas bsdus pa// de phyir
176b3(rgyud): bsdus pa'i mkha' 'gro brjod// lte ba'i dbun rtag bzhugs pa// nyi ma stong mchings pa'i 'od // kun rtog thams cad 'joms par byed// char bas phung po'i rnam rtog na// bsregs byas bar chad maud
176b4(rgyud): pa'i lus// rdo rje khams kyi rnam rtog ni// bsdus nas slar yang rang ba zhin gyis// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni/ der rjes der ni slar yang sdud// de ltar gang la phye leb bzhin// 'ching
176b5(rgyud): ba thams cad sreg par byed// rlung gis de 'od mngon sbyor bas// sngags kyi lus kyi sbyor ba yis// rnam par rtog pa tsam yang ni/ sreg pa nyid du the tsom med// mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i
176b6(rgyud): rgyad las ni// rnal 'byor mchog gi rim shes na// mkha'o 'gro ye shes rgyas par ni// rnal 'byor bsten pa rig par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las
176b7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma bsdus pa'i le'u ste sum bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis zhon// rnam rtog rlung ni rnam par gcod // nyin dang mtshan du shes par ni// brgya dang brgyad ni lhag
176b8(rgyud): par rgyu/ rlung rnams de ni rnam rtog no// gang phyir rnam par gcod pa byed// rnal 'byor de ni mchog tu zhi/ thams cad stong pa'i ngo bor byed// the tsom thog mar sbyor ba drug/ rnal 'byor rig pas mchog tu
177a1(rgyud): sgrub/ de nas dbyangs med yi ge ha// shin tu rgya che bzlas par bya// gang phyir mdud pa 'joms byed cing // bde ba skye ba ster bar byed// de yis rnam rtog zad ni// skad cig/ 
177a2(rgyud): gis ni gcod par byed/ rnal 'byor rje su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// de yi dbye ba bco brgyad kyis// dang po sbyor po bsgom par bya// bcu bdun rje su rnal 'byor sogs// 
177a3(rgyud): de las dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ni// rnal 'byor nachog la dbye ba lnga// de las kyang ni las rgyal mchog/ rnal 'byor dbye ba bcu gnyiso// de nyid dbye ba bzhi bcu drug// bsrid pa'i rim pa sngas
177a4(rgyud): pa yis mngon sum byed pa'i rnal 'byor ro// de la rdo rje bzlas rim mchog/ rdzogs rims rnal 'byor yan lag ni/ rnam par rtog pa 'joms byed pa// phra ba'i de nyid bla no med// cho ga ji be ni
177a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa// blo dang ldan pas sngon bzhin sgom// / srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par byed// rnal 'byor/ chen po ye shes che// nges par bsgoms pas yang dag ni// rnam
177a6(rgyud): rtog rlung ni 'joms par byed// rin gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa yis// dngos med ngo bo gcig pa dang // stong nying brten pa mngon par zhe na// sdom pa nges par brtan par byed// sgrub pas yang
177a7(rgyud): dag sgom byas na// rdo rje bzlas rim bla na mang // de yi rim bzhin ye shes mchog/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// rnal 'byor blo'i rgyud dpa' rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rnam
177a8(rgyud): par rtog pa'i rlung gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung shar na// gang shes rdo rje sems dpa'
177b1(rgyud): yi/ rang dngos po 'bang bzang po 'thob// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ sgom dang sgom min go 'bang bral/ 
177b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i ye shes che// gnas pa med cing dri ma med// phra ba'i cha kun dbus na gnas/ thig len da rnam par spangs// kun la khyab cig zhi ba dang // bdag byin rlabs pa'i mtshan nyid
177b3(rgyud): gcig/ mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnams las grol// bag chags rnam rtog rnam par spangs// tshigs dang mdud pa'i cha yi lam// sgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs// stong nyid ye shes
177b4(rgyud): mtshan nyid // sngags dang phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i na/ rnam pa'i spyo pa rnam par spangs// bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor gyi/ rgyud rnams la yang bklog mi bya/ rnal 'byor chen gyi
177b5(rgyud): rgyud chen po// bshang bar bya ba dam tshig mchog/ man ngag ji bzhin cho ga bzhin// 'og mo nyid du ba shra da por rigs// de yi rim pa rjes 'gro shes// bla ma brgyud pa'i
177b6(rgyud): 'bang mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rnam rtog med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas rnga
177b7(rgyud): rje can gyis gsungs// rnga rnams nub pa'i rnal 'byor ni// de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon// yul dang dbang po yang dag sbyor// rtsa rnams kyang ni 'char bar 'gyur// shar nas
177b8(rgyud): sngon bzhin song nas ni// bskyed pa'i rim pa bla na med// rnam rtog skye ba de yi phyir// brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim// de las skye dang rga dang na/ 'chi zhing slar yang ldog pa
178a1(rgyud): 'gyur// yul rnams dngos po mang yis// sbyangs pa'i ye shas de nyid phyir// de nyid de la spyod pa'i phyir// dngos su yul rnams dngos med phyir// dbang po rnams ni skye ba min// de las
178a2(rgyud): gnyis gnyis yang dag sbyor// dngos dang do yi stong pa nyid// de nas rtsa rnams nub 'gyur te/ 'khor lo'i rim pa la yang rten// de rnams bsdus pa las ni zho// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni// kun kyang
178a3(rgyud): rtsa'i 'khor lor 'gyur// de nyid kun chas nang du khyab/ stong nyid sgom pa rnal 'byor las// yul rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid// nges pa ru ni shes pa zhes// rigs pa'i rdo rjes rnam par 'joms// rnal 'byor
178a4(rgyud): chen pa'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs/ ba las rtsa rnams nub pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa/ bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// sbyor dag
178a5(rgyud): go 'phang mtshan nyid ni// ji lta ji lta ba bzhin sbyor/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i yan lag brten// rnam pa drug po de las phyed// de bzhin brgyad brgyad de las lhag brgyad gnyis brgyad phrag bzhi dang na
178a6(rgyud): de ltar grangs kyis sbyor ba gsal/ zla ba phyed pa'i cha lta bu/ stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gnas// phyed pa ma yin rdzogs pa min/ chu yi zla ba lta bur snang // sgyu ma chen po 'gro ba'i ma// thams cad
178a7(rgyud): rten pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rlung gi 'khor lo srog ces bshad// mkhas pa rnams kyi spyod yul mi ne// me yi 'khor lo stong nyid khyab// dbus na thig le lta bu ni// mi 'gyur kun tu 'gro ba dang // rang byung
178a8(rgyud): kun la khyab pa dang // bde ba yang dag 'phel bar byed// dbyangs dang gsal byed rnam par spangs// 'jig rten gsum ni lus pa// gcig tu byas na bskyed par byed// mi re shigs nA da'i go 'phang phan
178b1(rgyud): rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs// sbrul gyi lce ltar g.yo ba dang // tshangs pa la sogs pa mes dang // 'jigs pa ma yin g.yo ba min// yi ge dang ni tshig ma yin// 'byung ba'i tsho gas ni rnam par spangs// 
178b2(rgyud): grangs bral zad med skye ba med// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa// sgra tsam dri ma dang bral ba/ chags bral chags pa med pa dang // bya ba byed dang gnas med pa/ dpe
178b3(rgyud): med gnas pa med pa dang // srog dang rtsol ba rnam par spangs// lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog/ de lta bu yang rnyed par dka'// long spyod 'khor lo mchog tu gnas// 'ching ba med pa'i rnam pa mchog/ mchog tu
178b4(rgyud): khong du chud gyur pa// rnam pa kun gyis yang dag bzhugs// rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin gyis// chang gi ro yis myos pa bzhin// mchog ni dang po ma lus pa// dngos po kun gyi nang na gnas// thog ma tham
178b5(rgyud): lhag par gnas/ mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med// mchi/ na nyid thams cad rnam par spangs// zhi ba mi 'jigs brjod du med// rang bzhin nyams myong rang ngo bo// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas
178b6(rgyud): bla ma brgyad pa las ni thob// de ltar ye shes bye brag che// rang gi ngo bo rnam shes drug steng dang 'og tu yang dag sbyor// rnal myang zhes ni rab tu grags// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i
178b7(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa las 'khor lo drug sgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rje gsungs// dus kyi mtshan nyid sdom pa ni// rnal 'byor gang gis rnam par shes// 
178b8(rgyud): grangs kyi rnal 'byor bla na med// dus ni dus tshong zhes ni bshad/ bsam dang bsam bral rang dngos ni// dus bzang dang ni dus ngan dang // rnam pa gnyis la yang dag gnas// sna yi bu ga las byung nas/ 
179a1(rgyud): phyi yi sgo las rtag tu 'char// nang du sdud par dus bzang gsungs// 'byung ba yang ni dus ngan 'dod // dus ngan las ni gzhan pa mchog/ dus bzang mchog ster rang zhing ni// 
179a2(rgyud): rdzogs ldan dang ni gsum ldan dang // gnyis ldan dang ni dus bzang po// rtsod pa'i dus ni ngan pa ste// da ltar gsungs pa'i dus mtshan nyid// dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang // lhan cig skyes pa dus
179a3(rgyud): bzang ste// dga' dang bral ba ngan du so// dus kyi mtshan nyid de ltar bshad// 'jug pa dang ni gnas pa'i dus// dus bzang bar ni yongasu grags/ ldang ba yang ni dus ngan te// de ltar dus kyi mtshon nyid // 
179a4(rgyud): dus ni khams rnams thaMd de// mnyam pa ro gcig go 'phang mchog/ ye shes rnam shes rnam spangs te// dus ni gcig ni brjod pa yin// / ngos dang dngos med spros bral ba// bzhi pa'i skad cig mchu
179a5(rgyud): nyid ni// brjod brjod byed las grol ba// dus gcig zhes ni brjod// pa yin// chags dang chags bral nges grol ba/ bde ba chen po go 'phang swa// phyag rgya chen po'i don gyi gzhi// 
179a6(rgyud): dus gcig zhes ni brjod pa yin// mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med// grangs ni rnal 'byor rnam par spangs// de nyid dus su ngas bshad de// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po
179a7(rgyud): rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las dus dang dus tshad rnam par bshad pa'i le'u N+De sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i 'bras bu
179a8(rgyud): mchog nyon cig/ gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// phyag rgya chen po yang dag bsten// gsang ba sbas pa zhes ni bshad// rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes shing // bzhi pa'i dbang zhes bya 'i
179b1(rgyud): ming / zhal nas brgyud pa'i rim pa rnams// mchog tu zhi ba'i ye shes che// rnam rtog thams ca rnam par spangs// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che// rnal 'byor chen po'i don bsdus pa// rnal 'byor ma rgyud las bsgrub
179b2(rgyud): ba mchog tu rmang byung ngo bo nyid // ye shes chen po'i ro 'bebs pa// de nyid chen po'i yon tan ldan// na mkha' mchog la gnas pa'i sa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo// bde ba rnams ni 'phel bar byed// de
179b3(rgyud): ba chen po'i go 'phangs 'das// shes dang shes bya rnam par bral/ sgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs// sngags dang rgyud kyi bya bas stong // kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// dngos po kun
179b4(rgyud): gyi go 'phangs gsal// 'jig rten gsum gyi rnam pa'i mi// chadra dang chags bral rnam par spangs// dam tshig chen po la gnas pa// grangs med 'jig rten gsum gcig
179b5(rgyud): dngos/ dngos grub de kho na yi rgyud// de ltar gsang ba'i 'bras bu gsal// gzhan ni gang du'ang ma gsungs pa// rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes mchog/ rnal 'byor ma rgyud las shes bya// rnal
179b6(rgyud): 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las gsang ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// chos kyi dbyings
179b7(rgyud): kyi go 'phang mchog// chos kyi dbyings nas khyab pa'i khams// chos kyi dbyings kyis de la brjod// kun khyab mchog tu phra ba dang / kun 'gro rtag tu 'char ba dang // phung po lnga zhing 'byung ba lnga// yul
179b8(rgyud): dang skye mched rnam shes dang // de dag yang dag ldan chos kun// bshad de gsang ba'i dbang phyug skye// de dag dbus na gnas pa'i khams// khyab cing spyod yul ma yin pa// ji ltar til gyi til
180a1(rgyud): mar dang // ji ltar shing la me bzhin du// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad la// khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin// na mkha' bzhin du dri ma med// chos kun gyi ni gzhi yi mchog/ gzung
180a2(rgyud): dang 'dzin pa'i kun rtog gis// khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no// stong nyid ye shes rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor pa yis gsal bar mthong // chos dbyings b+ha ga zhes ni brjod// b+ha ga rin chen za ma tog
180a3(rgyud): gang phyir dbang phyug sogs yon tan// ldan pa de phyir b+ha ga brjod// b+ha ga chos rnamasu yang bshang // dbyings ni byang chub sems su gsungs// khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba yis// rgyu ni b+ha ga zhes byar
180a4(rgyud): bshad/ dbyings ni yang dag sbyor dngos kyis// chu zla bzhin du yang dag gnas// don dam gcig pu'i de nyid shes// lag mthil skya ru bzhag pa bzhin// mchog gi de nyid ltar ni snang // 
180a5(rgyud): rang rig shin tu dri ma med// dngos dang dngos med zad nas ni// rtag tu de nyid mthong zhing snang // chos kyi dbying ste go 'phang gsal// de ltar shi ni/ rgyas par bshang // gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas
180a6(rgyud): sbyor bral shes pa rmad du byung // rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las chos kyi dbyings kyi don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
180a7(rgyud): rdo rjes gsungs// rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ do yi don du bshad kyis nyon// ji lta ba bzhin bshad par bya// rdo rje mi phyed zhes ni gsungs// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid mchog/ rtsa lnga yi ni nam par
180a8(rgyud): rten/ rtse mo lnga yi rang ngo bo/ sa dang chu dang de bzhin ma// rlung dang na mkha' nyid dang ni// rtsa yi na mkha'i cha yi gzugs// bla ma brgyud las shes par bya// e raM laM baM yaM sa bon// brjod pa rtsa ni
180b1(rgyud): lnga rnams te// 'bang ba yis ni shes par bya// rdo rjes skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni// pad+ma lte ba'i dbus gnas pa// thig ler bshad pa 'gro ba med// dam tshig gnas ni shes pa dang // bdud rtsi mchog gis rab
180b2(rgyud): tu gang // rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa mang // de ni rdo rjer yongasu grags// me long mnyam nyid ye shes dang // so sor rtog dang bya nan tan// rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhi no// 
180b3(rgyud): de yi ngo bo yongasu shes// rdo rje rang nyid nyams myong mchog/ na mkha' cher gnas zhi ba dang // rtog pa med cing nyon mongs med// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag gzhi// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/ 
180b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rdo rje bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// rigs kyi dbye ba don bsdu
180b5(rgyud): pa/ de tshe rigs ni rnam pa lnga// rtsa ba'i rgyud du gas la bar gsungs// rnal 'byor spros pa dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshigo// rgyud du grags par dbye ba yi// mthar thug
180b6(rgyud): de ni yang dag gsungs// de nyid las ni bsdus nas kyang // rigs kyi dbye ba brgya ru gsungs// sna tshogs spros pa'i rnal 'byor/ gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes ni brjod// gang gis de yi rnam pa mthong
180b7(rgyud): sna tshogs nor bu dri bzhin no// sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis// sna tshogs nyon mongs mnan nas ni// 'gro ba'i bla mas grol ba'i phyir// gzhung nas gang
180b8(rgyud): gis de yis ni// sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo bo nyid// grangs med pa yi dbye ba yis// dbye ba grangs med sbyor ba yis// don dam rigs kyi dbye ba nyid// rgyud gzhan rnam su gsungs pa yis// sems can bas
181a1(rgyud): / ba'i bye brag gis// de ni bsdus na dbye bar 'gyur// rtsa yi 'khor lo'i rim pa yis// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de la stong phrag sum cu drug/ lus kyi rdzas dang gnas sogs kyis// 
181a2(rgyud): rim pa'i dbye ba de las kyang // stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// de rjes brgya yis mchog tu gang // bdun bcu rtsa gnyis drug cu bzhi// sum cu rtsa drug bsdus pa las// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de las kyang // sum
181a3(rgyud): cu dang ni dgu yang ngo // de las lnga dang de phyir gsum// gsum yang bsdus na gcig nyid do// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// gzhan yang gzhan du 'dres nas 'gro// de yang 'od gsal go 'phang lo
181a4(rgyud): rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che// gnyis med ye shes dri ma med// chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rigs kyi dbye ba'i don
181a5(rgyud): sdus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas brko ma ldan 'das kyis gsungs// phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med// / chos dang las dang dam tshig dang // phyag rgya chen po
181a6(rgyud): mngon par brjod// las kyi rnam smin nges pa yis// kun nas rgyas bta ba lta bur gnas// gang yang 'di ni las gang gi// de 'bras ji lta ba bzhin 'gyur// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid// 
181a7(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis ni rgyas btab nas// dam tshig rang gi yon tan dngos// rgyal sras rnams kyis rgyas btab pa// stong dang snying rje mi phyed pa// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyong ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
181a8(rgyud): dam tshig ni/ yongasu dag pa'i mdzad pa yis// de yi rang bzhin rang bzhin med// phyag rgya chen po zhes ni brjod// las kyi phyag rgya yongs shes na// sngags pa las ni thob par skye// bla mas shes rab
181b1(rgyud): dbang bskur na/ ji ltar mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rang dngos don// snying rje'i bsam pas bsal ba ni// de las nges par thob nas ni// chos nyid sgo nas nges par byed// de ltar de nyid de ye
181b2(rgyud): shes/ de ltar rnal 'byor ma mtshan nyid// dam tshig la zhen mkhas pa dang // rlung gi de nyid pha rol son// dpa ldan 'dus pa'i don bslabs pa// ngag 'jam shes rab ldan ma dang // mig yangs ma yi bu
181b3(rgyud): mo rnyed// gzugs dang lang chos rnam par rgyun// ji bzhin rnal 'byor dam tshig la// phyag rgyas lhan cig sgrub par byed// de nas de nyid thob pa na// phyag rgya chen po mtshan nyid do// de nyid bde chen go 'a'adra
181b4(rgyud): ni/ kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// stong nyid ye shes dri ma med// chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'bang gsal// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med// rigs
181b5(rgyud): dang pha rol phyin dbye bas// phyag rgya drug tu yang dag bshad// mar ma a haM dang / lha mo rnams kyi rim pa las// mchod pa'i rim pa ro gcig pa// rtag tu yang ni mchod par bya// gangs
181b6(rgyud): pa mo dang khras mkhan mo// sme sha can dang gar mkhan ma// ro bsregs mo dang bram ze mo// grub 'gyur don du rnal 'byor pas// bdag nyid rol cing gnas par bya// khrus mkhan rin chen rigs lnga
181b7(rgyud): skyes gdol pa pad+ma'i rigs las skyes// de bzhin gar mkhan las kyi rigs// ro sreg ma ni 'khor lo'i rigs// sme sha can ni rdo rje'i rigs// ye shes phyag rgya bram ze mo// rdo rje sems dpa'i
181b8(rgyud): rigasu brjod// 'di ni rigs ni drug tu 'gyur/ bram ze mo ni ma yin te// khrus mkhan mo ni sring mor brjod// gar mkhan mo ni bu mor shes// rme sha can ni chung mar grags// ro bsregs mo ni
182a1(rgyud): mna' ma ste// smug mo gdol pa ma zhes bya/ shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// rnam rtog med pas brjod par bya// gang phyir rnam rtog med gyur na// dngos grub
182a2(rgyud): kun la dus kun tu// sems ni ma ru gyur nas ni// sring mo dag tu yang dag bshang// lus ni bu mor shes par bya// srog ni chung mar rab tu gsal// mna' ma thur du sel ba'i rlung // dbu
182a3(rgyud): ma'i rlung ni sgyug mor brjod// ma ni rgyags pa'i rtsa yi cha/ sangs rgyas rin chen za ma rtog/ sring mo khu ba 'bab pa'i rtsa// spyi bo'i gnas na yang dag gnas// bu mo khrag rgyu ba yi
182a4(rgyud): rtsa/ de na phyed phyed lhag par gnas// chung ma gci na ni 'bab pa'i rtsa// de nyid kyi ni dbus na gnas// mnas mchi ma 'dzag pa'i rtsa// mgrin pa'i gan su lhag par gnas// 
182a5(rgyud): ma ni sa ru yang dag bshad// chu yi khams ni sring mor brjod// me ni bu mor shes par bya// rlung ni chung ma ra rab tu grags// mna' ma na mkha' ru ni bshang // sgyug mo
182a6(rgyud): nam mkha' chen po'o// mngar bar gyur pas na mkha' ni// sgyur ba sring mo ru ni brjod// kha ba rang gi bu mo dang // lan tshwa chung mar yongasu grags// ska ba sgyug mor shes par bya// chu ba min
182a7(rgyud): mar yongasu grags// de dag 'bad pas 'dod bya zhing // dngos grub 'dod pas bsten par bya// las kyi phyag rgya dbye ba 'di// de yi yon tan bsten pa'i mchog/ dam tshig de dang rtog
182a8(rgyud): par 'jug/ phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang zhi// ye shes mchog ni bla na med// de ltar phyag rgya'i go 'phang gsal// rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod yul lo// 
182b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las phyag rgya'i dbye ba rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang yang dag
182b2(rgyud): bshad// phung sogs skye mched mtshan nyid ni// rgyal ba rgyal ni gzugs zhes bshad// rdo rje 'dzin ni rnam shes dang / rin chen 'dzin la tshor bar gsungs// 'khor ba las
182b3(rgyud): rgal 'du shes gsungaso// shes rab 'dzin ni 'du byed dang // de ltar phung por rab tu gsungs// sa ni gti mug dga' mar bshad// de bzhin chu ni zhe sdang dga'// me ni chags
182b4(rgyud): gsal dga' ba dang // de bzhin rlung ni rdo rje da / 2// na mkha' rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi rdo rje dang // sgra ni sgra yi rdo rje ste/ dri ni dri yi rdo rje dang // 
182b5(rgyud): ni ro yi rdo rjer bshad// reg bya'i rdo rje reg byar 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// mig gnyis sa yi snying po dang // rna ba phyag na rdo rje dang // sna ni nama'i
182b6(rgyud): snying po dang // lce ni 'jig rten mgon po dang // lus ni sgrib pa rnam sel brjod// yid ni kun tu bzang po dang // rtsa ni byams pa ru ni brjod// ye shes mchog ni 'jam
182b7(rgyud): dpal zhing // khyab pa ru ni yang dag bshad// de bzhin lus kyi chos rnams ni// khro bo bcur ni yang dag bshad// de ltar lus kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs// phung po la sogs
182b8(rgyud): skye mched sogs// rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog gis ni// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las phung po la
183a1(rgyud): sogs pa dang skye mched kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phyag rgya chen po'i don mtshan nyid// rnal 'byor chen de'i 'bras bu ni/ 
183a2(rgyud): ye shes chen po'i don bsdus pa 'de ba chen po'i skal ba che// ro mchog chen po'i bdag nyid can/ sgyu ma chen mo mchog tu phra/ chen po'i chen po namapa' che// phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs ye shes// rnam rtog
183a3(rgyud): med pa'i go 'phang sten/ mi phyed rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas// rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che// na mkha' bzhin du gos pa med// rang bzhin med cing gzhi dang bral// gnyis med bdag med brjod du med// rnal 'byor rnam
183a4(rgyud): ni rang rig pa// phung po khams dang skye mched cha'i// kun rtog chos ni yo// ngasu spangs// sgom dang bsgom bya snom 'jug dang // rim pa gnyis ni rnam par spangs// rnam shes ye shes dang bral
183a5(rgyud): ba/ sngags dang bzlas brjod bsten pa spangs// dngos po kun gyi gnas las rgal// ye shes chen po rab gsol pa// dngos grub chen po 'dir shes bya// phyag rgya chen po bla na med// rnal 'byor chen po'i
183a6(rgyud): rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las phyag rgya chen po'i don rnam par nges de'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// nyams kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba ni/ 
183a7(rgyud): gang gis yongs shes rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor chen po dag shes par// gyur nas kyang ni ye shes che// de nyid rnal 'byor kan las bsgyings// ljang dang rdul dang ba sA langs// dbyangs 'gyur ba dang
183a8(rgyud): ldibs pa dang // mdog 'gyur mchi 'dzag thim pa dang // snying stobs can gyis 'di brgyad nyams// dga' ba rgyas pa'i rtse yi cha// rgyags pa'i cha yi rtsa dga' na// khong stong 'dar bar bskyed par
183b1(rgyud): byed/ rgyags pa'i chu yi rtsa sa na/ rab tu rdul byed bskyed par byed// de bzhin rgyags pas g.yengs pa'i rtsa// khong stong pa spu ldang bar byed// de bzhin na sa ra yi rtsa// khong stong tshig ni ldib par byed// 
183b2(rgyud): rus sbal chen po'i rtsa rgyas na// kha dog 'gyur ba skye bar byed// mgo bo chen po'i rtsa rgyas na// brgyal zhing sdug bsngal bcas par byed// 'ur 'ur chen po'i rtsa bye na// ba spu langs pa bskyed par byed// dga'
183b3(rgyud): ba chen po'i rtsa rgyas na// khong stong mchi ma 'dzag par byed// myos pa chen po'i rtsa byed na// srog gi rlung ni thim par byed// brgyal dang sems med bde ba che// de nas dran pa nyams par 'gyur// sgeg pa la
183b4(rgyud): sogs nyamasu shes// sngar bshad rim pa sad par byed// dzaHhUM baM hoHde bzhin du// a la la la la ho sngags// rab tu bskul bas rgyas nas su// nyams ni so so'i dbye bas shes// de ltar de ni dbye
183b5(rgyud): rgyud pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba / la rtogs pa las nyams kyi dbye ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcuHbdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gtsu
183b6(rgyud): bdag ces bya ba sgra yi rten// gang gis yang dag shes pa yis// srid pa'i 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ a haM 'khor lo'i 'ching ba dag/ nga ni yongs zang grol ba'o// a ni dngos po kun gyi mchog
183b7(rgyud): lus rnams kun la lhag par gnas// rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan// kun khyab kun mkhyen zad pa med// thogs med snying stobs zhes bya ba/ thabs cig du ni skye bar byed// sringad dang sring rtse brtse ba
183b8(rgyud): med/ sprul pa'i sku yi mchog dang ni// don kun byed pa la mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs 'byung ba'o// ha ni dngos po dang bral ba/ lus la gnas kyang lus bskyed yin// dbang po las 'das
184a1(rgyud): // mi gsal ba// rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs// dngos dang dngos med las grol zhing // gang la'ang lhag pa dang gnas pa/ dngos po thams cad nub pa dang // chos kyi sku yi ngo bo nyid/ 
184a2(rgyud): sems ni rdo rje 'chang dbugs phyung // don kun byed pa dang bral ba// stong pa'i rang bzhin mya ngan 'das// ye shes sku yi rang bzhin nyid // rjod dang brjod bya rnam par grol// de yang yi ge haM du grah+ma// thams cad
184a3(rgyud): a haM gun la khyab// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// a haM dngos po thams cad la// khyab pa'i sa ni lhag par gnas// a haM dang bral skyes bu ni// zla ba bcad pa'i shing bzhin no// haM ni dpral
184a4(rgyud): ba'i sku mtshams na// a ni lte bar yang dag gnas// 'dir ni a las zla bar bshad// 'od zer stong 'gyed pa yi haM// 'dir yong a yi ming la brten len rje du rab tu grags// 
184a5(rgyud): a ni srog gi rlung ngu bshad// de bzhin thur sel he du brjod// de gnyis gcig gyur 'khor ba ste// des na a haM zhes par grags// rnam rtog bral ba'i gnas pa ni// u haM gang du gnas pa med/ 
184a6(rgyud): gzhan ni 'ga' zhig 'di la yang // don dam par ni dmigasu med// de ltar a haM nga yis bshad// rgyud rnams kun tu rnyed par dka'// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs
184a7(rgyud): pa las a haM gi sgra'i don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// stong nyid de ba bsdus pa ni// rnal 'byor pa ni gang gis shes// stong
184a8(rgyud): nyid de ni shes par 'gyur// mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyir// stong nyid sgom par yongasu gsungs// nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams ni// kun tu rtog pa'i gnyen po dang // phyin ci log ni rnam
184b1(rgyud): dag pa/ phyi nas stong nyid du 'dod// phyi rol dmigs pa dang bral ba// nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams dang / phyi rol du yang mi rtog pa// 'dir ni sngang gi ni// stong pa nyid du yang dag bshad// snod kyi 'jig rten dang bral ba// chen/ 
184b2(rgyud): po stong pa nyid du brjod// ye shes gang gis de stong par// mthong ba de yang stong par brjod// me long ye shes rdzogs pa la// rjesu dmigs par byed phyiro// de yi mi mthun phyogs stong pa// dngos med
184b3(rgyud): stong pa nyid stong nyid// don dam par ni brdzun pa'i dngos// shes pa don dam stong pa nyid// 'dus byas sbyin pa la sogs kyi// dge ba dmigasu med pa'i phyir// rang gi rnam rtog mtshan nyid spyod// 'dus byas
184b4(rgyud): stong pa nyid du bshad// yang dag byang chub 'dus ma byas// rgyu mtshan yang ni dmigasu med// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// 'dus ma byas pa'i stong nyid gsungs// sems can don du smon
184b5(rgyud): lam sogs// rang dga' sogs pa dmigs pa med/ shin tu stong pa nyid du bshad// kun rtog thams cad rnam par spangs// / mtha' las 'das pa'i stong nyid gsungs// thog mthu
184b6(rgyud): med pa'i 'jig rten gyi// 'gro ba'i phyir ni smon lam nyid// rlom sems med par par de brjod de// thog mtha' med pa'i stong pa nyid// mya ngan 'das la dmigs pa med// dge ba'i bdag nyid mi
184b7(rgyud): stong pa// rlom sems med pa zhes bshad// dor ba med pa stong pa nyidang // 'dod chags la sogs dri ma ni// bdag ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i// de ltar rlom sems med gsungs pa// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
184b8(rgyud): du gsal// mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa// sku gzugs de yi yon tan ni// gnan rnams la yang mi dmigs pa// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid // byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams nyid// spyod
185a1(rgyud): pa la yang rlom sems med// chos rnams thams cad stong par bshad/ bdag dang skyes pa'i chos rnams ni// sgro ga tugs dngos po med pa'i mchog/ 'ching ba
185a2(rgyud): thams cad rnam par gcod// dngos med stong pa nyid du gsungs// ji ltar sngon gsungs stong pa nyid// de ltar dngos po med shes po// slar yang mi dmigs pa nyid ni// dngos po med pa stong nyid 'dong // de ltar stong
185a3(rgyud): nyid dbye ba yang // bag chags rnams kyi gnyen po'i phyir// spu yi gnyen po mi mthun phyogs// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dngal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las stong
185a4(rgyud): pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsadagu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ stong pa nyid ni skye ba'i rgyu// rnam pa med pa'i nyams myong dngos// lus rnams
185a5(rgyud): la ni khyab pa dang // phung po lnga ni rang bzhin lus// 'jo ra lo drug la khyab pa dang // chos rnams kun gyi dbus gnas phyir// ring ba ma yin zhi ba min// de ni kun rdzob dang dbyer med// stong pa nyid/ 
185a6(rgyud): ni don dam mo// rdo rje phreng ba de ltar bshang // srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid ni/ sku mdog sngon po zhal gsum pa// spyan gsum pa la phyag drug mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo nor bu g.yas// g.yon pa dril bu pad+mas
185a7(rgyud): ral gri shin tu rnon po dang // phyar ba go rims bzhin du bsnams// a li ka li las byung ba// zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs// sna tshogs pad rgyas gdan la ni// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhug
185a8(rgyud): hUM gi sa bon rdzogs pa dang // rdo rje chen po'i rigs las zung // kun rtog rnams ni bskyed pa'i rlung // rnam par gcod cing thim par byed// gnod byed de dag sel bar byed// gnyis pa thams
185b1(rgyud): cad rnam par gcod// sgyu ma chen stong pa che/ sangs rgyas sa ni rmad du byung // sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras ster ba'o// 'di yi sngags ni brjod par bya// oM dang badz+ra mA le dang // de bzhin AHdang hUM dang
185b2(rgyud): gnyis// phaT dang sA hA yang dag ldan// sngags mchog btus pa bla na med// rlung 'phrog de kho na nyid kyis// yid kyi rnam rtog sel bar byed// zhi ba'i gnas dang chu 'gram dang / shing gcig lam
185b3(rgyud): bzhi mdo dang // yang ni sum mdo 'bum phrag bcu// gsal bar yang ni bzlas par bya// de ni dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// de yi yon tan gsal bar 'byung // ni
185b4(rgyud): ba la sogs 'bang mi dgos// skad cig gcig la mngon par rtogs// de ni de nyid rigs mchog shes// dpa' bo gcig pu'i cho ga 'di// dpa' mo gcig pu nyid sgrub pa// de yi mtshan nyid sgom pa
185b5(rgyud): gang / rnam rtog spang bI rnal 'byor pa// shin tu rnam dang / na mkha'i dngos// rang gi dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las
185b6(rgyud): stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i phreng ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom rdo rjes gsungs// mtshan mo shes rab shes par bya// 'byung po thams cad thim nas 'gro
185b7(rgyud): mtshan mo'i chan zla bar 'gyur// zla ba mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid// kun rdzob dang ni don dam gyi/ shes rab rnam pa gnyis zhes bya// kun rdzob shes byar shes par bya// don dam reg bya rnam par spangs/ 
185b8(rgyud): reg bya dang bral bde ba gang // bde ba mchog de thob par dga'// nyin mo slar yang thabs su bshad// thabs ni nyin mor gyur pa dang // gang tshe dngos las skyes nyi ma// rtag tu b+ha ga'i bdag
186a1(rgyud): por 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rnam pa ni mar 'gyur// nyi ma las ni zla ba skyes// de las gnyis med ngo bo bshad// 'bar ba'i phyir ni nyi mar 'gyur// rnam par dpyad pa'i don dam dang / 
186a2(rgyud): chags bral mchog tu phra ba dang // mi snang ba dang stong pa'i lus// 'od gsal ba yi go 'phang ni// gang du yang dag mi gan so// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtog pa las
186a3(rgyud): mtshan mo nyon mo rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// A lI kA lI'i dam tshig ni// rgyud rnams gnan du ma gsungs pa'i// rgyal sras rnam
186a4(rgyud): la dgongs pa yi// 'od gsal po 'phang las skyes pa'i// snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gsal byed sum cu rtsa gsum ldan// ko lo'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o// snang ba mchod pa'i
186a5(rgyud): 'phang ni// snang ba las byung zad pa med// dbyangs ni bcu drug dang nA/ na pa// a li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o// de nyis gsang ba/ 'i sbyor ba las// dbus su skyes pa'i bde ba che// a li
186a6(rgyud): ka li'i dam tshig ces// grongs pa'i tshig gis bye brag byas// shin tu phra ba'i ye shes mchog bla ma brgyud las shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs
186a7(rgyud): pa las a li ka li rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// mtshams kyi mtshan nyid bla na med// snang dang mi snang bral ba'i mtshams// 
186a8(rgyud): shes rab rdo rje las byung ba// gnyis med 'dres pa'i dbus na gnas// 'bags shing gos pa rnam par spangs// rdo rje pad+ma 'chi med skyes// zla ba nyi ma yang dag 'dres// mthar ni yang dag mi 'gro/ 
186b1(rgyud): gang / mtshams med 'khor ba dag par byed// rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog/ phra ba'i mtshan nyid bsam mi khyab// seMn kun gyi mtshams kyi ni/ rdo rje 'chang gi btsun mo dang // 'char ba mchog tu dag/ 
186b2(rgyud): par bshad// dga' bral la sogs rnam par spangs// mdud pa'i car gnas mchog tu zhi/ tsa na ka yi tshig gu tsam// mtshan mo bdag po de shar ba// gang phyir stong gi go 'phang gnas// la la
186b3(rgyud): thig le'i rang ngo bor// rnam pa bzhi yis yang dag gnas// la lar stsogs spangs// la lar de yang dmig su med// gang phyir rang gi bdag nyid can// de phyir brjod du med pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po
186b4(rgyud): rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las mtshams kyi de 'char ba'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa do// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// rnam pa
186b5(rgyud): nyi shu'i ming tsam ni// slob dpon lasu yongasu bshad// sngags kyi rnal 'byor legs rgyas pa// sngon du sten pa sa sbyang dang // 'byung po bskad pa nyid ni// sa bzung zhing dang
186b6(rgyud): thig skud ni// spyan dang lhag par gnas pa dang // bgegs bskad de bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi/ thig ni rag tu gsal ba dang // phur bus yang dag gdab pa dang / bum pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / 
186b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi lhag gnas dang // khrus dang rab tu sbyang ba dang // mchod pa rab gnas gtor ma dang // slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang // me la sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin/ dbang bskur ba dang gshag
186b8(rgyud): su gsol// de ltar cho ga nyi sha'i las// gang gis de shes 'gro ba'i bla/ dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pas bya// bdud las bsdigs mdzub de ni mchog yo ge gsum bzlos pa la zhe na// rdo rje theg
187a1(rgyud): ba lhag par grol// zhi ba la sogs las gang gis// rtag tu lag pa'i mthil la gnas// de yi yang dag cho ga yis// cho ga mchog ni bya ba yin// rnal 'byor rje su rnal 'byor
187a2(rgyud): sogs// cho ga la sogs brtsam par bya// bgegs mthar byed pa'i snying po'i sngags// yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi mchog/ stong phrag bcu ni yongs bzla// thog mar mkhas pa ji bzhin du// bgegs
187a3(rgyud): rnams thams cad gsal ba'i phyir// sngon du bsnyen pa zhes ni bshad// de 'og yi gsum khrir ni// bsam pa kun gyis bzlas byas na// yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster// slob ma rnams kyi
187a4(rgyud): dngos grub rgyur// skye bos dben pa'i phyir bcas// sa bzung chu ni nye bar bcas// grong dang ha cang mi nye zhing // ring por yang ni brtsam mi bya// shin tu 'jam zhing srog chags med
187a5(rgyud): rgyal po'i phreng blang shin tu ring // gang khyim tshong dus las rgyang ring // yang na bde gshegs rten la ni// thog mar sor mo rnams la ni/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags dgod bya// khru gang
187a6(rgyud): sor ni bzhi pa yis// seng ldeng phur ba byas nas ni// yi ge gsum sngags chu yis bkru// yi ge brgya pa lan bdun dang // yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis brko// sa ni chu yi mthar thug pa// 
187a7(rgyud): yang na khru ni phyed dang gsum// yang ni sems kyis sbu bar bya// de la gnas pa'i 'byung po ni/ yang dag 'gror ni 'jug par bya// oM ma hA kro d+ha dz+wa lA rka/ hUM phaT mtha' da yang dag ldan// da ltar
187a8(rgyud): lag mthil sngags bkod la// 'byung po rnams ni bskrad par bya// sa la thal mo lan gsum du// brdab pa byas nas sngags bzlas te// ud gats+tsha da lan gnyis brjod// sarba b+hU ta gra
187b1(rgyud): ud gats+tsha// yi ge gsum ni mtha' ru brjod// badz+ra sa twa be bshad de// las ni thams cad bar gsungs pa'i// gtor ma byin nas 'gro ru bzhugs ni yongasu bzung rjes la// rdo rje slob dpon gyis
187b2(rgyud): brtsam bya// tsha rgo med cing ma gsal la// mnyam zhing zug rngu med pa dang // me long lta bur 'jam pa dang // mnyam pa yang ni mkhas pas bya// ba yi lci ba la sogs pa// rnam pa lnga yi byug
187b3(rgyud): par bya// byugs nas de rjes khrus byas la// slob dpon khro bo'i sku dang ni// dkyil 'khor 'jam pa'i rdo rje yis// mchog tu mi g.yo gzugs kyis ni// 'jam pa dang ni sum sgril gyis// ras
187b4(rgyud): sam yang na gso ma yis// yi ge gsum gyis rnam par sbyang / thig skud kyis ni kun nas mnyam// gru bzhi par ni byas nas kyang // rdo rje can gyis khru gsum gsum// gru bzhi par ni bzung
187b5(rgyud): bar bya// de yi dbus su lte ba'i tshe// sgrib pa'i skyon ni spang bor bya// / skra gdung dang ni rin chen bzhugs// legs par gas ngas nas byin gyis brlab// yi ge gsum yang swA hA'i
187b6(rgyud): mtha'// phaT kyi dbus su yang dag spyir// sngagaso 'di yang ni bzla sa per bya// brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag par gsal// tshangs pa'i thig ni btab nas ni// yi ge brgya pa bzla bar bya// 
187b7(rgyud): de rjes de la me tog char// sngags ni brjod nas gtor bar bya// oM dang a mo g+ha pad+mo// de bzhin du ni phyi nas su// ba su d+ha ri d+ha ra gnyis// d+ha ra Ni maN+Da li hAM// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags dang
187b8(rgyud): ni lan gsum bar du thig skud la/ zhabs bsil chu yis bsang bar bya// yi ge gsum gyis thig gdab bya// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rdo rje can gyis mtshams bzhi pa// thog ma
188a1(rgyud): shar dang byang dang ni/ ji srid lho dang nub dag dang // mtshams su yang dag thig skud dang // sngar yang yang dag gdab par bya/ shar dang lho yi mtsham dang ni// nub dang
188a2(rgyud): byang gi mtshamasu ni// thig skud kyis ni tshad gzhal bya/ zur ba ni dang ni thig skud bya// bskor thig gsum ni sgo bzhi pa// rdo rje phreng ba gsum gyis mdzes// tshangs pa'i thig gnyis btag
188a3(rgyud): nas ni// de las dbang po'i be brang ni// rnam pa kun gyis yang dag thig/ rgyal ba kun gyis bzhugs gnas gsal// de la rig pa 'dzin pa bri/ slar yang rin chen phye ma 'am// tshon sna lnga rnams me tog dang / 
188a4(rgyud): rdzas sam las kyi sbyor ba las/ rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ ma tshan ma'i phyag rgya la sogs bri// mi bskyod sku mdog phyagargya sogs// rig ni dbus su dgod par bya// rgyal ba rgyal
188a5(rgyud): dang rin chen 'chang // 'khor ba 'das dang shes rab 'chang // rim bzhin du dog dbye ba yis// shar la sogs pa'i phyogasu dgod// gti mug zhe sdang chags pa dang // rdo rje dga' sogs
188a6(rgyud): rim pa bzhin// me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnamasu// ji lta bzhin dgod par bya// sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba yi// gdan bdun gzhan gyi nyi ma gnyis// 'khor dga' zhe sdang dga' bar bcas// ka yis phreng
188a7(rgyud): gis rnam par rgyan// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// g.yon na shes rab ral gri bsnams// gzugs dang dbyibs rnams ji bzhin du// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// phyi rol
188a8(rgyud): gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// mtshams kyi char ni rnam par dbod/ shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la/ byams pa sa yi snying po shar// 'jam dpal phyag na rdo rje lhor// mkha' snying 'jig rten dang
188b1(rgyud): phyug ni// kun nas nub tu bsgom par bya// sgrib par rnam par sel ba dang / kun tu bzang po byang du song // zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// g.yon na ral gri dgod pa dang // phyag na rdo rje dri med pa'i/ Shi
188b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni gdan// lha mo rnams le zla ba'i gdan// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng na gsal// rnam par snang mdzang rigs las byung / mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la sogs dgod// shar la sogs pa'i sgo
188b3(rgyud): rnams su// gshin rje gshed la sogs pa dgod// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// de bzhin ral gri g.yon na 'dzin// mi g.yo la sogs mtshams rnamasu// gshin rje gshed kyi rang
188b4(rgyud): ngo bo// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// g.yon na ral gri rnam par bas me// gang phyir shes rab rang gzhin g.yon// de bzhin g.yon na ral gri brjod// gnod mdzes de bzhin gtsug tor ni
188b5(rgyud): 'og dang steng du rnam par dgod // khro bo rnams ni nyi mar bzhag/ sa// de bzhin sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan// de bzhin phyag rgya dbyug la sogs// nye bar mtshon nas dgod par bya// de bzhi
188b6(rgyud): gshegs pa rnam dag pa'i// ri mo lnga ni rnam par dgod// de la rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng // ra ba gnyis ni yongasu bskor// rin chen dra ba rnga ma dang // lha mo rnams kyi snam bu yis// ka brta babs 'khor
188b7(rgyud): lor mtshan/ ri dgas rnams kyi mtshan pas rgyun// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa ngan sogs// rnga yab me leng la sogs kyis// rgyan pa ru ni rnam par bshad // sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang
188b8(rgyud): ngag rten// slob dpon mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni// rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan no// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba// bgegs bskrad pas ni sngon song bas// suM b+ha'i sgra dang ni suM b+ha// thog mar
189a1(rgyud): dang ngo mtshar che// sku gnyis phaT kyi mtha' dang ldan/ shar gyi sgo ru dgod par bya// oM dang gr-i lnga gr-ih+na zhes/ hUM gnyis phaT dang yang dag ldan// blo dang ldan pas lho rung gong // oM dang / 
189a2(rgyud): gris+t+ra pa ya gnyis hUM gnyis phaT kyi mtha' dang ldan// nub tu yang dag spro bar bya// oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn+da dang bid+yA rA dza dang // hUM gnyis dang ni phaT mtha' dgod// de rjes yang ni byang du dgod// 'di yin
189a3(rgyud): gdugs pa bkug nas ni// de nas sngags pas phur pa gdab// seng sdeng las ni byas pa yis// phur bu sor ni bcu gnyis tshang // zur gsum yi ge gsum gyis mtshan// yi ge brgya pa so sor bzlas// 
189a4(rgyud): sngags kyi chu yis bsangs nas ni// phyogs dang man dmasu dgod par bya// oM dang yi ge g+ha lan gnyis// de bzhin g+ha ta ya ni gnyis// sar+b+ba duSh+TaM phaT zhes dang // de bzhin kI la ya gnyis
189a5(rgyud): dngaHsarba pA paM phaT dang ni// hUM gsum badz+ra kI la ya badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya wAg tsit+ta badz+ra dang // kI lA ya hUM phaT yi ge'i// mtha' can gyi ni phur bus gdang/ oM dang badz+ra
189a6(rgyud): mung ga ra// badz+ra kI la la A kai Ta// sa dang hUM gnyis phaT mtha' dang // sngags dang phur bus brdung ba brjod// rdo rjes bgeg ni 'jug la sogs// bskrad don rdo rje ra ba dang // steng du mnga' yi dra ba dang / 
189a7(rgyud): 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje dang // gtsug tor gning mdzes sngags kyis ni// byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ge yis// bum pa bcu 'am yang na drug/ rin chen las byas rnam dag pa// sman lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga// 
189a8(rgyud): 'bru lnga sogs kyis gang ba// rin chen lnga dang snam sogs// lo ma lnga yis rnam par rgyan// gur gum gla rtsi ga bur dang // tsan dan chu yis gang bar bya// me tog la sogs kyis mchod bya// rang
189b1(rgyud): rang sngags kyis byin gyis brlab// badz+ra d+h+r-ig dang dzi na tri ka/ rat+na d+h+r-i ka dang A ro li ka/ de bzhin pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika sngags dang // lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i 'od zer gyis// 'og min 'jig rten khams nas ni/ bum
189b2(rgyud): pa rang gis bskur byas pa// de nas spyan drangs nas ni gzhugs// de nas lha mo'i gzugs spros nas// de rjes gzhan la dgod par bya// A~M dang ru ru sU ru dang // de las dz+wa la tiSh+Tha gsal de bzhin sid+d+ha
189b3(rgyud): tsa ne/ sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+hA ne// swA hAM nos ni de la bzlas// spyan gyi rnam pa rdzogs nas ni// bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// oM dang shaM ka re dang yang // de las shAn ti ku ru dang // de bzhin g+hu ta ts+tsha
189b4(rgyud): ti dang // g+hu ti ne dang g+hu ti ne/ g+hA ta ya ni lan gnyis brjod// swA hA'i mtha' can sdug brjod bya// mA ma kI yi rnam pa rdzogs// bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// oM dang ka Te bi ka Te/ 
189b5(rgyud): ni ka Te ka Te ka Te// ka ro Ta bI r+ye swa hA// gos dka rnam par rdzogs nas ni bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// / oM dang tA re tut+tA re// tu re swA hA dgod par bya// sgrol ma'i rnam pa
189b6(rgyud): rdzogs nas ni// bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// gshin rje gshed sogs gzhan rnams la// gcig la las ni tham+ba par pa// oM na miHsa man+ta kA ya waka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ na many+dzabadz+ra
189b7(rgyud): kr-i d+ha ya/ ma hA dr-iSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya// oM a mr-i ta ku dz+ha li// kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gar+N+Ne gar+N+Na/ bi s+phoT
189b8(rgyud): ya bo s+pho Ta ya// se r+b+ba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti// dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ sngags 'di lan bdun bar du ni// las ni zad pa yin te// snying po'i sngags ni bzlas
190a1(rgyud): byas la/ rigs kyi dbang phyug mchod par bya// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis ni// lan bdun bar du bsgom par bya// brgya dang rtsa brgyad rim pa yis// yi ge gsum yang / 
190a2(rgyud): bzlas pa ni// de nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// mchod yon snod du mchod par bya// de nas du gu la ras ni/ ka pur a ga rus gdugs pa/ bkab nas rang rang sngags dang ni// de la rim bzhin lhag gan+da
190a3(rgyud): bya shal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// sprin bral namakha' lta bu'o// de lta bu yi sku mdog phyag rang snang ba yi sku la 'khyud// a li ki li las byung ba// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// gzhal
190a4(rgyud): yas khang dbus nyams dga' ba'i// 'og min zhing khams na bzhugs pa'i// dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas pa ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi las cod pan can// bsgoms nas de las 'od zer
190a5(rgyud): spoHkha dog lnga dang lug k+Shu yi// de yis sman drang slob dpon gyi sa// sngags brjod nas ni spyan drang bya// a h+ye hi dang b+ha ga bAn// sa ma ya ma nu sma ra// tiSh+Tha gnyis dang sa ma ya// de la
190a6(rgyud): a nu smar gnyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // swA hA yi mtha' lan gsum brjod// 'jam pa'i rdo rje spyan drang bya// dkyil 'khor pa dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dbusu spyan drang ba// rang gi
190a7(rgyud): gdan gyi dbye ba la// bzhugs shing yang dag mchod par bya// rang rang sngags dang rim ji bzhin// lha yi me togs kyis mchod// 'khor lo mchog ni mchod par bya// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi
190a8(rgyud): ba 'di// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin grong // yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni// dkyil 'khor mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal// thugs ni brtse bar nyer dgongs te// mgon pos mched pa 'di
190b1(rgyud): bzhes shig/ oM sar+b+ba ta ba ga ta na/ pU dzo bsta nA ya At+maT+Ta nir+yA ta yA mi// bla mas yi ge gsum brjod// lha yi rnam par byas nas nas ni// de rjes bang ba la mchod par bya/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA gaH/ 
190b2(rgyud): pU dza badz+ra swa b+ha ba/ At+ma ko h+ye zhes ni brjod// ring lha'i nga rgyal byas nas ni// ji ltar bskyed pa'i yum rnams dang // gnod byed kha na ma tho med// zhe sdang chen po'i rigs byung // dkyil 'khor dbang
190b3(rgyud): phyug mchod bya zhing // de las lha rnams lhag gnas bya// yid 'phrog sna tshogs lho yi gos// ga pur a ga ru yaus bdug sngags kyis dag byas dga' par bya// oM dang tiSh+Tha badz+ra
190b4(rgyud): brjod nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas bya'o// oM dang s+pha ra ba dz+ra hoHblo dang ldan pas sngags 'di brjod// me tog spar bas gtor nas ni// lhag gnas der gshegs par bya// rnam pa
190b5(rgyud): kun dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong ba ra bya/ rigs lnga'i rang bzhin bzang po yis// bcom lda na gzugs brnyan bsgoms nas ni// me long sogs la
190b6(rgyud): khrus bya zhing // de bzhin rdzas dang 'o ma sogs// ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang // de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol pa// de bzhin bdag gi sku khrus gsol khong pa na dbang phyug
190b7(rgyud): rdo rje sems// dbus su yi ge gsum dang spel// swA hA'i mtha' can brjod par bya// las kyi de nyid cho ga shes// de rjes sbyar ba'i gtor ma bya// oM sar+b+ba A ba ra Na/ shud+d+ha sar+b+ba pA pa~M dang
190b8(rgyud): bi shud+d+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ swA hA mtha' can sngags brjod bya// pad+ma bskor ba'i phyag rgya dang // yungs kar dkar po bsregs byas nas// nyon mongs pa ni sel bar byed// 'khyud cing bskor bas
191a1(rgyud): dor bar bya// de nas cho ga bzhin legs mchog/ sil snyan glu la sogs pa dang // bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya/ rang rang sngags dang go rims bzhin/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga
191a2(rgyud): ta/ puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha dang // sa mu dra dang s+pha ra// sa ma ya dang shri ye aH/ hUM gi sdigs ni rjes su brjod// rdzas rnams kun la rang ming ni// gzugs la sogs pa snga ma bzhin// cho ga bzhin du yang dag
191a3(rgyud): brjod// rdo rje sems dpa' legs bsgyings pa// rdo rje slob dpon cho ga shes// sngags 'di yis ni rab gnas bya// oM dang su pra tiSh+Tha dang // badz+ra swA hA'i mtha' can bzlas// yi ge gsum gyi snying po ni/ 
191a4(rgyud): sku gsung thugs la bkod nas ni/ me tog char ni dbab par bya// slob dpon slob ma'i cho ga dang bcas// klu yis yang ngag bskul nas no// sad pa na ni phyag kyang byas// las kun bdag
191a5(rgyud): nyi rnal 'byor ba dag/ gtor ma ngon kun grub par byed// las la byang shing mkhas pa dang // cho ga bzhin du bsgyings btsa/ sa dang // chang dang sna tshogs sha dang ni// de bzhin la du 'o ma dang / 
191a6(rgyud): 'bras can phye yi khur ba dang // sran khur bye ba mang po dang // mchod yon me tog sogs kyis mchod// snod bcu chu yis gang ba la'o// gsungs pa'i khro bo bcu sngags kyis// snga ma bzhin du cho ga
191a7(rgyud): yis// de dbus 'byung po kun la ni// ngo mtshar chen po'i tor ma sbyin// snga ma bzhin du cho ga yis// til bsregs bzang bas khyad par da// blo dang ldan pas sngags bzlas bya// 'di ni na kun sgrub
191a8(rgyud): byed pa// oM brah+ma de ba tA sar+b+ba// in+da da sha lo ka rak+Sha ka/ nA gau gan d+har+m+ma kuM b+hAt+sa/ yak+Sha b+hU ta ga tA/ ta tha pre ta ut+sa ta// bi shA tsa a paM sma re// DA ki ni gri he// big+h+nAM mA traM ga NAHsar+b+ba ta bI
191b1(rgyud): ga ta ag+ni ma ra gra hA/ a~M dzo d+hak+Sha ma hA ta dza/ ma nu ShA nam/ bi hi sa ka/ mu dra man+ta a d+hi d+ho b+h+yaHtsa/ gra hA nak+Sha tra ma nu Sha/ i maM ba li/ pa gr-ih+Na nU/ sid+him+me pra yats+tshan+tu me san+na/ sa t+ya ma neru
191b2(rgyud): kar me wu/ sata sa ha ya b+ha ban+d+ha tse/ d+ha na d+hA na/ su pa ra Nany+dza/ d+ha DAn+tu ma ma to shI te/ i ti u pA tra Na tro Sha Ni/ satwA nA ma na sha yan+ta tse/ thog mar au dang AHhUM phaT/ sI hA'i mtha' can las
191b3(rgyud): kun byed// de ltar sdug 'di snod la la bzlas// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par rol// slob ma lhag par gnas par byed// mtshan nyid yon tan gyis rgyan pa// tsan dan ga pur gla rtsi yi// chu yis
191b4(rgyud): kyang ni khrus byas te// dad pa'i chu ni 'chang ba yi// sems kyi dri ma rnam par khrung // bdog pa thams cad gtor bar byed// gos gtsang ba ni mchog tu bgo// khang pa brtsegs ma/ 
191b5(rgyud): byas nas ni// ras kyi yol ba kun nas bri// yi ge gsum pa yang dag ldan// rdo rje can gyis sngags chu ni// lan bdun gdong la gtor ba yis// las skyes dri ma sbyong bar byed// 
191b6(rgyud): de nas sa yi snying po sogs// mig la sogs la rnam par dgod// sor mo dbu ma gnyis kyis ni// dbang po so so la reg pas// sngags brjod bya zhing byin gyis brlob// lus kyi dkyil
191b7(rgyud): 'khor rnal 'byor gyis// oM dang tsak+Shu tsakrAHdang / sa man+ta dang tsak+ShaHbzlas// mai tI sa twa lo tsa ne/ sar+b+ba ar+the swa hA'i mtha' dang sngags 'di brjod// mthe bo gung mo yang dag sbyar/ 
191b8(rgyud): bsil chu dang mnyes nas ni// sngags de la ni gsum bzla bar bya// slob ma'i mig la so sor ni// mthe bo'i phyag rgyas reg par bya khru gang ba la sor bzhi pa'i// srung po zhags
192a1(rgyud): pa 'dra ba la// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags lan gsum// bzlas nas zhabs bsil chus bsang bya// skud pa lan gsum dkris pa ni// rdo rje gsum ni mdud par ldan// dpung pa gdon
192a2(rgyud): par bcings pa nI// sngags 'di lan gsum brjod par bya// oM dang lo tsa ne yi sgra// ya ta tAt+ta t+taM saM pra taM// maM b+ha bi Sh+ya nA yau sgra// raM dang rat+na ra yA ya// sid+d+ha na ni daR+sha dang // ya swa hA'i yaM sngags 'di ni// theg pa
192a3(rgyud): bla med lan bdun bzlas// slob ma la ni me tog gtor// de nas rdo rje 'chang gis ni// bcu gnyis gzhal ba yis// zur ni gsum du yongasu bya// yi ge gsum gyis byin rlab sgom// slob ma'i lag
192a4(rgyud): tu gtad par bya// oM dang pra ti badz+ra dang // sa man+ta dang I shwa ri/ AHhUM swA hA'i mtha' can sngags// bzlas nas slob ma sa dor bar bya// sar bab pa yi phur bu ste// phyogs ni gang du
192a5(rgyud): lta ba zhid// slob dpon dang ni slob ma yis// de yi phyogs bltas nyal bar bya/ nem nangs yang dag bla ma la/ ji ltar mthong ba'i don kun nu// de la dmigs nas spyan sreg ni// zhi ba la/ 
192a6(rgyud): sogs rab dbye bas// las ni zad pa nyid dam// bgegs zhi ba'i don du bya// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgyings bcas pas// rnal 'byor ji bzhin cho ga bzhin// sngar bzhin 'dir yang gtor ma ni// 
192a7(rgyud): bgegs rnams zhi phyir sbyin par bya// de nas gsol 'debs slob ma ni// rdo rje dpon thugs rjes khyab// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// mdun du 'dug nas phyag byas te// dga' chen khyod bdag
192a8(rgyud): ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tsha'o// dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol// sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol
192b1(rgyud): thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// de nas bla mas de la yang // bya dang mi bya gsungs pa ni// sems can las kyi srad bus bdab// rdul tshon bkye ba'i rim
192b2(rgyud): pa dgye// 'gro ba 'di dag dkyil 'khor te// rang bzhin dag pa gnyis med pa'o// thog mar dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor bdag/ rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid sgom// slob ma bdag nyid 'drar dmig
192b3(rgyud): nas/ de 'og bde rab bsgrub bya// bla ma bzang la dbang bskur phyir// slob mas de rjes gsol ba gdab// 'di nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la// nyon mongs chu srin na kras khyab// las kyi rlung gis
192b4(rgyud): dpa' glong 'khrugs// bdag bying thugs rje'i ma rgya mtshor ste// mi shes ling tog gis bsgribs mig/ nyon mongs dbang du bya ba ni// bde ba sdug bsngal 'jigs las skyob// thugs
192b5(rgyud): rje'i rgya mtshos bdag skyabs mdzod// de 'dra tshig gson rdo rje can// thugs rje'i thugs ni yongasu gang // slob ma la ni yongasu gsungs// bu khyod dus 'di nas bzung
192b6(rgyud): ste/ rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung lugs bstan// rnal 'byor mchog ni khyod kyis gzung // rdo rje sems dpa'i spyong ba'i gnas// bro khyod 'di ni bdud rtsi ste// bsrungs shig ma srungs na na
192b7(rgyud): bsreg// bsrungs na dngos grub kun grub 'gyur// nyon mongs zang sel ba'i rlung // oM dang pany+tsa a sri tra/ oM dra ka dang AHhUM za/ slob mas bdud rtsi lnga btung bya// rdo rje ye shes rmang byung
192b8(rgyud): nga'ogasang badran skyon 'gyur phyir// rdo rje slob ma la ni dbag/ dri chen dri nul sogs pa/ mtshal langs pa yi bu mo'i gos khrag dang khu bas yang dge bsgres// gu gul dang ni rnam par srin
193a1(rgyud): yi dwags me ni blangs nas su// pad+ma'i snod du bzhags nas ni// der ni zang gzhug par bya// khro bo rdo rje gsum bdag nyid// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas/ rdo rje 'chang dbang
193a2(rgyud): slob ma la// rmang byung chen po'i bdug pas bdug/ 'bab par 'gyur ba the tsom med// oM tiSh+Tha ma hA kro d+ha// de bzhin A be sha ya hUM// rnal 'byor pa yis sngags 'di brjod// slob ma la ni gsal
193a3(rgyud): bar dbab// badz+ra satwa wi ma he// Shid+ha rA dza ya did+ha ma he// de ltar sngags ni 'di yis kyang // slar yang sleb ma dbang bskur nas// rang bzhin gyis dag rang gi lus / dkyil 'khor mchog 'dim thong ba na// de bzhin partse
193a4(rgyud): dang lha mo dang // rgyal ba'i sras kyis yang dag ga ni// khro bo khyab pa'i gsang ba'i mchog// rdo rje sems dpa' rten dang ni// phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor ni// gnyis po de la bstan par bya// slar yang sdeb ma
193a5(rgyud): gsol ba gang ba// bdag dbang bskur mdzad du gsol// rnam rgyal bum pa blangs nas ni// pad+ma'i snod ni bzang po la// de yis dbus blo bzang po/ hUM rdor las byung mi bskyod sgo// rang nyid
193a6(rgyud): ye shes sa bonaH'od zer yang dag bskul bas 'byung // slar yang ye shes sems dpa' sgom// mi bskyod pa yi rnam pa mchog/ mi skyeng ngo bo de nyid kyis// rnam par shes pa'i phung po sgom// hUM slo
193a7(rgyud): ma'i mgo bor lag pa bzhag/ rdo rje slob dpon thugs rjes khyab/ oM dang ma hA sa ma ya// de bzhin IM sha ra tra dang // a b+hi ShIny+tsa mo swAhA/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a b+hi She ka sa ma ya/ shi ye A
193a8(rgyud): hUM de nas bzla// chu yi gting nas slob ma la// dbu rgyan dbang bskur do du ni// cod pan 'jig rten gsum rgyal po// sems can kun gyi don sgrub pa// snying rjes khyab pa ngas byin gyis// rdo rje sems
193b1(rgyud): dpa'i yon tan gnas/ sa bon tra las byung ba yi/ rin chen 'byung ldan pasgoms nas ni/ ri mo dar sogs bzod pan dang // slob ma'i mgo la sbyin par bya/ oM sar+b+ba ta bA ga ta/ rat+namu gra Ta s+phu dang / de/ 
193b2(rgyud): bzhin sgra dang pU dza ya/ any+dzi dang aHhUM dang // sngags 'di dag ni brjod nas ni// me tog mgo la sbyin par bya// slob ma rdo rje dbang bskur phyir// sgrar yang tha ma la gsol gdag// ye shes lnga yi rang
193b3(rgyud): bzhin dngas// rdo rje brtul zhugs ngas byin gyis// gang gis ma rig sgo nga 'byed// ye shes thob 'gyur nga yis bya// hrIHlas pad+ma rdzogs par ni// 'od dpag med du rnam par sgom// rdo rje lag pa gas
193b4(rgyud): bar sbyis/ slob ma la ni 'di skang brjod/ ngas khyod de ring dbang bskur bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de/ kun tu bzang po'i bcu la zhugs brgyan/ dngos grub bzang phyir rdo rje long / kham
193b5(rgyud): las byung ba'i ral gri 'am// don yong grub pa'i rang ngo bo// rdzogs bar lag pa g.yon pa ni/ slob ma bsgyings pa'i phyag rgya 'dzin// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dril bu smra yi
193b6(rgyud): rjes 'gror brjod// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog ni rgyal ba'i gzhi// rdo rje dril bu bzung rjes la// rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo// rang bzhin yon tan rnams kyis gang // bdag
193b7(rgyud): bo yi ni rnal 'byor 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad rang ngo bo/ slob ma'i mgon la lag bzhag ste// rdo rje can gyis ming dbang bskur// gzugs kyi phung po rnam par sbom// oM bad+ma ta bA ga / che
193b8(rgyud): mo zhes badz+ra sa tAM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi swA hA// phung po lnga yi rnam dag pa// thog mar rgu nas ming gi mthar/ dbang bskur ba ni mchog tu shes// rmang byung chen po bshad par bya// sangs rgyas lnga ni dag
194a1(rgyud): pa 'di/ dbang bskur lnga ni thob par 'gyur// ma rig pa ni gsal nas ni// ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// slob ma 'dod don sngags dbang sbyin/ 
194a2(rgyud): sngags kyi dbang bskur ye shes mchog/ ngas byin dngos grub ster bar byed// de nas yi ge drug sngags phaT/ swA hA'i mtha' can yi ge gsum// kha ni dam tshig gis bkang nas// sngags kyi sku yis
194a3(rgyud): dag pa dang / bla ma'i zhal las yang dag brjod// tha mas dngos grub sbyin bya'i phyir/ 'di ni sangs rgyas zad kyi// snying po yi ni ye shes mchog/ sangs rgyas thang bsdus pa ni// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang
194a4(rgyud): de nas slob ma spyod btul zhugs// sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis// gang gi spyod pa rnam dag pa// 'dod la thugs rje'i gtso bo yis// sems can don ni byed pa'i thabs// nga yis spyod
194a5(rgyud): pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin// de nas glegs bam dung la sos/ sa// mda' gzhu ral gri 'khor lo dang // sngon bzhi sngags kyis dag par byed// slob ma'i lag tu rim bzhin sbyin// 'di ni
194a6(rgyud): kun bzang sprod brtul zhugs// bsam pa sna tshogs rnam dag byed// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // sems na kun gyi don gyis byos// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// de bzhin d+hu Ta ra traM dang // de ltar sngag
194a7(rgyud): 'di dgong par bya// de nas lung bstan thob don du// bsam pa dang bas bla ma la// de ltar sangs rgyas rig su 'jug/ khyod kyis bdag la lung bstan gsol// don yod rdo rje zhes bya khyod// rigs
194a8(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug lung bstan bya// de nas slob ma dbugs dbyung 'dod/ bla ma'i zhal sngag nas ni skye// mgon po yang dag bdag dbugs phyung // byang chub spyod pa'i brtul zhugs brtan// de nas rdo rje
194b1(rgyud): chos gos mthar// g.yon pa'i lag pas bzung nas ni// g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin byas la// dbugs dbyung ba yi mchog bya ga/ nga yi rdo rje gsung bdag khyod// sangs rgyas kun gyi go 'phang mchog
194b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par brjod/ khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che// dang ldan yon tan 'byung gnas bdag/ bdud kyi stobs ni kun las rgyal// grong khyer mchog tu khyod zhug so// de nas slo mngon
194b3(rgyud): 'dod la// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur bya// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la stsol// de nas ye shes rdor dbang phyug/ ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer gyis// spyan drangs
194b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas lnga la sogs// lha mo'i 'khor lo rim pa shin 'byung // de yis ye shes chus bkang ba'i// bum pa bya ngag bsnams de bzhin gshegs rdo rje 'dzin dang rgyal ba rgyal// 
194b5(rgyud): rin chen 'dzin drang 'khor ba sgrol// shes rab 'chang ni rim pa bzhin// gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags la// de bzhin rdo rje dga' ma sogs// gshin rje mthar byed shes rab
194b6(rgyud): byed/ pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed// 'di yis kun nas dbang bskur bas// rdo rje slob ma rnam par bsam// dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// gsang ba
194b7(rgyud): gsum gyi gnas las byung // sangs rgyas kun gyi nga yis sbyin// de nas de bzhin gshegs lha mo// khro bo rang gi gnas dgod// 'jam dpal rnam par bsgoms nas ni// ye shes rdo rjes rnam
194b8(rgyud): par rgyan// oM dang su pra tiSh+Tha dang // badz+ra swA hA zhes ni dgo// blo bzang gyis ni sngags brjod nas// slob ma la ni me tog gtor// de nas me tog sogs kyis mchod// slob ma'i dkyil 'khor 'gro
195a1(rgyud): lo 'dra thugs rjes khyab pa'i bla ma yis// de nas slob ma rjes gnang bye de zhing shes pa'i rnal 'byor bas// mi bya ba ni ci yang med/ dpa' chen khyod kyis bka' drin gyis// da ni 'dod
195a2(rgyud): yon lnga la spyod// sgyu ma rmi lam 'drar shes nas// rten 'brel byung chos rnams ni// gzugs brnyan lta bur shes nas ni// sems can don ni mnyam med byos// bya ba byas pa'i slob ma ni// ci bde bar
195a3(rgyud): ni sgrub par bgyis// de nas bla ma la yon dbul// bstod cing kun nas phyag kyang byas/ skye bo bzang dang lhan cig tu// de nas bla ma gsang don gnyer// thur du kha bltas kha sbyar te/ ji ltar bdag nyid chen
195a4(rgyud): po khyod/ bdag kyang de 'dra bar mdzod// de nas rigs lnga las byung ba'i las dang chos sogs dbye ba yi// sngags kyi theg pas lhag par grol// skal ldan bud mod phyag rgyar bshad// skye
195a5(rgyud): bos dben pa'i mtshan byed na// ro yi gzhi yi gnas song nas thugs rje chen pos khyab pa yi// rdo rje slong dpon yon tan// 'byung // de ltar ji ltar rnyed phyag rgya// snyoms 'jug lani
195a6(rgyud): gang byung ba'i// bla na med pa'i rang bzhin gyi// sangs rgyas thaMd 'dus pa ni// rnal 'byor ma yi yang dag ltung // kun rdzob byang chub seMs gang yin// gsung ba de yi dbang bskur bya// 'di de sangs
195a7(rgyud): rgyas zad kyi// dam tshig chen po rnam byung ba// khams lnga las byung bcud kyis len// bde ba chen pos myang bar gyis// slob ma rtog pa dang bral bas// pad+ma la gnas de myang gyis// 'das pa'i
195a8(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang ba yis// rgyal sras ji ltar dbang bskur bya// byang chub sems kyi chu yis ni// bu khyod de bzhin dbang bsku bya de nas shes rab dbang bskur phyir// bla mas don 'dod slob ma la// dngos
