195b1(rgyud): grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/ bdag la khyed kyis dbang bskur stsol// de nas slob dpon bdag nyid che// phyag rgya yang dag byin gyis rlob/ mchog ni thob par bya ba'i phyir// de log slob ma la ni spyan/ 
195b2(rgyud): lha mo phyag rgya chen po 'di// dpag med bde ba rab ster be/ bu yis kun nas blangs nas ni// bla na med pa'i mchod pa gyis// de nas shes rab ye shes de'i// sgrub pa'i mchog tu 'dod pa'i dom
195b3(rgyud): lha mo'i ye shes de nyid mchog/ dngos grub don du nga yis sbyin// lha mos de la bka' bsgo ba// dpa' bo'i bu ni bla na med// dpa' bo khyod ni sgro 'am ci// byang chub sems ni za nus sam// yang
195b4(rgyud): ngag de ni nges par ni// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du smos// ji ltar gsungs pa'i dam tshig mchog lha mo ci phyir bdag mi nus// dede nas lha mo de dgyes nas// sra bkrol gos ni bor nas
195b5(rgyud): kyang // pad+ma dag ni 'byed byed cing // badz+ra mo k+Sha ho zhes gsung sa// b+ha ga'i pad+ma'i dbus gnas pa// bde ba kun tu rgyu ba'i 6// sor mos bskul nas dga' bar bya// dzi hAs kyang ni
195b6(rgyud): rol bar bya/ lhan cig skyes pa'i bde byed pa// 'di nyid rig pa bzang bsten na/ mchog tu dga' bas nyams myeng nas/ lhung ba'i bde bas de myang bya// de nas bcom ldan ma ngegyes nas/ dz+nyAn+tu
195b7(rgyud): mo k+Sha'i sngags gsungs zhing // rkang pa g.yon pa mgo la bzhag/ bka' yis de nyid yang dag bstan// de rang phan chad bu khyod kyis// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// rmi lam bzhin du sen/ 
195b8(rgyud): gyi bla na med pa'i don byos shig/ bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa yi// 'di la man ngag la mi shes// rig pa 'di ni dor byas nas// thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya/ brtul zhugs rnams
196a1(rgyud): kyi mchog gi rlig ma'i brtul zhugs bu yis spyod// de ltar 'di ni byang chub mchog/ rdo rje rnal khyor khyem/ rim pa bzhin du yongs shes bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i go
196a2(rgyud): 'phang brten// bdag la go 'phang mchog sul lags// ting 'dzin kun gyis 'bras bu gsal se ni kun la ci 'dod par// dngos grub bla na med par gsol// slar yang gshegs par mdzad pa'i
196a3(rgyud): phyir/ rang gi gnas gshegs badz+ra muH// de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin// 'khor lo lhag par 'byung ba'i rim// u tsiSh+Ta k+She tra ba la// a ti tsakra u tsiny+tsa/ su b+ho nA bi ba gnyis// khAk+Sha gnyis
196a4(rgyud): dang sar+b+ba dang // sid+d+hi pra yats+tsha med dang // oM sngon AHhUM phaT/ su hA// de yi rjes la brjod par bya// rdo rje dril bu 'chang 'gyu rab// g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas// kham
196a5(rgyud): gsum rnam rgyal rang bzhin dang // rdo rje slob dpon rang bzhin/ ni// khams gsum rnam rgyal rang bzhin 'chang // de ltar rmo/ gnyi shu las// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid
196a6(rgyud): bstan// de nyid mang du shes pa yis// bla ma dge ba'i las bzang po// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las cho ga nyi shu pa'i las rgyas pa'i le'u ste
196a7(rgyud): lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba// de yi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu ni// las ni cho ga nyi shur bshad// dbang phyug chen po'i rgyu mtshan ci// de yi 'bras bu ci zhig
196a8(rgyud): 'gyur/ chen po'i chen po ji skad gsungs// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje gsungs// las kyi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu dang // sngon du bsnyen pa'i las kyis ni// rgyu mtshan 'jig rten dngos grub brgyad
196b1(rgyud): ser sna la sogs bsal ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnam sgom zhing // sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsal gtan rab tu rdzogs// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur gyis// 
196b2(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// gsang ba la sogs la gnas pa// skye bo chags pa'i rgyu mtshan// kun tu spyod pa'i chos rnams kyis// mnyam nyid ye shes rgyu yis ni// bla ma dad pas man
196b3(rgyud): pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang don// chu sogs ming ni mthar thug pa// ye shes lnga yi rnam dag phyir// spyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i mtha'// sems can bsam pa rnam dag phyir// shes
196b4(rgyud): rab brtul zhugaso kyi mtha'// dpe yis bde ba bstan pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor sa tshon phra rab dang // mtshungs pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun// mchod pa nyid du 'gyur
196b5(rgyud): ba dang // de ltar 'bras bu 'khor lo 'jug/ sangs rgyas zad mchod pa ni// las kyi sgrib pa dag par 'gyur// shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// dbang bskur ba ni thob
196b6(rgyud): pa dang // dngos po'i ngo bo ji bzhin du// shes par ye shes kyis ni thob// bla ma yis ni sgrub pa dang // mchod pa de yi go 'phang mchog/ de ltar yun mi ring por 'thob// dag po'i spyod pa
196b7(rgyud): brtul zhugs mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las cho ga nyi shu pa'i rgyu mtshan dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// 
196b8(rgyud): de nas rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// mchod pa'i cho ga bla na med// gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// lus la mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim// rdo shing sa dang gser gyi ni// sku gzugs/ 
197a1(rgyud): la ni phyag mi bya// rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang // rab gnas nam yang mi bya'o// dri chen rdor chu dkon mchog sogs// bdag nyid lnga ni rtag tu mchod/ 
197a2(rgyud): de phyir de mngon nugs pa'o// thugs kyi rdo rje rang nyid gtso// sems de yang ni de dngos med// gang phyir stong nyid mtshan nyid ni// stong nyid kyang ni rnam pa med// de phyir thang rnamapa' 'a
197a3(rgyud): deltar rnam dge rnas shes bya/ rba ni gsum la'ang mchod par bya// gang phyir sems kyi rang bzhin kun// sems las gzhan pa yong ma yin/ rang nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dang / 
197a4(rgyud): sems kyi rang bzhin la ni gnas// lha yi gzugs ni bla med pa// sems ma gtogs pa gzhan ni med// de phyir/ de ltar rnam dpyod pa// rang lus gcig pu rtag tu/ 
197a5(rgyud): mchod// rigs lnga dag tu rtag spyod pas// rigs gcig tu ni rnam par rtag/ 'dod dang mi 'dod dbye ba dang // btu/ nga dang mi btung rnam par spangs// rnal 'byor skal
197a6(rgyud): yod skal med ces// nam yang smyo bar mi bya'o// phyag rgya'i rnam pa sngon po sogs// de bzhin gzugs la 'ang dbye ba gsum// gzugs rdo rje ma bkug nas su// sa snying la
197a7(rgyud): ni dbul bar bya// yang dag klu dang brjod bral dbyangs// de bzhin sgra la'ang dbye ba gsum// sgra rdo rje ma yang dag dgug/ phyag na rdo rje la ni dbul// ga pur a ga dza ti
197a8(rgyud): sogs// de bzhin dri yang dbye ba gsum// dri rdo rje ma yang dag dgug/ na mkha'i snying po la yang dbul// 'o byed pa dang 'jib pa dang // ro drug de bzhin dbye ba gsum// 
197b1(rgyud): rdo rje ro ma yang dag dgug/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la ni dbul// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyor// gos dang 'khyud pa'i dbye ba gsum/ reg bya rdo rje yang dag dgug sgrib sel la ni dbul bar
197b2(rgyud): byaHphyi yi chos rnams 'di dag kun// brtags pa dang ni ma brtags pa 'am// chos dbyings rdo rje yang dag dgug 'jam pa'i rdo rje la ni dbul// de bzhi ni phyi dang nang dang ni/ gnyis ka yang
197b3(rgyud): nimi dmigs pa// gzugs la gsum du byas nas ni// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// yul ni lnga ni nges gnas te// rgyud lngar nges par 'byung ba ni// rmi lam rlung dang ldan pa ru// 'dod pa
197b4(rgyud): lnga rnams spyad par byed// dbang po gang dang gang lam gyis/ sgrub pa po ni yul 'thob bo// de dag thams cad bugs rje che// mnyes pa'i phyir ni dbul bar bya// yang ngag dag
197b5(rgyud): ba'i me tog gos// rdo rje nyi ma pad+ma 'byung / me tog bdag nyid la mchod pa// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ rnam rtog tshu la yul ma yin zhing // de ltar gtuma'i me yis ni// des
197b6(rgyud): par bsregs pa de ni spos// thugs kyi rdo rje la ni dbul// rdo rje pad+ma yang ga par// zhugs pa la sogs rim las zung // rnal 'byor pa yi mi shigs sgra// thugs rdo rje la dbul bar bya// yi
197b7(rgyud): ge hUM las yang dag byung // sngags kyi 'od zer shin tu gsal/ mar med 'bar ba'i yang ngag 'ong // thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya// bde ba chen po rnam par gnas// byang chub sems ni sang pa dang
197b8(rgyud): de nyid kyis kyang byugs pa ni// thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya// 'dir ni gang dang gang long spyod// dbang po zad yang dag brten// de dag zang thugs rdo rje// bza' ba'i snad du mchod par bya// dgod
198a1(rgyud): dang sgeg dang rtse 'jo ni// sna tshogs kyis ni sems dga' byed// rnam par thar pa'i sgo ngag dang // thugs kyi rdo rje la ni dbul// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyungad dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mtha
198a2(rgyud): par rtogs pa las nang gi bdag nyid mchod pa'i cho ga'i rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ lha mo yi ni mtshan zhing mchog rnal 'byor ba
198a3(rgyud): la rtogs pa rnams// rtsa dbye ba yi rang bzhin gyis// rtag tu lus kyi rtse 'jo bya// de yi lha rnams su ni bshad// rtag tu bde ba kun gyis dga'// kun nas rnam par sgeg pa'i lus// bde ba chen
198a4(rgyud): pos kun tu khyab// lha nyid du ni yang dag brjod// dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang // bral ba lhan cig skyes skad cig/ 'char ba dang ni rtse 'jo dang // kun nas lhag par sgeg pa dang / 
198a5(rgyud): brgyal dang sad par gyur pa dang // de rnams lha mo ru ni ba shad// phyi rol du ni byung ba na// gang phyir yang dag sbyor bar 'gyur// lus kyi rtsa rnams yang dag sad// de phyir rnal
198a6(rgyud): 'byor mar ni bshad// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las lha mo'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes
198a7(rgyud): gsungs// e baM zhes bya yi ge gnyis/ e ni stong pa nyid du bshad // de bzhin pa ni thugs rje dang // thig le de gnyis sbyor las byung // don rnal 'byor rmad mchog byung // e baM gnyis ni
198a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang // mdor bsdus chos kyi phyag rgya'o// rgyal po chen po phyag rgya gnyis/ rgyud rnamasu ni thog mar gsungaso// a ni b+ha ga'i mtshan nyid do// pad+ma'i rten du shes par bya// rten pa/ 
198b1(rgyud): rdo rje zhes ni gsungs// bstan pa rdo rje 'chang ba yi// de la gnas pa'i thig le'i gzugs// sna tshogs sprul pa ston par byed// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// e ni/ 
198b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i mkha' dbyings sam// b+ha ga chos 'byung pad+ma la// rnal 'byor seng ger gdan la bzhugs// mchog tu rmang byung ston par mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' bo rdo rje// rdo rje 'jigs byed dbang
198b3(rgyud): byug dang // he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo// dang po sangs rgyas la sogs sa mtshan// e baM de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya// gnyisu med pa'i bde mchog dang // stong nyid snying rje dbyer mang med dang // 
198b4(rgyud): gang la de nyid mngon par mngon par brjod// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu// gnyis med ye shes mtshan ma ni// rgyud kun gyi ni gleng gzhir gsungs// rgyud kun gyi ni don bsdus pa// stong nyid
198b5(rgyud): snying rje mi byed pa/ gang la de nyid mngon par brjod// e baM zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis/ gang la 'di nyid med pa ni// de la de kho na nyid med// gang la de nyid longs shes pa// be sgo ma'i gser
198b6(rgyud): ltar gsal por ni// rlung ni legs bshad de nyid shes// sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas par// de ltar 'di ni de nyid mchog e ba don ni rnam par des/ chos kyi phyag rgya yi ge gnyis// dang po'i ngag tu yang dag pa
198b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon rtogs pa las oM baM zhes bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad pa dang rgyu mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad
198b8(rgyud): kyis nyon// e baM la sogs don rgyas pa/ gang gis yang dag yongasu shes// chos kyi de ni yang dag rtogs// e e ni shwa ra ba dam pa ste// 'dod chags bral sogs skad cig bdag/ srid pa gsum
199a1(rgyud): na yongs shes pa// 'di ni rtsa bar rnam par bstan// ba/ 'od ma sbreng ba ltar mdzes shing // chags la sogs pa rab bskyed ldan/ snang ba gsal ba rnam par shes// ming ni thabs shes
199a2(rgyud): bya ba yin// ma rig chen rang nyid rtsa ba ste// ma rig pa ni bzlog pa yin// ma rig pa las 'di 'byung bas// de bas snang ba 'byung ba'o// yA 'gro ba rnam shes gsum dang pa'o// de ming snang
199a3(rgyud): ba gsal ba ste// de ni stong pa cher 'gyur la// de yang 'od gsal bar 'gro'o// shru/ snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid can// gang 'di rnam shes gsum thob pa/ sems can khams ni me lus
199a4(rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin rtsa ba 'di yin no// ti/ de ni re re'i don snang ba// rlung gis blangs nas 'dzin byed pa// laM rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam shes ni// kun tu 'gro la gnas par 'gyur// e 'di ni rlung
199a5(rgyud): khams chen po ste// rnam shes gsum gyi bzhon pa yin// de yin// de yis rang bzhin dag tu ni/ ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur// ka/ sra ba'i sa khams chu nyid dang // de bzhin
199a6(rgyud): me dang rlung dag ni// rnam par shes par blangs nas su// srid gsum gon su skye bar 'gyur// smi 'di na phung po lnga rnams su// 'byung ba 'dus byas mtshan nyid ni// gzugs tshor 'du
199a7(rgyud): shes 'du byed dang // rnam shes nyid ni lnga pa'o// sa/ mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba sgrub pa nyid dang ni// me long dang ni chos kyi dbyings// 'di ni ye shes lnga po yin// ma
199a8(rgyud): yid kyi skye mched nyid dang ni// mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang // sna dang lce dang lus rnams te/ 'di ni skye mched rnams 'byung ba'o// ye/ gang yang khams gsum sems can rnams
199b1(rgyud): srog dang stsol ba la brten pa// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlos bzhin du// mi shes bsam gtan klog pa spangs// b+ha/ 'di las rang bzhin chags pa dang // chags med la sogs par yang / 
199b2(rgyud): 'gyur// de las dge dang mi dge'i las// de las skye ba 'byung ba yin// ga/ 'gro ba 'byung ba'i phung po rnams// sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid de// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga zhes// 
199b3(rgyud): ming gis rab tu bskul ba yin/ bAn+da rlung dang chu dang me dang sa// spyan la sogs pa bzhi po ste// ye shes bdag nyid can gsum du// shes bya sangs rgyas byang chub ster// sa/ zang
199b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur// phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab ci // mig la sogs pa'i bdag nyid der// sa snying la sogs rgyal sras so// rba / rol pas dga' ba gang
199b5(rgyud): yin pa'i// khro bo'i rgyal po stobs chen rnams// de yi phyogs ma tshams ngo bo ru// dpung pa yan lag rnamasu brtag/ ta de dang de yi rigs las byung // lha dang lha
199b6(rgyud): mo tha dad pa// de ni yong min de dag kyang // 'gro ba'i don phyir ston pa yin/ thA 'di las gnyis med mthong ba yi// rnal 'byor pa ni ye shes gsum// mthong phyir dman dang bar ma
199b7(rgyud): dang dam pa'i yul la bzhag par bya/ ga/ dbang po rang nyid rang yul la// 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang de// dbang po'i spyod yul gang dang gang // de dang de snang tsam nyid do// ta/ dbang po de yis
199b8(rgyud): lam nas ni// sgrub pa pos ni yul thob pa// de bzhin de las ma gsungs par// tshim par bya phyir dbul bar bya// kA sku gsum dag ni tha dad par// skyob pa yis ni yang dag bstan/ 
200a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i rim gyis sbyor ba yis// gcig tu yang ni 'gyur ba yin// ya/ gang zhig sangs rgyas sku mtshan nyid// kun rdzob bden par gsungs pa ni// de nyid rdzogs rims sbyor yis
200a2(rgyud): 'od gsal bA ri rnam dag 'gyur// / bAka/ tshig gi lam gyi yul 'di nyid// gtso bo ye shes ska rang bzhin// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// 'ja' tshon bzhin du snang ba yin// tsita/ sems
200a3(rgyud): dang sems byung ma rig pa// shes rab thabs dang nye thob dang // stong dang shin tu stong pa dang // stong chen zhes kyang rab tu brjod// tang rang bzhin snang spyi bye shes na// de nas spong pa rab tu g+ha/ 
200a4(rgyud): las kyi lus ni yongs spangs nas// rdo rje sku nyid thob rabang 'gyur// hri/ thugs la 'jig rten pa rnams kyi// don spyo de bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs// kun rdzob du ni sbrul skur gnas/ 
200a5(rgyud): ji ltar ji ltar 'dod pa spyod// da/ yid bzhin no/ bu mchog bzhin du// 'dod pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi phun tshogs kyang // stobs kyis blangs
200a6(rgyud): nas spong par 'gyur// yang rnal 'byor dbang po gang yang 'dod// de ni sgrib pa med par bya// mnyam par ma gzhag rnal 'byor gyis// rtag tu mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur// ba/ rdo rje pad+mo
200a7(rgyud): mnyam sbya ra bas// ye shes gsum gyi cha rig pa blo la gos dang ma gos pa// der ni bde bas rtag tu gnas// dzu/ sgra ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// dngos dag kun las rnam par rol// sang+yas
200a8(rgyud): mdzad po byed bzhin du// gtan la phab pa'i gzhi la gnas// yod rnal 'byor lhag pa'i rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor chen po rang nyid 'gyur// rdo rje can dang mkha' 'gro ma// gang yang na
200b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor de rang nyid// ljin dgag pa dag kyang byed pas na// bya dang bya min rnam spangs te// pad+ma la ni 'dam gyis bzhin// ngo bo nyid zhes gos mi 'gyur// b+ha yon tan brgyad dang nyer ldan
200b2(rgyud): pas// sems can thams cad rigs 'gyur zhing // 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par// bdag nyid ye shes lus kyis spong // ga gtso bo gang du spong ba yi// de yi khyim ni nam mkha'
200b3(rgyud): nyid bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// de nyid du ni rtag tu rol// lu/ 'di la snang ba dbye ba la// thun mtshams nyin mo mtshan mo yi// 'jig rten tha snyad byas pa yis// ye shes gsuM
200b4(rgyud): ni mthong phyiraro// gi sna tshogs pa yi tha snyad dang / 'jig rten pas ni yongs brtags pa// lan gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis// ye shes gsum las 'byung ba'o// 
200b5(rgyud): skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa dang // srid pa 'ang mar gnas pa ste/ ji snyed 'jig rten gyis brtags pa// sems kyi rlung ni rnam 'phru'o// hA/ rgod dang rtse mo byed pa
200b6(rgyud): da / gar gyi rnams dgur ldan pa dang // sngags dang phyag rgya rnam rtog pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa'o// / bdag byin rlabs chen ma gtogs pa/ rin chen gzhan dag 'dzin
200b7(rgyud): med/ me yis sbyangs pa'i nor bu bzhin// rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam pa'o// 'di skad la sogs dang po'i ngag/ mchog tu gsungs pa'i don rgyas pa// gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i
200b8(rgyud): mdo de nyid bshad pa bsdus pa ni/ rim pa ji lta ba bzhin shes// sgrub po'i de nyid shes pa ni// ye shes mchog gi mtshan nyid kyis// gang du gsal bar ma gsung so// rim
201a1(rgyud): pa 'di yis rnal 'byor pas// dpal ldan 'dus pa rgyas btab pa// de ltar rim pa 'di yis shes// seMn kun la phan bskyed pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon
201a2(rgyud): par rtogs pa las// e baM mA yA zhes bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg mchog nang
201a3(rgyud): du rgyu ba'i 'byung ba rnams// gang gis thim par gyur pa dang // rnam rtog bag chags sa bon ni/ phung po lnga yi bud shing dang // rnal 'byor ye shes chen po'i mes// rtag tu sbyin sreg
201a4(rgyud): rmad zung bya// lte dbus gnas pa'i sgra tsam ni// sgra tsam phyir rol gsang pad+ma// de la rang rgyud rlung gis ni// yongasu bskul ba'i me yis ni// dbang po gnyis ni yang
201a5(rgyud): dag sbyor// gzi brjid gsal bar rab tu 'bar/ gang tshe mar gang gsang pad+ma// de la 'di na snod du badz+re da/ ha ni blugs gzar zhes byar gsungs// rdo rje nga gang gzar
201a6(rgyud): du ni brjod// b+ha ga za' khung zhes ni bshang / dbang po lnga yi sreg rdzas dang // phung po yam shing du ni gyur// mer ni byang chub semasu bshang // gnam stong nas brtsams nyir bar// ji srid byed
201a7(rgyud): pa gshegasu gsol// me thab thig le tsam du gsungs// blugs gzar nam yang mi 'pho ba// sangs rgyas gti mug dga' la sogs// gzugs rdo rje sogs rgyal sras rnams// khro bo'i
201a8(rgyud): rgyal po bcu la ni// rtag tu sbyin sreg gi tshim bya// rdo rje sems dpa' mchod pa gang // de yang dgang blugasu ni brjod// hUM phaT yang dag ldan sngags kyis// cho ga bzhin du sreg
201b1(rgyud): blugs dbul// de yis lus gnas mnas 'gyur na/ lha yi dam tshig bla na med// yid la ji ltar 'dod pa rnams// de ltar dngos grub stsal nas ni// sbyin sreg 'di mchog tu gsu
201b2(rgyud): dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bu stsol// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg gi le n+do ste drug cu tham pa'o// 
201b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza'i ba ni// dngos grub kun byed de nyid mchog/ ji ltar rigs pa'i rim pa bzhin// rnam snang ma dang mi bskyod dang // don yod grub dang
201b4(rgyud): 'od dpag med// rin chen rgyal mtshan lnga po ni/ bdud rtsi lnga yi mtshan nyid do// khrag ni rin chen dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems ni 'od dpago med// de bzhin don yod
201b5(rgyud): grub pa sha/ mi bskyod de bzhin rdo rje chu/ dri chen rnams nga mdzad du bshad// de dag bdud rtsi lnga ni mchog/ bas mtha' nyams dga' skye bos dben// sgra yi tsher ma rnam par
201b6(rgyud): spangs// de la khang dbye ba ni// khang banyis brtsag sgo dang bcas// sa 'og khang pa gcig bya zhing // gzhan dag de yi steng du bya// gzhan ni gsangs nas bya ba ste// 'jig rten pa ni gcig tu
201b7(rgyud): shes/ sgrub pos do nyid kun shes shing // sngags shes bsam pa rgya che ba// brtan zhing snying rje mkhas pa dang // yul la phra dog rnam par spangs// sgrub po gtso bo'i yon tan gang // de lta bu
201b8(rgyud): nyid sgrub grogs mchog chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs// brtson zhing brkam chag med pa dang // khro med dang bcas dpa' ba dang // ming du thos shing yod par blta// thogs
202a1(rgyud): gnyis ka yo ni lus/ 'bras bu sogs kyis ngag bya ba// gnod mdzes bskul byed 'bum phrag gcig de rjes sngags pas bzla bar bya/ oM suM b+ha ni mu b+hA n+du ts+tsha phaT/ ma gra
202a2(rgyud): gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza hUM hUM phaT/ de nas zla gcig yi ge gsum/ sgrub pos mi smra bzlas par bya// kun tu bzang po 'gro ba'i gtso// 
202a3(rgyud): de ni skad cig rmi lam mthong // des ni bka' yis bsgo ba ni// ka nA mchog ni rten gyis la// sems can don ni mtshungs med byos// ji ltar de nyid rdo rje 'chang // bu mo skal ldan mig yangs ma// gzu
202a4(rgyud): dang lang chos rnam par rgyan// brkam chags med cing chags bcas sems// sgeg pas myos shing bsgyings dang bcas// nu rgyas sngo bsangs nyams dga' ba// rnam rtog med cing mang
202a5(rgyud): du thos// sgrub pos de srid 'dod par bya// ji srid khu ba dang bcas gyur// de nas gdong ni pad+ma gnyis// gnyis ka 'byung ba blangs nas ni// pad+ma'i snod der bzhag par bya// mtshan
202a6(rgyud): nyid bzang por zhag bdun du// glang po rta khyi ba lang mi// dpyid zla tha chungs gnyis ka shar// skye gnas nas ni blangs nas ni// de bzhin de ru rim pa bzhin// pad snod de nyid la ni der// zhag bcu
202a7(rgyud): bar du bzhag par bya/ nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// yi ge gsum ni sngags bzlas bya// 'du 'dri med cing dben pa'i gnas// tsan dan bzang po byugs nas ni// dzaHhUM baM hoHyi sngags
202a8(rgyud): bkod pa'i// pad+mo'i snod la bzhag par bya// ra yi 'o ma til gyi mar// mar dang li kha dkar po dang / cha ba skams bskol ba byas nas ni// de dang lhan cig snod bzhag bsre// rgya shug tshig
202b1(rgyud): gu chad tsam gyis// khro dang ldan pas ril bu bya// grib ma la ni bdam byas nas// rim gyis bskyed cing bza' bar bya/ rdo rje ming sring spun dang ni/ rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'// zla ba gci
202b2(rgyud): nas de nas lhag/ mdza' bo rnams dang yang dag bsgo// mar ngo'i tshes brgyad tshes bcu 'am// yang na bcu bzhi nas brtsams te// de la gtor ma bya ba ni// las kun la ni bla na med// de las
202b3(rgyud): kyang ni dngos grub skye// phyag rgya chen po mngon rdzogs dang // dngos grub rgyas dang zhi ba sogs// de yi 'bad mi dgos par thob// rlung gi de nyid yang dag slob// mkha' spyod nyid ni thob par
202b4(rgyud): 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng bar mngon par rtogs pa las bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste dul cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang
202b5(rgyud): bshad kyis nyon// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga mchog/ gang gis mchod pa las byung ba/ rgyas sras rnams kyi dngo sa grub mchog/ rnal 'byor che dang lhan cig tu sgrub
202b6(rgyud): pa'i phyir ni yang dag gnas// phyag rgya brda ni yongs shes shing // de dang dam tshig la ni 'jug/ de rnams tshogs ni rab mchog dang // tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes ni brjod// kun kyang ma
202b7(rgyud): tshig la gnas pa// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs// bla ma la dad dam tshig gnas// gtong sogs yon tan rnams kyis rgyan// thabs shes bya ba bgegs med na/ tshogs kyi 'khor
202b8(rgyud): lo la ni 'jug/ gzhan du skyon ni 'byung 'gyur te// 'khor lo la yang 'grub mi 'gyur// shes rab kyang ni thabs dang mtshungs/ mdza' bo bzang dang su mkhas/ lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lon/ 
203a1(rgyud): lhag pa yongasu spangs nas ni// thabs dang so sor shes rab dang // kun la gcig ni phan yon med// thog ma yid 'ong rnams dga' bar/ me tog gi ni dkyil 'khor
203a2(rgyud): bya/ de nyid sna tshogs mchod pa ni// legs par mnyam par gzhag nas mchod// gtso bo dngos po kun gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du mchod// tshogs kyi mchod pa byas rjes
203a3(rgyud): la/ dkyil 'khor lugs 'byung lugs bzlog pas// dad pa dngos pos kun nas ni// mnyam pas blta bas bsgoms nas ni// bstan bcos nyam myong 'jig rten dang // 'gal ba
203a4(rgyud): de ni gzhag mi bya// gzhan yang bstan bcos las gsungs pa// ma rkye na ni dgug par bya// slob dpon mgon la yang dag mchod/ ji ltar gdan stengs bzhugs gsol nas
203a5(rgyud): gdan ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya chen po ya/ nga dag ldan// rdo rje slob dpon de nyid kyang // mkhyen pa 'jo/ re lo'i dbus na bzhugs// dkyil 'khor pa ni gzhan rnams da
203a6(rgyud): de bzhin 'khor lo gnas pa bzhag/ dkyil 'khor pa bzhin shes par bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lor gtam smra dang // rtsod dang de bzhin sgrub pa dang // mchil snabs dor zhing dgod pa dang
203a7(rgyud): rkang pa la sogs skyong ba dang // yang dang yang du ldang ba ni// de la dus kun du mi la/ phyag rgya brda'i tshogs rnams kyis// bya zhing bya shes par bya// shes bzhin du ni gar dang glu// tshogs
203a8(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor du mau bya// gtso bo la ni snod kyi mchog/ dum bu gcig pa mtshan nyid bzang // de med du bu gsum pa la// me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod// lha yi chang la sogs
203b1(rgyud): ba gang legs par mnyam par gzhag ste dbul/ tshogs rnams la yangs so sor snod / me tog tshogs kyis yongs gang ba// thog mar gtor ma chen po sbyin// sngon bzhin bzang ba la sogs
203b2(rgyud): ldan// gang gis dga' ba rnams nyams pa// de 'dra btung bar mi bya'o// yang dang yang du phyag byas nas/ phyag rgya bcings nas btung bar bya// de nas bza' bzang ni// sbyang bya sogs kyis yang
203b3(rgyud): dag sbyang // oM dang AHdang hUM gis ni// sbyang dang sang dang rtog par bya// gur gum can ngan dpa' bo dang // gangs dang ri dwags lte ba dang // 'di ni dag byed bdud rtsi lnga// bza' ba 'di rnams rab tu
203b4(rgyud): spyod/ sbom po ming med sbyor ba yis// dpa' bo rnal 'a byor ma rim bzhin// gang gis lce rtses myang bar bya// pad+ma'i dbus su dus kun tu// kha la sems ni rnam par bkod// 
203b5(rgyud): na med pa'i mchod pa bya// pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus la ni/ dpa' bo rnams kyi gdan du brjod// dpa' bo'i don gyis mtshan nyid rnams// gal te dpa' bo mi shes na// dngos grub
203b6(rgyud): thams cad gsol ba yi// 'khor lo de yi 'bras bu med// de lta'i rim pa cung zad gang // phyi nang bdag nyid yang dag spyod// de cis yang dag dngos grub 'gyur// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i
203b7(rgyud): 'bras bu ster// rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig 'dres// rab tu bshad kyis de nyan cig/ gdug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma 'ga' zhig sems rtogs pa yi phyir 'ongs nas// de la tshe smra ba yA
203b8(rgyud): sgrub pa pos ni mi bya zhing / tshig tsam gyis kyang lan mi gangab/ bde bar 'ongs sam phyag rgya bya// de la cung zad bya smra gang // slob dpon rang nyid kyis ni bya// yang na byab zad kyi/ las
204a1(rgyud): kyi rdo rje yang dag spyad// gang phyir gang nyid rdo rje sems// las kyi rdo rje gnan 'ga' med/ sna tshogs kyi ni rnal 'byor ma// yang dang yang du dgug par bya// de la g.yo
204a2(rgyud): ba'i spyod pa med// slob dpon dpa' bo bzhin du spyod// gang yang skyon gyi spyod pa ni/ de yi lus ni ltung bar 'gyur// shin tu dga' ba yang dag skyes// bka' bsgo gar gyi spyod pa bya// rdo rje bcings ba
204a3(rgyud): de yang bya/ lha rnams ji ltar mnos pa zhing // ma'am sring mo bu mo 'am// gal te mchod par 'dod pa na/ shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// rtog pa med par bstan par bya// rab mchog de yi dngos
204a4(rgyud): grub ni/ thob par 'di la betsom med// lhag ma ga tor ma blangs nas ni// dgon pa chen por song nas dor/ sISh+ma k+She tra pA lA ya swA swA// sngags brjod bya// gal te del ra
204a5(rgyud): byed pa'i// rnal 'byor ma ni slar yang mthong // de ltar de ni yongs shes nas// rnal 'byor pa yi mtshan nyid mchog/ gang gi gdong ni 'bar ba'i 'od // zlum zhing 'jam la mdzes pa
204a6(rgyud): dang / smin ma ring ba de shes bya// 'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung // de la pad+ma'i phyag rgya bstan// rus sbal phyag rgya lan yin no// mchu slo mig dkyus ring ba dang // kha dog ser po yid
204a7(rgyud): 'phrog pa// 'di yi dpal bar yi ge gsum// ji srid skra mtshams bar du gnas// g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyis ni// 'dzum dag la ni rtag tu nyan// 'di 'dra' mkha' 'gro mthong na ni// mdung
204a8(rgyud): gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa dang // de yi bar phyed rab tu ston// g.yon pas yongasu bskor nas ni// phyag rgya lan gyis bstan par bya// sna tshogs pa yi gos la
204b1(rgyud): 'ang dga'// rin chen 'byung ldan rigs las byung // kha dog gnag cing gos kyang gnag/ skra ni 'khyil cing dar gyis bcings// nga pral bar gzhu yi rnam pa yis// de 'dra'i mtshan ma mthong
204b2(rgyud): nas ni/ rtag tu de ni sems g.yo ba/ ma mo zhes ni rab tu grags// dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya// de yi g.yon pas phyag rgya ston// mi bskyong rigs las byung bar shes// mtshan mo'i sa nas 'gro
204b3(rgyud): ba'i mchog/ zung ngu lho sbom kha dog dkar// byin pa sdom zhing shin tu mdzes// sa spyod mar ni shes par bya// dung gi phyag rgya lan yin no// rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung // mig yangs
204b4(rgyud): rdzi ma sdug pa dang // yan lag kun la baspus rgyan/ sngo bsangs mig ni dmar ba dang // yan lag phra zhing dpung pa ring // de ni mkha' 'gro ma ru grags// don yod grub pa'i rigs
204b5(rgyud): las byung // de 'dra ba yi rab mthong nas// kha ngan gyi ni phyag rgya dang // g.yon pa'i phyag rgya'i lan yin no// de lta ra 'bad pas shes nas ni// mkhas pas mtshan mo song nas ni// de
204b6(rgyud): la cung zhig 'jigs mi bya// gang phyir de nyid gang mchod bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang // rnal 'byor ma
204b7(rgyud): dang 'dres pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyin/ gsang ba'i tshig gi bshang pa dang // rdo rje'i gnas sogs gnas rnams su// rigs dran
204b8(rgyud): las byung rnal 'byor ma// mtshan mo 'du ba'i dam tshig ni// 'di 'dra ba yi tshig rnams dang // de lta bu yi gsang ba ni/ bshad kyis ngang pa'i sems kyis zhe na/ saM bo ta ka chang 'thung ba
205a1(rgyud): bi re sha ru mngon par brjod// na li ni ba taM thod dang // ku laM laM mi'i rus pa'i rgyan// / kun du raM 'dod yang dag sbyor// tsa ro ro drug bza' ba'o// saM pu taM dbang po gnyis
205a2(rgyud): sbyor ba/ a li gang yod pa yi ming // shang rim ge kaM skal yod shes// tsi tra kaM ni skal med shes/ ru sha ra ni zhu bar shes// mu ga ma dam tho rtsir brjod// tsan dra ma ni khrag tu ba shang // ga naM ba shang
205a3(rgyud): blor yongs su grags// gA naM sha chen du ni bshad// ni dzad du ra ru brjod// b+ha ha na ni chu ru bshad// bak+Sha yan lag rab tu bshad// shu baM bzang po zhes ni brjod// ho ni tshim pa zhes ni grags// marga
205a4(rgyud): lhogs pa ru ni brjod// g+h+ri tal du bshad pa dang // byom ga na pha rol dpung // ka mA ya ni gyis shig brjod// na ga raM ni bdag lus brjod// pa ta ka ni nyos shes brjod// a dza yan
205a5(rgyud): me zhes brjod/ sha khaM za ba zhes ni brjod// ra gam 'dor ni cho ga brjod// sha ta kaM mi bza' bar brjod// ci 'dra ba ni sngags zhes brjod// sha raM khyi 'tshed sha zhes brjod// raM pa
205a6(rgyud): ka ni bla mar ba shad// ka ya 'dir ni rgyul rigs brjod// ra gaM rje rigs zhes ni bshad// be raM rgya ni dmangs rigs brjod// tsa baM rigs ngan zhes ni brjod// sha raM sme sha can du brjod// zla ba
205a7(rgyud): tsakr-i ko la lpags mkhan// khang ko ma ro sreg ma ru bshad// sa man tra ni rgyal por brjod// mi raM ma'i ring du brjod/ b+ha ra ha gang zhes ni bshad// bam+ma phag ces brjod par bya/ pa laM sha ninya
205a8(rgyud): zhes brjod// de na ma ra skyes bu ni bshad// nag tu sbyin sreg tu ni bshad// ma rta a hA 'dab chags brjed// hi ra phyu ni me tog brjod// sha drul l-i ni spos su bshad// mA la ti ni dri ru
205b1(rgyud): ba shang/ sha ku ni ka mar mer ba shad// ka shi ka ni gos su ba shang // ke sa ra ni gdong du brjod// bai traM dpral ba zhesu ba shang // ma la smin mar yang dag grags// ko ba la yaM ni mig
205b2(rgyud): tu shes// a da ra ni sngo ru brjod// bal la bo ni mchu ru shes// pa sha mgrin pa ru ni grags// hUM so brag pa ru ni bshad// a gu ro ni dpung bar brjod// so so ru ni lag par bshang / shri ba
205b3(rgyud): le ni nu mar brjod// rje ti pha laM rkang par brjod// dal na ni lte bar brjod// pad+ma rnga lim gsang ba'i gnas// ka taM ba ka~M barma gnyis/ khe saM rje ngar du ni ba shang // nA ga na ni rkang par brjod
205b4(rgyud): ba ra a ka ke sa ra// sen mo zhes ni yang dag bshang/ pad+ma gar ni ga ni snang / sha kra ku su laM mal stan// shagra tu bu shes bya bar brjid// na la ni nA la ston med// go bag
205b5(rgyud): bla lam thams cad brjod/ sa ga raM ni rgas par bsha // a laM ro ni zhim por brjod// a k+Sha raM rim mizhim bshad// mri gaM mi smra bar ni beshad// pa go la mu da
205b6(rgyud): klu len// mi tra ga ra zhes bya bar brjod/ shap+ta tshul 'chos su ni bshad// s+phar sha zhags par rab tu grags// rangs sgeg mo yi ro 'bebs ma// ru po ri yi rtse mo'o// tra ne ha ni bsang
205b7(rgyud): bar bshad// pA rA pa ta 'chi bar brjod// ta ma lA ko se ma yul// pha la grong khyer du ni brjod// phri na grong du bshad pa yin// bya n+ya srog ces bya bar bshad// ku ru tar mkhas
205b8(rgyud): bar ba shad// na ye ne ni rnam shes brjod// a b+hi na pa dgod par bshad// ru d+hi ra ni 'tshang bar brjod// ku mu ra ni nyin mor ba shad// kan nya mtshan mor rab tu grags// nga sa
206a1(rgyud): nyim phyed dub da// dpe mtshan gyi cha ru grags/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyung dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las gsang ba'i tshig bshad nga'i le ru ste drug cu
206a2(rgyud): gsum pa'o// / de nas gnan yang bshad kyis nyon/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// sku ni mgo bor gnas pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis byang sems 'bab// de ni so sor rab bya bas// 
206a3(rgyud): yi 'khor lo ru zhes bya// yi ge phyi mo'i dbye ba yi gsung la gnas par rab tu shes// chags sogs bag chagasas dbye ba yis// thugs kyi 'khor lo ru ni shes// sku gsung thugs kyi bshad pa ni/ 
206a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po khyod can cig// rdo rje slob dpon lus 'di la// rgyal ba'i sku ni rim bzhin gnas// rang po sU yi/ rdo rje ni// gzugs phung la ni yang dge bzhugs// de rjes rnam la
206a5(rgyud): ni tshor ba yi ni phung por bshugs/ bcom ldan gsu nga gi rdo rje ni/ 'du shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs// las rnams kyi ni rdo rje ni/ 'du byed kyi ni phung por bzhugs/ bcom ldan thugs kyi rdo
206a6(rgyud): ni rnam shes phung por yang dge bzhugs// yang 'di'i sha sogs sa khams la// bcom ldan 'das yum spyan bzhug so// khrag sogs chu yi khams la ni// bcom ldan 'das yum mA ma bzhugs// dro ba la
206a7(rgyud): sogs me khams la// bcom ldan 'das yum gos dku bzhugs// mi bskyod la sogs rlung khams la// bcom ldan 'das yum sgrol ma bzhugs// de mig dbang po gnyis la ni// de bzhin gshegs pa
206a8(rgyud): bsnying go / de yi rna pa'i dbang gnyis la/ bde gshegs phyag na rdo rje'o// de yi sna bug gnyis la ni// de bzhin gshegs pa nam kha'i mdzod/ de li lce yi dbang la bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten
206b1(rgyud): dbang / de yi yid kyi dbang po la// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs bzhugs// khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni// lus shes bya bar brtags pa la// sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa
206b2(rgyud): de bzhug so// lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad la// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'o// lag pa g.yas pa'i rtsa bar ni// de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed// lag pa g.yon pa'i rtsa bar ni// de bzhin ga
206b3(rgyud): ba gzhan mi thub// kha yi pad+mar bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa rta mgrin no// gsang ba'i gnasu gzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil// dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhi
206b4(rgyud): gshegs pa mi g.yo ba// dpung pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal/ dbus mo g.yas par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyug pa sngo// dbus mo g.yon pa
206b5(rgyud): bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs po che// rang gi mgo stengs bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor los bsgyur// rkang pa'i 'og tu bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin ga
206b6(rgyud): ba gnod mdzes te/ lus ni 'di nyid kun la 'dir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs// sku yi dkyil 'khor zhes brjod pa// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbye ba yis// 
206b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus 'di// lus pa med pa sangs rgyas sku// skye ba 'di la rnal 'byor pa/ mya ngan 'das pa myur du 'thob/ khyod kyi dge ba yongs sbyin pa/ de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyi// lus la rgyal po thams
206b8(rgyud): cang bshugs/ mthong na don ni yod pa kye/ phyi ma'i dus na sems dpa' tshe/ de bas sems can zad kyi/ lha yi mchod pa'i yo byad kyis// rab tu 'thang de bla ma bsten// de nas mthong ba don yod bcas/ byang chub sems
207a1(rgyud): dpar grags pa che// dga' zhing mgu bas phyag byas te// bcom ldan 'das la mchi ma thags// gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhugs// legaso bya ba byin nas ni// bcom ldan 'das
207a2(rgyud): kyis 'di skad gsungs/ a A i I u U dang // re rA la l-I e e// oM oM a~M aHdbyangs zhes bya// ka tsa Ta ta ba sde tshan// ya ra la wa sha Shas// hu dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes// ngag kun rab tu
207a3(rgyud): spro dang ldan// 'dod chags la sogs bag chags kyang // grangs ni nyi shu brgyad kyis// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor legs rgyas pa/ dpal mchog las ni shes par bya// de ltar 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ rdo rje
207a4(rgyud): gsum ni dam tshig mchog/ mchog rmad byung rgyas pa ni// sgrub pa'i dbang pos yang dag shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'gro
207a5(rgyud): bshad pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas// bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dang // bla ma ston pa slob dpon dang // rdo rje 'chang dang slob ma
207a6(rgyud): yis mtshan nyid thod bsdus pa ni// dri med sems ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// chos ni ngag tu yang dag gsungs// sku ni dge 'dun zhes bya ste// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi gnas// sangs rgyas yi ge
207a7(rgyud): hU du bshad// gsungs ni yi ge AHru brjod// dge 'dun zhes bya yi ge oM// kun nas 'phro ba'i bdag nyid do// sangs rgyasra a ba d+hA tIr 'gyur// chos kyang la la na ru brjod// dge 'dun ra sa nA ru
207a8(rgyud): brjod// 'di ni gsum po'i mtshan nyid do// gzugs med khams ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// gzugs kyi khams ni chos dang ni// 'dod khams de bzhin dge 'dun te// de ltar khams gsum mtshan nyid
207b1(rgyud): mchog/ snying por gyur pa rang srogs las// khams gsum na ni gzhan med de// sgyu ma rlung gi khams gsum pa// rmi lam rmi lam bzhin du mthong // khams gsum bdag nyid de bzhin
207b2(rgyud): du/ gcig pur myur ba mthong bar 'gyur// byin gyis brlobs nas de bzhin nyid// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// dam pa'i chos dang chos kyi sku// da
207b3(rgyud): 'dun sprul pa'i skur ni 'gyur// de ni sku gsung bdag nyid can/ snang ba sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs// chos ni snang ba thob pa'o// dge 'dun snang ba mched par 'gyur// de ni snang ba gsum mtshan nyid// zhi
207b4(rgyud): ba la sogs las la byang // sngags dang rnal 'byor cha rnam sa shes// cho ga nyi shu bya ba bslabs// de ni bla mar mngon pa dar brjod// tshul khrims dag cing sbyin pa gtong // bzod dang
207b5(rgyud): brtson 'grus mchog tu ldan// nyin dang mtshan du sgom la zhen/ shes rab ldan zhing bzo la mkhas// bla ma'i spyir ni yon tan tshogs// dang ldan slob dpon zhes ni brjod// nang gi
207b6(rgyud): gsang 'dus la rab dga'// phyi rol nyan thos la spyod pa// de lta'i man ngag rim pa yis// slob ma rnams la rjes su bslab// de ni ston par yongasu gsungs// de skad smras pa de bzhin byed// rtogs pa
207b7(rgyud): rnams dang dkyil 'khor tshogs/ dam pa'i don gyis bya ba dang // slar yang snang ba gsum dang ni// rnal 'byor mchog gi spyod pa la// slob cing gzhan yang slob tu 'jug/ de ni slob dpon zhes bya'o// 
207b8(rgyud): de nyid bcu ni yongs shes nas// dkyil 'khor la sogs bya ba shes// slob ma rjes sdud nus pa dang // gsang ba'i dbang ni bskur ba dang // shes rab ji snyed yang dag ldan/ rgyud kyi man ngag la mi
208a1(rgyud): 'jigs// zab cing rgya cher yang dag ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa mchog char gcod pan 'dogs pa la ma bas// de ni rdo rje 'chang du bshad// dad cing bla ma la yang gus/ 
208a2(rgyud): rtag tu dge ba'i las la gnas// gnyis med sgyu yang med pa dang // rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs// lung ni mang du thos pa dang // gsod pa dang ni 'tshe ba spangs// sems can rnams ni 'don pa'i blos// kun
208a3(rgyud): tu brtson dang yang dag ldan// de la sogs pa'i yang dag ldan// dad pa chen por spro ba ma bcwa// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// gang la de ni nges shes bya// gong na med pa'i spyod rab mchog/ sngags dang rnal 'phyor
208a4(rgyud): raM ba sogs// yes lnga ni rnam dag dang //  rgya lnga ni rang de bzhin nyid// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis// snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang // chos dang long spyod sprul pa dang // sku gsum rnar
208a5(rgyud): sgom pa dang // bde chen yon tan mtshan nyid ni/ dag ba la sogs dbye ba dang // de bzhin sgeg sogs nyams dang ni/ rnal 'byor rje su rnal 'byor dang // shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor/ 
208a6(rgyud): che/ dang po sbyor mdor bsdus pas// de bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog/ las kyi rgyal po rnal 'byor mchog/ 'drug dang gnas dang ldang ba ni// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang // bde
208a7(rgyud): gnyis dbugs 'byung gnyis la sogs// gang la rgyas bshad de nyid rgyud// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du brjod// yon tan ji lta bu yi rgyud// thos sogs yon tan mchog gi ni// rten dang
208a8(rgyud): snod ces bya bar gsungs// mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyan pa dang // ji ltar seng ge'i 'o ma ni// sa yi snod du bzhag mi bya// de bzhin rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud// snod min dag la sbyin mi bya/ 
208b1(rgyud): slob ma skad cig de la 'chi// 'di dang pha rol du ni phung // snod min man ngag rab bshad na// slob dpon dngos grub nyams par 'gyur// rnal 'byol chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa/ 
208b2(rgyud): las sangs rgyas dang dam pa'i chos dang dge 'dun la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig rgyas pa'i le'u ste drub cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ slob ma'i bya ba'i
208b3(rgyud): spyod pa ni// zhi ba la sogs bya ba yang // sngags dang rnal 'byor rim pa yi// lham dang gdug dang gtsug ti ra dang // so rtsi la sogs myang ba dang // snabs kyi gong bu mchil ma sogs// 'dor zhing
208b4(rgyud): rkang pa skyong ba dang // gzhan du blta dang spyi btol smra// nor gyis snyems dang ngar 'dzin dang // rgyan la sogs pa blta ba dang // / bag med par ni smra ba dang // bla ma'i grib ma 'gom pa dang // de
208b5(rgyud): la sogs pa skyon gyi tshogs// bla ma'i mdun du rnam par spangs// 'jigs pas thal mo sbyar nas ni// spyi bor phyag rgya bka' lung nod// rab bdog kun gtong dam bcas pas// 
208b6(rgyud): ngo mtshar bcas shing gdong smad pas// slob mas bla ma'i mdun gnas bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod no// bla ma'i mdun du slob ma rnams// de lta bu sogs spyod zhes bya// dam tshig sdom
208b7(rgyud): ba sngar bshad pa// de rnams slob ma'i spyod pa'o// de yi ni sogs bya ba ni// bla mas bstan par bya ba'i rigs// de la mdor bsdus bshad par bya// thun mong cho ga'i mtshan nyid ni// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa
208b8(rgyud): gnyis// zla ba yar gyi ngo la bya/ dbang dang mngon spyod kyi ni las// zla ba mar gyi ngo la brtsams// byang du kha bltas zhi ba la// de bzhin rgyas pa shar du blta// drag po'i las la lho phyogasu// dbang
209a1(rgyud): gi las la nub du blta// gsod pa nyid la me yi phyogs// sdang bar bya la bden bral du// gnas nas bskrad la rlung gi phyogs// rengs pa la ni dbang ldan phyogs// zhi ba'i
209a2(rgyud): dog dkar po ste/ rgyas pa la ni ser po bya// dbang dang dgug pa la ni dmar// kha dog nag po gsod pa la'o// byams pa'i sems kyis zhi ba la/ dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa la// chags
209a3(rgyud): ba'i sems kyis dbang dag la// khro ba'i sems kyis gsod pa'o// zhi la phal cher zo rangs bya// de bzhin rgyas par snga dro bya// dbang dang mngon spyod dag gi las// nyi ma gung dang mtshan byed
209a4(rgyud): la'o// de ltar rigs par yang dag bshad/ sngags kyi/ rgyud gsungs mtshan nyid kyis// zhi ba la sogs dngos grub brgyad// blo ldan tshi ga bzhin du smra ba// rnal 'byor chen pos
209a5(rgyud): rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las slo mi'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bstan pa ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// 
209a6(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// khro bo bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gang gis rnal 'byor dngos grub bshad// thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// khro ba'i sems kyi bzlas pa ni// khro bo'i
209a7(rgyud): bzlas pa zhes ni brjod// yang na khro bo'i rgyal po rnams// sngags bzlas pa yi sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i bzlas pa de shes bya// dngos grub brgyad kyi 'bras bu sgrol// 'jig su rung ba'i
209a8(rgyud): dur khrod du// 'jigs pa 'jigs par byed pa'i gnas// skyes bu thod pa khrag gis gos// rma med pa yi mtshan nyid blangs// skyes bu'i khu ba zla mtshan dang // bsres nas bri bar bya ba
209b1(rgyud): ni/ de na bsgrub bya'i rnam pa dang // gsal dang 'jigs pa sreg pa dang // g.yon brkyang ba yis mnan nas ni// zhag bdun par du dus gsum du// gshin rje gshed kyi sngags 'dis ni// dngos
209b2(rgyud): grub rgyur ni bzlas par bya/ na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAgra tsit+ta badz+ra trAM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ta da ma ka/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu bA sha hasta/ dar ga bA ma ta ra tsa ni haSh+Ta/ tsa tur mu kha/ tsa tu
209b3(rgyud): b+hu dza/ Sha Ta tsa ra Na/ a gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sarba duSh+Ta pra NA a pa hA ri Ne/ ma hA bir+N+Na g+hA ha ka bi kri ta A naM/ sar+b+ba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra/ aT Ta aT hA sa nA di ni Sh+yA g+h+ra tsar+b+ba ni bA sa na ku ru ku ru/ sar+b+ba
209b4(rgyud): kar+m+ma Na/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ sarba ma nau tAM/ b+hin+da b+hiny+dza/ pa ra mri dranra/ A/ rA ya A keR+Sha ya/ sar+b+ba b+hU tAM/ ma tha ma tha/ ni ma tha ni rmAH// sar+b+ba puSh+TA ne/ pra be she yi/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye/ be ba shwa ta/ 
209b5(rgyud): dzIShi ta an+ta ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ nA sa na/ da hud ha/ byAts+tshapaH/ mA bi lam+ba mA bi li gas ma ya ma nu s+phA ra/ hwAt+ma/ tardza ya/ She ga na/ phaT phaT/ s+phoT ya s+pho Ta ya/ ka ra
209b6(rgyud): kA ra/ sar+b+ba A na na bI ra pU rA ya/ hi si b+ha ga hr-i/ kin+ti rA ya si ma/ na maHsar+b+ba at+ma ne sa twa ya hUM phaT swA hA// thog mar khro ba'i bzlas pa 'di// dbang du bya dang dgug pa mchog/ bskra
209b7(rgyud): par rab tu bshad par bya// khro bo gnyis pa'i bzlas pa yang // skye che lan tshwa yungs mar dang // dug dang da du rA khu ba// bsdigs mdzub khrag dang bsres nas su// dur khrod ras dang
209b8(rgyud): bya ba ni/ zla ba phyed pa lta bu mchog/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// logs gnyis rdo rjes mtshan par bya// da dbus sgrub pa'i ming bris la/ g.yon brkyang bar ni gnas nas ni// sngags
210a1(rgyud): ni yongasu bzla bar bya// sngar bzhin bsgrub bya'i ming bkug nas// mtshan phyed kyi ni dus su ni kun nas nag bdun par du bya// bskrad par yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// na maHsa man+takA/ 
210a2(rgyud): ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra dzA/ na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ ma hA daMSh+To ta ke Te b+hai ra ba ya/ a si mu sa la/ pa ra shra pAM sha hastA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuSh+NI li/ kha khe khA hi lA hi/ tiSh+ThASh+Ta/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ phan ha na/ da had
210a3(rgyud): / gar+dz+dza gar+b+ha/ swai Te s+phoT/ bi s+pho Ta yai bi s+pho Ta ye/ bar+b+ba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kA na/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI bi ti an+ta ki ra ya hU phaT swA hA/ sngags 'dis gdug pa'i sems can no// bskrang ba'i
210a4(rgyud): don du byis pa yin// zhi ba'i las ni bshad bya ba// gzhan gyis mi thub ming dang ni// khro bo gsum pa bzla nas ni// ma dang sbrul sogs zhi bar byed// lag pa gnyis la nyi ma gnyis
210a5(rgyud): de la hUM gnyis bsgom par bya// bsgrub bya'i mgo la lag gnyis kyis// brabs la de la zhugs nas ni// bsgrub byi snre la de gnyis kyis// 'byung po sreg par bsam par
210a6(rgyud): bya/ me dang 'byung po 'jigs bying pa'o// 'di yi sngags ni bshad bar bya// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA kA tsit+ta badz+ra tAM/ oM oM pa rA dwi rI tri re ti rI dzi hUM phaT// che ge mo 'byung po'i gdon lnga
210a7(rgyud): grol bar mdzad cig/ d+haHdug sel ba'i sngags kyis ni// bzhi pa bshad kyis de nyon cig/ khro bo rta mgrin bzlas pas ni/ yang dag mi mtshungs pa yo mchog/ bsgrub bya sems dpa' su
210a8(rgyud): rtseg sgom// snying khar zlas gnas ye shes sems/ de yi 'od zer gyis rab gang // bsgrub bya'i lus pamachog tu bsam// rab tu 'bar ba de yis dug/ de nas lag g.yas bsam pa ni// zla ba
210b1(rgyud): gis rnam par rgyun// kha dog dkar por sor mor dgod// de ltar sgrub pa po la bya// hUM d+hI NI k+ShI sA d+ha dgod/ las rnams kun ni 'grub par byed// bsgrub bya'i mgo bo nas brtsams te/ rkang pa'i
210b2(rgyud): mtha' yi bar du sbom// chu rgyun 'chad pa ri// drug ni 'og btang rim pa yis// 'dir ni sngags 'di bzlas bya te// rta mgrin gyi/ mngon par brjod// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+re twA/ oM hUM hU hU/ 
210b3(rgyud): ta ru la bi ru la/ sar+b+ba bi Sha g+hA ta ka ta ka dz+wa li ti be s+phu li ka/ aT Ta hA sa nA da sa hi tA// ka sa ri ho pa taM ad de badz+ra 'u ra g+ha ta na// tse ta ba su drA ta la ni shwa sa ru ta uta k+Shi p+ta ra Ni d+ha ra/ bi Sha na
210b4(rgyud): aT+TA hA sa a ba ra mi ta wa la be rA kra ma Ir+ya ga b+hi ti/ bud d+ha bud d+ha ha ya gri ba kha kha ts+tshi na da n+tin da/ A be sha ya/ sar+b+ba gra he 'u/ a pra ti ha ho b+ha we/ badz+ra dmany+dza kiny+tsi rA ya si i daM duSh+mA
210b5(rgyud): gra hi daMny+tsa/ sa r+b+baM bA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha mar da mar da/ bud+d+ha d+ham+ba ra d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+he a nu dz+nyA na kar+yaM ku ru swA hA/ che ge mo'i dug la sogs pa sel bar mdzod
210b6(rgyud): cig hUM zhes bya ba dang sngags spel lo// rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs te/ lhag ma rgyas par shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las khro bo'i
210b7(rgyud): bzlas pa dang zhi ba la sogs dngos grub brgyad kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi
210b8(rgyud): ye shes mchog/ dngos grub la sogs mtshan nyid ni// sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal sgrib pa sel ba dang // byams pa lnga po 'di dag dang // yi ge gsum dang rnam par spel// mig dang
211a1(rgyud): rna ba yid dang lus// rtsa'i 'khor lo byin gyis brlab// mtshan gsum nyin mo de dang 'dra// mngon shes lnga nyid thob par byed// bzhi pa yis ni dbang bskur bas// blo ldan de ni
211a2(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur/ snang ba mtshan mo'i cha ru 'gyur// nyin mo snang ba mched pa'o// mtshams ni snang ba thob pa'o// de ltar snang la sogs mtshan nyid// mtshan min mtshams dang nyin mo min// kun
211a3(rgyud): rtog rlung ni spong bar byed de ni skad cig mngon byang chub// mtshan nyid skad cig mar ni brjod tha mar 'byung dang thog mar 'byung ba 'am// dbus min 'byung ba'ang dbus su 'byung ba 'am// mtha'
211a4(rgyud): min 'thung ba'ang mthar ni 'byung ba 'am// de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs/ gang du 'gro ba dang ni 'od med/ cing // brang med 'brel med dngos med min// ngo mtshar
211a5(rgyud): gzugs can yin zhing ngo mtshar min// gnas par 'gyur min myur du 'gro ba min// gang zhig yod dang med pa'i tha snyadarnams dang bral/ bsod nams gzugs min sdig
211a6(rgyud): pa'i gzugs ma yin// bsod nams sdig gi bdag min mchog gyur pa// de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs// skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub// mtshan nyid 'di ni
211a7(rgyud): skad cig mchog/ rdo rje rtse mo byang sems ni// 'dzin pas lus kyi brtan pa nyid// de yis de nyid byang sems ni// rlung gi de nyid rab sbyor bas// rigs pas steng du byed pa na// rgas pa med par the
211a8(rgyud): bem med// hU~M ho rim bzhin shes pa ni// 'drin pa steng du rnam par spel// sngar bshad pa yi bdud rtsi lnga// 'di ni bcud kyis len du brjod// 'di nyid kyis ni grub par byed// lcags kyi gser 'gyur byas
211b1(rgyud): na ni rdo rje phyag rgyangs dru / rlung du 'jug pas thob par gyur/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dang / de yin rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang // gang la de gnyis gcig 'gyur ba/ de ni drug rngu
211b2(rgyud): 'jug par bshad / 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ rtog pa gnyis po spangs pas ni// gang du dngos po gcig 'gyur gzung du 'jug ces de la bshad// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag rtog
211b3(rgyud): pa gnyis dang rnam par bral// gang du yang ngag 'dres gyur pa// de ni zung du 'jug par bshad// rdo rje bzlas pa'i rab sbyor bas// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes nas ni// rnam rtog rlung rnams rnam par gcod
211b4(rgyud): sems la dmigs pa thob par 'gyur// bdag la byin rlabs rim bas kyang // dngos grub brgyad ni thob par 'gyur// snang ba la so/ rigs dbye ba shes// mngon par byang chub rim pa thob/ zung
211b5(rgyud): 'jug rim pa la gnas pa// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/ tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yis the tsomo med// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub cher// zung du
211b6(rgyud): 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog med par zhugs nas ni// thob pa 'di la the tsom med// lus ni gzhal yas khang du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis yang dag brten// zur bzhi pa ni mdun
211b7(rgyud): rgyab dang // g.yas dang g.yon gyi dbye bas so// steng 'og spro yi dbye ba yis// sgo bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin// sna rtse bzhi yi dbyibs kyis ni// rta babs bzhi ni brjod par bya// dra ba rgyu mar yang
211b8(rgyud): dag bshad// rgyus par 'gyur ba dra bo phyed// cha ni zla ba phyed pa dang // bum pa lto bar yang dag shes// rje ngar brla dpung lag ngar ni// ka ba brgyad du yang dag bshad// mig gi rnam shes
212a1(rgyud): me long sogs// sgra yi rnam shes rol mo dang // sna yi rnam shes me tog phreng / rin chen pha gu lnga rnams shes/ lus kyi rnam shes ras 'phan dang / yid kyi rnam shes ri / 
212a2(rgyud): mig ni 'khor mo'i mtshan ma dang / rna ba kun nas rdo rje rnams// sna ni badren duni bshad// lde ni dri bu ni gsungs// rnga yab la sogs rnam dag pa/ lus kyi tshogs zhes bya bar bshad// yid ni das
212a3(rgyud): kyi pad+mar gsungs// rnam rtog rlung ni yang dag brten// ye shes lnga ni rnam dag pa// re khA sngar ni yang dag brjod// phung po lnga ni rnam dag lnga// rnam dag kha dog lnga ni dbye// de dag gzhal yas khang du
212a4(rgyud): sbom dang po sbyor bar shes par bya// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ rigs kyi dbye ba rang ngo'o// de nyid phyi rol gnas par brjo// / dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'o// khams bzhi'i rang / 
212a5(rgyud): bzhin bdag nyid ni// gzugs kyi phung po mdor sdus na// gzugs kyi phung po rnams dang ni// mig gi rnam shes sa snying ngo // phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo rjer bshad// byams partsa
212a6(rgyud): rgyus dbus na bzhugs// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// shar dang lho yi mtshams su ni// me long ye shes su ni bshad// rnam par snang mdzad rnam dag nyid/ bde dang sdug bsngal
212a7(rgyud): 'jigs dang skyo// tshor ba'i mtshan nyid du ni 'dod// tshor ba chu yi khams dang ni/ phyi rol sgra ni rdo rje dang // rna ba phyag na rdo rjer bshad// rigs ni gnyis po 'dres pa nyid// dri yi rdo rje phyi rol 'gyur
212a8(rgyud): sna yi rnam shes mkha' snying po// khro bo gnyis po rnam par shes/ mnam nyid rin chen 'byung ba dang dngos dang dngos med sogs 'du shes// snga ma rjes drin mtshan nyid can// 'du shes phung po/ 
212b1(rgyud): me khams dang / phyi rol dri yi rdo rje dang // lce yi rnam shes 'jig rten mgon// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// de ni so sor rtog ye shes// 'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung // dge dang mi dge'i
212b2(rgyud): las rnams kyis// bag chags 'du shes mtshan nyid ni// 'du shes phung po rlung gi khams// phyi rol ro yi rdo rje dang // lus kyi rnam shes sgrib rnam sel// kun bzang tshig kyi mtshams dbus bzhun
212b3(rgyud): de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// bya ba nan tan grub ye shes// don yod grub pa'i rigs las byung // dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni// ye shes mtshan nyid rnam shes brjod// rnam par shes pa na ma'i
212b4(rgyud): khams// yid kyi rnam shes 'jam rdo rje// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis/ shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// mi bskyod pa yi rig sra las byung // mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// gzhal
212b5(rgyud): yas khang na 'di dag bzhugs// de nyid khams kyi dbye ba yis/ rim pa ji bzhin bshad par bya// sma rus phyi sa mchi lam snying // so ni rnam snang bdag nyid ngo do// spu da
212b6(rgyud): gnas dang nye ba'i snying // sen mo chu yi khamasu shas// rin chen 'byung ldan bdag nyid kyi// rigs kyi rten du shes par bya// so dang lpags pa sha dang snying // me yi khams shes bya bar
212b7(rgyud): brjod// 'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin dang // rigs kyi dbye bar shes par bya// rgyus pa sha dang rtsibs logs snying // rlung ni don yod grub pa'o// dri ma rgyus pa mkhris pa snying // de ni na mkha
212b8(rgyud): khamasu grags// mi bskyod pa yi rang bzhin dang // snying ni rnam shes lnga zhes bya// re re la'ang so sor ni// rnam pa lnga ni spro ba shes// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phung po lnga// nang gi bdag nyid rdzas
213a1(rgyud): bye ba sha rba rgyus pa sha kham tshad// klad pa dang ni klang rgyas dang // rus pa rkang dang snye ma dang // mkhal ma snying dang lto ba dang // glo ba mcher pa gcin dang ni// bshang
213a2(rgyud): pho ba long ka dang // zhag dang chu ser gnag dang ni// khrag dang mkhris pa bad kan dang // ngar snabs skra dang kha spu dang // sen mo spu dang lpags pa dang // lag pa rkang mig yan lag sogs// 
213a3(rgyud): mchogs ma dpung pa zhes ni brjod// de dag rim par shes par bya// gzhal yas khang ni rnam dge pas// de la gnas kyi dbye ba ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ pu la'i ra ni mgo
213a4(rgyud): bor shes// spyi gtsug dzA lan d+ha ra dang // rna ba g.yas pa u rgyan dang // spyi bo'i rgyab ni arbud// gong ba ri rna ba g.yon// 8 me shwa ri smin ma'i dbus// mig gnyis de bi ko Ta dang / 
213a5(rgyud): mA la wa ni dpung pa'iH// kA ma rU pa mchan khung gnyis// o dwe nra/ ma gnyisu grags// ko sa la ni lte bar shes// tri sa ku ni/ rna ba'i rtsa// kha yi pad+ma ka ling ka/ mgrin pa laM
213a6(rgyud): ba kar ni brjod/ snying ni kAn tsir shes par bya// hi ma la ya mdom su shes// mtshan ma gri ha de ba dang // pr-i ta pu ri ba shing ba'i lam// brla gnyi su wa t+ta dri pa sau rany+dza ni byin pa gnyis// rkang
213a7(rgyud): ba'i bo la ni sin du'i yul// sor mo rnams la na ga ra// mthe bong gnyis ni ma ru ra zhes// ku lu tA nI rkang pa'i mthil// de ltar gnas kyi rnam dag dang // sa bebu rnam par dag yad/ de nyid dang ldan
213a8(rgyud): shes par bya// thim dang long spyod bdag po nyid// 'jug pa la sogs bye brag gis// rims kyis rdo rje sems dpa' nying // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rlung rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid
213b1(rgyud): mchog/ srog gi rlung ni snying khar gnas// mi bskyod bye brag rigs las skyes// mngoms na gnas pa'i thur sel ni/ rin chen 'byung ldan bye brag skyes// stong du rgyus pa lkog mthar gnas// 
213b2(rgyud): 'od dpag med pa'i rang bzhin no// me dang mnyam gnas lte bar gnas// don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin no// khyab byed yan lag kun la gnas// rnam snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs// dbang po'i sgo yi
213b3(rgyud): rgyun las ni// srog dang rtsol ba rgyun 'di dang // dus kun du ni rgyu ba ni// srog ces bya ba yin par bshad// srog dang rlung dang phyi sa dang // de bzhin du ni khu ba sogs// 'og 'dren 'di ni thur sel rlung // rtag tu
213b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas shes bya// rgod dang za dang ldag pa dang // kun tu 'thung dang 'drib pa dang // gang zhig rtag tu mnyam gnas pa// mnyam du gnas pa zhes byar brjod// gyen du 'gro zhing sdud ba
213b5(rgyud): dang / bza' dang myang ba la sogs pa/ shes dang lhan cig 'byor pa dag/ gyen rgyu'i las su shes par bya// khyab dang 'dzin pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin 'gro dang ldog pa sogs// tshigs
213b6(rgyud): kun du ni khyab pa'i phyir// khyab byed zhen ni bya bar bshang / rlung gi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// de nas de yi 'jigs par brjod// snga ma bzhin du btang bzung sogs// phan tshun du ni gnod par byed/ 
213b7(rgyud): gzhan ni gzhan la 'tshe ba yin// stobs ni thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gcig ni gcig la thim par 'gro// ji ltar zla ba mas la// rlung rnams rim gyis nyams 'gyur ba// snga ma bzhin du gong nas gong
213b8(rgyud): rang gi bdag nyid la thim par// btang bzung slar yang 'gro bar byed// ji ltar mas bsregs dngos med dang // rgyu med par ni thim par 'gro// slar yang srog gi rlung shar pa// las kyi rlung na sna
214a1(rgyud): tshogs pa// de ni lhan cig rnam shes dang // slar yang 'jig rten gsum du gnas// de las las dang de las skyes// de las chags sogs bag chags dang // de las slar yang 'chi dang skye// de
214a2(rgyud): ltar 'khor lo bskor ba 'dra// sngon bzhin rdo rje zlas la sogs// rim gyis de yi dbye bar 'gyur// de nas sems dpa' chen po kun// de nyid mig sman thur ma yis// thams cad 'khrul pa'i long ba bsal/ 
214a3(rgyud): yang dag dngos po nyid ni mthong // de nas yang yang phyag byas te// mchi bcas mig gis bcom ldan la// lan gsum du ni bskor byas nas/ rdo rje 'chang la yang dag bstod// oM ma ho kun 'gro kun dbang
214a4(rgyud): byug / zhamakha' dang ni mtshungs pa brnyes// e ma 'o dam tshig de nyid// gsum// mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad// khams da gsum las ni rnam par grol// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo
214a5(rgyud): nying / 'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'cha'o// phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang // skye mched rnams la mi rten cing // srid dang mya ngan 'das las
214a6(rgyud): grol dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de ltar na mkha' gnas med cing // spros pa med cing gos pa med// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal
214a7(rgyud): bstod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal gyur pa// 'jig rten gsum 'di rnam par g.yos// bdud rnams bcom par mdzad nas ni// 'jig rten gsum gnas
214a8(rgyud): lha las rgyal// khro bo bcu ni kun nas ni// 'jig rten gsum rgyal gtso bo yis// 'di ltar bka' ni bsgo bar 'gyur// sa yi cha ni gang na 'di/ rdo rje phreng bar mngon brjod pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po'i/ 
214b1(rgyud): dam tshig rgyud// dus kun tu ni spyod 'gyur zhing / rgyun du de nying rang nyid kyis// khro bo bcu yis de las ni// rtag tu phur bus bgegs kun la// srung ba'i don du yul 'khor der// rang rang phreng ba'i sngas
214b2(rgyud): kyis ni/ de rnams la ni gtor mo dbul// sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// sna tshogs sprul pa bstan nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dus kun tu/ nyin dang mtshan du bzhugs par 'gyur// rnal 'byor
214b3(rgyud): chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par
214b4(rgyud): rtogs pa las rgyud zad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rdzog so// thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling snying po dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar
214b5(rgyud): gyi mkhan po su dran shi dz+nyA na dang // sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po 'ong kyi lha bcan po bla ma dge slong zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar snang
214b6(rgyud): du/ tsa tur de bi ti pa ri pr-i ts+tsha/ bod skad du/ lha mo bzhis yongasu nu sa pa// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tsha'o// lha mo ban dang mam ldan zhing // sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer
214b7(rgyud): rgyan pa/ shin tu dga' ba'i spyir chen la/ rdo rje sems dpa' cher bzhug so// 'od zer 'chang zhing 'khrigs pa yi// gsang chen chos kyi 'byung gnas la/ byang chub sems ni 'phros nas su
214b8(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings gnas su mdzad do// zhu ba'i dngos po de mthong nas// lha mo spyan mas yongs zhus pa// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// tshig 'di dag ni gsol ba ste// chos kyi dbyings rnam
215a1(rgyud): 'phro ba ni// gang las skye bar 'gyur ba lags// dang po ji ltar 'ong ba yin// de bzhin phyir 'gro ji ltar lags// yan lag med pa gang de ni/ yan lag dang bcas 'gyur
215a2(rgyud): nas su/ lus dngos 'gyur ba ji ltar lags// mig dang rna ba sna dang ni// de bzhin lha dang lus dang yid// dbang po phung po'i dngos rnams dang // khams rnamasu ni 'jug pa yang // ma rigs
215a3(rgyud): bag chags sred pa yis// bcings pa'i nyon mongs 'dod chags sogs/ rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa// ji ltar dngos su 'dus pa lags// dngos po med pa sbom po'i gzugs// gzugs
215a4(rgyud): sogs spyod yul mtshan nyid rnams// rang bzhin med cing dmigs med la// dmigs pa dang bcas ji ltar lags/ de dag ngo mtshar chen po ni// bdag gi the tshom lhas
215a5(rgyud): bka' stsol// de ltar zhus ma thag tu ni// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// shes rab zab pa zad med ni/ nyon cig spyan ma bshad par bya// dpyad du med
215a6(rgyud): cing shes bya min// de bzhin dpyad mkhan gyis shes dka'// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni// na mkha' na mkha'i spyod yul lo// mi shes mun pas bsgribs pas na// nyan
215a7(rgyud): thos rnams kyis shes pa min// spyod yul bag chags shes mkhan ni// rang sangs rgyas su sprul pa ste// de dag kun gyis kyang mi shes// shes med so so'i skye gnas dang // ma 'ongs pa
215a8(rgyud): dang 'das pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum la/ byol song bag chags las byung ba'i// dud 'gro yi dwags skye ba rnams// de kun gyis kyang mi shes te// sangs rgyas spyod yul gsang che no// 
215b1(rgyud): snying po shin tu snying po'i mchog/ gang de kun bdag la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang chen ni// lha mo khyod la bshad par bya// byang chub sems dag 'od gsal ba// zla ba shel dang mnyam
215b2(rgyud): pa'i 'od // de nyid ye shes lnga yi dngos// yungs kar che ba'i tshad tsam mo// de yi dbus su bzhugs pa'i lha// mi gsal gsal ba'i gzugs can te// phyed tshad tsam gyi phra mo'i mchog/ yid kyi dngos po'i
215b3(rgyud): thig le'i gzugs// rtag tu snying gi dbus gnas pa// 'od zer chen po 'bar ba can// ji snyed dgu pa'i bar du ni// dbral ba la gnas rkang mthil bar// thig le de kho nar bsdu te// lte ba'i dbus
215b4(rgyud): su rnam par gnas/ cha shas lnga pa can yin te/ bcu gnyis kyi ni tha ma la// cha nas drug gis mtshan pa nyid// nga ro thig les rgyan byed pa// rdo rje bong nas phyung nas su// sa bon
215b5(rgyud): sku gnas dbus bzhag ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni nu bar byed/ de ni rim par bskyed bying na/ sgong dgu la ni kun tu 'gro// khyab cing khyab gnas 'gro kun la/ mi g.yo la sogs pa
215b6(rgyud): dang bcas// tshangs sogs lha dang lha min gyi// gzhi ni de las gyur pa'o// gang la gtso bor skyod byed la// sa dang na mkha'i de zhes gsungs// ji snye lus la gnas pa'i bar// de yis las dang las min byed/ 
215b7(rgyud): dge dang mi dge bsam pa yang // bya ba'i las kun byed pa yin// sbyor ba rtag tu de gsungs te// mchod pa sgom par gsung ba yin// gang tshe las kyi lus zhig na// de tshe de yi rang mthu yin// de 'dra'i lus su
215b8(rgyud): de 'gyur te// gang gis g.yo dang mi g.yo khyab// na mkha' mnyam pa zhing 'dra ba/ de ni gnas par shes par bya// bcu yi gnyis mtha' tshig gi ngon// gang gis rtag tu sgom byas na// de ni dngos grub rgyas
216a1(rgyud): pa yid rdo rje 'dzin par bdag nyid 'gyur// so dang mchu dang dkan dang lde/ mgul gnas gang la yod pa ni// gang la de ni yig 'bru nyid / de ni zang dang gnas phyir ro// brjod pa med
216a2(rgyud): cing the tshom med// sgra yig rnam par spangs pa ni// rang gi phyi nang de bzhin nyid// byang chub sems ni 'dir gsung so// lha mo bzhis yongs zhus pa las lha mo spyan mas yongasu zhus pa'i le'u
216a3(rgyud): ste dang pa'o// // de nas lha mo mA ma kI/ rdo rje can la 'di zhus te/ byang chub sems kyi rim pa yis// kha snying lte ba gsang ba la// 'gro dang phyir 'ong bstan pa ni/ rdo rje chen mos bka' stsal 'chal
216a4(rgyud): tshe shas rnam pa du zhig gsungs// gnas kyi rnam pa bsgyur 'du// / khe dog rnam pa du zhig gsungs// de bzhin gdan yang ji ltar 'tshal// rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// cha shas bzhi
216a5(rgyud): dang mnyam ldan zhing // pad+ma bzhi la yang dag gnas// snying ka'i ba d+ma la gnas gnag/ kha yi pad+ma la gnas dkar// nga ro/ lte ba'i pad+mar gnas// gsang ba'i pad+ma nga ro mtha'/ 
216a6(rgyud): stabs kyi mtha' ru 'gro byed pas// thig le'i sbyor bar rab tu gnas// bsnam byed pa dang thos byed pa// de tshe mthong byed za byed pa// reg par byed kyang de kho nas/ bde dang sdug bsngal tshor byed pa'o/ 
216a7(rgyud): gang las gzhad byed bzla byed pa// de bzhin cho bo dang ngu ba// 'byed pa gcod pa de kho nas/ cho ga rnam pa mang po shes// rgyal po don yang byed par 'gyur// dbang phyug don yang byed par 'gyur// / 
216a8(rgyud): bram ze rgyal po rje'u rigs dang // dmangs rigs smang po'i rigs rnams dang // bud med du ma sprul par byed// dud 'gro yi dgas skye ba dang // gzugs can rnams dang gzugs med
216b1(rgyud): dang / de bzhin 'dod pa'i srid rnams las// 'byung ba thams cad skyed byed pa// de nyid kho na rdzu 'phrul gnas// mo gzugs dang ni pho yi gzugs// bde ba chen po go 'phang gnas// de ltar de bzhin nyid/ 
216b2(rgyud): shes pa/ dam pa'i yig 'bru shes pa gang // des ni gsang chen shes pa ste// gang nges bdag nyid kun gnas pa// kha dog med cing kha dog dmar// kha dog dkar dang ser ba yi// thig le'i gzugs bsgyur
216b3(rgyud): ba 'dis// 'gro dang phyir 'od rnam par bstan// gang de rig pa rdzu 'phrul che// mtha' yas bcas pa sna tshogs gzugs skye dang bsdus dang 'jig pa la// thig le'i gzugasu rab gnaso// gang gis
216b4(rgyud): brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i chos// stong phrag brgya ru shes na yang // de yi de nyid mi shes te/ de dag kun kyang 'bras med do// bcu gnyis lnga yi lnga pa yang // brgyad kyi mtha' ru 'byung ba 'dis/ 
216b5(rgyud): s+ya yig dang po yi ge a/ lnga pa yis ni yang dag rgyun// snying rje/ chen po las byung ba// kha mar bltas pa'i drug pas bta gas// gdod ma mtha' ma med pa'i lha// de ni spyi bor bstan
216b6(rgyud): pe yin// de dag gsang chen dam ma yin// lha mo bdag gis rab bsta no// lha mo bzhis yongasu zhus pa las lha mo mA ma kis zhus pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // de nas lha mo gos dkor mos// 
216b7(rgyud): yan lag kun gyis btud na su// thal ma snying khar sbyar byas te// rdo rje sems dpa' la gsel pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi bsdus pa dang / sku gsungs thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ rang bzhin nyid ni
216b8(rgyud): ltar lags// lha yi dbang phyug khyod la nus// gang gos 'od kyi gong bur bsdu// rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar logs// gsungs shig de nyid yig 'bru'i tshig/ 'dus pa gsungs pa ji ltar
217a1(rgyud): lags/ chu khams dang ni me yi khams// ji ltar ro ni mnyam por 'gyur// ma las skye ba gsum tsam dang // de bzhin pa las skye ba gsum// de dag drug sogs gong bu
217a2(rgyud): las// ji ltar mi rnams skye ba lags// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bdag mi 'tshal// thub pa chen pos bka' sprul mdzod// rdo rje can gyis bka' stsol pa// gsang ba shin tu gsang gyur
217a3(rgyud): pa/ nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// skye gnas dbu su rtsa gnyis ni// g.yon dang de bzhin g.yas pa ste// g.yon du byang chub sems shes bya// g.ya su de bzhi rak+Sha'o// de gnyis phrad nas
217a4(rgyud): gcig 'gyur ba// chos kyi dbyings ni 'dus pa yin/ mun pa sku ste rdul gsung gzugs// thugs kyi rang bzhin snying stobs te// rdul ni rak+ta byang chub sems// mun pa de bzhin
217a5(rgyud): bskyed pa yin/ rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas// rang bzhin mnyam pa'i ror 'gyuraro// dri chen chu dang shel me tog// de bzhin lnga pa byang chub sems/ bdud rtsi lnga dngos gong bur bsdus/ 
217a6(rgyud): de las rdo rjer 'dir gsung so// mi shas gnyis pa dang ldan pa// de bzhin dgu pa dag yin// de skad gsungs pa bcu dang ni// de bzhin lnga pa'i sa bon te/ cha shas gnyis pa lnga yi ni// drug gis btags
217a7(rgyud): pa des byung ba// de ni thig ler gsungs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge bruM// skye gnas pad+ma la gnas pa// de nyid sa bon swA hA/ 'dus pa la ni shes par bya// chu khams pa las skyes shes bya// me yi khams ni
217a8(rgyud): ma las skyes/ sha dang khrag dang lpags pa yang // ma las skyes pa zhes bshad do// tshil dang rkang dang khu ba ni// pha las skyes zhes bshad pa yin// gong bur yang dag 'dus pa ni/ de dag tsam du bshad pa yin/ 
217b1(rgyud): gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // de bzhin 'du byed rnam shes rnams// sangs rgyas dngos po lnga yi gzugs// phung po zhes bya bshad pa'o// / lha mo bzhis yongasu zhus pa las lha mo gos dkar mos
217b2(rgyud): zhus pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhad pa'i zhal gyur te/ lha mo sgrol ma bcom ldan mas// rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa ni// gsungs shig rdo rje can chen po// rdzas
217b3(rgyud): rnams sgrub pa bka' stsal 'tshal// de bzhin rigs pa'i sngags rnams kyang // dkyil 'khor rnams ni btags pa dang // sbyin sreg so sor bya ba dang // de bzhin mchod pa'i cho ga yang / khyad par du
217b4(rgyud): yang bka' sprul 'tshal// de ltar lha mos zhus ma bag/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrubs thabs ni// nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// gzugs dang spu dang
217b5(rgyud): dri dang ni// de bzhin ro dang reg la sogs// khams bco brgyad po de dag kyang // chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba'o// de dang / nying las byung ba ni// byang chub sems zhes shes par bya// byang nub
217b6(rgyud): sems las gong bu skye// gong bu las kyang yid bskyed// yid las na mkha'i khams kyang ni// khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams// dbang po phung po 'byung ba rnams// de ltar dbyingasu bsdu ba ste// bsdu
217b7(rgyud): ba de ni bstan byas po chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa yim de bas na kun pad kyi sgrub pa yang dag spyod par bya'o/ 'di ltar bal po zhes dngos kyis/ bsgrub par bya ba rab tu brtam chis dbyings
217b8(rgyud): sgrub pa ba shang na su rdzas brgyang yan lag sbre pa ba shang / ril bu mig sman dngas grub sas 'ogarol gri'i ngos grub dang // ma khar 'asrur dang mig smin dang / 'jib mi dang nang 'jom so dang / 
218a1(rgyud): mig dang glang po che dang rta/ glang dang khyi dang bong bu dang / rnga mo ma he spyang ki rnams/ cha ni mnyam por bya ba'o// mthe bong tshigs chang tsam du ni// shin tu mnyam par gzhag nas sbyar// dri chen chung
218a2(rgyud): rak+ta dang / byang chub sems nas tshad tsam ni// sngags bzlas nas ni sbyar byas te// byin gyis brlabs kyang bya ba'o// phyag 'tshal dang ni yi ge A// dbus de bzhin hU~M byas te// 'bar ba'i hri yi go 'bar byed pa// 
218a3(rgyud): po de ni rab tu sgrub// lan ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ sngags bzlas nas ni phye mar btag/ yungs kar lnga yi chang tsam du// lnga dang lnga ni 'byor par bya// tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ ril bu rnams ni byas
218a4(rgyud): nasuHpad+ma'i snod la bzhag byas te// stong phrag brgyar ni bzla bar bya// mtshams bzhi la ni sgom byas nas// nyin dang mtshan du bza 'bar yang // de ni bskal pa'i mtha' bar yang // dngos grub
218a5(rgyud): rgyas par 'gro ba ste// gzi brjid mdangs dang stobs brtson 'gru sa// lnga pa la ni smon lam yang // mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa// ril bu chen po zos phyiraro// rdzas kyi sgrub pa rnams
218a6(rgyud): rdzogs nas/ rig pa'i sngags rnams bdag la stsol// yig e dang baM yig dang // laM yig dbus yang dag gnas// drang po'i mdog ni dmar po ste// gnyis pa yi ni mdog dkar ba// gsum pa
218a7(rgyud): kha dog ser ba rnams// b+ha ga'i dbusu bsgom par bya// 'khor lo ltar ni bskor ba ni// nyin phyed dang ni mtshan phyed la// rig pa de ni rab 'byor na// de ni skad cig kho nar 'grub// lha mo lha min bu mo dang
218a8(rgyud): mi yi bu mo rno ba bzhi// sa yi dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// sngags kyis bkug nas spyad par bya// sgom pa de bzhin rigs pa'i sngags// bdag gis bshad pa zin byas te// dkyil 'khor rnams ni
218b1(rgyud): bshad par bya// dga' ma sems kyis rtse gcig nyon// dkyil 'khor lus shes gsungs pa ste// dkyil 'khor b+ha gar bstan pa yin// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dang ni// dkyi 'khor gsuM
218b2(rgyud): du brtags pa ni/ brtags pa rnams kyang 'dus pa ste/ gang du gtso bo bskyed par byed// phung po rnams ni sangs rgyas gsungs// 'byung ba rig mar brtag pa'o// chags pa lpags kyu kho na
218b3(rgyud): ste// zhags pa pad+mar chung byed pa// kha phrang pa ni sgrog yin par// sgra bsgragaso pa ni dril bur bshad// spos ni dri chen zhes gsungs te/ me tog rak+ta zhes 'dong ngo // mar me sha rnams kho na yin
218b4(rgyud): bri ni byang chub sems zhes 'dod// sgeg mo long gar bstan pa s+ho// phreng ba b+ha ga kho na yin// dbyangs ma dbugasu bstan pa drang // gar mkhan ma ni rnal 'byor te/ bcom ldan 'das
218b5(rgyud): kyis bzang por gsungs// de rtogs pa ni skal bzang yin// rtog pa de rnams byams pa sogs// de ltar nang gi bang gnyid gsungs// dkyil 'khor gzhan ni sngon bshad
218b6(rgyud): zin sbyin sreg las ni bshad par bya// nyon cig sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi// sbyin sreg phyi dang nang gsungs te// phyi na sngon du bstan pa yin// nyon cig khyod kyis nang gi ni// pad+ma bzhi rnams 'byor
218b7(rgyud): ba ni/ lus kyi dbusu nye bar gnas// me dang de bzhin rlung dang ni// dbang chen dang ni chu de bzhin// rlung gis me ni 'bar byas te// chu yis yongasu smin par byed// dbang chen dkyil 'khor
218b8(rgyud): las byung ba// gang du me ni bskyed pa'o// ra yig mngon spyod yi ge ste// ya yig dbang gi las kho na// la yig rgyas par 'gyur ba ste// ba zhig zhi ba zhes gsungaso// gang zhig zas
219a1(rgyud): dang btung ba ni// de dag thams cad chu la ste// pad+mar k+Sha yig kha mar lha/ snying gi pad+mar bcud par bya// lte ba'i pad mar 'gro phyir rol// kha sbyor tshul gyi sbyor ba yis// 
219a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i pad+mar 'gro ma bag// thal bar mtha' ru rnam par bstan// de ltar sbyin sregs bdag bshad pa/ zhin dang nyin du bya ba ste// rtag par rgyun tu zas zis ni/ tshe 'di kho nar 'grub
219a3(rgyud): par 'gyur// rgas pa med cing nad kyang med// 'chi ba med cing 'bras rnams med// de ni blo bur 'chi ba med/ 'tshe ba zang zad 'gyur zhing // rmi lam ngan yang zhi bar 'gyur// bzang po skal bar
219a4(rgyud): gnod pa ste// sems can tha~Md dga' bar smra// mthong ba tsam gyis bskul byed do// sbyin sreg las rnams bshad byas nas/ lha mo mchod pa bstan par bya// dri dang phreng sogs gos
219a5(rgyud): rnams dang spros ma zas dang lha bshos kyis// dbang po// gnyis ni rab 'byor nas// bdag la mchod pa rnams / ni bya/ bdag ni thams cad sangs rgyas nyid// sangs
219a6(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi gnas yin te// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu mchod// gang zhig 'ga' yang bya ba'i las/ rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par sgom// zas dang / 
219a7(rgyud): btung ba de bzhin gos// de bzhin dri dang phreng kho nas// rig ma bzhi yis rnam rgyan pa'i// bdag nyid lha nyid bsam par bya// de ltar bshad nas rdo rje de// cang mi gsung ba'i dngos
219a8(rgyud): bor bzhugs// de nas lha mo bzhi rnams kyis// phyag gi thal mo sbyar gyur te/ dgyes pas rab tu zhal bzhad nas// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni// rnam par mi rtog pazo ba ste/ cang ni
219b1(rgyud): gsung bar bzhugs gyur to// lha mo bzhes yongasu zhus pa las lha mo sgrol mas zhus pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mchog dam pa gsang chen zhes bya
219b2(rgyud): ba'i rgyud lha mo bzhis yongasu zhus pa dpal ur+ya na~M gyi yul nas byung ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i nga kho na nyid rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po smig ti dz+nyA nA kI rti nyid kyis bsgyur
219b3(rgyud): cing zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra dz+nyA na sa muts+tshe ya nA ma tan+ta/ bod skad du/ ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud// sangs rgyas dang
219b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// / ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes rdo rje kun la/ nas btus pa'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs
219b5(rgyud): pa'o// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// bcom lda na 'das ma rig pa dang // sems las byung ba dang / 
219b6(rgyud): sems zhes bgyi ba ci lags// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu nyon cig// yis
219b7(rgyud): gsum rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba de'i phyir ye shes gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// byams pas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ye shes gsum rdo rje'i ngo bo ji ltar lag
219b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa// 'gag pa med pa/ skye ba med pa de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / sna ba nye bar
220a1(rgyud): thob pa dang // stong pa chen po'o// de yang rtogs par dka' ba'o// 'on kyang snang ba dang bcas par brjod par bya'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis sems las byung ba ste// de
220a2(rgyud): ni snang ba mched pa dang / shin tu stong pa zhes gsung so// sems las byung ba'i rkyen gyis sems te// de ni snab dang // stong pa ste/ sems dang sems las byung ba dang // ma rig pa'i rang bzhin bdag med
220a3(rgyud): ba'o/ gsum po de dang de 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas
220a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po de rnams cad mi smra bar 'dug pa mthong nas bka'
220a5(rgyud): sprul pa/ rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar gyur na/ sa 'dug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi sa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag brtsal te gtugs
220a6(rgyud): nas gzhan yang zhus pa/ e ma'o ston pa rtogs par dkara' ba rnam par shes pa gsum gyi dbye ba mchog tu zab pa bcom pa bco ldan 'das bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa
