220a7(rgyud): ba gad du gsog/ bcos ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gagang 'od gsal ba las byung rnam par shes pa de nying sems dang / yid dang rnam pa shes pa zhes bya // don chos zad kyi na ba ste/ dran
220a8(rgyud): nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byung ba'i bdag ging de las rtog pa gnyisu gyur te bdag dang / gzhan dag tu'o// rnam par shes pa de'i gzhon pa rlung / rlung las me'o// melas tshwa ma// 
220b1(rgyud): tshulas 'o// de rnams las zung po lnga dang / smye yad drug dang // lub lde ste/ de dag thams pang ni rnam par shes pa rlung dang 'dres pa'o// de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bsnyen gyi sna b.rab tu
220b2(rgyud): zhes pa par spyod ba rjes myong bar byed de/ snang ba'i rgyus ring bzhin rnams yang dag par 'byung // de las 'od gas la bganas pa med pa// 'gag pa med pa/ skye ba med gdon dam pa'i bden pa/ yang
220b3(rgyud): dag pa'i mnga'i ste/ de las byung ba'i mun pa'i snang ba ni ma rig pa'o// de'i rang bzhin lta ba dang // 'khrul pa dang // rnam par g.yang ba dang / brjed ngas pa dang / le lo dang // mi smra ba dang / mi gsal ba'o// 
220b4(rgyud): ma reg pa las sems la byung ba ste/ i rje'i snang ba lta bu dang // shin tu gsal ba'i smig rgyu blta bu'o// de'i rang shin 'dod chags dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / drag pos
220b5(rgyud): sogs pa dang // kun rdzob du mngon sum du skyes pa/ 'i gzugs dang // lha'i tshogs dang // mtshan ma dang // rdo rje'i brda'o// sems las byung ba las sems te// zla ba'i snang ba dang / 
220b6(rgyud): shin tu gsal ba'i chu'i zla ba lta bu'o// rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la sog s+ho// kun rdzob du ni mngon sum gyi bud med dang // b+ha ga dang // pad+ma dang // lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o// rdo rje dang pad+ma
220b7(rgyud): yang dag par sbyor ba las shes rab kyi ye shes byung ba las rang gi rdo rje'i 'bad pa las ma'o// ma las chu ste/ nur nur po'i rnam pa dang / de las mer mer po dang // nar nar po dang / gor gor po dag go/ 
220b8(rgyud): de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba snang ba la khrag gi gong bu mkhrang gyur rnam so// de khu ba dang khrag dag gis bskyed pa'o// de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las 'dod chag so// 'dod chags lnga
221a1(rgyud): 'dod chags dang bral ba dang // bar ma'i 'dod chags rab tu shes par bya ste/ de'i phyir lus te/ lus las byung skyil krung bcing ba la sogs pa dang // gsung gi phyag rgya'i thabs
221a2(rgyud): gyur pa/ a li ka li las yang dag par byung ba'i sngags dang / sems kyi phyag rgya'i thabasu gyur pas bon dang mtshan ma las lhar dmigs pa'o// gzugs la sogs pa'i yul ni dbang po gnyis
221a3(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs pa'i thab su gyur pa'o// rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba dag gis thabasu gyur pa'o// sems dang sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyar nga ni
221a4(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyi thab su gyur pa'o// de rgyu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshon pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu
221a5(rgyud): dang chu zla dang / mig yor dang smig rgyu dang // rmi lam dang // / sgra brnyan dang // dri za'i grong khyer dang // mig 'phrul dang // dbang po'i gzhu dang / glog dang / chu bur dang / me long gi gzug
221a6(rgyud): brnyan lta bu ste/ sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin nye bar mtshon par byed pa yino// ji ltar 'o ma bsrabs pa las mar dang // ji ltar til las til mar te/ de bzhin du
221a7(rgyud): rdo rjes ni thabs kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir dang / pad+mas ni shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyiraro// ji ltar 'o ma dang til yang dag par mngon par 'dus byas pa med par
221a8(rgyud): mar dang til mar mi 'byung ba de bzhin du sngags dang phyag rgyas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyar ba med par rnam par shes pa gsum nye bar mtshon par mi nuso// 
221b1(rgyud): gang gis b+ha ga dang ling ga yang dag par sbyor mi nus pa des ni bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin mi rnyed do// bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin 'ba' zhig la skrag par mos pa tsam gyis ni las dang po pa'i
221b2(rgyud): sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog po la yang slob par 'gyuraro// gang rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde bas rang bzhin snang ba yang dag par nye bar mtshon par byed pa de ni bde ba chen
221b3(rgyud): bo'i go 'phang la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di ni sbas pa'i bshad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol ba// bcom ldan 'das ci'i don ji ltar lags/ btsa
221b4(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos spyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags la sa ma grol ba rnams rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dag tu btsun mo'i
221b5(rgyud): b+ha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed pa ngo mtshar can gyi rngo rje'i tshig zos nas smod par byed pa de rnams ring mi 'ga' ba'i
221b6(rgyud): sgo nas bshad pa de ni spyi'i don du bshad pa gsungs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags la spong ba'i chos kyi tshul du
221b7(rgyud): mthar thub pa bshad pa ji ltar lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams legaso leg so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje mchog dang
221b8(rgyud): ldan pa rnams nyon cig/ mtha' ni mu ste// 'od gsal ba yang dag pa'i tshul zhes bya ba mthar thug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das
222a1(rgyud): babs gang gis mngar drug bzang ba lags bcom ldan das kyis bkara' stsal gaphung po dang mas dang skyemached la sogs pa'i mtha' stong pa gsu mo
222a2(rgyud): ba gsum gyi mtha' 'od gsal ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdong pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i mtha' ji ltar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan
222a3(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji ltar mes shing ba sregs te thal bar byed pa de bzhin du 'ang gsal bar shes rab kyi ye shes yun ring pos rnam par sbyor bar byed// ji ltar Sha la'i lo ma thal
222a4(rgyud): bar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyi ye shes rnam par sbyong bar byed// ji ltar ras bal gyi mdab ma bsregs pa de bzhin du snang ba thob pa'i ye shes mchog tu myur bas rnam par spong bar
222a5(rgyud): bye// de bas na rim pa 'dis shing ta la'i lo ma dang // ras pa/ la gyi mdab ma thal bar gyur pa de bzhin du stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang // stong po chen po rnams mthar 'o
222a6(rgyud): gsal bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni mthar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcoM ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mtha' dag
222a7(rgyud): gis bshad pa ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dgongs pas bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don// nges pa'i don dang sgra ji bzhin pa
222a8(rgyud): sgra ji bzhin pa ma bzhin pa rnam so// byams pas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzhag ste tshig re re'i bshad pa bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
222b1(rgyud): stsal pa/ gang mthar thug pa bshad pa de nyid dgengs pas bshad pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chag ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa dang / bar ma zhi bar mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la
222b2(rgyud): sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o// lus dang ngag dang yid med pa dang // bdag med pa dang // thams cad stong pa dang // dag pa dang 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i
222b3(rgyud): tshig ni dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o// ga pu ra dang // khrag chen po dang // tsan dan dmar po dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni drang ba'i don su/ 
222b4(rgyud): ga pur ni khu ba dang / khrag chen po ni zla mtshan gyi khrag dang tsan dan dmar po'i khu ba dang bsres pa ni tsan dan dmar po'o// rdo rje ni mtshan ma ste thab so// pad+ma ni b+ha ga ste shes ra
222b5(rgyud): dang phyag rgya dang / btsun mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni nges pa'i don to// gnyi ga dang / spyod pa dang / bya ba'i rgyud rnamasu don gsal bar gsungs pa 'di
222b6(rgyud): lha ste/ dkyil 'khor dang // mchod sbyin/ gtor ma dang / sman dang / zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang // de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnam
222b7(rgyud): ni sgra ji bzhin pa ste/ de ni yi ge'i don gyi bshad pa'o// ko TA khya ko TA ga ko TA ko TA ba sh+tsa/ ko TA rA gra/ ko la khya/ ko la 3/ kai la ko la ba sh+tsa/ ko la sta tha/ 'dis dbang po dang / yul
222b8(rgyud): gsungs te/ de lta bu la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
223a1(rgyud): dang / gnyis ka'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang / bya ba'i rgyud dang / rtog pa'i rgyud rnams kyi tshad ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi
223a2(rgyud): ming stong phrag bcu gnyis zhes bya ste/ rgyas par byan grangs medo// gnyis ka'i rgyud stong phrag dag spyod pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgya do// bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o// rtog pa'i rgyud
223a3(rgyud): stong phrag bzhi'o// de dag ni stong phrag sum cu rtsa bzhi ste/ rgyud dang rtog pa'i ming gi mtha' ma'i yig ji snyed po ni kaM kha ga g+ha nga // tsaM tsho dza dz+dza nyaM/ TaM rba Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa'i
223a4(rgyud): b+h+ra ma ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa haM/ 'di dag ni ming gi yi ga'i mtha' ma rnam so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi byeng pa dang
223a5(rgyud): cho ga dang / bsgrub bya dang / sgrub pa de gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa las bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis
223a6(rgyud): langs te 'dod chags byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas rab tu bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyis dbus su 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin
223a7(rgyud): gyis btsun mo'i b+ha ga la yang dag par bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal ba rmang du byung ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gi mtha' dag gang gis rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa ni rnal 'gyu
223a8(rgyud): chen po'i rgyud la bzhug so// reg pa'i lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la dgod pa dang / de las byung ba'i byed pa dang las dang sgrib pa la sogs pa de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu rab tu dbyeng sgrub par
223b1(rgyud): byed pa gnyi ga'i rlung la zhug so// las kyi bya ba sna tshogs phyag rgyag chen po bya ba'i rgyud kyi phyag rgya dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu dbyang bas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa ni spyod pa'i rgyud la bcug so/ 
223b2(rgyud): 'jigs par dmigs shing shin tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang // ye shes sems dpa'i bde ba dam pa med pa dang / bdag nyid lha'i snyems pa med pa dang / rmad du byung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa dang / skyon gyi rgyu'i
223b3(rgyud): rtogs pas rab tu spyod pas sgrub par byed pa ni bya ba'i rgyud bzhug so// sngags dang sman dang / sbyin sreg dang / phye ma dang // mig sman dang / rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po rgya rab tu dpyang
223b4(rgyud): ba sgrub par byed pa ni rtog pa'i rgyud la bzhug so// byachub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
223b5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang / mtha' drug gi bshad pa dang / rigs pa rnam pa bzhi dang / shad pa rnam pa bzhi dang / dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang / gang zag
223b6(rgyud): rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa dang / bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa rnam so// gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste/ ming dang / gang gi don du byas po dang / byed pa po dang / tshad dang / dgos
223b7(rgyud): pa rnam so// mtha' drug du bshad pa ni 'di lta ste// dgongs pas bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / spu ji bzhin pa dang / sgra
223b8(rgyud): bzhin pa ma yin pa rnamaso// rigs pa rnam pa bzhi ni rgyud dang / gleng bzhi dang / nges tshigs dang / rgyu rnam so// bshad pa rnam pa bzhi ni yi ge'i don dang / spyi'i don dang / sbas pa dang // 
224a1(rgyud): mthar bug pa rnam so// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis ni 'di lta ste/ tshogs la bshad pa dang / slob ma la bshad pa'o// gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa 'di lta ste/ 
224a2(rgyud): rin po che dang / tsan ngan dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ud pa la rnam so// bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa ni 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden ba dang / don dam pa'i bden
224a3(rgyud): pa'o// rigs kyi bu kun rdzob ni mi brtan pa dang g.yo ba'o// de'i bden pa ni chu zla lta bu'o// don dam kha'i bden pa ni stong pa chen po bco brgya do// de'i mtha' ni gnaso// byang chub sems
224a4(rgyud): dpa' rnams gyis gsol pa// don dam pa'i bden pa la rab gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po pas las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting 'dzin la brten nas sen gyi don ji ltar rab tu spyod
224a5(rgyud): par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis sems ca/ rten gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha'
224a6(rgyud): la rab tu gnas par 'gyur// gang du sems can gyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pas yang dag par mtha' las langs te sen gyi don byas
224a7(rgyud): nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug par bye'o// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' zhing dgu la yi rangs te dga' ba dang yid nga
224a8(rgyud): ba skyes nas cang mi smra bar gyur to ye shes rdo rje kun las btus par zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par phye bar nyes pa'o rdzog so// rgya
224b1(rgyud): gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ka ra'i zhal lda nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur/ slang nas bla ma de nyid dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa'o// ye shes rdo rje
224b2(rgyud): kun las btus/ rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin/ ye shes rang bzhin 'khor ba dang / mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo'o// de nyis dbyer med rdo rje ste/ kun 'dir 'dus pas kun las btus/ de ston pa la
224b3(rgyud): der brtags nas// gnang la'ang ming don 'tsham pa yin// rgya gar skad du/ shu badz+ra hring ya a laM kA ra tan+t+ra nA ma khod skad du/ dpal rdo rje snying po rgyun gyi rgyud ces bya ba// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la
224b4(rgyud): phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs kyi snying po bud med bcu'i dkyil na cha shas lnga pa
224b5(rgyud): tshul bzhug so// brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'tsho/ ra rdo rje dang pad+mar sbyor ba la bzhugs pa 'di lnga ste dam tshig yongasu spyod pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / 
224b6(rgyud): ye shes kyi lus yong su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkhar 'gro dang / sgyu brnyan lci bu rdo rje'i gsungs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ngo // gzhan gyis shes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i
224b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'kha' 'gro dang / rtse gcig tu 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'bru dang gzhan las 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'kha' 'gro dang / rten par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rnan par
224b8(rgyud): byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rngarjemapar 'gro // smin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ma par 'gro dang bskyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / go 'byed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ma pa sngo
225a1(rgyud): / hA rA nu pUr la sogs pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / gi tA mgrin la sogs pa'i glu mkhan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / sbrul gyi snying po la sogs pa
225a2(rgyud): dri ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / tshod ma sna tshogs za ba'i ro ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang rtsen pa sna tshogs kyis 'khyud mkhan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang
225a3(rgyud): gsum rig par byed pa dngos med ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro thams cad dang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen mo na mkha'
225a4(rgyud): dbyings dang mnyam pa 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid zhu ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / tshor ba'i mtshan nyid sim pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / 'du shes/ 
225a5(rgyud): kyi mtshan nyid nub pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ma'a' 'gro chen po dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan
225a6(rgyud): nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen pi la sogs pa na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di til gyi gang bur lta bur gang bar snango // de nas rdo rje mkhar
225a7(rgyud): 'gro de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ mkha' 'gro chen po rdo rje 'drin po chen po la mchod pa'i sprin spros pa du ma yid las byung ba lha dang / mi'i mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas mchod
225a8(rgyud): nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs rnams zad kyi// gsang gsum bsdus pa'i spyod pa'i mchog/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud// 'dren pa mchog gis bshad du gsol/ 
225b1(rgyud): de nas rdo rje chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i tshig bsan nas mkha' 'gro thang la rnam par bltas te cang mi gsungs par bzhug so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i mnga' 'gro de dag zang kyis kyang 'di sa ce/ 
225b2(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dbang phyug gis yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor du 'chang du mi bzhed pa de bdag cag la mi dgye sum
225b3(rgyud): mdzad cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas 'chig su bcad pa gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen pos zhus pa legs/ sa 'o
225b4(rgyud): ma yin sangs rgyas kyang / 'di yi gzhung gis sems rmongs na/ sems dpa' gzhan ni smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas chos 'di da/ dpa 'di/ byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs phyir// byin gyis bcwas
225b5(rgyud): nas 'chad pa ni// ston pa rnams kyi chos nyid do// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thang rab tu dga' nas yang chod pa'i rtsa gas kyis mchod phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
225b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das legaso leg so// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dbang phyug gis bdag cag byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi gsang ba thun mongs ma yin
225b7(rgyud): ba bstan cing rnam pa thaMd kyi dbang phyug gis bdag cag byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs bzang dbang phyug gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag gis gsol ba bta
225b8(rgyud): pa mkhyen nas/ sems dpa' thad byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pazad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba bsdus pa/ 
226a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha las byung // oM AHhUM sa ma ya badz+ra/ de nas byung ma thag tu de'i 'od zer gyis rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i 'khor de dag dzang bsdus nas rang
226a2(rgyud): snying kar btsung nas/ bud med kyi dkyil na zad brgyal ba ltar gan so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi dbang phyug gis de bslang ba'i phyir mkha' 'gro tha~Md 'byung ba zhes bya ba ting 'dzin la snyoms par
226a3(rgyud): thug so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag du de dag dran pa slar thob cing ji lta bzhin du gan so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis 'khor lo rnam par dgong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'chi
226a4(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ snom par zhugs ma thag tu rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thad rang rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'khong bar gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen
226a5(rgyud): byi rgyas ba chen mkha' dbyings na gnas pa ji snyed pa de ngag thams cad kyang bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong ba'o/ gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zad
226a6(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug gis rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs te/ dbugs rngub par mi mdzad/ 
226a7(rgyud): 'byung bar mi mdzad/ lus 'gyur bar yang mi mdzad/ lus gnas par yang mi mdzad// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs mi dgongs nye bar mi 'jog go// thabs
226a8(rgyud): dang shes rab stong par yang mi mdzad/ shin tu 'gal ba can yang dag par 'jud par mi mdzad// mtho ris la yang mi 'jog/ ma dad pa rnams dang par yang mi mdzad/ ma dul ba rnams dul
226b1(rgyud): bar yang mi dzad/ nye bar 'tshe bzhi par yang mi mdzad/ ma 'gags pa rnams 'gag par yang mi mdzad/ mu bsgral bla rnams bskul bar yang mi mdzad/ ma rgyas pa rnams rgyas par yang mi mdza
226b2(rgyud): rnam par rmongs pa rnams rmongs pa sel bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar gyur pa rnams mi dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ mi dga' ba rnams dgra' bar yang mi mdzad na ma khros pa rnams khros pa ma
226b3(rgyud): mi mdzad / mi sdug pa rnams sdug yang mi mdzad/ drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang / gtum po chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / log 'dren dang / gdug pa chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha zad
226b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / shin tu gdug pa'i dug chen po dang / tsha ba'i gdon dang / nad dang / sbrul dang / sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang
226b5(rgyud): mi mdzad do// rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad// de nas com ldan 'das ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ brjid pa dang bcas par gar mdzad cing zhal 'dzus pa dang / 'dor ba dang / 
226b6(rgyud): bskam pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sman mdzes pas smin rings bsgyur ba dang / pad+ma'i phyag gi sor mo g.yas g.yon gar gyi phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa'i ngos la zhabs 'phen cing bsgyur ba dang / 'jor
226b7(rgyud): zhing bskul ba dang / 'jog cing 'dogs pa'i rnam par gnon pas rnamam kha'i dbyings 'di thams cad kun tu khyab par mdzad/ rlung gi khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad/ de la khyab nas
226b8(rgyud): me'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad/ de nas chu'i khams chen por kun du khyab par mdzad// de nas so'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad// de yang kun tu khyab nas bcos
227a1(rgyud): byang chub sems la kun tu khyab par mdzad/ rings dang sems can tshad dang / sna sna tshogs phra ba sbom po dang / bud med gzhon nu rgan pa dang / skyes pa dang ni mning dang / lha dang / 
227a2(rgyud): klu dang gnod sbyin dang // gdon dang skar ma shin rje dang // chu bdag brgya byin la sogs dang // 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur zad la// bcom ldan 'das ni bde chen po// kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin// kun
227a3(rgyud): tu khyab par byos te gnas/ dpal rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud las rdo rje mkha' 'gro byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de na gzhan yang bshad ba ba// las kyi mchog rnam
227a4(rgyud): 'grub byed pa'i// gsang sngags rnams ni bshad par bya/ rtse gcig sems kyis mnan par bya'o// oM a kA ro mu khyaM sarba d+har+m+ma NAM A d+ya ma tu pan na tAta/ gtor ma'i sngagaso// 
227a5(rgyud): a A/ i I/ u A/ e ai/ ai/ o au/ aM a bung medo// r-i ra/ l-i l-I/ ma ning ngo // ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dzA/ dzA he/ Ta thADa D+ha// ta thad d+hA na/ pa pha ba b+h+ra ma/ skyes
227a6(rgyud): pa2/ ye ra la we// 'byung ba'i 'o// sha Sha sa pa/ 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o// k+Sha/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sa bon no// badz+ra d+h+rika hU/ dzi na dzi ka b+hUM/ rat+na d+h+r-ika A/ A ro l-i ka dz+dza/ pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka'o// 
227a7(rgyud): ma nga 'gro chen po lnga'i 'o// dwe Sha ra ti mAM/ mo ha ra ti laM/ rA ga ra ti bAM/ badz+ra ra ti tA/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro rten par byed pa la sogs po'i'o// k+Shi ti gar+b+ha rme/ badz+ra pA Ni dz+r-IM/ ga gan gar+b+ha khaM lo ke shwa rA ya
227a8(rgyud): gzhi bar/ bzhisti ni kaM/ sa mnan+ta b+ha dra sa/ rdo rje ma 'grengs tshig spyod pa la sogs pa'i 'o// chub bodz+ra dza/ sha d+ha badz+ra hUM/ kan d+ha badz+ra gi ras badz+ra hoHsngar sha badz+ra khaM/ d+ha ma d+hA tu
227b1(rgyud): badz+ra ra/ rdo rje mal 'gro mdzes par byed pa la sogs pa'i'o// ya man+ta kriH/ bad+d+hAn+ya kriti/ pad+mAn+ta krita/ big+hA ta kri ta/ Ta ki rA dzA/ nI lA daSh+Tha/ ma hA/ ba la a tsa la ka na hUM/ suM b+ha ni hUM/ tsakra bar+N+Na
227b2(rgyud): ni b+h+rUM/ rdo rje mkha 'gro gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i'o// wA ri dzi ni b+h+rUM/ te dzo srin+na b+h+rUM/ man+te tsakra b+h+r-i/ ba ra d+ha na b+hUM/ bi sa ra Na b+hUM/ bi ra dzi na b+h+raM/ Shod+habad+hA rdo rje mkha' 'gro gtsug tor
227b3(rgyud): rgyal ba la sogs pa'i'o// hUM hrIHkha rdo rje mkha'agro'i 'o// oM me de ni bod+hi b+ha ba badz+re bin d+ha hA/ sa'i 'o// oM badz+ra pra kA ra Ne hUM ba hUM/ re ba'i 'o// oM badz+ra pany+dza ra hUM yaM hUM/ 
227b4(rgyud): dra ba'i 'o// oM badz+ra bi tA na hUM/ gur gyi'o// oM badz+ra sha ra ta sa tAM sa tAM/ madra'a'o// oM badz+ra dzA lAr+tha rbAts+tshaNAM/ 'od kyi'o// IM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba A tA
227b5(rgyud): ko tsa/ stong pa nyid kyi sngags// oM d+harmA d+ha tu swa b+ha ba a t+ma koH/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sngag so// oM sarba thagaN+DakA ya bA kau tsi t+ta badz+ra swa b+ha be At+ma ko ts+yai/ sku las
227b6(rgyud): pa byin gyis brlob pa'i'o// badz+ra sa ma ya sU traM/ mA ti kra ma hU/ thig gdab pa'o// badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ tshon dgye ba'i'o// hUM ha/ a dz+nyeHdbab pa'i'o// badz+ra kI la ya mud ga ra a kau Ta ya
227b7(rgyud): hUM phaT/ phur bus brdung ba'i'o// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas pa// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba'i// sngags kyi tshogs rnams ji snyed pa// de kun sngon du rgyas pa ru/ gsang ba dang ni 'jig
227b8(rgyud): byed dang // bde mchog sogs la nga yis ni// las dang bcas par rab bshad pa/ rnal 'byor rtogs pas shes bya'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// 
228a1(rgyud): de nas ma' 'gro grong khyer mchog dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ las kyi cho ga shes pa yis// ci rigs par ni las rnams bya/ nyi shu rtsa lnga'i srang bu ni// sems med
228a2(rgyud): las byung byas nasu// byin rlabs mi bskyod rtag pa ru// byas te thigs ni gdab pa'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ tA ra na bzhis rgyan pa ste/ ngar dang me rngog phreng bas klubs// srang bu bzhi dang rab ldan pa// 
228a3(rgyud): zur gyi ma ni thang du// zla ba rin chen rdo rje dgong // las kyi bye brag shes pa yis// blo dang ldan pas phyag rgya dgong / in+d+ra ni la lta bu yi/ 'jigs byed rdo rje dbus bri/ shar du le brgyad 'khor lo pa
228a4(rgyud): lho ru rin chen zur dgu ljang // nub du mdab brgyad pa d+ma dmar// byang du ral gri sngon po bri// me yi mtsham su 'khor lo sngon// bden bral ud pal dmar po dang // rlung gi mtshamasu pad+ma
228a5(rgyud): dkar dbang ldan ung pal ser po ste// rdo rje rje bshar gyi s+ho// lho yi s+thi ru rdo rje dbyug/ pad+ma'i sdong bu nub kyi sgo// byang sgo rdo rje kha byeg/ sbyor ba ldan pa dgong par bya// rnam pa
228a6(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa lngar ni/ tshon ci dag kyang bsgob bya ste/ rdul tshon lnga la sogs pa rnams// rim pa bzhin du gdab par bya// de nas bum pa bzung bar bya// rtsa ba nag nog med pa yi// zhabs brtan
228a7(rgyud): mgrin ring mchu 'phyang ba// lha yi grangs tsam sta gon gnas// mgul bar ras kyis yang dag dkris/ ldum bu yis ni kha mdzes pa// rin chen sman 'bra sna lnga dang / spos chu yis ni ra ba
228a8(rgyud): bkang nas// bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya/ rnam rgyal bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi/ bdag po lha mo rnam kyi bani/ lha rnams kyi ni bum pa bzhi/ sgo yi phyogs kyi bum pa ni/ las
228b1(rgyud): kun byed pas bzlas byas te/ ku sha'i chun pos sems can che// 'jug pa kun la gtor ba bya// yon dang gtor ma mchod bul nas// de dag phyi grar rab bkod de/ g.yasu rgyal ba spyan drang // de nas
228b2(rgyud): lha rnams rab gnas pa'i// bsam pa'i sbyor bas bsam bya ste// phyag rgya bral ba'i sbyor ba ni// lus can byin gyis mi rlob pas// bu mo gzugs bzang lang tshos rgyan/ dbang thob lus rgyas thob
228b3(rgyud): ba mo// g.yon ma rgyan gyis rab brgyan te/ dri yis 'khor lo sprul par bya// de la mar me brgya sogs pa'i// mchod pa phul nas bstod bya ste// bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni/ dung chen po ru
228b4(rgyud): bzhag bya ste/ lha rnams la ni phul bar bya/ denas ma kha'i gro grong mchog tu/ slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya ste tsha yang ga gi gi ma sam ma ga las kyi rgya
228b5(rgyud): ming ma / ma ngo sngags 'di gtolalo// pra tits+tsha badz+ra ho// zhes bya/ de nas tshig 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol// de ring dang ba'i shugs kyis ni// dkyil 'khor de 'dir lta bar bya// sangs
228b6(rgyud): rgyas rigasu khyad sku so// sngags dang phyag rgyas khyod byin rlab// dngos grub zing phun sum tshogs// dam tshig mchog tu 'grub par byed// rdo rje pad mo rol pa'i mchog/ sngags kyi bdag nyid
228b7(rgyud): shes par bya/ pa bye badz+ra/ gang dag me tog gsang ba ste// de de yi lha yang dag/ de yi sbyor b.rab sbyin te/ de yinan tan du sgrub bo// dung chen bdud rtsi lnga thud de// dmyal ba'i chu yis
228b8(rgyud): khyod la ni// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub pa'i// 'thung shig rdo rje bdud ci chu// badz+ri u da ka/ de nas sangs rgyas zad kyi// dam tshig dang ni
229a1(rgyud): sdom pa rnam pa rnams// tha mas slob ma sdig bral la/ ci lta ba bzhin bsgrags par bya// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u gsum
229a2(rgyud): pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dbang bskur ba yi cho ga'i mchog/ gang gis logs par byed 'gyur na// de ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// slob dpon mtshan nyid thaMd ldan// 
229a3(rgyud): yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa// de nyid bcu la sogs pa yi// gsang rig cho ga shes pa pos// bsgrims te slob ma yang dag gzung // bla ma la gus dang ba'o// dge sgom lha
229a4(rgyud): rnams mchod byed pa// gtong phod yon tan ldan pa'o// / de nas slob ma de yis kyang // langs te zhabs la mgo sa gtugs nas// rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa// gos dang
229a5(rgyud): rgyan gyis legs par bgos// steng du bla re bri bar bya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan dang / lham dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / gdu bu dag dang rka rags dang / 
229a6(rgyud): bkra shis tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis// slob ma sdig dang bral ba la// slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskuro// dang po rnam rgyal bum pa dang // de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang // lha rnams
229a7(rgyud): kun gyi bzhi po bzhis// bkra shis tshigs bcas glu sgra dang // rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis// skyob pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du// til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i// rgyal bas/ 
229a8(rgyud): bum pa gzungs nas ni// de nyid la ni dbang bskur bar// dkyil 'khor de nyid rig par bsam/ de lta bu ni bsams nas kyang // chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya// de nas yid 'ong du/ 
229b1(rgyud): / mo ni/ lags par goms pa dbang thob pa// rgyan gyis rab brgyan rab mdzes pa// btsal te bla ma la phal nas// de nas rgyal dbang slob ma de// nang ni sbas pa btus pa yi// gsang ba mnyam par
229b2(rgyud): 'jug pa yi// sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje pad+mo las drang ba sbom po mtha' lhag rtse sbyar nas// rkan tu rdo rje bzhag par bya// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// kye ma'o dam tshig bde brjod cing
229b3(rgyud): kye ma'o bde ba blong bar bya'o// 'di ni bsang ba zhes bya ba'i// de dbang bskur ba'i thabs mchog// yang na shin tu dang ba dang // gzugs bzang sgrub la dga' ba dang // sbyor goms bla ma la ni dbul/ 
229b4(rgyud): bla mas byin rlabs lha mo dang // sgrub pa de la sbyin pa ra bya// de yis blangs nas brtson pa'i tshogs ji skad gsungs bzhin rab byas nas// rang gi lho dang sangs rgyas dang // byang
229b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kun/ mnyes byed cho gas sems brtags te// mngon sum bde ba rang 'byung / pa// gzhan gyis gang du bsgrag mi nus// go ba'i yul de bde ba
229b6(rgyud): che/ bla ma de la dbul bar bya/ bla ma gzhan la de bzhin du/ ci dga' bar yi yon yang dbul// slob dpon cung zad ci 'dod pa// yid la bsams pa dbul bar bya// dam tshig 'da' bas 'jigs
229b7(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ bsgrims te de bzhin dbul bar bya/ slob dpon gyi ni yul gyi chog/ rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lnga// bum pa'i dbang sogs dbye ba yis/ yang na gsum du 'gyur ba yin// rang gi
229b8(rgyud): ma dang seng ge gangan// yon gyi mchog ste sangs rgyas rigs// gser dang glang po rin chen dang // sring mo bla ma la dbul ba/ rdo rje sems dpo'i rigs yin te// yon te yon gyi mchog yin no// 
230a1(rgyud): shing rta ni shin tu rgyan/ rang gi chung ma dbul bya ste// rin chen sna tshogs rnam dag ga/ yon te rin po che yi rigs// mu tig phreng ba shin tu mdzes/ bu mo rin chen dra ba yis// rgyan
230a2(rgyud): bla ma la dbul ba// yon de pad+ma'i rigs yin no// rgyal po dang ni dbang phyug dang // chung ma 'phrul gyi bzhon pa sogs/ glang po rteni shin tu rgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje zhan tan bri ma dbul bar bya/ 
230a3(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje'i rigs yin no// de rnams bzhi dang 'gyur ba dang / mi 'gyur ba yi bye brag gis// gsum du shes bya bla ma la// rdo ldan rdo rje slob ma yis/ ci ste bde ba kun 'dod pa// dang mos
230a4(rgyud): sems kyis dbul bar bya// yid la gang bsams ma phul lam// khas blangs de ni ma phul na// yi dwags dmyal ba rnam gnyi su// nges par skyes te brlag par 'gyur// de bas de
230a5(rgyud): rnams rab phul nas// gsol ba dag ni rab tu gang pa// rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni pa/ ngag zhugaso// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'jo
230a6(rgyud): du ni bdag zhug so// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ dkyil 'khor bdag gi de ring mthong // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur// de nas bla ma
230a7(rgyud): de yis kyang // de la dbang bskur sbyin bya ste/ dri dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// bsgribs te yang dag brtag par bya// dang po la ni bum pa'i dbang // gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang // gsu/ 
230a8(rgyud): pa shes rab ye shes te/ bzhi pa de yi ye shes te/ bla ma las ni thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las phan yon dang bcas par dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// 
230b1(rgyud): 'ang bas thabs kyis rigs lnga jog rang gi don gyur kun tu bzang / 'di gcan la rab bde'i phyir/ de rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs bshad/ yid 'ong dben pa'i sa phyogasu/ ci bder gas
230b2(rgyud): lanas pa dun/ sems kyis khyang par byas nas/ rnams brtag e ma'o 'jig rten kun// sdug bsngam chos kyis kun nis bcos/ byang chub sems nyams sems can rnams kun las
230b3(rgyud): bcung shes des mas pa'i/ sngags pas spyi bar bzhag ni/ ba dz+ra sems kyi rdus bras ma dris rnams/ phyogs babungs du byes su ches gyi na rnams nges pan lanas/ shin me
230b4(rgyud): sems dang ga/ 'das da ma dzes pa'i sems/ ltar yang ni dmigs su meng // gnyis med de la gnyis maud/ rnam pa' zhes pa gnas pa med// de ltar kun tu ga
230b5(rgyud): nas su 'gro bzang shin tu stong // dri med rnal 'byor nyid kyi yin/ dngos po med par rang sems bsam/ 'gro ba 'dzi ni de lta bu'i// dngos po gang dag yod min na// sdug sngal
230b6(rgyud): sna tshogs gang dag lags// sems nyams sems can 'byung bar sbom// 'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam shugs// dbyangs yig spel ba'i glu ldan bya// rin chen sems ni rmug pa ldan/ 
230b7(rgyud): bde gshegs rnams kyis bskul bar snang / shUn+ya tati ya~M ga pA dr-i swa hA/ pra b+ha thA I kA sha ta mA paM ga tas ma ya/ ud pa ta pa yan sug ta su~M ga ga ti te shrI badz+ra swa hA/ ShA
230b8(rgyud): s+t+waM hAMkarnam rtog kun spangs dri med pa'i// rnam par mi rtog sgom pa'i sems// sngags kyi de nyid bskyod byas la// hUM zhes pa yi gzugasu brtagating 'dzin gyis dbang 'gyur na// gang phyir/ 
231a1(rgyud): brtsams pas thob/ dam pa num pa'i dbyings la gnas/ byang chub sems tshogs der bcas la/ rnal 'byor yid kyis kun bsams nas/ rgyas par rnam par
231a2(rgyud): brtag par bya// yi ge zla gyis lnga yi gnas// rdo rje rin chen gyis ni rgyan// sgo khyung rta babs ka ba dag/ dar gyis phreng bas rnam par klubs// gru bani pa la sgo bzhi pa/ dril bu'i dra ba
231a3(rgyud): ngag gis rgyan// rtag par do shal phyag me long dang / me tog phreng bas rgyun rnams bres// de yi dbus seng ge'i gdan// seng ge bairgyad kyis rnam par rten// smon lam dbang gis
231a4(rgyud): de dag kun// byang chub sems dpa' mthu ba ma/ shar phyogs bgrang shin tu rgyas// lho phyogs rta yi gdan bzang ste// nub phyogasu ni ma bya ba/ shang // de bzhin byang byos
231a5(rgyud): namakha' lding // mi bskyod khro bo bsam pa ni// mthing ka dkar po dmar po'i zhal// rdo rje phyag rgyag thugs ka na// mthing ka kha dog gsal la bzang // g.yas na
231a6(rgyud): rin chen 'khor lo s+ho// ral gri pad+ma g.yon pa na// 'jig rten khams ni kun 'khrug pa'o// brtul zhugs can gyis zhal gsum bsam// dang po yi ni stong pa nyid// gnyis pa
231a7(rgyud): de bzhin mtshan ma med// gsum pa smon pa med pa yi// zhal du mkhas pas rig par bya// phyag drug rtag tu 'bar bas sgrom// mtshan cha sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// pad+ma la ni/ 
231a8(rgyud): mnyam bzhag nas// ye shes phyag rgya snying kha nang // dbus kyi gnasu bsam pa ni// rdo rje skyil mo krung du gnas/ shar gyi gnasu bsam pa ni/ sngags pas rnam steng thub pa ste/ 
231b1(rgyud): dkar dang mthing ka dmar ba'i zhal/ 'khor lo phyag rgya snying kan/ rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od gsal ba// rin chen rdo rje g.yas pa na/ ral gri pad+ma g.yon pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis
231b2(rgyud): rtag par bsam// thor tshugs dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan// rin chen mgon po lho phyogs na// ser dang ma 'ing ka dkar ba'i zhal// rin chen phyag rgya snying kha na// mar gang lta bur sna
231b3(rgyud): ba'o// g.yas na 'khor lo ral gri ste/ rdo rje pad+ma g.yon na'o// rtag par rnal 'byor pas bsam pa// rin chen char du 'bebs pa'o// nub phyogs gnasu dgod bya ba snang
231b4(rgyud): mtha' yas bsam pa ni// dmar dang mthing ka dkar ba'i zhal// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu// pad+ma'i phyag rgya snying kha na// rdo rje rin chen g.yas pa ni// 'khor lo
231b5(rgyud): ral gri g.yon pa na/ pad ma la ni mnyam gzhag bsam// byung phyogs gnasu don grub ni// ljang ku mthing ga dkar / 'i zhal/ ral gri phyag rgya snying kan// 'bar ba'i
231b6(rgyud): phreng bas mnyam pa'o// pad ma rdo rje g.yas pa na// 'khor lo rin chen g.yon pa na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de bus gnas pa// byang gi gnasu bsam par bya// sngags pas phyag drug bsam pa
231b7(rgyud): ni spyan de zhal gsum dkar mo yi// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya bzhin// de yi don du rnam par sbom// ma ma ki yang bsam pa ni// ud pa la dang ni mthing gzhal gsum phyag drug chag
231b8(rgyud): paste/ mi bskyod phyag rgya mchog 'dzin pa'o// chags pas chags pa rigs kyi sngags// zhal gsum phyag drug dge ba ste// sbyor ba'i sa ni dkar mo bsam// pad+ma rA ga'i phyag rgya'o// 
232a1(rgyud): smosas ma ga se sro ste/ 'khril bag rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan/ zhal gsum phyag drug rab rab tu bas sa/ phyogs med rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// bsgo ba ni sgo srung dgong byas
232a2(rgyud): sgo rnamasu ni khro bas me// khaM chen po gshin rje gshed // gzhan gyis mi thub dri bzhin te// thub par dka' ba rta mgrin dang / khro bdud rtsi 'khyil ba bsam// de dag kun kyang zhal gsum pa/ 
232a3(rgyud): drag cing drag por gnon pa'o// mthing ka ser po de bzhin dmar// ljang ku dag ni kha dog tu'o// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// thod pa'i phreng thogs de bzhin no// gdon rnams thams
232a4(rgyud): cad sgrog byed pa// gnod sbyin srin po phra men ma/ mahe seng ge stag rnams dang // kha lang zhon pa rnam bzhi'o// rnam par 'gyur ba'i khro gnyer can// khro bo spyan ni kun nas
232a5(rgyud): bsdus// sngags 'di rnams kyis bsam pa ni/ gshi na rje gshed la sogs pa'o// sngags kyi de nyid rjes 'thun par// sngags pas dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas su// 
232a6(rgyud): sa yi snying po la sogs pa// sems dpa' rnams ni der gnas bsam// lus dang ngag dang sems de nyid// hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/ sems ni dre ru zhugs par bsam// mi bskyod pa ni
232a7(rgyud): bdag nyid che// dbang po'i lam du byung na su// dang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis ni rgyan// bdag nyid gcig cing gcig 'gyur bar// skad cig gis ni brtag par bya// khyod ni rdo rje sems zhes/ 
232a8(rgyud): bya/ de la sogs pas bstod par byed// de nas rnam snang mdzad la sogs// rang gi snying kar rab tu bzung // gzugs rnams kyi ni rang bzhin du// rnam par snang mdzad phub pa bzhugs/ 
232b1(rgyud): tshor ba rin chen mgon po yin// mtha' yas 'od ni 'du she su'o// 'du byed kun tu gdon mi za// mi bskyod pa ni phung po lngar// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams ni// sngags 'di rnams kyis bzhugs
232b2(rgyud): bsam sa yi khams kyi rang bzhin du// de nas spyan ni de zhugs bya ste/ rnal 'byor yid kyis bsam po ni// de yang spro bar gnas par bas// mA ma ki yang chu yi khams// brlan zhing khrag ni rgyu ba'i
232b3(rgyud): phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni yid kyis bsam// de yi lus ni rgyas par 'gyur// me yi khams kyi rang bzhin du// gos dkar mo yang bzhugs par bya// kun tu khyab par zhugs pa yi// 'od rnamasu ni
232b4(rgyud): der 'gyuro// sgrol ma rlung gi rang bzhin du// bzhugs par dri ni bsam par bya// rlung ni rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// de bzhin pas gas rdzu 'phrul 'grub/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// nam pa
232b5(rgyud): rang bzhin dag tu 'jug// de lus khong stong nyid la ni// rang sems yon tan sbom pa'i sems// rnam pa'i dbyings kyi rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas sgyu ma'i sbyor ba su// dag pa'i
232b6(rgyud): bdag nyid cing 'dod par// de nas ri rab phul nas 'gro// sa ya snying po bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas spyan ni bdag nyid de// mig gi phyo su zhugs nas ni// 'phrul gyi mig tu rtag tu 'gyur/ 
232b7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje bdag nyidadi che// rna ba'i rnam shes sbyor bas na/ sgra rnams zad shes pa de// rna ba'i rnam shes de bzhin 'gyur// na mkha'i snying po bdag nyid che// sna yi rnam shes sbyor bas na// 
232b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas shangs ni bdag nyid shes// de yang de yi ngo bor 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por rab chags pa// rdo rje lce yi sbyor bas su// ro yi dbang po myong ba des/ skad cig gcig la de
233a1(rgyud): ru 'gyur// blo ldan sgrib pa thams cad ni// rnam par sel ba'i ming dang ldan// nyon mongs thams cad rnam par sel// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang 'jig/ me long gi ni rnam pa ltar
233a2(rgyud): rten pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba ni// gzugs bstan gyis ni sbyor ba su// skad cig gis ni de ru 'gyur// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// rnam pa bcu dang ngag tu yang // sbyor ba de ni byin rlabs
233a3(rgyud): nas// sngags pas de ni sems la gzhug/ khro bo lugs kyu dpung pa yis// zhags pa lta bu gnyis pa'o// lu gu rgyud kyi kha sprad gsum/ rgyal mchin gzhug par khyab bzhag/ de ltar
233a4(rgyud): don rnam rab tu zhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor bdag/ rdo rje phyag rgya dang ldan pa// g.yon pa dril bsnams sta zur brtan// rdo rje sas dpa' de gnas 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po dkar
233a5(rgyud): ba'i gzugs// dkar dang mthing ka dmar po'i dbu// stong nyid la sogs bdag sbyor ba// rdo rje sems dpa/ 'azhes smra// rdo rje phya n+ya rjesu chags pa la// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ 
233a6(rgyud): a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA kro haM/ sangs rgyas mchod pa la// oM sar+b+ba ta tha ga ta/ pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rang gi dkyil 'khor sde ma bzhin// mdun du bsams nas na mkha' la// khyab
233a7(rgyud): pa'i sbyor bas gcig byas te// dkyil 'khor ma bzhin bsams bzlas// bcom ldan mi mnyam gzhugs bcing bzhugs// rdo rje phyag rgya thugs dkar bsnams// g.yas par 'khor
233a8(rgyud): lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri g.yon pa'o// de nyid gsum gyi tshul gyis ni// ci tsam nus par bzlas pa bya// skyon yid kyis drangs nas ni// de dag zad snying kar gzhug/ mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas/ 
233b1(rgyud): 'dug na/ lus kyis ci tsam bskyod pa dang // tshig tu rab tu 'phro ba'i rnams// de dag sngags dang phyag rgyar 'gyur// rtag tu smom pa'i sbyor bas ni// de la sems dpa'i gzhan ma yin// rnal
233b2(rgyud): 'byor ngo bo gzugs can la/ lha mo rnams kyang de la 'dzin// dbang po lam du gang gyur pa// de dang de yi ngo bo dag/ shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba su// bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bya'o// dpal
233b3(rgyud): rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las lha'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga de bzhin pa
233b4(rgyud): pa zang dang // byang chub sems dpa' bad kyis tshig 'a thun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsil ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// yis gces
233b5(rgyud): pa dri med pa// byang chub sems ni rin po che// bla na me da pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyis gsol ba btab par
233b6(rgyud): thugasu chung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems ni lus kyi rnam pa yin la// lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin zhing sems kyang tshig gis rab
233b7(rgyud): tu brjod pa yino// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin pa thams cad sku dang gsung dang thugs sbyor ba thob nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kye ma kun tu bzang po/ 
233b8(rgyud): 'di/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ chos rnams skye ba med pa ste// g.yon ba med cing gan med pa// rtog pa'i dri ma spongs pa yin// bskyed pa bya zhes rab tu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das
234a1(rgyud): mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa gsungs spros rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung// dngos po 'di sa ma skyes
234a2(rgyud): te/ chos can med cing chos nyid med// na mkha' bzhin du dpags med pa'i// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi 'khrugs pas gsungaso
234a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dpag su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi
234a4(rgyud): sems 'di gsung // dngos po 'di dag dngos med de// chos mtshan nyid spangs pa yin// bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin// zhes bco
234a5(rgyud): ldan 'das rin chen tog gis gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong dpag me/ da kyis rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms pa/ 
234a6(rgyud): zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// dngos po skye ba med pa ste// dngos po ngo bo yod min pas// na mkha'i go 'phang thob bo zhes// dngos rnams rab tu brjod pa yin// zhes bcom ldan
234a7(rgyud): 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bla ma'i yang bla ma'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
234a8(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug na byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsalag gzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med/ son med cing srog kyang med// sangs rgyas
234b1(rgyud): / shing dang byang chub med// rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin// zhes bcom lnga 'das don yod grub kyis gsung so// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
234b2(rgyud): chen po byams pa la sogs pade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa thob nas ji mtshar skyes
234b3(rgyud): gyur te tshong du brjod do// kye ma'o sangs rgyas rtse'o dag/ kye ma'o chos ni bstan pa rnams/ bdag med ches las legs byung ba/ byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems
234b4(rgyud): snyam pa yi/ mi g.yo yi ge las byung zhing // rmi lam la sogs ma skyes pa byang chub sems khyod phyag 'alo// gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te// sems dpa'i skyil mo
234b5(rgyud): krung bcas nas// dang por rang bzhin dag go zhes/ dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas// yid kyis hUM byas rdo rje can// rdo rje sems mas byin gyis brlag rin chen khros su
234b6(rgyud): nga rgyal bya// lag pa stong de bskor ba ni// lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang drang // byin nas drang por phyogs bcing ste// dam tshig mchog kyang dbul bar bya// gdan rnams so sor phul na su/ 
234b7(rgyud): mchod yin 'dul ba'i sbyor ba bya// dbang bskur mtshon cha ga cha sogs// sol snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya/ nam pa kun gyis mnyen bya ba/ rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis bdag/ rnal 'byor
234b8(rgyud): rnas gsus shes bya ste/ khyon gyis brgya bas dang yongs brtags dang / gzugs nyid yong su rdzogs pa dag rnal 'byor yin gis sangs rgyas gsungs/ sngags kyi byin rlab sa
235a1(rgyud): rgyal bskyed// rnal 'byor byin rlabs yin par gsungs// byang chub sems ni dag pa dang // gsang sngags sa bon skye ba che// phyag rgya tshogasu brtag pa yis/ 
235a2(rgyud): rim gyis gzugs kyi rdzogs bya ba// de ni brtags pas brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs// bsdu dang spro bar bya ba laso// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dang // skad
235a3(rgyud): cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do// dang por dam tshig byin rlabs par// rnal 'byor rigs pa dag gis brtags// rab tu rdzogs par bya ba
235a4(rgyud): dag 'di ni rnal 'byor cho gar bshad// nyon mongs dri mar bcas pa'i sems// byang chub sems kyis dag bya ste// de ni rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes// brjod cing thal
235a5(rgyud): mo gsum gyis sbyar/ dag gyur de nas blo yis ni/ sems la so sor brtag par bya// sems la so sor brtags nas kyang / phyir rol rang bzhin stong par bya// sem
235a6(rgyud): rnam la ni gnas nas su// byang chub tshogs kyi bag chags des// bsgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag/ zla ba'i gzugasu rnam par brtags// dag pa'i pad+ma la gnas pa/ oM gyi myu gos
235a7(rgyud): bskrun pa yi// yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs// rdo rje sku ni bsgom par bya// AHzhes bya ba'i spos med gsung // sems ni hUM zhes bya bar sprul// yi ge gsum gyis byin rlabs
235a8(rgyud): lus snying la gnas bzla ba'i gzugs// de la rang gi yi ge ni// mdog gzugs 'od ni byed bsams te// nga rgyal bskyed nas de la ni// rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag nyid brjod// rgyal/ 
235b1(rgyud): rgyal kun yongasu rdzogs pa dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan pa/ cha shas kyi ni dra ba can// ye shes sems dpa'i rdzogs par brtag/ de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis// go cha
235b2(rgyud): mtshon tshwa la sogs bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas lnga dbang bskur te// cod pan phreng ba rnams kyis klubs// de nas de 'og sangs rgyas kyis// sprul pa mdzad pa'i sbru ma 'phro// yan
235b3(rgyud): lag bzhi pa dpung lnga pa'i// phyog bcur khro bo bcu dag dang // bsnyems ma dang ni rtog ldan ma// mtshan cha ma dang rtse mo can// sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam pa'o// rnam par 'phral po byin gyis rlob
235b4(rgyud): kun la khyab par byed pa yi// sna tshogs dbus su bzhag nas ni/ de nyid chen po bdag nyis lngas// phyogs bzhi 'khor la khyab bya ste// dga' bas dga' byed bzhi yang spro/ 
235b5(rgyud): ting 'dzin kun gyi dpa' ba la// 'od par byed pa'i sngags pa yi// 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje'i gzugs// pad+ma gzugs la de dag ni/ 'khor lo kun la pad+ma yi/ ngo bo yisan
235b6(rgyud): rol pa dang // a zhes bya ba 'phro ba las// mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugasu bya// mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams kun ldan pa'i// nyid kyi gdan la bzhugs par lta// skrag dang klu dang gar rnams dang // rgyal mtshan la
235b7(rgyud): sogs tshon dgye dang / sil snan mchod pa'i rnam pa ni// sna tshogs rnams kyi mchod pa bya// rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni// bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgoms nas/ myur ches bya ba phul ba dang // mi gsal gug skyed
235b8(rgyud): nyams pa dang // rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs// de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// bzlas pas skyon lag g.yas kyis// bsgrims nas rdo rje gsar nas su// g.yon pas dril bu la gsil zhing // 
236a1(rgyud): / rdo rje glu tshul sna tshogs dang // bdan myung du byas pas mchod// bzlas pa yis ni mjug brtus nas// gshegasu gsol dang rang zhing 'grub/ lus dang ngag dang sems bsgoms te/ brtan
236a2(rgyud): por ci bder 'gro bar bya// bar chad du ni gyur nas yang // yi ge brgya pas byin gyis brlab// de ltar bsgoms pas sgom byed pa// rdo rje theg pas rab rdzogs pa'i// byang chub de ni myur thob nas// zla nyi dkyil
236a3(rgyud): 'khor lta bur snang // sna tshogs las kyi thog 'dren cing // rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// rgyal byed pad+ma'i gdung rgyud can// gnas chen 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur// dang ldan rigs sngags kun gyi
236a4(rgyud): gtso// dga' chen 'dod dgur lcags kyur 'gyur// sgyu ma bzhin du kun shes shing // dregs pa 'joms byed khro zor 'gyur// dpal rdo rje snying po rkyen gyi rgyud las byang chub kyi sems sgo/ 
236a5(rgyud): ba'i ye shes sgrub pa'i le ru ste drug pa'o// / sbyin sreg de nyid la gnas pa'i// me ni lha yi zhal yin pas sna tshogs las rnams grub byed pa'i// sprin sreg las ni rab tu
236a6(rgyud): bshad/ sbyin sreg las ni lha rnams tshim// tshim par gyur na dngos grub ster// gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa// thaMd sbyin sreg dag gis bskongs// de phyir sku gsung chos mchog gis// sbyin sreg rab
236a7(rgyud): tu bsngags par mdzad// rtsub shing las ni byung ba'i me// dge ba yi ni las rnams byed// gdol pa 'am dur khrod byung ba yi// me ni las rnams rab tu sgrub// thab khung zlum po gru bzhi dang // zla gam dang ni
236a8(rgyud): zur gsum dang / dkyil 'khor gyi ni kha khyer la// rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis rgyan// sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rigs pas/ thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni// pad+ma'i steng gnas gtsug tor dang // rdo rje rin chen/ 
236b1(rgyud): pad+ma bzhag/ ji ltar dmigs pas bdugs na su// lag gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag ste// dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni// blug gzar bkang ste de bzhin sreg// sbyin sreg la dgos g.ya su bzhag/ 
236b2(rgyud): g.yon du chu yi snod dag // las kun byed pas bzlas nas su// bsang gtor dang ni 'thor 'thung bya// kun sha rtse mo rnan po yis// thab khung khor yug bskor bar bya// me ni 'bar bar shes pa dang // g.yas
236b3(rgyud): pa mi 'jigs thob spyod cing // gsang sngags 'dis ni cho ga bzhin/ me yi lha ni spyan drang // tshur spyon tshur spyon 'byung po che// lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog/ sreg blugs zhal zas zhes nas kyang // 'di nyid/ 
236b4(rgyud): du ni bzhug su gsol/ oM Ag+na ye A di pya A bi she A bi she ma hA shri ya ha bya ka bya bA ha na ya swA hA/ phyag g.yo na rdo rje bsang gtor te/ mchod yon chod pa rnam lnga dbul/ me yi phyog
236b5(rgyud): nas bong ba yin// gsus po che la mig gsum pa// gdong bzhi pa lag bzhir ldan// mdog dmar ral pa'i thur tshugs can/ me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing // las kyi 'od zer rnams/ 
236b6(rgyud): kyis rgyan// lag pa dang po mchog sbyin la// gnyis pa na ni sngags nor phreng // g.yon pa ril ba spyi blug te// gnyis pa na ni con nyid// mdog dmar rgyan ni med pa la// drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// 
236b7(rgyud): 'di lta'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang // thab kyi dbus su gzhugasu gsol// de la sbyin sreg la dgos pa// kun la lan gsum sreg blugs dbul// de nas mthor 'thung byas nas su// 'bar ba'i
236b8(rgyud): rnam par brgyur par bya// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni// mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya// legs par tshi ma byas bzod gsol te// 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gdag bum pa rgyan mtshan rdo rje gdu
237a1(rgyud): pad+ma'i lcags kyu'i rnam pa dang // me lce mdog dkar snang ba dang // 'khyil pa'i mtshan mas mkha' las brtag/ des ni myur du 'byung 'gyur ba// sgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya/ 
237a2(rgyud): zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni/ oM zhes pa dang swA hA ma bar// dbyangs kyi rgyud ni sring ba ni// bar chad med pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar// zhi ba'i sems ni zhi ba la 'byor pas rgyas pa mngon par spel/ dregs bde stobs
237a3(rgyud): tshul bcas pa dang // dbang du gyur pas dbang du bya'o// drag shul spyong tshul gnas pa// hUM zhes pa dang phaT dang bcas// lus ni me lce 'bar ba dang // 'jig rten gsum po bzar bsams nas// bskul ba'i
237a4(rgyud): tshig dang spel ba yi// gsang sngags yi ge nges par sbyor// sngags grub cho ga shes pa yis// sbyin sreg cho ga thams cadra la// sna tshogs las dang ldan pa yi// yang dag yin pa mchod
237a5(rgyud): par bya/ sbyin sreg de nyid la bskul zhing // dang po gang thug sa sreg cing dbul/ phyis ni rim bzhin rnam par spel// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams la/ dge ba'i rdzas rnams sbyin sreg
237a6(rgyud): bya kha shang gci khrag rkang rus pa dang // sha chen dag kyang sbyin sreg bya// ci ste ye shes sems pa'i zhal/ mi gtsang ba yis bkang na go// ci ltar sdig pa skye mi 'gyur// gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras
237a7(rgyud): bu gang // sems can mi shes pas rmongs pa// thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs shing // phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa// rnam rtog dra bas blug byas gang // de dag gis ni dge sdig gi// phung po gnyi su
237a8(rgyud): rnam par brtags// chos 'dir rang bzhin gyis dag ste/ skye ba med cing gnas med kyang // sems can shes pa sbal ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thab su brtan// dam pa'i don du dge spangs nas
237b1(rgyud): bsod nams min pa ci zhig smos// dper na mi gang chu klung gi/ pha rol 'gro ba'i sems can dag / rtswa dadrang shing la sogs bsdus nas// chu la rgal ba'i gzings byas te// de las 'jug te legs rgal
237b2(rgyud): nas khor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar/ de bzhin gshegs 'khor ba'i pha rol gyis// chos kyi lam ni skyed byas kyang // chos dang chos min rnam spangs nas// byang chub bde ba thob pa ni// de phyir rnam rtog rna
237b3(rgyud): spangs la// zab mo yi ni chos spel te// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs rnams la// sngags rig rnam rtog ma byed cig/ rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed pas// 
237b4(rgyud): namakha' lta bur dri med pa'i// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gnas// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// lus dang ngag dang sems bsdus nas// nga'o sgom pas gzi bskyed lus// rnam pa kun
237b5(rgyud): gyis rnam rgyan na// rnal 'byor ldan pas tshe 'di la// ye she/ sa rdzogs pa nyid 'gyur// las las byung bar bstan pa yi// skyes pa bud med gzugs mang la// mnyes pa nyid du mi bya 'di/ 
237b6(rgyud): rdo rje lus can dam tshig yin// ngan rtog bzang rtog da ba yi// sems kyis sems can rnams la ni// sna tshogs gdung bas sun mi 'byung // rdo rje dang ldan dam tshig yin// sred pas bskyed rtsub
237b7(rgyud): phra ma yi// tshig dag rnam par mi smra zhing // mnyan ni bde ba byed pa 'di// rdo rje ngag can dam tshig yin// rnam par snang mdzad chen 'khrug mchog/ sha yi khams la gnas pa yin// rkang la
237b8(rgyud): mi 'khrugs rgyas pa ste/ khrag la rin chen 'byung ba gtso// sems can rnams kyi rus phung gi/ rus gong la ni 'od dpag med// rtsa yi tshogs rnam rna 'brel la// thub pa skyes mchog don yod/ 
238a1(rgyud): la/ dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni// gsang chen pa yis bstan pa 'di// blo ldan rdo rje rnams kyis ni// rtag tu bsten cing bsgom par bya/ 'dod chags de bzhin gti mug rmongs/ sred dang / 
238a2(rgyud): 'du byed rnam sel ba'i// chos ni rnam pa lnga po 'di// grub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// bshang gci bu chu mchil ma khrag 'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhis bsdus pa// sgom pa'i blo gros rtogs pa
238a3(rgyud): yis/ dam tshig brtan par bya ba ste// rtag tu bza' zhing sbyin par bya// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'gro ba mi shes mun
238a4(rgyud): bsal phyir// ye shes ni ma shar ba las// dkag pu mun pa brasal tshul gsangs// gshin rje gshod la sogs pa yi// mdo ga dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa// de kun mngon tu rgyas pa ru/ bye
238a5(rgyud): brag gis ni rgyas par bstan// de ni las kyi khyad par gyi// dbang du byas pa khro bo tshogs// gzhan du ma gsungs gang yin pa// de dag 'di ru bshad par bya//  gI ye shes las
238a6(rgyud): byung ba/ gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po ste// zhal gsum ser po mdangs dang ldan// phyag drug nyi ma la sogs pa/ 'dzin cing skyil mo krung bcas pa// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis rgyan cing // 'jig rten
238a7(rgyud): khams kun 'khrug byed pa'i// gzugs kyi spros pas na mkha'i gar// rig mas sku la rab 'khyud pas// chags phyir spro bo'i rtsol ba can// 'di 'dra sgom par byed pa la// bgegs kyis gnod pa
238a8(rgyud): yong mi dgos// skyon med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// yang ni bruM gi ye shes las// byung ba sngags kyi 'khor lo can// zhal gsum gser 'dra mdangs po che// phyag drug 'khor lo la sogs pa// 
238b1(rgyud): ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis rgyan pa// / 'dzin cing stag gi smad g.yogs te/ zod pa'i phreng bas sku la rgyan// rig ma dang ldan chags pa po// 'jol sge gnyams kyi sbyor ba mdzad/ 'di sgom spro bar byed
238b2(rgyud): pa gzhin dang mtshan du rdo rje sems/ 'khor bcas gnasu byon nas su// rtag tu srung ba zhi byed / bka' bzhin byed pas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de bzhin thu go ye shes las// byung ba'i khro
238b3(rgyud): gtsug tor rgyal// zhal gsum ser po mngang dang ldan// phyag drug lcags kyu la sogs pa// 'dzin cing sbrul gyis yang dag rgyan// 'og tu bgegs kyi gtso mnan nas// gad mo'i sgras ni 'debs
238b4(rgyud): par byed// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis rgyan pa// khro bo 'di 'dra sgom byed pa'i// rnal 'byor gang la sangs rgyas kyi// sbrul pa'i bgegs kyang brlag byed na// gzhan ma rnams ni smos ci dgod
238b5(rgyud): snying 'gugs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// dru/ las yang ni byung ba yi// gtsug tor dam tshig spyod pa rtsan// zhal gsum gser kun mdangs ldan pa// phyag drug ka pa la
238b6(rgyud): sogs pa// 'dzin cing sna tshogs rab tu 'bar// ral po'i gtsug tor gyis rgyan pa// zhabs rnams basbyar zhing rnam par 'phen// spro dang bsdu ba'i blo gros can// 'di 'dra gang zhig sgom pa la/ 
238b7(rgyud): bin ya ka la sogs pa'i// bgegs kyis skabs ni mi rnyed par// ji bzhin rab tu bsgom par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// bruM bi ye shes las kyang byung // ming gi
238b8(rgyud): gtsug tor rnam par thor// zhal gsum gser ni bcom 'dra// phyag drug tri shA la sogs pa// 'dzin cing srog seng steng na gnas// rol pa'i stobs kyis bgegs mchu bcings// ral pa'i
239a1(rgyud): gtsug tor gyis rgyan pa// sangs rgyas sprin ni spro ba'o// gang zhig de 'dra sgom byed pa'i// rnal 'byor de yis go cha bgos// sra ba'i ngang tshul can yin pas// bgebs lus gang
239a2(rgyud): gis mi g.yo'o// bgegs las rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bruM gi ye shes mthu las byung / gtsug gtor rnam par 'joms pa'i mchog/ zhal gsum gser 'da'i nyi 'od mtshung
239a3(rgyud): phyag drug rdo rje la sogs pa/ 'dzin cing tshems kyis sgros mnan te/ chags ldan rig mas 'khyud pa'o// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis rgyan pa// khrag can ljags kyang 'dil ba ste// glu med
239a4(rgyud): byang chub thob 'dod pa// 'di 'dra sgom par byed pa la / bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du yang // bgegs kyis gnod pa yong mi 'ong // bgegs kyis stong pa ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
239a5(rgyud): tau/ yang ni bruM gi ye shes las/ yang dag byung ba'i swa/ bas dkar po// zhal gsum gser kun lta bur gnas/ phyag drug gdugs la sogs 'dzin cing // skyabs med mongs pa'i skyabs mdzad
239a6(rgyud): cing / ma ning rnams dang za ma la// bu ni sbyin par byed pa'o// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis rgyan pa// rig ma dang ldan sku chen 'di// rnal 'byor gang gis sgom byed cing // bzlas pa rtse gcig tu byed na// bgegs
239a7(rgyud): kyi gnod pas de mi rdzi// rin chen gyi skabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rnal 'byor khyad par can gyis ni// 'di rnams byang chub srung ba'i phyir// 'khor lo gtso bor rab bsgoms na// rang
239a8(rgyud): gi 'gegs kyis yongs mi tshugs// byang chub snying po don gnyer bas// 'di 'dra'i 'khor lo can bsgoms na// bsgrims nas rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis// ring po mi thogs 'dod pa 'pho ba/ dpas
239b1(rgyud): rdorje snying po rgyun gyi rgyud las byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gtsug tor byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// de nas yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa tha
239b2(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug rdo rje'i 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// di yi dpal ni gang zhig lag/ rdo rje dang ni snying po dang // de bzhin rgyan gyi don ni tsi/ kyi nye mchog de bstan du
239b3(rgyud): gsol// nganas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pas de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di ni thun mong ma yin pa'i// gsang ba'i rgyud du rab sbas pa/ ji bzhin
239b4(rgyud): gnas pa'i de kho na/ yang dag bstan gyis rtse gci gzhon/ lus ngag yid gsum bde dam 'as// l+h+wa ma las ni bsnod bya ste// byang chub chen po bde ba yis/ tshul bzhin
239b5(rgyud): du ni sngags pas bya// bsngal ba'i sring pos 'di smraste// dzaHzhes skad cig skad cig du// rang gi gnas na gnas pa yis// de nyid lha 'di bskyed par bya// bcu drug cha dang yang dag
239b6(rgyud): ldan/ zla ba gsang ba'i thig le la// me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid// rlung gi phul bas bskyod par bya// de bzhin bskyod pas bsgrub par bya// de bzhin du yang bskul bya ba/ rgyud kyi bring ni 'od gsal bzhin
239b7(rgyud): ste dang mdun du rtsa gnyis las// bcu drug gnas su yang dag gnas// de las snying dbus rab zhugs te// rlung gi sbyor bas phul byas pas// steng dang mdog rab mdzes rdzogs sku// bdag gi dpal du shes
239b8(rgyud): bar bya// de las byung ba'i dngos grub che/ nor bu la gnas rtog bral ba// thig la yig yang bsngos pa'i sku// lhan cig skyes par shes par bya/ de la de yi gzugs kyi sku// namakha'i khams kun gang
240a1(rgyud): ye bral ba'i shes pas don byed pa/ gzhan gyi dpal du shes par bya/ de rnams rgyalas byung ba yi/ ye shes shes rab shin tu gsang/ gsang ba rnam par 'grub pa yi/ rdo rje snying por
240a2(rgyud): rgyan ces bya// lha mo las byung bde dang ldan// 'ja' tshon ltar gsal rgyud dag pa// snang ba'i sku de mi shigs pa// rdo rje nga yis yang dag bsgrags// snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun/ bsdus phyir bas gra
240a3(rgyud): pa'i sku dam pa// rtog bral rgyud du sim gnas pa/ 'byung phyir snying po zhesu bsgrags// ngab dang ma ngag thams cad la// 'khor ba ji srid bar snang ba/ gnyis ka mdzes par byed pas na// rkyen du yang dag
240a4(rgyud): bsgrags pa yin// dpral dang rdo rje snying po dang // rgyan ces bya bani po no// 'brel cing grub par byed pa'i phyir// rgyud ces bya bar bshad pa'o// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong
240a5(rgyud): gi ni grangs snyed kyi// mtshan gyi don du// yang dag 'dus par ngas bshad do// gzhan du don ni ma bsgrags pa// bla ma la ni gu sa pa yi// slob ma la ni ma rtogs pa'i// rgyud gzhan dag
240a6(rgyud): tu sbas pa'o// don 'di yang dag ma shes na// ji snyed don ni bsam yas pa// shes kyang de yi 'bras bu med// da 'bras mu mang // de 'dod mnyes byas yang dag blang // dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las ye shes
240a7(rgyud): gsum gyi mtshan 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // rtag par mi phyogs smra ba dang // bla ma smod byed brtson pa la// dam tshig phyir ni yongs bsgral bya// de yi sha khrag klad pa rnams// drangs
240a8(rgyud): te tshogs kyi ston mo bya// de ltar ma byas sdug bsngal tshogs// gti mug can des thob par 'gyur// nad thams cad dang khros chen dang // 'jigs dang nye bar 'tsho ba yi// bskal pa grangs me bye ba ru// sdug
240b1(rgyud): bsngal chen por rab rnyed cing // 'o dod 'bod pas sbrul gyis rgyan// bstir med chen por rtag par 'gro// de bas las 'dis rgyas gdab bo// bdag nyid rdo rje mkha'agro yi// khro gzugs can nyid rgyur nas/ 
240b2(rgyud): ut+pal mthing ka 'dra ba yi// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// rdo rje tri shU phur bu dang // thod pa gri gug 'khor lo 'dzin// mi sdug khros pa lce lnga pa// bsams nas de 'og nam mkha' la lo// bsgrub bya
240b3(rgyud): rgyas par dmigs na su// rdo rje phur ba la sogs pa// sems can dkyil 'khor gnas pa la// sgrub pos de yi zhes pa spros// de nas phyag mtshan tri sha dang // phur bu drag po mchog dag gis// mgo dang snying
240b4(rgyud): ka lte ba dang // rkang pa gnyis dang lag pa yi// gnas lnga rab tu phu dag bya ste// rtse lnga'i 'od zer lnga po yis// srin bu 'dza' lu ke bzhin du// khrag kun sngags kyis drangs nas su// 
240b5(rgyud): thod par phab nas btung bar bya// de bzhin ga shanams yang bsdu sa nas// bza' ba ru ni rab tu brtag/ rus pa rnams kyang 'chos byas nas/ shes pa rdo rje pad+mar sbyar// 'dzin
240b6(rgyud): don grub rab byed pas// zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yang // 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bu// bsgrub bya legs par bsgrubs byas nas// las ngan dag gis
240b7(rgyud): de mi 'khor// sangs rgyas su ni skye bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor de yang de yi mthus// khro bo mkha' 'gro zhes 'gyur te// khams gsum bsad dang gso ba dang // sems kyi rdo rje brtan byas nas// skad
240b8(rgyud): thig tsam du byed par 'gyur// gsal bar nus pa gdon mi za// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las rdo rje mkha' 'gro khro bo'i sbyor bas dag bsad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas zhan yA/ 
241a1(rgyud): bshad bya ba/ 'dod chags thabs chen po yi rgyud// gang gis legs par shes na ni// tshe 'dis dngos grub sbyin par bshad// gsang ba 'dus pa stong phrag gcig/ rdo rje
241a2(rgyud): phre la 'bum phrag gsum// dgongs pa lung ston stong phrag bzhi// lha mo bzhis zhus brgya bdun nu// u dar tan tA nyis brgya brgyad// de yi nye bar bshad pa'i rgyud// dam tshig chen po lnga bcu lnga// rdo rje lnga 'dus
241a3(rgyud): stong phrag gcig kun las btus pa 'bus phrag gcig// mnyam zhing rnam rgyal nyis brgya bcu// zla gsang thig le stong bdun brgya// rdo rje sa 'og brgya nyi shu// bcod pan rdo rje bdun brgya lnga// khro zla
241a4(rgyud): thig le 'bum phrag lnga// rdo rje rnam rgyal rgya dgu brgya// mnyam nyid gsang ba stong phrag lnga// rdo rje gsang rgyan stong phrag lnga// rdo rje gsang mdzod stong phrag bdun/ nor bu gsang thig 'dum
241a5(rgyud): brag gcig snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul stong dang brgya// rdo rje gsang rgyan stong phrag gcing// rdo rje thod pa nyis brgya brgya// de nyid brgya stong brgya stong 'dun// dam tshig mngon rgyan
241a6(rgyud): stong phrag 'bum// 'jam dpa' dpe'o 'bum phrag gcig/ gsang chen bsdus pa brgya lnga bcu// rin chen sdong po dgu brgya bdun/ dus kyi thig le brgya brgyad cu// lha mo bstan chos lnga brgya bdun/ 
241a7(rgyud): 'di rnams dgos pa'i bye brag gis/ nga yis yang dag bstan par bya// 'di ni gnyis po 'khyud pa yi/ rgyud kyi dbye ba bstan pa'o// de bzhin du ni lag bcangs dang // dgong dang bltas pas shes par
241a8(rgyud): bya de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug gi / rgyud rnams kun kyang shes par bya/ mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud kun yang // 'di yi rim pas shes par bya/ phyi nang dbye ba shes pa yi// rgyud kyi dbye ba shes parabya/ 
241b1(rgyud): nang du bstan pa bla ma'i las/ yang dag blangs te bsgrub par bya// ci bzhin gnas pa la dgongs te// bde bar gshegs pas rgyud kun bstan// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud// mkha 'gom dang mkha 'gro ba/ rgyud
241b2(rgyud): rnams kun gyi phyi mo ste// gzhan du ma bsgrags don gang zhig/ 'di ru yang drag bstan pa ste/ rnal 'byor gang zhig len pa 'am// sgom par byed dam 'chad pa 'am/ klog par byed pa rnal 'byor che/ de yang dang
241b3(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyur// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud thams cad kyi dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ga/ sna tshogs mdo dang rgyud rnams kyis// sdom pa yang dag shes
241b4(rgyud): 'gyur na// mkha' 'gro chen por 'gyur bar bshad// gang gis nyan thos rab 'byin pa// spong ba ltung ba'i bye brag bshad// bslab pa dang ni rdzas grags kyis// 'di ru shes kyang
241b5(rgyud): yongs rdzogs byed// tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa gsum// dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sdom pa nyi shu la sogs dang / sems can don byed pa'i tshul khrims/ byang chub sems
241b6(rgyud): dpa' rab 'byin pa/ lus ngag yid gsum rab byung ba'i// sdom pa des kyang mkha 'gro yi// rgyud rnams yang dag sbyor bar byed// zla ba snang dang gtsang sbra bsdom// grong dang gnag ltas thang la yang // ngag
241b7(rgyud): lus yid kyis sems can la// gnod pa dag ni yong mi byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdom pa mchog bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// 'gro ba'i don byed byang chub sems/ bde gshegs thob
241b8(rgyud): phyir rab tu gzung // rdo rje mi bskyod rigs chen po// rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang / blo dpon yang ni bzung byas pas// de yi yon tan zab par byed// rin chen tog gi rigs mthon po/ nyin mo mtshan lan gsu
242a1(rgyud): dung zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang dbang // byin pas de yon tan 'thob// pad+mo snang ba'i rigs dag la// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// dam tshig rab tu bzung ba yis// bla med dang
242a2(rgyud): chub thob par byed// rnga sgra las kyi rigs mang po// dam tshig dang ni sdom par ldan// bsnyen bkur mchod pa sems can don// byas pa de yis yon tan thob// srog mi gcod cing g.yem mi bya// ma byin
242a3(rgyud): mi blang brdzun mi smra// bram khyal ba'i tshig rtsub mos// smra bar mi bya ba rnab sems dang // gnod sems log par lta ba rnams// nam yang bya ba ma yin// dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spong // lha dang bla ma
242a4(rgyud): de bzhin// nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba'i phyir// chang yang rnam pa ra spang bar bya// phyag rgya gzhon pa mtshon cha sogs// mtsha na ma 'am ni lha yi grib// bgom dang bza' bar mi bya ba// de la
242a5(rgyud): sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// sdom pa gang de gsung sa pa rnams// 'di ru dang po'i las can la// de yis yang dag 'jug par byed// thun mong ma yin phas pham pa// bcu bzhir
242a6(rgyud): grags pa gang 'di ni// sngag pa don kun 'grub byed pas// spang zhing dor bar mi bya'o// slob dpon snying nas smod pa dang // bde gshegs bka' las 'da' byed dang // zhe sdang gis ni ched sun 'byin/ 
242a7(rgyud): byams sems med par sems can spangs// byang chub sems chen 'dor ba dang // bdag gzhan grub pa'i mtha' smod byed// smod mi rung la gsang ba bstan// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid phung po smong/ 
242a8(rgyud): dag pa'i chos la som nyi byed// gsum ldan khro la byams ldan te// stong pa thal byung la rtog pa// dad ldan sems ni sun 'byin byed// dam tshig dang ldan gtso mi byed// shes ldan bud med smod/ 
242b1(rgyud): par byed// sngags pas de dag yongs spangs na// nges par dngos grub thob par byed// de la sngags pa yongs 'das na// nges par bdud dang phrad par 'gyur// nad dang sdug bsngal 'phel gyur te/ 
242b2(rgyud): bstir med spyi'u tshugs dmyal bar 'gro// sbom po ltung byed nyes dmigs kyang // de dang 'dra bar shes par bya// dam tshig mi ldan rig mar bsten// tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod par byed// gsang
242b3(rgyud): ba'i chos ni ston pa dang // dad ldan rnams la gzhan du ston// nyan thos nang du yun ring sa gnas// snod mi rung la ga5// kha na mtho sbom 'gyur te// sngags pa de yi dam sdom zad// zad pas 'grur
242b4(rgyud): bar yong mi 'gyur// de babazhin ra lan gsum du/ kha ton gyis ni bklag par bya/ dkyil 'khor mthong dang zhugs pa dang // dbang bskur ba la sogs tshul gyi// rdo rje ma
242b5(rgyud): 'gro thob pa bzhin// byang chub sems dang nyan thos dang // bya dang gnyi ga rnal 'byor rgyud// dgongs gsungs rnam sa kyis de lta min// de lta bas na sdom pa'i mchog/ nga yis yang
242b6(rgyud): ngag bstan par bya// dri chen dri chu rak+ta dang / shes dang byang chub sems rnams ni// bza' ba'i sbyor bas yang dag bza'// lto yi ye shes mes sbyangs phyir// phyi rol zas las khyad par 'gyur
242b7(rgyud): de bzhin glang chen rta sha dang // ba lang khyi sha sha chen rnam// ye shes lnga yi ngo bo'i phyir// dga' bar sems kyis bza' bar bya// de bzhin sems can bsad par bya/ ma byin par yang blang bar bya'o// 
242b8(rgyud): bud med thams cad 'dod pa spyad// brdzun tshig dag kyang smra bar bya// de ltar byas pas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par 'gyur// sems can rnams kyang tshim zhing dgal/ 
243a1(rgyud): de bzhin rnal 'byor snying po yis// sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems// rang 'dren nyan thos sku gzugs sogs// rang zhing dag pa gsum sbyor bas// phyag byas na ni mi rung
243a2(rgyud): 'gyur// kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ lus ngag yid kyi dkyil 'khor pas// rang nyid bsam gtan gsum sbyor bas// dbyer med blo yis mi bya'o// dkyil 'khor dag kyang mi bri'o// glegs
243a3(rgyud): bam dag kyang mi bkrago// mchod rten las kyang yong mi bya/ lag pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyang spang // nyin re zhing ni dus bzhi ru// bu mo legs par goms pa las// ga pur can ngan khas blangs te/ 
243a4(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du lus 'khor chod// rol mo'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa// nga yi rgyud las rab bstan pas// bcu drug thig le ngal so las// sngags kyi snying po brtag par bya// bla ma dam pa/ 
243a5(rgyud): thugs rje ches// yang dag bstan pa la dmigs pas// byin ci lo ga khur yongs 'dor te// rdo rje 'dzin par 'drar 'gyur// dang la rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las dam tshig dang sdom pa
243a6(rgyud): dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas ro langs chen mo yi// sgrub pa yang dag bshad par bya// sgrub pos legs par shes gyur na// dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o// nag po yi ni tshes brgya
243a7(rgyud): dang // yang na bcu bzhi gang yang rung // shing cig dur khrod ma mo 'am// yang na mi med gro bar du// sngon du sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can// las kun 'grub par byed pa sgrub// mda' mkhan ma dang sme sha can// 
243a8(rgyud): gdol pa mo dang gar mkhan sogs/ mdun gyi so la lhag yod pa// byad dang mdangs ldan rma med ma// lo na sum cu rtsa gnyis bsngags/ yang na nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// yang na chu dang dang por skyes// sbyangs nas/ 
243b1(rgyud): shi bA sbags pa// yang dag blangs te pha bong steng // gzhan yang bu mo skra bzung ste// lha bzhad dang ni dbang po lag/ dkar po dang ni ri sgra dang / gru gnon chu yis bkru bar bya// de nas can dan dkar po yI/ 
243b2(rgyud): bu mo lus byugs rgyan dang gros/ yang dag brgyan te mdun bzhag nas// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bya ste/ rtsa sogs gsang sngags rab tu bzla// 'byung po'i gtor ma yang byin te/ shan nag po
243b3(rgyud): mdangs dang ldan// myos byed bsregs pa ro yi khar// mtshan gcig thog zag sbyin bsreg bya// de nas tho rangs dus su yang // khrag chen phyogs bzhir gtor nas ni/ mar khung chen po ro la sku// de nas ro
243b4(rgyud): de langs 'gyur te// khro dang ldan pa'i ag tsar gyis// sa gsum mo yi sgras 'gengs byed// de tshe sgrub po skrag mi bya// snga ma ki yi sbyor ba sogs// srung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya// 
243b5(rgyud): skrag na de ma thag tu gsod// de tshe srung bas bsrung byas nas// bang gnyid langs te de yi ror// yungs kar gyis ni brdeg par/ bya// de nas de ni babs 'gyur te// sgrub pa pa yi mdun
243b6(rgyud): gnas nas/ bka' nad 'di skad smra bar byed// sems can chen po khyo ci 'dod// bdag la yang dag bka' stsol cig ral gri mig sman sa 'og gam/ rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len/ mi
243b7(rgyud): snang 'gugs pa las gang dag khe dag gis gcig gcig sbyar bar byar// de nas sgrub po de yis kyang // gang 'dod smras nas cang te'u brdung / de nas ro langs kha de nas/ du ba zul zhing me 'bar ga/ 
243b8(rgyud): de nas sbrul nag lta bu ru// ro yi kha nas 'byung bar byed// de de sgrub pas kha yis blangs// byung ste gser gyi ral grir 'gyur// de thogs tshangs pa'i 'jig rten khams// steng du nges par 'gro/ 
244a1(rgyud): ru ngas bar byed// de bzhin kun tu 'gro bar byed// de bzhin rdzas kun gang la bstan/ tham snga gser 'gyur rtsi lta bu// de bzhin thabs sgrub de byas nas// ro ni snga mkho bzhin
244a2(rgyud): 'gyur te// de yis sbyin sreg rab byas nas// dkyil 'khor yang dag tshim par bya// de bas 'di ni sgrub pa'i mchog/ don kun yang dag 'grub byed pa// las thams cad kyi gtso bo ste// bcom ldan rdo rje sas
244a3(rgyud): dpas gsungs// dpol rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las ro langs chen po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de ni nga yi sgrub po yi// dngos grub slo dpon las byung phyir// rgyud rnams kun las
244a4(rgyud): gsungs pa yi// slob dpon bskur ba'i cho ga bshad// slob dpon ma nga bar gyur na ni// dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur bas// slob dpon grangs dang mtshan nyid ni// yid gcig bsdus la mnyan pa
244a5(rgyud): gyis// dam sdom gyi ni snod gtsang la// slob dpon mtshan nyid yod rdzogs par// byed cing dang po las 'jug par// byed pa rgyu yi slob dpon// ri bong 'dzin pa bskul byed cing / 
244a6(rgyud): de yis sgrub bo zhing dag cing // ye shes sgyu ma'i snod rung byed// rkyen gyi slob dpon chen po'o// lhan cig nyan par gang gyur pa// de las dga' ba yang dag thob thos pas yang dag rab mthar
244a7(rgyud): phyin/ lhan cig byed pa'i slob dpon no// mi 'gyur byams ldan shes rab can// sngags rgyud sbyor shes dkyil 'khor mkhas// de nyid bcu shes theg chen dga'// gsang bzungs thub slob dpon yin/ 
244a8(rgyud): mig bzang ya so bcu drug pa// khu 'khrig rtog pa yA dag spangs// bla ma dga' ba dang mas can// shin tu rgyan gyis rab brgyan pa/ dang ldan sbyor ba la goms pa// gzugs bzang 'dod chags kyis mos
244b1(rgyud): byed// shin tu dul ba khyad par can// bsdu ba'i gnas su yang dag blangs// dge dang sgom pa la dga' ba// rtag tu bla ma la gus pa'i// slob mas bla ma 'di ltar blta// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nyid
244b2(rgyud): rtag tu rdo rje 'chang // de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung // de ni ye shes rgya mtsho che// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen sbyin// de yi yon tan thams cad gzung // skyon kun sems kyis kyang mi bsam
244b3(rgyud): yon tan bzung na dngos grub thob// skyon gyis dngos grub nyams par byed/ mchod rten bshigs dang sdig 'dra'i phyir// de yi grib ma'ang mi 'gom ste// stan dang lham dang bzhon pa dang // 'gom par
244b4(rgyud): bya ba smos ci dgos// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i// mchog kun de yi das spangs par 'gyur// slob dpon smod par byed pa de// rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya// de ni bgegs dang log
244b5(rgyud): 'dren dang // rims dang smyig dang gshin rjes 'dzin/ 'chi bar rab tu 'gyur ba ste// ngan pa gtum po blun chen te/ phyog sa bzhi dag tu song gyur yang // blo ldan rnams kyis mi
244b6(rgyud): srung bar// mdung la sogs pa'i mtshon cha yi// kha na ma zo byed pa bsang // mdo sogs bstan pa'i dmyal ba ru// slob dpon smod par byed pa ste// gnas par 'gyur ba nga yis bstan// de bas bla ma'i
244b7(rgyud): zhabs drung du// bag ma bzhin du ngo cha srung / glal dang dgod pa lung ba sogs// kha la lag pas bkob na su// shin tu 'jam par smra bar bya// mgo thod bcing dang mtshon byug pa// bla ma'i drung du mi
244b8(rgyud): bya'o// khri brdung ba dang bar ma tshig dag / thos pa'i yul nas mi bya'o// mdun 'gro ba dang rkang pa brkyang // yang dag nyid du mi bya'o// las ni gang dag byed pa 'am// mnyan pa la sogs 'dod pa la/ 
245a1(rgyud): gzung phyir thal mos bsheg par// gnas nas langs te mthong yul du// rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya ste// mtshan mo dang ni chu rgal dang // cong rong dag tu gnas gyur na/ 
245a2(rgyud): lung gzhar du dgum pa'i phyir// mdun du 'gro ba zhes mi 'gyur// de bas thabs ni thams cad kyis// rdo rje 'dzin pa bla ma mchog rjesu 'thun pas mnyes par bya// de mnyes sangs rgyas thams cad
245a3(rgyud): mnyes// gang gis slob dpon yang dag smad// de yis rgyud kun sgrub pa'i mchog/ gnyid dang 'du 'dzi rnam spangs te// bskal pa stong du legs bsgrubs kyang // dam la sogs sgrub par byed pa'o//
