245a4(rgyud): de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrims te// bsam pa 'bras bu smon byed/ pa'i// sangs rgyas 'bras bu smin byed pa'i// sangs rgyas 'dra sra bu 'dod pa yis// sems can dang dang ldan pas ma
245a5(rgyud): dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las bla ma bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / rdo rje pad+mo sbyor ba las yang dag ye she sa skye 'gyur bas/ sgyu ma'i mchog ni bud med de// de yi
245a6(rgyud): ming dang mtshan nyid bstan// hasti ni dang shang khi nA~M// ka ma lA dang tsi tra nA// thaMd rigs ni bzhir 'gyur te/ hasti rak+ta ro tsho ba// sbom mo 'dod chags yang dag che// pad yangs kha nas ra rul gro// dkar 'char mtha' phra go
245a7(rgyud): byed/ shang khi rak+ta ro bsgyur ba// rkang pa sna legs cung zad khro// kha nas dung khro 'gros dal legs// dkar 'chang dpal gyi 'bras bu 'dra// ka ma'i rak+ta'i ro dmar zhing / shang khi rak+ta'i ro bsgyur ba// pra sbom ran
245a8(rgyud): pa dmar mo ste// 'dod tshigs mig ni mi 'dzums// dkar 'chang a ri sha 'dra ga/ tsi ta rak+ta ro mngar shing // thun ru na khro bag dang bcas/ chags min lta byed do gnag pa/ dkar 'chang g.yas g.yon dbye
245b1(rgyud): bste 'di rnams yang dag phrang gyur na// sgrub pa po la tshe 'di ru// dngos grub yang dag ster ba ste/ de bas 'di rnams 'ab bas btsal/ yang dag rnyed nas gang rung du/ ba lang bza' ni mnga' yinang / lung
245b2(rgyud): bas shes khams rnam par 'phel// don thabs kyi ster ba yis// yang dag tu ni rang bzhin brtag/ rang bzhin na mkha' lta bu ste// dngos po thams cad zad pa ste// rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang // bral ba'i dag
245b3(rgyud): ba yang dag zab// bsam med zad med phra mo ste// dam pa zhi ba rnam dag pa// 'chi meng rdo rje bdud brjod// gang gi dbus su 'dab brgyad pa// snying po lnga yis yang dag rgyan// de dbus de gnas che nas lnga// 
245b4(rgyud): cha gnyis pa ni brgyad mthar dbyung // sum cu bcu lnga yi ni// chag nyis lnga pa drug pa yi// thig le'u ni gzhug pa ste// skyes bu gang gis de la ni// mig gi 'od zer gyis blta ga/ 
245b5(rgyud): de la ci bzhin gnas pa yi// ye shes skye ba ba tsam med/ nam zhig 'gog pa'i sems gyur na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa/ dang ldan mkha 'gro 'dra bar cu
245b6(rgyud): de ring phan chad bu khyod ni// dkyil 'khor yang dag 'dri ba dang // sgrub po rgyud la sbyor ba yi// slob dpon chen po nyid du 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang // dbang bskur bar ni rab bsngags
245b7(rgyud): te thams cad sngags ni sgrub 'gyur te// las mchog khyad par can yang 'grub// bu mo 'di ni khyod dang 'thun// sems can khyod kyis 'dod ba gyis// yid du 'ong ba'i rig ma 'di// bde gshegs
245b8(rgyud): kun gyis khyod spod gnas// stong pa la ni sems sbyor na// khyod ni yang dag dam par 'gyur// 'di ni bde gshegs bde mdzad pa// khyod nyid 'di las rab byung // dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud
246a1(rgyud): las dmigs pa dam bcas pa'i shes rab kyi mtshan zhing rtag pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// dngos kun chog shes med na// sgrub po dngos grub
246a2(rgyud): 'byung mi 'gyur// de phyir 'dir ni brtul zhugs bstan// spor ba'i rtsol ba thams cad ni// de nyid rig pas spang bar bya// rdo rje sems dang nges 'dug pa// spangs nas gzhan du mi bya'o// dag po de nyid la
246a3(rgyud): gnas pas// sbyor ba rnams kyang mi bya ste// bdag med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// ci sring bar du so sor brtag/ dngos med go 'phang la gnas dang // thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis// rgyud las
246a4(rgyud): gci 'byung ba rnams// ma brtags pas ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sgom pa'i sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ni// dngos grub mtshan nyid gang yang rung // de kun skad cig tsam la ni// rang nyid ga
246a5(rgyud): par gyur pa yin// de bas dge slong dngos gnas dang // de bzhin rtog dga'o rgan po dang // rang gi bu dang rgyal po la/ de nyid yang dag bshang mi bya// ci ltar mar me bum na
246a6(rgyud): gnas/ pha rol ral tu ni 'od mi gsal// bum pa de nyid chag par gyur// de 'og mar me gsal bar 'gyur// de bzhin rang lus bum pa nyid// de nyid mar me nyid lta bu// bla ma'i kha yis legs
246a7(rgyud): bcag nas// sbyor ba'i de nyid ston pa yin// sbyor ba de nyid la gnas na// sna che brtag pa mi rtag la// gnas shing 'jig rten pa spangs te// spyod pa zang byas na ni// de la de tshe sangs rgyas gzigs// kun tu the tsom
246a8(rgyud): gcod pa yi/ rig pas byis pa bzhin du spyad// gang tshe chags me ngarnal 'byor pa// de tshe phun sum tshogs 'phel 'gyur// sdig pa ma lus ldan pa dang // gti mug sgrib pa rab gnas pa/ sbyin/ 
246b1(rgyud): ba'i rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis// zla dag gis ni don yod grub// rang nyid sangs rgyas kun mthong zhing // 'dod pa kun gyis rab tu 'gengs// zad med gzhom du med pa dang // dang pa'i sku tshe 'byung bar 'gyur
246b2(rgyud): bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog/ 'bade pa med par yang dag 'thob// 'dod pa kun gyi dga' mos rnams// 'bad bral bas ni 'gab par 'gyur// 'gro dang 'dug dang gnas pa na// mchog tu zab pa'i gan+da
246b3(rgyud): la rtag/ 'od gas 'i ye shes lam mkhan pa// mtshan nyid rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis no// sems kyi rin chen brtan par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bshu
246b4(rgyud): pa/ byin gyis brlab pa'ang mdzad par 'gyur// de ltar gyur pa sa zhugs nas kyang // ji srid sems ni mi skyo bar// mnyadam gzhag yid ni bzang po dang // de la 'bad pas sgom
246b5(rgyud): par bya// de 'og la ni ci dga' ba'i// spyad pa yid ni gcig byas na// cung zad spun phye ba yi mtshan// byang chub rgya chen thob pa ra 'gyur// dgod dam sla 'am 'gug pa 'am// la lar
246b6(rgyud): rab tu gar byed par// ci srid skyobar mi 'gyur bar// sgom pa'i sems la zhen par bya// de lta'i dam tshig ldan gyur cing // rnam par mi rtog sngags pa yis// dus kyi nges pas yongs spangs nas// 
246b7(rgyud): bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las shes byed kun tu sbyong ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas mkha'agro de dag bde gcig tu 'dus te bcom ldan 'das
246b8(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa la tshig su bcas pas bstod pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin las// byung ba'i lha ste khyod mchog pas// sems dpa' kun gyi phyag rgya che// mkha' gro chen po phyag 'tshalo// 
247a1(rgyud): gti mug thams cad 'od gsal ba// mkha'agro sangs rgyas chen po ste// gzugs snang chos ni rnam dag pa// bde gshegs mkha' gro khyod la phyag 'tshal/ 
247a2(rgyud): nga rgyal thaMd 'od gsal ba// mkha 'gro re 'dod song ba ste// sim sogs chos ni rnam dag pa/ rin chen mkha' gro khyod phyag 'tshal// 'dod chags thams cad 'od gsal ba// skyon
247a3(rgyud): gyis gos med mkha'agro che// mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnam dag pa/ pad+mo mkha' gro khyod phyag 'tshal// phrag dog chos ni 'od gsal ba// mkha'agro sna tshogs las byed pa// mngon par
247a4(rgyud): 'du byed chos kun dag/ sna tshogs mkha' gro phyag 'tshal bstod// mtshan mchog 'di yis khyod bstod pas// ga dang zag de yang bsod nams tshogs// ye shes
247a5(rgyud): tshogs chen yongs rdzogs nas// sangs rgyas 'gyur bar gre rtsa ma med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos kun tu bzang po'i bde ba chen po namakha'i dbyings zad
247a6(rgyud): du khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi snying po mi shigs pa'i zla ba bskul bar byed pa ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// rang gi thugs ka'i mi shigs pa'i big
247a7(rgyud): le las shin tu dgos pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi gsang ba'i snying po zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su rgyas par byas te// na mkha'i dbyings zad du yang
247a8(rgyud): snang bar byas nas steng 'og du yang bzhugs te/ malu kyi rdus pa de 'i na seMn zad la gsal bar byas nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bas mnyes par byas te slar logs nas bac+doMs shin tu dgyes pa
247b1(rgyud): chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po'i snying mchog gi zla ba'i thig le'i dbus na bde bar bzhag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog tu bde bar gyur
247b2(rgyud): pa'i snying po des bskul ban gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'i thugs kha'i zla ba'i theg le'i dbu su gsang ba'i dgyes pa chen po'i
247b3(rgyud): bde bar gcig tu bsdus par gyur te// rang rang gi sku bud med kyi tshul du skyed bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas mngon par gyur to// de nas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs de dag thams cad rab tu dgar
247b4(rgyud): nas caco'i sgra yang dag par 'byin cing dbyangs chen po brjod paragyur to// kye ma'i rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje shin tu dgyes na po// kye ma'o sna tshogs babs ni bde byed che// 
247b5(rgyud): sna tshogs ye shes bde ba che// kye ma'o// kun tu bzang po yi// dpe ba'i ye shes bde byed che// gang bde'i phyir ni rig ma yi// pad+mo la ni gnas par mdzod// kye ma'o reg pa shin tu
247b6(rgyud): zab/ shes rab pha rol phyin ma 'di// sems can kun la shes rab kyi// mun pa thibs po sel bar mdzad// kye mo'o tha~Md ngo mtshar che// mkha' 'gro dra bar bar mdzad cing // rnam par snang mdzad myang
247b7(rgyud): ba dang / men pa dang ni 'phrog pa mchog/ kye ma'o shin tu dgyes// skra ldan sprul spyod pa dang ni/ sna tshogs skal bas bde che// sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu mdzes// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
247b8(rgyud): pad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen pos ting 'dzin las bzhengs te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas te 'di ces bka' stsal to// a li ni ka li dang / de thung zla ba rnam pa gnyis/ me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ 
248a1(rgyud): gcig tu gyur pa mnam nyid// sa bon mtshan mar gyur pa ni/ so sor rtog par ngas bshad do// de zung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'gro don bye ba bya nan tan// gzugs bsnan rdzog
248a2(rgyud): pa chos dbyings te// lha yi dbang po sangs rgyas bskyod// de la bar mas khu bas bskyed// bskur bas rang gi lhar bskyed nas// byin gyis brlab pa bya ba ni// rgyud rnams kyi ni thun mo // gsang dang gsang chen
248a3(rgyud): shin tu gsang // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po dang // rje su rnal 'byor zhes bya dang // stong pa dang ni shun tu stong // chen po stong pa zhes bya dang // dga' dang dga' ba bar ma dang // dga' bral gyi ni dga' ba rnams/ 
248a4(rgyud): rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi bo'o// phyir bzlog gnyis kyi ngag dang // gsang dang shes rab ye shes dang / kha sbyor 'byed pa'i cho ga dang // gtor ma rdo rje'i zlas pa dang // drag shul sgrub
248a5(rgyud): pa'i cho ga dang // rab tu gnas dang dkyil 'khor sgra pa// gsang ba'i de nyid bcu yin no// dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin phyag rgya dang // stang stabs 'dug stangs bzlas brjod dang / spyan
248a6(rgyud): sreg mchod pa las sbyar dang slar sdud pa yi rnam pa ni// phyi yi de nyid bcu yin no// yang dag de nyid dngos po mi shes par// gsang sngags smra ba yin zhes brjod pa// de dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal gsang
248a7(rgyud): sngags cho ga 'chad// de ni dam nyams 'di dang pha rol brlag/ nyams pas bdud kyis bzung nas shi nas dmyal bar 'gro// sems can rnams la rab brten te// byang chub dam pa tho ba 'gyur gson smra ba ma
248a8(rgyud): bya ste/ bde gshegs las ra la sems can sbyar// gang zhig sbyor 'di mi brtson pas/ rkang lag mig sogs sbyin pa dang / dka' thub ci 'dra spyad byas kyang // bdud rtsi ro thob mi nus so// rnal 'byor/ 
248b1(rgyud): gcig gcig shes byas nas// dben par song ste rab 'bad na// sdig dag tshe 'dir sangs rgyas 'grub// chos bdag med par rab bsgoms nas// thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chod// thabs shes gnyis
248b2(rgyud): kyi 'jo sgeg gis// gsang ba snga yis bdag nyid mchod// dngos po thams cad dngos med par// bzhi bcu'i don ni rtogs pa dang // rdo rje pad+ma dbang bskur ba/ bdud rtsi yis ni dga' bar byed// gas
248b3(rgyud): bar bya ba'i chos gsang bas// gsang zhing sbas te spyad par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la ni// rnal 'byor sems dpas spang zhing // de bzhin bza' dang btung byas na// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// 
248b4(rgyud): 'di la khrus dang gtsang sbra med de mchod phyir thogs pa 'ang med// dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg me de dus dang gza' tshes med// gtor ma la sogs bya bar bya ba med de mchog gi mchog
248b5(rgyud): dang po// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa yang dag 'di nyid yin te brtson par bya/ de nas mang 'gro de dag thams cad rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la leg so zhes
248b6(rgyud): gsol te// leg so legs 'a byed che// leg so legaso ye shes che// leg so legaso bde ba che/ leg so legaso sna tshogs che/ legaso legaso dgyes pa che/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
248b7(rgyud): pa chen pos thugs rje chen po'i thugs rang gi thugs yang dag pa la dmigs nas cang mi gsungs par zhug so// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud rnal 'byor chen po'i de kho na nyid nges pa ces bya ba dang
248b8(rgyud): u r+yan gyi gsang ba'i dgon pa nas byung ba rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
249a1(rgyud): phab pa// stong phrag gi chad du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen byin gyis brlabs nas// de'i dbus gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang
249a2(rgyud): 'dus par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bo la gsol ba btab po// rdo rje chos phyir khyod leg so// rdo rje'i spyan phyir khyod leg so// rdo rje ye shes phyir khyod legs// sangs rgyas ye shes phyir
249a3(rgyud): khyod legs// gong bzhin du sbyaro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kun
249a4(rgyud): la phan par mdzad// sems can mgon la gsol ba ni// khyab bdag theg pa chen po'i tshul// theg pa'i mchog ni bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de
249a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad la 'di skad cesabaka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad de skad ma zer cig/ spro ba mchog gi
249a6(rgyud): de kho na nyid kyi tshul nges par bstan par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu gsungs so// ci'i rgyus rdo rje 'dzin rab tu gsung / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
249a7(rgyud): thams cad kyis dgongs// de nyid kyi tshe 'khor chen po'i dkyil 'khor du/ byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams theg pa chen po mchog gi don gyi tshul chen
249a8(rgyud): po 'di thos nas// rnam pa stong du rnam par bsnyil bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol pa/ khyod kyis zhi bar byin rlabs pas/ sangs rgyas rnams
249b1(rgyud): kyi rnam pa can// khyab bdag de nyid rdo rje can/ byin rlabs mnyam par kun tu spyod// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes spyan gdangs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la le
249b2(rgyud): byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor lo chen po'i 'od zer gyis bkang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs yang dag par bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i
249b3(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhi rab tu byung bar gyur te/ shar gyi phyogasu mi zad pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i ni
249b4(rgyud): ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin tu byung bar gyuto// lho phyog su rin po che yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba nga'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin tu byung bar gyur to// nub phyogasu 'a
249b5(rgyud): med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin tu byung bar gyur to// byang phyogs don yod pa'i das tshi ga chagi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin byung
249b6(rgyud): bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnyi su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
249b7(rgyud): po sten to// rdo rje'i spyod pa mngon par brtson pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi phyogs bcu rnamasu de bzhin// de bzhin du yon tan khyad par du
249b8(rgyud): 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang // de bzhin du yon tan dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang thabs gcig tu phyogs bcur bzhug so// 'di lta ste yang stong gsum gyi snying chen po zhes bya ba'i
250a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams mkha' snang gi 'od zer gyis g.yogs par gyur to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis lhan cig pa dang 'thun pa tsam du yang mi bzod pa
250a2(rgyud): 'od zer du byas pa de lta kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od rdo rje sems dpa'i kyis mog mog por gyur nas kun tu gnaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
250a3(rgyud): cad phyag na rdo rje la byang chub sanga' dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i sprin rnams kyis yang dag par mcho de/ kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba bskyed cang mi gsung ba'i rnam par gan
250a4(rgyud): par gyur to// de nas kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams kyi rang gi thugs la bzhag nas ye shes kyi rigs de bskyed pa gsang chen dang bcas pa/ 
250a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba gsal bar byed pa'i rgyud rang gi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te ye shes kyi rigs rang gi ting 'dzin ston to// log
250a6(rgyud): bzhi pa la zur bzhi pa/ rin chen bzhi dang yang ngag ldan// 'o ma zho ni kun bkram par// byas nas bsam gtan yang dag brtsas// de yi dbusu pad+ma che/ shel dang zla ba mnyam pa'i 'od// gsal
250a7(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor rgyun tu bsgom par bya// 'bar ba'i 'dus pa de rnamasu// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam par sgom// kun nas yongasu zlum po ni// khru ni nyi shu bsam
250a8(rgyud): par byang cho ga shes pas de dbus// rang gzugs dge ba bsgom par bya// bdag dang bdag gir rnam rtog pa// dor ba'i bsam gtan yang dag brtsam// ye shes rigs kyi tshi ga yis// gas
250b1(rgyud): sngags sems la rjes dran bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na ku la swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ 'dis phyag rgya mnyam par 'dus pas// sdig pa thams cad yongasu dor bar bya'o// 'od zer stong phrag bcu pa ni/ 
250b2(rgyud): dang por bsams nas dri ma dbug/ ye shes rigs kyi cho ga yis// rig pa'i rgyal po rnam par sgom// 'od dkar phra mo 'bar ba ni// deng ni kun tu rnam par dgod// thams cad de nyidadu bya ste// bsgom pa
250b3(rgyud): bya bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba 'di gsung so// rang lus shin tu brtan byas nas// 'od kyi tshul gyi cho ga rnams// sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'dus pas
250b4(rgyud): ni/ mtshon pas rdor sems bskyed pas so// cho ga shes pas rab brtsams na// de yi dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// rang gi gzugs ni mi g.yo bar// byas nas rdor sems
250b5(rgyud): cho ga rnams/ ji srid na mkha' 'gongs gyur pa// cho gshes pas spro bar bya/ sang+yas gzugs dang rang gzugs shing // byas nas kun sbyor mtshan nyid kyi// rnal 'byor
250b6(rgyud): bsam gtan du su ni/ rdzogs bya de la rab tu gzhugs// rang gi gzugs dang sang+yas gzug ji ltar gnas ltar blo dang ldan// ji ltar rigs par sbyor ba ni/ rdo rje sems par bsgoms par bya/ 
250b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyirje/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsung so// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// rang lus bsgom bya rnal 'byor po// de nyid rdo rje'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje dbyer ma
250b8(rgyud): de sde mo// 'od lnga shin tu phyung nas ni// byang chub sems ni rnam par sgom// snying khar sangs rgyas kun ni mchod par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje/ bac+doMs kyis 'di gsung so// 'bar po'i phres
251a1(rgyud): ba'i khrugs pa'i 'od// dkyil 'khor lnga ni bsam par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'dus pas ni// bkang ste sngags ni bsgoms pa las// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan
251a2(rgyud): ltar byas nas// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can bsgom bya// rang gi gzugs der bsam bya// rtog pa bskyed pa'i cho ga las// thugs la byang chub sems kyang ni// bsgom bya la rnal 'byor
251a3(rgyud): skyes// rdo rje sems dpas rnam par rgyan/ cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya// der yang rdo rje sems dpa' la// sangs rgyas ni gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas
251a4(rgyud): gzugs// yi ge phra mo rnam par bsgom// yi ge rnamasu thaMd du// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// de rnams dang ni yi ge gnyis// / rang gzugs rnam par mnyam sgom la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
251a5(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// mkhas pas rang gzugs bsgom par bya// ji srid nam mkha' 'gongs gyur pa// zhing 'di byab par g.yog par bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// rdo rje'i rnal 'ad
251a6(rgyud): rnam sgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// 'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya// ji srid na mkha' 'gongs gyur pa'i// zhing 'di khyab par g.yog par bya// 
251a7(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyi ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam sgom pa// sang+yas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms pas// zla ba'i
251a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam sgom pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam sgom pa/ chos kyi rgyal// pad+ma'i rnal 'byor cho ga yis// sgom pa thaMd brtag par bya// sgom pa
251b1(rgyud): la sogs yongs 'dzin las// gzhan du mchod bya min pa nyid// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom nas/ shin tu brtan par brtan pa'i sems// byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// rgyun tu bdag nyid rnam bsgom/ 
251b2(rgyud): byasa'adi ni rdo rje'i tshul zhi ba/ rnon po bzhi nga mnyam pa'i 'o// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam sgom pas// cho ga shes pas dgang bar bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsung so// de nas kun
251b3(rgyud): tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs las phyungango // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams na mkha'i khams thams cad bkang ste/ byang chub
251b4(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i sprin rnams kyis yang dag par mchod// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'dud pa dang ldan par kun tu gnas par gyur to// de nas
251b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas/ kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chen po la / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa' smin chen/ 
251b6(rgyud): po rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de phyag 'tshal nas// byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la rab tu zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer kun tu gang ste// 'od zer de rnams de bzhin
251b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yang dag par bskul bar gyur to// de nas kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par mdzad nas// ye shes kyis gas 'di rgyas par byed
251b8(rgyud): nga'i rgyu rang gi gzugs rnam par snang ma dzad kyi gzugasu byin gyis brlabs nas rang gi gzugs kyi rnam pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dam tshig gi snying po ye shes
252a1(rgyud): rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi le'u gsung so// de nyid thams cad byed bzhin pa'i// bsam gtan kun sbyor mtshan nyid kyis// cho ga shes pas rab tu brtsam// 'di ni de nyid tshul dag pa'o/ 
252a2(rgyud): zhi ma'i dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pas// khru ni stong phrag bsam par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// waM yig de la sgom par bya// kun nas yongasu zlum por ni/ mthe chung ma tsam
252a3(rgyud): bsam par bya// 'bar ba de la cho ga shes// sna tshogs kha dog rnam par sgom// de ni 'bar ba yang dag skyes// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// phyogs rnams kun tu oM yig ni// kha dog
252a4(rgyud): sna tshogs rnams bsam bya// rnam snang la sogasanadam sgom pas// cho ga shes pas bskyed par bya/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa'o// dag
252a5(rgyud): nyid de la bsam pa ni// dga' ba skyed pa'i cho ga las snying gi dbus son phra mo ni// dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor2// sngags yig phra mo'i gzugs rnams kyis de de sems la/ 
252a6(rgyud): bsam par bya// oM yig 'od zer yang dag sbyor// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ sangs rgyas gzugs sogs mtshan nyid kyis// cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya// sangs rgyas gzugs
252a7(rgyud): nams bad du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// sangs rgyas bsred pa'i cho ga las// rang gi gzugasu de la bya'o// nyi ma lnga ni dgod bya ba// rdo rje thugasu cho ga las// nyi ma lnga ni dgod bya ga/ sngags
252a8(rgyud): pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khos na/ dpral ba ra ni rnam par sgom// 'od tshor 'bar ba mnyas pa'i nga / sangs rgyas gzugasu rnam par sgom// 'jig rten khams rnams rim par 'das/ slar yang de la rab
252b1(rgyud): bzhug bya// khru yi tshad las 'das pa yis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed// rang gi gzugs nyid bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces/ 
252b2(rgyud): gsung so// ye shes kyi rigs rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rang gi gzugs ni bsgom bya dag zur du rnam snang bzhag bya ste// rdo rje sems dpa'
252b3(rgyud): rnam bsgom bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// cho ga shes pas gzugs bcu drug/ kha dog bzhir ni rnam bsam bya// snying kha rnams dang thams cad du// lha rnams de la bsgom
252b4(rgyud): par bya/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsung so// rang gi gzugs la bgegs 'joms par// sems pa rten par bsgom par bya/ hUM yig dbugs nas phyung nas ni/ 'od zer
252b5(rgyud): rnam par rab tu gzhag/ ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung so// rang ga zugs la sogs mtshungs pa'i 'ong // lha ru skad cig de 'gyur// 
252b6(rgyud): yi ge rnams kyi tshad kyis ni// wa yig gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// sngags pas dbus yi ge nyid// byin nas las ni kun tu brtsam/ sngags pas dpral ba'i steng nas ni// ji srid lte ba zhes
252b7(rgyud): bar dran/ gnyisu da pal nyid rnam par rgya ba'i rtog pa chen po las rnam par dgod pa'i le'u dang po rdzog s+ho// // shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad du ni// pad+ma chen po rnam bsgom bya// nyi ma'i dkyil
252b8(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i chu bden sgom// las kyi rdo yang dag bskyed// rang gzugs ngal bsgom par bya// las kyi rdo rje rab bsgoms pas// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur// zhwa
253a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems rabs gsung so// 'o ma dang nobs nas ni// dbusu pad+ma rnam par sgom// rang gzugs sangs rgyas ltar byas nas// mkhas pas rang gzugs rnam
253a2(rgyud): bsgom bya// na mkha'i khams ni kun bkang ste// slar yang de nyid sbar bya ste// 'o mo dang zho mnyam byas nas// sna tshogs kha dog mnyam pa'i 'od// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// nyi ma'i dkyil
253a3(rgyud): 'khor sgom pa ni// rang gzugs sangs rgyas mtshungs pa ni cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya// rang gi gzugs dang thams cad du// lha la sogs pa rnam sgom byed// khru gang tsam las 'das par ni// nyi
253a4(rgyud): ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// bgegs rnams 'joms pa ltar bya sa nas// 'jig rten khamasu 'di sngo bya// rang gi phyag rgya snying kha ru/ bsams nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus/ 
253a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnam par cho ga shes// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ de dbus yi ge byin nas ni// 'jig rten lam su 'di spro bya// gdul ba la sogs can byas nas// slar yang
253a6(rgyud): de nyid la sbyar bya// khru gang tsam las 'das par ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje ral gri yang drag bskyed// 'jig rten khams ni yongs bgrod bya// pad+ma dkar po'i 'od 'bar deng // byang
253a7(rgyud): chub sems kyis rnam par rgyan// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// gzhogasu btsun mo dgod par bya// cho ga shes pas de ltar gzung // rang gi rdo rje de la gzhug/ 'jig rten khams ni thad du// sangs rgyas
253a8(rgyud): nyid kyis mchod par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsung sa// ji srid yang dag thob sbyor skyes// sngags pas slar ni bsdu bar bya// mtho gang tsam las 'das par ni// nyi ma'i dkyi
253b1(rgyud): 'khor sgom par ni// rang gzugs shin tu brtan byas nas// lha la sogs pas rnam par sgom// snying khar sngags kyi yig byin nas// sangs rgyas kun ni mchod par bya// mtho bdun tsam las 'das
253b2(rgyud): bar ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni sgom par byed// lha yi gzugs kyi dbus gnas par// snying khar de la bsgom par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungaso// rang gzugs spyan zhes bya bar
253b3(rgyud): ni byas nas sangs rgyas rnam par sgom// thugs ka nyid dang thams cad du// ma lus rang gzugs bsgom par bya// de ru snying po'i tshul gyis ni// sems dpa'i rnal 'byor rnam par sgom/ rgyang grags
253b4(rgyud): tsam las 'das par ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ gzugs kyis na mkha' 'gongs par ni// snying po rnams las yang dag bskyed// rgyang grags tsam las 'das pa ni
253b5(rgyud): gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// rang gi rnal 'byor legs brtan byas// sangs rgyas yang dag rnal 'byor sgom// rgyang grags tsa mo las 'das par ni/ byang chub sems ni
253b6(rgyud): rnam par sgom// lha ni yang dag bskyed nas ni// sngags kyi yi ge rnam par sgom// mtho gang tsam las 'das par ni// pad+ma'i tshol du rnam par spom// rang lus dri ma med byas nas// gsal ba'i dkyil 'a
253b7(rgyud): sgom pa'o// de dbus legs par brtan byas nas// rang gzugs dang nas dang por smom// 'od kar 'bar ba'i phreng ba sogs// pad+ma lnga po rnam bsgom bya// de yi dbusu rang gzugs dang // gzhogasu
253b8(rgyud): btsun mo dgod par bya// rang gi khu ba deng sogs 'byung // cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// sangs rgyas gzugs kyis na mkha'i khams// kun tu gang bar sgom pa ni// rang gzugs ral gri lta
254a1(rgyud): byas nas// kun gyi snying khar dgod par bya// rang gzugs sangs rgyas yang dag sbyor// mtshan nyid la sogs cho ga rim gyis// byang chub sems dpa' rnamakha'i gams
254a2(rgyud): yang dag gang bar rnam bsgom bya// rang gzugs zhags pa yang dag sbyor// khyab bdag sangs rgyas gzugs dgod pa// ji srid na mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// chog shes pas dgug par bya// 
254a3(rgyud): rang gzugs sangs rgyas yang dag sbyor// byang chub sems rnam sgom mo// sngags kyi yi ge sogs sgor gyis// de yi rnam par myur bsgom bya// byang chub sems kyi yang dag bskyed// 'od zer 'bar bas
254a4(rgyud): rnam par rgyan// rang gzugs sangs rgyas mtshungs pa ra ni// cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya// rang gzugs de la ga thugs gnas par// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyim pa'i 'od// spyan zhes
254a5(rgyud): bya ba yid dga' ba// cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sman ni snying khar rnam par god// / cho ga shes pas 'od rnam par// rdo rje sems dpa'
254a6(rgyud): rab gzhags bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// rang gzugs myur ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed/ lha yi rnam par yang dag sbyor// bsgom bya brlon
254a7(rgyud): ba gzhan min no// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpar yang dag bskyed// lcags kyu'i rnam pa zhags pa sogs// byas nas slob ma rab gzhug bya// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed/ 
254a8(rgyud): rang gzugs snying khar rnam dgod bya/ dgod pa byas nas lag sogs kyis// de nas grangs ni yang dag brtsam/ bzlas pa sogs sam btung bya ba/ blo ldan des ni de bya'o// sgrub po rnams kyis/ 
254b1(rgyud): / rnam bzlas bya// gzhan du yang dag grub min zhid // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis de skad ces gsung so// rang gi zugs ni yang dag bskyed// dbus su rang
254b2(rgyud): gi rigs sgom mo// mthar yang dag dang bgegs 'joms par// snying po de ru bsgom par bya// 'di rnams kyi ni cho ga yis// sgom pa la sogs cho ga'i rim// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ 
254b3(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po rnam bsgom bya// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs 'bar ba'i// khro bo'i gzugasu bsgom par bya// kha dog gang ste kho nar brjod// de nyid mthar thug de nyid brjod// de nyid de yis bas
254b4(rgyud): par bya// gzhan du grub pa min pa nyid// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun tu bzang bos de skad ces gsung so// rang gzugs dkyil 'khor byas
254b5(rgyud): byas nas ni// dbusu 'bar ba mnyam pa'i 'od // 'jig na khams rnams thams cad du// de nyid shes pas snying khar dgod// de la bdag nyid yang dag skyed// de yi rang bzhin de
254b6(rgyud): brtsam bya// rang gzugs pad+ma'i dbus gnas par// snang byed la sogs pa mnyam pa'i 'od/ snying khar yi ge byas nas kyang // rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya// rdo rje sems dpa' 'das pa la/ 
254b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugasu rnam bsgom bya/ rig pa'i tshul du yang dag bskyed// dngos grub thams cad kun thob 'gyur// de phyir sngags pas khyad par gyi// rig pa'i tshul ni mchog tu 'gyur// 
254b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsung so// thams cad de nyid bya ba ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gzugs ni rnam snang mdzad bas
255a1(rgyud): nas snying khar sngags ni rnam bsgom bya// de nyid sngagasu rje su dran// rig pa'i tshul gyi cho ga las// slob dpon yid ni dga' ba ru/ cho ga shes pas dbyung ba
255a2(rgyud): bya snying kha rnams dang thams cadadu// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa'o// rang gi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// de la ral gri la sogs sgom// cho ga shes pas yang dag bskyed// 'bar ba
255a3(rgyud): ba lnga ni rnam bsgom bya/ gzugs dang kha dog rnam par shes// 'jig rten kham su 'di spro bya// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan gyis de skad ces gsung so// 
255a4(rgyud): gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba 'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las ye shes rigs kyi ting 'a rjen gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// 
255a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugasu byin gyis brlabs nas de
255a6(rgyud): rnams kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa rnamasu rang ging gzugasu bzhago// bsdus pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// le'u bka' rnams stsal bar mdzad// 'o ma zhor bsams
255a7(rgyud): nas suka/ 'phags pa'i dam tshig bzhi po dang // dbus su'ang sngags pas ud pa la/ bsgom bya gzhan du mi bsam mo// ye shes dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor// de yi steng du
255a8(rgyud): rnam bsgom bya// khro bo'i rnam pa yang dag bskyed// 'od zer yang dag sbyor ba sgom// der ni 'od zer 'dus rnamasu// rdo sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya/ cho ga shes pas der rang gzugs/ 
255b1(rgyud): dbus su yang dag bzhag bsgom bya// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces gsung so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko NaM/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni// rang gi rnam
255b2(rgyud): rtog yongs 'dor bya// rang gzugs hUM yig ces brjod pa// byas nas kun tu rnams bsgom bya// chog shes pas de rnam su 'ang // ha yig mtha' bug rnams bsam bya// rang gzugs la so grwa
255b3(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i 'od // lha de skad cig de la 'gyur// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor// snying khar de la rnam bsam bya// cho ga shes pas gsang sngags yig/ cho ga mthong bas bsgos
255b4(rgyud): par bya/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces gsung so// gnas lngar yang dag sbyar bya ba/ rtse mo lnga ru nam bsgom bya// sngags kyi yi ge thams cad du// rdo rje sems
255b5(rgyud): rnam bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms pas// cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sras kyi gtso bos de skad
255b6(rgyud): ces gsung so// rang gzugs sems dpa'i tshul gyis ni// sems dpa'i mtshan mar bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu ni// cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// rang gzugs sems dpa'i
255b7(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// lha yi snying khar bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs de dbyung bar bya// 'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya// rang gzugs ye shes zhes brjod pa// 'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan
255b8(rgyud): byang chub semasu de phyung na// 'jig rten kha su 'di spro bya// rang gi gzugs zhes brjod pa ni// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ rang gi gzugs kyi 'od zer gyis// zhing 'dir khyab par rnam/ 
256a1(rgyud): bsgom bya rang gzugs lcags kyur bcas byas nas// rang gi gzugs kyi lag par dgod// cho ga shes pas bkug nas kyang // sangs rgyas gzugs la rab gzhag
256a2(rgyud): bya bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bos de skad ces gsung so// rang gi gzugs kyi tshul gyis ni/ gsang sngag yi ge rnam par sgom// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms pas/ 
256a3(rgyud): cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// byang chub sems rang gzugs ni// de nyid sgom pas sgom par bya// ba gegs ni sngags la yang dag bskyed// 'jig rten kham su'ang spro bar bya// mi sdug gtsigs shing 'jigs
256a4(rgyud): pa ni// bgegs kyi ngag de dbyung bar bya// byang chub sem su de phyung nas// 'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya// rang gzu gas nyi ma'i dbus gnas par// rnon po 'bar bas rnam par rgyan// 
256a5(rgyud): las kyi rdo rje shin tu mdzes// cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya// dang po'i rnal 'byor yang dag bskyed/ shin tu baHna pa brtan pa'i sems/ cho ga nye bar mthong ba yis// dang po'i
256a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// rang gzugs ud pa lar bsams nas// sna tshogs 'od zer mnyam par ldan// lha yi gzugasu yang dag sbyor// de yi steng du rnam bsgom bya// ji srid na mkha'i dkyil
256a7(rgyud): 'khor da// sngags pas 'jig rten gsum du spro// sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yid dga' ba ni bsgom
256a8(rgyud): bar bya// tho ba'i rnam pa yang dag sbyor// cho gas rtag tu bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' sogs gsungs pa// ji ltar rigs par bi Tu'i te// rang gzugs gsal ba 'bar ba'i 'od// snga ma kI sosra/ 
256b1(rgyud): rnam rgyan pas// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed/ 'jig rten gsum du yang spro bar bya// rdo rje ye shes yang dag bskyed// khro bo yang dag sbyor bsgoms pas// rang gzugs 'bar ba mtshungs pa yis/ 
256b2(rgyud): cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gas// mkhas pas rang gzugs bsgom bya// rtse mo lnga yi rdo rje che// 'jig rten kham su yang spro bya// bcom ldan 'das rnga rje'i rang bzhin gyis/ 
256b3(rgyud): khro bo'i gzugasu yang dag bskyed// rang gi sngags kyi yi ges rgyan// sangs rgyas gzugasu rnam bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas 'khor lo lha'i// 'od zer tshul du rnam bsgom bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo
256b4(rgyud): rje'i rang bzhin gyis de skad ces gsung so// rang gzug sa 'khor lo'i tshul gyis ni// 'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// rang gzugs sangs rgyas dang mtshungs pa// cho ga shes pas
256b5(rgyud): dbyung bar bya// rang gzugs 'khor lo'i tshul gyis ni// ral gri'i 'od zer gyis rgyan pa// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs gsal ba// kun nas rnam par 'phro ba'o// pad+ma rang snying dbus gnas
256b6(rgyud): par/ bram ze mangs pa rnam par rgyan// byang chub semasu yang dag bskyed// de la sngags kyi yi ge dgod// snying por ud pa lar bsam nas// sna tshogs 'od zer rnam par rgyan// cho ga shes pas byang
256b7(rgyud): chub sems// bsams nas sngags gsung bsgom bya// snying kha'i dbus sen phra mo ni// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// ye shes sbyor ba kun bskyed nas// sangs rgyas gzugasu bsgom par bya// rang
256b8(rgyud): gzugs phra mo'i dbus gnas par// sna tshogs 'bar ba mnyam pa'i 'ong // snying por yi ge bsams nas ni// rang gzugs de la bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje ye shes kyis de skad ces
257a1(rgyud): gsung so// khru gang tsam las 'das pa yi// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor skem pa ni// rang gzugs yi ger yang byas nas// rdo rje 'bar bar rnam bsgom bya/ khru gang tsam
257a2(rgyud): las 'das pa ru// ye shes dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// dbusu gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// bsams nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya// khru gang tsam las 'das par ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni/ 
257a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed/ bsams nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya// khru gang tsam las 'das pa ru// chos kyi dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// bgegs dgrar yang dag bskyed bsams nas// bzlas pa kun
257a4(rgyud): tu brtsam par bya// mtho gang tsam las 'das pa ru/ ye shes dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// rnam snang mdzad kyi gzugs bsams nas// 'jig rten khamasu 'ong spro bya// mtho gang tsam las
257a5(rgyud): 'das pa ru// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// dbus gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// gzhog su sangs rgyas yang dag sgom// rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor
257a6(rgyud): sgom pa ni// dbusu gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// 'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis de skad ces gsung so// rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'kho
257a7(rgyud): sgom pa ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// gzhog su btsun mo dgod par bya// btsun mo rnams ni thams cad// 'od zer lnga ni rnam bsgom bya// me tog yid dga' 'di rnams kyis// cho ga
257a8(rgyud): shes pas mchod par bya// 'phrog byed dri yi sprin la sogs// bsams nas sangs rgyas mchod par bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i spyan gyis de skad ces gsung so// cho ga shes pas btsun mo ni// ser
257b1(rgyud): po ltar bur ba sems nas ni/ sangs rgyas sras po 'dus pa ni// rnal 'byor bskyed de bsgom par bya// de byung ji lta bar bkod la/ rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed// rigs
257b2(rgyud): kyi dge ba bsgom par bya// rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni// ye shes phra mo rnam par sgom// rang gzugs kyi tshul gyis ni// dbus yang dag bzhag bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas rdo rje'i rtser// 
257b3(rgyud): rnam po lnga ru rnam bsgom bya// dkar po ye shes rigs rab brjod// nag po bsdus pa'i rigasu dran// dmar po pad+ma'i rigs zhes bya// ser po 'dod pa'i rigasu dran// mdzes pa'i gzugs ni rab gsal
257b4(rgyud): bar rig nas sna tshogs rgyan gyi rgyan// pad+ma rab tu rgyus byas nas// rang gi rdo rje de la gzhug/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sem sa dpas de skad ces gsung so// de ltar byas pas gang ldan pa/ 
257b5(rgyud): de ldan ye shes rnyed par dka'// rang gzugs shin tu brtan byas nas// bsam gtan brtson par rab tu gcu ga mdzes ldan ma dga' lta ba na// gzugs dang ldan par de
257b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// btsun mo mthong ba tsam gyis ni// 'thung 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med// rdo rje sems dpas zhing 'dir ni// yongasu gang bar rnam bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni brtan byas nas// 
257b7(rgyud): rdo rjes rnam par ltung bar bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum dper mi byed pas de skad ces gsung so// gnyisu med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rigs
257b8(rgyud): bsdus pa'i ting 'dzin gyi le'u gsum pa rdzog s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes chos kyi rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi le'u bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor chen po'i
258a1(rgyud): tshul du ni// thad du ni de nyid bya/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor nam sgom pa// cho ga shes pas rab tu brtsam// chos kyi kun sbyor mtshan nyid kyi// rnam par rtog pa yongs dor
258a2(rgyud): byang gsang sngags dbye ba brjod nas ni// thams cad rnal 'byor rnam bsgom bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tsa~M// dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor zhing cho ga shes pas yang dag brjod
258a3(rgyud): dngos po tha~Mng yang dge bskyed// dngos med bsgom bya min pa nyid // bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gis de skad ces gsung so// blo gros ldan pas pad+ma bsam// pad+ma rA ga'i dbang mtshungs
258a4(rgyud): pa/ dbrel 'khor de la bsom bya ba/ gzugs pa/ na dbu su rnam bsgom bya// rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag bskye da/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba mtshungs pa'i 'ang // 'bar ba 'dus pa de rnams/ 
258a5(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyung rnam bsgom bya// bcom ldan 'ad sa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis de skad ces gsung so// nam kha'i khams ni kun tu dgang // slar yang de nyid la bsdu bya/ rang
258a6(rgyud): gi gzugs dang zla dbus gnas/ sna tshogs kha dog mtshungs pa'i 'ong // snying kha ru ni rnam bsgoms nas// lce la gsang sngags sgom pa'o// rang gzugs de yi dbus gnas par// sangs
258a7(rgyud): rgyas ye shes rnam par rgyan// 'jig rten dbang phyug yang dag bskyed// 'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya// rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag bskyed/ pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni/ 'jig
258a8(rgyud): rten dbang phyug rab bsgom nas// gzugs kyis namakha' 'gengs par byed// chos kyis dkyil 'khor dbus ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgom nas// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed/ 
258b1(rgyud): 'jig rten kham su 'di spro bya// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsung so// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag
258b2(rgyud): bskyed// ji ltar rigs par gnas lnga ru// khyab bdag 'jig rten dbang phyug dgod// ces bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gis de skad ces gsung so// snying kha'i dbu son phra mo ni
258b3(rgyud): chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa// chos der yang dag bskyed nas su// 'jig rten kham su 'di spro bya// snying kha'i dbus son phra mo ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dri med pa// pad+ma de la rnam
258b4(rgyud): bsgoms shing // sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam pa sgoms nas// sangs gzugs rnams thams cad// 'jig rten dbang phyug rnam sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos
258b5(rgyud): 'chang bas de skad ces gsung so// snying kha'i dbus son phra mo ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa// sa ngas rgyas lnga ni rnam bsgoms na/ der yang de bzhin bsgo
258b6(rgyud): par bya// lte ba'i dbu son phra mo ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog zung rang gzugs la sogs rnam bsgoms pas// cho ga shes pas bsrung bar bya// mtho gang tsam las 'das par
258b7(rgyud): par ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus ni// chog shes pas rim pa bzhin// 'jig rten khams su mchod par byed// bcom ldan 'das chos 'tshang bas de skad ces gsung so// rgyang grags
258b8(rgyud): tsam las 'das par ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor sgom par ni// 'jig rten dbang rab sgom pa yis// rang gi gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni// 
259a1(rgyud): bad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// gzhog su btsun mo byas na su// sangs rgyas gzugs ni mchod par bya// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor
259a2(rgyud): sgom pa ni// 'jig rten khams ni kun nas su// cho ga shes pas mchod par bya// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// 'khor lo'i 'o sgom pa ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mchog byas nas// rang gi zugs/ 
259a3(rgyud): ni dgod par bya// sngags pas steng gi rim par ni// ji srid na mkha' 'gengs pa zhes// pad+ma ra ga'i 'ong mnyam pa'i// pad+ma lnga ni rnam bsgom nas/ cho ga shes pas rang gzugs ni// dbus su yang dag
259a4(rgyud): gnas bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni kun 'byung ba/ shar du rnam par bsgom par bya// lhor ni bsdus pa zhes byas nas// rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam par bya// nub tu
259a5(rgyud): 'chang byas nas ni// byang du 'dod pa 'byung ba'o// 'khor lo yis rigs zhes brjod// ral gri chos kyi rigs zhes brjod// rdo rje bsdus pa'i rigasu grags// rtse
259a6(rgyud): 'dod pa'i rigasu bshad// namakha'i khams ni kun gang bar// byas nas khyab bdag chos 'chang ba// lag tu ral gri yang dag bskyed// rang gzugs kyis ni gzhom par bya// 'dod mchod kyis
259a7(rgyud): ni 'joms byas nas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi cho ga rig lag tu mdung ni yang dag bskyed// rang gzugs kyis ni phye mar brlag/ gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// ye shes rigs ni bzlos
259a8(rgyud): bar byed// ye shes dkyil 'kho tshul gyis ni// bsdus pa'i rigs ni nam ltung byed// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ chos kyi rigs ni nges par ltung byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ 
259b1(rgyud): tshul gyis ni/ chen po'i rigs ni nges ltung byed// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ rigs kun nges par ltung bar byed// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas de skad ces gsug so// gnyi su med pam 'am pa'i
259b2(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen por/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting 'dzin ste le'u bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thaMng rang gi
259b3(rgyud): rdo rje chen po la gzhag nas ye shes kyi rigs la sogs pa can de la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis rab tu bcug cing brtan par byas nas// dkyil 'khor chen po de rnams rang gi
259b4(rgyud): gzugs kyi rnams pas kun tu gnas pa dang // gzug sa chen po lha chen po'i lha'i rnam par yang dag par sbyar nas// 'dod pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin 'di gsung so// dkyil 'khor
259b5(rgyud): chen po'i tshul las ni/ thams cad de bzhin kho nar bya// cho ga shes pas rab brtsam bya// gzhan du bsgom bya min pa nyid// 'dod pa'i rigs kyi cho ga yis// gsang sngags
259b6(rgyud): rigs pa rjes dran bya// oM kA ma dz+nyA na swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM// ji ltar rigs par brjod nas ni// rnal 'byor 'dis ni yang dag brtsam// kar ni kA ra mtshungs pa'i 'od// pad+ma chen po yang dge bskyed
259b7(rgyud): de nyid dkyil 'khor byas nas ni 'ang gzugs ni dgod par bya// 'dod mchod gzugs ni kun bskyed nas/ 'jig rten lam su 'di spro bya/ rang gzugs 'drod mchod tshul gyis ni// gzums
259b8(rgyud): kyis nas para' 'gengs par byed/ sna tshogs 'bar ba nam rgyan pa'i// tshangs pa'i dazugs ni yang dag man na 'dod mchog gzugs ni kun bskyed nas 'jig rten lam su 'di spro ba/ chog
260a1(rgyud): shes pas re ra bar// gzugs gsum rnam par bsgom par bya/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i chod pas de skad ces gsung so// khru gang tsam las 'das pa
260a2(rgyud): ni pad+ma chen po rnam sgom pa// tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi srid pa 'dir// cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// khra ni brgya drag 'das par ni// pad+ma chen po nam bsgomab 'dod tshad gzugs ni
260a3(rgyud): yang dag dbyung // sangs rgyas de nyid la bsgom bya// khru ni brgyad brgya 'das par ni// pad+ma chen po rnam sgom bya// khyab 'jug gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// stabs rgyas la sogs der
260a4(rgyud): bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag skyed// tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis 'di spro bya// chos kyi gzugs ni yang dag pa skyed/ khyab 'jug gzugs kyis 'di spro bya/ sems dpa'i gzugs
260a5(rgyud): brtan byas nas// 'dod mchod mtshungs pa'i gzu// gas rnams kyis// 'jig rten khams ni kun tu yang / cho ga/ shes pas spro bar bya/ khru gang tsam las 'das par ni// tshangs par
260a6(rgyud): tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis na sgo ba// snying khar de rnams yang dag bskyed// sangs rgyas gzugasu rnam bsgom bya// cho ga shes pos sangs rgyas gzugs// gzugs la gzugasu rnam bsgom bya/ 
260a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pas de skad ces gsung so// khru gang tsam las 'das par ni// khyab 'jug gzug ni rnam sgom pa/ snying khar de rnams kun bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas gzugasu rnams
260a8(rgyud): bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs rnams thams cad du// 'dod pa'i mchod pa mtshungs pa'i gzugs// sgeg pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan gyur pa// cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya// ji srid gzugasu
260b1(rgyud): yang dge sbyor// de srid ni btsun mor 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pas de skad ces gsung so// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// gzugasu bskyed nas bsgom par bya/ cho ga shes pas
260b2(rgyud): dang po'i sbyor// mnyam bair gzhag pas bsgom par bya// na mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar// mkhas pas byas nas brjod pa'i rnam par gsol ba gangag ma'ab par gzhag pas de ltung bya/ cho ga
260b3(rgyud): bas lha'i rnam pa// sangs rgyas 'od dang mnyam pa'i gzugs// ji ltar rigs pas sngag pA sbyin// gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyuraro// cho ga shes pas lha mo lha'i// rang gi gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ 
260b4(rgyud): gyazhan du rdo rje sems dpa' rnams// dkar sogs chodag 'byung ba yis// sgeg pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan gyur pa'i// rang gzugs rnon po'i tshul gyis ni/ cho ga shes pas lnga mo der khas
260b5(rgyud): nas mtshon cha rnam bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas rdor pa d+ma// kun sbyor cho ga shes pas 'byung ba yis// rigs kyi gzu gas ni kun bskyed nas// rang gi khu bas de ni mchod// rgyal ba chu skyes
260b6(rgyud): rigs kyi lha// gzhan du grub pa nyid mi 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje'i rigs brjod pa'i// lha nyid grub pa nyid mi 'gyur// dang po dang mthar thams cad du// 'di ni thun mtshams bzhi ru bya// rgya ba chu skyes rdo rje skyes
260b7(rgyud): gzhan du 'grub pa nyi ma yin// ma mo'i gzugs ni kun bskyed nas// 'od zer sna tshogs mnyam pa'i 'od // rang gzugs 'dod mchod tshul gyis ni// khams gsum par yang spro bar bya// 'dod pa'i mchod
260b8(rgyud): pa mtshungs pa'i gzugs// sring mo ba nir ni yang dag sbyor// gzugs kyi mtshan nyid tshul gyis ni// mnyam par gzhag pas smra bar bya/ ge sar ser po dang mtshungs pa'i// tshangs pa'i gzugs ni rnam
261a1(rgyud): snoms nas/ chog shes pas sangs rgyas gzugs// byas nas de ni rab bsgom bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas de skad ces gsung so// gnyi su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam
261a2(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las 'dod pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi le'u ste lnga pardzog s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
261a3(rgyud): rang gi dkyil 'khor du banag nas rang gi ting 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te gnyi su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa med chen por dngos grub zad kyi ngam tshig gi ye shes mchog gi le'u 'di bka
261a4(rgyud): stsal to// blo ldan 'dod pa thams cad la// rnam rtog bya ba min pa nyid// sangs rgyas thaMng 'joms pa ni// sems dpa' smad ba min pa nyid// dga' dang rtsod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// sangs rgyas
261a5(rgyud): thams cad slu ba dang // gzhan du de la lha'o// sems ni brtan bya min pa nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzas gang yin// skye ba med pa'i yon tan 'byung // sems ni shin tu brtan byas la/ 
261a6(rgyud): btsun mo la sogs rnam par sgom// 'jig rten gsum pa'i dbang phyug ma/ rig ma chen mo spyan mar grags// de yang btsun mor byas nas kyang / kun tu nye bar longs spyod/ cho ga shes pas ye shes
261a7(rgyud): rigs lhan cig 'joms par yang dag brtsam// srog chags rnams kyi dge 'joms pa// bsdu ba'i don ni rtag khya// chags la chags pas sbyar bya ba// chos kyi rigs la rtag tu bya/ 'dod mchong rig
261a8(rgyud): ni mtshungs pa la// rtag tu brdzun yang smra bar bya// kun la rang de ltar 'di bya/ gzhan du grub pa min pa nyid / sa su gzugs ni nam bsgoms nas/ snying la don nas bsgom bya/ thams cad de bzhin yon bya/ 
261b1(rgyud): gzhan du de dag mi 'gyuraro// ye shes rigs ni rnam 'joms pas// dga' ldan rnamasu nye bar skye// chos kyi rigs ni rnams 'joms pas// bde ldan du ni skye bar 'gyur// chos kyi rigs sogs dbye ba yis
261b2(rgyud): bsdus pa zhes ni grags par 'gyur// 'dod mchod rigs ni 'joms pa yis// khams gsum pa la sogs pa 'byung // gnas med lus dang bral ba yi// lus dang ldan pas gnas par 'gyur// de yi gdong
261b3(rgyud): ni gzi rgyas par// chos rnams kun tu skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bos de skad ces gsung so// sems can khams kyi mthar thug par// bdag ni rdo rje lta bur
261b4(rgyud): brtan// srid pa sgrol bar yang dag sbyor// sangs rgyas bka' yis dgod par bya ye shes dge ba kun 'byung ba sangs rgyas chos tshul 'di rnams kyis sems dpa' bsdus pa yang dag 'byung // 
261b5(rgyud): gzhan du mchod bye min pa nyid// shes rab pha rol byin par thabs// ye shes chen po kun btus pas// sems la rtag tu'ang sbyar bar bya// chos bsdus pas ni thob par 'gyur// byang chub
261b6(rgyud): sems ni sems chen po// rdor sogs mtshan nyid min pa nyid// de bzhin du ni ye shes kun/ snying po kun las btus pa 'di// pha rol phyin pa btus pa 'dir/ sangs rgyas rnams btsun mo brtan/ de rnams
261b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// kun sbyor mtshan nyid 'di rnams kyis// sgra dri ro la sogs pa rnams// ji ltar nus par 'dul bar byed/ rang gzugs sangs rgyas tshul gyis ni/ de la dbusu rnam bsgom bya/ 
261b8(rgyud): 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrugs byas nas// snying khar de rnams rab gzhug bya/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas de skad ces gsung so// bsdus pa zhes rig su brjod pa'i/ gar mkhan chen po yang dag
262a1(rgyud): 'byung de la ngo mtshar gsol btab pa// de la 'joms par byed par dgongs// phyag rgya chen po'i 'chang brjod// mi rnams rigs ni bzhi po yang / byas nas da
262a2(rgyud): tshig tshul gyis na// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// sems ni sems can thams cad kyi// rang bzhin phul phyung chen po ste// rnam rtog dam+bi la gnas pa// skye ba rnams dang dman par smra/ 
262a3(rgyud): bsod nams bsod nams kyis de'i lus// gos pa'am yang na de min nyid// de ltar shes nas ci rigs par/ gzhan du sgom bya min pa nyid// pad+ma ud pa la la sogs pa// 'dam skyes
262a4(rgyud): yang dag byung ma skyes// sems la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang // de nying la kun shes par bya// byang chub sems ni brtan byas nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyang yongasu gsungs// rdo rje
262a5(rgyud): de nyid las skyes te// gzhan du 'byung ba min pa nyid// sems can gyi ni sa rnams kyis// 'grub par 'gyu ra bar grags pa yin// de bzhin gang 'di dag pa che// ye she
262a6(rgyud): lcags kyu'i tshul che no// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsung so// gnyi su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por dngos grub thams cad
262a7(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gi ye shes mchog gi le'u ste drug pa rdzog so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad nges par byung nas kyang
262a8(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brlabs par kun tu gnas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes
262b1(rgyud): byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya'i tingange 'dzin la sdom par zhugs nas dang po'i rnal 'byor das tshig thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'du bar byed pa bskyed pa dang bcas pa'i gsang chen palnga
262b2(rgyud): stsal to// sangs rgyas gzugs yang dag bskyed// 'od zer sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'od// 'od zer snying po sogs mtshul gyis// 'khor lo dkar po dang mtshungs pa// tsan ka yi 'bru chang
262b3(rgyud): kyis/ kun nas yongasu zlum po ru// sngags pa'i dpral ba'i steng du ni// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// cho ga shes pas zla ba cig/ de yis de ltar 'di spro bya// na mkha' la sogs
262b4(rgyud): rab 'byam du// zla gnyis nang du rgyas par bya// dza tI'i me tog sogs g.yogs par// dkyil 'kho rede ru rnam bsgom bya// mtshan ma phul byung bcas mthong nas/ 
262b5(rgyud): mtshan nyid brjod pas mtshon par bya// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas rnam rgyan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom nas// gang du dkyil 'khor sogs tshul gyis/ nas
262b6(rgyud): tsam du ni bsgom par bya// rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che// sna yi rtser ni rnam bsgom bya/ in+d+ra nI la sogs tshul gyis// de yi kha dog rnam sgo mo// ud pal la sogs g.yogs pa la// dkyil
262b7(rgyud): 'khor de la bsgom par bya// kun tu de nyid bya ba ni// ye shes rigs kyi cho ga las/ cho ga shes pas chos sems dpa'// bskyed nas bsgom par bya ba ni// namakha'i khams ni kun bkang bar
262b8(rgyud): byas nas 'od zer yang dag bsdu rgya bug cig pu'i ched kyis ni/ parla yang dag sbyar bsgom bya / badra gA'i 'od sa chungs pa'i/ 'bom brgyang pa rnam bsgom nas/ dri sar rigs par snying la de/ 
263a1(rgyud): bsgom bya gzhan du mi bsam mo// thog ma par ni rnam spangs nas// sgom pa de yi dgongs pa'o// me tog pad+ma sogs g.yogs par// de phyogasu ni rnam bsgom bya/ 
263a2(rgyud): cho ga shes pas 'dod mchod pa'i// sems dpa' 'od mtshungs bsgom par bya// 'od zer 'bar bas rnam rgyan pa'i// rtse gsum shin tu brtan byas nas// chog shes pas nas tsam du// bsam nas lte bar
263a3(rgyud): bsgom par bya// kar ni kar sogs me tog che// ser po 'bar ba bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsung so// kun tu rnal 'byor bzhi rnamasu// rnam pa bzhi po rnam bsgob bya// dri srong
263a4(rgyud): nam pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ chog shes pa spro bar bya/ gang yang sngags pas zla ga'i su// thun bzhir rnam par bsgom par bya// rnam par dben dang yid 'ong dang // skye bo bral bar bsgom pa
263a5(rgyud): bya zhwa dang sha sogs can gza' la// brtul zhugs can gyis mar gsar btung // bslus pa dang yang sa la 'dzi gas// de ltar gang 'di brtul zhugs can/ cho ga shes pas sangs
263a6(rgyud): gzugs// dngos nyid du de lta bar byed// rang gzugs rnam shes bya min nyid// sgra ni nyin par byed min nyid// rnam pa gnyi su de yi sems// skye ba min zhing yang yang min// gang zhig kha nar bsgom par bya// 
263a7(rgyud): gzhan du de dag 'gyur nyid// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor sbyor la sogs// bskyed nas de la bsgom par bya// bdag po'i rnal 'byor kun bskyed nas// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// 'bras
263a8(rgyud): bu'i cho su skye 'gyur te/ gzhan du bskyed par 'gyur min nying // bcom ldan 'das byang mu ci sems kyis de skad ces gsung sa// gnyi su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen/ 
263b1(rgyud): po las dang po'i ye shes kun las btus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rang gi ba spu'i khung bu rnamasu rab tu
263b2(rgyud): bcug nas dam tshig zad kyi ye shes 'byung ba byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la sdom par zhug so// snoms par zhugs ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
263b3(rgyud): pa de rnams thad rang gi gzugs bud med kyi gzugasu byin gyis brlabs pa kho nar ba spu'i khung bu rnams nas mngon byar gyur to// de nas btsun mo de rnams thams cad kyis yis chen po'i
263b4(rgyud): rin po che de'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pas yang dag par mchod// na mkha'i khams thams cad kun tu bkang zhing snang bar byas nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams
263b5(rgyud): gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje btsun mo thaMd kyi b+ha ga rnamasu rang gi rdo rje yang dag bar sbyor ba'i rnam pas yang dag par sbyar nas rang gi gzugs der
263b6(rgyud): tshad du byin gyis rlab par byed pas byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin gshegs pa bad kyang de'i tshe tshad de bzhin kho na bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyis snga mo ji lta ba'i phyag na rdo rje rigra
263b7(rgyud): thams cad dam tshig gi ye shes de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes chen po'i dam tshig bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni/ dbusu sngag suM rnams bsgom
263b8(rgyud): bya// snying khar dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rje bos de skad ces gsung so// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni/ 
264a1(rgyud): rnams snang la sogs rnams sgom bya// de nyid kyis ni kun bskyed nas/ de nyid mchod par byed par 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bsam
264a2(rgyud): par bya/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// de yi mchod pa byed par bshad // dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni// rang rigs la sogs rnam par sgom// dbusu gzugs ni brtan byas nas/ 
264a3(rgyud): de yi mchod pa byed par bshad// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// spyan ni yang dag bskyen nasu// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// dmangs rigs dkar mo rnam bsgom bya// kun sbyor
264a4(rgyud): la sogs mtshan nyid kyis/ sna tshogs rgyan dang yang ngag ldan// ud pal sngon po dang mtshungs pa'i// mA ma ki ni rtag bsam bya/ me togs chun sogs kyis don bzhin/ ji lta
264a5(rgyud): rig par rnam rgyan pa/ rigs ma tshe mo dkar mor grwa/ gas// khrag dang mtshungs par bsam par bya// yid kyi ku/ na sbyor phun tshogs kyis// bsdus pa yis ni rnam par rgyan// 
264a6(rgyud): ulpa na mtshungs skal bzang mo// sngags sdug pas rtog tu bsam par bya// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsung so// mar sar la sogs kun sbyor gyis// ying du 'ong ba
264a7(rgyud): de bsgom bye/ chang nyid yid kyis sbyor byed pa// gang de nyid ni sgom bzhin du// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rang gi sngags kyis yang dag bskyed// skrod por byed pas cho ga kun/ 
264a8(rgyud): 'dir ni bskyed cing bsgom par bya// log pas mgrin pa la sogs bzung // rkang pa de la sbyar bar bya// me tog gnyis sogs mtshan nyid kyis// rang gi rdo rje gzhug bsam bya/ zla ba'i
264b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor/ khu ba de la ltung bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsung so// nam kha'i khams ni kun bkang bar/ byas nas de nyid kyis bsgom bya/ me tog bzhi la
264b2(rgyud): sogs tshul gyis// de la mchod par byed ces dgongs// nyer spyong lnga yi mchod pa yis// mchod bdag kun sbyor las mchod bya// dri gzugs ro dang reg bya ni// thams cadu de nyid kyis sbyin// 
264b3(rgyud): rdor sems rnams ni blo ldan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsred pa dang // mnyes dang mchod par rab tu brjod// dgyes por yang ni brjod pa yin// 'di yis gsang sngags grub pa ni// sgrub pa po rnams
264b4(rgyud): rnam rgyal 'gyur// gsal byed rgyas pa sgrub don du// sangs rgyas nyid sogs yang dag 'bor// gal te chos nyid mi 'gyur ba// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid// sangs rgyas sog
264b5(rgyud): kyis yongs bzung ba// gzhan du thob par mi 'gyu ro// sems kyi mi dge min nyid// smad pa'i kun spyod bya min nyid// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ chos nyid mi 'gyur dun
264b6(rgyud): las btus// gang gzhan btsun mo rnams nyid ni// 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba ni// ji ltar 'os par mchod bya ba// sprin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod// brtson
264b7(rgyud): 'grus su yang brtan par brjod/ 'di ni sngags pa mkhas pa yis// cho gas lhag par gnas par bya// rang gi sngags ni yang dag brjod/ zla ba lta bur sbyar bar bya// der ni rdo rje la bsdus pas/ 
264b8(rgyud): slar yang sngags pas gzhug par bya// gzhog su rin chen rnam sgom bya// ze 'bru nyid la bya ba'o// de rnams kha dog bsdus pa yis// rigs kyi dbye ba rtogs par bya// rigs gsum la yang thun meng du/ rdo rje/ 
265a1(rgyud): sems dpa'i ston 'byung // de yi yi ge yang dag bskyed// gzhug la bsam gtan lhur len pas// las kyi dbye ba sogs rnams kyis// bya ba'i mtshan nyid de rab grags// ye shes rigs
265a2(rgyud): la ud pal sngo// / bsdus pa shes pa grags// 'dod mchod rigs la pad+ma dang // chos kyi rigs la'ang dgongs pa yin// cho ga shes pas lo bcu pa'i// btsun mo ye shes rigs la shes// bsdus pa
265a3(rgyud): zhes la brtag bya ba/ yin tan mdangs ldan bcu gnyis lo// sngags pas rtag tu chos zhes par// bcu drug lo ma kun tu brtsam/ kun tu 'dod mchod rigs la ni/ nyi shu'i lo can brten par bya/  bcom
265a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyis de skad ces gsungaso// ji snod khu ba yang dag bsdus// bcu gnyis lo dang ldan par bya// mdor na gang gang 'dod gyur pa// sna tsho
265a5(rgyud): rgyan dang yang dag ldan// me tog chun po sogs rgyan pa// ji lta ra rigs par bya ba yin// rnar snang mdzad sogs byas nas// / de nas mchod pa yang dag brtsal/ rigs kyi dbye bas
265a6(rgyud): las rnams ni// tsan dan gur gum rab tu brjod// bde bar bzhugs shing mdzes byas pa// dkyil 'khor de nyid kyis de bya// zad bsdus pa de bya ba// ji ltar dbye ba mi shes na// gal te dbye ba de yo ni// 
265a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyang ni 'grub mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa zad kyi thugs kyis de skad ces gsung so// mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyan pa yis// rgyan du byas pa'i bu mo bdun// bcu gru
265a8(rgyud): lo yis rnam pa des// ji srid bcwo brgyad lo lon par/ shin tu ring min thung ba min// phra min rnam par skyes pa'ang min// mtshungs med gzhon ma sgrub bya// gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur// chog shes/ 
265b1(rgyud): pas de bzung la/ de nying sgrub thabs kyis bsgrub bya// 'ja m+bu'i gling du dbyang sogs kyi/ mtshan nyid zad kyis rgyan pa/ bcu drug bsgrubs na cho ga shes// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// khru bzhi pa yi
265b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni khris nas rtag tu bsgrub par bya// rig pa'i tshul gyis che ga yis// mkhas pas 'bum phrag lnga ru bzlas// mar me khe sogs tshwa kr-i te// gzhan du bsgrub bya min pa nyid// bcom ldan 'dasangs
265b3(rgyud): rgyas zad kun tu snang bas de skad ces gsung so// khru yi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje se der yang dag bskyed// bdud rtsi zhes bya'i khro bo che// byin nas yang dag las rnams brtsam/ cho ga shes pas de ru
265b4(rgyud): yang man ma bkod nas bsgrub par bya// dri dang me tog sogs mchod pa// byas nas bsgrub bya gzhan du min// mtsho dang chu 'gram yid 'ong dang // ri bo dpon pa rnamasu yang // cho ga shes
265b5(rgyud): pas bsdus pa yis// rang nyid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// rin chen kun gyis mchod pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa ste// sgra naras gzigs kyi mgon pa yi// mchod pa zhes ni de la
265b6(rgyud): bshad/ thun tshong dang po las 'das par// gnyis par yang dag nyer gnas pas// rnal 'byor pa yi sgrub par smra ba// de kho nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur// thun tshod phyed du yang dag 'byung // lnga yi bar mchad
265b7(rgyud): rnam su'ang // phyag rdo rjes byin rlabs pas// sgrub po zag tu 'grub par 'gyur/ rigs kyi bdag po ltar gyur nis// 'jig rten khams ni kun tu yang // btsun mo grangs med po Ti yi/ dngos grub rtom
265b8(rgyud): phyir rnam par spyod/ de ye byangs sangs rgyas zhing / rirab kyini rdul phran gyi/ phyag na rdo rje kun 'byung ba/ sems can rnams kyi byed pa yin// gnyi su yed pa mnyam pa zhid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtag pa
266a1(rgyud): rgyal po chen po dam tshig pad kyi sgrub thabs chen po gsang ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa rdzog s+ho// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zad sngar yang dag par 'dus
266a2(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pad kyi ye shes khung chud pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags chen po'i dam tshig sgrub pa
266a3(rgyud): po rnams kyi seng ge rnam par rol pas dam tshig gi ye shes byed par myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bar 'gyur ba bstan du gsol/ 
266a4(rgyud): de nas phyag rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi tshig nye bar gsan nas// rdo rje rang snying khar bzhag ste de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams
266a5(rgyud): la gsung 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'as de bzhi gshegs pa rnams rgyu ci'i phyir de skad gsung / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi gang nges
266a6(rgyud): par bstan nus pa ni medo// yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la ye shes kyi 'od zer yang rnam pa stong du rnam par zhigs par gyur to// gzhan du na ga la 'gyur zheso// de bzhin du ni de
266a7(rgyud): lta bu byas nas de nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thaMd kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi thugs ka dang spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rang gi gzugasu
266a8(rgyud): gnas par bye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes ye shes kyi dam tshig khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi dam tshig bka' stsal to// grangs med 'byung po bad ni/ de nyid sbyor bas/ 
266b1(rgyud): bsad par bya// skye ba 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// sangs rgyas bye ba yongs rdzogs pa// ye shes sbyor bas bsad par bya// skye ba 'di nyid 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' thob
266b2(rgyud): par 'gyur// pad+ma chen po tshad kyis ni/ sede phung po rnam gnon bya/ chos kyi de nyid ting 'dzin gnas// bcom pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// chog shes pas pad+ma'i chang // 'joms byed 'dren pa bsang par bya
266b3(rgyud): 'dod mchod de nyid bsgoms pa yis// de yi dngos grub che zhes bya// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsung so// namakha'i khams ni kun bkang bar// mtshan nyid nges ni bsad par bya// de ltar
266b4(rgyud): yang 'dir sangs rgyas nyid// skye ba 'di nyid kha na la// rnam pa sna tsho gas yang dag thog/ sems can sems ni cho ga yis// yang dang yang du spang bar bya// bsod pa'i bdag nyid sogs
266b5(rgyud): 'byung ba// gzhan du sbyor bami 'gyur nyid// sems can kun gyi sem sa gang yin// gsal bzhi pa 'od gsal bar// sna tshog sa dngos pos ma gos pas/ semasu brjod pa'i de nyid
266b6(rgyud): sgom cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas yum// de nyid nye bar long spyod bya// gsang sngags dge ba 'byung ba kun// gzhan du grub pa nyid mi 'gyur// dede sngags pa la lus pas// mchog gi tshogs ni yang dag
266b7(rgyud): dbyung rdo rje sems dpa' dge 'byung ba/ gzhan du dgyes par 'gyur min nyid // nye bar longs spyad bya kun du/ nye bar long spyod kun brtsam bya// gzhan du gal te bdag rmongs pas/ mnar med lta bur 'tshed par
266b8(rgyud): 'gyur/ da bdag nyid bza' bar bye/ chang ngam gzhan yang rang gis btung // sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin par 'gyur/ myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba zhid / sha chen rtag tu bza' bar bya// ti la mar yang rung rang
267a1(rgyud): sung bya/ chog shes pas gshang ci'ang rung / bza' ba'i bdag nyid can gyis bza'// rma yi sgo las byung ba'ang min// sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya// me teg
267a2(rgyud): shim sprin chen po// byas nas bde den dri bzhin// sngags pas rtag tu smad pa yis// btung ba nyid ni 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi// ye shes blo yis dam tshig brjod// bcom ldan 'das
267a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rje su snang bar byed pas de skad ces gsung so// sngags pas rtag tu dkyil 'khor ni// gshang dang gcibs sau ru// nyal bar byed pa la sogs sam/ bsam pa shin
267a4(rgyud): tu sra brtan bya// gshang dang gcibs bkang ba yi// gru bzhi kun tu bskyed nas ni/ rang gzugs de yi dbus su ni// sna rtsir nas kyis dgang bar bya// bcom ldan 'dasangs rgyas 'byung ba
267a5(rgyud): ni des chag bdag po dka' ba yin// gang gzhan gsum po bsdu sa pa yis// 'dir gzhan so sor gnas de min// tshig she sa pas phyi 'dir ni/ khya de gzhan rnams dang sbyar bya// 
267a6(rgyud): ye shes 'khor los bskul ba yis/ dngos grub yangs pa der 'gro 'gyur// rang ngam gal te gzhan yang rung // de nyid sbyor bar mi byed do// ji srid na mkha' kun 'byung ba// sangs rgyas nyid ni thob
267a7(rgyud): mi byed// nga ni mnar med nga 'jigs rung // nga ni sdug sngal nga bde bar// zhe sdang nga la de bzhin mongs// nga ni 'dod chags so sor gnas// zhes gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal
267a8(rgyud): ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes khong du chud par byed pa zhes bya ba'i mchog tu gsang chen gyi le'u ste dgu pa rdzog s+ho// 
267b1(rgyud): de nas bcom lnga lhag rjo rje slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi ye shes thob pa'i 'bras bu dang phyungag gis rdo rje sems dpa' bad kyi babung dam tshig chen po la bka' stsal pa/ dgra bcom la byab
267b2(rgyud): bya yin zhing / dge slong yang rung phyag rgya min// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas nyid // thob pa phyag te phyag rgya min// rang gzugs ni rang gzugs kyis// bsams nas de nyid cho ga las// snying
267b3(rgyud): khar rdo rje segs byas nas/ yang dag mchod byar de sbyar bya// gal te rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung // kha cig phyis 'di las 'gongs na/ rang gi byang chub sems smras pas// mgo bo tshal ba bdun du
267b4(rgyud): 'gas khwa gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// gsang sngags yang nas yang du bzlas// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed// rang ga zugs la ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas sleb dpon po nyid
267b5(rgyud): 'di/ rtag tu srung ba'i khyad par las// gzhan du slob dpon rnam si kyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'thob mi 'gyur// rang gi gzugs rnam bsgoms nas// de nyid las ni phra mo'i
267b6(rgyud): gzugs// byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// slob dpon sangs rgya su bsgom bya// sgrub po rnams kyi ye shes 'di // de nyid dam tshig 'byung ba'o// dam tshig la sogs sbyor ba 'dis// sangs
267b7(rgyud): rgyas kyi yang 'grub mi 'gyur// dam rgyu shin tu rnal 'byor gyis/ rang gi snying bar gzugs sgom bya/ de la rdo rje yang dgra bskyed// ji srid 'dod pas bsten par bya/ dus la ltos pa la sogs
267b8(rgyud): ldan 'di ni ngas tshig mchog yino// ji srid dngos grub bsgrub bya ba// rtag tu de yis bsrung bar bya// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kyis de skad ces gsung so// rang gi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// rang
268a1(rgyud): gzugs la sogs mtshan nyid kyi// snying khar bdud cir brjod pa ni/ de yi sngags ni yang dag brtsam/ 'di yang dam tshig ye shes te// kun tu drim gsal bzhid/ 
268a2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i dngos grub brtan pa ni// brtul zhugs brtson pas bsrung bar bya// sangs rgyas zad rnams bsgoms nas// bsgrub bya'i rnam par bsam par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' yang ngag bskyed// snying
268a3(rgyud): po de la bsgom par bya// cho ga shes pas 'di rtag tu/ dus gsum du ni bsgom par bya// gal te gzhin du bzlas byas sam// sgrub na de nyid ma yin zhing // rig ma gzugs dang gzug sogs
268a4(rgyud): can/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas rgyan byed pa'i// sems dpa' rin chen ya nga dag bskyed// de yi lag tu'ang rnam sgom bya// bsdus pa yis ni sgom bzhin du// ji srid dngos grub rab mthong
268a5(rgyud): byed// gzhan du gal te bdag rmongs ngan// de yi sbyin pa der mi 'gyur// shin tu rnam bkra shin dri med// ye shes rin chen cod pan du// gzhag nas sgrub pa yin
268a6(rgyud): mchog/ sa steng lhan cig rgyu bar byed// rdor sems bdag nyid dngos grub pa// rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs// rtag tu rdo rje ye shes chos// go 'phang du ni bsgral bar bgyis// yis
268a7(rgyud): rdo rjes dngos grub pa// bdud rtsi zhes sogs byin gyis brlabs// rnamakha' mchog tu phra ba yi// bzang po nga ni rnam dpyod byed// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsung // 
268a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yo shes gsang sngags yeng su dag pa'i de kho na nyid byin gyis rlog
268b1(rgyud): bzhes bya ba de bzhin ga shegs pa byi macig bka'astsal to//  rje sa da skye smos gzugs kyi rjenas rab brjod / sems la don pasgos nas ni/ yis rdo rje ba zug sa/ rang bzhi
268b2(rgyud): dag pa'i do// gsung ba'i rdo rjer yongasu brtag/ dag pa'i ye shes rnam bsgoms pas// sku gsung dgu par rnam bsgom bya// rdo rje'i byin rlob shin tu gsal/ mi phye rdo rje'i sku nyid// sangs
268b3(rgyud): rgyas sku yi rang bzhin nyid// cho ga shes pas byin gyi brlab// rdo rje 'di yis byin brlabs pa// 'di yis byang chub thob par byed// cho ga shes pas zla drug gis/ sangs rgyas nyid 'dri
268b4(rgyud): thob par gyis// chags skyes chos kyis ma gos pa'i// rdo rje de rnam zad 'byung // de ltar de nyid cho ga byas nas// dngosagrub zad bsdus pa yin// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bcu
268b5(rgyud): gshegs pa tha~Md kyi ye shes kyi kun tu sbyod pa'i dam tshig pa/ 'astsal to// mi sgrub yi tshul gyis ni// rdo rje yis gsu mi 'byung bas// de kun nye bar long spyod pa// sangs
268b6(rgyud): kun spyod nyid du 'gyur// namakha'i khams ni kun bkang ba'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni gal te bcom// skye ba 'dir nyid sangs rgyas nyid// rdo rje slob dpon bsdus pa'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'a
268b7(rgyud): dbus ni/  rje' gzugs na/ rdo rje'i gzugs ni yang dgra bskyed// mkha' khams sangs gzugs kyis ni/ yongs gang bar nas bsgom bya// snying khrir sngags ni yang dag
268b8(rgyud): bskyed/ mnyam par yinag pas bskul bar bya/ kun tu dgyes po'i'adas tshig gang // rdo rje slob dben rtag bskam bya// zhema'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ rang gi sngags ni snga
269a1(rgyud): dag bskyed mkha' khams gzugs kyi yang dag bkang // snying khar thaMd rnams bsgom bya// de nyid de ni byed bzhin pas// sangs rgyas bka' nyid go 'phang
269a2(rgyud): gnas/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rang gi sngags ni yang dag bskyed// cho ga shes pas gzugs rnam par// gnas lnga rnamasu bsgom par bya// byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed
269a3(rgyud): de kun bskul bya brtul zhags can// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// rang gi sngags ni yang dag bskyed// cod pan du de rnam bsgom nas// mchod par bya zhing bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas slob dpon
269a4(rgyud): bde ldan gang / de 'di rnal 'byor pa'i bdade de// kun tu skrag pa kun spangs pa'i// sngags pa seng ge bzhin du spyod// skye ba 'dir nyid sangs rgyas nyid// skad cig de la nges sbyor byed// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
269a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thaMd kyi dam tshig gis de skad ces gsung // so// gnyisu med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtogapa'i rgyal po chen dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu pa'o// / 
269a6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd bsdu bas byon nas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi bkod pas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
269a7(rgyud): la yang dag par mchod de de skad ces ces gsol to// dngos grub thaMd byed bsam gtan// bsam gtan dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// de nyid bcom ldan bshad
269a8(rgyud): du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi gsol ba 'debs par byed pa'i tshig gsan nas// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis
269b1(rgyud): rlob pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig thaMd kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kun tu spyod pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ston par mdza do// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ dkyil
269b2(rgyud): 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje ye shes lta bu ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsal byed/ 'o ma dang zhor bsam bya zhing // pad+ma phra mos nyer bar mdzes// sna tshogs me tog chun pos gang // rab tu 'bang
269b3(rgyud): pas bsgom par bya// logs bzhi pa dang zur bzhi par// mkhas pas rab tu brtag par gyis// dzam bu na da yang dag byung // de la dbusu bsgom par bya/ khru ni bcu drug du bya ga/ sangs rgyas slob
269b4(rgyud): dpon cho ga gnas// cho ga shes pas grwa rnam su rtse mo lnga pa rnam bsgom bya// ji ltar rig pa'i gnas lnga ru// zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor brtag/ dkyil 'khor rnams ni bsgom byed pa// lag pa
269b5(rgyud): gcig tu yang dag bskyed// ji ltar rigs pas shar gyi ni/ mi bskyed yongasu brtag par bya/ cho ga shes pas lho yi/ ni/ deng ni rin chen dgod par bya/ nub kyi dpag med ces brjod
269b6(rgyud): pa byang du don yong grub pa'o// cho ga shes pas ser po'i mdog/ de nyid sgom pas bsgom par bya// dbusu khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad// sangs rgyas bskyed nas bsgom par bya// slob ma'i rnam
269b7(rgyud): par thad du/ cho ga shes drangasra bsgom bya// rig ma chen mo spyan la sogs// grwa rnams nyid du rnam bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas bdud rtsi zhes// sgo rnams kun tu bsgom par bya// de rnams kha dog
269b8(rgyud): bsdus pa yis// so sor rtogs par bya// de rnams kun gyis gzugs rnams rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya// 'od zer lnga po yang dag bskyed// 'dod yon lnga rnams bsdus pa yis// 
270a1(rgyud): khyab bdag la ni dbul bar bya// sangs rgyas slob dpon cho ga las// mkha' khams sangs rgyas kun gyis ni// yongs su gang bar rnam bsgom bya/ de ni khu bzad kyis/ 
270a2(rgyud): mchod pa bsgom par grags pa yin// dam tshig thaMd kyi dngos grub ces bya ba bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor rdzog s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang gdon mi za
270a3(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa// blo ldan sangs rgyas slob dpon gyis// de bzhin nyid du thang bya// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ thaMd der ni rnam bsgom
270a4(rgyud): bya shar gyi chos rnams kun gyi mchog rdo rje sem sa dpa' dgod par bya// sngags pas lho ru brtag pa ni/ rdo rje se la rgod par bya/ nub du ye shes rdzogs byang chub sangs
270a5(rgyud): rgyas slob dpon dgod par bya// byang du zad kun skrag pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya/ dbusu khams gsum pa mnyam pa/ rdo rje gzugasu rnam bsgom bya/ dkar po'i mdog
270a6(rgyud): tu rnam bsgoms nas// nag pa'i dbu suM bsgom par bya// btsun mo rnams ni kha phye nas// de nyid la ni rdo rje gzhug/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dpa' dbang phyug ma// gnas bzhi rnamasu 'bad pas so// ji
