366b3(rgyud): ba'i sngags sogs 'bar ba bzlas// de dag steng du thim 'gyur bas// lus ngan sras po'i sngags bzlas pas// de yang gong ma'i tshad nyid// phyin pas yongasu bzlas par bya// yid
366b4(rgyud): chen phur bu sor bcu pa// bcu drug dag gis de nyid kyikha ru yongasu bskor bar bya// bdag nyid snga ma'i cha lugs la// 'bar ba bskyod pas phur bu bsngags// nyungs kar til
366b5(rgyud): gyi rigs gnyis la// byang phyogs khro bo'i snying pa nyid brgya rtsa brgyad pas yongasu bsngags// skud pa sngon po nyid la yang // 'bar ba chen po'i sngags bzlas nas// de
366b6(rgyud): yi gzugs nyid yung ba yis// gro ga dag la bris byas la// skud pa de yi rab bcings la// nang du nges par gzugs par bya// steng du me long nyid la yang // gur gum khu bas byug byas
366b7(rgyud): la kho bstan la ni dgab par bya// zhag bdun par du bsnyen pa yis// de ning 'gugs pa'i sngags kyang bzlas// de nas sngags pas sbyor ba 'di // yongasu ma nyams yang dag bzlas// de rdzog
366b8(rgyud): nad pa bkug byas la/ gu gul nag po'i dung pa yis// sna zhing ngag tu bdug par bya// de nas de nyid 'phros pa na// mi bzang rab tu 'bar ba yis// sder mo yis ni drag tu bzung // hUM gi/ 
367a1(rgyud): nga rgyal sgra dang ldan/ zhags pa sngon po gang yin pas// de yi ske nas bzung byas la/ me long nying la ngo bstan bya// g.yas pa rdo rje ldan pa yi// phreng bas sngags ni yang dag bzlas// 
367a2(rgyud): de nas rab tu ldan pa yis// srog gi snying po yongasu bzlas// bsam pa yongasu rdzogs pa yis// nga zhing la ni yang dag dbab// de nas rnam par rab ldan pas// sngags chu yis ni khrus byas la// lus
367a3(rgyud): ngag yid gsum drag po yis// dngos po yongasu bcings byas la// khru gang brkos pa'i nang du gzhug/ phur bus steng du gzir byas la// phaT kyi sngags kyis yang dag mnam// des ni gdon mi
367a4(rgyud): za bar ni// gnod sbyin gdon dang nges par bral// de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo nying // yongasu srung ba byas// phyi nas gdon mo 'jug pa yin// oM ma hA be shra ba trA ya kaM kA la yak+Sha
367a5(rgyud): ban+d+ha nA/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta ku tA li hUM phaT/ la puHsha ya ga ha na ha na yak+Sha pa ra ya/ oM A kaR+Sha ya a kaR+Sha ya/ sarba yak+Sha na sU sha oM yak+Sha hr-i ma dza ma
367a6(rgyud): so pa la haM/ oM sarba ra ra bi sho d+ha ye hUM phaT/ oM ha hra ha phaT phaT phaT hUM/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // lus la sogs pa'i phar gnod gnyis// yongasu sbyang bar yang dag
367a7(rgyud): bshad// de nying lus ngan sras po la// keng bsgrubs de nyid nges par 'jig/ de yi sbyor ba byang// lus ngan sras po'i sgrub pa bshad / dang por de yi gzugs bya / 
367a8(rgyud): rams dang yung ba rab sbyar bas// ba dan ne'u le'u rkyal pa dang // sku gdung g.yas phyogs bzhag byas la// gong mo lta bu'i gzugasu br-i// g.yas g.yon gnyi su de nyid kyi// yi ge gnyis/ 
367b1(rgyud): po bri byas la/ de mthar drag po'i snying po bri// gsum sbyor dngos po 'bigs byed pa'i// tshigs gsum du ni nges pa las// dar dag dmar po kha tshon gang / me tog phreng bas yongasu rgyan// 
367b2(rgyud): rin chen sna lnga'i phye ma dang // di yi phye ma sna tshogs pa// phur ma byas pas gdags par bya// srog snying 'o mas bris bya la// de yi ming rus khrag gis bri// 'bru dag dkar po'i steng btsugs pa
367b3(rgyud): de nyid la ni chags par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa// 'phang du sor gnyis nges pa las// gong du bstan pa'i sbyor ba yis// yongasu byugs par byas pa las// mchod pa lnga yis rab
367b4(rgyud): mchod la/ bdag nyid sdom par yang dag gnas// zasu da gsum bza' byas shing // chang la sogs pa gtung mi bya// gtor ma cha gcig bsnyen par gnas/ cha gnyis nyin mtshan dus
367b5(rgyud): gnyi su// bsam pa'i sbyor bas yongasu btang // dang po 'i gtor ma de nyid la// nyungs kar nyid kyang blugs byas la// ba zlas pa'i grangasu thim par bya// de yi ming rus gang yin
367b6(rgyud): pas// snying po dag la re re zhing yang dag pa ru mnyes par bya// rang gis ma nyes gang yin pa'i// tshig brtson pa yis drag por bong / shin tu gdug sems rab 'bar bar// dang po snying
367b7(rgyud): rje chen po bskyed// 'di la chags kyi sbyor ba dang // brlag por bgyi ba'i skul ma gang ba// ring du 'tshon snying rje spang // myur du khyod kyis bsgral du gsol// de dag la sogs tshig dag gis
367b8(rgyud): de la tshig kyang drag por brjod// de nas gnas gang yin par ni// dang po'i gtor ma brdab par bya// dang po dang ni bar ngag dang // tha mar phyogs spyod srung ma la// 'o dong bong pas
368a1(rgyud): gtor ma btang / sngags rnams bla ma'i lung nas ni// yongasu shes par bya ba ni// oM bai shra mA rdza ya hUM/ a mu t+pa la ta ba ta sa sa ga ru/ de lus yongasu
368a2(rgyud): byung bas na// yang dag pa ru shes par bya// mtshan mo mgyogs pa zhes bya ba'i// srog chags gang dag shi ba yi rus pa la ni sngags bzlas la// de yi khang rtsar bzhug par bya// de yis ltas ngan
368a3(rgyud): sna tshogs pa// yang dag pa ru 'byung ba yin/ grub pa'i rtag su brtan pa ni// skyes pa mda' gzhu pa dag ni// yang yang rmis par gyur bI// nges par 'grub par yang dag bshad// lag na rdo rje gos sngon
368a4(rgyud): bau can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las gnod sbyin gdong ser gyi gdo na 'dul ba'i le'u bcu gsum pa'o// / lag na rdo rje gos sngon gyis// bcom ldan mgon la 'di skad gsol// gang zhig
368a5(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa la// bris sku la so gos glegs bam zhing / tshang de gang gis bgyi lags// rig pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// gang zhig sgrub par byed pa yis// bris sku glegs bas
368a6(rgyud): sbyor ba 'jis// yang dag par ni bsgrub par bya// dur gr-ing la sogs gang yin par// ri mo mkhan nyid rim pa bzhin// dpung bskur ba ni yang dag bya// tha ga pa yang bsnan byas la// dri zhim pa yis yo
368a7(rgyud): su byug steng 'og gnyis la mtha' gnyis gsum// mnyam par gzhag pas yang dag brtag/ dmar po lnga yis rab byugs// sa bon yang dag ldan pa dang // dri zhom rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ 
368a8(rgyud): yongasu byug par bya ba yin// tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs pas// yid ches sngags kyi tshon gyi rnams// mnyam par sbyar bar bya/ snod dag zod pa nying la ni// pir ni mi yi sgra yis bya// ngur khrod
368b1(rgyud): zhing sa lang stong ma// gnas dben pa ni yongasu bri/ las mkhan sngon po'i gos bgos te// khrag gis gdong dag byug byas la/ sngags 'di yis ni rtag tu bzlas// oM tsat+ta ma hA ro Sha No ko ra yaM/ sarba sa/ 
368b2(rgyud): ratha ts+tsha hUM// gtor ma drag po gang yin pa// bri ba'i dus su bzhag par bya// zin nas de nyid btang bar bya// dang por tshon rtsi thams cad la// rin chen sna lngar byin gyis brlab// rdo rje rtse gcig phyag rgya yI/ 
368b3(rgyud): yang dag pa ru bri bya ste// bskyed byed dang ni yon bdag gi/ bsam pas yongasu bri bar bya// dkyil du pad+ma bcu drug la// snying po ze 'bru yang dag ldan// dkyil du gtso bo 'bar ba nyid // gong ma'i gzugs
368b4(rgyud): kyis bri bar bya/ 'khor la sogs pa thams cad kyang // snga ma la/ bur yang dag bri// phyi rol shing la sogs pa dang // dur khrod brgyad kyis rnam par rgyan// 'jigs par byed pa'i ro langs dang // 
368b5(rgyud): lce spyang dag po'i sgra yang sgrogs// de ltar rim pa ji bzhin pas// gong ma lta bus yang dag bri// dbang bskur gnas skabs gang yin pas// mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor yongasu bri/ 
368b6(rgyud): yi bar du mi gzhan la/ bris sku bstan par bya'o// brgyang shing rus pa nyid la mi khyes pas thang ka yongasu brgyangs// gur dag sngon po phub byas la// mkha' la yongasu bsun mi bya// gal te bstan par
368b7(rgyud): byas pa na// dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba med// de bas mnyam par gzhag pa yis// yod sbyor ba legs par brtsam par bya// glegs bam nges par bri bar bya// gro ga ngag la sor dag ni// bkyus
368b8(rgyud): su bcu gnyis zheng du bani// de yi tshang du bya ba la/ khrag dang bdud rtsi lnga rnams kyis// yongasu byug par byas pa la// me long ur gyi mnan byas te// mthong shun nyid gyis legs par bri/ 
369a1(rgyud): 'dri mkhan sbyor ba rang ldan pas// smyug gu lcags las byas pa yi// snod ni bong par yang dag ldan// gtor ma yang dag bshams byas la// hUM gi ngag gis rtag tu brjod// gos
369a2(rgyud): ngag sngon po bgos byas nas// rgyan cha la yis rnam par brgyan// mi gzhan la ni mi bstan cing // glegs shing rus pa 'am glang chen gyi kha so dag la nges par bya/ zag pa bram ze mo yi ni/ 
369a3(rgyud): skra yis yongasu bsdams par bya// yang na yid ches lpags pa la// mnyen par bya bas yongasu snga ma// ngan lag g.yon spod kyi bar// de zhing ngag gis yongasu sba// sangs rgyas lnga yi dag po ma
369a4(rgyud): nges par rdo rje rnon pa zhing // sdang ba zang 'dul byed cing // dngos su dpa' bo rab 'bar ba/ chen po yi ni chen po nyid// kun la ma' 'gro chen po ste/ sku chen rab drag 'jigs gzug
369a5(rgyud): mkha' lta mnam la phyag 'tshal bsngod // las la 'ju ga bar snang ba nyid/ kun bsdus pas ni nga brdud bya// lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lho'i rgyung las
369a6(rgyud): bris sku dang glegs bam gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / lag ni rdo rje gos sngon gyis// bcom ldan mgon la 'dzi sang gsol// gang zhig rgyud 'di las sbyor bas// thabs kyi
369a7(rgyud): yan lag sna tshogs pa// yang dag rgyas par gsung du gsol// bde gshegs mchog gis bka' sprul pa// dad pa'i rang bzhin gyi mis// 'di nyid la ni mngon par smra ba/ klu gdug
369a8(rgyud): 'bar bas zin pa ni/ nub mo na par gyur pa dang // yan lag drag par na pa dang / smin ma la sogs byi ba dang / lus la sha ro khol bar gnas/ tshigs su na zhing chags par ldan/ sdeng
369b1(rgyud): mi dga' dang dkar la dgal// klu yi nang du shes par bya// ba lang dmar po mthong ba dang // sbal pa nya sogs mtshan ma rmi// bu mo gzhon mthong ba dang // skyes pa skra ser mi ba dag klu yi mtshan smra bstan
369b2(rgyud): ba yin/ khrus la dga' zhing skung ba 'khal// chang la yongasu dang che ba// tshangs pa'i nang du shes par bya// sman logs mang dang lag sbyar dang // tho ra na pa gang yin pa// zas mi za dang snying 'bar
369b3(rgyud): ba/ tshangs pa'i gdon du rig par bya// sked pa brkyang dang nyal la dga'// sen mo byi dor byed pa dag/ tshangs pa'i nang du shes par bya// nub mo sbyar ba rmi ba dang / spre'u bya la mthong gyur na// tshangs pa'i
369b4(rgyud): mtshar mar bstan pa yin// mirgan rid pa mthong ba dang / shar phyogs ril 'jig pa dag/ tshangs pa'i rtagasu bstan pa yon// dbugs ngag nang du 'dren pa dang khra zhing spyi bo
369b5(rgyud): lag pa 'dud// skrag par byed cing shal dga'// ga shi yi ni gdon du bstan// rkang pas sa la rdebs pa dang / mkha'/ sogs g.yas pa 'am g.yon pa ma/ gshin rje
369b6(rgyud): nang du rig par bya'o// tshig pa za dang gzhan la rgol// mi gzhan la ni mngon par snang // sngar dag rab tu mi bde dang // thag pa dag las 'dud pa 'dor// gshin rje'i gdon du shes par bya// glang dang
369b7(rgyud): barmis pa dang // gos dag sngon po lus la gyon// gshin rje yin mtshan ma yin// shing la mdzegs pas phyir ljang dang // glu gang zhugs par gang rmi ga// de ni gshin rje'i mtshan ma yin// mig rtso
369b8(rgyud): rgod cing smra ba skyug 'khur ba 'bung cing brang la rdung // gnod skyon gdon du shes par bya// yang yang ldang zhing sdam pa rgong // kha nas lce ni rkyong ba dang / lus la brku byug byed pa dang // gnod sbyin
370a1(rgyud): gdon du shes par bya'o// sgo ban ning zas la dga'// rgyab tu gzer ba gang yin pa// gnod sbyin nang du shes par bya// rba sngon dgul non pa dang / bong bu la nan mi ba nam
370a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin mtshan ma yin par bshad// bya rog lag par thogs pa dang // thag pas lus 'khyud nyal bar rmis// gnod smin mtshan mar reg par bya'o// spos chu la ni sngags btab nas// byin
370a3(rgyud): na len po mi byed pa// tshangs pa'i gdon du shes par bya// nyungs kar zhing la rab sngags nas/ lag par byin pas mig mi lbo// gshin rje'i gdon du shes par bya/ shal sngag kyis rab bsngam
370a4(rgyud): nas/ kha ru byin pas sna 'gas pa// de ni klu gdon sa par gsal/ skud pa sngon po nyid la ni// rab bsngags mdun pa bdun bor ba// mgul du bcings pas skad ngan 'don// 
370a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin gdon du yin par bshang// chom po dag ni phrad pa na/ sbyor ba 'di yis yang dag sbyor// dur khrod mi ga nga bsregs pa yis// sna tshogs thal ba blang byas la/ 
370a6(rgyud): chang dang nges par spras byas te// sbrul gyi lpags pas gtum byas la// til gyi gang bu grags pa la// 'bum du yang dag bzlas byas te/ bdag nyid gos la yang dag gtum// de nas
370a7(rgyud): de dang phrad pa dang // drag po las kyi sbyor ba yin// de nyid la ni phog par gtor// de yi sa de la gtor ba yis// de ni rengs par rmongs par 'gyur// oM mA nu Sha dul+la staM b+ha na hUM// sgyu ma dazang
370a8(rgyud): du sdung byed na/ sbyor ba 'di zhing brtsam par bya// ngos 'jam rdul dang zla ba dang / bgegs kyi gnyen po'i khu ba dang // sgeg chen las kyi khu ba su// byed pa gnyis ka bar smras la/ de
370b1(rgyud): la 'thun pa ning la ni// yongasu bskul bas sbyin par bya// de nas nges pa dus btang la// kha sbyor ba yis yang dag bsngags// oM na mo kA ma de ba ya ya ya kA ya kA ka la sar+b+ba b+ha g+ha bi pA ra ma
370b2(rgyud): swahA/ a mu kaM/ 'bum du dang por bsnyen pa yos// sbyor ba nges par spang bar bya// nor dag sgrib par 'dod pa na// nor 'dzin lha mo yongasu bri// kha dog ser po zhing la ni// phyag bzhi par ni bri bar bya// 
370b3(rgyud): zhal gcig nu ma 'bur ba la// g.yas kyi dang po ting 'dzin po// gnyis pa 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po zhing na ni// rin chen 'bar ba yang dag bsdams// gnyis pas ni
370b4(rgyud): le'i rgyal ba bsnams// de lta bu yi gzugs byas la// / sna tshogs dri yis yang dag mchod// mchod pa rnam pa lnga ngag dang // na bza' dar la sogs pa yis// yang dag
370b5(rgyud): pa ru mchod par bya// zhag grangs brgya rtsa brgyad pa ru// yongasu bsnyen pas bsngags bzlas bya// nga nas grub par gyur pa'i rtags// de nyid g.yo bar gyur pa yin/ 
370b6(rgyud): de grub rten ni rnyed par ni// de yis lung ni ston par 'gyur// de nas dbyig ni mi zad pa'i// bdag por de nges par 'gyur// ma rungs pa dag slor gzhag na/ sbyor ba 'di dag nges par brtsam
370b7(rgyud): de yis kun grags nyid dang ni// khu chen sa la sogs pa la// sngags 'di yis ni 'bum du bzlas// de nas bsnyen pa yongs rdzogs pas// yid ches dung la sbu gu can// sor bdun dag
370b8(rgyud): la dug blug te// skud pa sngon pos rab bcings la// nub phyogs dag tu nges par gdags// de ni 'byung bas bskyod pa na// mi de nges par spro bar 'gyur// oM ma hA kA lA ya s+t+waM b+ha u
371a1(rgyud): na ma ta ya/ a mu kaM sany+tsa la swA hA// mi rnams nges par mi gsal bas// rdo rje mo ni yongasu sgrub// sa la phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du// re mig bcu gnyis bris byas
371a2(rgyud): la/ ma rig la sogs rtags kyi ni// dngos po yang dag bri bar bya// de nas sngags pas rab bsngags la// bsam pa rab tu rdzogs byas la// de nyid dngos po gang yin pas// bse ba sbyar
371a3(rgyud): bas me tog bor// gang du bab pa der gnas la// shes rab can gyis rnam par dpyad// bzang ngan ltas rnams yongasu bshad// rig pa legs par sbas pa yis// kha yi lci bas rab btum
371a4(rgyud): la/ dang por gnyi su shes par bya// ring du bye brag med pa yis// bcom ldan sngon du bzhag byas te// dang por mchod pas yang dag mchod// smod dag yongasu btsugs pa yis// 
371a5(rgyud): shes rab bcu gsum bdag nyid can// dmar po gos kyis rgyan byas la// khrus ngag legs par byas pa dang //  yis legs par blugs byas la/ dpral bar thig le
371a6(rgyud): dmar po gdab// me tog dri zhim dmar po nyid // de yi lag tu sbyin par bya// de yis de la blang bar bya// de yis dngos po gsal bya ste// bzang ngan lnga su nges par ston// spyir na sna tshogs
371a7(rgyud): gdon la ni// 'bar ba chen po'i sngags bzlas bya// gu gul nag po'i dud pa dag/ de yi sA ru bdug byas la// nyungs kar gu gul me tog dang // / de yi snying pos bsreg par bya// 
371a8(rgyud): de yis nad pa gang yin pa// bgegs dang nges par bral bar 'gyur// srin la gnyis la skung po ni// sngon pos yang dag bsdam par bya/ spyi bo'i skra las srad bu gang / bcings/ 
371b1(rgyud): pas sngags ni nges par bzlas// 'khrug pa'i sde dag rgyal 'dod na// khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po yis// 'bum du bzlas pas bsnyen pa bya// de nas a mra'i lo ma las// yung bas yongasu zi
371b2(rgyud): byas la// gi wang gis ni rab tu bsku// cod pan spyi bor btums byas la// rang zhing sku ru bsgoms byas la// lag pa g.yas pas nyungs kar dang // ske tshe bral bar sbyar byas la// sngags bzlas
371b3(rgyud): sdig mdzub phyar ba yis// yongasu bros par sngo rgyal 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yis bdag nyid la// 'chi ba slu ba yang dag bya// bdag gi rgyud la 'chi ltas ni// phyi nang bcu gnyis yang dag
371b4(rgyud): ldan bdag gi bang la sha mtshan dang/ dmar po byung bar gyur pa na/ sum cu gnyis zhag 'chi 'gyur bas// rig pa'i rgyal po'i sngags kyi su// til la bsregs blugs stong du ni
371b5(rgyud): chang bar byas pas de bzlog 'gyur// de dang cha 'thun gang yin pa// kan la 'brum bu gsum pa dang // lce yi rtse mo sme ba dang // rdo rje lam nas khrag 'dzag dang // 'jug
371b6(rgyud): gnyis dbugs dag gsum pa dang // ri yi rtse mor shu ba byung // nang gi 'chi ltas nges pa ste// stag dang byi ba 'brug dag dang // rtsangs pa bya ge ga nag po ru// yongasu sbyor bas rig
371b7(rgyud): bzlas/ gau wang 'ug pa ru sbrul dang // tsam pa ka dang ut+pal dang // seng ldeng phur bu gang yon dang // 'ug pa'i sgro la sbyor dang // bya rog mkha' la 'phur ba yi// dkar pos dag
371b8(rgyud): phog pa ni/ phyi yi 'chi lhas yin pas na/ gong du grags pa'i sar song la/ rig pa la sogs sbyor ba yis// yong su bzlog par bya ba yin mkha' la sna lnga mthong ba dang / chu
372a1(rgyud): / la mig gzugs mthong gyur na// shin tu sdig pa'i lhas su bstan// rmi lam la ni stug zhon la// mchod rten nyid la 'dzeg pa dang // seng ge'i khar ni zhugs rmis
372a2(rgyud): pa/ yongasu sdig pa'i lhas yin pas// logs shig sor mo rtse gsum dang // bse ru'i phyogs dang kun 'dir 'dab// yon rgya mtsho mtshan bzang dang // skye mched 'phags lam chu
372a3(rgyud): srin mo// lo gsum zhag bzhi zla ba lngar// mi de nges par 'chi bas na// rig pa'i rgyal mo bdud rtsi 'khyil// rten 'brel yi ge brgya pa yis// sngags kyis sman la bsrung ba bya// khams
372a4(rgyud): gsum rnam rgyal 'jig rten mgon// de dag gi ni snying po yis// stag sogs gsol nges par bzlas// rma bya chen mo'i sngags dag gis// 'ug pa'i sgro sog
372a5(rgyud): nges par bsngags// phyag na rdo rje 'jam dbyangs dang // / stobs chen khro bo gang dag gis// sngags kyis seng ldeng 'ug sgro dang // ku sha byi la la sogs dang / 
372a6(rgyud): gsob la bsngags pas yongasu bzlog/ gtor ma sbyin sreg las kyis ni// yongasu bzlog par bya ba yin// shin tu dpa' dang dad par ldan/ shes rab che dang thos pa
372a7(rgyud): bsags// bla ma la gus gtong bar phod// lung ba ma gos gtsang ma la// rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur nas// tshogs kyi 'khor lo lnga byas la// shes rab ldan la bstan
372a8(rgyud): bya ba'i// gsang ba drag po'i rgyud rgyal 'ong // gzhan la bshad par bya ba min// gsang ba drag po khyod kyis ni// phan dang gnod bya gang yin la// rim pa bzhin du shes
372b1(rgyud): ba yis/ legs par swa dang bshad pa ni// gnas skabs du ma dang ldan zhing // kun la nges par zhugasas pa yis// rgyud 'di la ni nges par brtag/ rgyu 'di gang na gnas pa
372b2(rgyud): na// sa phyogs de yi gdug pa rnams// ring du bsrings pas gnas mi byed// gal te gnas par byed pa na// de rnams kun gyi rgyud tshig 'gyur// drag po rgyud kyi
372b3(rgyud): rgyal po la// gang zhig zhugs par gyur pa la// dug gsum sku la rab rgyan nas// btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gnas te// nyon mongs 'khor gyis rab bskor nas// bde ba chen po'i
372b4(rgyud): pas gnas// lag na rdo rjes de nyi du// skad cig tsam gyis bskor ba ni 'bum phrag gsum du rab bskor nas// bde bar gshegs la 'di skad gsol// rang ga
372b5(rgyud): gis rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di/ nges pa'i don dang rab sbyar nas/ gsang ba nyid du smras par bgyi/ lag na rdo rjegos sngon ma rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las las sna tshogs
372b6(rgyud): kyi le'u suM lnga pa'o// / phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gnod sbyin drag po chen po rdo rje me lce'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po// rat+na kAr+Ni dang / bod kyi
372b7(rgyud): lo tsA ba dge tshul khyu grags kyis bka' drin mnos nas rgya po bong du spyan drangs te bsgyur ba lag so// / rgya gar skad du// badz+ra hri da ya badz+ra dzi hA na ha na ma d+ha ra ShA/ bod sra
372b8(rgyud): rdo rje snying po rdo rje lce dba'i pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub songang tha~Md la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bac+doMs dung khrod chen po bsil ba
373a1(rgyud): tshal na bzhugs te// de na 'khor nye ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu rnams dang thabs gcig
373a2(rgyud): tu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs ka nas 'od zer rab tu bkye bar gyur te/ 'od zer nges stong gsum gyi stong
373a3(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ba khyab par byas nas sen zad kyi nang dang mi bde ba dang sdug sngal zang dang bral bar byas slar bcom ldan 'das kyi thug su zhug so// de nas drang song chen po nyes 'dor
373a4(rgyud): langs te phyag 'tshal nas bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na son thaMd la nang dang / dug dang / rims dang / ngagra dang / gdon dang / byang sems da
373a5(rgyud): spong gtong dang / char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / lo tog ma rungs par byed pa rnams kyis seMn thang sdug bsnga la zhing nyam thag par gyur na de la ji ltar srung ba dang / 
373a6(rgyud): bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// drang srong chen po zhes 'jo rang la rdo rje snying po rdo rje lce dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod// des sems can tshad la srung ba dang / bskyab pa/ 
373a7(rgyud): dang / sba bar byed// dengs bshad kyis legs par tu nyon la yid la zung shig/ de nas bac+doMs kyis byAdz+r-i hU~M zhes gsungs pa rdo rje snying po khro zhing gtum pa gdug pa'i cha lugs can 'thon nas badz+ra
373a8(rgyud): kyi snam logs na 'khod par gyur to// de nas bac+doMs kyis mgrin gcig tu gzungs 'di bka' stsal to// nyi ma nAn zla ba nAn/ klad pa nAn/ ku na zhi/ tsi ta ku li nAnA/ yak+Sha bzlog khyer/ de
373b1(rgyud): nas gzungs 'ang gsungs ma thag tu bgegs dang log 'dren thaMd 'jigs skrag nas kha sbub tu 'gyel te lbu bar skyug cing brgyal bar gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas kyang 'jigs
373b2(rgyud): nas lus 'dar zhing bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dgra dang / gdon thang brlag par byed pa'i gzungs 'di brjod par bgyis// 
373b3(rgyud): kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol// na mo bud+d+hA ya/ tsi tra mu drA yak+Sha bzlog byer/ de nas gzungs 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams tha~Mng kha sbub tu 'gyel te/ 
373b4(rgyud): gdon dang log 'dren thang kha sdug tu 'gyel te/ khrag tu skyug cing dbugs dang bral bar gyur to// de nas yang klu mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces brjod// bac+doMs bdag gis som
373b5(rgyud): bangal brgya srung ba bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa srung bar bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bas+t+ra na pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi'o// char dusu dpa
373b6(rgyud): bing lo tog bang srung bar bgyi'o// nang dang dgra dang gdon tha~Mng gzhom par bgyi'o// bac+doMs kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa ltar bgyid pa las bzlog par mi bgyid // bcom ldan 'das kyis
373b7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ legs leg so// klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas khyod kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa ltar gyis shig / dam tshig rje su bsrung shig/ ji ltar 'i'i bka' gcag na ngan song du lhung nga re/ ba ji ltar
373b8(rgyud): bsgo bathaMd kyis shig/ nas gsang pa'i bdag pos rdo rje lde dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bklags pas 'grub pa drag po rab tu mi bzang ba 'di smra so// badz+ra badz+ra hU~M/ na mo bud+d+ha ma
374a1(rgyud): tramu dra yak+Sha bzlog bye / na ga byer/ na ga nan/ nA ga go la nan/ nA ga ha na ha na mA ra ya zad rnams gdon nag po song song // b+hu ga tsi phaT/ tsi ka pyu phag l+ye pa ti phaT/ e pa ga ra
374a2(rgyud): tse di nA ga bar ma ma hA ba la sa ta ya go de sang he nan/ thum ril zang che ge mo mA ra ya/ dzaHrbang nan/ nA ga bA la hril nA ga pr-i gr-i nA ga phog badz+ra pra ba sha ya sa 'di gsungs shig/ byer ya/ b+h+yom
374a3(rgyud): ma hA a hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ mA ra ya ku ru swA hA/ ra sha mA ra ya rbang shig byer nan nan pha na ha na mA ra ya rbad nan/ de nas gzungs 'i gsungs ma bag tu namakha' la gnam lcags dradag po'i rdo rje
374a4(rgyud): 'og pab nas dgra dang / gdon dang me tog ma rungs par byed bzad kyi lus dus bur gtubs nas rdul phra rab bzhin du bar+Nag par bya'o// de nas bac+doMs kyis cho ga bka' stsal
374a5(rgyud): ba/ drang song chen po sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byi dor byas nas pa'i rnam lngas byug par bya'o// tsan dang rgya spos dri zhim pos byug par bya'o// me tog sil ma dgra so// 
374a6(rgyud): bum pa gang ba bzhago// mar me budo// gtor ma bzang po bzhago// lcags sam seng ldeng gi phur pa gzug so// dbu su rdo rje snying po bzhag par bya'o// de'i mdun du klu mtha' yas bzha'o// de nas mchod pa
374a7(rgyud): 'dod na me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lnga bya'o// klu mchod par 'dod nu khar ba'i snod du 'o mi dang // klu sman sna tshogs dang / rtsi sman sna tshogs kyis bya'o// nang dang dug srung bar 'dod na tshil chen dang / 
374a8(rgyud): gla rtsi dang / skud pa sngon po dang / rma bya'i spros bya'o// klu nag po chen po la ni tshol chen dang // gla rtsi dang / chen skung sna lnga dang / seng ldeng gi phur pas bya'o// 'byung po thaMng la ni phu pa dang / nyungs kar b+h+ya
374b1(rgyud): bya'o// skya reng 'char ka'i gdon la ni phur pa dang / nyungs kar dang / nyungs nag dang / ske tshe dang / bal chen gyis bya'o// 'byung po kun tu rgyu ba la ni phur bu lnga dang // thod pas bya'o// gzhan dag bsad par 'jod
374b2(rgyud): na phur po dang / gzugs dang / thod pas bya'o// mnan par 'dod na bod pa dang / dug dang / nyungs kar gyis bya'o// lo tog gzhom par 'dod na/ thod pa dang / dug dang / nyungs kar dang / tshol chen dang / 
374b3(rgyud): khrag sna tshogs la bya'o// lo thog srung bar 'dod na thal chen dang / ske tshe dang / phur bus bya'o// kun tu srung ba zhes bya ba gzhan gyi spong gtong bzlog par 'dod na mchod rten dang / gzugs dang / 
374b4(rgyud): thod pa dang / nyungs kar dang / phur pas bya'o// bang zhi bar 'o ngan thab khung rnying pa sngon na pa rgya shug la me btang la/ dkar gsum dang / mngar gsum dang / 'bras dang / til dang / ma
374b5(rgyud): kar la sbyin sreg bya zhing / che ge mo mA ra ya shin+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes bzlas na thang srung bar 'gyur// gang dag bsang bar 'dod na spang nga'i nang du seng ldan nam gdug pa'i
374b6(rgyud): shing lo mi gtang la/ gdug po'i rdzas sna tshogs dang / ske tshe dang / til dang / mar nag dang / tshil chen dang / ming byas spel te// spyan bsreg bya zhing / che ge mor sha mA ra ya rbad ces bzlas
374b7(rgyud): na dgra dang / gden thang brlag par 'gyuraro// bdag gzhan srung bar 'dod nam bya'i mkhris pa dang / ka ra dang / si'i bdud rtsi lo brgya lon pas bya'o// klu sa bdag srung bar 'dod na spos dang / ku gul nag
374b8(rgyud): bo dang / gla rbi dang / mu zi dang / ldong ros dang / dri chen dang / sbrang rtsis bya'o// mchog tu srung bar 'dod na 'bras bu gsum dang / bu chung gi rang byung dang / dri chus bya'o// khyad par dam pa srung ba chen
375a1(rgyud): a ru ra rnam par rgyal ba bcang zhing gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o// shig byer nan/ 'go nAn/ ha na ha na mA ra zang nan// drang srong chen po zhes 'dor gzungs 'di yod la rab tu zung / 
375a2(rgyud): shig/ sems can thams cad la srung ba dang // bsgrub pa dang / sA bar gyis shig/ nga'i bstan pa rjesu bsrung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ drang song chen po nyes
375a3(rgyud): 'dor dang / thang dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yon dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bac+doMs kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// / rdo rje snying po
375a4(rgyud): rdo rje lce dbab pa zhes zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// / 'dri dang po ska cog gis bsgyur zhing / phyis gzhan lo tsA ba d+ham grags kyis kyang bsgyuraro// rgya gar skad du/ gu hA badz+ra
375a5(rgyud): pAdz+ri a ba tan+ta khong skang du// bral phyag na rdo rje gsang bstan pa'i rgyung / dpal 'od zer gsang ba po la phyag 'tsham / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 'og
375a6(rgyud): min gyi gnas lgang lo can gyi pho brang na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po la/ rig sngags kyi lha tshogs kyis bskor te bzhug so// de nas dpal mo'i dbang phyug mas 'di skad ces
375a7(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po 'di sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ci lta bu zhig lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snying rjer zhing shes rab che/ bzod dang ldan zhing
375a8(rgyud): brtson 'grus che// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob cing // bslab pa gsum la rab tu gnas// des ni dpa' yang dag 'grub// gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las sgrub pa po gang zag bstan pa'i le'u
375b1(rgyud): / ste dang po'o// / dpa' mos gsol pa/ dpa' bo 'di sgrub rnam pa'i gnas ji lta bu lags/ dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa/ dben la nyams dpa' yid 'ong ga bkra shis dpal 'phel yang yang
375b2(rgyud): 'dzin/ dur khrod chen po 'jigs gnas pa// ri gsum rtse 'am shang dang ngam// phug gam lha khang stong pa dang // brag ri sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// khro bo'i cha byang 'angadra ba'i gnas// der ni dpa' bo sgrub par
375b3(rgyud): gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo 'di bskyed pa'i dmigs pa ji lta bu lags/ bac+doMs kyis
375b4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ dang po stong zhing bdag med// snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par ngag/ de lta bu yi chos nyid la// sangs rgyas son gnyis med pas// ma bsgoms mi rtog snang ba
375b5(rgyud): gsal// mtha' bral mkha' mnyam ngabu ma'i don// sem sa kyi rang bzhin de lta bu// de ltar ma rtogs son la// sdug bsngal kun dang bral ba yis// thugs rjes phyogs med bsgom
375b6(rgyud): par byaHsangs rgyas thaMd 'byung ba'i rgyu// rang bzhin sems ni yi ge hUM// yi ge hUM gi 'phro 'du las// gzhal yas khang dang lha yi ge ngan// lha yi sa bon yi ge las// go rim bzhin du bskyed par bya/ 
375b7(rgyud): gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las dmigs pa bskyed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // dpa' mes gsol pa// bac+doM rigs kyi bdag po 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dmigs pa ji ltar lagos/ bac+doMs
375b8(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskyed pa'i dmigs pa thob nas ni// snying khar ye shes sems dpa' sgom// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs khar ni/ pad+ma ming ba ba'i rgya sran tsam// dbusu nyi zlar
376a1(rgyud): gzhal yas khang // gzhal yas khang gi nang du ni// a shang mar me'i rtse ltar sgom// de la dmigs pa thob nas ni// ci yang bsam par mi bya ste/ bsam gyi mi khyab de bsams
376a2(rgyud): bas// de las ye shes thob par 'gyur// gsal la mi rtogs rig pa'i sku// ye shes zhes ni de la bya// gsang bstan pa'i rgyud las// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / 
376a3(rgyud): dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po 'di 'i ra'i ro ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpa' bo chen po 'di'i 'khor ni thugs kyi 'khor bzhi'o//

376a7(rgyud): baM ma ra ya tsiny+tsa zang / oM badz+ra kro d+ha na ga hI hUM phaT phaTe/ mA ra ya rak+Sha rngubs rbang / oM badz+ra kro d+ha ku be ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ mA ra ya ke tsha zang / dpa' po'i 'khor lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis
376a8(rgyud): rig pa phul ga ma hA de ba ma rA ya song song / ma hA nA gra ma rA ya dzaHdzaHma phA de ba rA ya han ha na ma hA ma ni mA rA ya gtubs gtubs/ ma hA grub pa ma rA ya tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA yak+Sha mA

376b2(rgyud): pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dag pa'o// dpa' mos gsol pa/ bac+doMs phrin las kyi gzhung sbyin sreg gi bsdu 'tshal lam mi 'tshal ces gsol pa dang / bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa// sbyin sreg

376b4(rgyud): pa'o// bac+doMs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ de nas rigs kyi lha tshogs rnams yid rang ste bac+doMs kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo // // bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag

376b6(rgyud): ra dzA na ma khod skad du// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis

376b8(rgyud): yin gyi tshogs dang / gnod sbyin lnga brgya dang bcas te thabs gcig tu gzhug so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das pa dang tha~Md 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas byang chub sel
377a1(rgyud): lagan rdo rjes b+ha gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// khyim gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po ma g.yo las/ gcig car bzhengs te gsang

377a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i lte ba nas yum dpal mo rdo rje bde ma zhes bya ba byung spyi rang gi ston pa la g.yas phyogasu bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ phyag byas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gso to// 
377a6(rgyud): khyod kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ni// gsang ba dam pa gang yin pa// rdo rje 'dzin pas legs par gsungs// 'dzi na rnyed dka' rgyud chen de// rin chen lta bur 'dod 'byung po// grangs med tshogs las byung

377a8(rgyud): gyi khams khyab par byas te/ tshur 'dus nas rang rang gi zhal du thim pa dang // dpa' mo rdo rje bde ma khyod// stong pa'i rang bzhin bdag med mas// ji ltar zhus bzhin bshad par bya/ gus pA nyon la legs par
377b1(rgyud): zung rdo rje 'chang gi sku gsung thugs/ mi phyed stong pa'i rang bzhin las// thugs rje sna tshogs 'bas chul te// 'don rab tu rtogs dka' bas// 'das dang nga ltar bzhugs pa dang / ma 'ongs sangs rgyu
377b2(rgyud): spyod yul yin// bsam gyis mi khyab rnam par dag brjod med mi g.yo 'dus ma byas// namakha' dri med chos kyi sku// dus gsum dus med rtogs pa'i mchog/ 'di la ji ltar bstan du yoda'on
377b3(rgyud): kyang snying rje'i rang bas/ thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin ni// gnyis med gnyis kyi thabs tshul rig/ 'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste// de nyid gzhan la mngon bsnyon pas// gdul bya tshim 'gyur rgyal

377b5(rgyud): rab gnyis med pa'i// sna tshogs nor bu rgyud chen 'di// rang gi gsang ba dam pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gas nga ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rab tu
377b6(rgyud): dga' ba'i glang bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bad mas gsol pa/ bac+doMs rdo rje 'chang chen po khyod la bshad sgrub pa'i gang zag ji lta bu lags/ bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/

377b8(rgyud): che// bzong ldan brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs// bslab pa gsum ldan dang pas rgya ma/ dpa' zhing gsang ba'i spyod pa shas// gus shing g.yo meng skyabs gnas gsum// rtag tu mchod cing yengs
378a1(rgyud): / pa med/ lhag pa'i lha la yid ches shing // phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob la// dam tshig brjo don nges par 'dzin// de lngas sgrub pa byas gyur na/ yun mi ring ba rang nyid kyi// gas
378a2(rgyud): gsum la ni mkhas 'gyur te// 'bang bas thob pa'i 'bras bu ni// skal ldan de yi snying la gnas// zhes gsung so// bac+doMs phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi blo las sgrub
378a3(rgyud): pa po'i gang zag bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje 'dems gsol pa// bac+doMs rdo rje 'chang khyod sgrub pa'i gnas ji lta bu lags/ bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
378a4(rgyud): mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag me bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog khyod la bshad kyis legs par zhon// nga nyid sgrub pa'i gnas mchog
378a5(rgyud): ni dur khrod brgyad dam nye ba'i gnas/ dur khrod na gas kyi nang du ni// ri rtse brag ri sngon po'i mdog/ khros pa'i gzu gsa'ang byang lha ba// me tog sngon pos mdzes pa dang
378a6(rgyud): ne'u sing dang ut+pal nags// dben zhing yid 'ongs nyams dga' ba// bkra shis dpal 'phel dbang yang 'dzin// lcang lo can dang ming 'thun pa// sna tshogs sgrub pa'i gnasu shis// chu sgra
378a7(rgyud): chu med u ma'i gnas// rgyal po'i pho brang tshong 'dus dang / nyan thos la sogs 'dug gnas// nga nying sgrub par mi bya'o// smin pa'i gang zag rnams la ni// gnas sogs bsngags pas ci zhig
378a8(rgyud): bya dzad bde chen sangs rgyas kyi// zhing khams rol pas gnas pa yin// de bas rigs kyis brtag par bya// bcom ldan las phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi
378b1(rgyud): / rgyal po las sgrub pa'i gnas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i me'u ste gsum pa'o// dpa' mo rdo rje bdengs gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang khyod// sgrub pa'i babs ji lta bu lags/ bac+doM
378b2(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma mkhyod kyis zhus pa legs// brag med bde ba'i rgyud 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par zhon// nga nyid sgrub pa
378b3(rgyud): rim pa ni// snying rje chen po sngon 'gro zhing // gzhan gyi don la bslab par bya// na mkha' rdo rje can dmigs la// bde ba chen pos rnam par mchod// rgyud sbyangs sangs rgyas tshogs dag
378b4(rgyud): la/  'gyod pa spangs te rjes yid rang / mya ngan 'da' la gsol bar bya// dam pa'i don la bskul bya zhing // rigs kyi sa bon cher bskyed la// kun la khyab byed gzhan don
378b5(rgyud): skrag bdag gi sdug bsngal mi blta zhing gzhan dag bde la dgod par bya// mi 'ongs lta bur gan sa pa yi// seMn kun la snying rje sbom// spros bral
378b6(rgyud): gnyis 'dzin spangs pa yi// tshul la yang dag/ bslab par bya// sangs rgyas son gnyis med cing // dpa' bos stong zhing bdag dang bral// snang zhing srid pa'i chos
378b7(rgyud): rnams can// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag// mtha' bral mkha' 'dra dbu ma'i don// de lta bu yi chos nying la// sems kyi rang bzhin gnyi su med// ma rtogs logs pa'i son la// sdug
378b8(rgyud): bsngal kun dang bral ba'i phyir// snying rje chen po bsgom par bya// rang gi sems zhing yi ge hUM/ sangs rgyas thaMng bskye ba'i ma/ chu skyes babs dang shes rab ldan// mtha' gnyis spangs pa
379a1(rgyud): gdan dang bcasas gnyis med rdo rje'i rang bzhin te// snying rjes sbyangs nas gsum pa rdzogs// sgra mdog nag po zha' gcig pa// phyag gnyis g.yas pa rdo rje 'dzin// snun pa'i stobs
379a2(rgyud): can rdo rje 'bar// g.yon pas dri bur kur brten te// sgeg pa'i tshul can namakhor gdengs// rin chen chu 'dzin rgyan dang ldan// stag lpags dar gyis sku la rgyan// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang
379a3(rgyud): bdud la brdzis// spyan gsum gdug pa'i mche ba gtsigs// bskal pa'i me 'ong nang du bzhugs// yi ge gsum gyi gnas gsum po// lhar byas skye mched byin gyis brlab// gan su khro bo'i yig
379a4(rgyud): 'bru bskyed// sprul pa dpag med phyogs bcur 'gyed/ yig bzhi yis ye shes dbab// rig bdag la sogs sangs rgyas kyis// dbang bskur byin brlabs cod pan bsam// 
379a5(rgyud): de yi ting 'dzin 'byung ba'i rgyu// cho ga gsum pa'i sem sa dpa' yis// gzhan don rgyun mi 'chid par sgom// yang na gsu nga gi yig 'grus mtshan phrin las thog med rnal 'byor
379a6(rgyud): bzlas// 'di ni rnam dag rig pa ste// rtag tu ma nyams 'bras bur ldan// bac+doMs phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las dpa' bo gcig pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// 
379a7(rgyud): dbang mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa// bac+doMs rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor sgom par thabs ji lta bu lags/ bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med
379a8(rgyud): bde ba'i rgyu'abyung ma// bdag med shes ratha ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par zhon// skad cig ma yi lhar bsams nas// snying lar nyi ma'i rig pa hUM/ 'od kyis rang bzhan snod bcud
379b1(rgyud): rnams// sbyangs te sangs rgyas sa la gzhan// 'od zer gnyis pas sangs rgyas dang // byang sems dkyil 'khor dgug bya ste// phyag bya hUM las lha mo bsam// me tog la sogs pas mchod la// tha
379b2(rgyud): dang pa yi mchod pa che// de 'od dpa' med lha mo yis// reg bya tha mi dad pas mchod// sdig po shags rje su yid rang dang // gsol zhing skyabs 'gro bdag lus dbul// sems bskyed dge ba bsngo bar bya// 
379b3(rgyud): de rjes dang po byams pa ste// gnyis pa snying rje gsum pa dga'// kun gyi mthar la btang snyom so// sbrang gni sngags kyi phyi nang kun// stong par byas te Tang lus kyang // daphung po'i gzhu 'dra srid
379b4(rgyud): 'dzin gyi// gan su hUM bsam de 'ong bcas// tsam las byung ba'i 'khor lo ste/ rtsibs bcu la ni nyi ma pas me// dbu su hUM las gnod mdzes bskyed// de las hUM 'phros khro btsu yang / 
379b5(rgyud): rangs la gsal bar bskyed// sngags pas bgegs med gyis shig par// de la bka' lung bsgom par bya// zhal bzhi gsang sngags dran pa yis// mthe bong bsdigs
379b6(rgyud): mdzub sbyar nas ni// phyogs bcu badz+rani brtan par bya// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na trAM hUM phaT/ oM gr-i pA ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A nA ya ho b+ha ga wA bid+yA rA rdza
379b7(rgyud): phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjod pas// lus ngag sems las byung ba yi// bgegs kun gyi ni mgo stengasu// rdo rje phu rab gzugs par bya// oM g+ha g+h+ra~M g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sar+b+ba du
379b8(rgyud): big+h+nAn hUM hUM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sar+b+ba pA paM A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bAkra tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT rdo rje tho bas brdung bya ste// oM badz+ra mud ga kI la ya a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ 
380a1(rgyud): / btab pas nges par brlag/ slar 'dus phyogs mtshams ma lus par// sa bzhi ra ba dra dang // gur bcing ba dang bla re dang // mda' dang me yi 'od 'bar sgom// oM badz+ra di nA badz+re b+ha
380a2(rgyud): ban+d+ha hA/ oM badz+ra pra kA rarmA \u0f7f hUM oM badz+ra paM dza ra hUM la g+hu/ oM badz+ra bi hAn hU wa hUM/ oM badz+ra sha re dz+wa la hA sa traM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la a na la rka hUM/ rims pas brjod la snying rje yi/ bdag nying gzhan
380a3(rgyud): pani 'dod pa// smon lam las byung rdzu 'dral mchog/ yaM las byung ba gzhu 'dra ba// sngon po pa ngan ldan pa bsam// de steng raM byung rgong ma ri kha/ gru gsum dmar po 'od 'brar ba// baM las skyes pa zlum po ste
380a4(rgyud): dkar po 'khyil pa'i tshul du bsam// de las skyes pa dbang che na te// lo skyes ser po rdo rje'i rgyu// gru bzhi 'od zer 'bar ba bsam// de steng tsam las chos kyi 'khor// lte bar bruM las gzhal yas khang
380a5(rgyud): gru bzhi sgo dang rta rabs bcas// dra ba phyed dang dra bas rgyan/ 9 nga ba rin chen rdo rje dang / mdzes pa'i ba dan bcas pa bsam// de nang ba las chu skyes ni// ge sar 'jab mar bcas pa'i steng / 
380a6(rgyud): nyi ma ka li 'od 'bar tsha// steng du b+hA ba a li bsil// kha sbyar bar du hU dang a// gnag cing dmar ba'i rnam pa la/ de las pad+ma rdo rje bsam// slar yang yi ge 'gro ba sbyang // hUM gis mi bskyod thugs rnams
380a7(rgyud): sU// a yis 'od dpag gsung bsdus la// gnyis med zhu bas sprul pa bsdu// rdo rje las ni khro bo b+hapad+mas khro mo'i rnam par bskyed// khro bo mthing ka zhal gcig pa// rang 'ong las byung phyaganyis
380a8(rgyud): 'khyud// rdo rje dril bu thabs shing se g.yas dang g.yon du bsam par bya// bu rgyan la sogs ris chen ldan/ dbu skra lams ser gyin du 'bar/ nag po sbrul lus klu chen brgyad/ sku smang stug gi/ 
380b1(rgyud): lpags pas dkris/ chos gos sngon pos su stong / sa/ mche ba gtsigs shing spyan gsum das ra/ 'dod dgur bsgyur zhing brkyang bskum zhabs// mtha' gnyis sbyangs pa'i steng du bzhugs// de yum
380b2(rgyud): rdo rje bdes khro// dmar ldang zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// g.yas pa gri gug yab la 'byung // g.yon pa thong pa bde ba ster// gnyis med g.yon gyi phyogs nas 'khri la// rdo rjes sbyor
380b3(rgyud): ba'i sgras bskur te/ shar phyogs pad+mar nyi zla las// hUM las khams gsum rnam par rgyal// dkar po zhal gcig phyag gzhi pa/ g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzim/ g.yon pa dril bu
380b4(rgyud): can te// khro bo rgyan ldan bsams nas kyang // 'byung po'i nus pa 'joms par byed// lho phyogs zhim ro steng su// sbru las zung ba'i leg ldan gnas// g.yas pa gri gug g.yon thong ba// zhabs
380b5(rgyud): gnyis pa rkang bskum thong phreng ldan// dag po gsod pa'i lha ma brtson// nub tu klu 'dul 'dud rtsi 'khyol// ljang ku zhal gcig/ phyag bzhi khro// g.yas pa rdo rje bya khyung dang // g.yon
380b6(rgyud): pa dbyug to phur bu ba rnams/ sa 'og klu sogs zasu gsol// byang du k+Sha las rnam zas bu// zhal gcig phyag gnyis bum steng su// mdog ser g.yas pa rgyal mtshan bsnams// g.yon
380b7(rgyud): pas nor 'dzin bzung ba ste// dbul ba sel ba'i don la brtson// sgo mtshams lha yi rang bzhin la// ye shes spyan drangs mchod la gzhug/ de ni yi ge bzhi sbyor yin// lus ngag sems la yig
380b8(rgyud): le/ lha yi mtshan ma gangab par bya// skye mched lhar byas shing 'dzin gyi// nus pa mi shigs lgar blta so lo// ye shes lnga 'dus yige bsam/ rdo yi 'od kyis spyan drangs pa'i// ril+la/ 
381a1(rgyud): lnga snyoms 'jug byin rlabs kyis// mi bskyod rdo rjes dbang bskur te// gsang ba shes rab ye shes kyi// rgyas btab rigs la bzhi pa yi// phyag rgya chel rigs med do/ 
381a2(rgyud): 'di ni gsang chen sku sgrub pa// rim gyis gsal zhing rnam par dag/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku thob pa// tshe gcig nyid la 'gyur ba yin// rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa sogs 'jig
381a3(rgyud): rten ma lus kun// skad cog nyid la dbang du 'gyur// gtsug ni rin chen la sogs pa'i// gdug pa can rnams snying yang 'byin// dga' bo la sogs klu tshon rnams// rtag tu de la 'dud
381a4(rgyud): par 'gyur// nad kyi rigs kun ma lus 'joms// gnod sbyin ma lus bka' nyan cing // lha srin ma lus bran du 'gyur/ 'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste// mdzes ma khyod la bshad
381a5(rgyud): pa yin// bac+doMs phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon pa ra bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ri le'u sde lnga pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bdems/ 
381a6(rgyud): gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi don ji lta bu lag// bac+doMs 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag
381a7(rgyud): med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog khyod la bshad kyis leg par zhon// gsang ba mchog gi gsang ba ste// phrin las tha~Mng rdzogs byed cing // sdug
381a8(rgyud): bsngal kun las skyob byed pa'i// a li ka li mnyam sbyor las// thabs dang shes rab mnyam med pa'i// sngags kyi don ni rnam pa lnga// sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa dang // phrin// 
381b1(rgyud): las sna tshogs rig pa dang // 'khor gyi las kyi 'og pa dang / 'byung po dmug dang bsang pa dang / gtor ma gtang ba'i rig pa'o// oM badz+ra \u0f7fhU~M phaT swAhA/ oM
381b2(rgyud): kro d+ha ni lA~M bat+ta ra badz+ra pa Ni hUM phaT swA pA/ oM badz+ra tsaSh+Ta ma hA ro la Na hU phaT swA hA/ had+ya thAl+lo b+ho ban+d+ha ga a d+hi pa ha ye/ i daM nI lA ba ra d+ha ma sha ri lA tri/ badz+ra pA Ni hr-i dai ya~M/ yaHsa ma
381b3(rgyud): gram gro ma thul g+huHsa de ni//  ba'on+d+ha/ d+hanA~M/ saN+Da rbar+d+ha/ oM prad+d+ha'i bri sa k+Sham pa/  ga nA kAn+ta/ khrag bra ha na tAn/ hrI ts+tsha n+dan ga dz+rang la ni/ Sh+T+r-i gyi namaman
381b4(rgyud): r+yan+da nA ga sha r-I rA khi s+pho Ta ya na ge na ya na na~M// tad+yaHoM AHhU~M phaT/ nA ga bri da rat+tA ya hUM phaT/ nAM gauta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI la ba~M sa nA ya hUM phaT a pre hi ha ta ba le pa rak+Sha mA
381b5(rgyud): ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn tA rAp+na ya pha gr-i trA sa na la pheT/ ku Sh+pa d+d+hotasA ngan ya baTe/ pre ga po shatsu bo nI shaM ka rA ya phaTe/ yak+Sha a pasmai ra be na ka sha ka ra y+ra pha T+Tasas
381b6(rgyud): da ra da ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya na sha ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+na bi nA sha ka ra yA phaT/ sar+b+ba sha d+h+waM saMg+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ ni mAM ba ra d+ha badz+ra pA N+Di radz+nyo ba ya ti swA hA/ oM badz+ra trai lo kya
381b7(rgyud): dza ya b+hI smr-i swA hA/ mA ra ya tsit+ta rbad zad/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi ma hA ka lA la hUM baT oM ma hA kA lI gu r+Na hr-i da ya hUM phaT/ tsit+ta kr-i ng+gi duny+dza dzaHoM badz+re kr-i d+l-i a mr-i ta nA ga hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta
381b8(rgyud): ku Da li saM khaM ku ru hUM phaT/ mA rA ya rak+ta rngubs/ oM badz+ra kro d+he ku be ra rA dzA ya hUM phaT/ oM Ar+ya dzaM b+ha la dza li dra ya hU~M phaT/ mA ra ya ke chom chom/ ma hA de ba mA ra yA song song / ma
382a1(rgyud): nA ga ma ra ya dza dza/ ma phA de bi ma ral ha na ha na/ ma hA ma nu ma rA ya gtubs gtubs// ma hA grub pa ma ra ya tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA yak+Sha mA ra ya b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ma hA gar+b+ha rma ma
382a2(rgyud): ya khos khos/ ma hA sa r-i ni mA ra ya nAM/ ma hA nI lAM ba rang+ga badz+ra pA Ni yak+Sha hUM/ mu ru mu Shu hUM phaT/ mA ra Na song song // mA ra Ta bying bying / mA ra \u0f7frmugs rmugs/ mA ra Na ha la ha la/ mA ra Na myos
382a3(rgyud): myos mA ra/ myos bying / mA raN thus r-is dza dza/ ka ka rak+Sha tA pA s+yai b+h+yo dza khe'o// / sha ra NI hUM smai b+h+yo dz+wa la lA/ tsa pa rat+na rbA hUM swe b+h+yo dza kha lA tsa ka rak+Sha pU dzI ts+tsha b+ho dz+wa la lA/ mun du
382a4(rgyud): hU hU s+yai b+h+r-i dzA Sha kha/ ka ka rak+Sha sa ma ya bud+d+hA ya s+phuHre ti sho rak+Sha sa ma ya bud+d+hA ya sU ta rau/ tsa ba rak+Sha sa ma ya drA d+hA ya sU ta ra/ tsa ka ra mr-i du rak+Sha sa ma ya bud+d+ha ya
382a5(rgyud): s+phu ta ra/ hU~M la dri la/ dis mi/ khob pog/ shar di rong ro zang chang / kha kha~M kha thA/  thums thug/ dza re dza ra r+g+ho/ rgas has/ rke bte ba/ kri ta ga/ kri khrag kri khrag tshal
382a6(rgyud): pi tshetshal pa/ rbod ling chang ling / srog tshig nan zang / lus dul mA rA ya rbang / raM raM dz+wa la dz+wa la shi sha~M/ rdul bun rbad song / nA gau mA ra ya hUM phaT dzaHhUM baM hoHd+har+m+ma ka ka ki ri/ d+har+m+ma he sha sa
382a7(rgyud): muny+dza/ d+har+m+ma te sha ka ra/ d+har+m+ma he sha sa ma ya/ bud+d+ha pu ha ra/ he ba he pa kha khA raM/ ti ba he pa ka tsa ra/ te pa hi pa mun du ri/ ti ba he pa pus+t+raM ha ra/ ta pa te ba saM muM dza/ tsa ka ra muM du ra le/ 
382a8(rgyud): badz+ra rtsa ma na dzA dzA/ sun du naM/ badz+ra dzu tshaM madz+ra ru dzu ru sa nr-i dza dza \u0f7f/ badz+ra b+ha na She dza/ badz+ra pU ra Ni 'dzi/ badz+ra muny+dza re le dza/ kha dza ra mu dur lo// Sha dza rA dza mr-i drA ras
382b1(rgyud): mu She khad+ma ra NIShA dza ra dz+ra mu dur dzA khe/ kha dza rA dza muM du ras muny+dza ra khe dzu dzu dza dza khA hi dza/ oM kA ya bAka tsit+ta i daM ba li/ b+huny+dza dzi g+ha puSh+pa d+b+ha ba maM sa se/ sa khan+ti/ khud+d+hi be Da gA d+ha/ 
382b2(rgyud): oM a mr-i ha pra ti dza ka sa ka ruM pU dza khA hri rak+ta pi ba ta/ ka se ru bI dza khA hi/ d+hu ga/ puSh+pe/ A lo ki gan+d+he/ nai bi d+ye/ kA sa kau ru pU dza khA haM/ oM e kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma dz+dza/ a
382b3(rgyud): nuta ban na twA ha/ oM AHhUM/ 'di ni 'on chen sngags kyi mchog/ ma lus dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i dpal// gzugs ma khyod la zher bshad pas// 'di ni mi 'da' rim tshig yin/ bcom ldan 'das
382b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po lags gsang sngags bstan po le'u sgo drug po'o// / dpa 'a mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bac+doMs rdo
382b5(rgyud): gi 'khor ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog
382b6(rgyud): khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyo na// nga yi 'khor ni bas mi khyab// 'od tsam grangs ni sangs rgyas kyis/ bskal par bgrangs kyang shes mi 'gyur// de bas na mkha'i tshang dang mtshungs/ 
382b7(rgyud): mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// skra yi 'khor ni khro bo bcu// rigs lnga'i ngo bo sku gsung thugs// mi 'gyur gdug pa 'dul ba yin// thugs kyi 'khor ni rigs brgya ste// mdor
382b8(rgyud): bsdus sprul pa'i khro bo bzhi/ gsung ga 'khor ni dpag med kyang // rigs drug 'dus pa'i khrung chen yin/ sna tshogs bsam gyis mi bya'o// gdul bya'i 'khor ni klu chen brgyang / 
383a1(rgyud): gsung gis do rigs 'dul ba yin// gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i tshogs// lnga brgya rigs bsdus sku yi 'dul// thugs kyis lha srin gdug pa 'dus// byams pa'i
383a2(rgyud): 'dzin gyi 'dul// 'di la 'dis 'dul sprul pa'i tshogs// smon lam dbang gis byung ba ste// bsam gyis mi khyab nges 'dul ba// rigs la brjod par ga la nus// mdor bsdus mdzes ma khyod
383a3(rgyud): la bstan// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las 'khor nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ 
383a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi las sgrub pa'i rim pa ji lta bu lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdze sa ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ zag med bde ba'i
383a5(rgyud): rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog khyod la bshad kyis legs par zhon// gdug pa'i klu rnams 'du/ 'dod pas// rdo rje khyud chen stobs chen 'dul// nga yi
383a6(rgyud): gsung gi sprul pa ste// mche ba rno dpal drag po gtsigs// baM las rgya mtsho ri rab snying // yi ge hU~M las byung ba yi// dpa' bo klu 'dul bsgom par bya// sku mdog nag po zhal dgur ldan// 
383a7(rgyud): rtsazhal mthong nag g.yas pa dkar// g.yon pa dmar po de steng du// bus dmar g.yas pa ldang ba ste// g.yon pa btse ma gser dang 'dra// de steng dbus dka re g.yas pa gnag/ g.yon pa bai DUR+Ya
383a8(rgyud): ltar sngo// thang spyan gsum rdo rje'i mchu// spyi gtsug rin chen rdo rje rA// phyag ni bco brgyad g.yas pa na// rdo rje ral gri dgra sta zhags// mdung dang lpags kyu mda' dang ni// rtse gsum las
383b1(rgyud): kyi bya khyung bsnams// rim bzhin chu bdag mtha' yas dang // nor rgyas stobs rgyu dung skyong dang / pad+ma pad chen rigs ldan dang // 'jog po klu dgu ro stong lnga la sbyar gtso la rin che

383b3(rgyud): sbal gyi rgyal mtshan gzhu dang ni gtum chung phur dang khyung phu ro// rims bzhin rlung 'byin dga' ma dang / mdzes ldan dpa' mo 'ong byed ma// grub ma brtan ma dge ma dang // gsapa
383b4(rgyud): bying rim bzhin yab dang 'dra// thal sbyar gcol paHdbul// gdengs ka gsum gyis 'dung byed ma// g.yon du rim bzhin bsam par bya// zhabs bzhi chu srin rus sbal dang

383b7(rgyud): sprul pa go cha'i sngags bsam pa// oM hUM NAM hrI A/ spyi bo mgrin pa snying kha dang // lte ba gsang gnas bsam par bya// e baM ma yA dpung pa dang // dpyi'i steng su

384a3(rgyud): ru ra d+hu mA ra ya/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ badz+ra ba hi ga ru De be ge hUM dza dza ri dza pri dza hUM phaT/ thugs gsang rdo rje gtum po'i sngags// drag byed zad brlag par byed// klu rnams snying khrag 'thig pa yin/

384b1(rgyud): thal ba dkar gsum sbyar bya ste// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu la ngor// de ltar las kyi sbyor ba de// lan bdun byas par gyur na ni// klu chen dug gis snying la zin// nges par sos par 'gyur ba yin//

389b1(rgyud): / gang dang gang du bar gyur pa'i// rigs kyis de la spro bar bya// chu dang cod pan rdo rje de// dril bu ming gi dbang bskur te// rigs lnga'i bdag nyid ye shes lnga// brtul zhugs bstan rjes gnang sbyin// 
389b2(rgyud): dbugs dbyung rdo rje slob dpon sgrub// gsang ba shwe rab ye shes dang // bzhi pa brjod med dbang skur ba// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// mchog tu rab zhugs mthong bas na// deng

389b4(rgyud): tu srung bar gyis// slob mas bla ma la gtung nas// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de ltar bdag gis sgrub par bgyi// btso ldan 'das kyis bshad pa ltar// rgyan dang na bza'

395a6(rgyud): nyi ma zla ba rnam dag dbul// baM la maM byung ba'i lnga mo ni/ sku mdog dmar ldang zhal gcig ma// phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa 'dzin// gar thabs rgyan gyis mdzes ma

395a8(rgyud): he hazhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas pa na/ rin chen g.yon pa thod pa 'dzin// g.yon du dam tshig sgrol ldang // g.ya sa pa ut+pal thod pa 'dzin du gos da ka r-i dasar
395b1(rgyud): ser te// pad+ma bong pa bsnams pa'i phyag/ kun kyang khro zhing grwar thabs bzhugs// rus pa rin chen rgyan dang ldan// mchog smrab nang rnams sbyang ba dang // srung zhing 'dod pa
395b2(rgyud): zhi rgyas dang / rang gi srog 'dzin phrin las dbang // rtag tu yis pa yang mchod// rig pa nges par bsun pa ni// oM badz+ra suM bud+d+ha sar+b+ba ba shaM ku ru su ra ka hUM phaT swA hA/ 
395b3(rgyud): oM shaM ka re shr-i ti ka re/ g+hu Ta g+hu Ta ti ni g+ha ha ya/ g+hu Ti nau sA hA/ oM ru ru sU ru dzA la tiny+dza sid+d+ha lo tsa ni/ sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni sA hAM// oM a ka Te ni ka Ta ka TaM ka TaM ka r-iT
395b4(rgyud): bIr+ya swAhA/ oM tA re tut+tA ra~M tu ri ma ma A yu She s+yA hA// rang rang las dang 'brel pa ni// 'bum 'gyur sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur// las gzhan dngos grub
395b5(rgyud): ma sgrubs par// lha mo khyod kyis byed pa yin/  ni gsang ba dam pa ste// ches gsang bas kyang mchog yino// de bas mdzes ma khyod la bshad// bac+doMs
395b6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las yum sgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// dpa' mo rdo bdems gsol pa// rdo 'cha
395b7(rgyud): gau las sna tshogs pa sgrub pa ji lta'u lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med
395b8(rgyud): shes rab mi yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par zhon// sgrub po phun sum tshogs 'dod pas// nga nyid thog mar mnyes bya ste// 'dod pa'i rdzas la 'khor lo
396a1(rgyud): pri de yi nang du chud pa yi// long spyod ming dang spel bris nas// bkug la bcug la sngags 'di bzlas// oM tsaN+Da ma hA rol / tad+ya thA/ oM tsa la pra tsa la/ la
396a2(rgyud): lA lu te yA/ de ba ka ma hA kA li/ a na tsa ra ya bo swAhA// khri bzlas pas rang ci 'dod pa 'ong bar 'gyur te// gong bu dgug pa'o// rang nyid rdo 'dzin bsams la// ta la'i lo
396a3(rgyud): ma la ri rab kyi 'khor lo byas te// zur du hUM dang hr-i'o be rA du bsgrub pa'i meng byi'o/ lte bar sngags bri/ rtsibs la yang sngags bris te// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan cing // oM tsaSh+Ta
396a4(rgyud): mahA Sha rdza tsa muSh+Ti d+hu ma ke shi sr-i/ ha na ha na/ hi/ pa tsa po tsa hau// de ba dat+ta che ge mo me be shi ri sAhA// zhes khri bzlas pas rkang pa dgug pa'o// oM tsartA ma hA ro Sha thag pa
396a5(rgyud): pi ti ri swAhA/ sngags 'dri bzlas la kha bskus la/ khyu mchog gi l+li ba dang ldong ros bsres la rdo rje'i gzu gas te/ lte bar 'khrul 'khor bcug la dga'i
396a6(rgyud): sgor sbas na 'chi bar 'gyuraro// bkrugs pa sa 'grub 'gyur nus pa 'di// rdo rje 'dzin pa re rab zhugs nas// rdza mkhan lag pa'i 'dug pa la// rdo rje'i rnam par 'khrul wA ra bas// 
396a7(rgyud): au tsaN+Dam hA de roSha// che go mu ShatithAM ti sa g+ha sa na te// / g+haM daM ti/ maM g+h+rA laM g+haM/ mu tra mu ri/ She che ge mo ban+d+ha mi swAH// sngags 'di khri bzlas
396a8(rgyud): khang par mnan// nges par shags las rgyal bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra tsak+Shu ma hA ro Sha Na nas ni khaM be rA ya/ tsi ro tsau ri/ ka tu ru tu re na mu Shi/ tu te ba~M d+ha so ri khe li swA hA/ rdo rje la ni khrag gi
396b1(rgyud): bris gang gi phyogs mtsham sbas pa na// byi ba Sha ni 'ching ba yin// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro la/ naM tu na te/ si ri sa re/ Shi li khi li sAhA/ stag gi lpags pa la bris te gang la btags pa'i spyang
396b2(rgyud): ki srung // oM tsan+d+ra ma hA ro Sha ta ma rak+Sha ho// nA sha kA ra y+Ya swA hA/ shing pog la bzlas ra ba ra sAs// spre'u gnod pa bzlog par 'gyur// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro la tra sar+b+ba saM b+ha ya dr-i b+he sA
396b3(rgyud): sbrang rtsi bu ma zhu ba la// 'od bzlas byugs pas dom 'bres/ oM tsaN+Da ma n+do Sha tra la rA prad+hA na dr-i dru d+ha swA hA// dug dang lan cha ske che dang // yungs kar la phug sa bon dang / de rdu rang
396b4(rgyud): kal bi dang / ma he phag dang lde spyasbyang khrag sbrus la rdo rje brgyang byas la// phyogs mtshams spras na gnod pa 'o// mtshan/ das bcang yi nges pa yin// oM badz+re tsadz+dza ma hA rol
396b5(rgyud): b+hid+hahon kaM swAhA/ sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na srung ba 'di yang mtshams bcad yin// oM bi hi bi na/ hrIb+h+r-i bi Ta bi Ta hU trAM swAhA// sngags 'di gang yin lci ba
396b6(rgyud): med bzlas te ma he 'thung ba'i chu/ nang bcug zho rnams brlag par 'gyur// gser me la ma reg pa// g.yu mi gam phug pa/ mu tig/ mu mon/ ga ser gyi bris pa'i khrom 'arba
396b7(rgyud): mu rbi bcan dug/ gra gul// ge bang spre'u'i spus btums la/ oM badz+ra tsar+d+ham pa ro la/ gamu Na tsa le ba dud tra ma rA ya/ b+ha ti ga ru Da be ga hUM dze br-i dza nA ka rA dza ma rA ya hUM
396b8(rgyud): 4Ta/ sngags khri bzlas te lus la bcangs na klu zang 'gros par 'gyuraro// oM pad+ma k+Sha pad+ma k+Sha la ru \u0f7f hUM phaT swA hA// chu gtsang ma la bzlas te mig bkrus na mog nad thams cad/ 
397a1(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyuraro// sug spel dang / dza ti dad+ya/ nA ga ge sar dang / a sho ha ka'i 'bras bu rnams la sngags 'dri bzlas te dpal bar shu kras thig
397a2(rgyud): ye byas na kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyuraro// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha/ dza~M b+he ha hri swAhA// brgya rtsa brgyang bzla so// byis pa gsar btsas srung ba na/ kham phor nang du rdo rgyus kyis// rdo rje
397a3(rgyud): rgya gram lta ba'i nang / oM badz+ra tsat+tA ma hA ro Sha che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA// hUM bcu bris de lha bstims la// mchod skyon pa maher ma sbyin byas te// de yi steng du spang bar
397a4(rgyud): lus la gur gum chus bris pa'i 'khor lo gnyi/ sa bas bsrung bar bya// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha hA khas ha do lA yI swA hA/ me do yA sA ba tsin mo ho hi sAhA

397a6(rgyud): Shardzan ma sa ra na mA/ tad+ya thA/ d+he ra mahA d+haM d+hang+ga Te druM Ta de swAhA/ bye ma dang thal chen la bsngags nye zhing la gtor na srog chags kyis za bar mi 'gyuraro// oM badz+ri su
397a7(rgyud): da bi shud+d+ha a l+li ba ba ra tsu la tse ra sa ga gan+d+ha sA pa mi h+ya ban+d+ha li swA hA// sngags 'di rdo rje'i shing dang // nga lis dang / arga gsum la lan bdun bdun bzlas te/ rna ba'i lo
397a8(rgyud): tu bcug na tsA re ba thaMd kyis gnod par bya bar mi nuso// mi rus l-i byas phur bu ni// bgegs kyi lus can zhal gcig pa// phyag bzhi po ba zhags pa dang / dgra sta rtse
397b1(rgyud): gsum bsnams pa ste// dug khrag lan cha sre tshe dang // rgya tshwa mar nag nang du bco// stobs chen sngags bris te nga/  ra se mas btums// khyim sgor smras na 'chi bar 'gyur/ 
397b2(rgyud): oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa/ bi d+hA na sa ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i thod par khyi smon pa'i lce la dgra'i ling ga bris he rta'i de ga pa'i 'og tu bcug la sngags
397b3(rgyud): 'di bzlas nas gang gi sgor sngas na bskrad pa 'am spro bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra tsat+ta ma hA rol che ge mo mu b+hau ya phaT/ ces khri bzla so// shing li dang rtag pa la rdo rje'i rnam par byas la
397b4(rgyud): lte bar las kyi rig pa bcug/ dpa' bo g.yul du shi ba'i skra'i the gus rkeng par btags la klang la bskor na 'gegs 'bros par 'gyuraro// gro ga'i 'dab ma la rdo rje
397b5(rgyud): nang du chud pa'i lte bar sku gsung thugs kyi sngags dang bsrung bya bri// de'i mtha' mar rab 'byam bri// de'i ni bar bstan pa'i 'khor gyi sngags bri// de'i mtha'
397b6(rgyud): mar shes rab kyi sngags bri/ de'i mtha' mar me'i tshogs bris te dril la lus la btsangs na gdon tha~Md kyis glags mi rnyed do// byi khung shar bltas sa dang ni// 'ug chung rus pa
397b7(rgyud): lang ka'i rtswa// sgo lcags khung bur blags byas te/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na kur ti sa nA karti chums dang phuT phuT swA hA/ sngags de brgya dang brkyang bzlas na// smyug mas yang
397b8(rgyud): yang daklog pa ni// sgo lcags 'byer bar the tshom med// dur khrod sol bas bosregs pas ni// slar yang snga ma dag tu 'gyur// rgya gram nang du chud pa yi// dmig gi gtsog/ 
398a1(rgyud): bring+ga ste sngags dang spel nas spring kha ru// ser ldeng bu rab btab pa ni// nges par de nyid rengs par 'gyur// byi ba nag po'i rtug pa dang / sha tsan ra yi rA dang ni// khyi na ga spu dag bsre
398a2(rgyud): gyur na// 'bru yi rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de sogs las kyi rim pa ni// bsam gyis mi khyab ji snyed pa/ khyod la bstan par mi nus pas// sngags grub de yis rtogs par 'gyur// bac+doMs phyag na rdo rje
398a3(rgyud): gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las las sna tshogs bstan pa'i le'u bcu bdun pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi char dbab pa'i cho ga ji lta bu

398b2(rgyud): b+hA ri sha ya btags te bzlas// nges par char rgyun 'bab par 'gyur// g.yo to 'bab par ma gyur na// gu gul dad pas gzer byas nas// phrin las sngags kyis srog kyang g.yo// gal
398b3(rgyud): te ma bab na rdo rje 'dzin pa phyung la tsha ba'i mar nag gis blugs la sngags bzlas na 'bab par 'gyur// yang na kham phor la sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i khrag dang shas sngar ltar byas la

398b5(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyur// des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na/ yung kar skye tshe snang spong dang / khra ma'i me tog bye mar byas// ra yi 'oms la bu sgyus sngags bzlas mtshe'am chu mig tu brtsad

399a5(rgyud): dang 'brel par shes par bya// mchod pa'i rdzas dang yam shing dang / du ba la sogs sreg pa'i rdzas// g.yas dang g.yo na gyi rim pa yin rang zhing rdo rje 'dzin par bskyed/ rgyas la
399a6(rgyud): dga' dang zhi la ni/ dbang la chags pa khro la bsang // gzhan rtsub bskrang ba la sogs yin// dmar ba me phyogs gdung ba'i las// bsrung ba rlung ste mnan pa ni// bder bral dbang dang dgug pa yang // lho yi
399a7(rgyud): phyogasu blta ba yin// bsang dang dbye 'ang de/ gzhin te/ shar ni byang phyogs rgyas pa yin// hUM las bskyed pa kha dog dmar// mdzes pa'i zhal gdangs cung zad gnag/ dbyug gu ril pa
399a8(rgyud): spyi blugs dang // bgrang phreng g.yon dang g.yasu bsam// ral tsong pan gsus pa che// rgyan dang ldan pa bsams la bstim// bsang gtong zor 'thung mchod yon dang // zhabs bsil la sog

399b2(rgyud): byad me ni rtse gcig 'bar gyur na// bsam pa tha~Mng 'grub par ston// gnyis 'bar rtse gsum mi g.yon// 'bar ba'i 'bras bu tha~Mng 'dzin/ rtsa bzhi mnyam zhing brtan pa ste// rgyas pa'i las la 'bras bu yod/ 
399b3(rgyud): zla 'ang snam la rim med// de ba med cing bai DAR+Ya ra 'ang // nang mang rigs rnams rgyas par byed// chu shel nor bu spangs pa dang / pad+ma rA ga gsal ba ni// sdig pa ma lus zad par 'gyur// 'phar ser
399b4(rgyud): puny+dza re ka dang / ngan du kha dege gsal ba ni// rgyal srid dpal rnams 'byor pa yin// ut+pa la ma la u sha'i di// tsam pa ka rang sig kar di/ ga pur a ga ru yi dros// dge zhing tshe rang dpal gyi

399b6(rgyud): kyi dbyibasu 'tshar// dag pa me yi dbyibasu bstan// ngan pa de las ci rigs bzlog// de rjes rjes kyi rim pa ni/ oM ag+na ye a mu ka s+ya shan+ti~M ku ru swAhA/ sreg blug se// oM bo d+hi br-ik+Sha ya sA hA/ a sha
399b7(rgyud): thi'i'o// oM badz+ra lA tA ya swAhA khrag sha'i 'o// oM badz+ra ku be rA ya swA hA/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi'o// oM badz+ra shaM dz+wa lA ya swAhA/ u dum bai ra'i 'o// oM sar+b+ba pA paM da pan badz+ra swa mA/ til gyi'o// 
401a1(rgyud): oM badz+ra puny+dza ye swA hA/ 'braso ba'i 'o// oM badz+ra saM pa de swA hA// zho dang zan gyi'o// oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ dur ba'i'o// oM badz+ra pra ti ha ta badz+ra ya sA hA/ ku sha'i 'o// rdzas rnams rang sngags
401a2(rgyud): ci rigs dbul// bstod cing gsol ba'i las bya ste// me yi snying khar dkyil 'khor mchod// gsang la sogs pa rim pa bzhin// sngar bstan pa las shes par bya// de rjes lngag mas ci rigs mchod/ nu
401a3(rgyud): la sogs rdzas rnams ni// lha yi zhal du mchod par bya/ yam shing ku sha la sogs pa// 'od la mchod par bya ba yi ma/ phyag tu zhal zas 'thor 'thung dbul// me tog bdug pa dgu dang 'ong // thib le sIng
401a4(rgyud): gsang gtor yang / sku la phul te zhabs bsil 'dra/ mar me la sogs rim bzhin gnas/ dkyil 'khor bsdu gsheg rim pa rnam/ mkhas pas nye bar brtags te bya/ dkyil 'khor lngas ni
401a5(rgyud): mchog sngar la/ me yis 'dong ba'i don sgrub byed// lag pan bya sa ni bde ba 'byir// jo ma sbrang rtsis rig pa 'phel// khro dang sra nams ma kun sel// dur bas srog ni 'dzin par byed na
401a6(rgyud): kyis brtson 'grus la dbang ste/ stobs 'phel sha ka yi no// 'bru 'phel so ba'i las yin te// sdig pa 'dag pa ti la yino// 'bras kyi nus pa 'phel byed pa// zhi la yungs kar kA shas sru // dpal
401a7(rgyud): bskyed pa ni bu shing ste/ yam shing gzi ster bar byed// 'byor pa 'phel ba mar yin no// sbyin bdag bkra shis thab yin te// dngos grub kun sIr mchod bu'i rdzas/ thabs dang shes rab gzar bu ste/ 
401a8(rgyud): bdung rtsi mar gyi tshim byed pa// mchod pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya// 'di na mdzes ma'i yul yin gyis// gzhan gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur// bac+doMs phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan
401b1(rgyud): ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan pa'i le'u sa bcu dgu pa'o// dpa' mo rdo rje bdems gsol pa// rdo rje 'chang khyod kyi gsang ba'i mtshan nyi shu gcig gi bstod pa ji lta bu
401b2(rgyud): lags// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsol pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag me shes rab ma yi mchog khyod la bshad kyis legs par zhon// nga yi ming
401b3(rgyud): ni nyi gcig/ dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang // mi 'gyur g.yung dang dbang bskur te// 'di dag mdzes ma khyod la bstan// na mo nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo g+ha kaN+Do b+ho
401b4(rgyud): tsat+tA badz+ra na maHsu b+hu Sha ni sa b+h+yo tsadz+dza ba p+lan mo rat+na kuD+D+h+yak+Shar si tsaN+DA badz+ri/ na mo b+ha kr-i badz+nye b+ha si ra tsat+ta badz+ra/ na maHA r+ya g+ho Sha sin+na tsat+tA badz+ra/ na maHpra sa rA yi te sI tsit+ta
401b5(rgyud): badz+raM na mo badz+ra la a ra tsi shau sI tsat+t+wa badz+ra/ na maHsa ts+li ba no ba la tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo dur ngan tang maM kam pa ratsaN+Da badz+ra na ma~M b+hai ra ba bi b+ha thA sa rA b+hu hrIHtsa
401b6(rgyud): na mo gro mo kro d+ha bi shwa ha nA prI b+hiHtsar+N+Na badzi na maHtsa tur s+phu ra r-i'i sis+t+ra tsar+dz+dza badz+ra/ na mo ma hA ba laM ba ra k+Sha ma tsadz+dza badz+ra/ na mo nai rAt+ma sa ha nin+da da tsa badz+ra na mo a me g+ha dza ga
401b7(rgyud): kr-is rbaSh+Ta badz+ra/ na mo shA ki bi shwa nir ma hA tsar+N+Na badz+ra/ na mi ha hA sa twa so nir g+ho Sha tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na ma a tsa lo ha ka dzang ho tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na moHpany+tsa bud+d+haHma mu ku Ta tsaN+DA brlan mo
401b8(rgyud): badz+ra ma hA be sha yud d+ha rod tsaN+Da badz+ra/ rdo rje gdum po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / glegs pa
402a1(rgyud): du byas te 'chang ba la ni phyogs bcu sangs rgyas tshad kyis rjes sbyong bar 'gyur// srung bar 'gyuraro// sbed par 'gyuro// skyob par 'gyuro// mtshan 'di rnams 'dzin pa de mtshams rje
402a2(rgyud): pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa byang bar 'gyuraro// lan cig tsam brjod pas kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du son dmyal ba rnam su mi skye'o// ngan 'gro gzhan yang spangs pa yi
402a3(rgyud): no// tsher badzang skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// rdo rje 'chang lnga brgya yang rtag tu mtshan 'di 'dzin pa'i phyi bzhin rje su 'brang // gdug pa can gyi klu rnams kyis mi 'tsho zhing slar long spyod sna
402a4(rgyud): tshogs sbyin no// 'chi ba'i dus su yang bai DUr+ya lta bu'i sa lus bstan te rang gi gan su khrid par 'gyuraro// mtshan 'di gnas pa'i sa de ni lcang lo can dang mtshungs pa yin/ mi
402a5(rgyud): ma yin po gdug pa can gyis nam yang gnod pa byed pa/ ra mi 'gyuraro// grub pa brgyad dang sangs rgyas kyang ster ba ra byed na/ gzhan lta yang ci smos te/ mtshan 'di dag rin
402a6(rgyud): po che dang 'dra bar lte bar bya'o// 'di ni dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// ched du brjod pa na che// gdug pa zad 'joms par byed/ dpal dang gzi brjid 'phel ba yin// phrin las sgro rnams thogs
402a7(rgyud): ba med/ 'di ni rdo rje 'chang yin pas/ zhin mtshan dus gsum klog pa yin// phyi bzhin rtag tu srung bar byed// nang dang gdon rnams kun las par// sman chen zhes pa thang 'joms// 'byung po kun
402a8(rgyud): gyis bskur ba ste/ mdzes ma khyod la bstan pa yin/ 'din nem dag legs pa'i lams su 'ching la gau na dpal gnas te// rtag tu mtshan 'di brjod par gyis// bac+doMs phyag rdo rje gsang ba
402b1(rgyud): mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig gis bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // dpal mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa// rdo rje 'chang gi rgyud 'di bshad pa
402b2(rgyud): dang \u0f7fswa ba dang / ji ltar gzung ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bec+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ zag med bde rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab mi yi mchog khyod la
402b3(rgyud): bshad kyis legs par don// phyi ma'i dusu nga yi rgyud// gsang ba sku gsung thugs kyi gter/ bla med rgyud rgyal rin chen 'di// byang chub sems ldan snying rje che// thos mang shes mchog tu
402b4(rgyud): gsal// ngang pa che zhing lha lha gus// bla ma bstan cing dbang sgur thog/ dam tshig sdom pa ma lus ldan// brtson 'grus che ba gzhan don dpal// 'jig rten bde la ma chags pas/ 
402b5(rgyud): rgyud 'dimanam dang bshad par bya// des las bzlog pa'i gang zag la// ming tsam bstan par mi bya'o// gal te bstan par/ gyur pa na/ sngags pa dam tshig rnams gyur te// nang
402b6(rgyud): 'byung po ma lus pas// nye bar gtses te 'chi bar 'gyur// de nas mnar mang sdug bsngal ni// grangs med 'das kyang thar mi 'gyur// de bas gsang ba sku gsung thug/ snying po dam pa 'di dag la/ rgyu
402b7(rgyud): btab ste mchod pa dang // bstod cing sba ba byas gyur na/ yid la re ba kun rdzogs shing // 'jig rten zad bde bar 'gyur// gleg pa ma sor na bcu drug la// ris bdun rgya yis btab nas kyang // rtag tu sbyi na/ 
402b8(rgyud): gtsug tu gzung 'di dang bral bar ma gyur na/ bstan pa de yin sgrub pa de/ sgrub pa chen po de yin te// sngags kyang de yin lha yang de// bla ma de yin slob dpon yang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun yod
403a1(rgyud): de yin bskyed dang rdzogs pa de// ma lus dbang yang de yin te// 'jig rten bya ba kun spangs nas// 'di la mchod par gyur pa ni/ tshogs gzhan ci yong rmongs pa'i rgyu// ci phyir 'di la la
403a2(rgyud): mi byed // ces bac+doMs kyis gsungs te// yum la rje su gtang ba'i don bstan pa ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen po// rdo rje padam par ster ma// rtog pa gcod mdzad yus khyod la// rgyud 'a
403a3(rgyud): gtad kyis legs par zung // gzungs ma yid 'ong rgyal ba'i sa// rnam dag mchod cing sdug bsngal 'joms// ma lus 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal/ rdo rje bdes phyag 'tsha'o// zhes bste
403a4(rgyud): nas rlud ga/ do// de nas yum gyis rje su bzung ste/ dus gsum bde gshegs ma lus pa'i// thugs sras po sde dpon che// 'jig rten thang 'dul mdzad pa/ 
403a5(rgyud): dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// gtum po dpa' bo 'dzi gas par byed// klu 'dul gzhan gyi mi thub pa// drag po 'dzu gas par byed pa'i lha// rdo rje gtum po khyod phyag 'tshal
403a6(rgyud): zhes bstod nas phyag dang bskor bas mnyes par byas nas slar yab kyi thugs kha'i thim par gyur to// de nas 'khor bad kyis mchod pas mchod cing baspong bas bstod do// gsang
403a7(rgyud): mngon par bstan rgyud kyi rgyal po gsungs pa leg so legaso zhes mngon par mgrin gcig tu ched du brjod pa ched du rjod de// rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa la mngon par
403a8(rgyud): dga' nas yings te mngon par bstod par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rgyud ji ltar bstan cing sba ba dang / rje su yi rang
403b1(rgyud): ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig go// // bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po la la tsanA gu chem
403b2(rgyud): dang khod kyi lots+tsha ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis byang phyogs sham b+ha la'i dpe dang bstan te bsgyur ba'o// slad kyis yul dbus kyi dpe dang // khya phye nas byung ba dang bstan nas legs
403b3(rgyud): par gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra su kha kro d+ha/ bong skad du/ rdo rje bde khros rgyud kyi rgyal po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' zade la phyag 'tshalo//

403b5(rgyud): pa rnams kyi dang po sems dpa' chen po yid cher gso/ sa pa gus pas bkur sti dang / rim gro dang / phung dung / dang / ste stang du byas te/ e ma'o byams mgon drug
403b6(rgyud): rje can 'gro ba'i seMn mang kun/ me yis tshig cing mtshon gyis beg/ mun par 'khyams nas ri yis nan// rlung gis khyer ba snyi re rje/ skyabs kyi ngas pa bka' stsal 'tshal// zhes
403b7(rgyud): zhus pas der ni mgon pos sku bstan te/ zhal gyi pad+ma rab phye nas// spyan gyi gzi mngangs kun la gzigs// ljags kyi dkyil nas bko' stsal pa// skyobs pa'i nges pa 'di yin gyis/

404a1(rgyud): / de nas mngon par bshang bya ba/ bkra shis maN+Dal legs byas la/ tshul dang 'thun pa'i dum dgod// de yang mug tsang sdang bdur drugs/ gzhan yang shing rtog 'bras bu dang / mngar gyi rnam

404a3(rgyud): pa'o// de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ sgrub byad rang rgyud dag pa yis/ bskyed tshul rgyas sam bsdus kyang rung / hUM las phyag na rdo rje ni// dbu gsum mthing ra phyag ni mdzes/ sku ni che zhing mtshungs pa med// zhabs kyis
404a4(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i nang du yang / chu srin sbal ba'i steng du brdzis/ g.yas g.yon dang po'i phyag gnyis kyis/ rdo rje gsor zhing dril chen brdung / mtha' gnyis drug pa zhal du 'dran// dbu gsum g.yas dkar

404a6(rgyud): ri rab la/ stangs bcas zhum pa med par bzhugs/ de ltar lha dang rang sbyar nas/ de nyid bstan pa'i yan lag gis/ rang lus tshags su gzhug par gyis/ rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las lha sgom pa'i le'u ste gsum
404a7(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ sgo gsum sbyor ba shes pa yis/ bsang ba'i snying po 'bum du bzlas/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+To ta ka ha nad ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ bco brgyad sngags
404a8(rgyud): kyi rgyal po 'di/ ma byung mi 'byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ 'di bzlas sngon du grub par 'gyur/ rtag tu mtshan ma bzang po 'byung / gzhan gyi sbyor ba 'od mi 'ong // ring la nges par ston par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i rim pa/ 
404b1(rgyud): thub mi thug/ 'badangs legs par brtag par bya// de nas gtor ba sbyin pa ni// oM AHhUM zhes rgyun tu gtong ngo // rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las gsang ba'i snying po dang mtshan ltas bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// 
404b2(rgyud): / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// rten ni rdo rje'i 'od du 'bar// brten pa 'phro tshad hUM 'bar// 'bar ba'i 'od zer kun tu 'phro// 'jig rten ma lus sbyang nas kyang // slar la thig
